[\[22b.1\]]ba ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud bzhi pham par byed pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la thug pa'i bar dang /_gnas pa dang /_'byung ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba 
[\[22b.2\]]dang /_'byor pa dang /_rgud pa 'jig rten du kun du ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de la sogs pa dus dang yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung nas spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas te/_thabs sna tshogs kyi tshul rnams kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de ni yang 
[\[22b.3\]]dag pa'i phul yin te theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba yul gcig yang dag par thob par byed pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni gdags pa'am rnam par 
[\[22b.4\]]rig pa med cing mi dmigs te/_ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ni spyod pa yang med mi spyod pa yang med bslab pa yang med bslab pa yang med bslab pa ma yin pa yang med do/_/'dul ba yang med 'dul ba ma yin pa yang med do/_/de la ni lus sam ngag gam yid 
[\[22b.5\]]kyi 'jug pa'am/_ldog pa mi dmigs so/_/de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'am/_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'am/_nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am/_rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/_chos zhes bya ba 'am/_dge 'dun 
[\[22b.6\]]zhes bya ba 'am/_lha zhes bya ba 'am/_klu zhes bya ba 'am/_gnod sbyin zhes bya ba 'am/_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram/_yod ces bya ba 'am/_
[\[22b.7\]]med ces bya ba 'am/_bsod nams zhes bya ba 'am/_bsod nams ma yin zhes bya ba 'am/_'khor ba zhes bya ba 'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/_'ching ba zhes bya ba 'am/_thar pa zhes bya ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu de la ni dus zhes bya ba 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]'am/_tshod ces bya ba 'am/_skad cig ces bya ba 'am/_yud tsam zhes bya ba 'am/_thang cig ces bya ba med do/_/de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba 'am/_skar ma zhes bya ba 'am/_nyi ma zhes bya ba 'am/_me zhes bya ba 'am/_rlung zhes bya ba 'am/_
[\[23a.2\]]chu zhes bya ba 'am/_sa zhes bya ba 'am/_mtshan mo zhes bya ba 'am/_nyin mo zhes bya ba 'am/_dus tshigs zhes bya ba 'am/_lo khyud 'khor zhes bya ba 'am/_zla ba zhes bya ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na rtog pas brtags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi 
[\[23a.3\]]mthar ltung ba ji snyed pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtags pa'i sgo ci snyed pa de dag thams cad ni de la mi 'byung zhing med de de mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos nyid de gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te de la gnyis su mi 'byung ngo /_/rigs 
[\[23a.4\]]kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' gnyis pa ma skyes pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyis su med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[23a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams su bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_spyod pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/_/bslab pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o/_/
[\[23a.6\]]thob pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob pa'o/_/rtsom pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsom pa'o/_/'dul ba ma yin pa de ni 'dul ba'o/_/gdags su med pa ni 'dogs pa'o/_/mthong ba med pa ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o/_/bsnyen 
[\[23a.7\]]bkur mi byed pa ni dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o/_/mi nyan pa ni chos nyan pa'o/_/khong du chud pa med pa ni khong du chud pa'o/_/'gro ba med pa ni 'gro ba'o/_/gnas pa med pa ni gnas so/_/stong pa nyid ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]rnams ni shes pa med pa thob pa med pa mngon par rtogs pa med pa mngon sum du byed pa med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni spyod pa spyad pa'o/_/gang du yang mi chags pa'o/_/gang du yang rjes 
[\[23b.2\]]su chags pa med do/_/gang du yang khong khro ba med do/_/gang du yang zhe sdang ba med do/_/de mi snang ma rmongs phyin ci ma log pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste/_rnam par mi rtog pa/_zhi ba/_legs par gnas pa/_zla med pa/_rab tu mi g.yo ba/_
[\[23b.3\]]sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang sems can gyi don bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba dus gsum du yang sgyid lug pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i khams ni rdul lam/_du ba'am/_sprin gyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/_sgyid lug 
[\[23b.4\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha'i khams rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di lta bu spyad pa yang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/_kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de la spyod pa 'di 
[\[23b.5\]]lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyan rdo rje chen po'i tog gi spyod pa rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pas bsod nams la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bya/_bklag par bya/_gzhan 
[\[23b.6\]]dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar 
[\[23b.7\]]to/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag gang dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnyed pa legs pa rnyed pa lags na/_gang dag nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yid la bgyid pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bcom 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa chen po bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[24a.2\]]pa'i tshul la skal ba mchis pa lags so/_/bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po bla na med pa 'phral du 'bras bu mang ba bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te/_rdo rje 
[\[24a.3\]]chen po 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i sgra 
[\[24a.4\]]sgrogs te gsung gcig tu rdo rje chen po 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i 'byung gnas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brjod cing shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der gshegs 
[\[24a.5\]]te byon nas rdo rje chen po pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol te/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam stobs dang ldan nam 'tsho 'am bde ba 
[\[24a.6\]]la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad slod nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang 
[\[24a.7\]]sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM badzra ka ra khaM swA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i gsang sngags gsungs nas sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de ya mtshan du che'o snyam du snying 'dun par gyur te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la blta zhing 'khod do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 
[\[24b.2\]]'khor de ya mtshan che snyam du rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la zhus pa/_gsang 
[\[24b.3\]]sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas/_/rnam par 'dren rnams mi gsung las/_/bde gshegs sras la rdo rje yis/_/dbang bskur du ni nges par gda'/_/gsang sngags spyod pa ye shes che/_/theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog_/der ni thams cad mkhyen nyid dang /_/don 
[\[24b.4\]]kun grub pa'i spyod pa 'thob/_/gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi/_/theg pa chen po thams cad mkhyen/_/sngon gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_/nags tshal mchog 'dir rtag tu bshad/_/sA la'i rgyal mtshan nyams dga' che/_/spyod pa yang dag bstan 
[\[24b.5\]]pa'i gnas/_/sngon gyi spyod las byung gyur pa/_/gsang sngags shes las byung bar bshad/_/gang dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang /_/mgon po gang dag da ltar byung /_/rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs pa rnams/_/de dag 
[\[24b.6\]]thams cad 'dir gshegs nas/_/gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi/_/theg pa chen pos dbang bskur 'di/_/bde gshegs sras la rab tu stsol/_/sangs rgyas drang srong chen po pa/_/kun gyi dbang ni bdag lags so/_/'jig rten phan par 'tshal bas na/_/
[\[24b.7\]]rdzogs sangs rgyas la gsol ba 'tshal/_/bstan pa kun la bsrung ba dang /_/dam chos rtag gnas bgyi slad du/_/bdag nyid che ba'i spyi gtsug tu/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis dbang bskur stsol/_/gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi/_/theg chen rtogs par khong 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]du chud/_/sngon gyi smon lam nges byung ba/_/sangs rgyas sras po grags chen lags/_/thog ma'i spyod ldan nges pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas 'dra tsam ci zhig ste/_/bde gshegs sras po chags med pa/_/byang chub mthar thug dbang thob lags/_/gsang 
[\[25a.2\]]sngags mgon pos rnam kun du/_/'khor 'di byin gyis brlabs lags na/_/gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas/_/ci slad mi gsung gyur cing bzhugs/_/thams cad ngo mtshar 'dzin 'gyur te/_/bde bar rtog la brtson par gnas/_/dpa' bo che rnams 
[\[25a.3\]]the tsom dang /_/de bzhin yid gnyis bsal du gsol/_/da ni dus la bab lags na/_/phyi shol ma mdzad bshad du gsol/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[25a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gsungs pa/_'dren pa rnams kyis gang sangs rgyas/_/chos nyid 'di ni gcig tu mchog_/rtag tu mnyam par gzhag rnams kyis/_/rab tu bsgrims te de rtogs bya/_/
[\[25a.5\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la sogs pas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po kun du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa/_gru bzhi lha ma pa/_sgo bzhi gtod pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi ras bskor ba/_sgo gang dang /_
[\[25a.6\]]rta babs dang /_stegs bus brgyan pa/_steng du rin po che'i bla res bres pa/_/rin po che'i dril bu dbyangs pa rin po che sna lnga'i srad bu bres pa byin gyis brlabs te/_dbus su rdo rje pad+ma'i khri dang phyogs cha brgyad du rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas bskor ba dang rdo rje'i phyir ras kun 
[\[25a.7\]]du bskor ba dang rdo rje'i phyi rgyab tu ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dang rdo rje'i srad bus bres pa dang rdo rje bcing bas bcings pa dang /_rdo rje'i phur bu dag gdab pa dang thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du byin gyis brlabs nas steng gi gtsug tor nas thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo /_/'od zer de dag phyung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar byas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i spyi gtsug du zhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu byang chub 
[\[25b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dga' zhing mgu nas rab tu dga' ste thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA a pra ti ha ta ba la/_ma hA badzra A dz+nyA ka ra Na/_na mo stu te swa hA/_de nas 
[\[25b.3\]]thogs pa med pa'i stobs rdo rje'i snying po smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang stong pa nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_stong 
[\[25b.4\]]pa nyid chen po'i mtha' las byas pa sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang yang dag par sdom pa dang /_des pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i lag tu byin no/_/de bzhin 
[\[25b.5\]]gshegs pa de dag gis kun du bzang po'i lag tu rdo rje byin ma thag tu/_de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_
[\[25b.6\]]nyan thos thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu/_
[\[25b.7\]]kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni lag na rdo rje'o lag na rdo rje'o zhes brjod do//_//'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/_bam po gsum pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam tshig 'di byin gyis brlabs nas yang 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA gu h+ya badzra d+ha ra swA hA/_de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[26a.2\]]thams cad du gsang ba'i bdag po gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags nas 'di lta ste/_snying po 'di'i mthu dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs 
[\[26a.3\]]dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dag mngon sum du zhugs so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa kun du bsrung ba dang 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'i snying po rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH
[\[26a.4\]]sarba thA badzra d+ha ra pi ra bi ra pi ki ra swA hA/_rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje chen po rgya che ba las byung ba'i lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang 
[\[26a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang /_las dang po pa rnams 
[\[26a.6\]]dang /_/sems can rnams kyi rgyab dang /_mdun dang ma nyal pa'am gnyid kyis log pa'am chos ston pa'am byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am sems can gyi don byed pa'am sprul pa rab tu byed pa'i bar du thams cad kyi drung na gzugs thams cad yang dag par 
[\[26a.7\]]ston pa'i cho ga shes pa lag na rdo rje cod pan can kun du snang ngo /_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis phyogs rdo rjes bcings pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA dig badzra Ta Ta Ta Ta Ta~M swA hA/_phyogs rdo rjes 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]bcing ba'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sems can ma rungs pa thams cad rdo rje'i bcing bas bcings par snang ngo /_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa'i rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH
[\[26b.2\]]sarba thA Tha Tha Tha Tha Tha~M swA hA/_sa rton gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di rdo rje'i sa rton to zhes bya ba'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa'i 'og gi 
[\[26b.3\]]rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/_namaHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tha ya Ta ya T+ra~M swa ha/_sa 'og gi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sa'i 'og gi phrag thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[26b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sa'i 'og gi rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'gro ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe 
[\[26b.5\]]b+h+yaHsarba thA ts+tshin+da/_sarba bIr+yA n+tu ra ga dim pra bar ma la b+d+ha bi dza ya swA hA/_rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems 
[\[26b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gnod sbyin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
[\[26b.7\]]sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badzra yak+Sha Ni gr-i ha da ta swA hA/_gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnod sbyin 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje bsgrags pa'i tog rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/_namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ha ra ha ra nA ga badzra swA hA/_de 
[\[27a.2\]]nas klu'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang klu'i gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni klu'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de 
[\[27a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ma tha ma tha badzra gan+d+ha rbahr-id ya swA hA/_rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang /_dri za'i 
[\[27a.4\]]gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni dri za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba 
[\[27a.5\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badzra pi ta tad+ha ra ka ra ha~M ha swA hA/_de nas rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[27a.6\]]dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje chen po 'di ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mi 'am ci'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badzra kin+na ra dan+da bi dza 
[\[27a.7\]]ya shap+ta swA hA/_de nas mi'am ci'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang mi'am ci'i gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mi'am ci'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ma hor ga badzra dz+wA lA ya swA hA/_de nas rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad 
[\[27b.2\]]dang lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lto 'phye chen po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba 
[\[27b.3\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badzra rAk+Sha sa kru ra da ha pa tsa Tu~M Tu~M Tu~M swA hA/_de nas rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang srin po'i gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 
[\[27b.4\]]srin po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badzra hr-i da he ha swA hA/_de nas rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i snying 
[\[27b.5\]]po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin 
[\[27b.6\]]gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po 'byung po'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ha le hU le badzra ma ha b+h+ya te shwa ra swA hA/_rdo rje chen po 'byung po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang 'byung po'i gnas 
[\[27b.7\]]thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'byung po'i rdo rje chen po zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ma hA badzra pi shA tse shwa ra bi shwa ra bi shwahr-i da ya ga~M mi tsi mi tsi ma Ta ma Ta badzra swA hA/_rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sha za'i gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[28a.2\]]chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po sha za mo'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badzra dU ti pi shA tsi ki ri mi ri mi le swA hA/_rdo rje chen po sha 
[\[28a.3\]]za mo'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sha za mo'i gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za mo'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin 
[\[28a.4\]]gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje srin mo'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA badzra ka rA li rAk+Sha si hA ri mi ri swA hA/_rdo rje srin mo'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang srin mo'i gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang 
[\[28a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin mo'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po gnon po'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA o stA ra ka badzra hi si swA 
[\[28a.6\]]hA/_gnon po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang gnon po'i gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnon po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de 
[\[28a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ki li ki li badzra bid+ha hi ni swA hA/_grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]dang /_/grib gnon gyi gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni grib gnon gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis brjed byed kyi gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying 
[\[28b.2\]]po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA gra~M gra~M s+pha ra Na badzra swA hA/_brjed byed kyi gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang brjed byed kyi gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[28b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni brjed byed kyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yang gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA bi ra badzra 
[\[28b.4\]]sarba gra ha ni kr-in tan dzA Ti ba la~M po da ra ra Ta ra Ta swA hA/_gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[28b.5\]]chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig du 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/_namaHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tha bar+dz+ra~M bar+dz+rasa~M 
[\[28b.6\]]sa~M swA hA/_lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang /_lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas rnams su/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lha la sogs pa'i snying po rdo 
[\[28b.7\]]rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad kyi gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA b+hai Sha dz+ya badzra a mr-i ta b+ha ba swA hA/_rtsi sman chen 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]po'i rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang /_rtsi sman chen po'i gnas rnams su/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rtsi sman gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur 
[\[29a.2\]]zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad kyi gdon bsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA tra Ta traT badzra swA hA/_nad bsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams 
[\[29a.3\]]cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rga ba'i gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga 
[\[29a.4\]]te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA a mr-i tod b+ha ba badzra la la la la swA hA/_rga ba 'gog pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes bya ba gcig nas 
[\[29a.5\]]gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ka ti badzra dza ya ha ha swA hA/_'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma 
[\[29a.6\]]thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'chi ba las rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rgud pa'i gdon bzlog 
[\[29a.7\]]pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA par ma badzra sarba shri ya~M a b+hu da yan+da da ma hA kA ru Ni ka d+ha ka d+ha ka swA hA/_rgud pa thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du/_
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rgud pa thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i stobs thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 
[\[29b.2\]]gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA oM badzra tsakra ba rti hU~M swA hA/_de nas 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_
[\[29b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad dang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang sha za la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[29b.4\]]lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i snying po gsungs pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA dzI shrI hU~M swA hA/_de 
[\[29b.5\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yang 'khor los sgyur ba chen po la sogs pa rdo rje chen po'i snying po rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la byin te/_byin nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin stug po'i dra ba chen pos thams 
[\[29b.6\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas chos gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na 
[\[29b.7\]]rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bsgyur nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lag tu rdo rjes dbang bskur bas khyod dbang bskur to/_/ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las byas pa'i rdo rje khyod la byin no/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen 
[\[30a.2\]]po'i rdo rjes khyod byin gyis brlabs so/_/rdo rje snying po thams cad khyod la bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyod la bstan pa thams cad kyi don bya ba dang bsrung bar gnang ngo /_/khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs so/_/rigs kyi bu da rang 
[\[30a.3\]]gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nges par ston cig_/rigs kyi bu lag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po shod cig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/chos kyi rjes ci skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[30a.4\]]ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ngo mtshar thob pa dang bdag rnam par rgyal ba'i chos dam pa thob pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[30a.5\]]lag na rdo rje de'i tshe rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas lag na rdo rje rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi 
[\[30a.6\]]khams thams cad dang zhing thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos kun du rab tu g.yos so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos rab tu g.yos kun du rab tu g.yos so/_/chem chem rab tu chem chem kun du rab tu chem chem mo/_/'gul 
[\[30a.7\]]rab tu 'gul kun du rab tu 'gul lo/_/ldeg rab tu ldeg kun du rab tu ldeg go/_/shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'o/_/nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'o/_/lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o/_/byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'o/_/dbus mtho na mtha' 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]dma'o/_/mtha' mtho na dbus dma'o/_/snang ba chen po yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa na 'khod pa de dag kyang 'od des snang bar byas nas sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag phan tshun blta zhing gcig gis 
[\[30b.2\]]gcig mthong nas sems can gzhan dag gcig 'dir skyes pa blta sems can gzhan dag gcig 'dir skyes pa blta'o snyam mo/_/de dag gis bltas pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po'i gzungs kyi chos ston to/_/de dag gis chos 
[\[30b.3\]]de thos nas dad pa rnyed de shi 'phos nas lha'i nang du skyes te shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba chen pos dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang mchod pa 
[\[30b.4\]]bya ba'i phyir dong ngo /_/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de dang thang cig de la chad par gyur to/_/de'i tshe dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi ming yang mi grag par gyur to/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi ra bas kun du 
[\[30b.5\]]bskor ba dang /_lha'i zas dang /_skom dang /_yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa dang lha'i lus dang ldan par gyur to/_/shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur to/_/lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba 
[\[30b.6\]]gnyis kyang lhan ne ma yin lhang nger ma yin te de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad mog mog por gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la snyoms 
[\[30b.7\]]par gzhag ma thag tu de'i tshe sgu'i bu ga thams cad nas khro bo'i rgyal po dag byung nas hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po ni bsgrags/_lag na rdo rje ni thogs/_gdong gi dpral ba'i khro gnyer ni bsnyer/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbyangs gcig gis go 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]bar byed cing /_kye ma rungs pa yi srin po dang /_/pha yi mtshun dang sha za dang /_/ma mo'i gdon dang 'byung po dang /_/brjed byed grub pa sbrul 'dzin bcas/_/gnon po bgegs dang log 'dren sogs/_/gdon gyi tshogs rnams thams cad ni/_/ser sna 
[\[31a.2\]]yongs su btang byos la/_/dul ba'i sems kyis mnyam gzhag ste/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/mkhas pa dag ni skyabs su dong /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan 'di/_/rdo rje rab tu 'bar 'dzin pa/_/nags tshal dam pa nyams dga' bar/_/yid 'ong khang pa brtsegs 
[\[31a.3\]]na bzhugs/_/dong la mgon po de las ni/_/dam tshig yongs su stsal byos la/_/nga rgyal nga yi med byos te/_/sa rnams kun du rgyu bar byos/_/gzhan du khyed cag de ring nyid/_/rdo rje 'bar ba rab 'khrugs pa/_/'bar ba 'jigs chen de dag gis/_/mgo ni shin tu 'gems 
[\[31a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/de ltar khro bo'i rgyal po dag_/'jig rten khams 'di thams cad du/_/btsal med tshig gis go byas nas/_/rdo rje 'dzin gyi gan dengs shig_/ces ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/de'i tshe 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i 
[\[31a.5\]]bstan pa 'di tshol zhing sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ngo /_/chos la skyabs su dong ngo /_/dge 'dun la skyabs su dong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de'i 
[\[31a.6\]]tshe rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang 
[\[31a.7\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi gnas rnams su/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lag na rdo rje drag 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]po'o/_/lag na rdo rje drag po'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul chen po la smon lam shin tu btab par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje drag po'i snying po 'di 
[\[31b.2\]]smras nas/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas te dkyil 'khor chen po smras so/_/de la slob dpon gsang sngags kyi/_/de nyid don mkhas tshul khrims ldan/_/sgyu rtsal rnams la 
[\[31b.3\]]mkhas pa dang /_/snying rje'i rang bzhin bzod dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun sems/_/nges pa dang ni dus shes pa/_/g.yer ba sro shi ma yin pa/_/mdangs che zab mo'i chos la mos/_/bzlas brjod la brtson rtag tu ni/_/bsam gtan byed pa la dga' zhing /_/lag 
[\[31b.4\]]na rdo rje'i ming thos pa'i/_/sngags pa de yis rtag par ni/_/mchi ma 'byung zhing spu zing byed/_/rmi yang lag na rdo rje la/_/yid gnyis the tsom med pa dang /_/dus shes de bzhin tshod shes shing /_/byas gzo de bzhin bden smra ba/_/slob dpon de lta bus ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i 
[\[31b.5\]]mchod rten na ma sku gzugs kyi spyan snga'am rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs te gong du smos pa'i snying po de dag re re zhing yang 'bum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu lag na rdo rje drag po'i snying pos yungs kar dang mngar gsum bsres pa dag lan khrir sbyin sreg bya'o/_/
[\[31b.6\]]de'i 'og tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzlas brjod bya'o/_/drag po'i snying po chen pos slob ma dag par bya ba dang bsrung ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu sa brtag par bya ste rdo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo 
[\[31b.7\]]med pa skye ba po grog spur la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sa ni thams cad du yang shis pa'o/_/der gza' gtum po la ma bab pa tshes grangs ngan pa ma yin pa mi mthun par 'jug pa dang phrad pa spangs pa dang nyi ma dang byed pa dang yud tsam dang rgyu skar dang gza' bzang por mngon 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]pa la las brtsams na shis par 'gyur ro/_/dmar dang ser dang dkar dang nag_/'dren ma pa ni lnga pa yin/_/gang yang rung ba'i sa der ni/_/mkhas pas khru gang tsam brkos nas/_/sngags pa yis ni brkos pa de/_/sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya/_/
[\[32a.2\]]lhag na rnam pa kun du mchog_/kha da chad ni 'bring du brjod/_/gang bar ma gyur sa de spang /_/mkhas pas der ni brtsam mi bya/_/dkar po dag ni zhi bar bstan/_/dmar po dbang gi don du 'dod/_/ser po rgyas par shes par bya/_/nag po drag shul spyod par shes/_/der 
[\[32a.3\]]ni mchod yon gtor ma dang /_/mar me spos dang bdug pa dag_/bsgrims te byin nas bsrung bya ste/_/mnyam par gzhag nas sa la brjod/_/de yi nub mo sa der ni/_/ku sha bting ba'i steng du nyal/_/gal te sa de rung gyur na/_/der ni bsgrims te bri bar bya/_/sngon gyi 
[\[32a.4\]]sangs rgyas mi mchog gis/_/de ni bgegs med yin zhes brjod/_/gzhan du na ni der mi bri/_/bgegs dang bcas pas phung bar 'gyur/_/de nas sngags pa langs nas ni/_/de yi nyin mo mkhas pa yis/_/sa ni shin tu yongs bzung phyir/_/sbyin sreg bya ba 'di byas te/_/
[\[32a.5\]]sbrang rtsi dang ni 'o ma dang /_/mar bsres sbyin sreg mchog tu 'gyur/_/zhi ba'i sems kyis sbyin blugs ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya/_/de nas sngags pas sa brkos la/_/sa de nyid kyis slar dgang ngo /_/yang na dkyil 'khor las kyi tshe/_/sngags pas spos kyis sa dgang 
[\[32a.6\]]ngo /_/legs par brdung zhing mnyam 'jam bya/_/phyogs cha dag dang sgo yi rnams/_/kun kyang rnam pa thams cad du/_/rin chen sna lngas rab mdzes bya/_/bye brag tu ni sa dbus su/_/rin chen sna lnga gzhag par bya/_/de nas yon tan ldan pa yi/_/slob ma dag ni gdams te 
[\[32a.7\]]gzung /_/bzlas brjod sbyin sreg rnams kun gyis/_/bsgrims te de dag bsrung bar bya/_/mchog sbyin rdo rje blo ldan gyi/_/gsang sngags 'di ni zlos pa ni/_/skyon dang yon tan rnam dpyad pas/_/de dag thog mar brtag par bya/_/yon tan 'di dag ldan pa ni/_/shin tu brtags 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]nas gzung bar bya/_/reg dang bzo ni phun sum tshogs/_/gsal zhing dul la brtson pa dang /_/shes rab ldan brtan byas gzo dang /_/dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang /_/gzugs mdzes yan lag yongs rdzogs dang /_/gang dag theg chen dga' ba dang /_/byang chub 
[\[32b.2\]]sems dpa' kun la yang /_/yang dag rtag tu gus gnas dang /_/pha la gus dang ma la gus/_/bla ma mchod la rab brtson dang /_/gang dag pha rol don spyod la/_/snying nas rtag tu 'jug pa dang /_/gang dag drang zhing des pa dang /_/g.yo med cing ni chos brtson dang /_/lus dang 
[\[32b.3\]]ngag dang yid dag pa/_/de dag nye bar brtags gzung bya/_/gang dag snying nas 'jig rten 'di/_/'jig rten pha rol yid ches dang /_/bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang /_/dmangs rigs gang dag chos brtson zhing /_/sngags kyi theg pa rtogs 'dod pa/_/de dag bsgrims te 
[\[32b.4\]]gzung bar bya/_/nyan thos thag pa can rnams min/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg can min/_/zhar ba lag zha za ma dang /_/sgur po 'on pa mi thung dang /_/gang dag sna leb gyur pa dang /_/de bzhin mig yon gnong bag can/_/'jungs dang byas pa mi gzo dang /_/mkhas snyems sems 
[\[32b.5\]]dang g.yon can dang /_/sngags kyi theg pa skyed chen gyi/_/theg pa la ni ma mos pa/_/de dag nam yang gzung mi bya/_/de dag bstan 'dir skal ba med/_/bstan bcos mi shes mi gzung ste/_/thor bu thor bu 'dzin pa dang /_/de bzhin bla ma mi gus pa/_/smad pa de dag ring 
[\[32b.6\]]du spang /_/gang dag yan lag ma tshang dang /_/rkang zha dag dang theng po dang /_/yan lag lhag par gyur pa rnams/_/mkhas pas bsgrims te yongs su spang /_/ci skad smos pa'i slob ma rnams/_/de'i tshe cho ga bzhin brtags te/_/gcig pu yod na'ang de gzung ngo /_/yang na 
[\[32b.7\]]slob ma bzhi zhig gzung /_/de nas smyung ba byed bcug la/_/spos dang me tog rnams kyis ma chod/_/dkyil 'khor nang gi sa la ni/_/ku sha gding ba bting ba la/_/des pas slob ma lhan cig tu/_/der ni rtag tu nyal bar bya/_/slob dpon yud tsam yud tsam zhing /_/de tshe 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]slob ma rnams la ni/_/theg chen zab mo rgya chen 'di/_/chos kyang rab tu bshad par bya/_/gsang sngags brjod las 'byung ba yi/_/yon tan kun du brjod na phan/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/_/rdzu 'phrul la sogs yongs su brjod/_/pha rol 
[\[33a.2\]]rgyun la snying rje ba/_/de dag yud tsam yud tsam brjod/_/nam gyi bzhi cha lus pa'i tshe/_/gal te rmi lam bzang rmis na/_/dkon mchog gsum la gzhol rnams kyis/_/nam langs pa dang legs rab tu/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar 'dug nas ni/_/khyod kyis de dag brjod 
[\[33a.3\]]par gyis/_/pad+ma'i steng na 'dug na mchog_/gzung dang mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/_/rgya mtsho mthong ba rmis pa dang /_/rkyal dang 'thung la'ang de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas mthong na snying dga' ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba rnams dang /_/'jig rten rang sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[33a.4\]]dang /_/nyan thos rnams dang gang mkhas pa/_/de dag mthong na snying dga'o/_/me yi phung po grags pa dang /_/ba lang khyu mchog glang chen dregs/_/rta ni dkar por gang 'gyur ba/_/de dag mthong dang zhon pa dang /_/ba lang khyu yang shis pa yin/_/bram ze dang ni rgyal 
[\[33a.5\]]rigs dang /_/rgyal po dge bar grags pa dang /_/sdug pa'i gnyen dang grub pa dang /_/nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang /_/de dag mthong na shis par 'gyur/_/rmi lam smra zhing gtam zer dang /_/rang gi mgo bo gcod pa dang /_/sha chen za bar byed pa dang /_/khrag gis 'khru bar 
[\[33a.6\]]byed pa dang /_/de bzhin mi gtsang nub pa dang /_/zho dang 'bras chan za ba dang /_/chang yang 'thung bar byed pa dang /_/skra 'breg pa ni mchog yin no/_/so yang lhung par gyur pa dang /_/thang shing dang ni n+ya gro d+ha/_/de la 'dzegs pa shis par 'gyur/_/legs so bu zhe'am 
[\[33a.7\]]blo ldan zhes/_/sgra ni de skad thos pa dang /_/yid du 'ong ba'i bud med dang /_/nyin mo nyal po byed pa dang /_/tshangs pa drag po'i nyi ma dang /_/khyab 'jug dang ni zla ba dang /_/lus ngan po dang nor sbyin dang /_/brgya byin dang ni chu lha dang /_/de dag mthong ngam smra ba dang /_/
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'bel gtam byed na nges par 'grub/_/gzhan yang de lta'i rmi lam dag_/dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis gzung /_/rmi lam de las bzlog pa dag_/'jigs med rnams kyis gzung mi bya/_/sa la rgyug dang mchong ba dang /_/gar byed pa dang glu len dang /_/rgod dang bong bu rnga mo 
[\[33b.2\]]la/_/zhon pa shin tu ngan pa yin/_/'bru mar gyis ni lus bskus dang /_/gcer bu dag dang smra ba dang /_/zhar ba theng po sgur po dang /_/mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa dang /_/phag rnams dang ni khyi rnams dang /_/bong bu rnams kyang de bzhin te/_/ma he rnga mo ce spyang dag_/rmi lam 
[\[33b.3\]]mthong na rtag tu smad/_/rtse gsum rtse gsum gdengs thogs dang /_/mig dmar shin tu 'jigs pa dang /_/gcer bu dag dang sna leb dang /_/sdigs mo byed pa'i 'jigs byed dang /_/mdog gnag mi bzad chen po dang /_/gos sngon gzugs byad mi sdug pa/_/su yis rmi 
[\[33b.4\]]lam rmis pa ni/_/de la dngos grub yod mi 'gyur/_/zung shig rgyob shig choms shig ce'am/_/zo shig ces pa'i mi bzad sgra/_/drag po 'jigs byed khro thos dang /_/phung dang ma rnyed thos pa dang /_/bya rgod bzhad dang bya dkar dang /_/'ug pa bya rog byi la dang /_/byi ba sdig pa 
[\[33b.5\]]sre mo sbrul/_/gang dag gzhan yang skye bo gdug_/de dag rmi lam mthong gyur tam/_/reg par gyur na'ang mi dge'o/_/de nas phyi de nyin par slob dpon gyis rdo rje'i snying pos ba'i rnam lnga la sngags kyis btab ste slob ma bos la rdo rje drag po'i snying pos bsang gtor byas te/_/shing 
[\[33b.6\]]a shwa t+tha'i lo ma kong bu'am snyim pa'i nang du snod du bya ba sbyin zhing khyed de ring zas kyi tshod shes par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/nyi ma nub na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs med kyis/_sreg blugs dang yam sreg shing nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas a shwa t+tha'i shing 
[\[33b.7\]]ngam/_/yang na u dum bA ra las/_/sor brgyad tsam gyi so shing bya/_/thog ma gcig ni me tog brgyan/_/rdo rje drag po'i sngags btab la/_/de dag la ni bca' phyir sbyin/_/shar gyi phyogs su mdun bstan nam/_/yang na byang phyogs bstan te gzhag_/gsang sngags mgon 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]po dran byas la/_/gar bltas de bzhin shes par bya/_/de nas phyi nyin slob ma rnams/_/smyung ba byed du bcug nas su/_/rdo rje mi pham me zhes bya/_/srid pa gsum po rmongs byed pa/_/rtag dran bya phyir de dag la/_/dri ma med pa'i gzungs sbyin bya/_/snying du 
[\[34a.2\]]sdug pa'i dam tshig brjod/_/nyams pa la yang lhag par brjod/_/sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed/_/mchog tu bkra shis byed par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa/_/thams cad kyi ni ma yin te/_/sdig pa thams cad byang byed pa/_/de ni kun du rtag dran bya/_/slob dpon 
[\[34a.3\]]gyis ni thams cad du/_/rtag tu mnyam par gzhag sems kyis/_/sna lnga'i tshon las byas pa yi/_/thig skud rab tu bzang blangs la/_/bsgrims te sa 'di thams cad la/_/thig ni legs par gdab par bya/_/dkyil 'khor dkyil du 'dug nas su/_/sngags pas de bzhin 
[\[34a.4\]]gshegs rnams dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba dang /_/'khor los sgyur ba dran byas la/_/bdag nyid der bsgoms byas nas su/_/de'i sngags yid kyis dran byas la/_/de nas shar phyogs kha bltas te/_/shar phyogs nyid du thig gdab bo/_/de nas yang ni bsgyur byas 
[\[34a.5\]]la/_/nub phyogs kha bltas 'dug nas su/_/nub phyogs nyid du thig gdab/_/de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis/_/byang gi phyogs su kha bltas la/_/byang phyogs nyid du thig gdab bo/_/de nas yang ni bsgyur byas la/_/lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te/_/rnam par dbye 
[\[34a.6\]]ba shes pa yis/_/lho phyogs su ni thig gdab bo/_/de ltar nang logs dkyil 'khor ni/_/cha brgyad yod pa rab tu bya/_/de nas de lta'i tshul gyis ni/_/phyogs bzhi yongs su bskor byas la/_/kun du gru bzhi lham par ni/_/rab tu bsgrims te gdab par bya/_/dbus 
[\[34a.7\]]kyi gnas nas byung nas su/_/me yi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la/_/sngags pas sngags kyi cho ga bzhin/_/shar phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/_/de nas cho ga shes pa yis/_/gus pas dbang ldan phyogs song la/_/nub phyogs su ni kha bltas te/_/byang phyogs ngos kyi 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]thig gdab bo/_/dbang ldan phyogs nas song nas su/_/rlung gi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la/_/der ni lho phyogs kha bltas la/_/nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/_/gnas de nas ni de byung la/_/bden bral phyogs su song nas su/_/me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni/_/thig 
[\[34b.2\]]skud legs par gdab par bya/_/kun du gru bzhi lham par ni/_/de ltar gnas de byas nas su/_/de nas phyi rol de bzhin du/_/cho ga bzhin du cha brgyad bya/_/tshad ni bcu drug khru yin te/_/slob dpon nyid kyi khru yis so/_/de nas byung la blo ldan gyis/_/cha gzhan dag 
[\[34b.3\]]ni bya bar bya/_/phyi rol sa dang bcas par ni/_/khru grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/_/der yang snga ma ci bzhin du//cha brgyad nyid du gcad par bya/_/brgyad pa nas ni gzung nas su/_/sngags pa yis ni thams cad du/_/'khor sa'i thig ni gdab par bya/_/gnas gsum dag tu nges 
[\[34b.4\]]par yang /_/cha brgyad gang dag 'tsham pa yi/_/thog ma'i sgo ni gdod par bya/_/dkyil 'khor rim pa bar ma ni/_/snga ma nyis 'gyur sgor shes nas/_/rim pa gsum par sum 'gyur dang /_/sgo gang dag kyang mkhas pas bya/_/rta babs dag gi tshad rnams ni/_/dbus kyi 
[\[34b.5\]]cha dang mnyam par bya/_/lha yi gtso bo rnams la yang /_/sgo gang dag ni bya bar bya/_/rim pa gsum du rnam dbye bas/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor legs phye la/_/sngags mgon gnas la 'dug nas su/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/tshon rtsi 'dir ni bye brag tu/_/
[\[34b.6\]]rin chen sna lnga yin par 'dod/_/sA lu btags pa'i phye yang rung /_/ci ltar 'byor pas byar yang rung /_/gos dkar bgos shing gtsang byas la/_/dul zhing ze'u kha bcings nas su/_/bsgrims te byang shar phyogs mtshams nas/_/tshon rtsi dag ni dgye bar bya/_/rdo rje khu 
[\[34b.7\]]tshur tshul gyis sam/_/yang na lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas sam/_/snod kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis sam/_/rig byed 'don pa'i lag pas so/_/thog mar dkar po dgye bar bya/_/de yi 'og tu dmar po dgye/_/de yi 'og tu ser po dgye/_/de yi 'og tu ljang khu dgye/_/thams cad 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]dag gi nang rol du/_/sngags pas tshon ni nag po dgye/_/cha brgyad dag tu gang bstan pa/_/dbus kyi cha yi cha rnams ni/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste/_/de dag rdo rje bcing tshul 'dod/_/gdan ni pad+ma ra bstan pa ste/_/mchog tu dkar zhing mdzes pa 
[\[35a.2\]]yin/_/de yi steng du rdo rje gzhag_/de bzhin rdo rje'i gtsug tor te/_/me lce 'bar ba'i snying po bya/_/mdor na sa bon ldan par bya/_/de la shar phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog gzhag par bya'o/_/lho phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i 
[\[35a.3\]]rgyal po'i dbang po'o/_/nub phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med do/_/byang phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'o/_/byang shar phyogs mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can no/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su ni de bzhin 
[\[35a.4\]]gshegs pa rnam par gzigs so/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob bo/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig go/_/mdor na dbus kyi pad+ma ni/_/'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa ste/_/'dab ma 
[\[35a.5\]]dkar po shar phyogs su/_/nub phyogs su ni dmar po nyid/_/byang phyogs su ni ser po ste/_/lho phyogs su ni nag po nyid/_/'dab ma lhag ma rnams kun du/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dren mar gsungs/_/de yi snying po'i dbus su ni/_/bum pa zla ba'i 'od 'dra bri/_/de yi steng 
[\[35a.6\]]du rlung chen te/_/'bar zhing tog dang ldan par bri/_/zla gam 'dra zhing drag po ste/_/'od ni dbyar gyi sprin mdog 'dra/_/rlung gi steng du me bri ste/_/dbyibs ni gru gsum gnas pa yin/_/rtags ni 'bras bu zur gsum pa/_/'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang mtshungs/_/de yi dbus 
[\[35a.7\]]su pad+ma bri/_/'od ni dus mtha'i me dang mtshungs/_/de yi snying po'i dbus su ni/_/'khor los sgyur ba bri bar bya/_/de la bcom ldan 'das de ni gzugs sam phyag rgya'am yi ge ci rigs su gzhag par bya'o/_/phyag rgya gzhag na rdo rje ste/_/bsgrims nas sa bon ldan 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]par bya/_/de yi phyi rol cha rnams ni/_/brgyad po dag tu'ang snga ma bzhin/_/sngags pas cho ga ci bzhin du/_/lha rnams rnam par dgod par bya/_/de la shar phyogs su ni 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs pa dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor dang 
[\[35b.2\]]bcas pa rdo rje ut+pala'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o/_/shar lho'i mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/lho phyogs su ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 
[\[35b.3\]]'khor du lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas shing rdo rje 'chang thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i 
[\[35b.4\]]phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/nub phyogs su ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su ni pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems 
[\[35b.5\]]dpa' byams pa 'khor dang bcas pa ril ba spyi blugs kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/byang phyogs su ni pad+ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o/_/
[\[35b.6\]]byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o/_/phyogs bzhir ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'khor dang bcas par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang 
[\[35b.7\]]du chud par bri'o/_/de la rnam thos kyi bu'i phyag rgya ni dbyug to yin no/_/'phags skyes po'i phyag rgya ni be con no/_/mig mi bzang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o/_/lus ngan gyi phyag rgya ni zhags pa'o/_/phyi rol khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi lha ma pa sgo bzhi gtod pa sgo 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]khang dang rta babs dang mu ran shin tu rnam par phye ba khor yug chen pos yongs su bskor ba'o/_/de'i nang rol du ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de la shar phyogs su ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa 
[\[36a.2\]]bri'o/_/de'i byang phyogs su ni tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/tshangs pa'i byang phyogs su ni dbyangs can 'khor dang bcas pa pi bang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de dang nye bar sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa bum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/
[\[36a.3\]]de'i byang phyogs su ni dpal chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya'am yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor dang bcas pa mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/brgya byin gyi lho 
[\[36a.4\]]phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor dang bcas pa shing rta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/me'i phyogs su ni drang srong me lha 'khor dang bcas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/lho phyogs su ni gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa gshin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/
[\[36a.5\]]de'i shar phyogs su ni 'chi bdag gi dril bu bri'o/_/mtshan mo nag mo'i ni tog go/_/nag mo'i ni zhags pa'o/_/drag po'i chung ma'i ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o/_/tshangs pa'i chung ma'i ni pad+ma'o/_/khyab 'jug gi chung ma'i ni 'khor lo'o/_/gzhon nu'i chung ma'i ni mdung thung ngo /_/
[\[36a.6\]]phag gi chung ma'i ni tho ba'o/_/tsA muN+Di'i ni mi thod do/_/dbang po'i chung ma'i ni rdo rje'o/_/lus ngan gyi chung ma'i ni dbyug to'o/_/gshin rje'i nub phyogs su ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams 'khor dang bcas pa kha'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/sha za rnams ni dra ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas 
[\[36a.7\]]pa bri'o/_/gnon po rnams ni lcags kyi rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/grib gnon rnams ni gdugs rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/brjed byed rnams ni lag pa brang la bcar ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni lag pa bkan pa'i 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/srin mo rnams ni mche ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya'am lce rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/sha za mo rnams ni rdo rje bab col gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/bden bral gyi phyogs su ni bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/
[\[36b.2\]]nub phyogs kyi sgo'i lho phyogs su ni chu lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de nas sgo dang nye bar dbang phyug chen po mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de dang nye 
[\[36b.3\]]bar dka' thub zlog pa rtse gsum gdengs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/sgo'i byang phyogs kyi ngos su tshogs kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de'i byang phyogs su thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas 
[\[36b.4\]]pa dbyug to rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa ba dan gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/byang phyogs su rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug to rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de dag gi 
[\[36b.5\]]shar phyogs su khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de'i 'og tu nam mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa 'dab ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de'i shar phyogs su sna tshogs phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po rnams dang ljon pa la sogs pa mi 
[\[36b.6\]]'am ci'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rang rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/_de la dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rnga phre'u dang pheg rnams so/_/mi'am ci'i phyag rgya dag ni sku'i pi bang la sogs pa brdung bsgreng ba rnams so/_/de nas lto 'phye chen po rnams dang 'bab 
[\[36b.7\]]chu chen po rnams rang gi zer chu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag po rig byed 'don pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de dag gi shar phyogs su zla ba 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma dkar po dang bum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/nub sgor ni ki li ki la rang 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]gi phyag rgya bri ste drag po rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/byang sgor ni sgo srung gnyis bri bar bya ste/_de la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ni dbyug to'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/shar sgor 
[\[37a.2\]]ni khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis bri bar bya ste de la 'jig rten gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/be con sngon po can ni be con gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/lho sgor ni thub par dka' tho ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/mngon phyogs su ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa 
[\[37a.3\]]bri'o/_/'og logs su ni rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho'i 'gram na sring mo bzhi rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/_de la tum bu ru'i phyag rgya ni dbyug to'o/_/rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni mdung thung rtse gsum pa'o/_/rnam par rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni pad+ma'o/_/mi pham ma'i phyag rgya ni 'khor lo'o/_/
[\[37a.4\]]gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o/_/sring mo bzhi'i lho phyogs su ni smin drug gi bu 'khor dang bcas pa mdung thung gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/byang phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams ral gri dang ras la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/'khor thams 
[\[37a.5\]]cad kyi gnas ni thig ler bri'o/_/de dang de dag de ltar lhag mar brjod pa thams cad ni thig ler byas te/_thams cad kyang rdo rje drag pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi las ci bya ba de thams cad ni rdo rje drag po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje dbang 
[\[37a.6\]]bskur ba las dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa'i cho ga'o/_/cho ga shes pas de lta bur/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mchog bris te/_/byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas su/_/rab tu bsgrims te mchod par bya/_/de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnag_/kha yi cha ga shel kha can/_/mgrin 
[\[37a.7\]]pa ring zhing lto che ba/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga blang bar bya/_/sa bon rin chen sna lngas bkang /_/spos kyi chus kyang rab tu bkang /_/kha rgyan yal gas khebs byas shing /_/de bzhin 'bras bus kha bkang la/_/mgul chings kyis kyang bcings byas la/_/kha dog ci rigs rnam par 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]dgod/_/sgo bzhi po ni thams cad du/_/bum pa snga ma ci bzhin du/_/brgyad nyid du ni gsungs pa ste/_/dgu pa de ni bsang gtor ba/_/rdo rje drag pos rnam kun tu/_/bsgrims te de ni sngags kyis gdab/_/bcu pa dbus su shes par bya/_/de ni 'khor los sgyur la dbul/_/rta 
[\[37b.2\]]babs rnams ni mdzes pa ste/_/rin chen rnam pa bzhi las bya/_/yang na yid 'ong shing las bya/_/tsan dan yang na gzhan yang rung /_/dum bu ma yin ma grugs pa/_/gas pa med cing 'dzer ba med/_/ba ru na dang sha ma dang /_/sa la krI kang ka ta'ang rung /_/rin chen dril bu rab 
[\[37b.3\]]dpyangs shing /_/dar dang ras la sogs pas brgyan/_/khru ni brgyad dam bdun nam drug_/me tog phreng dang ldan par 'dod/_/steng du rin chen bla re bre/_/mu tig rgyan phreng rnam par dpyangs/_/dar dang ras kyang dpyangs par bya/_/dkyil 'khor las ni che bar bya/_/kha dog sna 
[\[37b.4\]]tshogs ba dan rnams/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu dpyangs par bya/_/srad bu la ni brgyu bar bya/_/dril bu sgra dbyangs ldan par bya/_/kha dog sna tshogs gdugs kyi rnams/_/ci rigs par ni bri bar bya/_/rin chen bzhi las byas pa 'am/_/de med zangs las byas pa'ang rung /_/
[\[37b.5\]]mchod pa'i yon gyi snod bzhi zhig_/blo dang ldan pas gzhag par bya/_/sna tshogs spos su gsungs pa ni/_/gur gum dang ni tsan+dan dang /_/spri ka la sogs ci yang rung /_/srog chags yan lag kun mi rung /_/sna tshogs bdug pa dbul byas te/_/a ga ru dang sgron shing 
[\[37b.6\]]dang /_/ga bur shi ri ba sa ka/_/ce pog dang ni ru rta dang /_/sA la'i shing gi thang chu 'am/_/yang na thang shing thang chu dbul/_/rdo rje 'byung ba'i rig pa 'am/_/rdo rje drag po bzlas brjod bya/_/ut+pa la dang pad+ma mchog_/tsam pa ka dang klu shing dang /_/ke sar dang ma li ka/_/
[\[37b.7\]]mya ngan 'tshang dang skya snar dang /_/ta ka ra dang pu na ga_/dong ka'i me tog mdzes pa yin/_/ka ra bIr ku mu da/_/sna ma d+ha nu ka ri yi/_/me tog ci rigs dbul bar bya/_/de bzhin lha bshos sna tshogs te/_/'o thug zho dang 'bras chan dang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsi rab tu bzang /_/
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]bag chos dang ni la du dang /_/sbrang rtsi gzhag pa'i cung peng dang /_/a sho brti ben ka/_/spyan gzigs khaN+Dar grags pa dang /_/shi re b+he d+ha ka mo ta/_/gar+b+hod ka ra ka dang ni/_/be reg dang ni dwe tshe dang /_/sha ku la dang par pa ta/_/'bru yi la thug 'breng bu dang /_/shun 
[\[38a.2\]]tha pa li ka dag dang /_/g+ha ri ka dang swa sti ka/_/mon sran gre'u zhu te'u dang /_/rtsa ba dang ni drungs pa dang /_/'bras bu sna tshogs dbul bar bya/_/sran tshod kha dog ldan pa dang /_/sge'u gsher nges par dbul bar bya/_/sran tshod ril bu che chung dang /_/b+he ga na dang saM b+ha d+hi/_/bu 
[\[38a.3\]]ram bsres te khu sman dang /_/rab tu bsgrims te byas pa dang /_/bu ram sna tshogs btsos pa dag_/kun du rnam pa thams cad dbul/_/rnam pa sna tshogs zho dag dang /_/zho bsrubs bu ram btags nges dbul/_/'o ma legs par btsags pa dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[38a.4\]]btung ba rnams kyang dbul/_/kha ri'i dbu ba kha ra dang /_/mar dang bu ram 'bru mar dang /_/sbrang rtsi dang ni lan tshwa dang /_/dge bar grags pa dbul bar bya/_/btung ba bsgos pa byas pa dang /_/tam bu la dang mal cha dang /_/snod spyad bzang zhing mdzes pa dang /_/rnam pa sna 
[\[38a.5\]]tshogs rtsi sman dang /_/rab tu bsgrims te cho ga bzhin/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyob la dbul/_/de nas so so re re la'ang /_/na bza' ras zung re re dbul/_/me long mig sman yid 'ong dang /_/dung dang de bzhin gi wang rnams/_/byang chub tshogs ni bskang ba'i phyir/_/mgon 
[\[38a.6\]]po kun la dbul bar bya/_/skyob pa rnam pa thams cad du/_/de ltar legs par mchod byas nas/_/de nas sngags pas sbyin sreg bya/_/snying po cho ga bzhin du bya/_/sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig ni/_/cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya/_/thams cad 'grub byed yid 'ong ba/_/
[\[38a.7\]]zho dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o/_/yi ge klog pa bzhi zhig kyang /_/phyogs bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya/_/de la shar phyogs bzhag pa ni/_/'phags pa shes rab pha rol phyin/_/byang phyogs su ni mdo bzhag pa/_/gser 'od dam par dam pas bzhed/_/nub phyogs su ni 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]gzhag bya ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin/_/sdong po bkod pa'i tshul chen ni/_/lho phyogs logs su shes par bya/_/dkyil 'khor lha rnams ci lta bar/_/de dag la yang gus par mchod/_/dam pa'i chos ni bklag pa 'di/_/bsrung ba rnams kyi dam pa yin/_/
[\[38b.2\]]de nas lha rnams thams cad kyang /_/de yi tshe na dgyes par 'gyur/_/gang dag 'jig rten mi srun pa/_/de dag phyogs phyogs phyogs 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de lta bas na rnam kun du/_/de tshe dam chos bklag par bya/_/slob ma thams cad bos nas su/_/de dag la ni skyabs gsum 
[\[38b.3\]]sbyin/_/sdig pa mi bya brjod par bya/_/sdom pa dag kyang 'dzin du gzhug_/mkhas pas cho ga 'di bzhin du/_/byang chub sems kyang bskyed du gzhug_/rdo rje drag po'i sngags chu yis/_/de nas kun la bsang gtor bya/_/dam tshig yongs su brjod byas la/_/mkhas pa nang 
[\[38b.4\]]du zhugs nas su/_/gos rnams yongs su brje bya ste/_/sngags kyis mngon du gdab par bya/_/de tshe snying rje ldan pa yis/_/slob ma de dag gdong bkab la/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i dam tshig gi/_/phyag rgya sngags pas 'ching bcug ste/_/lag tu me tog byin byas nas/_/de 
[\[38b.5\]]tshe snying gar yi ge bsam/_/stsob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni/_/me tog de dag dor du gzhug_/blo dang ldan pas slob ma yi/_/rna g.yas rdo rje dril bu bzhag_/rdo rje rnga zhes bya ba yi/_/lha mo chen mo g.yon par ro/_/me tog rnams ni gar bab pa/_/lha de de yi yin par 'dod/_/
[\[38b.6\]]de ltar slob ma bcug byas nas/_/de tshe dam tshig bstan par bya/_/mkhas pas zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_/'di ltar sbyin sreg rab tu bya/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/dbang 
[\[38b.7\]]dang de bzhin drag shul spyod/_/sbyin sreg las ni mdor bsdus pa/_/sems dpa' chen pos brjod par mdzod/_/cho ga thams cad rgyas pa dang /_/de bzhin tha dad las kyang gsungs/_/sems dpa' chen po'i gnas gang du/_/me yi thab kyi khung bu bgyi/_/yam sreg 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]shing ni ji lta bur/_/las ni ci zhig brtsam par bgyi/_/khyab bdag thab khung bka' stsol la/_/bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[39a.2\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so legs/_/khyod kyis dri ba gang byas pa/_/de dag thams cad brjod par bya/_/g.yeng ba med pa'i yid kyis nyon/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus su ni/_/sbyin sreg me thab khung bu bya/_/de tshad gtan la 
[\[39a.3\]]dbab pa ni/_/khru gang tsam ni brjod pa ste/_/mtho gang tsam zhig brkos nas su/_/dbus su rdo rje gzhag par bya/_/kha khyer yang ni der byas te/_/mkhas pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su bya/_/rtsa bas rtse mo dkris pa yi/_/ku sha dag ni der dgram mo/_/de ltar kun du 
[\[39a.4\]]legs par yang /_/sngags pas shin tu dgram par bya/_/ha cang mi nye mi ring bar/_/sbyin sreg me yi thab byas te/_/tshul bzhin du ni byas nas su/_/der ni sbyin sreg brtsam par bya/_/ku sha sbams steng bdag 'dug ste/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams dran byas nas/_/de 
[\[39a.5\]]nas me ni 'bar byas la/_/de la bsang gtor bya ba tsam/_/de yi 'og tu me der ni/_/me tog gcig cig gzhag par bya/_/de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/rang gi phyag rgyas dgug par 'gyur/_/de la me yi phyag rgya ni/_/lag pa g.yas pa drang brkyang ste/_/mthe bo 
[\[39a.6\]]mthe chung drung du gzugs/_/sngags 'dis dgug par bya ba'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ag+na ye hA bya kA bya bA ha na ya swA hA/_blo dang ldan pas rig sngags kyis/_/de nas dgang blugs sbyin sreg bya/_/de la dgang blugs byin nas ni/_/slob ma g.yon 
[\[39a.7\]]du gzhag par bya/_/de dag re re'i phyir yang ni/_/dgang blugs nyi shu lnga lnga bsreg_/rnam pa sna tshogs las kyi rnams/_/'di lta bu dag rab byas te/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/dbang dang drag shul spyod pa'o/_/zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'o mar bcas/_/mar dang 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]'o ma sbrang rtsi'o/_/rgyas la zho dang 'bras chan dang /_/gang dag gzhan nas gsungs pa'o/_/drag shul spyod pa tsher mar gsungs/_/dbang byar snga ma ci bzhin du/_/las 'dod 'jigs pa med rnams kyis/_/ci rigs par ni sbyin sreg bya/_/ci ltar rigs 
[\[39b.2\]]pa so so las/_/de dag la ni yon dgug go/_/yang na yid la gang 'dod pa/_/de ni ci bder sbyin par gyis/_/de yi tshe na slob dpon la/_/slob ma rnams kyis yon dbul lo/_/ma byin na ni dam tshig nyams/_/dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/dper na nyi 
[\[39b.3\]]ma zla ba gnyis/_/'jig rten mig tu mkhas pas 'dod/_/de bzhin skye bo 'di la yang /_/slob dpon de ni mig 'drar 'dod/_/dper na me yi khams des ni/_/bud shing thams cad sreg par byed/_/de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya/_/mi shes bud shing sreg par 
[\[39b.4\]]byed/_/dper na chu yi khams de ni/_/'jig rten gdung ba thams cad gcod/_/de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang /_/gdung ba kun gcod shes par bya/_/dper na rlung gi khams de ni/_/'jig rten thams cad rtag tu bsgrub/_/de bzhin slob dpon slob ma la/_/dge ba 
[\[39b.5\]]rnam par sgrub par byed/_/dper na lus can thams cad la/_/sa ni rten du grags pa yin/_/de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang /_/chos kyi rten du 'dod pa yin/_/dper na bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad/_/chos kun rtogs par khong du chud/_/de bzhin slob dpon shes par 
[\[39b.6\]]bya/_/dper na dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/gsang ba thams cad mthun par 'dzin/_/de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang /_/'dir ni sngags kyi gsang ba 'dzin/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa rnams/_/de ni rtag tu rjod par byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/_/
[\[39b.7\]]bsngags pa chen po'ang rjod par byed/_/dper na sangs rgyas mig 'dra ste/_/yang dag lam ni ston mdzad pa/_/de bzhin sngags pa 'jigs med kyang /_/theg chen gnas 'di ston pa yin/_/bdag ltar sngags pa de bzhin te/_/slob dpon ci bzhin rgyal de bzhin/_/
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]slob dpon gyi ni yon tan bzung /_/skyon rnams nam yang gzung mi bya/_/yon tan 'dzin na grub par 'gyur/_/nyes pa rnams ni dngos grub nyams/_/slob dpon la ni smad byas na/_/'jig rten dag na tshe thung zhing /_/de bzhin ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur/_/nya pa 
[\[40a.2\]]la sogs rigs su skye/_/'di ni nyes kun 'byung gnas te/_/mkhas pas bla ma skur mi gdab/_/chos 'dod rnams kyis slob dpon la/_/rtag tu rgyun du mnyes par bya/_/gang na rgyal ba'i sras gnas pa/_/sa de mchod rten 'dra ba yin/_/der ni rgyal sras 
[\[40a.3\]]thams cad dang /_/bdag kyang snying las chung ba yin/_/sbyin sreg las kyi dam pa 'di/_/dpa' bo khyod la brjod pa ni/_/sems can rnams la phan bzhed pas/_/mgon po rnams kyis sngon chad bshad/_/sbyin sreg bya ba'i las rnams la/_/gang gis 'di ltar rnam 
[\[40a.4\]]shes pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin/_/dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/_/lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las me'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par phye ba'o//_//'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/_bam po bzhi pa/_de nas byang chub sems 
[\[40a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas snga mas bsngags pa yi/_/dbang bskur dkyil 'khor brjod par bya/_/khru gsum tshad gcig gzhag nas su/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/de yi 
[\[40a.6\]]tshad ni khru bzhi ste/_/dkyil 'khor logs su mngon phyogs bya/_/der yang sngags pas cha bsnyams shing /_/kun du gru bzhi lham par bya/_/sngags pa sngags kyi tshul gnas te/_/me yi phyogs su 'dug byas la/_/de tshe byang du mngon phyogs te/_/cho ga bzhin du thig 
[\[40a.7\]]skud bre/_/snga ma'i gnas ni spangs nas ni/_/dbang ldan phyogs su 'dug byas te/_/rlung phyogs spyod yul bar du ni/_/byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/_/rlung gi phyogs su 'dug nas su/_/lho phyogs logs su mngon bltas te/_/bden bral phyogs kyi bar du ni/_/
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/_/de bzhin rlung gi phyogs spangs te/_/bden bral phyogs su 'dug byas nas/_/de nas shar phyogs mngon bltas te/_/sngags pas gsang sngags rjes dran zhing /_/me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni/_/lho phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/_/
[\[40b.2\]]cho ga 'di bzhin thams cad kyang /_/gru bzhi lham par rab tu bya/_/mkhas pas thog ma nyid du ni/_/nang rim cha brgyad byas nas su/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du/_/mkhas pas rim pa gnyis pa bya/_/dbus kyi pad+ma mdor brjod na/_/'dab brgyad 
[\[40b.3\]]ze bar bcas pa ste/_/'dab ma'i bar bar thams cad du/_/rdo rje dag ni bri bar bya/_/de dag la yang snying po bri/_/rang gi snying pos bskul nas ni/_/phyogs skyong brgyad po de dag kyang /_/ci bzhin gnas su rnam par dgod/_/de la nang rol grwa rnams su/_/'jig 
[\[40b.4\]]rten skyong ba rnam par dgod/_/bgegs kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_/sgor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gzhag_/dkyil 'khor lha la ci lta bar/_/der yang mchod pa rab tu bya/_/ras dang bla re dril bu dang /_/gdugs dang me tog rnams kyang dbul/_/mu tig phreng sogs me 
[\[40b.5\]]tog phreng /_/ci nus ci 'byor dbul bar bya/_/de la dbus su ni phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan bri'o/_/rin po che sna bzhi'i bum pa rin po che dang /_sman thams cad kyis bkang ba/_rin po che me tog dang /_me tog kun du rgyas pa dang /_'od dpag med 
[\[40b.6\]]dang /_/mi 'khrugs pa dang /_kun du bzang po dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_byams pa dang /_sa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis spyi bor dbang bskur ro/_/sngags pa pad+ma dam pa der/_/rab tu bzhag nas bdag nyid kyis/_/me tog spos kyis 
[\[40b.7\]]mchod byas la/_/mar me mchod yon dbul bar bya/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang /_/sil snyan sgra rnams phyung ba dang /_/rol mo'i sgra sil snyan mang gis/_/yang dag mngon du dga' byas la/_/skyob pa kun gyi mngon sum du/_/bsgrims te de ni dbang bskur ro/_/
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]ji ltar gling bzhi'i dbang phyug go/_/'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang bskur ba/_/de bzhin sngags pas ngo mtshar dang /_/bkra shis kun gyis dbang bskur ro/_/me tog rnams dang bdug pa dang /_/spos mchog rnams kyis yang mchod la/_/lag pa g.yas su rdo rje 
[\[41a.2\]]dang /_/g.yon du 'khor lo bzhag nas su/_/slob ma de la 'di skad du/_/rdo rje slob dpon khyod 'gyur te/_/de nas rdo rje ldan pa khyod/_/rdo rje'i chos ni rab brjod pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis khyod lag tu/_/ting 'dzin 'byung ba'i rdo rje byin/_/deng nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/
[\[41a.3\]]lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/_/sdang ba rnams ni tshar bcad dang /_/bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa/_/de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/_/'dren pa rnams kyis rdo rje byin/_/ci ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal/_/bdag por bya phyir dbang bskur ba/_/de bzhin chos rgyal dbang bskur 
[\[41a.4\]]phyir/_/rdo rje blo ldan dbang bskur brjod/_/rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis/_/de la bsrung ba bya bar bya/_/slob ma rdo rje chos brjod la/_/lag pas blang ba byas nas su/_/dkyil 'khor chen po der khrid la/_/dam tshig dag ni rnam bsgrags te/_/byang chub sems ni gtang 
[\[41a.5\]]mi bya/_/khyod kyis byams dang snying rje dang /_/lag na 'khor lo gzhar mi btang /_/blo dang ldan pas thabs rnams dang /_/rdo rje bzhag pa khyod kyis ni/_/nam yang yongs su gtang mi bya/_/blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/sangs rgyas dam tshig 'di yin te/_/ci ltar 
[\[41a.6\]]rang gi lus bsrungs pa/_/de ltar khyod kyis 'di srungs shig_/de byas sangs rgyas byas gzo ba/_/sangs rgyas sras zhes brjod pa yin/_/gzhan du na ni dam tshig nyams/_/rdo rje can du khyod mi 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyi/_/rigs ni byang chub sems yin te/_/
[\[41a.7\]]rtags ni snying rje yin zhes brjod/_/thabs ni dbang du bstan pa ste/_/rdo rje bzhag pa go cha bgos/_/rdo rje mtshon cha thogs pa yin/_/khyod la lha rnams phyag kyang 'tshal/_/khyod ni bsrung ba kun du byed/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang /_/rnam pa kun du bsrung ba mdzad/_/
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba rdzogs so//_//de nas 'jam rab dpal ldan pa/_/ya mtshan gyis ni mig rgyas pas/_/rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad smras/_/dpa' bo gzi brjid chen po legs/_/khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[41b.2\]]dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog_/gang gis dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/_/gsang chen bcas pa yang gsungs shig_/lha rnams thams cad so so dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi/_/phyag rgya dang ni sngags bcas pa'i/_/sbyor ba rnams kyis rab sbyor dang /_/bsam gtan 
[\[41b.3\]]brtan bca' man ngag dang /_/rig pa'i chos ni yang shod cig_/brtul zhugs dang ni spyod dang rtags/_/yul dang dus kyi rnam kun dang /_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/de bzhin drag shul spyod pa dang /_/'byung po dag ni dgug pa dang /_/nor yang rab tu dgug pa dang /_/gsang sngags 
[\[41b.4\]]spyi yi mtshan nyid dang /_/bye brag rnams kyang bshad par mdzod/_/'jig rten 'dir ni 'dor ba su/_/gzhan du 'gro ba su zhig gsungs/_/'di dang gzhan 'bras 'jig rten na/_/rnyed dka' rgyal bas rnam gsungs dang /_/las ni gzhan gyis byas 'gyur la/_/'bras bu gzhan spyod 
[\[41b.5\]]'gyur ba dang /_/dkyil 'khor 'di dang sngags rnams kyi/_/'bras bu bdag la bshad par mdzod/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/_/mi yi lus kyang rnyed par dka'/_/gsang sngags 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/_/dad pa phun sum tshogs par dka'/_/sangs rgyas kun 
[\[41b.6\]]gyis de ring khyod/_/lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/_/bstan pa 'di yi bya ba la/_/gsang chen 'dzin par dgongs pa ste/_/dkyil 'khor 'di yi bar dag gi/_/cho ga rgyas par bshad par mdzod/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag 
[\[41b.7\]]na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis gang dris pa'i tshig 'di ni legs par smra ba ste/_de'i phyir 'jam dpal rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig_/'jam dpal de la dkyil 'khor gyi gsang chen 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]ni lha gang yin pa de kho bo yin no/_/kho bo gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor yin no/_/lha'i gnas gang yin pa de kho bo'i gnas so/_/kho bo'i gnas gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor ro/_/dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ni gsang sngags te dkyil 'khor med par gsang 
[\[42a.2\]]sngags med de/_'jam dpal gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs yod pa dang gzugs med pa'o/_/de la gzugs yod pa ni ri mor bri ba'o gzugs med pa ni bri ba ma yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang bri bar bya ba ni brir rung ba'o/_/mi bri ba ni brir mi rung ba'o/_/
[\[42a.3\]]gzhon nu de la bri ba ma yin pa ni las thams cad bya'o/_/bri ba ni bya ba dang las kyi rgyu tsam du zad de/_de ni pha rol dad pa bskyed pa yin la/_gcig gis ni lha'i gnas su byin gyis brlab par bya ba ste don gnyis bsgrub pa dang bya ba dang rnal 'byor tha dad pa ma yin pa'i dkyil 
[\[42a.4\]]'khor dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/slob dpon las dang /_bya ba dang /_dus dang /_byed pa dang /_nus pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_bsam gtan du bya ba dang /_man ngag dang /_rnal 'byor thams cad dang ldan pa bdag la dbang thob pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/gzhon 
[\[42a.5\]]nu de la man ngag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_slob dpon dang slob ma'o/_/slob dpon ni slob dpon gyi yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/de ni de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug cing tshig bzhin du byed la mi slu ba'o/_/tshad ma de ni man ngag go/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan yang tshad ma gang 
[\[42a.6\]]zhe na/_gang mdo sde dang gsang sngags kyi don mi slu ba dang por shes nas de'i ro myong ba dang don de shin tu chung pas de las mi nyams pa dang brtan par 'gyur ba de ni chos nyid do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa de ni man ngag bshad pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[42a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang gsungs pa de de bzhin te gzhan du mi 'gyur bas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad ma ste de ni mi slu ba'o/_/de mngon par rtogs pa dang mngon sum du byas pa dang 'bras bu thob pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do/_/gzhan yang chos nyid de thob par byed pa'i 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]rnal 'byor la sbyor ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i sngags pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du bzhed do/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni gsang chen 'di/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis sngon bshad de/_/gzhan du bri ba 
[\[42b.2\]]'ba' zhig ni/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu bral ba yin/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang lha ni rnam pa gnyis te/_'bras bu'i ngo bo dang rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo'o/_/de la 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni chos nyid rtogs pa'o/_/chos nyid de mngon sum du thob pa gang yin pa ni 'bras bu'o/_/'bras bu gang yin 
[\[42b.3\]]pa de rnam par smin pa'o/_/rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ngo bo'o/_/ngo bo gang yin pa de tha snyad du lhung ba'o/_/tha snyad du lhung ba gang yin pa dang tha snyad kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni btags pa'o/_/de ni bya ba'o/_/bya ba gang yin pa de las so/_/chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni 'bras bu med/_/
