[\[42b.4\]]mngon par rtogs pa med/_mngon sum du bya ba med/_rnam par byang ba med kyang las dang rnam par smin pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'bras bu dang /_thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[42b.5\]]byang ba ston to/_/gsung ngo /_/brjod do/_/'dogs so/_/rab tu 'jog go/_/rnam par 'grel to/_/'chad do/_/tshul bstan pa sna tshogs kyis tha snyad 'dogs so/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[42b.6\]]rnams dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten 'di zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten pha rol zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba zhes bya ba dang /_rga ba zhes bya ba dang /_'chi ba zhes bya ba dang /_nad ces bya ba dang /_rgud pa zhes bya ba dang /_phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba dang /_'dus 
[\[42b.7\]]byas zhes bya ba dang /_'dus ma byas zhes bya ba dang /_'gro ba zhes bya ba dang /_'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_rig pa zhes bya ba dang /_ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang /_shes rab can zhes bya ba dang /_rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang /_'dod chags pa zhes bya ba dang /_zhe sdang zhes bya ba dang /_gti mug 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]ces bya ba dang /_'ching ba zhes bya ba dang /_thar pa zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_sred pa zhes bya ba dang /_de kho na zhes bya ba dang /_yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi slu ba zhes bya ba dang /_mig ces bya ba dang /_rna ba zhes bya ba dang /_sna zhes 
[\[43a.2\]]bya ba dang /_lce zhes bya ba dang /_lus zhes bya ba dang /_yid ces bya ba dang /_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_sgra zhes bya ba dang /_dri zhes bya ba dang /_ro zhes bya ba dang /_reg ces bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /_chos zhes bya ba dang /_dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang /_nyan thos zhes bya 
[\[43a.3\]]ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_lan cig 
[\[43a.4\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /_bden pa mthong 
[\[43a.5\]]ba zhes bya ba dang /_'jam dpal gzhan yang lha zhes bya ba dang /_klu zhes bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_dri za zhes bya ba dang /_lha ma yin zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha' lding zhes bya ba dang /_mi'am ci zhes bya ba dang /_lto 'phye chen po zhes bya ba dang /_mi zhes bya ba 
[\[43a.6\]]dang /_mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba dang /_skyes pa zhes bya ba dang /_bud med ces bya ba dang /_ma ning zhes bya bar 'dogs so/_/'jam dpal de ltar na las dang rnam par smin pa med pa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 
[\[43a.7\]]gyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i sgo nas 'dogs pa mdzad do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos de la ci ltar gdags pa'am rnam par rig par mdzad/_lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_'jam dpal las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa nyid la gdags pa'am rnam par rig 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]par mdzad de/_'jam dpal las dang rnam par smin pa med pa stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid de la yang gcig ces bya ba'am gnyis zhes bya ba 'dogs te/_de ltar grangs bstan pa rnams dang /_ming gi brdar byas pa rnams kyis 'dogs pa mdzad pa la ltos/_'jam dpal gzhan 
[\[43b.2\]]yang nam mkha'i khams las dang rnam par smin pa med pa yin na/_nam mkha' la yang sngon po zhes bya ba dang /_ser po zhes bya ba dang /_dmar po zhes bya ba dang /_dog ces bya ba dang /_yangs zhes bya ba dang /_dag ces bya ba dang /_ma dag ces bya bar 'dogs so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[43b.3\]]de bzhin du las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dogs pa mdzad de/_'dogs pa de yang las dang rnam par smin pa med pas byas pa yin na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams 
[\[43b.4\]]kyis khong du ma chud par zad de/_de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba la gzhug pa'i sgo dkyil 'khor 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/_/gsum ni 'dus par gyur pa las/_/sngags 'byung bar ni 'dir bstan to/_/phyag rgya'ang de bzhin 'byung ba ste/_/gzugs can ma yin 
[\[43b.5\]]bstan du med/_/rtag tu 'jig rten gsum rnams su/_/thogs pa med cing chod pa med/_/dper na gtsub stan brten nas su/_/gtsub shing gtsubs pa byas gyur na/_/mi yis rtsol ba byas rgyu las/_/stobs dang ldan pa'i me 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gsum ni 'dus pa las/_/
[\[43b.6\]]gsang sngags dang ni phyag rgya lnga/_/chen po dag ni 'byung 'gyur te/_/byung nas yid la bsams pa yi/_/las rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin/_/'jam dpal dper na/_rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis bsams ma thag tu lha'i zas dang /_skom dang /_rgyan dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_
[\[43b.7\]]shing rta dang /_bud med dang /_khang khyim dang /_gzhal med khang la sogs pa thams cad 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_lha 'dus pa las thams cad 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che skyon thams cad dang 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]bral ba de med par ma gyur na de'i tshe gang bsams pa de thams cad 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du sngags kyi tshul yang khong du chud par bya'o/_/'jam dpal gang gi tshe rang gi gzugs yongs su spangs te/_lha'i nga rgyal la the tsom med pa thob pa de'i tshe gsang sngags 
[\[44a.2\]]kyi chos nyid des chos nyid ston te/_de'i tshe des tshig gis de'i rnam pa ston pa na bya ba nus par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal brten pa'i chos nyid ci ltar las byed nus par gyur pa la ltos/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na rgyal brten nas rgya'i 'bur 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rdzas med na yang rgya'i 
[\[44a.3\]]'bur mi 'byung la yod kyang bya ba dang las dang bral na rgya'i 'bur mi 'byung ste/_'jam dpal gnyis ka yang phan tshun du ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/_/mis rtsol ba byas pa de las ci 'dir rdzas 'byung ba'am/_'on te las kyi bya ba de 'byung ngam gang yin te/_snga phyi 'gal ba'i phyir brten 
[\[44a.4\]]nas gsang sngags sam/_phyag rgya 'byung ba tsam la ma gtogs par 'byung ba med do/_/'jam dpal sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ci snyed par byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sbyor ba yang de snyed du blta'o/_/'di la rgyal bar byed nus pa su yin zhe na/_phyag rgya dang /_
[\[44a.5\]]gsang sngags dang ldan pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis rgyal bar byed do/_/'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam pa mang por brtags pa'i phyir te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di ni gsang sngags so/_/'di ni phyag rgya'o/_/'di ni lha'o zhes 
[\[44a.6\]]rnam par gzhag par mdzad do/_/chos kyi dbyings de ni gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa/_gzung ba ma yin pa/_dkrug pa ma yin pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rnam par gzhag pas rnam par bzhag go/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 
[\[44a.7\]]phyir bya ba thams cad byed do/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang ci ltar gzhan gyis las byas pa la ci ltar gzhan spyod ces gang smra ba de ni/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu dbang phyug rang gi sems la dbang thob pa de 'dod pa bzhin du longs spyod sna tshogs la yongs su spyod par byed 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]de/_'di lta ste/_lha'i khang khyim dang /_gzhal med khang la sogs pa dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta dang /_bud med dang /_bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa mngon par sprul nas bdag kyang yongs su spyod cing gzhan dag la yang sbyin par byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 
[\[44b.2\]]nyid kyis sngags de bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gzhan gyis byas pa la gzhan yongs su spyod do/_/'jam dpal gcig byed pa la mang po yongs su spyod pa'i rnam grangs yod de/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am zhing pa bzhin no/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang 
[\[44b.3\]]'jig rten 'di 'dor ba ni su gzhan du 'gro ba ni su zhes gang smra ba ni/_'jam dpal gang gi tshe sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs 'dus ma byas kyi khams la gnas pa de'i tshe de 'jig rten 'di yin no/_/gang gi tshe sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs de nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams 
[\[44b.4\]]la gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten 'di 'dor zhing /_'jig rten pha rol du 'gro'o zhes 'dogs te/_/'di ni chos nyid rtogs pa'i gang zag gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos nyid ni 'dus ma 
[\[44b.5\]]byas kyi khams su rnam par gnas te/_de ni nam yang 'dus byas kyi dri mas mi gos so/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rdo rje ni 'dam rdzab kyi rnyog pa'i dri ma'i skyon thams cad kyis mi gos so/_/de bzhin du chos nyid de yang 'dus byas kyi skyon thams cad kyis mi gos so/_/'jam dpal byis 
[\[44b.6\]]pa so so'i skye bo'i 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa dag ni nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyud du lhung ba/_ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa las byung ba'i sems pas srid par skye ba rnams nyon mongs pa can rnam par sgrub bo/_/de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas te/_'du byed kyi tshogs 
[\[44b.7\]]'di 'gags pa'i tshe lha'o snyam mam/_mi'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal nyid rgyud de'i rjes su 'brel to/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rab tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin blta ba'i mi ni bdag gi bzhin yon tan khyad par can 'di lta bus bzang ngo zhes sam/_mi bzang ngo 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]zhes rtog par byed kyis de dang tha dad pa yang ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa'ang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang 'khrul pa'i phyir sems la ngar 'dzin pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_gsang sngags rnams kyis dug dang rims la sogs pa sel ba'o/_/
[\[45a.2\]]tshe 'di ma yin pa'i 'bras bu gang zhe na/_mngon sum dang /_rtog pa'i dra ba dang bral ba bsam gtan rtogs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ste/_rjes su dpag pa dang dpag par bya ba'i rtog ge'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa yid ches pa'i lung gis grub pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_rigs pa 
[\[45a.3\]]dang ldan pa dang /_rang gis myong ba'i rnam pa ni 'bras bu bstan te/_'di ni tshe 'di ma yin pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang drag shul spyod pa'i las smros shig ces gang smras pa ni bya dgos par 'gyur bas na khro bo nyid brtsam par bya ste/_zhi ba'i sems dang /_snying rje dang /_
[\[45a.4\]]byams pa'i rang bzhin dang /_rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la blta bas lha'i gzugs dang rang gi khro bo'i gzugs tha mi dad par sbyor ba dang ldan par byas pas/_me'i yang khro bo'i gzugs la cig shos kyang khro bo'i gzugs so/_/rang dbang sgyur ba'i khro bos sngags kyi ngo bos bkug 
[\[45a.5\]]la myur du brang ngam/_snying ga'am/_mgo'am/_lto'am/_rked pa'am/_byin pa'am/_rkang pa'am/_rgyab bam/_rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la srog chags thams cad dgod kyang rung /_chags kyang rung /_rtse yang rung /_sdod kyang rung /_lam du 'gro yang rung /_nyal 
[\[45a.6\]]yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_'greng yang rung /_chu klung gi pha rol dpag tshad brgya na 'dug kyang rung /_lha la sogs pas bsrungs kyang rung bdag la me sbar bas sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o/_/zhi ba la ni zhi ba ma zhi ba la ni ma zhi bar gsungs so/_/de nas lag 
[\[45a.7\]]na rdo rjes thogs pa med pa'i ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang /_bstan pa don yod par yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir yang sangs rgyas kyi gsung bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas de'i tshe stobs mtshungs ba med pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dam tshig chen po'i gsang sngags smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra sa ma ya d+h+r-i ke_/dam tshig gi rdo rje'i gsang sngags 
[\[45b.2\]]smras ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i sgra 'ur zhes grags so/_/'di thos byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/de dag skad cig de nyid la/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[45b.3\]]kun gyi spyan snga ru/_/rdo rje mchog stobs gzungs thob bo/_/yang bdud bzhi pham par byed pa'i rnam par bsgyings pa'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_bsrung ba chen po stobs po che stobs bcu'i gzi brjid las byung ba'i gsang sngags 
[\[45b.4\]]'di smras so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_badzra gi ni/_badzra shu u la ni/_badzra mu ta re/_ba li nam a gra/_ma hA ba le/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_shi lo shi lo/_Ti lo/_Ti lo/_Ta Ta le/_ma hA tsaN+Di/_ku ru~M g+ho na/_shwe ta/_pad+ma mA li ni/_
[\[45b.5\]]hi hi he he/_rak+Sha rak+Sha/_ma hA sa ma ya/_a nu ga te swA hA/_de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_kye ma bsrung ba dam pa 'di/_/gsang sngags rjes su spyod pa yi/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/lag na rdo rjes rab tu brjod/_/de 
[\[45b.6\]]nas yang lag na rdo rjes yang dkyil 'khor gyi thabs thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra a gra d+ha ra/_a na lo bi shwa sa~M b+ha ba swA hA/_rdo rje'i me lce chen po 'bar ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH
[\[45b.7\]]sh+tsa N+Di badzra a rtsi s+pha ra Na swA hA/_rdo rje 'od 'phro chen po'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_ma hA tsaN+Da badzra ka ba tsa bi s+phu ra badzrI ga swA hA/_rdo rje go cha'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_ma hA badzra a gra d+ha ri te dzo dag te swA hA/_rdo rje mchog gi 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]spyi gtsug gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_badzra a nan+ta ga ti hi swA hA/_rdo rje gtsug tor chen po'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_ta thA ga te/_A shA pa ri pUr tsin+tA ma Ni rA dza badzra hUM swA hA/_rdo rje mdzod spu'i 
[\[46a.2\]]sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_ta thA ga te lo tsa na dz+nyA na badzra swA hA/_rdo rje spyan gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_/oM badzra A na naM swA hA/_rdo rje zhal gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thI ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te 
[\[46a.3\]]sa t+ya d+harma pra tiSh+Thi te badzra ga pu ru sa ra swa sti bu ha a laM kA ra gar+b+ha badzra dzi hwA hUM b+ha ga ba ti/_sarba sa twa san+to Sha Na ka ri swA hA/_rdo rje ljags kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_badzra a gra sa me b+h+yo bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra swA hA/_rdo rje sku'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te 
[\[46a.4\]]b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_ar+g+ha badzra swA hA/_mchod yon gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_gan d+ha a ba b+hA sa na swA hA/_dri'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH_puSh+pa badzra a gra d+ha ra ka swA hA/_me tog gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu 
[\[46a.5\]]khe b+h+yaH_dz+nyA na badzra swA hA/_bdug pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_ak+Sha ya d+har+m+ma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na badzra swA hA/_lha bshos kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_ta thA ga te tsak+Shur badzra swA hA/_mar me'i sngags so/_/dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[46a.6\]]thabs kyi sngags kyi mdzod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/_ting nge 'dzin de las langs te rdo rje chen po gsang ba mtho ba'i tog rdo rje mthon po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[46a.7\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje lhangs zhes bya ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba de byin no/_/
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaHta Ta ta Ta/_s+pho Ta ya badzra saM kr-i ta bi d+yu dzi hwA du rdAn+ta da ma ka da ha si ta/_laM bo dar ka ha ka ha/_tsu lu tsu lu/_muny+tsa aT+Ta hA sa na/_dA ra bi dA ra/_badzra bak+t+ra/_badzra aM ga_/badzra nai tra/_badzra shro tra/_badzra g+h+rA Na/_badzra daM Sh+Ta a nu tsa ra/_kiny+tsi rA ya si/_pra 
[\[46b.2\]]bi sha badzra pA Ni hr-i da yo~M/_A bi sha A bi sha/_g+hur+Na g+hur+Na g+h+rur+NA pa ya g+hur+NA pa ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA ka ra/_pra ba ra/_d+har+m+ma lab+d+ha badzrA ya hUM kr-i ta swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lhangs zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 
[\[46b.3\]]tshim zhing mgu ste rab tu dga' zhing yi rangs nas/_de'i tshe rdo rje me zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_
[\[46b.4\]]kun du rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul to/_/rgya mtsho chen po thams cad kyang 'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun du rab tu 'khrugs so/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyang 'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul to/_/chem 
[\[46b.5\]]chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje yang 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar te/_
[\[46b.6\]]'jigs 'jigs lta chen po'i gzugs 'dzin la/_rdo rje'i mig las me lce 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcur snang bar byed cing /_rdo rje 'jigs 'jigs lta chen po zhes bya ba'i khro bo 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa mig 
[\[46b.7\]]gsum pa/_mche ba bzhi pa/_gad mo rta skad 'byin pa/_lus la glang po chen po'i pags pa khrag can gyon pa/_lag na rdo rje thogs pa phyung ngo /_/yang ba spu'i bu ga thams cad dang /_yan lag gi tshigs thams cad nas rdo rje khro bo thams cad mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]can lag na rdo rje thogs pa dang /_kha dog tha dad pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgras go bar byed pa dang /_lag na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa dang /_sdang ba thams cad skrag par byed pa dang /_bdud kyi gnas thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang /_
[\[47a.2\]]'cha' ba dang /_rgod pa dang /_'bug 'bug po'i sgra 'byin pa dang /_rmug rmug po'i sgra 'byin pa dang /_lag na rtse gsum gdengs pa dang /_gtun rked nyag thogs pa dang /_lag na be con thogs pa dang /_lag na ral gri thogs pa dang /_lag na tho ba thogs pa dang /_lag na dgra 
[\[47a.3\]]sta thogs pa dang /_lag na mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /_ka na ya dang /_mda' bo che dang /_'khor lo dang /_lcags mda' dang /_zhags pa dang /_dbyug to dang /_lcags thag dang /_khab 'dra ba dang /_gshol dang /_rnga dang /_'khar rnga dang /_dril bu dang /_rnga bo che thogs pa 
[\[47a.4\]]dang /_gzi brjid can thams cad kyi gzi brjid mi snang bar byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig la lta ba lhur len par bstan nas/_yang gtsug tor nas khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul las byung ba/_
[\[47a.5\]]me lce 'bar bas lang long du gyur pa/_thor tshugs can gsus 'phyang po/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i tshad tsam gyi lus dang ldan pa rab tu 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang 'dra ba dpral ba khro gnyer gyi rim pa can [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po'i pags pa khrag can gyi smad 
[\[47a.6\]]g.yogs gyon pa/_bka' nod cing 'dug pa bstan to/_/yang dpral pa'i dkyil na khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gzhan khro bo zla ba'i thig le zhes bya ba lag pa brgya stong du ma yod pa/_mig gsum pa/_mche ba bzhi pa/_gad mo rta skad kyi sgra 'byin pa/_gshin rje'i gzugs 'dra ba khro 
[\[47a.7\]]bo'i g.yog 'khor brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/_lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa/_stag lpags kyi sham thabs gyon pa/_sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa kun du bstan to/_/yang lag na rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas khro bo rdo rje be con chen po can lto ba spyang 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]ki'i lto ba 'dra ba/_mig dmar ba/_khros pa dang bcas pa/_an da rnyil ltar sngo ba/_lag na be con thogs pa/_skrag par byed pa drag pa/_sdig pa'i pags pa'i sham thabs can sdigs mo byed pa bstan to/_/yang stobs mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[47b.2\]]zhugs te/_snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po stobs po che zhes bya ba lag pa bzhi pa/_skra gyen du 'greng ba mig ser ba mche ba bzhi pa dbyar gyi sprin 'dra ba lag na be con thogs pa lag na dgra sta thogs pa gsus 'phyang po mig gsum pa stag lpags kyi sham thabs 
[\[47b.3\]]can rang gi lus me lce 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa bstan to/_/yang lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_gom pa 'dor ba'i rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba'i khro bo skra bshor zhing gyen du 'greng ba/_gshin rje'i gzugs 
[\[47b.4\]]'dra ba/_gdong gi dpral ba khro gnyer gyi rim pa can mig dmar ba/_gad mo cher rgod pa/_kha gdangs pa/_lag pa bzhi pa/_lag na mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_rdo rje dang /_'khor lo dang /_ral gri thogs pa/_phyogs bcur blta ba bstan to/_/yang lag na rdo rje 
[\[47b.5\]]rdo rje drag po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa/_'jig rten gsum kun du rmongs par byed pa/_sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa bskyed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[47b.6\]]thams cad las byung ba/_mdog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs ma/_rdo rje'i rtags can ma me lce'i phreng bas lang long du gyur pa/_bzhin yid khros pa 'dra ba/_lag na rdo rje'i lcags thag thogs pa/_bka' nyan pa lhur len pa/_'khor pho nya mo khri dang ldan pa 'di bstan

[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]na zhags pa dang /_gtun shing dang /_tho ba dang /_gtun rked nyag dang /_kha ba thogs pa dang /_'khor pho nya mo khri dang ldan pa bstan to/_/yang rig pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje'i khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi khu tshur las byung ba/_rdo rje'i rtags can rab

[\[48b.1\]]sarba thA ga to d+b+ha be/_dzA ti ni tri lo tsa ne/_sarba d+harma n+d+hir d+ha ni ki ti saM ka ra ni swA hA/_rdo rje khu tshur gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra pa tAM ke badzra ma na se swA hA/_rdo rje ba dan gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA

[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]b+hU te ha ri swA hA/_rdo rje dril bu'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ro ma ma ni ni ri ti ni swA hA/_rdo rje spu'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra bu li na khi shi khi ni swA hA/_rdo rje sen mo can gyi sngags so/_/na maH

[\[49a.6\]]b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ts+tshA ya ga ta sarba ga ti ta thA ga ta ts+tshA ya saM b+ha ba rak+Sha sa badzra swA hA/_rdo rje grib gnon gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA an+ta t+ta ya bi nA shA na/_bi kr-i ta rauM drak+shabadzra sa twa swA hA/_rdo rje gnon po'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_

[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra nA ga mu khi gau ri nI la ti ti nI swA hA/_rdo rje klu'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra d+ha ra/_yak+Sha ku la sun+d+ha ra swA hA/_rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba

[\[49b.3\]]dza ri ti re re Ti ri badzra mu kha swA hA/_rdo rje nam mkha' lding gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra gau ri Ti ki Ti ni swA hA/_rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA rA ga dA rA yA na na dza li ba badzra rak+Sha 
[\[49b.4\]]mA l+yaM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni pri ya swA hA/_rdo rje lus dmar gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba tha ki li ki li ka lo ka rA lA ba gra/_sa ra sa ra gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na swA hA/_rdo rje kI li ki li'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra bi dAr 
[\[49b.5\]]pU ra ya pU ra ya/_ba ha ba ha swA hA/_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA he laM gi li kuR+da ni ha he ki hi swA hA/_rdo rje 'gro lding ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ha la hu na ra ku pa ra ba d+ha ra/_d+ha

[\[49b.7\]]kha ra/_badzra ga da ke yU ra kuN+Da laM/_a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/_badzra na kha badzra aM gu laM/_badzra hasta/_badzra tsa ra na/_badzra gA tra/_badzra ne tra/_nI la badzra badzra ga ta/_ba Da ba mu kha ga ni gam+b+hAM ra hUM kA ra/_ra ti ta sa ta ha si ta lam+bo da ra/_gra sa gra sa pra bi sha A bi sha A bi sha/
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]g+hur+Na g+hur+Na/_g+hur+Na pa ya g+hUr+NA pa ya/_sarba satwa/_b+hU ma b+hU ma/_b+hU ma ya b+hU ma ya/_sarba duSh+Ta pa tsa pa tsa/_da ha da ha/_ma tha ma tha hUM hUM/_badzra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_rdo rje na da ku be ra 'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA pra tsa la/_mo bu li bi d+ha 
[\[50a.2\]]ra/_badzra kri ha na kha/_badzra satwa swA hA/_rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA shud d+ha badzra prA kr-i ti shud d+ha/_sho d+ha ya sarba swA hA/_rdo rje rdzas thams cad dag par byed pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_
[\[50a.3\]]sarba thA badzra ag+ni badzra swA hA/_rdo rje me'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra a na la/_pra tsa la mau li thid+d+ya dar swA hA/_rdo rje rlung tshig gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzraM ga badzra d+ha ra dzi na A d+ha ra swA hA/_rdo rje 
[\[50a.4\]]sa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bi ra dze badzra swA hA/_rdo rje rdul dang bral ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA smr-i ti na da da badzra satwa swA hA/_rdo rje dran pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[50a.5\]]mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA pad+ma badzra swA hA/_rdo rje pad+ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba T+ra badzrot+ta ma ka ru Na a ga d+ha ri kA ru Na maN+Da la swA hA/_rdo rje snying rje'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA mai t+r+yud ga ta/_sarba sa twa hi 
[\[50a.6\]]taM ka ta swA hA/_rdo rje byams pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA pA ra mi tA/_gar+b+ha sarba tra a pra ti ha ta badzra tsin+ta swA hA/_rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA sarba shUn+ya tA badzra ni ta bi shud+d+ha 
[\[50a.7\]]sa twa/_a ber+ya badzra hr-i da ya swA hA/_rdo rje stong pa nyid kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra d+hA ra NI shwa ra d+ha ra badzra swA hA/_rdo rje gzungs kyi sngags so/_/na maH_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra bo d+h+yaM ga_/dr-i D+ha A shA ya 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]sarba bud d+ha swA hA/_rdo rje byang chub kyi yan lag gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA mArga bi Sha d+ha ka d+ha ka d+ha ka tsa ra tsa ra swA hA/_rdo rje lam gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA sat+ya badzra sa mung+ga ta/_bud+d+ha rU bad+har swA hA/_rdo rje 
[\[50b.2\]]bden pa'i sngags so/_/namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA a be ni ka badzra saM b+ha ba bud+d+ha pu tra swA hA/_rdo rje ma 'dres pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA a b+hI Sha ra dwa badzra mArga ni da ri Sha ka swA hA/_rdo rje mi 'jigs pa'i sngags so/_/na maH
[\[50b.3\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tri rat+na sarba pa ka/_bud+d+ha rU pa Ni da ra swA hA/_rdo rje dkon mchog gsum gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dr-i D+ha mU la badzra br-i k+Sha bo d+ha ni da da swA hA/_rdo rje byang chub kyi shing gi sngags so/_/na maH
[\[50b.4\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA a pa rA dzi ta badzra/_dzi ta ri la b+ha drA nu dz+nyA na swA hA/_rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra rat+nA kA ri swA hA/_rdo rje rin chen 'byung gnas kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta 
[\[50b.5\]]thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA pra la ya badzra dz+wa dz+wa la d+ha ka swA hA/_rdo rje sa rmeg med pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra bi ba d+ha ya sarba hUM hUM swA hA/_rdo rje 'chags pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA saM b+h+yaH/_
[\[50b.6\]]sarba badzra badzrot+ta ma ka ru Na mA ya swA hA/_rdo rjes 'jigs pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA saM pat+ti badzra sa ma ya swA hA/_rdo rje phun sum tshogs pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ku mA ra 
[\[50b.7\]]badzra ha sta swA hA/_rdo rje gzhon nu'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA kA ma badzra bi la si ni ta ki ti swA hA/_'dod pa'i rdo rje sgeg mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA kA ma badzra bid+yA d+ha ri ku mu de swA hA/_'dod pa'i rdo rje rig 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]sngags 'chang ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA rak+Sha badzra ni ka man+da de kA ma yak+Sha Ni swA hA/_rdo rje gnod sbyin mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ma taM gi khi ri khi ga kha ri ka swA hA/_rdo rje gdol ma'i 
[\[51a.2\]]sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ru d+hi ra pri ya/_ru d+hi ra be tA li/_li hi la ha/_li li gi ni badzra ma thi ni ra hi/_rdo rje khrag gi ro langs ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra pi tA li ka li mA li na ba mA 
[\[51a.3\]]li lu shu d+ha/_swa ri he swA hA/_rdo rje ro langs mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra dun+te/_badzra shI ti ke/_ud pA da ni pA da mA bi lam+ba badzra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_rdo rje khro bo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[51a.4\]]thA ku na khi ku na khi/_badzra pA Ni pri ye hi ti hi de swA hA/_rdo rje sen ngan mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzrAM gi ku ruM ga ni badzra tun+de ke swA hA/_rdo rje sgros ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra d+ha ba li/_
[\[51a.5\]]d+ha li taM gi badzra b+h+ra ma ri ke swA hA/_rdo rje bung ba mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra sha ba ri/_sha ba ri rU pa d+hA ra Ni g+hi ni g+hi ni Ni ke swA hA/_rdo rje sha ba ri'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ba sa na ti ke badzra ku 
[\[51a.6\]]sum ha sta/_badzra ku su ma sam+b+ha be swa hA/_pho nya mo rdo rje me tog gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hA sa hA sa badzra ha san+tu nr-i t+ya nr-i t+ya swA hA/_pho nya mo rdo rje bzhad ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hi ma da ba li 
[\[51a.7\]]ge/_badzra ma da ba badzra pA Ni ma nu sma ra swA hA/_pho nya mo rdo rjer ro ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra badzra ku k+ku/_ri ma sa mu khi badzrod b+ha be au ya kiM da n+de de bi badzra pa ta ki swA hA/_rdo rje khyi mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzro d+pi/_la ke hi na dan+di bi ni bi ku ni swA hA/_rdo rje ut+pa la mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra mA li ni khai la na ti ke tsa la tsa la/_bi tsa la bi tsa la/_ruT+Tu la lu ru swA hA/_pho nya mo rtsen mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba 
[\[51b.2\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ha ra Na khA da ya sarba du ra ni ba ri Ni ha re swA hA/_rdo rje sha bkra mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra maM ka ti rak+ta mu khi rak+ta ak+Shi badzrot+ti kad+da kad+da ma pi lam+ba/_badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_pho nya mo 
[\[51b.3\]]rdo rje spra mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra d+ha ra/_saM d+ha ra swA hA/_pho nya mo rdo rje 'chang ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra kA li ke dra me ti ko_/ran+di ka ha Ta hu Te swA hA/_pho nya mo rdo rje nag 
[\[51b.4\]]mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tha laM ba bi ga li ta/_ma hA ma Ni ku twaM sa swA hA/_pho nya snyems par 'dug gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA pra tsaN+Da badzra d+ha ra ka/_niR+da yi da ha da ha/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_sa ma 
[\[51b.5\]]ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_pho nya rab gtum gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra la li ta badzra pA Ni pri ya sarba satwa ba shaM ka ri swA hA/_pho nya rdo rje rol pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra tsan+d+ra mu khe/_kha 
[\[51b.6\]]kha khA hi khA hi/_sma ra bra ti dz+nyA swA hA/_pho nya rdo rje zla gdong gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra go na duR+dAn+ta da ma ka bi ma la mu kha dza hi dza hi swA hA/_pho nya rdo rje dri ma med pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra 
[\[51b.7\]]ba la d+ha ri si si mi swA hA/_pho nya rdo rje stobs 'chang gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA khe tsa ra/_badzra ga ma na/_he ha ha swA hA/_pho nya rdo rje mkha' rgyu'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzraM ga to ta ra ta ra du bar 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]ba ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_ka ma ka ma swA hA/_pho nya rdo rje 'phags kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzrot+ta ma swA hA/_pho nya rdo rje mchog gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra bAk+t+ra du ha du ha swA hA/_
[\[52a.2\]]pho nya rdo rje gdong gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra dan+du ra tsa pi Ta badzra ra na/_si la da ha ri lam+bo da ra d+ha ra/_d+hu ba ra swA hA/_pho nya rdo rje so'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA raM dza ya dza ya/_badzra ru tra dza ya/_
[\[52a.3\]]dza ya tsaN+Da ro Sha Na swA hA/_pho nya rdo rje khro bo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA trai lo kya gra sa na badzra du ha badzra pA sha ha sta/_A na ya A na ya/_kiny+tsi rA ya si/_ta thA ga ta sa ma yam nu sma ra swA hA/_pho nya rdo rje 'jig rten gsum gyi sngags so/_/
[\[52a.4\]]na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tsaN+Da la/_badzra kiM ka ra ku ru sarbaM/_kiny+tsi rA ya si bi tsi tra pha ting pa ri te swa hA/_phyag brnyan rdo rje gtum po'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ping+ga la/_la li ta ke sha_/pra dz+wa li 
[\[52a.5\]]ta sha rI ra hA ka d+ha ka/_ku ru ku ru swA hA/_phyag brnyan rdo rje ser skya'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ke tu king+ka ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/_tha ra tha ra/_ka ra ka ra swA hA/_phyag brnyan rdo rje tog gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_
[\[52a.6\]]sarba thA te ga d+hi la ka kiny+tsa rA ya/_la li ta be Sha d+ha ri/_d+hA ra Ni d+hA ra Ni/_pra ti dz+nyA mu hu mu hu/_muny+tsa da ha saM swA hA/_phyag brnyan rdo rje dus po che'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ku la A dz+nyA ka ra/_ra ta ra ta riM bi swA hA/_phyag brnyan 
[\[52a.7\]]rdo rje bka' bzhin byed kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ha kr-i tAn+da/_sha ma na b+hany+dza ka la ha/_pri ya hi li hi li la li ta du sta sarba hr-i da ya swA hA/_phyag brnyan rdo rje 'thab sred kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]sarba thA badzra shi kha ra/_mu lu mu lu/_he lu he lu swA hA/_phyag brnyan rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ka ta ka Ta/_ma tha ma Ta/_hUM hUM badzra ku la sun d+ha ra d+ha ra ha ra ha ra swA hA/_phyag brnyan rdo rje rigs mdzes kyi sngags so/_/na maH
[\[52b.2\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ha la ha la/_Ta ra Ta ra lun+ta na badzra king+ka ra swA hA/_phyag brnyan rdo rje phung byed kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra d+ha tany+dza ya dzaM ka ra bu tan+ta ra hwa swA hA/_phyag brnyan rdo rje rlung las rgyal gyi sngags so/_/
[\[52b.3\]]na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba tha ko ti na dza ya/_kiny+tsa rA ya si gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na ko ti ting+ga ti ga ta swA hA/_phyag brnyan rdo rje mtha' las rgyal gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tsa pa li ke tsa pa la badzrI Ni swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje 
[\[52b.4\]]phyar mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA su badzrI Ni badzra du ti ke swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje legs kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra pany+dza ri ke badzri ni swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje dra ba mo'i sngags so/_/na maH
[\[52b.5\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA rat+na mA li ke badzra pA Ni pri ye swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje rin chen phreng ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra mA li ni da pa la mu khi badzrI Ni swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje dkar mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta 
[\[52b.6\]]thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra lam+bi ke swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje 'phyang ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra su ga na ti ge badzra gi badzra da yi ta ka swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje snying brtse mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu 
[\[52b.7\]]khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA su tiSh+Tha badzrI Ni badzra pA Ni hr-i da yaM ga me swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje legs gnas mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra du ku la b+hak+She shu ha ra ni swa hA/_bran mo rdo rje du ku la'i ras can gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ka ra li ke ba rti ke swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje mnyam pa mo'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra dza ya ka ri badzra sha rI rA Ni swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje rgyal byed ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[53a.2\]]mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ka ra b+hi badzra a ti sha ni ke swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje bsdigs ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra badzri Ni badzra ba d+hi ke swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje gsod byed kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[53a.3\]]mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA me kha la la li ta ke sha ba ri badzra gan+d+ha ri swA hA/_bran mo rdo rje tshig 'dzin gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA su sid d+hi ka ra badzra sA d+ha ka yi sarba badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA ku ru swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po legs par grub byed kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba 
[\[53a.4\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA rat+na mA li badzra d+ha ra swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po rin chen dbu rgyan rtse gsum gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bi d+yot+ta ma tsin+ta badzra hUM/_rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa mchog gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba 
[\[53a.5\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ba la ki li ki la badzra ma ku Ta d+ha ra swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po ba la ki li ki la'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thArat+na ke li ki la/_rat+na ma ku Ta d+ha ra swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po rin chen ki li ki la'i 
[\[53a.6\]]sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA su rU pa mA la badzra badzra hi taM ka ra swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po gzugs legs kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra biM na du ga ta badzra d+ha ra swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po 
[\[53a.7\]]rdo rje thogs pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA la li ta badzra pu ru Sha ma hA yak+Sha rU pa d+ha ras ra sa ra swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rol pa'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ga dza kar+Na badzra lo tsa na tsaM na tsa 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]la kA swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po glang po rna ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tra Ta badzra kany+dza hUM swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA b+hI Sha Na badzra b+hI ma/_badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa 
[\[53b.2\]]ya ti swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po bsdigs su rung gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ha ri ti/_sarba tra me pra ti ha ta/_ta ra ta ra swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'phrog byed kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[53b.3\]]thA hA sa badzra d+ha ra su tA nu/_sarba a rta sa rta ka/_hi hi ri swa hA/_rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje bzhad pa'i sngags so//_//phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud/_bam po lnga pa/_de nas yang lag na rdo rje yan lag thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[53b.4\]]snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus bu snying las skyes pa kha nas byung ba dag yid dang yan lag thams cad las byung ngo /_/de la lag pa gnyis las ni gzhon nu lag bzang ngo /_/kha nas ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde'o/_/rdo rje cod pan las ni gzhon nu rdo rje cod 
[\[53b.5\]]pan no/_/spyi gtsug las ni gzhon nu rdo rje gtsug byung ngo /_/rdo rje me tog rnams las ni gzhon nu rdo rje me tog go/_/rdo rje me tog thod las ni gzhon nu rdo rje me tog thod do/_/rdo rje'i brang las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i brang ngo /_/rdo rje'i snying las ni gzhon nu rdo rje sdug go/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[53b.6\]]dpral ba las ni gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'o/_/rdo rje'i smin ma las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i smin ma'o/_/rdo rje'i rna ba las ni gzhon nu rdo rje 'chang ngo /_/rdo rje'i mig las ni gzhon nu rdo rje 'jig rten mig gcig pa'o/_/rdo rje'i sna las ni gzhon nu rdo rje shugs 'chang ngo /_/rdo rje'i mkhur 
[\[53b.7\]]tshos las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i rten no/_/rdo rje'i kos ko las ni gzhon nu rdo rje gces pa 'dzin to/_/rdo rje'i so rnams las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i mche ba'o/_/rdo rje mgul pa las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i glu'o/_/rdo rje mchan khung las ni gzhon nu rdo rje'i me 'bar ba'i gzi brjid do/_/rgya ba nas ni 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]gzhon nu rdo rje gnya' shing 'dzin to/_/de ltar de dag la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i bu gzhon nu khro bo de dag lag na rdo rje thogs pa sems can gyi don la brtson pa'i yid dang ldan pa snying rje'i dkyil 'khor las yang dag par byung ba lag na rdo rje'i smon lam gyis 
[\[54a.2\]]snying drangs pa 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa rnams su byang chub mchog dam pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_sa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[54a.3\]]lam dang /_stong pa nyid chen pos lus rnam par bskyed pa sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa lag na rdo rje'i snying du 'thad pa sha stag go/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te gsang sngags smras pa/_na maH
[\[54a.4\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra se nod+d+ha ba badzra pA Ni pri ya swA hA/_rdo rje sde'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra pa hU d+b+ha badzra ba hu shu raM ga ma swA hA/_rdo rje lag bzang gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu 
[\[54a.5\]]khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bi tsi tra badzra she kha ra/_badzra shi kha rA pi lam+bi ta ha ra swA hA/_rdo rje me tog thod kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ki ri Ti badzra d+ha ri/_bi shud d+ha aM ga ra swA hA/_rdo rje cod pan gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te 
[\[54a.6\]]b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra mUR+b+ha a gi ta/_hUM hUM hUM swA hA/_rdo rje gtsug nas byung ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ku su ma/_a tsi dra ta badzra mu rti badzra swa b+hA ba swA hA/_rdo rje me tog gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_
[\[54a.7\]]sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ba ra d+ha ri/_u ra badzro ta ta ma swA hA/_rdo rje brang gi sngags so//_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra hr-i da ya badzra pA Ni pri ya satwa hi taM ka ra swA hA/_gzhon nu rdo rje sdug gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tsan+d+ra badzra aM ga sun d+ha ra swA hA/_gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra tsakra maN+Da la saM bu ta badzra b+h+ru ba swA hA/_gzhon nu rdo rje smin ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA 
[\[54b.2\]]badzra aM ku d+ha ri shru tA d+ha ra d+ha ra niR+da da swA hA/_rdo rje rna mchog 'chang gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra lo tsa na dz+nyA na tsak+ShuR+da da swA hA/_rdo rje mig gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra be ga d+ha ri/_
[\[54b.3\]]ma no dza be d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/_rdo rje shugs 'chang gi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ud+d+ha ra badzra sa ma yam nu pA la ya swA hA/_rdo rje rten gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra d+ha ra d+ha ra dz+wA li ta mU rti swA hA/_
[\[54b.4\]]rdo rje gces pa 'dzin gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra aM ku ra badzra ke tu sa ra sa ra swA hA/_rdo rje mche ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA saM bo d+hi badzra d+ha ra pri ya badzra gI ti swA hA/_rdo rje glu'i sngags so/_/
[\[54b.5\]]na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra dz+wa li ta badzra mU rti badzra d+ha ra swA hA/_gzhon nu rdo rje 'bar ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA te dza a ba lam+bi ta/_mU rti d+ha ka d+ha ka swA hA/_gzhon nu rdo rje gnya' shing 'dzin gyi sngags so/_/
[\[54b.6\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa lag na rdo rjes rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang bskur cing /_gnod pa thams cad 'gog pa lus la bsrung ba chen 
[\[54b.7\]]po'i srad bu thogs pa rtag tu ma byed zer bar bdag gi zhes brjod pa'i sgra phyung ngo /_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA he badzra shU li ni badzra ma taM gi a nan+ta mu kha badzra hi li dza yan tiM/_ru ti mu kha ti si s+phu ran ti swA hA/_mA ma kI'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bu bi mo badzra mA lI ni/_badzra a da b+hU te/_sany+tsa ya sa man+ta shI ti sha ma badzra ran+d+ha ne na/_g+hu d+hu g+hu d+hu/_dza hi dza hi mA bi lam+da/_b+ha ga ba te bA rA hI/_sma ra sma ra/_badzra saM gI ti swA hA/_rdo rje mtshams kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba 
[\[55a.2\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra ma hA ma N+Da daR+sha ya badzrI bi kra ma swA hA/_rdo rje snying po 'dzin gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra si tA ta pa tre dz+wa kr-i ta swA hA/_rdo rje gdugs dkar po'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu 
[\[55a.3\]]khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bi ta ta ma hA badzra bi da na raM ga raM gA pa ya swa hA/_rdo rje rin chen ba dan chen po'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA rat+na kU Ta/_dz+wa li ta badzro da b+ha ba swA hA/_rdo rje khang pa brtsegs pa'i sngags so/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_
[\[55a.4\]]sarba thA badzra pad+mod+d+ha ba/_badzra A sa na badzra na da da swA hA/_rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA smr-i ti/_badzra d+ha ra ka swA hA/_rdo rje dran pa'i sngags so/_/namaHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba tha bo d+hi bi bo d+ha na badzra ba ma 
[\[55a.5\]]ba ma ba swa hA/_rdo rje byang chub kyi sngags so/_/namaHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba tha pi ma ti ha ra ka_/badzra rat+na d+ha ma d+ha ma swa ha/_rdo rje yid gnyis rnam par gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sngags so/_/namaHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA 
[\[55a.6\]]dz+nyA na badzra swA hA/_rdo rje shes sbyin gyi sngags so/_/namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba tha a mr-i ta badzra pa swA hA/_rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA pra ba rta ya badzra dz+nyA na sA ga raM ra swA hA/_rdo rje chos brjod kyi sngags 
[\[55a.7\]]so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra saM sa thA pri ya/_bi rA ga ko Ti swA hA/_rdo rje chags bral gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA shU n+ya tA ko Ti badzra saM d+ha ra ka swA hA/_rdo rje stong pa nyid kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]tha ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA sarba d+har+m+ma sa ma tA pra ba ka badzra sa twa swA hA/_rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ga ga na gany+dza ni ta ra shi sha ya ma khaM badzra swA hA/_rdo rje nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te 
[\[55b.2\]]b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzra yak+Sha Ni badzra da de a t+tsi pa ra Ni ma na si badzra mA li ni swA hA/_rdo rje gnod sbyin mo'i sngags so/_/de nas lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[55b.3\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi srog la dbab pa'i tshogs kyis bye ba bsregs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'jig pa'i dus chen 
[\[55b.4\]]po'i tshe 'byung ba'i nyi ma bdun ltar 'bar ba rgya mtsho'i gling chen po'i me'i sgro ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs za ba 'jig pa'i me chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje snying po'i mchog 'di smras so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA phaT 
[\[55b.5\]]hUM/_'jig pa'i me chen po'i snying po smras ma thag tu/_de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chu shing gi tshal rtsa ba bcad pa lta bu dang /_rlung drag po chen pos bskyod pa bzhin du 'gul nas stan thams cad las khas bub tu 'khor lo chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 
[\[55b.6\]]bsgyel to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/lag na rdo rje'i mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad dang /_ri rab dang /_ri rab chen po dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug 
[\[55b.7\]]chen po 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_rgya mtsho chen po thams cad bskams nas rnam par tshig ste thal bar gyur pa mthong ngo /_/lag na rdo rje'i snying ga nas kyang khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig pa'i me lce chen po zhes bya ba byung nas/_gad mo rta skad chen po rgyas 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]par 'byin cing thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi snying rnams yongs su bsdus nas nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid du gyur te/_lag na rdo rje'i snying gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs so/_/lag na rdo rje yang snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de'i tshe de bzhin 
[\[56a.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba brjod de bka' stsal pa/_sngags kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho yi/_/snying po stobs chen ldan pa 'di/_/bstan pa 'di ni srung byed cing /_/
[\[56a.3\]]theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di la/_/gdul dka' rtag tu 'dul ba ste/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bshad/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'khor lo chen po rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyel bar rig nas cher snying rje skyes te mig gnyis 
[\[56a.4\]]kyis ring du bltas nas rdo rje mchog gi snying po dam pa sbyin pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/_spyod pa chen po mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyir rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po la blta zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rab dam pa la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa byang 
[\[56a.5\]]chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'khor 'di la dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sgo cung zad cig stsol cig dang /_des bstan pa 'di la srog gi re ba thob cing dad pa thob nas rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi snying po 'bul bar gyur to/_/de skad ces 
[\[56a.6\]]smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob cing /_/nam mkha' lta bur chags med la/_/kun du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/smon lam rtag tu rdzogs byed pa/_/
[\[56a.7\]]gsang sngags kun gyi spyod pa dang /_/de bzhin gsang sngags bsgrub pa dang /_/brtul zhugs dang ni rtags dang gzugs/_/dus dang yul dang cho ga shod/_/de'i tshe rdo rje de rdo rje mchog gi stobs kyi gzungs dang lhan cig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la byin no/_/
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA e hi ma hA badzra ko Ti ku Ti la pA pa ka aM ku la shi khe ka bi la ke shI ta Ti ta Ti/_ko Ti ko Ti/_kar+k+ka Ti mu Ti ma hA thin dud lo lo/_du ka du ka/_sa ma sa ma/_sa ra sa ra/_bi sa ra bi sa ra/_s+phu ra s+phu ra/_ud+d+ho ti te/_ha ri piM ga le/_tsa 
[\[56b.2\]]Ti bi tsa Ti/_dz+wA le bi dz+wA le/_badzra g+ho Na/_badzra sa ra dr-iSh+Ta pra ha ra Ne/_ma ti b+hU te/_rat+na tra ya/_a ti ta le/_badzra d+ha ra bi shAs ma/_a pra ti ha ta pra ma rda ni swA hA/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de dag la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag rig pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje mi pham 
[\[56b.3\]]pa mes rab tu rmongs byed 'di dran par gyis shig dang 'dis khyed la phan pa dang bde ba dang srog thob par byed par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rjes rig pa chen mo 'di smras ma thag tu de nas dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rjes 'khor de byin gyis brlabs nas mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_phyag 'tshal 
[\[56b.4\]]lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi pham pa mes rab tu rmongs byed de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras te skad cig de nyid la 'khor de langs nas/_kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la blta 
[\[56b.5\]]zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma ye shes kye ma skyid/_/kye ma sngags shes bsam mi khyab/_/des ni bdag cag thams cad kyang /_/mgon dang bsam gtan dga' dang ldan/_/sems zhi tshigs ni ma mchis par/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa lhur len gyur/_/sangs 
[\[56b.6\]]rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni/_/bdag cag thams cad mchis nas su/_/cho ga'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir/_/snying po dag ni da dbul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba'i 
[\[56b.7\]]dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA oM/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi snying po'i mchog lags te/_rig byed bzhi rab tu brjod pa rigs bzhi kun du gzhog pa dbyangs dang ldan pa'i bkod 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]pa chen po 'god pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di las rig byed rnams 'byung sngags rnams dang mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i las rnams 'byung ste/_rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'o/_/lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che/_/rdo 
[\[57a.2\]]rje oM zhes bya ba ste/_/byams dang ting nge 'dzin las skyes/_/nga rgyal rnam par spangs pa legs/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po rgyal srid thams cad la dbang sbyin par 
[\[57a.3\]]bgyid pa 'di bzhes su gsol/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bi da rA ya/_mau li mau li/_pi hu bi hu swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bdag lha rnams kyi bdag po bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[57a.4\]]chen po 'dir zhugs par gyur pa der bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/_des dang por lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar thang shing gi yam sreg shing mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig tu lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[57a.5\]]'das bdag gis de thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/shi 'phos nas kyang mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyas par 'gyur ro/_lag na rdo rje la blta zhing zas mi 'tshal bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal srid 'thob ste dam tshig nyams 
[\[57a.6\]]pa ni ma gtogs te mi 'grub bo/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das klu'i snying po mchis te des na bdag cag thams cad dbang du mchi'o/_/dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bsrung 
[\[57a.7\]]bar bgyi'o/_/dug bsal bar bgyi'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA re re rA tiM nA ga le li ri/_phud ta ri dzi he swA hA/_snying po 'di bsgrub pa lags te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/_mtsho chen por zhugs te lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]nas klu gang yang rung ba mngon du phyogs te mchi bar mthong ngam mtsho 'khrugs te de la mi 'jigs par bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tha mar seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing yungs kar gyi 'bru mar la smyugs pas lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis te de lta na yang 'grub bo/_/de 'gro 
[\[57b.2\]]ba'am mi 'gro ba'i dug rnams kyang bsams pa tsam gyis sel bar 'gyur/_sgrub pa po'i las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan yang bsams pa tsam gyis bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di 
[\[57b.3\]]skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ba mang po 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar bgyid pa'i rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA yak+Sha sha ra/_kiny+tsi 
[\[57b.4\]]rA ya si/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_de b+hI me/_bai shra ba Na pri ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di bsgrub pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du gcig pu mchis te/_snying po 'di lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas 
[\[57b.5\]]mchod par bgyis la mtshan thog thag tu til nag po zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bsres pas lan sum khri sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'tshal ba de stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/zas mi 'tshal bar lkog tu dben par gnod sbyin mo yid la bgyis te/_nyin zhag bdun du lan khri bzlas brjod 
[\[57b.6\]]bgyis na gnod sbyin mo stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/lo gcig gi bar du nyin re zhing dran par bgyis na gter cig stsol bar bgyid do/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag kyang dkyil 'khor 
[\[57b.7\]]rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA khi mi si ri sma shri/_pa ri pU ra ya na pra ti dz+nyA man+ta ke swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na de'i slad bzhin du bdag rtag 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]tu 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi zhing yungs kar dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres la lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 
[\[58a.2\]]'khor srung gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bi d+ha ra d+ha ri/_gan+d+ha ri ri si swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 
[\[58a.3\]]snying po 'di dran par bgyid pa de la dus ma lags par 'gum par mi 'byung ngo /_/rtag tu dpal gyis 'khor bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal ba des zla ba tshes nas bzung ste nya'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin me tog gi sreg blugs la lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor 
[\[58a.4\]]pas mchod pa bgyis la mtshan thog thag 'bras kyi 'o thug sbyin sreg bgyis na grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang bsam pa thams cad 
[\[58a.5\]]yongs su bkang ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA shrI d+hi d+ha ra ya bi rU pAk+Sha swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid pa de'i slad bzhin bdag rtag 
[\[58a.6\]]tu 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la mtshan thog thag tu gu gul shing gi yam sreg sbrang rtsi dang mar 
[\[58a.7\]]la smyugs la lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/_/ma grub na yang yul gru bzang po lnga stsol to/_/de nas chu dbang rmugs byed 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir sgrub pa po 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]rnams kyi don thams cad grub pa mchog 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ku ru tsu ru mu ru dzaM b+ha dza lod b+ha ba swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyid pa de la ci 'tshal ba de bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na 
[\[58b.2\]]nyi ma 'gyur ba'i tshe ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sa ya bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal srid dam gter chen po stsol to/_/gi wang la lan cig bsngags te mig bskus na gang la bltas ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo gdong la bsngags te bsams nas nyal na ci bsams pa de rmi lam du mthong ngo /_/
[\[58b.3\]]gos 'dod na me tog kha dog ci 'dra ba chur bor ba kha dog de 'dra ba'i gos de dag rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/phyugs chung 'dod na zhag bdun gsum du nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan la sngags lan cig btab pa'i me tog phog par bor na rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na dpal che bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[58b.4\]]de nas lag brgyad pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_'dod pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe 
[\[58b.5\]]b+h+yaH_sarba thA tsa kra dwa dwa bA hu rA dza swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub par bgyid pa des bsrung bar bgyis la skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs gtsang mar shing mya ngan 'tshang gi 'og tu lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar gzhon nu la ci 'byor bas mchod de 
[\[58b.6\]]mtshan thog thag a ka ru'i bdug pa bsregs la bzlas brjod bgyis na nam phyed dam nang par de la bdag bstan par bgyi'o/_/dam pa gang 'tshal ba stsol te/_zas mi za bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nyid du gnod sbyin mo mchi'o/_/gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/_/ci ste mi mchi na 
[\[58b.7\]]'gum par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen gyis btud nas/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang sgrub pa po gsang sngags bsgrub pa la brtson pa rnams la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i slad 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA pany+tsa la pany+tsa mu kha pany+tsi kha hrIM hrIMHrak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dam tshig thob ste 
[\[59a.2\]]gsang sngags bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma kho nar bdag gi snying po 'di lan cig brjod par bgyi'o/_/de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i slad du bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can bdag de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bdag mchi ba'i snga ltas ni sgrub pa po de'i lus la lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngad 'bab 
[\[59a.3\]]par 'gyur/_spro ba'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_bgegs thams cad ma mchis par tshegs chung ngus des dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/
[\[59a.4\]]tha mar ba dmar ser gyi mar zangs kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag ste du ba 'thul ba'am 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis la de 'thungs na gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/du ba 'thul na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste ma grub na yang skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu 
[\[59a.5\]]bzlas brjod bgyis na nor 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsams nas lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris la sogs pa 
[\[59a.6\]]lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA traM gi ni bo de de mA li ni dza ti mi hUM swA hA/_bcom 
[\[59a.7\]]ldan 'das gang la la bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang chen drag po dam pa 'di bsgrub par bgyid pa des dpal gyi sgo mo'i sgor mchis la snying po 'di lan drug 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar dug dug dang khrag dang ske tshe'i 'bru bsres pa lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na lha ma yin gyi gnas 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]thams cad gtan pa ma mchis shing 'khrul 'khor ma mchis bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdag cag gis rim gro char bgyis te rigs kyi bu de bzhugs par bgyi'o/_/yo byad thams cad kyang stsol bar bgyi'o/_/dngul chu dang sman bcud kyis len thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[59b.2\]]de nas sna tshogs phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ma d+ta 
[\[59b.3\]]ma taM gi swA hA/_'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te 'dis dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o/_/'dis bdag cag dri za'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o/_/lha'i bde ba sna tshogs myong ngo /_/mdor na bgyi ba bgyid pa thams cad nus so/_/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas thams cad na mchis so/_/
[\[59b.4\]]ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog mar ri phug tu ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la snying po 'di 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tha mar du ru ska'i 'bru mar gyi me bus la a ga ru'i yam sreg shing khri sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas de'i bsam pa yongs 
[\[59b.5\]]su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/gi wang la sngags kyis btab ste dpral bar thig le bgyis na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/lag mthil la sngags kyis btab ste gdong la bya bas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi'am 
[\[59b.6\]]ci'i rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ti ti li phu swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[59b.7\]]ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te 'dis bdag cag mi'am ci'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o/_/sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dang rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams kun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchi'o/_/lha dang klu'i gnas thams cad 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]du kun gyis kyang bkur to/_/snying po 'dis ci la yang mi brjed do/_/ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na des gcig pu dgon par slong mo'i zas 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba'i sna lnga dang bsres 
[\[60a.2\]]pas dkyil 'khor bskus la ci 'byor pas mchod de/_gur gum gyi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te mi'am ci'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis bkur cing gang 'dod pa de bgyid do/_/de nas rnam par bdud kyi bu la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po 
[\[60a.3\]]thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ra ng+kA ri bi Sha ri bi She Sha Ni kr-in+ta ni ku mA ri ke ha swA hA/_phu phu swA hA/_
[\[60a.4\]]bdag cag gi snying po 'dis klu thams cad rang gi dam tshig la dgod par bgyi'o/_/snying po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis klu thams cad bdag cag gi phyag brnyan du 'gyur te 'jigs shing zhum pa dang 'dar ba dang re ba chad par 'gyur/_dug ma mchis shing phyogs phyogs su 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[60a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ste rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des mtsho chen por zhugs la mid pa tsam nub par 'greng ste/_snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas mtsho de nyid nyin gcig bzhin skam mo/_/klu'i gnas thams cad kyang 'bar 
[\[60a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi gzugs kyang ston to/_/bgegs gzhan brgya dag kyang bgyid de de la 'jigs par mi bgyi'o/_/de nas mtshan ma de dag byung nas tha mar ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba de nyid kyis rgya mtsho'i ngogs su dkyil 'khor bskus la bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la ci 'byor pas 
[\[60a.7\]]mchod de dug dang nye ba'i dug thams cad las klu'i rgyal po brgyad bgyis la de nas ske tshe'i 'bru re re nas khrag gis bskus te sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas klu thams cad lhags nas dam pa long shig ces mchis na skrag par mi bgyi'o/_/'di skad du phyag brnyan dag tu gyur cig ces brjod 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur te de slan chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do/_/de nas 'jigs su rung ba la sogs pa srin po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor 
[\[60b.2\]]chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA kAM 'a ri Ni luN+Di ni swA hA/_bdag cag gi snying po 'dis mi thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang stobs 'phrog par bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mdor na 
[\[60b.3\]]rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na ci yang dkon pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des dur khrod du du ba 'thul bar zas su sha 'tshal zhing gos sngon po bgos la lag tu ral gri thogs la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod 
[\[60b.4\]]bgyi'o/_/tha mar 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o/_/ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyis la nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas srin po'i bdag po gang yang rung ba zhig mchi bar 'gyur te de la 'jigs par mi bgyi bar mchod yon stsal na/_bdag la 'dod 
[\[60b.5\]]pa'i gzugs can gyi dngos grub byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/_/des ral gri de blangs nas stsol bar 'gyur te/_de nas lha'i 'gro ba can du 'gyur/_ngo mtshar gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas drang srong chen po mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 
[\[60b.6\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sgrub pa po rnams la sman pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di dbul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ka pI la dz+yo ti ni ra Na da bing+ga la lo tsa na swA hA/_bdag gi snying po 'di ni re ba 
[\[60b.7\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags te/_'dis bdag kyang bkug ste dbang du mchi'o/_/dpal bskyed par bgyi'o/_/nor stsal bar bgyi'o/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nor 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/snying po 'dis rtag tu bza' ba'i sbyin sreg bgyis na bza' ba 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mdor na rdzas gang gis sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i rdzas de 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na ri'i rtse mor mchis la slong mo'i zas 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de me thab bgyis 
[\[61a.2\]]la rgya shug gi yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar smyugs la lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te dga' mgur las rnams bgyid do/_/de nas sprin gyi phreng ba can la sogs pa rlung rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di 
[\[61a.3\]]skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/sgrub pa po dngos grub bsgrub par 'tshal pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA b+h+ra ma ra b+h+ra ma re/_tsa pa li 
[\[61a.4\]]tsa pa li ke/_he ram bi ni swA hA/_'di ni bdag cag gi snying po mchog lags te 'dis bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin bgyid do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung dang mi 'gal bar bgyi'o/_/phan pa dang 
[\[61a.5\]]bde ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des thog mar snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas bdag cag gis de'i bgyi ba thams cad gnang bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na des zas mi bza' bar lan khri 
[\[61a.6\]]bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor lnga bgyi'o/_/kha dog sna tshogs kyi ba dan bdun bzhag go/_/de nas ba dan 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te bskyed pa dang dgag pa la sogs pa las rnams dga' 
[\[61a.7\]]mgur bgyid do/_/de nas skar ma'i rgyal po zla bas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_dpal yang dag par 'jog par bgyid pa dbul lo/_/
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tsan+d+ra kA na ti bi shud d+ha haM ga swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyi gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na bkra mi shis pa 
[\[61b.2\]]rnams sel to/_/dpal skyed do/_/rtag tu skal ba bzang po stsol to/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des zas su 'o ma 'thung zhing pad+ma'i rdzing du zhugs la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar zla ba nyal shel lam mar sar las zla ba bgyis la pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i phrag tu stsol te mtshan thog 
[\[61b.3\]]thag bzlas brjod bgyis na nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe 'od zer 'byung ste byung nas kyang sgrub pa po'i khar 'jug go/_/de nas 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor 'khor nas kun nas 'khod par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te gdung ba ma mchis pa dang nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/_bdag 
[\[61b.4\]]gi gzhal med khang du bskal par gnas shing lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/dpal yang mchis par 'gyur te rgyal srid la sogs pa gang 'dod pa stsol to/_/de nas nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom 
[\[61b.5\]]ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po gzi brjid dang stobs thams cad pa zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa dang bde ba dang tshe ring ba dang nad med par bgyi ba'i slad du de dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA sid+d+ha bed+yo da na swA hA/_
[\[61b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa po gang la las snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na de la nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na gzi brjid can du 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des 'bab chu'i 'gram gyi bye ma la mar me kha lnga bus la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//_
[\[61b.7\]]de nas mer sbyin sreg bgyis la nyi ma nub kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas nyi ma gang yang rung ba zhig mchi bar 'gyur te/_de la mchod yon la sogs pa 'tshal la gang 'dod pa de blangs la de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mchi bar 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de bgyid do/_/gzhal med khang 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]gang yang rung bar mchis so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po chu lha klu'i rgyal po du ma dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[62a.2\]]thA a pa ma pa ti bi ra dza swA hA/_gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na de rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/spyod pa gtsang ma thams cad la blo mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na rgya mtsho chen por 
[\[62a.3\]]mid pa nub tsam du zhugs la snying po 'di lan 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas tha mar rin po che sna bzhi las klu bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de klu'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig gnas kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis la mchod yon stsal te ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byin cig ces brjod 
[\[62a.4\]]par bgyi'o/_/de phan chad gang bsgo ba de bgyid do/_/de nyid du zhugs nas lo mang por gnas so/_/de nas khyab 'jug gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi 
[\[62a.5\]]snying po 'di 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA e ka e ka_/ba ra ba ra/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_biSh+Na be swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po ni 'di lags te 'dis sdang ba thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o/_/phung bar bgyi'o/_/yams kyi nad dang gnod 
[\[62a.6\]]pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de'i blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa dang ba'i rnam lnga bsres pas khyab 'jug gi gzugs 
[\[62a.7\]]lag pa bzhi pa bgyis te lag pa g.yon pa gcig na 'khor lo/_/g.yas pa gcig na dbyug to/_/g.yon pa gcig na dung /_g.yas pa gcig na dam pa sbyin par bgyis la ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis te ci 'byor pas mchod la kha nub phyogs su bltas te mchis la 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'gul ba'am dung sgra 'byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te dgos pa gang bsams pa de thams cad bgyid do/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi rgyal po drag pos byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la
