[\[62b.2\]]mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po mchis te des na bdag las drag po bgyid pa'i slad du sems can thams cad kyis drag po zhes bgyi bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bdag rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gsum ma rung bar bgyid do/_/dbang du bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[62b.3\]]'das bdag gi snying po 'di dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hUM phaT/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad pa'i nor lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la dran par bgyid 
[\[62b.4\]]na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig bka' bzhin du bgyid do/_/'jig rten gsum yang dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des dur khrod du lus thal bas byugs la mi mgo'i thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan thogs shing 
[\[62b.5\]]lag na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs te khri'i zur shing khyer la stag lpags kyi sham thabs 'tshal zhing slong mo'i zas bab bab du 'tshal la snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas du ba 'thul ba'i dur khrod du ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis te mdung rtse 
[\[62b.6\]]gsum pa dang khri'i zur shing bzhag la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis nas mi sha'i bdug pa bsreg cing mtshan thog thag brjod par gyis na drag po nyid [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang pos bskor nas 'jigs 'jigs lta chen po'i gzugs can du mchi bar 'gyur te de la mi 'jigs par bgyi zhing mchod yon stsol to/_/
[\[62b.7\]]de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa thams cad kyang bgyid do/_/de'i slad du 'brang zhing bka' sdod pa lhur len to/_/de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]po 'dir snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA po n+ne te dat+ta b+hU ta a d+hi pa ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar bgyid pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag 
[\[63a.2\]]tu dran par bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/bsrung bar bgyi/_dpal bskyed par bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des skyed mos tshal dben pa'i gnas su zas nub mo 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod pa 
[\[63a.3\]]bgyis te tsan+dan gyi bdug pa bsreg cing gtor ma rgya chen po yang phul/_mar gyi mar me brgyad kyang phul la nyi ma nub pa nas brtsams te nam phyed kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o/_/de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa thams cad kyang bsgrub par 'gyur ro/_/sman bcud kyis len kyang stsol 
[\[63a.4\]]to/_/de nas lha mo dka' thub zlog gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA u ma ye swA hA/_bcom 
[\[63a.5\]]ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni skal ba bzang po thams cad bgyid pa ste/_me tog gam/_spos sam/_lig bu mig gam/_gi wang la sngags lan cig btab ste bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na 
[\[63a.6\]]des bzang ldan gyi snying po la sa cho ga rgyas par nyis 'gyur du sbyar te bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de nas gza' chen po smin drug gi bus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir yid rab tu dga' zhing rang gi snying po 
[\[63a.7\]]'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA he ku mA ra dz+wa li ta mU rti tsa ru tsi tra ma ba ra swA hA/_bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad kun du skrag par bgyid pa ste gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/glags tshol ba'i gdon thams 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]cad kyis glags mi thod do/_/rma bya'i mjug ma la sngags kyis btab ste gdon gyis btab pa la bya ba pa bgyi zhing de'i bdug pa yang bsregs na sos par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog mar byis pa khye'u brgyad bkur sti cher bgyis te 'tshal ma stsal la de dag zas gang 
[\[63b.2\]]la sred pa de stsol to/_/de nas ma mo'i khyim du lag na mdung thung thogs la gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ma mo'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du mchod pa ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis te 'bab chu'i 'gram gnyis kyi 'jim pa las gzugs 
[\[63b.3\]]brnyan bgyis la/_snying gar mdung thung btsugs te ji srid shi'o zhe'am rgyab chag go zhes sa sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na grub par 'gyur ro/_/de slan chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do/_/de nas lha'i bu sprin dkar sprin gyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' lag na 
[\[63b.4\]]rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA gu lu gu lu/_gardza gardza/_ma hA sbud b+ha ba/_ba ra bin+du tut+mA 
[\[63b.5\]]la/_dar dar/_pu ra pu ra/_ka sa ka sa swA hA/_bdag cag gi snying po 'di ni 'gro ba thams cad la sman par bgyid pa ste/_'dis ni bdag cag rgya che zhing stug pa'i sprin gyi dra bas nam mkha'i dkyil khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas lo tog thams cad sgrub par bgyid do/_/sa chen 
[\[63b.6\]]po 'di yang char pa'i rgyun chen pos tshim par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la chus phongs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/lus la nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/
[\[63b.7\]]de'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par mchi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des byams pa dang ldan pas zla ba drug tu zla ba shar ba nas brtsams te zla ba shar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/zla ba drug tshang nas ci 'byor bas mchod pa bgyis te rgya mtsho chen po bzhi 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]las chu blangs la/_bum pa zhabs nag po med pa bkang ste spos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pas mchod la/_nam chu las dbu ba 'byung zhing gyen du 'thor ba dang sgra 'bug 'bug po'am 'brug gi sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na/_lha'i bu char sprin gang yang 
[\[64a.2\]]rung ba zhig mchis nas chu bar snang la 'thor ro/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te 'dod pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad bgyid do/_/de nas glog sprin 'joms pa dang /_glog gzi brjid dang /_glog 'od snang dang /_glog phreng bzang zhes bya ba rnams kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na 
[\[64a.3\]]rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das gnod pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/_s+phu ra 
[\[64a.4\]]sarba ma hA pri ti ka ra swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na de la bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des phyogs bzhir sgron me bus shing phyogs bzhir bdug pas bdugs la ci 
[\[64a.5\]]'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis te/_phyogs bzhir kha dog ci lta ba bzhin du bum pa bzhi bzhag pa la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas phyogs bzhir glog byung ba la 'jigs par mi bgyid par thams cad la mchod yon stsal na 'grub par 'gyur te/_rang gi gnas su khrid 
[\[64a.6\]]nas bsrung bar bgyid/_yid kyis bsams pa rnams sgrub par bgyid do/_/gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de stsol to/_/de nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sogs pa ri'i rgyal po chen po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[64a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA tsa la tsa la/_ma hI d+ha ra/_rat+na 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]d+ha ra swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po 'di gang zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de dgon par mchis pa'i tshe/_bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i 
[\[64b.2\]]rtse mor 'dzegs la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa bgyis te 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang bsres pa'i sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas bdag cag ri'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig mchis te 'di skad ces 
[\[64b.3\]]smra'o/_/bu tshur sheg nged kyi gnas su 'dong /_ci 'dod pa de sbyin no zhes smra'o/_/des kyang nam bdag dgos te dran pa'i tshe tshur shog cig ces smras nas de bzhin du gyur cig_/thams cad bgyi yis khyod su la yang ma slong zhig ces smra'o/_/de nas gshin rje dang /_mtshan mo nag 
[\[64b.4\]]mo dang /_be con nag po can dang /_skyes bu nag po dang /_rna nag mo dang /_dpal sbyin ma rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_na maH
[\[64b.5\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bai b+hA sa twA ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po 'di gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/_bdag gis de gsad dgug gi slad du rang gi g.yog 'khor mi dgye bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des zla ba mar 
[\[64b.6\]]gyi ngo'i zhag bcu bzhi pa'am zhag brgyad la smyung ba bgyis te/_'bras sA lu btags pa'i phye las gshin rje sor brgyad dam sor drug pa 'khor dang bcas pa bgyis la ma he dang be con yang ngos gnyis su bzhag ste/_de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis nas mtshan thog thag 
[\[64b.7\]]bzlas brjod bgyis na/_nam phyed dam/_nyi ma shar ka na ma he sgra 'byin tam/_be con 'gul te mchod yon la sogs pa stsal la bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i las rnams bgyid do/_/de nas mtshan mo nag mos rang gi snying po smras pa/_
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bi ka rA le rA tri mA te swA hA/_gang la la rtag tu dran par bgyid na de bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na snga ma bzhin no/_/be con nag pos kyang rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu 
[\[65a.2\]]khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ta mo da b+ha bA/_kA la pA sha ga swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag de'i drung du mi mchi'o/_/phan gdags pa'ang bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi ste/_bdag gis de'i bsam 
[\[65a.3\]]pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/de nas skyes bu nag pos rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ut+ta ma bu ru Sha swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[65a.4\]]de'i drung du mi mchi bar phan gdags par bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/khyad par cung zad ni 'di lta ste/_skra'i zhags pa ni gnyis gzhag par bgyi'o/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'chi bdag gis rang 
[\[65a.5\]]gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA a pra ti ha ta ka de kar+m+ma ba sha a bu ke de be ba ra de swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag de'i drung du mi mchi ste sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so/_/ci ste bsgrub par 
[\[65a.6\]]'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi ste dril bu gzhag go/_/de nas dpa' byed kyis rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bA kr-i ti ma hA trai t+ye b+ha ga ba ti/_mu ti mu khi swA hA/_gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag de'i drung du mi mchi ste/_
[\[65a.7\]]'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_bla ma la smod pa ni ma gtogs so/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/'bras kyi 'o thug lan tshwa can gzhag par bgyi ste/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol to/_/de nas rna 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]nag mos rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA kA la tsa kra Ni swA hA/_gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag de'i drung du mi mchi ste pha dang ma mi dga' bar bgyis pa ni ma gtogs so/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par 
[\[65b.2\]]bgyi'o/_/bye brag tu ni phub ma'i me dang bcas pa'i me snod gzhag par bgyi'o/_/su zhig de ltar bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas ma mo thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[65b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ma mo drag mo bdag cag kyang 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i slad du/_grong dang ljongs thams cad du gnas par bgyi'o/_/dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bdag cag so so'i snying po 'bul bar bgyi'o/_/de nas tshangs pa'i chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maH
[\[65b.4\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA oM brah+ma pa ti ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/ma mo thams cad kyang yi rangs nas rtag tu bsrung bar bgyid do/_/ci ste bsgrub par 
[\[65b.5\]]'tshal na des oM zhes bgyi ba snying gar bsams la lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas ma mo'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de mtshan thog thag tu sngags bgrang /_nor bu dang ril ba spyi blugs lag na thogs la oM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra grag gi bar du bzlas 
[\[65b.6\]]brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba'i las de bgyid do/_/gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/_/de nas drag po'i chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hrIHphaT swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag 
[\[65b.7\]]gi snying po 'di rgyun du dran par bgyid na/_bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing bsgo ba bzhin bgyi'o/_/gang bsams pa de stsol to/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na slong mo'i zas bza' zhing dur khrod na mtshan gcig mchis par lha chen po'i glo g.yas par lan nyis 'bum 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de da tu ke ra ka'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pa bzhi khri dur khrod kyi mer sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/nam phyed na khyu mchog gi sgra'am/_oM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur te de nas ma mo thams cad grub 
[\[66a.2\]]par gyur to/_/de nas khyab 'jug gi chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA nA ra ya ni dza ga da thi ha ri/_ba la ba di dza ye swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_
[\[66a.3\]]bskyab pa'i slad du bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des bsod nams 'bab par lan lnga khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ston zla tha chung sa tshes bcu gnyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de/_man dA ra ba'i me tog mar la 
[\[66a.4\]]smyugs pa la lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/_/ma mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhon nu'i chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ku mA ri/_ma yU ra/_
[\[66a.5\]]tsi tri ke ta ga dre shak+ti d+hA ri Ni/_bi t+tsi swA hA/_phu swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o/_/ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des kha lho phyogs su bltas te lag pa g.yon 
[\[66a.6\]]par mdung thung thogs shing lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas de bzhin du ci 'byor pas mchod la 'bru'i la du rgya shug tsam gyis mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/nam phyed dam nang par gzhon nu ma mchis nas mdun du 'greng ste de la mchod yon stsol to/_/
[\[66a.7\]]de phyin cad grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/_/de nas tsa muN+Dis rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ru d+hi ra be tA li/_A kaR+Sha Ni/_ma hA kr-it+te ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_b+hin+da b+hin+da tsa muN+Di bi t+tse swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/_bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o/_/ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des gos sngon po bgos te lag na mi thod thogs te/_zla ba gcig zas su sha bza' zhing dur khrod dam mo'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[66b.2\]]du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar de nyid du ci 'byor pas mchod de mi sha'i sreg blugs yungs kar gyi mar la smyugs pa lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas ha ha zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byin te/_lce'u gnyug bgyid la lag na mi thod thogs shing mchi bar 'gyur te/_mi thod khrag gis gang 
[\[66b.3\]]ba'i mchod yon stsol to/_/de nas legs so zhes mchi ste sgrub pa po la bskor ba bgyis te de nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de slan cad rtag tu slad bzhin 'brang zhing ci 'dod pa de bgyid do/_/de nas phag gi chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/_namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_
[\[66b.4\]]sarba thA badzra go Ni ni bI da badzro ti ra bI ra bI ra li hUM ka ri swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/
[\[66b.5\]]tha mar ske tshe'i 'bru dang chang bsres pa'i sreg blugs lan 'bum mo'i dkyil 'khor du sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas nam phyed na phag gi chung ma nyid byi la mo'i gzugs kyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na lha'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ngo /_/de nas grub par rig par bgyi ste de phyin cad ci 
[\[66b.6\]]'dod pa bzhin du las thams cad bgyid do//_//'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/_bam po drug pa/_de nas lus ngan gyi chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tsi da ri Ni ku ra bin+de dAn+d+ra pA Ni swA hA/_
[\[66b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na de la rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/nyin gcig bzhin du nor thams cad rnam par 'phel lo/_bdag gi phyag brnyan bzhi rtag tu g.yog 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yid la bsams 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]pa'i dgos pa thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des slong mo'i zas bza' zhing lag na be con thogs la/_shing drung gcig na mchis par snying po 'di lan sum khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar de nyid du ci 'byor pas mchod la 'bras yos 
[\[67a.2\]]kyi sreg blugs zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bsres la lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/_de slan cad gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/_/de nas 'jigs 'jigs lta chen po'i chung mas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom 
[\[67a.3\]]ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA he kun khi/_ma hA na khi sha ku ni/_u lU ka mu khi/_ya ma dU tI bi ta tse swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid 
[\[67a.4\]]na de'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des slong mo'i zas bza' zhing lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/_shing drung gcig par mchis la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de bu btsas pa'i thal ba'i 
[\[67a.5\]]sreg blugs lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyi'o/_/de nas 'jigs 'jigs lta chen po'i chung mas srul po'i gzugs 'dzin cing mchi bar 'gyur te/_de la 'ug pa'i 'dab ma'i bdug pa stsal to/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/_/de nas chu klung chen po gang 
[\[67a.6\]]ga la sogs pa chu klung chen po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ma na 
[\[67a.7\]]si ma no nu ge ga li bi ma le swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la chu'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na lkog ma nub tsam gyi chur zhugs la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas ci 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]'byor pas mchod de 'bras sA lu btags pa'i phye ma zho dang sbrang rtsis sbrus pa las sor drug tshad tsam gyi gzugs bgyis la brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na grub par 'gyur te/_de slan cad chu klung rnams su zhugs kyang 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/de dag nyid dang ci srid 'dod kyi bar 
[\[67b.2\]]du gnas shing bu bzhin du rjes su spyod la gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/_/de nas sna tshogs phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 
[\[67b.3\]]rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA b+ha ga ba te gan+d+ha rba rA dza pri ye swA hA/_gang la la zhig bdag cag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/_bdag cag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyid do/_/dgos pa thams cad la rab tu 
[\[67b.4\]]dga' ba'i yid kyis gnang ba stsal bar bgyid do/_/bskor nas gnas par bgyid do/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa bgyid cing steng du bla res bzung la/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rjes su dran pa stsal bar bgyi'o/_/ji ste bsgrub par 
[\[67b.5\]]'tshal na des thog mar dgon pa chen por zhugs la zas su 'bras bu bza' zhing snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de du ru ska'i bdug pa bsreg cing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_dri za'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba 
[\[67b.6\]]zhig mchis nas mgo la me tog gi phreng ba stsol gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas dri za'i nang du kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur te dri za'i gnas thams cad du zhugs nas kyang nam yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/mdor na gang 'tshal ba de stsol to/_/de nas rig 
[\[67b.7\]]sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ga ga na saM b+ha be ga ga na gau ri/_u t+pat+ti ke hi ri khi ri khi ri sa na sa ra ba haM ga mi swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po lags te/_'dis bdag cag rig sngags 
[\[68a.2\]]'chang gi rgyal po zhes bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bgyid pa zhes bgyi'o/_/mdor na 'dod pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la zhig snying po 
[\[68a.3\]]'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/_/bdag cag de la dngos grub dang mthu dang stobs brtan pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/ci ste snying po 'di nye bar sgrub par bgyid na/_des ri'i rtse mor mchis la cho ga snga ma bzhin du lan sa ya bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas ci 'byor pas mchod la ba lang gi 
[\[68a.4\]]lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus te mar gyi sreg blugs lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/thogs pa med par 'dod dgur 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas so can la sogs pa srin mo chen mo thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje ga la ba de 
[\[68a.5\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA kre ka ri ko ta re pi ti ke swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 
[\[68a.6\]]'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/_de dgon pa chen po na mchis kyang rung /_dur khrod na mchis kyang rung /_chu'i nang na mchis kyang rung /_me'i nang na mchis kyang rung /_rgya mtsho'i nang na mchis kyang rung /_srin mo'i nang na mchis kyang rung ste bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/zhi ba dang 
[\[68a.7\]]bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/chad pa la sogs pa yang yongs su spang bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des khang stong ngam dur khrod chen por gcig pu bong bu zhon zhing /_bslangs pa ma lags pa'i kha zas 'tshal la/_lag na gri thogs shing ce spyang gi 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]pags pa'am byi la'i pags pa'i sham thabs bgos la snying po lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar nya sha la sogs pa ci 'byor pas mchod la ba lang gi lci ba'i bdug pa bsreg cing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyi ste/_phyogs phyogs su bya b+he ru Na Ti ka phyogs bzhir sgra 
[\[68b.2\]]'byin pa'am/_bong bu'i kha nas me lce 'bar ba 'byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi zhing /_'jigs pa mi bgyi bar legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod la mchod yon stsal to/_/legs so zhes brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/_/
[\[68b.3\]]bong bu la zhon zhing gang dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'byung po'i rgyal po brtsegs pa la sogs pa 'byung po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 
[\[68b.4\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dang phan pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hi si hi si/_mi si mi si/_gi li gi li/_
[\[68b.5\]]b+hU te shwa ri swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag cag des bsgo ba bzhin du bgyi'o/_/bye brag tu ni zas kyi phud stsal la don thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des shing pa ti'i drung du 'byung po thams cad 
[\[68b.6\]]pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o/_/tsan+dan gyi bdug pa bsreg cing kha zas mi bza' bar 'byung po'i rgyal po thams cad lhags nas gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig la sogs pa stsol gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/yang na rang gi khyim du khrid nas dngos po thams cad kyis 'gron 
[\[68b.7\]]bgyid do/_/gang 'tshal ba de stsal to/_/las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang bgyid do/_/de nas ba lang skyong ba la sogs pa sha za thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba tha mi tsi mi tsi/_khi si khi si swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag cag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[69a.2\]]dgos pa thams cad la gnang ba stsal bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des khang stong du snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de/_gzegs ma'i sreg blugs sam/_rgya skyegs kyi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg 
[\[69a.3\]]bgyis na sha za gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas dam pas 'gron bgyid do/_/gang 'tshal ba de bslang bar bgyi ste 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/_/de nas gnon po 'gul po la sogs pa gnon po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 
[\[69a.4\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA gu ru gu ru swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/_de la 'byung 
[\[69a.5\]]po'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/de nas rnam par 'byam pa la sogs pa grib gnon rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/namaHsarba 
[\[69a.6\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA gi ni dza miny+dzi swa hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/de nas nya mid la sogs pa mdangs 'phrog pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[69a.7\]]lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA gi li gi li swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag cag de'i mdangs 'phrog par mi bgyid do/_/de nas bzhin ngan la sogs pa [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi tshogs thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying 
[\[69b.2\]]po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA b+hi mi ri b+hi mi ri/_durla b+he swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/_bdag cag de'i dgos pa thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid do/_/de nas legs rgyal la sogs pa 
[\[69b.3\]]bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bdud kyi stobs thams cad pa zhes bgyi ba'i snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_
[\[69b.4\]]sarba thA taM gi ra swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/_bdag cag de'i mdun du mi mchi bar bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma kho nar gtsang mar bgyis shing /_gos gtsang ma bgos la skyed mos tshal lam lha chen 
[\[69b.5\]]pho'i gnas su glu len cing gar bgyid cing /_rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa dag gis/_yid dga' bar snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas de nyid du yo byad thams cad kyis rgya cher mchod la/_spos thams cad las 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs bgyis te mar 
[\[69b.6\]]gyi mar me brgya dbus la/_glu drug ldan nam 'dab brgya ma'i dbyangs kyis mtshan thog thag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nam phyed na dga' ma dang sdug ma dang lhan cig tu mchis shing /_de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/_mi snang bar 'gyur ba'am/_rjes su rgyu ba nyid kyang rung 
[\[69b.7\]]ste dam pa stsol to/_/ci ste ma grub na grong dam pa brgyad stsol to/_/skal ba bzang po'i mchog dang ldan zhing 'dod pa'i lha gnyis pa dang 'dra bar sa la rgyu bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal ma la sogs pa sring mo chen po bzhi phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs te 'dug nas de dag gis byang 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/de nas rgyal mas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tsa ye tsa 
[\[70a.2\]]yod+b+ha be swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/dpal bskyed par bgyi'o/_/bu mang por bgyi'o/_/skal pa bzang po stsal bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub 
[\[70a.3\]]par 'tshal na des rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu'i klung du zhugs kyang rung /_ri'i rtse mor mchis kyang rung snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar gcig pus sa phyogs gtsang ma dben par ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor byugs la ba ser mo'i mar gyi 
[\[70a.4\]]mar me bus te/_nam gyi gung la yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang /_'dod dgur 'gro ba dang /_'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rnam par rgyal mas rang gi 
[\[70a.5\]]snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dza yot+ta re dza ya bi dza ya ni nan+da ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/tshe ring ba dang nad med pa phun sum tshogs 
[\[70a.6\]]pa stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des yang snga ma bzhin du lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/ma grub na yang skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/_/nor chen po dang ldan pa dang 
[\[70a.7\]]lan thebs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mi 'pham mas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA an+ta a dzi te swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/_bdag de'i bsam pa thams cad yongs 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du rtag tu slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor bas mchod de mtshan thog thag gu gul gyi bdug pa bsreg cing /_til nag pos nam gyi 
[\[70b.2\]]gung la sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do/_/de nas gzhan gyis mi thub mas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA an+na rdza be a ku ti le a pa rA dzi te swa hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying 
[\[70b.3\]]po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag de bsrung ba'i slad du rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/_/gzung ba'i tshig dang skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin 
[\[70b.4\]]du snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod la klu shing gi me tog mar dang bsres pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na des na 'grub par 'gyur te/_tshig tsam gyis las bgyid de gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas tam bu ras byang chub sems 
[\[70b.5\]]dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo/_/na maHsarba 
[\[70b.6\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM he dzaM be/_oM he mo he swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni gdong bzhi pa phyogs bzhi nas byung ba skye dgu gnas pa 'byor pa 'byin pa sdud par bgyid pa ste/_'bru dang bsangs dang bkra shis dang /_/dpal dang 
[\[70b.7\]]rnam par 'byor pa 'phel/_/ngo mtshar mang po rnams dang ldan/_/'di ni bcud kyis len gyi mchog_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dus thams cad du yid la bgyid na/_bdag 'khor dang bcas te de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/ci ste bsgrub 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]par 'tshal na des 'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_nyal yang rung /_lam du 'gro yang rung ste/_bdag la rnam par da god par bgyis pa bzhin du skyes bu bcing bar bgyi'o/_/gdong bzhi pa rnam par bkod la phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o/_/des tshes gcig 
[\[71a.2\]]nas brtsams nas zla ba nya'i bar du bgyi'o/_/de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de 'bras sA lu'i phye las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas par bgyis la snying po oM zhes bgyi ba dang dza zhes bgyi ba shar phyogs su dgod do/_/bA zhes bgyi ba nub phyogs su dgod do/_/ma zhes bgyi ba byang 
[\[71a.3\]]phyogs su gzhag go/_/ha zhes bgyi ba lho phyogs su gzhag la dngos grub 'tshal bas rtswa ku sha sbams pa'i steng du mchis te/_nub gcig lan tshwa'i sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na/_na nga par dngos grub ci 'tshal ba'i 'bras bu stsol to/_/bzlas brjod bgyis na yi 
[\[71a.4\]]ge [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du rig par bgyi'o/_/de nas lag na rdo rje de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bltas nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_grogs po dag 'di ltar khyed kyis dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po rnams smras shing phul ba dang rjes su yi rang ba ni grogs po 
[\[71a.5\]]dag legs so legs so/_/snying po 'di dag ni snying po mchog gis drangs pa ste/_des na 'di dag ni snying po mchog gis zin pas dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig bstan pa 'di las 'das na snying po mchog gis rdo rje 'bar ba kun du mched cing 'bar bas/_de'i 
[\[71a.6\]]mgo bo 'gems par 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa de bzhin du gyur cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe rdo rje ye shes chen po'i 
[\[71a.7\]]'od zer 'phro ba las 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_lag pas lag na rdo rje las rdo rje blangs te/_ye shes las byung ba'i ut+pa la dri ma med par byas nas ye shes chen po las byung ba'i ut+pa la de la rdo rje gzhag go/_/rdo rje chen po de bzhag ma thag tu 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du kye ma 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/_/de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 
[\[71b.2\]]snying ga nas mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po byung ngo /_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA many+dzu badzra dza ya ra ti ta pi la sa hUM kr-i da na ku mA ra swA hA/_rdo rje'i snying po hUM zhes bya ba mchog dang ldan pa byung ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs 
[\[71b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mgo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/_rdo rje chen po legs so legs/_/stobs chen rdo rje dam pa sbyin/_/lag na rdo rje dbang bskur bar/_/dngos 
[\[71b.4\]]grub bsgrub pa rgya cher ni/_/bstan pa 'di la bshad par gyis/_/de skad gsungs nas rdzu 'phrul che/_/sangs rgyas de dag der bzhugs bzhin/_/'jam dpal gzhon nu'i spyi bo nas/_/phyag rnams de dag slar bkug go/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 
[\[71b.5\]]gnang bas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rim par phye ba smras pa/_thog ma nyid du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten na ma/_sku gzugs sam/_dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du snying po gang yang rung ba rgya cher brjod 
[\[71b.6\]]de/_slob dpon mgu bar byas la gsol ba btab ste/_slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag la gsang sngags stsal du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/_/slob dpon la de skad ces gsol ba btab nas/_thal mo sbyar te pus mo'i lha nga 
[\[71b.7\]]sa la btsugs la lag pa stong pa ma yin pas sngags gang 'dod pa blang bar bya ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du 'o zhes tshig tu brjod par bya'o/_/gzhan du sngags bdag gis blangs na ni grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i snying po 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]'di dag gi spyi'i dngos grub bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_ri'am/_nags tshal lam/_khang stong ngam/_phug gam/_dur khrod dam/_chu klung ngam/_dben pa gang yang rung ba der gnas la/_slong mo'i zas za yang rung /_bslangs pa ma yin pa'i 
[\[72a.2\]]zas za yang rung /_gtsang mar byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos la/_dus gsum du khrus byas shing gos lan gsum brjes te snying po gang yang rung ba zhig lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas ldong ros sam lig bu mig gam/_gi wang ngam/_ba'i rnam lngas 
[\[72a.3\]]bkrus kyang rung /_ba lang gi lci ba'i phung po'i steng du gzhag kyang rung ste zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes nas bzung ste nya'i bar du gzhag go/_/bdag gi lha dang bdag gi gzugs tha mi dad par byas la mtshan ma byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de la mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te sngon 
[\[72a.4\]]ma byung ba'i chos thos par 'gyur ba dang /_snang ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa myong pa snyam du shes pa dang /_bdag nyid la yid ches par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 
[\[72a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod de rdzas de lag pa'i snyim par bcug la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar rdzas de 'bar ba'am du ba 'thul ba'am dro bar 'gyur ro/_/'bar na ni lus la bskus na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/_
[\[72a.6\]]nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang /_bskal par gnas pa dang /_thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad du rgyu ba dang 'dod na mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/du ba 'thul na sum ris byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dro bar gyur na 'gro ba thams cad 
[\[72a.7\]]la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/_/ma grub na las su rung ba dang blon po chen po'i srid thob par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gcig sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bgyid cing snying po gang yang rung ba zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci 'byor pas mchod la/_sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la blta 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]zhing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de'i gzugs de grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang yang rung ba'i mdun du bsgrubs na yang de bzhin du 'grub ste gang 'dod pa de byed do/_/sngar spyad pa ma byas kyang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la dbus 
[\[72b.2\]]kyi yul du ni 'khor los sgyur ba bcom ldan 'das drag po chen po 'grub bo/_/lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni lag na rdo rje drag po 'grub bo/_/'gro lding ba'i yul du ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'gro lding 'grub bo/_/byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad+ma 'grub bo/_/
[\[72b.3\]]shar phyogs kyi yul du ni dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'grub bo/_/skyed mos tshal chen por ni gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang /_gnod sbyin mo rnams 'grub bo/_/khang stong du ni sha za dang sha za mo rnams 'grub bo/_/dur khrod du ni ma mo rnams dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_srin po 
[\[72b.4\]]dang /_srin mo la sogs pa 'grub bo/_/ri rnams su ni rig sngags 'chang rnams dang mi'am ci rnams 'grub bo/_/dgon pa chen po rnams su ni dri za rnams 'grub bo/_/'bab chu rnams su ni klu rnams 'grub bo/_/khang pa chen po dang shing pa ta'i drung dag tu ni 'byung 
[\[72b.5\]]po rnams 'grub bo/_/byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni gnod sbyin chen po dang nad ku be ra 'grub bo/_/rgya mtsho chen por ni sring mo bzhi dag 'grub bo/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang grong khyer chen po rnams su ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can 'grub bo/_/chu 'dus 
[\[72b.6\]]su ni tshangs pa 'grub bo/_/dur khrod du wa dang bcas par ni drag po 'grub bo/_/skyes bu chen po'i gnas su ni khyab 'jug 'grub bo/_/byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni nyi ma 'grub bo/_/gangs ri la ni zla ba 'grub bo/_/lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni smin drug gi bu 'grub bo/_/ri sul 
[\[72b.7\]]dag tu ni lha ma yin rnams 'grub bo/_/rigs kyi bu dag rgya mtsho chen po rnams su ni lto 'phye chen po rnams 'grub bo/_/yul ma ga d+hAr ni drang srong chen po rnams 'grub bo/_/mya ngam dag tu ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams 'grub bo/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang ri rnams su ni rin 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]po che dag 'grub bo/_/'bab chu rnams su ni 'bab chu chen po dag 'grub bo/_/yul ka ling gar ni 'byung po'i rgyal po dbang ldan 'grub bo/_/stor khung rnams su ni gnon po dag 'grub bo/_/khyim gyi bar rnams su ni grib gnon rnams 'grub bo/_/rten dang 
[\[73a.2\]]gnas rnams su ni brjed byed kyi gdon rnams 'grub bo/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang yul lang ka dang /_ri ma la ya'i steng du ni gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa 'grub bo/_/gzhan yang srin po chen po rnams ni yul lang ka dang ri ma la yar 'grub bo/_/gzhan yang nam 
[\[73a.3\]]mkha' lding gi dbang po thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen por 'grub bo/_/gangs khrod du ni dbyar sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams 'grub bo/_/gzhan yang ri rtse brgyad pa'i rtse mor ni rlung bdun 'grub bo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de ltar na sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[73a.4\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung ste/_dus kyi dbang gis gsang sngags 'grub pa gdags par mdzad cing rnam par gzhag par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i 
[\[73a.5\]]blo gros kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal dus zhes bya ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces 
[\[73a.6\]]smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dus zhes bya ba 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ci srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub par khong du chud 
[\[73a.7\]]par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po na 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po yod de/_nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal po chen po ji srid du rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de srid du chu skam par mi 'gyur te/_nor bu 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]rin po che chen po mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho chen po de yang skam la gnas pa dang /_chu na gnas pa'i mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_kha cig tu ni btung bas/_kha cig tu ni gnas kyis/_kha cig tu ni rin po che rnam par 'geng pa nas rnam pa 
[\[73b.2\]]thams cad kyi bar gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing /_nam yang nye bar mi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal po de med par gyur na chu med pa dang /_dngos po thams cad med pa'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po yang srog chags thams cad kyi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo 
[\[73b.3\]]gros de bzhin du ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang nye bar bzung nas dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan 
[\[73b.4\]]las 'das na dngos grub de yang nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros ltos ci tsam du shing yod pa de tsam du me 'bar te shing med na me mi 'bar ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub par khong du chud par bya ste/_zhi 
[\[73b.5\]]ba'i blo gros 'di ni dus yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas 'byung bar brtson par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi 
[\[73b.6\]]sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags sngar spyad pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de gsang sngags spyad pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_spro ba dang /_yi dam la brtan par gsang sngags kyi gzhi re re nas spyad par bya'o/_/ji tsam du 'gro yang 
[\[73b.7\]]rung /_'dug kyang rung /_nyal yang rung ste de sems rtse gcig kho nas 'jug ste gnyis su ni ma yin no/_/gcig pu gnyis su med par dben pa nyams dga' ba 'du 'dzi med par rang gi yul la gnas shing sngar bsnyen pa bya'o/_/de nas zla ba tshes nas brtsams te 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]nya'i bar du bya'o/_/de nas ral gri 'am/_'khor lo 'am/_lig bu mig gam/_gi wang la sogs pa gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la/_ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba dang ba'i gcin bsres pas dkyil 'khor byugs la bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[74a.2\]]'khor lo bsgrub na 'khor lo'o rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/ci ste ral gri bsgrub na des rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/ci ste lig bu mig dang gi wang la sogs pa bsgrub na mdung rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/ci 'byor pas mchod la nyi ma nub kar 
[\[74a.3\]]dmar por gyur pa nas bzung ste nyi ma shar gyi bar du 'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/_byang chub kyi sems sngon du byas la bsrung ba byas pa dang byams pa'i sems kyis rdzas de blangs te/_mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nam phyed dam nyi ma 
[\[74a.4\]]'char kar rdzas de nges par 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/'bar na yan lag bkra la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'ong zhing de dag gis bsod nams ci lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur nas rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur te 'dod na mchi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[74a.5\]]thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mar rgyu ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson pa'i yid du 'gyur ro/_/gi wang la sogs pa yang de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/'bar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_gling 
[\[74a.6\]]bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams su spyad pa spyod pa dang /_bskal par gnas shing rgyu ba dang /_'dod dgur thags thogs med par 'gro bar 'gyur te/_/shi 'phos nas kyang rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/du ba 'thul na mi snang ba dang /_'dod pa'i 
[\[74a.7\]]gzugs can dang /_'dod pa bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyu ba dang /_longs spyod kyi drug cha 'phrog par 'gyur te/_shi 'phos nas kyang dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dro bar gyur na 'gro ba thams cad la dbang byed pa dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa dang /_sgyu rtsal 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]thams cad shes par 'gyur te/_shi 'phos nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du gnod sbyin gyi pho brang lcang lo can du skye bar 'gyur te gnod sbyin gzhon nu'i lus thob bo/_/ci ste ma grub na yang nges par yul thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub 
[\[74b.2\]]sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags thams cad kyi gong nas gong du gyur pa stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa gsang 
[\[74b.3\]]sngags kyi mgon po'i sgrub pa nyon cig_/zhi ba'i blo gros thog ma nyid du sngar spyad pa byas pa dkyil 'khor mthong ba/_dam tshig thob pa gnang ba rdo rje 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba des/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor bris la rin po che 
[\[74b.4\]]dang spos dang sman thams cad kyis bkang ba'i bya ma bum bcu drug 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa dag gis spyi bor dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/dus thams cad du lha'i gzugs mthong bar bya'o/_/de nas ri'i rtse mor song la slong 
[\[74b.5\]]mo'i zas bza' zhing dus gsum du khrus bya/_dus gsum du go sa brjes la shing ltar mi smra bar bya zhing gtsang sbra dang /_gtsang sbra spyod pa phun sum tshogs par byas la bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po sa ya phrag 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de 
[\[74b.6\]]nas rdo rje drag po'i snying po lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas gser mgar gso sbyong bzung bas gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'am drug pa nor bu me shel gyi lte ba can dang /_'od zer 'bar bas bskor ba brdung du gzhug go/_/de nas spos chus 
[\[74b.7\]]bkrus te mchog sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i sngags kyis gzi brjid bskyed par bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje drag po'i snying pos bskul bar byas te/_bskul nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na tsan+dan gyi sgrom bu yod pa'i nang du bcug la gzhag go/_/
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]de nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku mtho gang tshad kyi mchod rten khri bya'o/_/de nas zla ba tshes nas brtsams te a ga ru'i bdug pa bsreg cing zla ba nya'i bar du bya'o/_/bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byed cing bslangs pa ma yin pa'i zas za bas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la 
[\[75a.2\]]ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus te/_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/de na 'dug pa'i 'khor lo lag pas blangs la 'khor lo las 'od zer rnams byung gi bar du mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de dag 
[\[75a.3\]]gis sgrub pa po snang bar byas nas lus 'gyur ro/_/nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char kar sa g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i rol mo'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/lha'i spos chu dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char bar snang las 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig 
[\[75a.4\]]sngags 'chang thams cad 'dus te/_de dag gis dbang bskur nas lha'i rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mthong ba dang /_gang dag gis mthong ba de dag dang lhan cig tu gyen du 'phags so/_/nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan 
[\[75a.5\]]zhing yid mgyogs pa'i shugs 'chang la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci 
[\[75a.6\]]dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong nas gong du 'gyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang dang lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i g.yog 'khor can/_lha'i sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa dag gis 
[\[75a.7\]]mngon par bstod par gyur nas 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po bya ba bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir 'khor lo de la zhon te 'gro zhing /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su mchod pa'i don du skad cig re re la yang me tog thams 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]cad dang /_spos thams cad dang /_phreng ba thams cad dang /_bdug pa thams cad dang /_ras thams cad dang /_gos thams cad dang /_phye ma thams cad dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta dang /_gzhal med khang thams cad dang /_rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong 
[\[75b.2\]]ba thams cad dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_zas dang skom thams cad dang /_lha'i bu mo thams cad dang /_lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang /_lha'i sman gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba thams cad dang /_dus 
[\[75b.3\]]thams cad du lha'i khang bu brtsegs pa rnams 'bul lo/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du ni bza' ba dang /_gos dang rgyan dag gi sprin mngon par sprul pa byed do/_/'dod na mchi'o/_/rgyal ba'i sras mos pas spyod pa gzhal du med pa'i sa thob pa yin no/_/grags pa chen po 
[\[75b.4\]]dang ldan no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bskyed pa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par gzi brjid dam/_stobs sam/_ye shes sam/_bkod pa'am/_rdzu 
[\[75b.5\]]'phrul lam/_'phrul pa'am/_gzugs sam/_dpal lam/_spobs pa de dang mnyam pa'am lhag pa gang yang med do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_'jam dpal 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di ci ltar bkod pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul mngon par grub pa 
[\[75b.6\]]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_bsam pa zad mi shes pas re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di ci tsam du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/'jam dpal gang dag rdzu 'phrul 
[\[75b.7\]]chen po rtag tu rjes su dran pa de dag kyang yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]gros de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ci skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po ni yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad nye bar 
[\[76a.2\]]'tsho yangs chen po 'di ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa chen po ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po 'di ni lo tog 
[\[76a.3\]]thams cad skyed do/_/sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po yang thos pa dang /_bsams pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_bzlas brjod byed pa dang /_bsgrubs 
[\[76a.4\]]pas kyang rnam pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do/_/klu bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[76a.5\]]pa nyid do/_/bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do/_/bdud bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do/_/las bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do zhes gang dag yang dag par smra bas smras pa de dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/_/de 
[\[76a.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de dag thams cad ni 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig rten pa'am 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan kha cig/_bsam gtan bsgrub pa'am/_bdud dam/_'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug 
[\[76a.7\]]gam/_klu'am sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan par gyur pa rnams kyang /_bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyang ston to/_/zhi ba'i blo 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di/_ji ltar gsang sngags thams cad kyi bdag po dang /_gtso bo dang /_mnga' mdzad pa dang /_'di las gzhan pa'i go 'phang mchog gzhan la med par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[76b.2\]]'khor lo la ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa gdengs pa dang /_mdung thung dang /_lcags kyu dang /_dgra sta dang /_mtshon rtse gcig dang /_thong gshol dang /_zhags pa dang /_ka na ya dang /_lcags mda' dang /_
[\[76b.3\]]lcags thag dang /_gzhu dang /_be con dang /_mdung dang /_gtun shing rked nyag dang /_dbyug to rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par bya'o/_/lig bu mig dang /_gi wang dang /_ldong ros la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bsgrub par bya ste/_de dag gi dngos grub kyang 
[\[76b.4\]]de bzhin du rnam pa gsum mo/_/ci ste ril bu bsgrub par 'dod na bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sngags lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas ldong ros dang /_lig bu mig dang /_/a dam gup+ta'i rtsa ba dang /_an+d+ha puSh+pi ka'i rtsa ba rnams cha 
[\[76b.5\]]mnyam ste gcig tu bsres la ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu'i tshad tsam du byas te lcags rnam pa gsum gyis bskor la/_'khor lo lag na thogs sam/_ral gri lag na thogs shing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam sku gzugs kyi mdun du zas mi bza' 
[\[76b.6\]]bar de khar bcug la nub ka dmar thag chad nas bzung ste 'khor lo dang ral gri las sngon po'am/_ser por snang ba'i 'od zer byung ba'i bar du bzlas brjod byas na sgrub pa po snang bar byed cing grub par 'gyur te/_nyi ma shar ba'i mdog can dang /_rlung ltar 'gro ba 
[\[76b.7\]]dang /_bskal par gnas pa dang /_mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_'dod pa'i gzugs can du gyur pa de shi 'phos nas kyang rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ri mo'i sku gzugs dang /_sku gzugs med par bgyi na bsgrubs kyang dngos grub 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]sbyin par mdzad do/_/ci ste ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs kyi bu mo gzugs bzang ba yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa gso sbyong gzung ba zhig la rin la ma brtsegs par nyos pa'i shing bal 'khal du bcug la/_tshes 
[\[77a.2\]]grangs dang /_byed pa dang /_yud tsam bzang po la yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i tha ga pa 'thag tu bcug ste/_ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la sbos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do/_/skra med pa dang mnyam pa 
[\[77a.3\]]dang 'jam par bya'o/_/tha ga pa'i thags cha rnams kyang ba'i sna lnga dang spos chus bkru'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros thams cad kyang rdo rje drag po'i snying pos lus bsrung bar bya'o/_/ri mo mkhan gso sbyong gzung ba dang /_mkhas pa dang /_dad pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa/_ser 
[\[77a.4\]]sna med pa yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhig_/sa phyogs dben zhing dugs med pa/_gtsang ma me tog bkram par a ga ru'i bdug pa bsreg cing /_tshon rtsi sar pa sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug go/_/zhi ba'i blo gros yang na sgrub pa po bdag 
[\[77a.5\]]nyid kyis bri bar bya'o/_/gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng zhing sil snyan dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sgra mang po dang /_shis pa rgya chen po dang /_bkra shis pa brjod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros sgrub pa po byams pa'i sems 
[\[77a.6\]]dang ldan pa thod ze'u ka bcings pa sngags bgrang nor bu 'phyang ba dang bcas par ri mo mkhan gyi rgyab na 'dug cing /_bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gzugs dang kha dog bsam par bya'o/_/phyag rgya dang yi ge rnams kyang bsam zhing bcom ldan 'das 
[\[77a.7\]]'khor los sgyur ba chen po bri bar bya ste/_pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs pa gser gyi kha dog gi mdog can me lce 'bar ba lang long du gyur pa/_thor tshugs can dar ram ras kyi sham thabs mnabs pa/_na bza' bla gos dar la mnabs pa/_ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]zhugs pa/_zhal yid tsam 'dzum pa/_mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa bri'o/_/de'i g.yas rol du dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje gur gum gyi mdog can phud pu lnga pa/_rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ut+pal sngon po lag pa g.yon pa na thogs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par 
[\[77b.2\]]brgyan pa/_dar ram ras kyi smad g.yogs bgos pa/_bla gos dar la gyon pa/_me lce 'bar ba dang bcas pa pad+ma dkar po la 'dug pa bzhin 'dzum pa bri'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i g.yon rol du ha cang yang mi ring bar de'i zhal du blta bar 
[\[77b.3\]]brtson pa byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa cod pan thogs shing cod pan 'gul ba/_gos tshig gu gyon pa pus mo btsugs pa/_rdo rje dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyor ba bka' nod pa bri'o/_/de'i mdun du snga ma bzhin du lan sa ya 
[\[77b.4\]]bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de lag na ral gri'am lag na 'khor lo thogs shing mtshan thog thag a ga ru'i yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pas sbyin sreg byas na nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar nges par ri mo'i gzugs las 'od zer dag byung ste/_
[\[77b.5\]]de dag gis snang bar byas nas grub par 'gyur te/_snga ma bzhin du gar dga' ba der 'gro'o/_/ri mo'i gzugs de mthong ba tsam gyis kyang sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/ri mo mthong ba'i mthu yis ni/_/mtshams med lnga la sogs pa'i las/_/
[\[77b.6\]]sdig pa sngon chad gang byas pa/_/de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_/'khor los sgyur ba gzi bo che/_/mgon po dran par 'dod pa bzhin/_/'jig rten kun gyi don bsgrub pa'i/_/'phrin las mdzad pa smos ci dgos/_/sngags pas ri mo'i gzugs mdun du/_/
[\[77b.7\]]pad+ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na/_/'dod bzhin dngos grub mchog sbyin pa/_/dpal ni mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur/_/sngags pas gang yang rung bar ni/_/zad mi shes pa'i gter mthong zhing /_/nam mkha' la yang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bsam pa bzhin du 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]'dod pa rnyed/_/gi wang dang ni ldong ros dang /_/lig bu mig kyang de bzhin no/_/kha zas mi bza' gtsang byas la/_/mkhas pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/_/sngar bsnyen bya ba med par yang /_/sngags pas 'grub 'gyur the tsom med/_/'jig 
[\[78a.2\]]rten gsum na mi snang zhing /_/skye bo kun gyis thub mi 'gyur/_/ri dang nags tshal bcas pa yis/_/sa rnams kun du rnam par rgyu/_/bskal par gnas shing gzi brjid che/_/rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang drag po chen po lag na 
[\[78a.3\]]rdo rje'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_rang gi yul na gnas shing gtsang bar byas la byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid du byas te/_ri'i rtse mor song la slong mo'i zas bza' zhing gos lan gsum brjes la dus gsum du khrus bya zhing byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams 
[\[78a.4\]]te/_gus shing de dang mthun pa'i cha byad du byas la mi smra bar sa ya gcig 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu ral gri'am/_'khor lo'am/_be con nam/_zhags pa'am/_dgra sta'am/_gtun shing rked nyag gam/_tho ba'am/_mdung thung blangs la/_
[\[78a.5\]]ba'i rnam lngas bkrus shing spos chus kyang bkrus la shubs dang bcas par lag na thogs te/_'greng ngam 'dug kyang rung 'gro yang rung zla ba gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/_/nyal na yang 'khor los sgyur ba chen pos bsrung bar bya'o/_/de nas zla ba phyi ma la tshes nas brtsams 
[\[78a.6\]]te nya'i bar du bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod de/_/ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la ri'i rtse mo de nyid du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du/_bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad 
[\[78a.7\]]kyi sku gzugs gzhag la mchod pa byas te/_phyogs gcig tu bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o/_/de la shar phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po yan lag bkras byin gzhag go/_/lho phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde gzhag go_/nub 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog ldan gzhag go/_/byang phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po kI li ki la gzhag go/_/grwa bzhir ni tshon sna bzhi pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa me lce 'bar ba dang bcas pa gzhag go/_/dbus su ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba 
[\[78b.2\]]dang bcas pa bris la snying po steng du gang bsgrub pa de bri'o/_/de'i steng du rdzas gang bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du gzhag go/_/pad+ma nas khru gang tsam gyi sa gzhi bor la/_rdo rje rgya gram bris te der 'dug la bsrung bar bya ste 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas 
[\[78b.3\]]brjod bya'o/_/'bar nas g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/yang na me tog gi char 'bab bo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros yang na snang ba chen pos sgrub pa po snang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na me tog gi phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te/_/mchod yon 
[\[78b.4\]]byin la blangs na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang /_yid ltar mgyogs pa dang /_khams gzhan du mar rgyu ba dang /_mchod pa byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang /_dbang phyug 
[\[78b.5\]]thams cad kyi gnas thob pa dang 'dod na mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/bdag 'chi ba shes par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje bdag nyid ston par byed do/_/shi 'phos nas kyang lcang lo can du lag na rdo rje'i khyim 
[\[78b.6\]]du gzhon nu'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i chu 'thungs na nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/gi wang la lan cig bsngags te mig la bskus na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/so shing la 
[\[78b.7\]]sngags lan cig btab ste 'chos na 'dod pa'i zas rnyed do/_/chu'i nang du me tog kha dog ci 'dra ba bor ba de 'dra ba'i gos rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kha la sngags kyis btab na gang dang smra ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la hUM zhes bya bas dug sel to/_/
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]khros pa dang bcas pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs na bag 'khums par 'gyur ro/_/gdon gyis zin pa la rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la hUM zhes bya bas bsdigs shing raM zhes bya bas 'bar bar byas pa tsam gyis 'bros te the tsom med do/_/gdon gyis zin pa la lag 
[\[79a.2\]]mthil la ha zhes bya ba bsams la byabs na sos par 'gyur ro/_/me tog gam/_spos sam/_bdug pa la sngags kyis btab ste su la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gdon drag po thams cad kyang cho ga 'di nyid kyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/sngags pa dul ba'i sems dang ldan 
[\[79a.3\]]pa slong mo'i zas bza' zhing bsrung ba byas la/_klu'i rgya mtshor lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/_klu 'byung ste gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed do/_/skud pa sngon po la sngags kyis btab ste rims kyis btab pa'i mgul par bcings na de'i mod la rims las thar bar 
[\[79a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/mig na ba la shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug ma blangs la lan cig sngags kyis btab ste/_/zangs kyi snod la brud de mig la bskus na de'i mod la sos par 'gyur ro/_/klad nad thams cad la ni gu gul la sngags kyis btab ste lus thams cad g.yogs la mgor gtugs 
[\[79a.5\]]na klad nad med par 'gyur ro/_/zas ma zhu bar gyur na chu la sngags kyis btab pa'i khyor chu lan bdun 'thungs na sos par 'gyur ro/_/lto na ba la ni skud pa dmar po ldum bur t+na su tsi'i rtsa ba dang bcas pa la sngags kyis btab ste rked par bcings na lto ba'i nad sos par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[79a.6\]]zhi ba'i blo gros nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa gdon thams cad sel ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal bo 'di brjod par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_'jam dpal ci las 'di dag grub pa yin par bstan nam/_'on te ma grub pa yang yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis 
[\[79a.7\]]smras pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni rtag tu grub pa yin te/_zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba ma gtogs par sngar spyad pa bya mi dgos/_sngar bsnyen par bya mi dgos par tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rang 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]gi lha'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa la bye brag tu brjod pa'i bsgrub pa rnams bstan to/_/shing arga dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /_ki ri ka ra ni ka dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /_ka ra bI ra dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /_u shi ra dang /_ba la ka dang /_tsan+dan 
[\[79b.2\]]dang /_na le sham dang /_ni rgun ti dang /_gu gul dang mar du bsres pa'i bdug pas ni gdon thams cad phung bar byed do/_/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/_/dpal dang ldan pa dang /_tshe dang skal ba bzang por byed pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 
[\[79b.3\]]na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab las bram ze blo gros ldan zhes bya ba rig byed rnams la rig byed kyi don la mkhas pa/_bzo dang sgyu rtsal thams cad mngon par shes pa/_gsang sngags kyi don la mkhas pa zhig byung ste/_de ri zhig 
[\[79b.4\]]gi rtse mo la brtson 'grus brtsams nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje drag po chen po 'di bsgrubs bsgrubs pa las/_bgegs dang log 'dren ma rungs pa dag gis gtses pa dang /_de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[79b.5\]]rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze blo gros ldan gyis/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de'i 
[\[79b.6\]]tshul smos te gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di na ri che ge mo zhes bgyi ba'i rtse mo la brtson 'grus brtsams nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje drag po de bsgrubs bsgrubs na/_yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de'i dngos grub ma rnyed ma thob ma dmigs na rdzas su cung zad cig bsgrubs 
[\[79b.7\]]na/_de thams cad kyang bgegs rnams kyis phrogs na/_de la bdag gis ci ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis/_bram ze blo gros ldan la bdug spos 'di bka' 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]stsal cing gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang gsungs so/_/s+yA d+ya the daM/_ru ru le le/_bud+d+ha ma taM gi_/puk+ka si/_sha ba ri ka_/gr-ih+Na khA da ya swA hA/_zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na rig pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub pa'i bram ze blo gros ldan zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan 
[\[80a.2\]]zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs sam yid gnyis za na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros rdo rje 'chang spros pa med par gnas pa zhes bya ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyams 'di nyid du 'dus pa yin te/_spros pa rab 'byam rgya chen po mtha' yas pa la 
[\[80a.3\]]mkhas pa des gsang sngags 'di dang bdug pa yang da rnyed de bsgrubs so/_/ci ste ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na/_snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas/_tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma 'dres pa dag gis ras la lag na rdo rje ut+pa la'i 'dab ma'i mdog lta bu 'am pri yang 
[\[80a.4\]]ku'i kha dog lta bu'i sngo bsangs sam/_margad kyi kha dog lta bu'i sngo bsangs su bri bar bya ste/_bzur te phyed snang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhin cung zad khros pa dang bcas pa gos tshig gu gyon pa/_rin po che'i brag la rin po che'i phug na tshul bzhin du shis shing 
[\[80a.5\]]skyil mo krung phyed bcas te 'dug pa/_bsgyings pa dang bcas pa bsnyems pa dang bcas pa/_me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/_lag pa g.yas pa na rdo rje 'bar ba dang bcas pa gsor ba bri bar bya'o/_/de'i mgo bo'i g.yas rol gyi steng du ha cang yang mi ring bar/_de 
[\[80a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim snang dpal pad+ma dkar po la skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/_mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa rig pa'i rgyal po dbugs 'byin par mdzad par bri'o/_/g.yon rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sra bas rab tu 'joms pa dbugs 'byin pa snga ma 
[\[80a.7\]]bzhin no/_/lag na rdo rje'i 'og g.yas rol du phyag brnyan sog ma'i du ba'i mdog lta bu'i gos dri ma can gyon pa/_skra kham pa gyen du 'greng ba/_mig dmar ba/_dpral ba khro gnyer gyi rim pa dang bcas pa/_lag na zhags pa dang ral gri thogs pa/_bka' nod 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]pa lhur len pa pus mo gnyis btsugs pa bri'o/_/g.yon rol du phyag brnyan ma pus mo btsugs pa mdog sngo ba sangs ral gri so gcig pa yu ba can dang /_zhags pa lag na thogs pa snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/dben pa dugs med pa de'i mdun du zas dkar gsum bza' 
[\[80b.2\]]zhing gos dus gsum du brjes la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de a ga ru'i yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi la smyugs pas mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg byas na/_nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar ri mo'i gzugs las 'od zer dag 'byung ngo /_/yang na ri 
[\[80b.3\]]mo'i gzugs 'gul lo/_/yang na me tog gi phreng ba 'gul lo/_/snga ma bzhin du grub par 'gyur te/_las thams cad kyang byed do/_/rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na skal ba bzang po'i mchog dang ldan zhing nad thams cad las thar 
[\[80b.4\]]ba dang /_'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang 'jig pa'i me'i snying po chen po stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am 
[\[80b.5\]]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_lha dang /_lha ma yin pas mchod pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi dgos/_smyung ba yang mi dgos par ri'i rtse mor song la lan sum 'bum 
[\[80b.6\]]bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ske tshe'i 'bru'i sreg blugs dug dang /_khrag dang /_lan tshwa dang bsres pa lan sum 'bum sbyin sreg byas na/_mtshan mo hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po grag cing snga ma bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te/_grub nas kyang 'jig rten 
[\[80b.7\]]gyi khams du mar rgyu ba dang /_yid ltar mgyogs pa dang /_gzi brjid mtshungs pa med par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par de las lhag par su yang med do/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na/_'byung po thams cad kyis mi thub par 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi khung gi sgor song nas khros te lan khri bzlas brjod byas shing sbyin sreg kyang snga ma bzhin du byas na/_lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad gtan med par 'gyur te/_ci 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su spyod cing 'dod pa bzhin du rang 'byung bar 
[\[81a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/las thams cad byed do/_/ci ste gter chen po 'byung bar 'dod na zas mi bza' bar snying po 'di lan khri bzlas brjod byas la tha mar shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas lan gsum bsnun na rang 'byung ngo /_/rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na skye bo thams cad dga' bar byed do/_/
[\[81a.3\]]khros pa'i mdun du phyag rgya bcings la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na dang bar 'gyur ro/_/byis pa gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gdon chen po thams cad la ni gzugs byas la rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas 
[\[81a.4\]]brjod byas na gdon de tshig cing sgra 'byin cing 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/dris pa myur du smra bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste pha rol la gnod pa byed par 'dod na ba ru ra'i shing bu sor drug pa dag gcig la ming nas brjod cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags la/_nam phyed na khang steng ngam sgo'i 
[\[81a.5\]]nang du btsugs na khyim du gnod pa chen po 'byung ngo /_/yams kyi nad chen po yang 'byung ngo /_/yid kyis ni zhi bar byed do/_/ci ste ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub na ras la bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje 'od kyi kha dog dbyar gyi sprin 'dra ba/_rgyan med pa/_mig dmar ba/_khros pa/_
[\[81a.6\]]ma mchu sos mnan pa/_dpral ba khro gnyer gyi rim pa 'chas pa/_rkang pa g.yon pas sa mnan te 'dug pa/_rkang pa g.yas pa'i rdog pas bsnun pa ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs pa ltar byed pa/_lag pa g.yas pa khro bo'i rdo rje mi bzad pa 'phen pa 
[\[81a.7\]]ltar 'dug pa bri bar bya ste/_bsrung ba byas pa/_rdo rje gtsug tor gyi gzugs su bsgyur ba/_rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid du gyur pas sa phyogs dben pa dugs med par mchod pa rgya cher byas la ri mo mkhan gso 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]sbyong bzung ba 'drir gzhug go/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba dam tshig thob pa/_spro ba dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug gi_/gzhan ni gang gis kyang ma yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros dam tshig mi shes pa dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba gang la la zhig gis ri mo'i 
[\[81b.2\]]gzugs mthong na/_de'i mod la de nad rnam pa gnyis kyis btab par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_rims drag po dang gcong chen por 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_'jam dpal kye ma gang gis yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bu bstan pa'i 
[\[81b.3\]]snying po mchog don chen po dang ldan pa/_mthu chen po dang ldan pa 'di ngo mtshar to/_/'jam dpal gyi snying po mchog 'di ni/_gang zhig 'di'i ming ci zhes bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sra ba'i yon 
[\[81b.4\]]tan rnams dang mthu la ni mtha' med do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros lag na rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'i me las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ste/_ma dul ba thams cad 'dul ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[81b.5\]]thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_bstan pa mchog tu kun du bsrung bar smon lam btab pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas rgya mtsho rab 'byam 
[\[81b.6\]]rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam sgrogs pa'i sgo la 'jug pa/_thams cad du sngon du rgyug pa'o/_/de'i mdun du ci 'byor pas mchod de gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam 'bum sbyin sreg byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/_gang 'dod pa 
[\[81b.7\]]de byed do/_/ri'i rtse mo'am rgya mtsho'i ngogs su song ste/_ri mo'i gzugs bris la slong mo'i zas sam/_bslangs pa ma yin pa'i zas bza' zhing /_mid pa nub pa tsam du chur zhugs la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod la 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]ral gri'am 'khor lo lag na thogs shing /_dug dang /_khrag dang /_yungs kar bsres pas lan sum khri sbyin sreg byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho las sgra 'byung zhing bskams par 'gyur ro/_/ri'ang 'gul ba'am 'grum par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[82a.2\]]las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/_/rdzi char ram/_lce 'bab pa la yang lan cig bsdigs pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur ro/_/'ching ba thams cad dang nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_gnod pa 'byung ba thams cad la lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/_shing drung gcig 
[\[82a.3\]]yod pa'am/_'bab chu'i ngos sam/_mtshan ma gcig yod pa 'am/_grong khyer gyi sum mdor ri mo'i gzugs bris la/_rgya cher mchod la spos dang me tog gis mchod pa'i bum pa yungs kar gyis bkang la/_'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags bzlas brjod byas 
[\[82a.4\]]te snying po snying gar gzhag la ri mo'i gzugs de la shis pa snyan pa rgya chen po brjod pas mngon sum du dga' bar bya ste/_dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/yungs kar de dag gis ni gnod pa thams cad dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_'chi ba thams cad sel to/_/
[\[82a.5\]]sems can dpag tshad tsam na 'dug pa thams cad kyis ri mo'i gzugs de mthong na yang de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/_bam po bdun pa/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems 
[\[82a.6\]]dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag gi spyi'i bsgrub pa'i rim par phye ba nyon cig/_zhi ba'i blo gros de la sgrub pa po rig pa'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba bsgrub par 'dod pas rig sngags gdon par bya ste/_tshes grangs dang /_
[\[82a.7\]]byed pa dang /_yud tsam bzang po la smyung ba byas la/_mar gyi mar me bus te ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la/_ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam sku gzugs kyi mdun du rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs med mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o/_/nang par khrus byas 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]la dri zhim pos bskus te gos gtsang ma bgos la zas dkar gsum zos la dbang po gsal ba dang /_nyams tha mal bar gnas pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa'i slob dpon bla na med pa'i sbyin gnas la thal mo sbyor te pus mo 
[\[82b.2\]]btsugs la gsol ba btab ste/_slob dpon bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i slad du rig pa'i rgyal po bdag la stsal du gsol/_byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du bgyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/slob dpon gyis kyang thams cad du snying rje ba dang ser sna med 
[\[82b.3\]]par byas la slob ma de la sbyin par bya'o/_/de ltar rig sngags dang dam tshig mnos nas ci skad bstan pa lta bu'i sa phyogs rnams su de dang mthun pa'i cha byad du bsgyur la/_ri'i rtse mo'am/_'bab chu'i ngogs sam/_nags khrod dam/_chu mig gi dngo'am/_yid du 'ong ba 
[\[82b.4\]]dben pa der/_zas dkar gsum bza' ba'am/_'o ma btung zhing lan sa ya bzlas brjod byas na sngar spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ral gri'am/_rdo rje'am/_mdung thung ngam/_be con nam/_mdung rtse gsum pa'am/_lcags sna gsum gyi 'khor lo
