[\[82b.5\]]blangs la/_ba'i rnam lngas bskus te ba lang gi lci ba'i phung po'i steng du gzhag la rdo rje drag po chen po'i snying pos bsrung bar bya'o/_/de nas zla ba tshes nas bzung ste nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la spos chus bkrus te/_ba lang gi 
[\[82b.6\]]lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la/_snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris te ci 'byor pas mchod la shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du gzhag ste mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/_nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar nges par 'bar zhing rig sngags 'chang thams cad 
[\[82b.7\]]'dus te de dag gi bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur nas rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/_'dod pa'i gzugs 'chang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams du mar rgyu ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste ma grub la brtul 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]zhugs ma nyams na de bzhin du lan gsum du bsgrub pa byas na mtshams med pa lnga byas pas kyang nges par 'grub bo/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/sman la bzlas brjod byas la 'thungs na nad med par 'gyur ro/_/mar la sngags kyis 
[\[83a.2\]]btab ste zan za kar sngar 'thungs na lo khyud 'khor du lus brtan par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs kyi mdun du mig btsums te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs kyis dge ba dang mi dge ba brjod do/_/de bzhin 
[\[83a.3\]]du rna ba bkab ste bzlas brjod byas na yang thams cad thos par 'gyur ro/_/nyal kar mal du zhugs la mig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te nyal na snang ba dang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin ji lta bar mtshan mo yang de bzhin no/_/so shing la lan cig bsngags 
[\[83a.4\]]te 'chos nam bslangs par zas rnyed do/_/lig bu mig dang gi wang la sngags lan cig bsngags te mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/spos la bzlas brjod byas te bskus na gang dag gis dri tshor ba de dag dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dgra mthong na phyag 
[\[83a.5\]]rgyas bcings la lan cig brjod na dgra dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/spos dang me tog la sogs pa la sngags kyis lan cig btab ste gang la byin pa de dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste g.yul ngor 'jug par 'dod na skyes bu bcing bar byas la g.yul ngor zhugs na g.yul 
[\[83a.6\]]rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste dmag rengs par bya bar 'dod na/_be kang+ka ta'i shing gi me phus la gru tshal gyi yam sreg shing gis lan khrir sbyin sreg byas na dmag rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/gnod pa thams cad la mngar gsum gyi sreg blugs lan sum khri sbyin sreg 
[\[83a.7\]]byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/thal bas ni rdzi char gcod do/_/shing bu'am tshon gyis ni lce 'bab pa bzlog go/_/skud pa sngon pos ni 'byung po'i gdon zhi bar byed do/_/gzugs byas pa thal ba'am shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas bsnun na gtong bar 'gyur ro/_gdon chen po 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]la yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/byis pa gdon gyis zin na 'bras sA lu btags pa las gzugs byas la ske tshe'i 'bru dang lan tshwa dang bsres te thub ma'i me bus pa'i nang du sbyin sreg byas na dus thams cad du ming tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/rims kyis 
[\[83b.2\]]btab pa la lag pa g.yon pa la sngags kyis btab ste mgo la gzhag na rims nad sel to/_/nad thams cad bsal bar 'dod na sman thams cad bsogs la ba ru ra'i shing gi me bus te/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sreg blugs sbyin sreg byas na/_de phyin cad thams cad 
[\[83b.3\]]sel bar byed do/_/ci ste ri mo'i gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na ras skra med pa ma dras pa la snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po 'drir gzhug ste/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_cod pan 
[\[83b.4\]]'gul ba thogs pa/_pad+ma dkar po la 'dug pa/_rgyal po chen po'i cha byad 'dzin pa/_me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun nas lang long du gyur pa/_lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/_g.yas pa dam pa sbyin pa/_skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/_zhal cung zad 
[\[83b.5\]]'dzum pa/_sgrub pa po la lta bar bri'o/_/de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa po lag na pog phor thogs shing /_de'i gdong du blta ba la brtson pa/_tshul dang mthun pa'i cha byad can pus mo btsugs pa bri'o/_/de'i mdun du lan sa ya bzlas brjod byas na snga ma bzhin du 'grub 
[\[83b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa'i rgyal po spyir bsgrub pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang lag na rdo rje'i bu mo smon lam chen po la dbang thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa rnams kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_snga ma bzhin du 'khor los sgyur 
[\[83b.7\]]ba chen po'i cho gas gsang sngags gang yang rung ba mnos la ci skad brjod pa'i gnas kyi nang nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu ngogs su song la lan sa ya bzlas brjod byas na sngar spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas zla ba tshes nas bzung ste rdzas gang bsgrub pa de blangs la zla ba nya'i bar 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de ba lang gi lci bas la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la bsrung bar bya ste/_gu gul gyi yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pas mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg byas na/_nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar nges 
[\[84a.2\]]par 'grub par 'gyur te rdzas de 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de blangs na rdo rje rigs su rdo rje gzhon nu'i lus thob bo/_/gzungs chen po 'thob bo/_/'dod na mchi'o/_/ci ste ma grub na yang las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos na yang lcang lo can nam longs spyod chen 
[\[84a.3\]]po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje la blta zhing bzlas brjod byas na sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/lus thams cad la byab pa byas te nyal na/_rmi lam na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[84a.4\]]rnams mthong zhing de nyid du gzungs kyang 'thob bo/_/zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe ba ser mo ma smad spu mthun gyi mar blangs la zangs kyi snod du bcug ste/_tsan+dan gyi dkyil 'khor byas la der gzhag ste/_zla ba la mi blta bar dngos grub rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod 
[\[84a.5\]]byas la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'bar na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/du ba 'thul na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dro bar gyur na 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ci ste ri mo'i gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na cho ga snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan byang 
[\[84a.6\]]chub tu sems bskyed pas sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rnams kyis skra med pa'i ras la gzhon nu gang yang rung ba zhig 'drir gzhug ste/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_phud pu gsum gyis mgo brgyan pa/_pad+ma dkar po la 'dug pa/_ral gri 'od 'bar ba'i 
[\[84a.7\]]dbus na 'dug pa/_lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa/_lag pa g.yas pas sgrub pa po la dbugs 'byin pa/_gser gyi kha dog lta bu'am/_pri yang ku'i kha dog lta bu'i sngo bsangs pa bri'o/_/de'i mdun du mchod pa chen po byas te bsgrub 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]pa brtsams na snga ma bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i bu nad ku be ra lag na rdo rje dga' ba'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi dgos/_smyung ba bya mi dgos par lag na be con thogs shing 
[\[84b.2\]]dgon pa chen por zhugs la/_lam mi bzur mi smra bar lus la glang po che'i pags pa bgos la/_de dang mthun pa'i cha byad du bsgyur te lag na rdo rje drag po'i snying po'am 'khor los sgyur ba chen pos bsrung ba byas la/_slong mo'i zas bza' ba'am zas mi bza' bar 
[\[84b.3\]]lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/_na da ku be ra nyid 'ong zhing dam pa stobs te/_dam pa gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do/_/klu'i mtshor zhugs la lan khri bzlas brjod byas na klu byung ste gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do/_/lha ma yin gyi khung sgor lan 'bum bzlas brjod 
[\[84b.4\]]byas na/_lha ma yin gyi bu mo nyid byung nas 'jug par byed de/_sman bcud kyis len la sogs pa gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do/_/ci ste mi 'dod na de nyid du de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dug cing dbang phyug thams cad kyi bde ba thob pa dang bskal par gnas par 'gyur te/_lus de nyid 
[\[84b.5\]]kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mthong ba dang chos kyang thos par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na mthong ba tsam gyis srin po dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang sha za'i gdon la sogs 
[\[84b.6\]]pa thams cad ring ba bas kyang ches ring bar 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros mdor na ji ltar bsgrubs kyang rung /_cho ga zhib mo gzhan nas 'byung bas bsgrubs kyang rung ste nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i bsgrub pa 
[\[84b.7\]]yin te/_mtshan gcig yod pa'am dur khrod du thal bas lus bskus te/_lag na mdung rtse gsum pa'am/_rdo rje thogs la slong mo'i zas bza' zhing yul rgyu ba dang /_gnas med par rgyu ba dang /_gtsang ba dang /_bzod pa dang /_nang gtsang bar mngon par dga' 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]ba dang /_ser sna med pa dang /_lus dang srog la mi blta bar byas la/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dbang po'i pags pa'i sham thabs bgos te/_snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas mtshan gcig yod pa'am/_dur khrod dam/_yang na shing 
[\[85a.2\]]drung gcig yod par sngags pas bsgrub pa'i phyir song la/_zla ba nya la snga ma bzhin/_/khang pa'i nang gi rnam dag par/_/mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas brjod bya/_/nam phyed dam ni nyi shar kar/_/rdzas des gzhon nu yongs 'gyur zhing /_/'od ni me lce 'bar phreng 'dra/_/
[\[85a.3\]]grub na nam mkha' spyod yul 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor che la skal bar gnas/_/'jig rten kun du rnam par rgyu/_/mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gsang sngags grub pa dang 'dra ba ni 'jig rten gsum po dag na su yang med do/_/ma bsgrubs kyang las 
[\[85a.4\]]rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/_phyag rgya bcings te gdon thams cad la bltas na de'i mod la gdon gyis gtong ngo /_/rims kyis btab pa la bltas na rims las sos par 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa thams cad du rang gi cho ga zhi ba mo'i cho ga'am/_gzhan gyi cho ga zhi ba mo'i cho 
[\[85a.5\]]ga'am gang yang rung bas byas kyang nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang lag na rdo rje dga' ba khro bo zla ba'i thig le'i bsgrub pa 'di yin te/_ri'i rtse mo'am rgya mtsho chen por mid pa nub tsam du chur zhugs la/_bslangs pa ma yin pa'i kha zas bza' zhing shing 
[\[85a.6\]]ltar mi smra bar byas la/_stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos la/_lam mi bzur bar 'khor lo'am/_ral gri'am/_mdung rtse gsum pa'am/_rtse gsum gdengs pa lag na thogs la/_yi ge 'bru grangs bzhin du lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor 
[\[85a.7\]]pas mchod de zla ba nya la thod ze'u ka bcings shing bsrung ba byas te/_mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/_nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar nges par 'grub ste/_nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gzi brjid mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/_grub pa thams cad kyang de las 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]ring du 'byor par 'gyur/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_sha za la sogs pas kyang de la zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro/_/mkha' 'gro mas rgyas btab na rgya'i gzugs kham phor kha sbyor gyi nang du bris te sngags kyis btab ste nad pa la bstan na rgya bshig pa byas par 'gyur 
[\[85b.2\]]ro/_/tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon gyis zin na dur khrod kyi sol bas gzugs sam ming bris la shing sha la ta ka'i lcug mas gzhu'o/_/yang na ba lang gi rnga ma'i srad bu hUM zhes bya ba dang bcas pas bsdigs na de'i mod la sgra cher ngus te 'bros so/_/gang dris pa de smra'o/_/gang yang rung ba'i 
[\[85b.3\]]cho gas sbyor ba byas kyang de lta bur grub par gyur te/_gzhan gyi cho ga zhi ba mo'i tshogs byas kyang gdon mi za bar 'grub bo/_/lan cig bzlas brjod byas kyang rung /_bzlas brjod ma byas kyang rung ste rjes su dran pa nyid kyis 'grub bo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[85b.4\]]pa thams cad kyi stobs las byung ba/_stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa/_lag na rdo rje'i rigs su skyes pa stobs po che'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi dgos so/_/smyung ba bya mi dgos la sbags kyang rung /_/sbags pa ma yin pa yang rung /_
[\[85b.5\]]khrus byas kyang rung /_khrus ma byas kyang rung /_mi thod kyi phreng ba thogs shing /_khri'i zur shing thogs pa dur khrod na gnas pa thal bas lus bskus la gang du yang rung bar snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar de nyid du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor 
[\[85b.6\]]bskus la bsrung ba byas te/_rdzas gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de thogs nas thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis 'di'i 
[\[85b.7\]]stobs la zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams dang /_spyod pa thob pa'i rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams ma gtogs par 'di dang mtshungs pa su yang med do/_/rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]gdon thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad dang 'jigs pa thams cad du yang dran pa nyid kyis thams cad zhi bar byed do/_/lha ma yin gyi khung du 'jug par 'dod pas shing sha me'i be con thogs la/_lha ma yin gyi khung sgor lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar 
[\[86a.2\]]ci 'byor pas mchod la dug dang khrag dang ske tshe'i 'bru bsres la/_lan khri sbyin sreg byas na lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad du bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/be con de la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/_sgo de la bsnun na lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'byung ste/_de dag 
[\[86a.3\]]gis sgrub pa po de rang gi khyim dag tu 'jug par byed do/_/sman bcud kyis len la sogs pa thams cad kyang sbyin par byed do/_/gang 'dod pa de byed de gzhan gyi cho ga zhib mo'i cho gas kyang 'grub bo/_/khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ste/_bzlas brjod byas pa 
[\[86a.4\]]tsam gyis thams cad byed do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang phyag brnyan thams cad spyi'i bsgrub pa 'di yin te/_mtshan mo zas za ba/_gos dri ma can gyon pa/_nga rgyal bcag pa/_brnyas par gyur pa/_smyon pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/_bgad pa dang /_gar bya ba dang /_
[\[86a.5\]]sil snyan rnams la mkhas pas khang stong ngam/_shing drung gcig yod par 'gro yang rung /_'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_nyal yang rung /_glu len yang rung /_gar byed kyang rung snying po 'di dag lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma 
[\[86a.6\]]lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la me tog bkram ste ci 'byor pas mchod do/_/lcags ur mo las ral gri bya rogs so byas pa dang /_mi'i skra'i zhags pa khru bcu gnyis pa'am/_khru gsum pa'am/_khru gang pa thogs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nam phyed dam nyi ma 
[\[86a.7\]]shar kar nges par 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de thogs na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/_'dod pa'i gzugs 'chang bar 'gyur te 'jig rten gsum po yang bcings nas khrid de 'ongs na sems can phal 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]pa rnams lta ci smos/_/rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/_bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur/_shi 'phos nas kyang lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang phyag brnyan ma lag na rdo rje'i 
[\[86b.2\]]rigs su skyes pa rnams kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_/gcig pu gnyis su med par khang stong ngam/_gnas khang ngam/_phug dben pa'am/_lhugs med par phyag brnyan ma gang yang rung ba zhig lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de/_
[\[86b.3\]]gri bya rog gi so lta bu'i yu ba can dang /_zhags pa lag na thogs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar 'grub par 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang /_'dod pa'i gzugs 
[\[86b.4\]]'chang bar 'gyur ro/_/lan tshwa las gzugs byas la spos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pas mchod de/_gnas dben pa lhugs ma med par gzhag la gcig pu mtshan thog thag lag pas brang du bsnun cing bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin du nges par 'grub ste gang 'dod 
[\[86b.5\]]pa'i dam pa de sbyin par byed do/_/tsher ma a pa mar ga'i so shing la lan cig sngags kyis btab ste 'chos nam bslangs par zas rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/mdor na cho ga gang dang gang gis bsgrub pa de dang de nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ste 'dod 
[\[86b.6\]]pa tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang pho nya thams cad kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_slong mo'i zas bza' zhing rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la/_lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod la de bzhin 
[\[86b.7\]]du shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog mar la smyugs pa lan khri sbyin sreg byas na grub par 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de byed do/_/gzhan yang bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_mar sar las gzugs byas la spos dang me tog gis mchod de/_zla ba nya la tsan+dan gyis dkyil 'khor bskus te/_zla 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]ba la mi blta bar 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas la de blangs na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro/_/ci ste du ba 'thul ba 'thungs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/dro 
[\[87a.2\]]bar gyur te 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/_thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu skal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang lha'i nang 
[\[87a.3\]]ngam lcang lo can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros rang bzhin gyis grub pa dag ste/_'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa bklags pas 'grub bo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang pho nya mo 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don byed pa rnams kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa 'di yin te/_grog mkhar gyi 
[\[87a.4\]]sa'am ngogs gnyis ka'i sa las gzugs byas la/_skyed mos tshal dben pa lhugs med pa ci 'byor pas mchod de rig pa lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar zla ba nya la gtor ma rgya cher byas la lig bu mig gam gi wang ngam ldong ros spos chus bskus te/_de'i 
[\[87a.5\]]lag tu gzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/'bar na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro/_/du ba 'thul na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dro bar gyur na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su rnam par rgyu ba dang /_nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can/_rlung ltar rgyu 
[\[87a.6\]]ba dang /_sems can gyi don byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/ma bsgrubs par yang las su 'gyur ro/_/gi wang la lan cig sngags kyis btab ste gdong la byugs na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/lig bu mig la sngags kyis btab nas mig la 
[\[87a.7\]]bskus na gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/kha la sngags kyis btab na gang dang smra ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/me tog dang spos la sogs pa la sngags kyis btab la su la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dben par lam du 'dug ste gang dbang du bya bar 'dod pa de'i ming 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]nas brjod de lag pa snying gar bcar la rig pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zhag bdun na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/chu la sngags kyis btab ste gdong bkrus na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/_/lan tshwa'i sreg blugs lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/_skal ba bzang po mchog 
[\[87b.2\]]tu 'gyur ro/_/phyugs chung 'dod na shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog a ga rus bdug pa la sngags lan re btab nas zhag bdun du rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chur bor na nges par rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/ra'i 'o ma la sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na yang de bzhin du rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[87b.3\]]bu 'dod na thang shing gi yam sreg shing ba ser mo'i mar la smyugs pas zhag bdun sbyin sreg byas na bu yod par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na rnam grangs 'dis las stong byed de dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed de dpal yang skyed par byed do/_/rdo rje pho nya mo chen po 'di dag 
[\[87b.4\]]ni bklags pas 'grub bo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba'i bran rnams kyi bsgrub pa nyon cig_/gtsug lag khang ngam/_dgon pa'am/_grong ngam/_grong khyer gar bab bab du nyal ba/_sus bcos kyang nga rgyal bcag pa/_bran 
[\[87b.5\]]gyi gzugs 'dzin pa/_gos dri ma can gyon pa/_sgra shig shig por 'dug pa/_khrus mi byed par dri ma can gyi mdog can gyi snying po gang yang rung ba zhig grong khyer chen po'i sum mdo'am mo'i khyim du lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar de nyid 
[\[87b.6\]]du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus la/_ci 'byor pas mchod de/_lcags sna gsum gyi mchil lham mam lce 'bab pas bcag pa'i shing gi mchil lham blangs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/_nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar nges par 'bar 
[\[87b.7\]]zhing 'grub par 'gyur te/_shing gi mchil lham gyon na gar 'dod pa de nyid du 'gro'o/_/'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin cing rlung ltar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/ma grub kyang las su 'gyur te/_rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rims 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]kyis btab pa la skud pa nag pos bcings na rims las sos par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad la yungs kar ram spos chus byab pa byas na sos par 'gyur ro/_lag na rdo rje'i mdun du til nag po zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bsres pa lan 
[\[88a.2\]]sum khri sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa byed pa yang las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros bran rnams ni gang mi byed pa ci yang med de/_dam tshig rjes su srung bar byed/_bstan pa'i don byed/_bsgrub pa na 
[\[88a.3\]]dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo ston par byed do/_/gzhan gyi cho ga zhib mo'i cho ga'am ci ltar 'byor pa byas kyang nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo 
[\[88a.4\]]gros lag na rdo rje dga' ba'i snying por gyur pa/_gsang ba dang bcas pa'i bran mo rang bzhin gyis grub pa/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_las sna tshogs byed pa/_las gang dag dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ba dag yod de/_
[\[88a.5\]]de dag gi bsgrub pa 'di yin te/_tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi dgos/_smyung ba bya mi dgos par mtshan mo zas za ba bslangs pa ma yin pa za ba de dang mthun pa'i cha byad 'dzin pas ral gri so gcig pa yu ba dang bcas pa lag na thogs pa/_rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 
[\[88a.6\]]chur rked pa nub tsam du zhugs te lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar de nyid du ci 'byor pas mchod de yungs kar dang gur gum bsres pas mtshan thog thag lan sum 'bum sbyin sreg byas na nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar nges par 'grub par 'gyur te/_de thogs pas 
[\[88a.7\]]yid ltar mgyogs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam du mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa chen po byed pa dang /_thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang /_sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa dang /_bsam pa thams cad 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bsgrub pa gzhan yang yod de ri'i rtse mor song la de bzhin du lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de 'o ma'i sreg blugs lan sum 'bum sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa byed pa yang nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[88b.2\]]ri mo'i gzugs dang sku gzugs med par yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba bla mas gnang ba/_ser sna med pa/_dad pa dang ldan pa/_dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba/_spro ba dang ldan pa/_yi dam la brtan pa/_rtag tu 
[\[88b.3\]]mnyam par gzhag pa/_gsang sngags kyi de kho na'i don la mkhas pa/_bla ma la gus ba la grub par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du na ni brgya byin bdag nyid chen pos bsgrubs kyang /_gsang sngags kyi dngos grub sbyin par mi byed de/_yon tan ci skad brjod pa dang ldan pa la 
[\[88b.4\]]nges par 'grub bo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_phyag brnyan dang /_phyag brnyan mo dang /_pho nya dang /_pho nya mo la sogs pa 'di dag gi mi snang bar 
[\[88b.5\]]'gyur ba'i yon tan 'di skad du brjod pa gzhan yod kyis/_legs par rab tu zung shig dang kho bos khyod la bshad do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[88b.6\]]'di ni dus yin/_'di ni tshod yin te 'jam dpal de'i dus la bab par shes na shod cig_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la cho ga snga ma bzhin du sngar spyad pa byas pa'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pas spang ma'am/_ba bla'am/_ldong ros gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la/_zangs 
[\[88b.7\]]kyi ga'ur bcug ste ngad ma shor bar byas la/_zla ba mar gyi ngo la zhag gsum smyung ba byas la lha chen po'i gnas su lha chen po'i g.yas rol gyi lus la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas te du ba 'thul gyi bar du bya'o/_/des lus la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bu btsas 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]pa'i khyim nas thal ba blangs la snyim par bcug ste/_de bzhin du zla ba mar gyi ngo la lha chen po'i glo g.yas rol gyi lus la bzlas brjod bya ste du ba 'thul gyi bar du'o/_/des sum ris byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu bzhi la skar ma rgyal 
[\[89a.2\]]dang gza' zla ba la bab pa'i tshe skyes pa shi ba dur khrod du bsregs pa'i me'i nang du ba ru ra'i shing bcug la tshig pa dang /_rang gi khrag gis bsad de/_de'i sol ba thogs la khang stong dben zhing lhugs med par ba lang gi mkhris pas thig ler byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas 
[\[89a.3\]]na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lig bu mig blangs te cho ga snga ma bzhin du lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ba ser mo'i mar gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bya ste/_de nas zla ba nya la grub kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas la des mig bskus na skye bo thams cad 
[\[89a.4\]]kyis lus mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros yang ldum bu ad+ma gup+ta'i rtsa ba cho ga snga ma bzhin du blangs te lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas la/_zla ba mar gyi ngo la lha rten du mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas te khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/shu dag dkar po'i rtsa ba dang 
[\[89a.5\]]rgya spos kyi rtsa ba la snga ma bzhin du mi snang bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/skar ma rgyal gyi tshe ut+pal sngon po blangs la ra'i 'o ma dang btags te/_zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe zangs kyi snod dam/_shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma kha sbyor ba'i nang du bcug ste zla ba btang gi bar du bzlas 
[\[89a.6\]]brjod byas la de 'thungs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang gur gum dang /_du ru ska dang /_pad+ma'i ze ba ba ser mo ma smad spu mthun pa'i mar dang btags la/_snga ma bzhin du zla ba sbyang gis zin pa'i tshe zla ba btang gi bar du bzlas brjod byas la de 'thungs 
[\[89a.7\]]na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros shing a sa na'i me tog dang shing de ba'i me tog [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]nag po'i khrag dang btags la/_zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe zla ba btang gi bar du bzlas brjod byas la de 'thungs shing lus la yang bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]gros gzhan yang a ga ru nag po blangs la sbrul nag po'i mig dang /_snga ma bzhin du lha chen po'i glo g.yas rol gyi lus la bzlas brjod byas te de du ba 'thul gyi bar du'o/_/des thig ler byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po kha gnyis pas bzung ba la til nag po dang 
[\[89b.2\]]lhan cig btags te/_zla ba mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'bru mar des du ba chags par byas la de la sngags kyis btab ste mig bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang a ru ra'i rus pa'i rkang phyung ste/_sbrang rtsi dang ni lhan cig 
[\[89b.3\]]btags/_/a shwad lo ma 'bar bcug la/_/mkhas pas chu 'dus ga la bar/_/khong pa na nga gi rnam dag par/_/mtshan gcig thog thag brjod byas na/_/nam phyed dus na 'grub 'gyur te/_/de la the tshom yod med do/_/yid gzhungs pas ni thig le byas/_/de tshe lus ni mi snang 'gyur/_/
[\[89b.4\]]lig pu dang ni spang ma dag_/rin la mi brtsegs nyos nas su/_/zangs snod kha sbyor nang bcug la/_/cho ga bzhin du sngags brjod na/_/nam phyed dus su 'grub 'gyur te/_/'di la the tshom yod med do/_/lus la bskus pa byas na yang /_/nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten drug cha 
[\[89b.5\]]phrogs nas su/_/de tshe bsod nams las su 'gyur/_/ril bu bsgrub pa bshad par bya/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de nyon cig_/mtshal dang de bzhin spang ma dang /_/ad+ma gup+ta'i rtsa ba dang /_/kur+ya tshang ma'i mjug ma dag_/mkhas pas gcig tu bsres nas su/_/rgya shug tshig gu tsam byas pa'i/_/
[\[89b.6\]]ril bu blangs la bsgrims nas su/_/sngags pa sngags kyi tshul gnas te/_/sna gsum lcags kyis dkri bar bya/_/dur khrod du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam sku gzugs kyi mdun du ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/_nam phyed dus sam yang na ni/_/nyi ma shar ka'i 
[\[89b.7\]]dus kyi tshe/_/rdzas de gzhan du yongs gyur te/_/me lce 'bar phreng lang long 'gyur/_/sngags pas de yi khar bcug na/_/nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/nyi ma 'char 'dra'i mdog can dang /_/'dod pa'i gzugs can 'jigs med pa/_/'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs shing /_/bskal par gnas la gzi chen 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]'gyur/_/bstan pa'i don byed dpal ldan zhing /_/rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/_/zhi ba'i blo gros ril bu gzhan yang yod de/_bak+kul yi snying blangs la/_/blo ldan dong ka'i me tog dang /_/lig bu mig dang spang ma dang /_/cha shas mnyam par byas nas 
[\[90a.2\]]su/_/sna gsum lcags kyis dkris byas la/_/mtshan gcig yod pa'ang dur khrod dam/_/shing drung gcig pa'am phug rnams su/_/dbyar srungs 'jug tshe bsgrub par bya/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i 
[\[90a.3\]]byang chub sems dpas ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la/_ci 'byor pas mchod de dbus su rdo rje gzhag la/_de'i steng du shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du ril bu gzhag ste/_/rdo rje drag po chen po'i snying po'am/_rdo rje gtsug tor gyis bdag dang rdzas 
[\[90a.4\]]bsrung bar byas la/_ba dmar ser gyi mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa la lan stong rgyun mi 'chad par sbyin sreg byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/_de nas des nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar rdzas de gyur te/_de khar bcug na nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang /_bskal 
[\[90a.5\]]par gnas pa dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba rnam par spangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mar rnam par rgyu ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi don byed par 'gyur ro/_/phyung na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing yid ltar mgyogs pa dang /_shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten 
[\[90a.6\]]gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ril bu gzhan yang yod de/_ba la a ti ba li rtsa/_/de bzhin gser dang dngul dang ni/_/lig bu mig dang shu dag dang /_/de bzhin du ni mthing shun dang /_/de dag cha shas bsnyams nas su/_/phye ma skam por byas 
[\[90a.7\]]pa dag_/char pa'i chu yis sbrus nas su/_/ril bu gsum zhig byas pa la/_/zangs kyi leb mas dkris nas su/_/sngags pas snga ma bzhin du gzhag_/zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe/_/zhag gcig smyung ba byas nas su/_/grub pa de ni khar bcug la/_/
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]rtag tu mi snang gyur pa yin/_/ril bu gzhan yang yod de/_shing til ka'i me tog dang /_byi la nag po'i snying dang /_pha bang gi snying skam po btags la/_char bas sbrus pa'i ril bu yang snga ma bzhin te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ril bu gzhan yang yod de/_shing pa na sa'i sa bon 
[\[90b.2\]]dang /_dzi ban ta'i sa bon dang /_shing a gasta'i me tog dang /_byi ru dang /_stong zil dang /_shing kany+tsa na'i me tog rnams cha bsnyams pa yang snga ma bzhin te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/shel dang /_lhang tsher dang /_shing ba ru Na'i sa bon dang dri san ta'i sa bon rnams cha bsnyams 
[\[90b.3\]]ba yang snga ma bzhin te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ril bu gzhan yang yod de/_dung gi lte ba dang /_a ga ni dza la dang /_ldong ros rnams cha bsnyams pa yang snga ma bzhin te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ril bu gzhan yang yod de/_dug dang /_bong ba dang /_lang+ka li dang /_du 
[\[90b.4\]]ru ska'i rtsa ba dang de dag cha bsnyams pa yang snga ma bzhin du grub par 'gyur ro/_/ril bu gzhan yang yod de/_shing ma du ka'i snying po dang /_shing sA la ser po'i snying po dang /_khab long rnams cha bsnyams pa yang snga ma bzhin te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di 
[\[90b.5\]]dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[90b.6\]]chen po gang la la zhig ril bu 'di dag bsgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu mngon par brtson par byed pa de'i tshe 'di la chos gnyis re bar bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos nyid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[90b.7\]]thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang chos gnyis te tshe 'di la dngos grub la nges par gzhol bar gyur pa dang /_shi 'phos nas kyang rdo rje'i rigs su gzhon nu'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang gnyis te 'di lta ste/_nad thams cad las 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]thar bar 'gyur ba dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi spyod yul la brtson pa dang /_yid 
[\[91a.2\]]gnyis dang /_the tsom dang bral ba dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang /_byams pa dang ldan pa dang /_snying rje can dang byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid du bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[91a.3\]]pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_/ji ltar brtul zhugs la gnas pa yin/_ji ltar spyad pa spyod pa yin/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[91a.4\]]spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang du gnas pa de yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /_gsang sngags rnams la dngos grub thob pa dang /_theg pa chen po las yongs su mi nyams par 'gyur/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal 
[\[91a.5\]]gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros legs so legs so legs so yang legs so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros khyod de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_kho bos khyod la bshad do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi tshe byang 
[\[91a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod la bdag nyid rang gi lha'i gzugs su byas la the tshom med pa'i yid kyis/_nga rgyal bskyed cing 'gro yang rung /_'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_nyal yang rung /_rtag tu dus thams cad du bskyod kyang mi g.yo ba de'i tshe/_zhi 
[\[91a.7\]]ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe des ltas bstan pa de'i tshul dang mthun par bya ba byed pa dang /_de'i rnam pa bsten pa dang /_rnal 'byor la 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]brtson pa de'i tshe brtul zhugs la gnas pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe brtul zhugs de la bzlas brjod dang /_sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i las spyod pa de'i tshe spyad pa spyod pa yin no/_/lha'i gzugs de dang tha mi dad pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson zhing gang gi tshe bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang yongs su bzung 
[\[91b.2\]]ste/_theg pa chen po la spyod pa de'i tshe gsang sngags rnams la dngos grub 'thob bo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu mtshan ma med pa la gnas par bya'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub 
[\[91b.3\]]sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa la ci ltar mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa yin zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub kyi sems bsgoms na mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa yin te/_zhi ba'i blo gros gang la mtshan ma rnams mi 'byung zhing thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs 
[\[91b.4\]]so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros sems mi dmigs pa'i phyir sems kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i 
[\[91b.5\]]phyir brtson par bya'o/_/sems can rnams la phan bzhed pas/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa yi/_/brtul zhugs dang ni tshul khrims dang /_/spyod dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la/_/gang tshe gnas na de yi tshe/_/sngags pas 'di ltar sngags grub bo/_/rtog dang 
[\[91b.6\]]bral ba'i ye shes ni/_/sngon gyi rgyal bas mngon sangs rgyas/_/rtog dang bral ba de la ni/_/gsang sngags 'grub par bstan pa yin/_/de yi 'bras bu rnam dag pa/_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal 'gyur/_/gang zhig rtog la gnas byed pa/_/de la dngos grub mi 'byung ngo /_/
[\[91b.7\]]de lta bas na rtog spangs la/_/sngags kyi gzugs ni bsam par bya/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/_byis pa rtse ba'i spyod pa'i gar rnam par 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]dag pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog_/
[\[92a.2\]]'jam pa'i dbyangs can stobs po che/_/dpa' bo chen po cher grags pa/_/ma dul rtag tu 'dul mdzad pa/_/sngags dang gsang sngags spyod pa dang /_/rnam pa kun du byis rtsen dang /_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams dang /_/bsam gtan bsam gtan byed rnams kun/_/
[\[92a.3\]]bdag cag rnams la thugs brtse'i phyir/_/lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/_/gsang sngags shes pa che 'byung ba/_/dkyil 'khor chen po gtsor gyur pa/_/spyod pa kun du bstan pa'i gzhi/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad du gsol/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[92a.4\]]pas/_gzod ma nas skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rang gi snying po rdo rje chen po'i yi ge smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ba rad badzra ma~M/_de nas dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i snying po chen po 'di smras ma thag tu thams 
[\[92a.5\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_mgrin gcig tu kye ma dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'di ni sngon gyi spyod pa las byung ba'o zhes smras so/_/yang 'jam dpal gyis rang gi dam bcas pa'i rdo rje'i yi ge smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA he he ku 
[\[92a.6\]]mA ra ka_/badzra badzra sma ra sma ra pra ti dz+nyA swA hA/_'jam dpal gyis yang rang gi ngag yang dag par grub pa'i gzhi'i gsang sngags smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bA kye da tA re ku mA ra rU pa d+ha ra swA hA/_yang 'jam dpal gyis rang gi ngag yang 
[\[92a.7\]]dag par grub pa'i sgo'i gsang sngags smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH_sarba thA bA kye da badzra he swA hA/_yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_rang gi ngag gi don sgrub par byed pa'i gsang sngags smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bA kye da badzra ko bi da swA hA/_yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje mtha' dang bral ba smras pa/_namaHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba tha taM badzra hI swa ha/_yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi pho nya mo'i tshogs kyi 
[\[92b.2\]]snying po smras pa/_namaHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ba dzrob ki Shi ni swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA badzro ta kra ke shi Ni swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA su ma ti badzrI Ni swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[92b.3\]]mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tsi trA k+Shi badzri NI swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA A kaR+Sha Ni badzro ta gi swA hA/_de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor smras pa/_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/_/kun du gru bzhi lham 
[\[92b.4\]]pa la/_/rdo rje mtshan rtags mtshan ma can/_/de yi dbus su bya ba ni/_/gru gsum rnam par gnas pa ste/_/gru gsum lta bur gzhag par bya/_/me las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri/_/tshon ni kun du dmar po ste/_/rdo rje 'bar bcas mtshan ma can/_/de yi cha gsum gzhag 
[\[92b.5\]]nas su/_/ut+pal yi gzugs bris te/_/de yi steng du rdo rje bri/_/'bar dang bcas shing thig ler mdzes/_/tha ma thog thag bya ba ni/_/ut+pal gzugs kyi phreng ba'o/_/sngags pas de yi dbus su ni/_/gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs ldan pa/_/mgo la phud pu 
[\[92b.6\]]lnga gzhag pa/_/sha mdog gur gum 'dra ba bzhag_/lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pal rdo rje dang bcas pa thogs shing g.yas pas dam pa sbyin pa'o/_/yang na phyag rgya'i gzugs so/_/yang na yi ge'o/_/de yi phyag rgya bri ba ni/_/ut+pal rab tu bzang po ste/_/de yi 
[\[92b.7\]]steng du rdo rje bri/_/'bar dang bcas shing thig les mtshan/_/de'i g.yas rol du snying po rnams gzhag go/_/g.yon rol du pho nya mo rnams gzhag go/_/'og rol du khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje mtha' dang bral ba'o/_/lho phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]cad rnam par sel ba'o/_/nub phyogs su ni nam mkha'i snying po'o/_/byang phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa ste/_cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag pa'o/_/yang na phyag rgya rnams so/_/yang na yi ge'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal 
[\[93a.2\]]gzhon nur gyur pas snying po mchog 'di'i bsgrub pa smras pa/_de la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/_dbang bskur ba/_dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa/_sdom pa blangs pa/_rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pas gnas khang ngam/_phug dben pa'am/_lhugs med par snying po 
[\[93a.3\]]'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas ur mo'am/_lcags sna gsum mam/_tsan+dan las byas pa'i ral gri'am/_'khor lo'am/_lcags kyu'am/_be con nam/_dgra sta'am/_mdung thung ngam/_zhags pa'am/_mda' bo che gang yang 
[\[93a.4\]]rung ba zhig ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la yang spos chus bkrus te/_ba lang gi lci ba'i phung po'i steng du gzhag la 'khor los sgyur ba chen pos bsrung bar bya'o/_/tha mar de nyid du mchod pa rgya cher byas la/_ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor la bskus la/_dam pa 
[\[93a.5\]]sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pas/_a ga ru'i yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi las smyugs pas mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg byas na/_nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar mtshan ma chen po dag 'byung zhing rdzas kyang 'gyur te 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de thogs nas rig sngags 
[\[93a.6\]]'chang du gyur te/_yid ltar mgyogs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mar rnam par rgyu ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi gzungs thob pa dang /_nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang /_rga ba 
[\[93a.7\]]dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi don byed par 'gyur ro/_/smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par lus de nyid kyis byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sa gnon no/_/rig sngags 'chang gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan pa/_dam pa sbyin 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]pa'i rdo rje'i mtshan ma can lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'am/_ma dul ba 'dul ba sna tshogs gzugs can gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba/_rig sngags 'chang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas par yid las byung ba'i khang pa chen po na 
[\[93b.2\]]gnas pa/_de mthong bas rig sngags 'chang rnams mi dbul po dang 'dra bar sems shing bdag cag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur te/_nyin gcig bzhin du rjes su dran par byed na/_mtshams med 
[\[93b.3\]]pa lnga la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du nyi ma shar kar phyag rgya bcings te/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zla ba drug na yul gru sbyin par byed do/_/shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog dag la sngags lan re re btab ste/_nyi ma'i 
[\[93b.4\]]gzugs la bsnun na zla ba gcig na grong dam pa brgyad sbyin par byed do/_/pad+ma'i rdzing bur song ste pad+ma dag la lan 'bum sngags kyis btab nas/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje la phul la snying po mchog de nyid kyis 'bras kyi 'o thug gis lan 'bum sbyin 
[\[93b.5\]]sreg bgyis na rgyal srid sbyin par byed do/_/gdong la sngags kyis btab nas gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/khros pa la phyag rgya bcings te snying po dran par byas na dang bar 'gyur ro/_/chu klung chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba mthong na bong ba la sngags kyis btab 
[\[93b.6\]]ste 'phangs na chu na rgyu ba thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro/_/gos kyi mtha' mar mdud pa bor te gos bgos na kha bcings pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'brog dgon pa'am chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa yod par yang de ltar mdud pa bor na rengs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[93b.7\]]gdug pas zin pa lam go'am mgul par bkod na dug med par 'gyur ro/_/snying po dam pa thig le dang bcas par rkang mthil yan chad du bsams na dug med par 'gyur ro/_/mkha' 'gro mas rgyas btab pa la rang gi snying gar bsams la nad pa'i mgo la rang gi 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]gzugs su bsams na/_de'i mod la sos par 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad la yang de bzhin du phyag rgya bcings la/_thal ba'am yungs kar la sngags lan bdun btab ste mgo bor bsnun na thams cad 'bros so/_/rlung chen 
[\[94a.2\]]po ldang ba mthong na chu la sngags kyis btab ste gtor na de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lce 'bab pa mthong na lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo la sngags kyis btab ste bsdigs na zlog par 'gyur te the tsom med do/_/ci ste 'chi byed la phur bus btab par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phur bu'am 
[\[94a.3\]]lcags kyi phur bu la rab tu drag po'i snying po dam pas lan brgyad brgyas sngags kyis btab la ngogs gnyis nas sa blangs te/_gzugs sor brgyad pa'i tshad du byas la mi ro bzhag pa'i khri las srad bu bkod de/_de'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcings la snying gar phur bu 
[\[94a.4\]]des btab na phur bus btab par 'gyur te ci yang mi byed do/_/dgrol na phur bu phyung la mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang na phur bu phyung bar 'gyur ro/_/rA dzA nam ba shi ka rtu ga mo la baN ma yiM pra kr-i tri ra kr-it+t+wa ra hA sa ba big ta paR+pa ta A kre ba ta k+Shi Na tsa ra nad a bar+b+h+yaH/_ya thA bi bo thA pU dza/_kr-it+ta 
[\[94a.5\]]tshit+t+wa dzu sU yat+t+r-i t+sa bad ha rA dzas pa ri bA ro ba sha~M a gats+tsha ti/_skal ba bzang por bya bar 'dod na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin gcig bzhin lan tshwa'i sreg blugs sbyin sreg byas na/_rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa thams cad kyi nang na skal ba bzang po mchog tu bzang por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[94a.6\]]kha zas kyi sbyin sreg byas na kha zas 'byung ngo /_/dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje la blta zhing zas mi bza' bar bzlas brjod lan 'bum byas na gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de sbyin par byed do/_/shing n+ya gro d+ha'i drung du dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram pa bsrung ba byas la/_/a ga ru'i 
[\[94a.7\]]bdug pa bsreg cing zas mi za bar gnod sbyin mo yid la byas te lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo yang 'ong bar 'gyur te/_gang blangs pa de sbyin par byed do/_/nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa byas shing nor bu bzang gi lag nas bzung ste/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]brjod byas na zla ba drug gis ti na ra brgya sbyin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo bzung la nyi ma shar ka nas nub kyi bar du mig phye ste/_bzlas brjod byas na thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sngon gyi las rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje la blta 
[\[94b.2\]]zhing mig mi 'dzums par bzlas brjod byas na tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la blta zhing nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du rtag tu dran par byed na dam pa sbyin par byed do/_/lag na rdo rje'i lag na yod pa'i rdo rje la 'jus te/_kha zas mi 
[\[94b.3\]]bza' bar lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na rang gi gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje'i rigs gzhon nu'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du kun du bzang po dang /_byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bltas te/_zas mi bza' bar lan sum 
[\[94b.4\]]'bum bzlas brjod byas na rang rang gi gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/_/char mi 'bab na gla ba'i yam sreg shing 'o ma la smyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na char pa 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi dbugs bkag la chu'i nang du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zla ba drug gis 
[\[94b.5\]]gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma'i phyi bzhin phyogs shing lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/_blon po chen po'i thabs sam gter chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lag na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs la slong mo'i zas bza' zhing ma mo'i khyim du ci 'byor pas mchod 
[\[94b.6\]]pa byas te/_lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na ma mo thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de byed do/_/gu gul gyi bdug pas gdon thams cad sel to/_/'bru mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab pas lto na ba sel to/_/rab tu 'khru ba la srad bu 
[\[94b.7\]]sngon po la sngags kyis btab ste rked par bcings na rab tu 'khru ba sos par 'gyur ro/_/klad pa na ba la bil ba'i 'bras bu btags te/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags la bskus na sos par 'gyur ro/_/mig na ba la gro ba'i me tog gi khu ba la lan cig sngags te snar blugs 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]na sos par 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan gyi lde gu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags na tsha ba'i rims nad sel lo/_/a ga ru'i bdug pa'am/_gu gul gyi bdug pas zhag bzhi pa sel to/_/ban+du ka'i shing gis 'bras kyi 'o thug btsos te skyes pa'am bud med bu med pa'i chos can 
[\[95a.2\]]la blud na skyes pa dang ma tshogs na yang bu 'byung ngo /_/kha dog sna bzhi pa'i gtor ma byas la kha dog sna bzhi pa'i bum pa bzhi la sngags lan brgyas btab ste/_lam gyi bzhi mdor ram shing drung gcig pa'i drung du ma ning ngam mo gsham bkrus na bu 'byung ngo /_/ci ste dmag gzhom 
[\[95a.3\]]par 'dod na skra can ma dang snying po mchog bsres te/_lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la srog shing gi phyag rgya bcings te/_mdzub mos bsdigs na rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste phyir 'bab par byed 'dod na byams pa'i sems kyis dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya mgo 
[\[95a.4\]]bor bcings la bsams na dgra la phyir bzlog pa 'bab par byas par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste dgra phung bar 'dod na bsgrub pa byas te nam phyed na skra bshig cing rkang pa g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te tsog tsog pur 'dug la/_de logs su bltas te dug dang /_khrag dang /_lan tshwa dang /_ske 
[\[95a.5\]]tshe'i 'bru bsres pa'i sreg blugs rdo rje chen po mtha' dang bral bas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bil ba'i shing gi me bus pa'i nang du sbyin sreg byas na phung bar 'gyur te/_'di la the tshom med do/_/lha'am klu'am mi yang rung /_/mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa'ang rung /_/gnod sbyin bdag po 
[\[95a.6\]]brgya byin 'ang rung /_/'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/zhi ba'i blo gros mdor na cho ga gang dag gis bsgrubs pa'i cho ga de dang de nyid kyis dngos grub sbyin par byed do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos bskal pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[95a.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog cher rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po mnyas par byas nas/_zhi ba'i blo gros des kho bo shin tu dka' ba byed par gzigs nas cher thugs rje'i stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas snying po dam pa 'di byin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros snying po 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]dam pa 'di thob ma thag tu kho bos sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs chen po 'bum phrag bcu dang /_mngon par shes pa chen po 'bum phrag bye ba phrag bcu thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag mngon 
[\[95b.2\]]du snang bar gshegs te de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kho bo la dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do/_/kho bos chos kyi rnam grangs de 'di lta ste/_snying po mchog 'di nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis skad cig thang cig yud 
[\[95b.3\]]tsam la bzung ngo /_/blangs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi tshe kho bos snying po dam pa 'di thob pa'i skad cig de la/_zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyis dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa gzungs kyi sgo 'bum phrag grangs med pa thob bo/_/zhi ba'i blo 
[\[95b.4\]]gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag la gnas te/_gsang sngags yang dag par ston pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub 
[\[95b.5\]]cing /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba las grol ba de dag thams cad kyang snying po dam pa 'di nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas thams cad kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur te/_gzhon nu'i gzugs 'dzin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byed do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 
[\[95b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog cher rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po 'di yang /_gzhon nu'i cho ga med pa dang /_yo byad med pa dang /_ri mo'i gzugs med par bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis 'grub bo/_/ci 
[\[95b.7\]]ste ri mo'i gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na tshes grangs dang /_byed pa dang /_yud tsam bzang por rtogs pa la rin la mi brtsegs par rgyu skud nyos la/_rdo rje drag po chen po'i snying pos bsrung ba'i cho ga byas pas ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la/_me tog bkram par 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]thag pa yan lag yongs su tshang ba dge ba'i ming can gso sbyong bzung ba/_zas dkar gsum za ba/_dbang po dul ba/_chos dang ldan pa/_rtag tu chos la dga' ba zhig thags 'cha' ba'i rnam lngas bskus pa dag gis/_skra ma shor ba ras khru lnga'am drug pa zhig 
[\[96a.2\]]'thag tu gzhug go/_/khrus byas shing byug pas byugs la thod ze'u ka bcings shing dri zhim po dang /_dri dang ldan par byas pas mchod pa rgya cher byas la/_a ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs shing thag pa la yon bzang du byin la dgrol bar bya'o/_/bkrol nas kyang 'khor los 
[\[96a.3\]]sgyur ba chen po'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la/_sa phyogs gtsang ma me tog sil ma bkram pa/_spos dang bdug pas bdugs par spos kyi chu'i nang du bcug ste zhag bdun bzhag go/_/de nas phyung la nyi ma la skam mo/_/de nas ga bur dang /_gur gum dang bsres pa'i phye 
[\[96a.4\]]ma 'jam pos ras la lan mang du bsgo bar bya'o/_/klu shing dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_skya snar la sogs pa'i me tog gis kyang bsgo bar bya'o/_/smyung ba byas pas tshes grangs ngan pa dang /_mi mthun par 'jug pa'i nyes pa dang bral zhing /_tshes grangs dang /_byed pa dang /_
[\[96a.5\]]yud tsam bzang po la rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa/_shis pa brjod pa yod pa me tog bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor du mchod pa rgya cher byas la/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas gsol ba btab ste/_snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan rdo rje chen po'i 
[\[96a.6\]]dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_/mkhas pa snyom las med pa/_dad pa dang ldan pa/_gos gtsang ma bgos pa/_kha zas ran par za ba/_bsrung ba byas pa zhig tshon pir sar pa sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rnams 
[\[96a.7\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog char rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po 'drir gzhug ste/_pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_gser gyi mdog can mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa/_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]par zhugs pa/_kha dog du ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/_gtsug tor nas 'od zer chen po 'byung ba zhal yid tsam 'dzum par bya'o/_/de'i 'og rol du dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje gur gum gyi mdog can dar ram ras kyi smad g.yogs gyon pa/_dar la'i 
[\[96b.2\]]bla gos bgos pa/_mgo la phud pu lnga dang bcas pa pus mo btsugs pa pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la 'dug pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_lag pa g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba/_g.yon pa na rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la 'dzin pa/_
[\[96b.3\]]gzhon nu'i gzugs can de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de'i mgo la 'bab cing de dag gi lus snang bar byas la rang gi 'od kyi dra ba'i dbus na 'dug pa/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba ni rin po che'i ri chen po la rin po che'i phug na 'dug pa bri'o/_/rin po che'i ri de yang dus 
[\[96b.4\]]thams cad pa'i me tog gi shing ljon pas brgyan pa bri'o/_/'og tu ni rgya mtsho chen po bri'o/_/ras gcig la dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i ri chen po la rin po che'i phug na skyil mo krung du 'dug pa/_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/_gzhon nu'i gzugs can 
[\[96b.5\]]dar ram ras kyi sham thabs gyon pa/_dar la'i stod g.yogs bgos pa/_lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la thogs pa/_rang gi 'od kyi dra ba'i nang na 'dug pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bri'o/_/de'i snying gar snying po zhi ba'i 
[\[96b.6\]]cha byad 'dzin pa/_me lce 'bar ba lang long du 'dug par gyur pa 'od ston zla'i 'od zer dang 'dra ba/_lag pa g.yas pa na dam pa sbyin pa/_g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/_gos dkar po gyon pa/_lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo las chu'i rgyun 'dzag par bri'o/_/de'i 'og rol 
[\[96b.7\]]du sgrub pa po cha byad ci ltar 'dzin pa bzhin du bri'o/_/lag na pog phor thogs shing pus mo btsugs par bri'o/_/dben par de'i mdun du ci 'byor pas mchod pa rgya chen por byas te/_lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sngar spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/ri mo'i gzugs 'di 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]mthong ba tsam gyis/_sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/_/bsgrub pa'i rdzas gang ci yin pa/_/de dag thams cad nges par 'grub/_/gang zhig sdig pa'i las rnams kyis/_/gdol pa'i skye gnas skyes gyur kyang /_/sngon gyi sdig pa'i las rnams las/_/de yi 
[\[97a.2\]]mod la skye bo grol/_/ri mo'i gzugs 'di'i mdun du ni/_/las rnams thams cad grub 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/de la ci yang dkon pa med/_/ri mo mthong na rtag tu yang /_/tshe dang de bzhin dpal dang ni/_/nor dang grags pa ldan par 'gyur/_/skal ba bzang 
[\[97a.3\]]zhing mkhas par 'ong /_/zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje gang dag ri mo'i gzugs 'di la dad par byed pa'i sems can dag ni shin tu dkon no/_/dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje gang dag dkyil 'khor chen po la 'jug pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi tshul 'di nyid nyan pa 
[\[97a.4\]]dang /_'jug pa de dag sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur na/_gang dag lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba/_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs pa de dag lta ci smos te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par 'gyur ro/_/'jam 
[\[97a.5\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros de de bzhin te/_ji skad smas pa de bzhin no/_/gang dag tshul 'di nyan pa dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni/_dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor mngon par rtogs pa chen 
[\[97a.6\]]po mthong ba'am rna lam du thos par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa rnams la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[97a.7\]]bya ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam du mi 'gyur gyi/_zhi ba'i blo gros rin po che'i rgyal po'i nor bu rin po che de ni/_sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma dang ldan pa de dag la mthong ba dang /_reg pas kyang ci ltar bsams pa bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]zhi ba'i blo gros chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o//_//'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/_bam po brgyad pa/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 
[\[97b.2\]]gzhan yang rang gi dam bcas ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_cho ga snga ma bzhin du ri'i rtse mor song la rang gi gnas na gnas pa/_mi smra bar dus gsum du khrus byed pa/_gos lan gsum brjes pas yi ge lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/tha mar zla ba nya 
[\[97b.3\]]la ci 'byor pas mchod de/_rdzas gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nges par 'grub par 'gyur te/_snga ma bzhin du rig sngags 'chang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing /_lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag stong sil snyan dang pheg rdo ba ba mngon du 
[\[97b.4\]]ston cing /_'jig rten gyi khams du mar rgyu ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa/_sprul pa du ma byed pa/_sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba/_'dod na mchi ba/_smon lam las nges par skyes pa/_sgra 
[\[97b.5\]]mtha' yas pa sgrogs pa'i dbyangs kyi gzungs thob pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga rtogs par khong du chud pa/_nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can yid ltar mgyogs par 'gyur te/_snga ma'i tshul bzhin du gang 'dod pa de nges par 'grub bo/_/ci ste ri mo'i gzugs 'grub 
[\[97b.6\]]par 'dod na cho ga snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ldan na bzhugs pa/_byang chub kyi snying po mchog la zhugs pa/_skyil mo krung du bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/_gser gyi mdog can mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa/_gtsug tor nas byung ba'i 
[\[97b.7\]]'od zer rnams kyis kun du snang bar bri bar bya'o/_/byang chub kyi shing drung na gor shir+Sha'i tsan+dan gyi byang chub kyi shing thams cad dpag bsam gyi shing chen po ltar legs par brgyan par bya'o/_/bkod pa sna [(]tshogs [,]tshogs [)]kyis legs par brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]de'i g.yas rol du byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi me tog brtsegs zhes bya ba gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzung ba/_lag na rnga yab thogs pa/_gos tshi gu gyon par bri'o/_/g.yon rol du byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan brtsegs zhes 
[\[98a.2\]]bya ba pri yang ku'i me tog lta bu'i sngo bsangs pa'i gos tshig gu gyon pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_lag na rnga yab thogs pa bri bar bya'o/_/'og rol du nyan thos chen po brgyad bri bar bya ste/_brtan pas byin pa dang /_yangs pas byin pa dang /_snying pos byin pa 
[\[98a.3\]]dang /_rgyal ba'i blo gros dang /_dri ma med par byin pa dang /_sangs rgyas srung dang /_tshogs kyis byin dang /_blo gros bzang po rnams so/_/g.yas ngos su byang chub sems dpa' rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_dbyibs tha dad pa/_cha byad tha dad pa/_kha dog tha dad pa 
[\[98a.4\]]brgyad bri bar bya'o/_/steng du rig sngags 'chang lus sprin gyi nang du chud cing me tog gi char 'bebs pa dag bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gzhon nu'i gzugs 'dzin la mkhregs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_lag na ut+pa la thogs pa/_pus 
[\[98a.5\]]mo btsugs pa/_phud bu lnga bcas pa/_bka' nod pa/_'bar ba dang bcas pa/_bzhin yid tsam 'dzum pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo 'od zer gyis yongs su bskor bar bri bar bya'o/_/de'i mdun du lan sa ya bzlas brjod bya ste/_snga ma bzhin du snying po dam pa'i cho ga 
[\[98a.6\]]dang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du las thams cad byed do/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na nyams par mi 'gyur te/_gzhan du ma yin no/_/zhi ba'i blo gros ci ste byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'byor pa 'dod cing snying po gang yang rung 
[\[98a.7\]]ba zhig bsgrub par 'dod na/_dkyil 'khor mthong ba des gang yang rung ba zhig cho ga snga ma bzhin du blangs la/_dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes la bkrus te rjes la byugs nas rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis lan drug 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas tha mar ci 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]'byor pas mchod de shu ti zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pa dag gis mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg byas na blon po chen po'i thabs thob par 'gyur ro/_/ma grub na las rnams su 'gyur te yul gru sbyin par byed do/_/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chur mid pa nub tsam du zhugs la snying po dam pa dang 
[\[98b.2\]]lhan cig tu lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na gter mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gu gul gyi yam sreg shing mar la smyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na/_grong dam pa brgyad sbyin par byed do/_/lha ma yin gyi khung sgor zas mi za bar ske tshe'i 'bru dang lan tshwa sreg blugs rdo rje mtha' dang bral ba'i 
[\[98b.3\]]snying po dang lhan cig tu lan 'bum sbyin sreg byas na/_lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams byung nas 'jug par byed de gang 'dod pa sbyin par byed do/_/ci ste ba 'byung bar 'dod na grog mkhar ram chu 'dus su nyin gcig bzhin du ba'i rnam lnga za zhing rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di lan sum khri 
[\[98b.4\]]bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de 'bras sA lu'i phye las sor bzhi tshad kyi ba ma smad byas la ba ru na'i shing gi me bus te/_lan lnga khri sbyin sreg byas nas nam phyed dam nyi ma shar kar de nyid du bdag la rtse zhing byung ste/_rdo rje drag po'i snying pos sngags btab pa'i chus 
[\[98b.5\]]gtor na mi 'gul bar 'gyur ro/_rin la mi brtsegs par dri zhim zhes ming btags pa'i ba nyos la nyin gcig bzhin byab par bya'o/_/zla ba re re zhing thang shing bdar ba dang bsres pa'i chus bum pa bkang la ba la spos dang me tog gis mchod pas mchod na ba brgya stong du 'phel bar 'gyur 
[\[98b.6\]]te the tsom med do/_/de bzhin du rta dang /_glang po che dang /_rnga mo dang /_lug dang /_ma he 'byung bar 'dod na nyin gcig bzhin du gla ba'i shing gi me bus la/_nas dang 'o ma la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg byas na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zas kyi sbyin sreg byas na zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[98b.7\]]'bras dang mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na zas mi zad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'bru thams cad sbyin sreg byas na 'bru thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gang sbyin sreg byas pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kha bzhin la sngags kyis btab na rtag tu lan thebs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe mchod pa byas la shu dag dkar po blangs te khar bcug la zla ba la blta zhing /_zla ba btang gi bar du bzlas brjod byas la de zos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe ba ser mo ma smad spu mthun pa'i 'o ma blangs la/_ba lang 
[\[99a.2\]]gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus te/_ci 'byor pas mchod la zla ba la blta zhing mar 'byung gi bar du bsrubs te de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba med par 'gyur ro/_/ra'i 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa lan brgyad brgya sngags kyis 
[\[99a.3\]]btab ste 'thungs na gcong chen po 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/mar la lan brgyad brgya sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sman gang yang rung ba la lan cig sngags kyis btab ste zos na nad med par 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin bzlas brjod byed na skal ba 
[\[99a.4\]]bzang por 'gyur ro/_/a pa marga'i sreg blugs nyin gcig bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/spos sam me tog la sngags kyis btab ste/_su la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/a tha rA dza ni ma ba shwa ka rtu ka mo gau ra sa ri sha pa ku ku ma saM mi shi 
[\[99a.5\]]ra ni ra hA ro la k+k+haMdzu hU yad/_rA dza ba shi b+ha ba ti/_bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na ming smos la skyor chu la lan cig sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/phyugs chung 'dod na shu ti'i sbyin sreg nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na phyugs chung rnyed par 
[\[99a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/chu rgal bar 'dod na skyes bu bcings pa byas la rgal na chu la rgyu ba thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste dmag rengs par byed 'dod na lo ma bdun pa'i shing las be con sor bcu drug pa'i tshad byas la/_spos dang me tog gis mchod pa'i ming nas smos shing pus mo nub tsam du 
[\[99a.7\]]sa la btsugs te/_de'i steng du zhag bdun du tu ru ska'i 'bras bu dang yungs kar bsres pa lan 'bum sbyin sreg byas na dmag rengs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros ma bsgrubs kyang de la sogs pa'i las rnams su 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang rdo rje mtha' dang bral 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]ba'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/_tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi dgos/_smyung ba bya mi dgos par dgon pa chen po'am/_dur khrod chen por song ste/_gos sngon po bgos la lam mi bzur slong mo'i zas bza' zhing /_nga rgyal med par byas la sngar snying po dam pa 'bum bzlas 
[\[99b.2\]]brjod bya'o/_/des na khro bo chen po 'di'i sngar bsnyen pa bye ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ri'i rtse mor song la lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya cher byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nyi ma shar kar khro bo'i rgyal po nyid 'ong bar 'gyur te/_'ong ba'i 
[\[99b.3\]]mtshan ma ni sgrub pa po'i lus las 'od zer 'byung ba dang /_mig gnyis g.yo ba dang /_rkang lag 'gul ba 'di dag 'byung ste me tog dang bdug pas mchod par bya'o/_/de nas byang phyogs su rnga sgra chen po 'byung ngo /_/rnga sgra byung nas mche ba 'jigs su rung bar gtsigs la skra gyen du 'greng 
[\[99b.4\]]ba sgrub pa po la bsdigs pa lta bur khro bo'i rgyal po nyid 'ong bar 'gyur te/_sgrub pa pos 'jigs par mi bya'o/_/khro bo de mthong ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas bskor ba dang /_lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[99b.5\]]rnga brdung ba dag dang sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma grub na dam pa lnga sbyin par byed do/_/rgyal srid dang /_mi snang ba dang /_'dod 'jo'i ba dang /_bum pa bzang po dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o/_/ri la song ste lan brgya stong bzlas brjod 
[\[99b.6\]]byas na gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do/_/rA dzA na ma ba shi ka du rga mo sa lak+Sha me kan da rA dzA ba sho b+ha ba ti A dam b+hid t+ya i pa A dz+nyA ka ro ti/_snod du dbab par 'dod na lan brgya stong du bzlas brjod byas na snod du 'bab bo/_/gter dbyung bar 'dod na lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na gter 
[\[99b.7\]]'byin no/_/ci ste ril bu bsgrub na rgya skyegs dang ldong ros dang /_'u su'i 'bru mar dang btags la ril bu byas te de nas zangs kyis dkri'o/_/dkris nas kyang zhag bdun bzhag la ril bu gnyis sam gsum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo/_/gcig lag na 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]bzung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni ma dul ba 'dul ba brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa che ba'i yon tan dpag tu med pa'i dpal dang ldan pa'o/_/'di'i sngags bzlas brjod byas la rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba yang byang bar 'gyur zhing /_mtshams med pa lnga po 
[\[100a.2\]]dag kyang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/ci skad bshad pa de bzhin du byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos gang dag 'di'i sngags 'dzin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur na/_bzlas brjod byed pa dang bsgrub pa yid la bsams pa thams 
[\[100a.3\]]cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_tshes bcu bzhi'am [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga gang gis smyung ba byas te bzlas brjod byas pa de bskal pa bzhir 'khor ba phyir snyil bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khro bo'i rgyal po sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye bas mchod pa 'di'i ming yang don yod pa yin te/_'di'i 
[\[100a.4\]]ming bzung bas sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni brjod pas 'grub pa'o/_/'dis sangs rgyas thams cad bsgral to/_/skyes pa'i ro blangs la nam phyed na chu ngogs su song la chus bkrus la/_me tog la sogs pas brgyan te/_mgo 
[\[100a.5\]]shar phyogs su bstan la sgrub pa po grogs bzang po dang /_rtswa ku sha sbams pa'i steng du 'dug ste/_shu dag dkar po la lan bdun sngags la khar bcug ste ro kha dang zhes byed kyi bar du rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa pos 'jigs pa med par byas la rkang pa g.yon 
[\[100a.6\]]pas brang du mnan kyang sgra drag po 'byung ste/_de la yang 'jigs par mi bya bar rig sngags 'chang gis du ba byung gi bar du rig pa bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis mgo la bsnun par byas te/_bsnun ma thag tu mi ro'i kha nas sbrul snang 
[\[100a.7\]]ste de la yang 'jigs par mi bya bar rig pa dran par bya ste reg par bya'o/_/reg ma thag tu ral grir gyur te snying po dran par byas la blang bar bya'o/_/blangs ma thag tu skra lcang lor 'khyil par 'gyur ro/_/lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi bdag 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]por 'gyur ro/_/thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lo drug khri thub par 'gyur ro/_/mdung thung bsgrub pa ni/_sgrub pa po zas su 'o skyo btung zhing ri'i rtse mor song la rig pa lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dur khrod kyi thal ba dang grog 
[\[100b.2\]]mkhar gyis 'o mas sbrus la mdung thung bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad du bya'o/_/sbyin dang ma 'bags pa'i tshon gyis ri mo bri'o/_/de nas dur khrod du song la ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor la bskus te/_spos dang me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa 'byung po'i gtor 
[\[100b.3\]]ma thams cad bya'o/_/gtsang mar byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos la mi thod kyi steng du 'dug cing mdung thung yang mi thod cig gi steng du bzhag la mdung thung 'bar gyi bar du rig pa bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas sngags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog rnams kyis mchod yon dbul lo/_/
[\[100b.4\]]yang na rig pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na phyogs rnams nas sems can dag 'ong bar 'gyur te/_'jigs pa mi bya bar khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par byas la mdung thung la reg par bya'o/_/reg ma thag tu de bud med du gyur nas bu ci bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de la bdag 
[\[100b.5\]]khyod la skyabs su song ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas de sngags pa'i lag mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i mod la skra lcang lor 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/_/lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur ro/_/mdung thung lag na thogs na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/_'khor los sgyur 
[\[100b.6\]]ba ma gtogs par rig sngags 'chang rnams de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gang la bltas pa de dag thams cad de'i rkang pa la mgo bos gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste nor bsgrub na shing bil ba'i yam sreg shing brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na ti na ra brgya rnyed do/_/gu gul gyi ril bu rgya 
[\[100b.7\]]shug tsam 'bum sbyin sreg byas na gzugs rtags can stong rnyed do/_/a ga ru'i shing gi me bus la/_shing pa ta'i 'bras bu zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar las smyugs te/_stong sbyin sreg byas na nyin gcig bzhin du ma bslangs par ti na ra rnyed do/_/bud med dbang du bya na phub ma'i 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]sreg blugs lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rA dzA ma t+ya ba shi ka ra ne ba la na hU ti nan/_aSh+Ta sa ha sran dzu hU yang+ba sho b+ha ba ti/_rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chur zhugs la me tog kha dog sna tshogs 'bum gtor nam blangs par nyin gcig bzhin 
[\[101a.2\]]du ras zung re rnyed do/_/dur khrod du song la dkyil 'khor byas te zhag bdun mi shas sbyin sreg byas na sha zas zin pa la bltas pas gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/ne'u le'i spu las lan drug stong sbyin sreg byas na sha za thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur 
[\[101a.3\]]ro/_/lug nag po'i bal mar la smyugs pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg byas na bud med dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sha za mthong bar 'dod na dur khrod du ba lang gi ko ba tsam gyi dkyil 'khor byas la nya la sogs pa'i gtor ma byas te/_kha shar phyogs su bltas la mi'i skra khrag la smyugs 
[\[101a.4\]]pas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na sha za thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur/_'jigs par mi bya ba srung bar mi bya'o/_/'di skad du khyed nga'i dbang du 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya ste/_de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du de la ti na ra lnga lnga sbyin 
[\[101a.5\]]par byed de/_de dag kyang 'god par bya'o/_/mdzub mo la lan bdun bsngags pas sprin zlog go/_/thal ba la lan bdun bsngags pas smra ba rengs par 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags pas ri 'gul bar 'gyur ro/_/ma la ta'i me tog gam/_ku ti dza'i 
[\[101a.6\]]me tog la lan bdun bsngags pas bud med gang gis bsnams sam/_gang la byin nam/_gang gi mgor bor ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin mo dbang du 'gyur bar 'dod na dur khrod du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing sngags bzlas brjod bya'o/_/der skam sar ba lang gi ko ba tsam gyi 
[\[101a.7\]]dkyil 'khor byas la gtor ma rgya cher bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis shing arka'i yam sreg shing khrag la smyugs pa lan bdun stong sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs mi sdug pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/_de la 'jigs par mi bya bar rig pa dran par byas la 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]'dug cig 'dug cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de dam pa rnam pa gsum las gcig sbyin par byed de/_ma'am sring mo'am chung mar 'gyur ro/_/mar gyur na ni bu bzhin du dgos pa thams cad byed de/_sring mor gyur na ni nyin gcig bzhin du ti nar re re sbyin par byed do/_/chung mar 
[\[101b.2\]]gyur na ni de dang lhan cig rtse'o/_/lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor lo de bsgrub pa yin te/_sngar spyad pa byas pas mgar ba gtsang ma gso sbyong bzung ba/_yan lag ma tshang ba med pa la ur mo'i 'khor lo byed du bcug la sor brgyad pa 
[\[101b.3\]]me lce 'bar bas bskor bar bya'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor lo de ba'i sna lnga'i nang du bcug ste zhag gcig gzhag go/_/de nas phyung la bkrus te bskus la/_ras gtsang mas dkris te de'i 'og tu mdun du gzhag la mchod pa dang gtor ma byas te/_mchod yon gyi 
[\[101b.4\]]snod blangs la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lha thams cad spyan drang ngo /_/de dag la yang mchod yon phul la yang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis slar gshegs par bya'o/_/thal ba la lan bdun ba sngags btab pas thal ba'i ra bar 'gyur ro/_/rtswa'i me la lan bdun bsngags pas me'i 
[\[101b.5\]]ra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas cho ga bzhin bsrung ba byas te/_yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags pas sa bcing ngo /_/chu la lan bdun bsngags pas nam mkha' bcing ngo /_/de nas sngags pas mchod yon gyi snod spos chus bkang ste/_me tog dkar po bcug pas rtsa ba'i 
[\[101b.6\]]sngags kyis rang gi lha spyan drangs la mchod yon phul te stan la gzhag la yongs su rgyas par byas te mar dang sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma'i sreg blugs thog mar lan bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas sngags pas 'khor lo lag pa gnyis kas blangs la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/
[\[101b.7\]]de nas rnga sgra grag par 'gyur ro/_/'brug ni di ri ri zer ro/_/mar me'i me lce ring por 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo yang 'gul lo/_/nam mkha' las kyang rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod 'khor lo 'di grub pa dang /_/khyod byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa dang /_khyod srid 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba legs so zhes sgra grag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sngags pas la gor la gor du lag na rdo rje 'ong gi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje 'ongs nas sgrub pa po la bu khyod bdud kyi dpung las rgyal ba dang /_khyod byang chub kyi lam du zhugs 
[\[102a.2\]]pa de legs so zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lag na rdo rje'i lag pa g.yas pas sgrub pa po'i spyi bo la nyug go/_/byugs pa de'i mod la rigs kyi bu de'i mdun du gzhal med khang rgyar dpag tshad stong yod pa/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dpyangs pa/_gser skud bres pa/_mu tig gi 
[\[102a.3\]]phreng ba bres pa/_an+da rnyil dang /_mthon ka chen po dang /_pad+ma rA ga dang /_margad chen po dang /_dri mchog dang /_rin po che'i khyad par gzhan dag gis kyang mdzes par byas pa/_rdo rje sna tshogs bkod pas rnam par bkram pa lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang /_rig sngags 
[\[102a.4\]]'chang la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa la sogs pa de dag kyang /_glu len cing sgra snyan pa'i pi bang dang /_rnga dang /_gling bu dang /_pheg rdob pa byed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'phags pa lag na rdo rje nyid kyi lag pa g.yas pas sgrub pa po 
[\[102a.5\]]bzung ste/_gzhal med khang du 'jug cing rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa ltar song shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'gro ba thogs pa med par gyur nas/_khro bo'i rgyal po chen po de'i mthus rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor 
[\[102a.6\]]los sgyur ba thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/de nas lag na rdo rjes rig sngags 'chang de gzhal med khang du bzhag nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'khor rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas/_rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal 
[\[102a.7\]]po du ma la phyag 'tshal zhing ri mor byed la mchod pa byed cing /_mdun na rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bas thams cad la bsgo zhing 'gro'o/_/khro bo 'di ni dam pa dpal dang ldan pa/_rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/_las thams cad byed pa ste 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad byed do/_/'byung po thams cad skrag par byed do/_/dgug go/_/dbang du byed do/_/skam par byed do/_/gnod par byed do/_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad ci 'dod pa de thams cad sgrub bo/_/ci ste bzhon pa bsgrub par 'dod na de 
[\[102b.2\]]nas ngang pa'am glang khyu pa'am/_rma bya'am/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_glang po che 'am/_rta'am gang yang rung ba zhig byas la/_ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung ba ri mo 'drir gzhug ste/_ri mo'i gzugs nub phyogs su bstan la gzhag ste/_mchod yon rgya cher byas la mar me yang 
[\[102b.3\]]'bul zhing bsrung ba'i cho ga yang byas la u dum bA ra'i yam shing bsreg cing stong yang sbyin sreg bya'o/_/spos chus lha spyan drangs la slar gshegs su gsol nas mchod yon dbul lo/_/mchod yon phul nas bzhon pa gang yang rung ba zhig lag pas mnan la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas 
[\[102b.4\]]brjod bya'o/_/de nas sngags pas la gor la gor du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/gal te ngang par gyur na de'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ni ngang pa sgra 'byin to/_/khyu pa ni ngar ro/_rma bya ni lhung lhung zer ro/_/nam mkha' lding ni 'phur ro/_/glang po che ni sgra ngur ngur zhes zer ro/_/rta ni skad tse re re 
[\[102b.5\]]zer ro/_/'di dag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin no/_/ngang pa la zhon na mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gnyis par 'gyur te/_tshe bskal pa mchog pas kyang mchog thub par 'gyur ro/_/khyu pa la zhon na lha chen po gnyis par 'gyur ro/_/rma bya la zhon na smin drug gi bu gnyis
