[\[102b.6\]]par 'gyur te/_dpa' zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po dang ldan pa tshe bskal pa chen po thub par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe shi 'phos na de'i tshe bram ze'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste nam mkha' lding bsgrubs la de la zhon na khyab 'jug gnyis 
[\[102b.7\]]par 'gyur te/_tshe bskal pa thub par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe shi 'phos pa de'i tshe shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs su skyes par 'gyur te/_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste glang po che grub cing de la zhon na brgya byin gyi brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_lha'i rgyal 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]po byed la nad med pa dang /_mdzes pa dang /_lha mo rnams dang rtse bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe shi 'phos pa de'i tshe shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste rta bsgrub cing de la zhon na nyi ma gnyis par 'gyur te/_mthu che zhing 
[\[103a.2\]]che bar gyi bskal pa thub par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe shi 'phos pa de'i tshe shing sA la chen po lta bu'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na zangs sam/_a ga ru'am/_tsan+dan nam/_tsan+dan dmar po'am/_thang shing ngam/_seng 
[\[103a.3\]]ldeng ngam/_shing ban+da'am/_shing ni ma pa'am/_shel lam/_sgron shing las rdo rje rtse gcig pa sor brgyad pa'am/_sor bcu drug pa mgar ba'am/_shing mkhan gso sbyong bzung ba byed du bcug la ba ser mo'i sna lngas bskus te/_zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la bcom ldan 
[\[103a.4\]]'das kyi mdun du mchod pa rgya cher byas la gtor ma yang byin te/_rdo rje spos chus bkrus la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag phul te/_smon lam btab la khro bo'i snying po brjod de mchod yon gyis lha spyan drangs la mchod yon dang stan phul te/_mar dang sbrang rtsi'i 
[\[103a.5\]]sreg blugs lan bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de nas sngags pas lag pa g.yas pas rdo rje blangs la 'bar zhing sgra tseg tseg mi zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas sngags pas la gor la gor du bzlas brjod bya ste/_shar phyogs nas khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje mtha' dang bral 
[\[103a.6\]]ba pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor la/_rig pa bye ba phrag dgus yongs su bskor zhing 'ong gi bar du bya'o/_/rig pa de re re la yang 'khor bye ba phrag lnga brgyas yongs su bskor ba'o/_/rig pa'i rgyal po de lag pa g.yon par rdo rje bzung ste/_lag pa g.yas pas 
[\[103a.7\]]sgrub pa po la snyan cing zab pa'i sgras dbugs 'byin cing /_gzi brjid nyi ma ltar 'bar la lha thams cad kyis ni mchod me tog gi char ni 'bebs shing 'ong ngo /_/de nas sgrub pa pos 'ongs pa la mchod yon dbul lo/_/stan yang dbul lo/_/smon lam btab la bcom ldan 'das 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/_bdag la dngos grub stsal du gsol zhes gsol ba gdab bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag pa g.yas pas sgrub pa po'i mgo la reg par byed cing 'di skad du bu ci bya zhes smra'o/_/de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul la 
[\[103b.2\]]pus mo gnyis btsugs te bdag la rdo rje'i dngos grub stsal du gsol/_des bdag khyod kyi bka' drin gyis brtson 'grus chen po dang /_stobs chen po dang ldan zhing rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[103b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrub pa po la bu khyod kyis rdo rje 'di grub ste/_brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa dang ldan zhing rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi rgyal po chen por 'gyur zhes brjod par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje ci lta bar mdung thung la sogs pa bsgrub pa'ang de bzhin 
[\[103b.4\]]no/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mtha' dang bral ba'i cho ga zhib mo thogs pa med pa rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/_byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes dbang bskur ba zhes bya 
[\[103b.5\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor yod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho bo gcig pu la bshad do/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i tshe/_bstan pa dang gsang ba'i yang ches gsang ba/_gsang chen dam pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rnam par 
[\[103b.6\]]mi rig na/_gzhan 'jig rten pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos pa gsang ba dam pa 'di yang kho bo la gtad de/_zhi ba'i blo gros mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_rdo rjes dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o/_/'dis rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba dang bcas 
[\[103b.7\]]pa ma lus pa 'di mtha' dag khyab ste/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang ma khyab pa med do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di lta bu dag thos nas/_sems can rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la bltas nas bstan pa gnas par 'gyur ba'i don du 
[\[104a.2\]]mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de bshad du gsol/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[104a.3\]]thabs sla ba gang gis don chen po byed par 'gyur ba mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyon cig_/zhi ba'i blo gros thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyis sa gang yang rung ba zhig yongs su bzung la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/sa de byang chub kyi sems kyis sbyang bar bya'o/_/dmigs 
[\[104a.4\]]pa'i tshul la gnas nas su/_/sngags pas gang zhig gzhan du byed/_/de la dngos grub myur mi 'gyur/_/dngos grub nyid kyang mi 'thob bo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros nyon cig_/dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong nas ni/_/gang gis dngos grub thob gyur pa/_/dkyil 'khor rgyal po 
[\[104a.5\]]dgod pa ni/_/brtul zhugs bzang po khyod la bshad/_/dam tshig don du lus can la/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/_/de bri cho ga bshad par bya/_/nges par bsgrims te mnyan par gyis/_/khru lnga kho ra khor yug la/_/stegs bur bcas pa'i sgo 
[\[104a.6\]]bzhi gtod/_/de nas sngags pas bya ba ni/_/dkyil 'khor rim pa gnyis su dbye/_/nub phyogs sgo nas gzhug par bya/_/yang na byang phyogs sgo nas gzhug_/snying rjer ldan pa'i yid kyis su/_/kho ra khor yug de bzhin bya/_/nang du zhugs nas sngags pa yis/_/de 
[\[104a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dran byas la/_/sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pas/_/dkyil 'khor rgyal po bri bar bya/_/zhi ba'i blo gros nyon cig_/dkyil 'khor rgyal po dgod pa ni/_/ci ltar sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin/_/khyod la thams cad brjod par bya/_/g.yeng med 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]yid kyis mnyan par gyis/_/blo dang ldan pas de dbus su/_/phyag rgya mchog tu mdzes par bri/_/pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/_/sna tshogs mdzes pa nyid du 'dod/_/shar phyogs 'dab ma dkar po ste/_/nub phyogs su ni ljang khu'o/_/byang phyogs su ni dmar po bri/_/lho 
[\[104b.2\]]phyogs su ni nag po'o/_/'dab ma lhag mar brjod pa ni/_/'dren mar rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/_/de yi snying po dbus su ni/_/bum pa bsgreng ba bri bar bya/_/de yi steng du pad+ma che/_/pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje bsgreng /_/de yi tha mar 'od zer gyi/_/dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes pa bri/_/
[\[104b.3\]]dkyil 'khor gang dang gang yin pa/_/sa bon dang ni ldan par bya/_/blo dang ldan pas de steng du/_/chos kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa ste/_/pad+ma dkar po'i steng gzhag la/_/rdo rje rnams kyis 'khor ba bskor/_/mkhas pas dbang ldan phyogs su ni/_/phyag rgya mchog tu bzang 
[\[104b.4\]]bri ste/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba la/_/dkyil 'khor yid bzhin rin chen gzhag_/de yi steng du bri ba ni/_/pad+ma dkar po mchog tu mdzes/_/zhi zhing me lce phreng bas 'khor/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags pa bri/_/byang phyogs su ni dung bri ste/_/dkar la mchog 
[\[104b.5\]]tu 'tsher bar bya/_/'jig rten dbang po 'dra ba ste/_/gzugs bzang phyag rgya 'di bri'o/_/dung gi steng du rdo rje bri/_/rdo rje'i steng du pad+ma'o/_/lho phyogs su ni song nas su/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yi/_/phyag rgya bsgrims te bri bar bya/_/de yi steng du rlung gzhag go/_/
[\[104b.6\]]de yi steng du pad+ma ste/_/dus mtha'i me 'dra'i 'od can bri/_/de yi steng du blo ldan pa/_/lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri/_/nub phyogs su ni song nas su/_/ut+pa la zhes bya ba yi/_/phyag rgya shin tu mdzes bri ste/_/pad+ma'i steng du gzhag par bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che/_/
[\[104b.7\]]'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yin/_/bden bral phyogs su song nas su/_/ral gri gcig ni bri bya ste/_/pad+ma dkar po'i steng du gzhag_/'od zer gyis ni 'khor bar bya/_/sgo yi g.yas g.yon ngos gnyis su/_/khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis bri ste/_/'jig rten gsum 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]rgyal mgon po dang /_/khro bo zla ba'i thig le'o/_/khro zla thig le'i thob ste/_/'jig rten gsum rgyal rdo rje'o/_/de nas sngags pas mnyam gzhag ste/_/phyi rim ngos su bri ba ni/_/de la shar phyogs su ni 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o/_/
[\[105a.2\]]byang phyogs su ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o/_/lho phyogs su ni gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o/_/nub phyogs su ni rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o/_/sgo'i g.yas g.yon du ni thub dka' dang /_mngon du gyur pa gnyis bri'o/_/phyogs bzhir 
[\[105a.3\]]ni bsrung ba chen mo bzhi gzhag par bya ste/_'di lta ste/_shar phyogs su ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin ma'o/_/byang phyogs su ni gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o/_/lho phyogs su ni 'od zer can zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o/_/nub phyogs su ni 'jigs pa 'jigs byed dbyug to'i 
[\[105a.4\]]phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/_/de nas phyogs bzhir bum pa mgul chings dang bcas pa bzhi gzhag go/_/dbus su bum pa gcig gzhag go/_/de nas slob dpon gyis/_cho ga snga ma'i tshul bzhin du/_/rab tu bsgrims te slob ma bzung /_/dkyil 'khor snga ma'i skabs 
[\[105a.5\]]bzhin du/_/spos dang me tog sbyin par bya/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros ngo mtshar gyis 'dun par gyur pa'i snying gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la rnam par blta zhing 'dug nas tshig smras pa/_/kye ma'o sems dpa' chen po gang /_/sangs rgyas zhing 
[\[105a.6\]]du thams cad du/_/bsgrags pa chen po bstan pa ni/_/khyod kyis spyod pa ci 'dra zhig_/dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong nas su/_/gang gis dngos grub 'grub 'gyur la/_/rdo rje dbang bskur dam pa mchog_/shin tu rmad du byung 'di bstan/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_
[\[105a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros legs so legs so/_/tshig brjod pa 'di bzang ngo /_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'di skad du lag na rdo rje/_rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]dkyil 'khor 'di ni mchog tu ches gsang ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_zhi ba'i blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ji skad du bstan pa yin/_/de skad ces 
[\[105b.2\]]smas pa dang /_lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gang khyod kyis dris pa de legs so legs so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i mthu bsgyings pa nyon cig_/zhi ba'i blo gros dkyil 'khor 'di lta zhog gi/_de 
[\[105b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin du ma las nges par byung ba gzungs du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i rdo rje yang kho bo la byin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams pas ches snga ba'o/_/zhi ba'i blo gros ye shes kyi rdo rje 'di ni/_sngags pas 
[\[105b.4\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mgu ba'i mgo bor bsams la sbyin par bya ste 'di nyid de'i dam tshig yin no/_/des na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag po'i rdo rje 'di ni mchog tu srung bar byed pa dang /_bstan pa kun du bsrung ba dang /_de nyid 
[\[105b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yin pa dang /_bgegs thams cad phung bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i rdo rje sngags pas nam yang rnam pa thams cad du yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_zhi ba'i blo gros kyis byang 
[\[105b.6\]]chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lag na rdo rje sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas gang khyod kyis mchog tu gsang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa legs so legs so/_/ye shes rdo rje bla na med/_/bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/ye shes gzugs 
[\[105b.7\]]su gnas pa 'di/_/blun po rnams kyis mi shes so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bya chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros khyod la gsang chen bshad kyis/_zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis ma dad pa 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]su la yang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di ma bstan cig_/dam tshig 'di yang yongs su dag pa ma gtogs pa su la yang ma sbyin cig_/lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i tshe/_
[\[106a.2\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du don yod pa yang dag par bstan pa las/_
[\[106a.3\]]don nges par 'byung ba rnams kyi rtags su gyur pa/_rdo rje mchog las yang dag par byung ba'i phyag rgya rab 'byam dbyibs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par grub pa/_sems can gyi khams bsam pa tha dad pa rnams ci lta ba bzhin du yang dag par tshim par byed pa/_'gro ba tha dad 
[\[106a.4\]]pa rnams dang /_rigs dang /_skye gnas dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs tha dad pa rnams dang /_spyod pa tha dad pa rnams dang /_bsam pa tha dad pa rnams dang /_tshul dang nges pa'i tshig brjod pa tha dad pa rnams dang /_tshig gi lam tha dad pa rnams su sna tshogs kyis spras 
[\[106a.5\]]pa'i lus kyi dbyibs dag mngon par sprul nas/_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam mtha' yas pa nges par bstan pa rnams su lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mnyam pa nyid la nges par sbyor bar byed pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par bskyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems 
[\[106a.6\]]dpa'i mig 'phrul las yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyag rgya rab 'byam dag yod de/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du de dag kho bos khyod la bshad kyis nyon cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub 
[\[106a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus yin/_de'i tshod yin gyis/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi sgo'i phyag rgya rab 'byam bshad du gsol/_de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]gcig tu tshig smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na de'i dus lags de'i tshod lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms 
[\[106b.2\]]par zhugs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa'i phyag rgya rab 'byam smras pa/_thog mar lag pa gnyis snyim pa sbyar la srin lag 
[\[106b.3\]]gnyis nang du gzhug gung mo gnyis gshibs te gyen du bsgreng la/_mdzub mo gnyis tshigs gsum pa'i thad ka nas gang tsam gyis ma reg tsam du gzhag_/mthe'u chung gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis kyang de la phyogs par gyen du bsgreng ngo /_/'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag 
[\[106b.4\]]rgya ste sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te sa ma ya badzra hUM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ya mtshan gyis spyan rgyas par gyur nas/_drang srong chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi dam tshig 'di ni ngo mtshar to/_/
[\[106b.5\]]de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang /_/rang rgyal gang dag 'jig rten na/_/gnyis med bse ru lta bu dang /_/tshangs pa la sogs 'phrul po che/_/'jig rten lha rnams gang yin dang /_/gang gzhan gnod sbyin dri za dang /_/mkha' lding mi'am ci la sogs/_/srin po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[106b.6\]]gnon po dang /_/grib gnon brjed byed grags pa rnams/_/de dag kun gyis tshig smras pa/_/dam tshig dam pa ngo mtshar to/_/sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig 'di las su 'da' ba/_/sdang sems ldan pa de dag gi/_/mgo bo dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/
[\[106b.7\]]sems can kun la phan byed pa/_/me lce phreng 'khrugs mi bzad pa'i/_/rdo rje rnams kyis rtag tu 'gems/_/dam tshig 'das pa nges par ni/_/ngan song 'gro la sogs par 'gyur/_/skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mi mnyes 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]byas/_/de dag dngos grub tshe 'di dang /_/tshe gzhan 'bras bur gyur 'dir med/_/gal te 'bras bu mchog 'dod na/_/de lta bas na rnam kun du/_/blo dang ldan pas bsgrims byas la/_/dam tshig 'di ni bsrung bar bya/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis de nyid du 
[\[107a.2\]]sbyar ba ni rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo gnyis myur du slar bkyed pa ni rdo rje dz+hi ga ra'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo gnyis bsegs su bkyed pa ni kun du brjod pa'i me'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du gzhug pa ni rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub 
[\[107a.3\]]mo gnyis bkug ste thur du bstan la mthe bo dang lhan cig gzhag pa ni rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis bkug la lhag ma de bzhin gzhag pa ni rdo rje dra ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo thams cad gcig tu kha bye ba la thug pa'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje ut+pa 
[\[107a.4\]]la'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje ut+pa la'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis kyis sor mo thams cad 'khyud la/_mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo'i drung du bzhar ba ni rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgya las mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo'i ngos la bzhar ba ni khro bo rdo rje kha'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje kha'i phyag rgya de 
[\[107a.5\]]nyid las mdzub mo gnyis nang logs su bcug la stod de gzhag pa ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo'i logs su yid tsam dgug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i phyag rgya'o/_/mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug la srin lag gnyis 
[\[107a.6\]]gshibs te gyen du bsgreng ba ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis bsnol mar 'khyud la lhag ma de bzhin du gzhag pa ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo 
[\[107a.7\]]gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis 'khyud la lhag ma de bzhin du gzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma mA ma kI'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis srin lag gi drung du bzhar ba ni rdo rje sgeg pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje sgeg pa'i phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkyed pa ni rdo rje me 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]tog gi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du bkug pa ste/_gung mo gnyis gshibs pa ni rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo rnams lan bu thabs su byas pa bzlog ste/_mdzub mo gnyis gshibs 
[\[107b.2\]]pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo g.yon gyis g.yas pa mnan la lhag ma snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis gshibs te bkyed la mthe bo gnyis de logs su phyogs par gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi phyag 
[\[107b.3\]]rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje sen mo can gyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang la mthe bo gnyis sbas pa ni rdo rje rigs mdzes ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis snying gar gshibs te mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug la lhag ma 
[\[107b.4\]]thams cad brkyang ba ni rdo rje bla re'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang nang du bkug pa ni rdo rje tog gi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mor gzhag la snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni rdo rje lag pa'i phyag rgya'o/_
[\[107b.5\]]de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka'i snyim pa sbyar te/_sor mo thams cad dril bu'i tshul du byas la srin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste bskyod pa ni rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni rdo rje rnga bo che'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag 
[\[107b.6\]]rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis bsgreng la mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug pa ni rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni 'khyud pa'i tshul du bya zhing mthe bo gnyis yid tsam bkug pa ni rdo rje be con gyi phyag rgya'o/_/'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni be 
[\[107b.7\]]con sngon po'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i ngos kyis drung du bkug ste bzhar ba ni rdo rje lus dmar gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la bskor ba'i tshul gyis gzir cing mthe bo bsgreng ba ni rdo rje kI li kI li'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]mthe bo gnyis nang du bkug la srin lag bsgreng ste/_tshigs gsum pa bkug pa dgug pa ni gzhon nu lag bzang gi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gshibs la tshigs gsum pa bkug pa ni gzhon nu rdo rje sde'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las 
[\[108a.2\]]gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng la lhag ma snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni gzhon nu rdo rje spyi gtsug gi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yon pa nang du bkug pa ni gzhon nu rdo rje dbu rgyan rtse bran gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo bkan la srin lag gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis 
[\[108a.3\]]bsgreng gung mo gnyis dbus su rtse mo dgug pa ni nad ku be ra'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug la srin lag gnyis thad kar brkyang ba ni khro bo zla ba'i thig le'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la smin mtshams su bzhag ste/_mdzub mo dang 
[\[108a.4\]]gung mo mig gi tshul du dpral bar sbyar ba ni rdo rje 'jigs 'jigs lta'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo gnyis gshibs pa la 'khyud pa ni kun du bzang po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis gdu bu'i 
[\[108a.5\]]tshul du khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste yid tsam bkug pa ni stobs po che be con gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis rtse sprad de zlum por byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo de nyid bsnol te sbyar ba ni rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las mdzub mo 
[\[108a.6\]]g.yon pa yid tsam dgug pa ni rdo rje yu ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis lag mthil du bkug la gung mo gnyis tshigs gsum pa bkug ste thur du bstan pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar 
[\[108a.7\]]ba la srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug ste/_mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo gnyis la 'khyud pa ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo thams cad bsdus la gung mo yid tsam brkyang ba ni rdo rje gtsug tor thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje mtshams kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo dang mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis kyi drung du bcar la lhag ma snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[108b.2\]]de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la khu tshur g.yon pa brdeg par gzas pa ltar bya zhing /_khu tshur g.yas pa brang la bcar te mdzub mos bsdigs pa ni mngon du gyur pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis ka bskor ba'i tshul du khu tshur bcangs la rkang pa brkyang la khu tshur bsnun thabs 
[\[108b.3\]]su gyen du bstod pa ni thub dka'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la/_mthe'u chung gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis nang du bkug pa ni rnam thos bu'i dbyug tho'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis zhags mig gi tshul du byas pa ni zhags pa ste nor rgyas kyi bu'i phyag 
[\[108b.4\]]rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis kyis sor mo thams cad 'khyud pa ni sa'i snying po'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis ral gri'i tshul du sbyar ba ni nam mkha'i snying po'i ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/_/ral gri'i phyag 
[\[108b.5\]]rgya las srin lag gnyis nang du bkug pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/ral gri'i phyag rgya de las mthe bo gnyis nang du bkug pa ni zhi ba'i blo gros kyi rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo bkan te srin lag gnyis bsgreng ba ni me tog gi 
[\[108b.6\]]phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis mthil du bcar ba ni byug spos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis gung mo gnyis la bcar ba ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis mthe'u chung gnyis kyis 'khyud pa ni mchod yon gyi 
[\[108b.7\]]phyag rgya'o/_/mthe bo gnyis brkyang ba ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o/_/mthe bo sbas te mdzub mo bskum pa ni gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka gcig tu sbyar la mthe bo dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te srin lag gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]rdo rje dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la mthe'u chung gnyis mthe bo la phyogs par bya ba ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya las mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng ba ni rdo rje smin ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje smin ma'i phyag rgya las mdzub 
[\[109a.2\]]mo gnyis mig gi tshul du bkug ste/_/gung mo'i ngos la bzhar ba ni rdo rje mig gi phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje mig gi phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje rna ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje rna ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo g.yon pa bkug pa ni rdo rje lte ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje lte ba'i phyag rgya las 
[\[109a.3\]]gung mo g.yas pa bkug ste g.yon pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje mkhur ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje mkhur ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rtse mo bkug la sbyar ba ni rdo rje rta babs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje rta babs kyi phyag rgya las mthe bo g.yon pa bsgreng la g.yas pa bkug pa ni 
[\[109a.4\]]rdo rje rked pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje rked pa'i phyag rgya las srin lag gnyis phye ste phyir bkyed pa ni rdo rje mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje mtshan gyi phyag rgya las srin lag gnyis yid tsam bkug la thur du bstan pa ni rdo rje brla'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje brla'i phyag rgya las srin lag g.yon 
[\[109a.5\]]pa yid tsam brkyang ba ni rdo rje byin pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje byin pa'i phyag rgya las srin lag g.yas pa brkyang ste g.yon pa nang du bkug pa ni rdo rje rkang pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis bsnol te rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du bcings la mdzub mo gnyis bsdigs pa'i tshul du gzhag pa ni rdo rje 
[\[109a.6\]]lag pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje lag pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo g.yon pa bkug pa ni bran po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni bran mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo g.yas pa phye ste brkyang ba ni pho nya thams 
[\[109a.7\]]cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo g.yon pa phye ste brkyang ba ni pho nya mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/snga ma bzhin du lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul du byas la/_mthe bo g.yon pa bsgreng ba ni phyag brnyan thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo g.yas 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]pa brkyang ba ni phyag brnyan ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kha phye la thug pa'i tshul du thal mo sbyar te spyi bor gzhag pa ni gzhon nu gtsug nas byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa la sbyar la mthe bo g.yas pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[109b.2\]]phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo g.yas zed g.yon pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje glu'i phyag rgya'o/_/snga ma bzhin du snyim par sbyar mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis bkug la mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin mo thams 
[\[109b.3\]]cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje dri za'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje dri za'i phyag rgya las srin lag g.yas pa bkug pa ni rdo rje lha ma yin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las srin lag g.yas pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid 
[\[109b.4\]]las mthe'u chung gnyis ka bkug pa ni rdo rje mi'am ci'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo g.yon pa bkug pa ni rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las brkyang ba ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis bkug pa ni rdo rje srin po'i phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[109b.5\]]de nyid las brkyang ba ni rdo rje srin mo'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis bkug pa ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las brkyang ba ni rdo rje gnon po'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rdo rje grib gnon gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de 
[\[109b.6\]]nyid brkyang ba ni rdo rje brjed byed kyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis snyim pa'i tshul du rgyab sbyar te/_sor mo thams cad slangs la mthe bo gnyis so so'i lag mthil du bzhar ba ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo g.yas pa rang gi gnas su gzhag pa ni 
[\[109b.7\]]skye ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du mthe bo g.yon pa rang bzhin gyi gnas su gzhag pa ni rga ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ba ni na ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi drung du mthe bo gnyis 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]gzhag pa ni dbul ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phye ste mthe bo gnyis dang sbyar ba ni rgud pa 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo g.yon pa la mthe bo g.yas pas 'khyud cing /_de bzhin du mdzub mo 
[\[110a.2\]]g.yas pa la mthe bo g.yon pas 'khyud pa ni 'chi ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng la srin lag dang mthe'u chung mdzub mos 'khyud de/_mthe bo gnyis de dag gi drung du gzhag pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[110a.3\]]kyi gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa sbyar la srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug ste gung mo gshibs la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste ngos la sbyar cing /_mthe bo gnyis de'i drung du gzhag pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi 
[\[110a.4\]]phyag rgya'o/_/gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni rig pa mchog gi rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis bsgreng ba ni rig pa'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste gung mo la nas gang tsam 
[\[110a.5\]]gyis ma reg par gzhag pa ni legs par grub byed kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la dril bu'i tshul du sor mo thams cad bkyed pa ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis pad+ma kha phye la thug pa'i tshul du byas pa ni gos 
[\[110a.6\]]dkar mo'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid cung zad khu phye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni mthu chen thob kyi phyag rgya'o/_/snga ma bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar ba gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung rnams nang du bkug ste mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te mthe bo gnyis de'i drung du sbyar ba ni 'phags ma 
[\[110a.7\]]sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis rgyab sprod du sbyar te/_phan tshun du 'khyud la sor mo rnams blas pa ltar byas te lcags sgrog gi tshul du bsdams pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o//_//'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba/_bam po 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]dgu pa/_de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[110b.2\]]cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dngos grub bsgrub pa la brtson pa rnams kyi don du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang rang gi phyag rgya rtags su gyur pa stsal bar bgyi ste/_des rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag myur ba nyid du dngos 
[\[110b.3\]]grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa khyod legs so legs so/_/rigs 
[\[110b.4\]]kyi bu dag de'i phyir rang rang gi phyag rgya rab 'byam dag smros shig_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas rang gi phyag rgya smras pa/_lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te sor mo gsum brkyang la mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis gcig tu sbyar bar bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi 
[\[110b.5\]]tshangs pa'i be con gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rang gi phyag rgya smras pa/_lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la srin lag dang mthe'u chung rnams nang du bcug ste/_gung mo gnyis gshibs la bsgreng zhing mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis de'i drung du gzhag par 
[\[110b.6\]]bgyi'o/_/'di ni bdag gi rdo rje'i phyag rgya lags te las thams cad kyi don bsgrub par bgyid pa'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis rang rang gi phyag rgya smras pa/_lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo gnyis bsgreng bar bgyi ste rnam thos kyi bu bdag nyid chen po can gyi dbyug tho'i 
[\[110b.7\]]phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis kyi steng du mdzub mo gnyis gzhag pa ni/_'phags skyes po'i be con gyi phyag rgya'o/_/be con gyi phyag rgya las mthe'u chung gnyis zhags pa'i tshul du bgyis pa ni yul 'khor srung gi zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/zhags 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bo gnyis nang du bkug la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni mig mi bzang gi rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nas lngas rtsen gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa la gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni lngas rtsen 
[\[111a.2\]]gyi mdung gi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang mdung gi tshul du bsgreng ba ni 'brog gnas kyi mdung rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya'o/_/snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ba ni lag pa brgyad pa'i tho ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[111a.3\]]du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la gung mo gnyis rgyab sbyar zhing mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/_de nyid kyi tshigs gsum pa la sbyar la mthe bo gnyis de gnyis kyi ngos la sbyar zhing sor mo lhag ma gshibs te gzhag pa ni rmugs byed 'dzin chu dbang gi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las 
[\[111a.4\]]mthe bo gnyis nang du bkug pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/mthe bo de nyid bsgreng ba ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i steng du gzhag pa ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis 
[\[111a.5\]]phye ste nang logs su sbyar ba ni dri za thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid nang du bkug pa ni rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid bsgreng zhing me lce'i tshul du phral la mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug pa ni lha ma yin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid 
[\[111a.6\]]las srin lag gnyis kyang phra la la lhag ma snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni srin po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pas gdong bkab la lag mthil du lces bldags pa ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyags rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar 
[\[111a.7\]]ba la sor mo thams cad bsnol te bsgreng ba ni lha ma yin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis thal mo bkan te dbyibs sgu bor bgyis pa ni klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis rgyab sbyar la mthe bo gnyis gcig gis gcig 'khyud 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]pa ni khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni bde byed kyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdung gi phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la lhag ma bsgreng ba ni dka' thub zlog gi rtse gsum 
[\[111b.2\]]gdengs pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gshibs te tshigs gsum bkug pa ni smin drug gi bu'i mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo tha mal bar bsgreng ba ni gshin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du khu tshur 
[\[111b.3\]]bcangs la mdzub mo brkyang ba ni drag po'i chung ma'i mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid pad+ma bzung ba'i tshul du bgyis la mthe bo'i rtse mor mdzub mo gzhag pa ni/_tshangs pa'i chung ma'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/mthe bo dang mthe'u chung sprad la/_lhag ma gsum ba dan gyi tshul du 
[\[111b.4\]]byas pa ni dbang po'i chung ma'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid las dril bu'i tshul du kha sbub pa ni mtshan mo nag mo'i dril bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni 'chi bdag tog gi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid khu tshur bcangs la mthe 
[\[111b.5\]]bo yid tsam sgu bor bsgreng ba ni phag gi chung ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid shugs kyi tshul du bsgreng ba ni tsa muN+Di'i mi thod kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la srin lag dang mthe bo gshibs pa ni grib gnon gyi gdon rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[111b.6\]]phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gshibs pa ni grib gnon ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung yang sbyar ba ni brjed byed kyi gdon gyi phyag rgya'o/_/yang der mdzub mo yang sbyar ba ni gnon po'i gdon rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u 
[\[111b.7\]]chung phyung ba ni byad kyi gdon gyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo tha mal par bsgreng ba ni tum bu ra'i dbyug tho'i phyag rgya'o zhes rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/_/de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs pa la mthe bo nang du bcug ste mdzub mo brkyang ba 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]ni rgyal ma'i mdung gi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la gung mo bsgreng ba ni rnam par rgyal ma'i ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la srin lag bsgreng ba ni mi pham rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung 
[\[112a.2\]]bsgreng ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te/_sor mo thams cad 'dab ma'i tshul du brkyang la mthe bo gnyis dbus su bsgreng ste mi 'gul bar gzhag pa ni nam mkha' lding gi rnam par 'dud kyi 'dab ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[112a.3\]]phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bsgreng ba ni klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya ci rigs par [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ste/_klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams so/_/lag pa gnyis ka'i ngos tshur bstan pa la glog rnam 
[\[112a.4\]]par gtor ba'i tshul gyis sor mo rnams rtse mo sprad de phyogs bzhir rnam par gtor ba ni glog thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka gcig tu sbyar la phreng ba'i tshul du gzhag pa ni dbyar gyi sprin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim 
[\[112a.5\]]par sbyar la gung mo gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni chu lha'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni zla ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bskyed pa ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug pa ni dbyangs can gyi phyag 
[\[112a.6\]]rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng ba ni chu klung chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la phral te lag pa g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa'i tshul du 'dug cing g.yas pa mi 'jigs 
[\[112a.7\]]pa sbyin pa'i tshul du gzhag pa ni me'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa ni oM zhes bya ba sngon du btang ba la bstan pa ni drang srong thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa gnyis ka bstod de mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung yid tsam bkug pa ni ri thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]lag pa gnyis ka sbyar la mthe bo gnyis bsnol te mdzub mo gnyis kyang bsnol ba ni khor yug chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/rnal 'byor gyi stan la 'dug nas blo dang ldan pas lag pa gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i tshul du lte ba'i thad kar gzhag pa ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa 
[\[112b.2\]]g.yas pa bstod de mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du byas pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa bkan te dam pa sbyin pa'i tshul du gzhag pa ni dam pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo brkyang ste dpral bar khro gnyer 
[\[112b.3\]]bcangs la gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di ni bdud skrag pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo dang srin lag bsgreng ste mthe bo de'i drung du gzhag pa ni spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te phan tshun bsnol la sor mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te 
[\[112b.4\]]mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng la bkug ste dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sbyar ba 'di ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo bsgreng la tshigs dang po bkug ste/_lhag ma rnams bsnol ba'i tshul du gzhag pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[112b.5\]]lcags kyu'i phyag rgya de las gung mo gnyis bkug ste de nyid la bcangs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag brkyang la lhag ma de bzhin du gzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lte ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung brkyang ste 
[\[112b.6\]]lhag ma de bzhin gzhag pa ni rked pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste nang du bcug la srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis yid tsam bkug ste gung mo gnyis gshibs pa 'di ni sbubs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 
[\[112b.7\]]'di nyid las srin lag gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba ni rdo rje mtshams chen po bcad pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las gung mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo brkyang ba ni bsrung ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni rdo rje kun du 'bar ba'i 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la sor mo thams cad brkyang ste mdzub mo gnyis ngos nas 'khyud pa ni rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis sbyar ba ni rdo rje lce'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub 
[\[113a.2\]]mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis bkug ste nang du sbyar la mthe bo gnyis bstod de yid tsam bkug la gung mo logs su phyogs par gzhag ste/_srin lag gnyis snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rdo rje zhal gyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug la bkug ste bstod de 
[\[113a.3\]]gzhag pa ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkyed de tshigs dang po bkug pa ni rdo rje so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa'i tshul du sbyar la mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug ste sbyar ba ni stobs bcu 
[\[113a.4\]]'dzin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las mthe bo gnyis rtse mo bkug ste sbyar ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis kyi steng du srin lag gnyis gzhag pa ni rdo rje ye shes thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las 
[\[113a.5\]]mdzub mo gnyis kyi drung du bkug ste gzhag pa ni byams pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la gung mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis 'khyud la mthe bo gnyis kyi steng du mdzub mo gnyis gzhag ste lhag ma snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag 
[\[113a.6\]]rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bkug ste srin lag de'i drung du bcar ba ni phyag brnyan ma thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo thams cad yid tsam bkug la gung mo bsgreng ba ni ut+pa la'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag 
[\[113a.7\]]pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgreng ste yid tsam sgu bor byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri so gcig pa yu ba can gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis tshigs dang po bkug pa ni nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]nyid las mthe bo gnyis bsnol ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid nang du bcug pa ni gos bkra gyon pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las 
[\[113b.2\]]gung mo gnyis bsnol ba'i tshul du gzhag pa ni spros pa med par gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis sbyar ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo dang srin lag bskyed pa ni sgra cher 
[\[113b.3\]]sgrogs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la sor mo rnams bsnol zhing zla ba'i tshul du byas la bsdams te mthe bo gnyis ngos la bzhar ba ni nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis phyung ste mthe bo gnyis dang rtse sprad pa ni stobs 
[\[113b.4\]]bcu las nges par 'byung pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis phyung ste mthe'u chung gnyis snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas pa rnam par gnon pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya las mthe bo gnyis lag mthil du gzhag pa ni ltad mo can gyi 
[\[113b.5\]]phyag rgya'o/_/mthe bo phyung ste mdzub mo'i drung du bcar ba ni spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo dang mthe bo sbyar ba ni blo brtan gyi rin po che'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di 
[\[113b.6\]]nyid las mthe bo dang srin lag rtse mo sprad la gung mo brkyang ba ni lag na phyag rgya rin po che'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung sbyar la mdzub mo bkug pa ni rtag tu brtson par gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la 
[\[113b.7\]]mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo mnan te mthe bo gnyis ngos la sbyar ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni cher bzhad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]mo brkyang ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyi 'od zer 'bar ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo gnyis la go cha'i tshul du 'khyud pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi go cha'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyi snyan gyi phyag 
[\[114a.2\]]rgya'o/_/mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug la g.yon pa brkyang ba ni 'di nyid kyi smin ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni 'di nyid kyi shangs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis la go cha'i tshul du 'khyud la yid tsam bkug ste mthe 
[\[114a.3\]]bo gnyis de'i drung du bcar ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las kha sbubs te smin mtshams su gzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du mdzub mo brkyang la mthe bo bstod de bkug pa ni bcom ldan 
[\[114a.4\]]'das kyi zhal gyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug la slar bsgreng ba ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste phyir bsgreng ba ni ljags kyi phyag rgya'o/_/'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gdub kor gyi tshul du ngos 
[\[114a.5\]]la sbyar ba ni mkhur ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug ste gung mo gnyis kyi drung du sbyar ba ni kosko'i phyag rgya'o/_/gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya las mthe'u chung gnyis bskyed de snying gar gzhag pa ni dpal be'u'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa 
[\[114a.6\]]gnyis snyim par sbyar ba'i tshul du sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gdub kor gyi tshul du gung mo gnyis kyi ngos la sbyar ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni lte ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/srin lag gnyis kyang nang du bcug pa ni bcom 
[\[114a.7\]]ldan 'das kyi gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis kyi nang du mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug la rdo rje'i tshul du gzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis snga ma bzhin 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]du gzhag pa la mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du ngos la gzhag pa ni rdo rje yan lag las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje yan lag las byung ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi drung du bcar la lhag ma snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[114b.2\]]du lag pa gnyis bsnol ba'i tshul gyis g.yon pa kha sbubs la g.yas pa bkan te/_mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis rtse mo sprad la sor mo lhag ma rnams mdung rtse gsum pa'i tshul du gzhag pa ni gnyis ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung dang mthe bo rdo rje 
[\[114b.3\]]bcings pa'i tshul du bcing ba ni rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgya ste mtshams bcad pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas g.yon gnyis ka bskum pa ni sa bcing ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo snga ma bzhin du brkyang ba la lag pa g.yas 
[\[114b.4\]]g.yon gnyis ka'i gung mo bkug pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo brkyang la srin lag g.yas pa bkug pa ni lus kun du 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/lus kun du 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya de las srin lag brkyang ste mdzub mo'i tshigs dang po 
[\[114b.5\]]bkug pa ni nam mkha' rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo yang lag mthil du phur bu'i tshul du gzhag pa ni phur bu rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phur bu rdo rje'i phyag rgya las sor mo thams cad bskum pa ni rdo rje bkra shis kyi phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje bkra 
[\[114b.6\]]shis kyi phyag rgya las sor mo thams cad bsgreng ste gzhag pa ni rdo rje bla re'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las sor mo'i bar phral te gzhag pa ni rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nyid las gtun shing gi tshul du gcig tu bsdus pa ni rdo rje gtun shing gi phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje gtun bu'i 
[\[114b.7\]]phyag rgya las lag pa g.yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug la mdzub mo be con gyi tshul du bsgreng ba ni rdo rje be con gyi phyag rgya'o/_/gung mo yang de nyid la sbyar te brkyang ba ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya las tshigs dang po bkug pa ni 'khor lo rdo rje'i 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]phyag rgya'o/_/'khor lo rdo rje'i phyag rgya las gung mo'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste sbyar ba ni rdo rje lcags mda'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje lcags mda'i phyag rgya las srin lag yang de nyid la sbyar ba ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya las gung 
[\[115a.2\]]mo bsgreng ste brkyang la de dag las gcig zhags pa'i tshul du bkug pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo gsum gcig tu bsdus pa ni rdo rje rus sbal gyi phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje rus sbal gyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo bsgreng ba ni lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 
[\[115a.3\]]'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las sor mo gnyis brkyang ste mdzub mo bskum pa ni stang stabs 'gugs pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te gung mo gnyis srin lag gnyis la 'khyud de mthe bo gnyis dang 
[\[115a.4\]]mdzub mo gnyis ngos la sbyar ba ni rdo rje gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las/_mthe'u chung gnyis ka brkyang nas su/_/mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng byas la/_/'di ni gtun shing rked nyag ste/_/kun du thogs pa med par 'dod/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis de'i drung 
[\[115a.5\]]du bkug pa ni rdo rje yan lag brgyan pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rdo rjes byin gyis 
[\[115a.6\]]brlabs pa rnams kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs sa sla ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa shes pa/_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyag rgya gsang chen yan lag dang yan lag las byung ba/_rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa rnams dang /_
[\[115a.7\]]sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang /_theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa rnams dang /_rdo rje 'chang gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams kyis mnyan pa'am/_gzung ba rnams kyis ma gtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang shes par mi nus na/_
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]gzhan 'jig rten pa mu stegs byed rnams kyis shes pa'am rnam par shes pa lta ci smos pa bshad par brtsams so/_/de nas rdo rje 'chang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i mig gnyis kyis rnam par bltas te rdo rje don yod pa'i 
[\[115b.2\]]dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zur tsam gyis go ba'i ye shes las byung ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byam zhes byas pa'i chos kyi sgo sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa sgrol bar byed pa yod do zhes smras 
[\[115b.3\]]nas/_/de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi bar nas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang ldan par byung ngo /_/de byung nas nam mkha'i khams kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa 'dun par 
[\[115b.4\]]byas nas/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can gyi khams byin gyis brlabs te/_slar yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bskor ba byas nas mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_sems 
[\[115b.5\]]dpa' chen po 'di ni dus so/_/'di ni tshod do/_/des na bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bsrung ba dang gzi brjid phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rdo rje 'chang 
[\[115b.6\]]gis gsang chen dang bcas pa'i yan lag gi phyag rgya smras pa/_mkhas pas dam tshig ces bya ba'i/_/phyag rgya thog mar bcings nas su/_/sangs rgyas snying po dran byas la/_/lag pa g.yas pa bsgul bar bya/_/oM rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni mi shes 
[\[115b.7\]]pa'i grong khyer 'jig par byed pa ste/_rdo rje ye shes rnam par dgod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/_/steng gi phyogs su yongs bskyod na/_/sdang ba rnams ni bskrad par 'gyur/_/skyod byed rnams kyang g.yo bar 'gyur/_/btsums kyi tshul du byas nas su/_/
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]lag pa g.yas pa bteg byas la/_/rnal 'byor pas ni mtshog mar gzhag_/kha zhes bya ba 'bar phreng can/_/thig le dang ni bcas par yang /_/spyi bo'i steng du gnas par bya/_/me lce phreng ldan kun du 'bar/_/phyogs bcu kun du lham me ba/_/gtsug tor phyag rgya 
[\[116a.2\]]phyag rgya che/_/gtsug tor steng na gnas pa yin/_/sngags la/_badzra ho kha~M swA hA/_lag pa de nyid mdzub bsgreng ste/_/bteg pa smin ma gnyis kar yang /_/sngags pas ha zhes bya ba ni/_/skyed gnyis dang ni ldan par gzhag_/sngags la/_badzra ho tu ma swA hA/_rdo rje smin ma'i phyag 
[\[116a.3\]]rgya'o/_/gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis su/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/ha zhes bya ba mig gnyis su/_/skyed gnyis dang ni ldan par gzhag_/sngags la/_badzra ho hrIHswA hA/_rdo rje mig gi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/ha zhes bya ba stobs ldan par/_/
[\[116a.4\]]mthe'u chung bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis su/_/rdo rje sna la gzhag par bya/_/sngags la/_badzra ho ha swA hA/_rdo rje sna'i phyag rgya'o/_/mthe'u chung bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis su/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/sngags pas rna ba gnyi gar yang /_/he zhes bya ba gzhag par bya/_/sngags la/_
[\[116a.5\]]badzra ha ho swA hA/_rdo rje rna ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/mthe bo bsgreng ste lag de nyid/_/bteg nas mkhur tshos gnyis kar yang /_/ha zhes bya ba skyed gnyis can/_/brtul zhugs can gyis gzhag par bya/_/sngags la/_badzra ho ho swA hA/_rdo rje mkhur ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags pas gung mo 
[\[116a.6\]]mtheb sbyar te/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/ha zhes bya ba skyed gnyis can/_/mchu gnyis su ni gzhag par bya/_/sngags la/_badzra ho hU~M swA hA/_rdo rje mchu'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags shes pas ni mtheb bsgreng ste/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/ha zhes bya ba thig le can/_/
[\[116a.7\]]lce yi gnas su gzhag bar bya/_/sngags la/_badzra ho ha~M swA hA/_rdo rje lce'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa bteg nas su/_/sngags pas nu ma jing gnyis kar yang /_/ra zhes bya ba gzhag bya ste/_/skyed gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o/_/sngags la/_badzra ha hor swA hA/_rdo rje 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]nu mjing gi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa de nyid ni/_/mgul pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya/_/ra zhes bya ba skyed gnyis can/_/mdzub mo rtse mos gzhag par bya/_/sngags la/_badzra ho hri swA hA/_dpal be'u rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/mkhas 
[\[116b.2\]]pas mchan khung phyogs su gzhag_/ra zhes bya ba'i thig le can/_/der ni legs par gzhag par bya/_/badzra ho ra ma swA hA/_rdo rje mchan khung phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/sor mo srin lag tshul gyis ni/_/ra gnyis rtseg dang bcas par yang /_/lag 
[\[116b.3\]]pa gnyi gar gzhag par bya/_/badzra ho rA rA swA hA/_rdo rje dge ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/sngags pas snying gi steng du ni/_/ra zhes bya ba rna ru can/_/ji lta bzhin du gzhag par bya/_/badzra ho ro swA hA/_rdo rje snying gi phyag rgya'o/_/lag g.yas dam pa sbyin byas 
[\[116b.4\]]la/_/mkhas pas sor mo mdzub mo yis/_/snying ga nas ni sor gnyis su/_/skyed gnyis ldan pa'i ba gzhag go/_/badzra ho b+ha swA hA/_rdo rje yan lag gi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid smad nas su/_/gung mo pa zhes bya ba gnyis/_/skyed gnyis dang ni ldan par yang /_/rtsib 
[\[116b.5\]]logs g.yon par gzhag par bya/_badzra ho b+hi bi swA hA/_rdo rje rtsib logs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/mkhas pas rtsib logs g.yas par ni/_/ba zhes bya ba'i thig le can/_/mthe'u chung sor mo gzhag par bya/_/sngags la/_badzra ho 
[\[116b.6\]]pa~M swA hA/_rtsib logs g.yas pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/mthe bo dang ni gung mo gnyis/_/ba zhes bya ba'i thig ler bcas/_/rna ru rtags can lte bar gzhag_/sngags la/_badzra ho baM swA hA/_rdo rje lte ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de 
[\[116b.7\]]nyid bteg nas su/_/lte ba'i 'og gi sor gnyis su/_/ba zhes bya ba'i thig le can/_/gnyis shig mdzub mo'i rtse mor gzhag_/sngags la/_badzra ho ba~M ba~M swA hA/_rdo rje zla ba sdug gi phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa de nyid bteg nas su/_/rked pa'i phyogs su blo ldan 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]gyis/_/sor mo gung mo'i tshul gyis su/_/skyed gnyis ldan pa'i ba gzhag go/_/sngags la/_badzra ho b+hau swA hA/_rdo rje rked pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa kha sbubs la/_/g.yas pa de'i steng du bkan te/_/lag pa gnyis bsnol mar sbyar la/_/mthe bo 
[\[117a.2\]]mthe chung phan tshun du/_/rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul byas te/_/mdzub mo bsgreng la g.yon rol nas sor mo thams cad kyis go bgo ba'i tshul du bskor ro/_/rdo rje go bgo ba'i phyag rgya ste/_sngags la/_badzra ha~M ha swA hA/_mthe bo gnyis ni phye nas su/_/g.yas logs su ni yongs su 'phang /_/
[\[117a.3\]]tshangs la sogs pa'i lha skrod na/_/sdang sems rnams lta smos ci dgos/_/rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes/_/rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyis gsungs/_/'di gzhag bya ba'i tshul gyis su/_/rgyal ba dam par 'gyur ba yin/_/sngags la/_badzra ho ba~M ba swA hA/_mdzub mo nang 
[\[117a.4\]]du bkug nas su/_/lhag ma snga ma bzhin du gzhag_/gung mo gyen du bsgreng byas la/_/'og gi sa la gzhag par bya/_/sngags la/_badzra ho haM swA hA/_rdo rje yan lag gi phyag rgya'o/_/'di dag thams cad shes nas su/_/rdo rje'i lus su sra bar 'gyur/_/bltas pas bgegs 
[\[117a.5\]]kyang zhir 'gyur na/_/pha rol gnod pa smos ci dgos/_/bltas pas nad rnams thams cad dang /_/sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed/_/phyag rgyar bcas te sngags brjod na/_/lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur/_/de nas slob ma brtag bya ste/_/cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis 
[\[117a.6\]]ni/_/yan lag thams cad mtshan ldan zhing /_/yan lag rdzogs la mthun pa bdam/_/mthong ba nyams dang zur lta dang /_/ma rungs pa dang mi'u thung spangs/_/bye brag tu ni lta ba brtag_/lta ba don kun sgrub par byed/_/drag dang 'jam dang bar ma dang /_/lta ba rnam pa gsum 
[\[117a.7\]]du gsungs/_/bskrad dang bsad dang de bzhin du/_/bskam dang phung bar bya ba dang /_/ma rungs ba dag dbang bya dang /_/tshar gcod pa ni drag por bstan/_/'jam por lta ba 'jam por byed/_/sems can thams cad dbang du byed/_/bsgrub pa rgya cher sems ldan zhing /_/'jam por lta 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]ba snyan par smra/_/snying rje dang ni thabs ldan zhing /_/byang chub sems dang 'jigs med pa/_/bdud kyi dpung ni stobs po che/_/ma thul thams cad 'dul byed na/_/bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang /_/sdang ba kun lta smos ci dgos/_/de lta bas na rnam kun du/_/
[\[117b.2\]]'jam por blta ba brtag par bya/_/mdza' dang dgra la sems snyoms shing /_/las su bya ba rnam spangs la/_/sngags pas bar mar gnas pa ni/_/gal te thabs la mkhas shig na/_/yid la bsams par gyur pa yis/_/dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/_/de lta 
[\[117b.3\]]bas na rnam kun du/_/lta ba 'di ni rnam par sbyar/_/gang zhig lta ba yongs dag cing /_/de bzhin yid kyang rnam dag pa/_/de la rdo rje ye shes phyir/_/brtul zhugs can gyis mchog tu bstan/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 
[\[117b.4\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar khyod kyis bshad pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar na/_bdag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' yid rnam par sbyang bar bya'o snyam byed do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces 
[\[117b.5\]]smras so/_/'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/yid rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'di khyod kyis legs par smras so/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir nyon cig dang /_gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[117b.6\]]gsang sngags rnams la gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par gyur pa'i yid rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sgo kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/'jam dpal de la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dkyil 'khor mthong ba/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/_yid snying rje dang 
[\[117b.7\]]ldan pa/_thabs la mkhas pa/_gsang sngags kyi sgo yi ge'i tshul bstan pa la mkhas pas 'di snyam du ngag ma gtogs par yid med/_yid ma gtogs par ngag med/_yid ma gtogs par lha'i gzugs med de/_yid nyid ngag yin la ngag nyid yid yin 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]zhing lha'i gzugs nyid kyang yid yin la/_ngag nyid kyang lha'i gzugs yin no snyam du bsam par bya'o/_/de ltar tha dad du bya ba med par mos na/_sngags pas yid rnam par dag pa thob bo/_/yid rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa de gang gi tshe/_rnam pa thams cad du rtag 
[\[118a.2\]]par bdag gi lus dang lha'i gzugs su/_bdag gi ngag dang lha'i ngag tu/_bdag gi yid dang lha'i yid du mtshungs par mthong ba de'i tshe mnyam par gzhag pa yin no/_/gang tshe kun du thams cad du/_/sngags pa mnyam par gzhag gyur na/_/de'i tshe lus la sogs pa yi/_/mnyam nyid 
[\[118a.3\]]gnas la zhugs par 'gyur/_/mnyam nyid gnas la gnas pa yi/_/yan lag bskyod pa ji snyed dang /_/tshig tu brjod pa ji snyed pa/_/de snyed gsang sngags phyag rgya yin/_/sngags pa kun du dgra med cing /_/rtag tu mi g.yo bde bar gnas/_/dbang phyug kun gyi go 'phang thob/_/
[\[118a.4\]]'dod pa 'byor ba'i gnas la gnas/_/de bsil yongs su gdung ba med/_/bzod dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims bsdams/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ji tsam du yid rnam par dag 
[\[118a.5\]]pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po ni rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa rnams la phan par gyur pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de 
[\[118a.6\]]bzhin du chos kyi sgo 'di yang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par gyur pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi sgo 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni gsang sngags kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i 
[\[118a.7\]]gnas la skal ba yod pa yin no/_/lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa ste/_de dag ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po la 'jug pa dang /_mnyan pa dang /_yang dag 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]par 'dzin pa'i skal ba yod pa dag go/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang dag yid rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson pa de dag ni phyag bgyi ba lags 
[\[118b.2\]]te/_bdag cag thams cad g.yog dang bcas 'khor dang bcas par 'dus nas gos dang zas rnams kyis de dag la bsti stang du bgyi/_bla mar bgyi/_ri mor bgyi/_mchod par bgyi'o/_/grong na gnas kyang rung /_dgon par gnas kyang rung ste gnod pa thams cad kyang bzlog par 
[\[118b.3\]]bgyi'o/_/phan pa rnams nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson pa de dag gi re ba thams cad ji tsam du yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis pa de srid du bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[118b.4\]]par sangs rgyas par mi bgyi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so legs so/_/grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_gang gi lag na yid rnam par dag pa'i sgo gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[118b.5\]]rnams kyi byang chub bo/_/'di lta ste gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 'dzin pa la bsti stang du bya ri mor bya ste 'di nyid bya ba'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags 
[\[118b.6\]]kyi sgo spyod pa rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/_rnam par dag pa mtha' yas pa'i gnas kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smras pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba b+ha ya b+hi kha te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hU~M tsa pa li ni ka_/ke ka rak+Sha rak+Sha dA ke b+h+ya daR+ma/_Sha tA~M gi tsaN+Do li 
[\[118b.7\]]Sha pa do li tirat+na ha ma ba yi ni ma ni sam ma ma hA ya na si swA hA/_chos smra ba gang la la zhig gis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par byas na/_de la 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te gung mo gnyis bkug la nang du bcug 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]pa ni byang chub kyi snying po gnon pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis kyi tshigs dang po bkug pa ni bdud yang dag par bskul ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis slar phyung ste/_snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni bdud kyi 
[\[119a.2\]]dpung skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis gshibs te mthe bo gnyis bkug la nang du bcug pa ni bdud kyi sde rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis phyung la mdzub mo gnyis bkug la nang du bcug pa ni bdud 'dul ba'i phyag 
[\[119a.3\]]rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA he he swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo g.yon pas mthe bo g.yas pa mnan pa ni gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hi swA hA/_
[\[119a.4\]]phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pas mthe bo g.yon pa mnan pa ni srin po thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA te he re Te swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis lag pa g.yas pa'i 
[\[119a.5\]]mthil du brud pa ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA he rang+gi Ni he he swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las snyim pa'i tshul du byas pa ni mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis dung gi tshul du byas pa ni 
[\[119a.6\]]rdo rje dung gi phyag rgya ste klu thams cad kyi snying rnam par 'joms pa'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dzaM gi ri phut+ta re re swA hA/_de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la gung mo gnyis bsnol ba ni/_gnod sbyin thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags 
[\[119a.7\]]la/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dziM gi ri Ni hU~M na de ke swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug la gung mo gnyis snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni dri za tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH_/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]he ri ge b+h+yaHswA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis 'khyud pa'i tshul du byas pa ni lha ma yin nges par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis 'khyud la bsgreng ste/_sor mo lhag 
[\[119b.2\]]ma rnams brkyang ba ni nam mkha' lding thams cad bran bzhin las ci yang byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ha ri ping+go li mu khi swA hA/_de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la lag pa g.yon pa bkan te g.yas pa kha sbubs la srin lag gis lag pa 
[\[119b.3\]]g.yon pa mthil du reg par byas pa ni mi 'am ci tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dza ya dza ya ni swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mos lag pa de nyid kyi mthil du reg par byas pa ni lto 'phye chen po tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[119b.4\]]sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ga ra li ni hU~M ka ri Ni swA hA/_de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la lag pa gnyis bsnol ba ni sdang ba thams cad dgag pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA he tsaN+Di 
[\[119b.5\]]he ri bi ke swA hA/_lag pa de nyid sor mo rnams gcig gis gcig 'khyud la lag pa gnyis snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni srin po thams cad kyi snying tshig par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA keng ka ri Ni dz+ha~M ka ri Ni ke swA hA/_phyag 
[\[119b.6\]]rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis yid tsam bkug pa 'di ni srin po thams cad kyi snying rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA kar na dzi te bi kha la mu ki swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phye ste mthe bo snga ma bzhin 
[\[119b.7\]]gzhag pa ni sha za 'dul ba'i phyag rgya ste rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis rtag tu gsungs so/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA mi tsi swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis phye la mdzub mo gnyis snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni sha za mo thams 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]cad kyi snying rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA pi shA tsi ni swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis kyang phye ste/_gung mo gnyis snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni 'byung po thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[120a.2\]]sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA gu~M gu~M swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis kyang phye la srin lag gnyis snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni 'byung po thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA gu mi gu 
[\[120a.3\]]mi hi li ge swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo g.yon pa brkyang la lhag ma snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni grib gnon thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tshA yA li swA hA/_de bzhin du mthe bo g.yon pa brkyang la lag 
[\[120a.4\]]pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni grib gnon thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dzo la ni dza ti ke swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phye ste bsnol ba'i tshul du bkug la mthe bo gnyis kyi steng 
[\[120a.5\]]du gzhag pa ni brjed byed thams cad gzhig pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA la~M bod ra NI b+h+ri b+h+ri shi ni swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las sor mo thams cad phye ste bsgreng ba ni brjed byed ma thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_
[\[120a.6\]]na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA be rat+ni u lka mu gi tsi phu ri re swA hA/_de bzhin du sor mo thams cad bkug ste nang du bcug la/_mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ste de ltar byas pa 'di ni byad rnams kyi snying skam pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[120a.7\]]mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA khi khi ri hr-i da ya bi dA ra Ni swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis bkug ste nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba 'di ni byad thams cad kyi snying kun du sbyar ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bis ri Ni swA hA/_de 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]nas yang lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_rdo rje ye shes las mngon par 'byung ba rnams kyi don du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po las byung ba'i phyag rgya gsang ba rab 'byam bstan 
[\[120b.2\]]pa'i sgo smras pa/_thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas te/_byang chub kyi sems mngon du byas la/_/byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i mig gis sems can gyi khams khyab par byas te/_spos kyis lag pa bskus la kha shar phyogs sam/_byang phyogs su bltas te 
[\[120b.3\]]phyag rgya legs par bcing bar bya'o/_/lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la bstod de gzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog gi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tri rat+na niR+dzA ta hU~M hU~M swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis 
[\[120b.4\]]bkug ste ngos la bcar ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa me tog kun du rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ba swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du bkug ste gung mo'i ngos kyi thad 
[\[120b.5\]]kar gzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA a mi tod+b+ha be/_dz+nyA na pa ri Ni swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste 'di nyid kyi rtse mo gung mo la reg par byas pa ni mi 'khrugs 
[\[120b.6\]]pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA b+hi ga da dz+wA dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ba swA hA/_lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/_mdzub mo gnyis kyis mthe bo gnyis la 'khyud pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags 
[\[120b.7\]]la/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ka na bi tsu ti ta dz+nyA no da ya swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dz+nyA na shi khi saM b+ha ba swA hA/_de bzhin du snga ma ltar khu tshur bcangs la srin lag gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob kyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bi shud+d+ha ga ta dz+nyA na bi de swA hA/_
[\[121a.2\]]snga ma bzhin du de ltar khu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel gyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dzi ma swA hA/_de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo gnyis dang mdzub mo 
[\[121a.3\]]gnyis nang du bkug pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dbu'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA kha tra mi swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis phyung ste gshibs la bsgreng ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur 
[\[121a.4\]]ba chen po'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dzAM/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phyung ste tshigs dang po bkug pa de nyid la sbyar ba ni spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_
[\[121a.5\]]sarba thA dri/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis yid tsam bkug la mdzub mo gnyis la phyogs par byas te/_lhag ma snga ma bzhin gzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA a~M/_snga ma 
[\[121a.6\]]bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis phyir bkyed de brkyang la tshigs dang po bkug cing mthe bo gnyis phyir bkyed de brkyang ba ni bcom ldan 'das dpal be'u'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA shrIH/_phyag rgya 
[\[121a.7\]]'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bkyed de brkyang la mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi lte ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hriM/_snga ma bzhin du lag pa gnyi ga khu tshur bcangs la/_mthe'u chung gnyis 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]phyung ste bkyed pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hra~M/_'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste dgos pa'i don thams cad sgrub bo/_/gang zhig nang gi dag pa yis/_/
[\[121b.2\]]phyag rgya 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/_/sngags pa 'di ni sdig bral bar/_/'gyur te 'di la the tsom med/_/rdo rje 'chang rnams thams cad dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/_/rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha kun yang /_/blo dang ldan pa de la bsrung /_/de lta bas na rnam kun du/_/bdag 
[\[121b.3\]]nyid che la gus par bya/_/rig sngags rtag tu bzlas byas na/_/de la dngos grub mi dka'o/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa'i sngags/_/tshe 'di la ni grub par 'gyur/_/'jig rten sngags rnams gang yin pa/_/de dag de yi dbang 'gyur te/_/bsgo ba ci zhig gyis shig 
[\[121b.4\]]ces/_/de yi g.yas g.yon 'khor bar 'gyur/_/mi min lha yi sman rnams kyang /_/de yi dbang du gyur cing 'khod/_/sngags pas sngags kyi tshul gnas nas/_/gang tshe lus ni 'dor 'gyur na/_/dbang sgyur gyi ni gnas mchog tu/_/de tshe de ni skye bar 'gyur/_/gang 
[\[121b.5\]]na dbang ldan bcom ldan 'das/_/rnam par snang mdzad che bzhugs par/_/rgyal ba'i sras po 'dod pa bzhin/_/skye bdag ni 'dzin par 'gyur/_/ji srid byang chub gyur gyi bar/_/de yi spyod pa nyams mi 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'chang rnams thams cad kyis/_/thams 
[\[121b.6\]]cad du ni byin gyis brlabs/_/de bzhin du lag pa gnyi ga sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste/_mdzub mo gnyis tshigs dang po bkug la gung mo gnyis gshibs pa la nas gang gis ma reg pa tsam du gzhag cing /_mthe bo gnyis de'i drung du gzhag pa ni rdo rje drag po 
[\[121b.7\]]chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/_phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pas gung mo bsgreng ba la 'khyud pa 'di ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i mgo'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ma~M/_mdzub mo g.yon pas gung mo bsgreng ba la 'khyud pas mdzub mo g.yas pa phye ste/_snga ma bzhin du tshigs dang po bkug ste gzhag pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba
