[\[122a.2\]]mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA dzI/_de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo bsgreng ba la 'khyud pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i go cha'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA A/_de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis phye la glog 'gyu ba'i thabs su brkyang ba ni 
[\[122a.3\]]rdo rje drag po'i rdo rje me lce 'bar ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA k+sha~M/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug ste mthe bo'i drung du gzhag pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i dpral ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta 
[\[122a.4\]]thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ni la~M ba ti ka ti swA hA/_de bzhin du mdzub mo g.yon pa'i mthe bo'i drung du gzhag la gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs dang po bkug ste yid tsam smad pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i nu ma jing gi phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu 
[\[122a.5\]]khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ha sa ha sa/_d+ha ka d+ha ka_/tsa ra tsa ra/_ha~M pra tsaN+Da padzra swA hA/_de bzhin du nu mjing gi phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste bkyed la brkyang zhing mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i dpal be'u'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga 
[\[122a.6\]]te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA pi phu la badzra tsaN+Da swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung phyung ste snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i rkang pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA bi tsi tra ga ti swA hA/_de ltar phyag rgya rab 
[\[122a.7\]]'byam 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam pa sna tshogs su gnas pa/_'jig rten gyi khams du mar sems can gyi khams du ma rnam par sbyor bar byed pa/_dus gsum la ni stobs thogs pa med pa/_chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa las byung ba/_
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba gcod par byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[122b.2\]]rtogs pa thob par byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bkod pa bstan pa'i rnam par gnas par byed pa/_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa sgrub par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[122b.3\]]pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig tu gyur pa sha stag go/_/lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa bstan pa dang cho 
[\[122b.4\]]'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas las phyag rgya rab 'byam ji snyed pa'o//_//'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/_bam po bcu pa/_de nas yang lag na rdo rjes bdud thams cad pham par byed pa/_bkod pa rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[122b.5\]]zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_lag na rdo rje'i mgo la byugs nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sems can kun la phan byed pa/_/dpa' 
[\[122b.6\]]bo chen po legs so legs/_/gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi/_/rdo rje stang stabs ched kyi phyir/_/sdang ba'i sems can 'jigs byed pa/_/ting 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs/_/rdo rje stang stabs cho ga'i rim/_/sems can chen po khyod kyis ston/_/rdo rje 
[\[122b.7\]]'byung ba'i rkang stabs ni/_/sngags rgyal rnams kyi spyi yin te/_/'dug pa dang ni 'gro ba dang /_/ldang dang rnam par gtor ba dang /_/dgug pa dang ni brkyang ba dang /_/rkang pas bcing dang bskum pa dang /_/spo ba dang ni gzhag pa dang /_/khu tshur bcangs pas gzung ba dang /_/
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]gzir dang rdo rjes gzhom pa dang /_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas phur btab dang /_/seng ge lta bur mchong ba dang /_/hUM zhes bya bas bsdigs pa dang /_/snyan las langs nas mchu gnon dang /_/khro gnyer dpral bar blta ba dang /_/smin ma bskyod par bya ba dang /_/de 
[\[123a.2\]]bzhin mig gnyis bgrad pa dang /_/rkang stabs rnam par dbye ba dang /_/lag gnyis sbyar bar bya ba dang /_/de bzhin lag pa bskyod pa dang /_/rkang pa gnyis kyis mchong ba dang /_/lus ni bsnyems dang bcas par yang /_/bye brag tu ni ston pa dang /_/bcad dang gtub dang 
[\[123a.3\]]bgad pa dang /_/bza' dang rnam par bgad pa dang /_/kun du sgra dang rnam sgra dang /_/drag tu byed dang bcing ba dang /_/sdang ba thams cad tshar bcad dang /_/rengs par bya dang rmongs bya dang /_/gyen du mchong dang bsnun pa dang /_/mdzes pa'i stabs dang gtsub pa dang /_/bsgrub 
[\[123a.4\]]pa'i dang por sngar spyad dang /_/de bzhin lha la bsnyen bya dang /_/sngags pa yis ni dkyil 'khor dang /_/dngos grub ci 'dra yin pa dang /_/sems can khams la rnam kun du/_/bsrung dang sba ba bya ba dang /_/dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad dang /_/gzhan yang yid la ci 'dod dang /_/
[\[123a.5\]]sdang sems ldan pa de dag la/_/de bzhin phyir gso bya ba dang /_/'di dag thams cad rgya cher ni/_/sems can thar bar 'dod pas smros/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rkang stabs kyi thabs kyis rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di lta bu gsungs so/_/namaH
[\[123a.6\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hUM hUM hUM/_phaT phaT phaT/_tsaN+Da badzra pra dz+wa li ta mU rti swA hA/_de nas lag na rdo rjes gsang sngags 'di thos nas dga' zhing mgu la/_rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la rnam par bltas nas smras pa/_kye 
[\[123a.7\]]grogs po dag nyon cig_/sems can gang la la dag sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su dong ba rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod cing /_gsang sngags kyi tshul la brtson pa de dag la ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_deng phyin cad bsrung bar gyis shig_/bsti stang du gyis shig_/ri mor gyis shig_/mchod pa gyis shig_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_chos kyi rjes bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes brjod nas cang mi smra 
[\[123b.2\]]bar 'khod do/_/de nas lag na rdo rjes yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag gang la la zhig ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la bsrung ba bsgrub par brtson pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[123b.3\]]pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam tshig las 'gal bar byed na/_rig pa'i rgyal po drag pos rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun du mched cing rab tu 'bar bas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[123b.4\]]chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhi ba'i blo gros stang stabs kyi mtshan nyid sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/de bzhin gshegs la phyag 
[\[123b.5\]]byas nas/_/sngags pas shar phyogs kha bltas te/_/'greng la thal mo mtshog mar gzhag_/gsang sngags lta bur 'jo mchog gis/_/rdo rje stangs tshul gar byed cing /_/mtshog nas thal mo phab nas su/_/snying gar gzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[123b.6\]]kun du bskor bar bya/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su/_/lag pa g.yas pa bteg byas la/_/g.yon pa rked pa'i rgyab tu gzhag_/rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/_/g.yas pa bskum par legs par sbyar/_/g.yon pa mtshog mar bstod nas su/_/sdang ba 
[\[123b.7\]]kun la bsdigs par bya/_/rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang bya zhing /_/gnyi ga rdo rje khu tshur bcangs/_/khros bcas hUM zhes bya bas bsgyings/_/rdo rje bsnun pas bsnun par bya/_/rdo rje gar gyis bsgyur nas su/_/rkang pa g.yon pa bskum byas la/_/de ltar phyogs bzhi rnams 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]su yang /_/rdo rje'i gnon 'gros gnon par bya/_/rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/_/rked pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya/_/rting sprad gnas la gnas nas su/_/mig ni thur du blta bar bya/_/rdo rje phur bus btab nas ni/_/sa 'og rnam bdun g.yo bar 'gyur/_/'brug 
[\[124a.2\]]sgra dal 'dra'i hUM ldan zhing /_/rab 'bar rdo rje 'chang 'dra bar/_/rdo rje gyen du 'gyed par bya/_/rgyab tu thal mo sbyar bar bya/_/de nas rdo rje gar bya zhing /_/lte ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya/_/'di 'dra'i gnas la gnas nas su/_/myur 'gro la shin tu bslabs pas bzhag_/sangs 
[\[124a.3\]]rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/khro bo phyag brnyan bran mo yi/_/mtshon cha'i phyag rgya ji snyed pa/_/rdo rje be con dbyug tho dang /_/mdung thung mda' chen 'khor lo dang /_/rdo rje rtse gcig gtun shing sogs/_/pho nya pho smos gang yin dang /_/bgegs la sogs pa rnam par zlog_/
[\[124a.4\]]phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan gang gsungs pa/_/bgegs rnams gzhig par bya ba'i phyir/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan rnams kyis/_/spyi yi cho ga rgyas par ni/_/bslabs pa'i sngags pas lhar bcas dang /_/lha min gsang ba kun du gzhom/_/dkyil 'khor la ni bgegs 
[\[124a.5\]]bya'i phyir/_/tshangs pa'i sdong bur thug pa nas/_/sa steng gnas pa'i lha yi bar/_/gcig tu 'dus nas lhags gyur kyang /_/stang stabs cho ga shes pa yi/_/sngags pas hUM zhes bya ba yis/_/thams cad rnam par gtor 'gyur te/_/shing bal 'dab ma rlung gtor bzhin/_/
[\[124a.6\]]rdo rje 'bar ba'i mer gyur nas/_/bskal pa'i me 'drar langs nas su/_/rdo rje rkang pa ldan par ni/_/rdo rje phyag rgyas kun du gzhom/_/rdo rjes gnon dang ldan par ni/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom nas su/_/sngags pas sa gsum phung byed na/_/bgegs dang log 'dren smos ci dgos/_/chen 
[\[124a.7\]]po'i rdo rje phyag rgya yi/_/stang stabs 'di ni spyi yin te/_/bsgrub min don kyang sgrub byed na/_/cho ga zhib las byung ci smos/_/rdo rje 'byung ba dam pa ni/_/thog mar bcing ba byas nas su/_/de nas rdo rje mchog rig las/_/'byung ba gzhan yang bcing bar bya/_/'di las gsang 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]sngags rnams dang ni/_/stang stabs rnam pa thams cad 'byung /_/de lta bas na rnam kun du/_/sngags pas bsgrims te bslab par bya/_/dam tshig chen po rdo rje 'byung ba'i rtsa ba'i stang stabs so/_/rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/_/seng ge bzhin du pha rol gnon/_/rdo rje phyag rgyas 
[\[124b.2\]]kun du gzhom/_/rdo rje rkang pa brkyang bar bya/_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing /_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom nas su/_/sa rnams kun kyang g.yo 'gyur na/_/gsang dang klu rnams smos ci dgos/_/seng ge'i tshul du mchongs nas ni/_/bgegs gang seng ge'i gzugs 'dra dang /_/
[\[124b.3\]]glang chen shing rta spre'u dang rta/_/gzhan yang gang dag rkang bzhi pa/_/de nas rnam par 'bros pa'am/_/'chi bar 'gyur te the tsom med/_/tshangs pas byas pa'i bgegs rnams kyang /_/skad cig de la myur du 'jig_/seng ge ltar pha rol gnon pa'i stang stabs so/_/
[\[124b.4\]]rdo rje 'byung bar yang 'dug ste/_/rkang pa bsnol ba'i tshul gyis su/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyi ga ni/_/rked pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya/_/hUM brjod mgul pa bsal ba'i sgras/_/rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing /_/rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas ni/_/de yi rtse mo sar btsugs la/_/
[\[124b.5\]]rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas ni/_/lag pa rdo rje gsor bcas par/_/lag g.yon snying gar bzhag nas ni/_/sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i mer bsgyur nas/_/rdo rje'i nyi ma'i mig ldan par/_/rdo rje mgul pa bsal ba'i sgras/_/phyogs kun 
[\[124b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya/_/bgegs kyi gnas su dmigs nas ni/_/myur du rdo rje gom stabs kyis/_/rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas na ni/_/rdo rje phyag rgyas kun du gzhom/_/de bzhin phyogs dang mtshams rnams kyang /_/kun du yang dag gzhom par bya/_/bdud 
[\[124b.7\]]sde mi bzad chen po dang /_/phyogs rnams kun nas byung ba kun/_/g.yas brkyang gom pa'i stabs sbyar te/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kun du gzhom/_/sa gsum thams cad g.yo 'gyur na/_/bgegs dang log 'dren smos ci dgos/_/rdo rje phyag rgya bltas nas ni/_/
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang /_/mi bzad gzugs can srin po rnams/_/phyogs rnams kun du 'bros par 'gyur/_/rdo rje g.yas pa brkyang ba'o/_/rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/_/mtshog mar rdo rje thal sbyar to/_/rdo rjer bcas pa'i lag 
[\[125a.2\]]bskor zhing /_/sprin ltar yongs su khyab par bya/_/rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing /_/mchu ni so yis gnan par bya/_/khu tshur g.yon pa bteg par bya/_/g.yas pa snying gar gzhag par bya/_/rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas su/_/g.yas rol du ni gcu bar bya/_/'brug sgra 
[\[125a.3\]]dal 'dra'i hUM brjod pa/_/g.yon pa brkyang ba'i rkang gnon te/_/rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya/_/g.yas pas la gzug par bya/_/rdo rje rkang pa sa 'og tu/_/bsnun na thams cad g.yo bar byed/_/sa yi 'og na gnas pa'i klu/_/gsang dang lha min srin por bcas/_/thams 
[\[125a.4\]]cad g.yos pa 'di ci zhes/_/ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i sems gyur nas/_/ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i snying gis su/_/'di dag thams cad cir 'gyur kye/_/bskal pa zad par ma gyur grang /_/de skad phan tshun 'dri bar byed/_/gnas de nas ni yang bskyod nas/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig 
[\[125a.5\]]ldan par/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas hUM brjod de/_/rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya/_/klu dang gsang ba thams cad dang /_/gzhan yang gang dag sar gnas pa/_/gang na sngags 'chang 'dug pa yi/_/gnas der thams cad lhags nas su/_/lung ni yongs su nod byed cing /_/rdo 
[\[125a.6\]]rje 'bar bas rab nyen pas/_/jo bo ci zhig tshol cig pa/_/bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol/_/bcud kyis len tam dngul chu 'am/_/'on te mig bsku'i sman rdzas sam/_/gnod sbyin pho smos 'bangs su 'am/_/'on te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam/_/'on te dpal gyi 
[\[125a.7\]]sgo bzhed dam/_/'on te yul sa gzhan bzhed na/_/rdo rje 'bar bas gzir gyur pas/_/bzhed pa thams cad bskang bar bgyi/_/sngags pas 'ga' zhig blangs nas su/_/de dag la ni byams par bya/_/rdo rje gar ni legs bya zhing /_/phyag rgya de ni bsdu bar bya/_/
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis su/_/rdo rje gnas su gzhag par bya/_/gzhan du na ni gsang ba dang /_/srin po thams cad gnod byed de/_/glags lta klan ka tshol byed pa/_/gzir ba de dag gnod par byed/_/glags su gyur pa rtogs nas su/_/sngags pa la ni gnod par byed/_/de 
[\[125b.2\]]lta bas na rnam kun du/_/blo dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos/_/rdo rje'i gnas ni rig byas la/_/stang stabs bya ba sbyar bar bya/_/g.yon brkyang rkang pa'i stang stabs so/_/rdo rje'i 'byung bar 'dug nas su/_/dpral bar thal mo sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje gar ni byas nas su/_/thal mo snying 
[\[125b.3\]]gar gzhag par bya/_/tshangs pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/pad+ma'i thal mo rgyas par bya/_/gnyi ga khu tshur bcangs nas su/_/g.yas pa gyen du brkyang bar bya/_/g.yon pa snying gar bzhag nas su/_/hUM dang phaT bcas khros bsgyings shing /_/sos ni mchu yang mnan byas 
[\[125b.4\]]nas/_/rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan zhing /_/bzhin ni khro gnyer rim 'chas pas/_/gar byed pa yi tshul gyis ni/_/rkang pa g.yas pa dgug par bya/_/g.yon pa yang ni de bzhin dgug_/rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya/_/gyen du bltas na drag tu ni/_/
[\[125b.5\]]rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun par bya/_/rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun pas ni/_/tshangs pa bcas dang brgya byin bcas/_/gnas dang bcas pa thams cad 'gul/_/phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing /_/grogs dag bskal pa 'khrugs gyur tam/_/'on te sems can che byung ngam/_/'on te 
[\[125b.6\]]sangs rgyas byung gyur tam/_/ci zhes thams cad phan tshun smra/_/myos ches gyur nas phan tshun dang /_/phyogs bcu dag tu lta bar byed/_/rdo rje 'bar bas gzir bas na/_/gnas de nas ni dong nas su/_/rdo rje'i ldan pa ci bzhed pa/_/gsungs zhes lung ni nod par byed/_/bdag 
[\[125b.7\]]cag nongs pa ma mchis shing /_/bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid ma lags/_/rdo rje 'bar bas gzir gyur nas/_/bka' lung myur du bdag la stsol/_/rdo rje can gyis rdo rje la/_/mig mi 'dzums par rtag tu blta/_/lha phal gzhan rnams de dag kyang /_/rdo rje 'bar 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]bas brgya la gyur nas/_/rdo rje'i dam pa ldan pa la/_/thugs la ci dgongs blang mdzod dang /_/gal te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam/_/de bzhin mi dang lha bzhed dam/_/lha yi bu mo bsnyems pa dang /_/lha yi bde ba yid mthun bzhed/_/thugs la gang bzhed de dag 
[\[126a.2\]]rnams/_/de dag dbul bar bgyid par 'gyur/_/de nas lha mang rdzu 'phrul che/_/de dag yid ni rab dga' nas/_/rdo rje 'bar bas gzir ba dag_/sgrub pa po la myur du dbul/_/de nas byams pa'i sems kyis ni/_/sngags pas bltas nas gtang bar bya/_/gzhan du na ni gzir de dag_/
[\[126a.3\]]glags rnyed gnod pa byed par 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'byung bar yang 'dug ste/_/rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya/_/mtshog mar thal mo sbyar nas su/_/phyogs rnams kun du rgyas par bya/_/rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/_/g.yas pa bteg cing de bzhin g.yon/_/rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni/_/g.yas 
[\[126a.4\]]pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya/_/g.yon pa snying gar bzhag nas su/_/smin ma dgug cing bsgul bskyod de/_/mig gis bgegs la bltas byas na/_/hUM dang bcas pas rang bskul na/_/gal te tshangs pa nyid gyur tam/_/gal te khyab 'jug nyid gyur tam/_/drag po brgya byin 
[\[126a.5\]]nyid gyur yang /_/bltas pas myur du 'jigs par 'gyur/_/ci ste khyab 'jug drag po rnams/_/bdag gi dbang du gyur 'dod pas/_/kun du bskyod pa'i tshul gyis su/_/rdo rje nyi ma'i mig can gyis/_/rkang pa thabs sbyar tshul gyis su/_/rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun par bya/_/rdo 
[\[126a.6\]]rje phyag rgyas bsnun pas na/_/sa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yo/_/de nas brgya byin lha rnams dang /_/lha min srin po gsang ba pa/_/stan las nyams par bdag nyid kyis/_/ma shes shig ni brgyal bar 'gyur/_/de nas khyab 'jug drag po rnams/_/yid ni blong zhes 
[\[126a.7\]]gyur nas su/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor cher ldan pa/_/ga la ba der thal sbyar dong /_/bdag cag nongs pa ma mchis par/_/sngags kyis bdag cag shin tu gzir/_/gzir ba'i lha rnams de dag kun/_/stan las sems ni nyams par 'gyur/_/ci ltar ci bgyi bka' stsol 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]ces/_/lung la gus pas lta zhing 'khod/_/kun la byams pa byas nas su/_/snying la bsam pa gcig blangs na/_/de yi mod la de dag rnams/_/dga' zhing mgu nas sbyin par byed/_/sngags pa mnyam par bzhag nas su/_/de dag phyag rgya'i rgyal po btang /_/rkang pa spo 
[\[126b.2\]]ba'i tshul gyis su/_/rdo rje'i gnas su gzhag par bya/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje'i gnas ni rked nas gcod/_/rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/_/dbang po chen po'i gnas su brtan/_/mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas la/_/phyogs rnams kun du rgyas par bya/_/
[\[126b.3\]]rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcangs byas la/_/gar byed pa yi lag pa yis/_/bgegs kyi gzugs rnams bsdigs par bya/_/de bzhin g.yas dang g.yon gyis kyang /_/gnas nas song gi bar du bya/_/ci ste bgegs chen rab sdang ba/_/bsdigs nas 'gro bar 
[\[126b.4\]]mi byed na/_/rdo rje gom pa myur bor la/_/gyen du lag pa kun du bskyod/_/lag gnyis sa la brdabs nas su/_/'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod la/_/gsang sngags blo ldan rkang bskums te/_/rnam pa kun du lus bskor ro/_/de nas sdang ba'i tshul gyis su/_/rdo rje'i lag pa 
[\[126b.5\]]g.yas brkyang la/_/rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/_/g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni/_/re re tshangs pa'i byed byas la/_/'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM rnams dang /_/phaT rnams kyis ni rab bskul te/_/rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya 
[\[126b.6\]]yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gzir bar bya/_/bde gshegs go 'phang ma gtogs par/_/rdo rje can dang 'khor lo can/_/sangs rgyas sras po gang gzhan gyi/_/de yi lus la mi sems na/_/lha dang dri za gsang ba dang /_/gzhan yang gang dag klu rnams dang /_/shing 
[\[126b.7\]]bal 'dab ma rlung gtor bzhin/_/hUM brjod 'jigs 'gyur smos ci dgos/_/lha min srin po ma rungs pa/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]grul bum mngag gzhug dang /_/bdud dang bdud kyi pho nya rnams/_/'di ltar gyur pa ci zhig smos/_/byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag cing /_/snying rje 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]la yang mnyam bzhag nas/_/byang chub sems dran sngags pa yis/_/phyag rgya bsdu ba brtsam par bya/_/nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir/_/bgegs rnams la ni gnod mi bya/_/shin tu sdang bar rig nas su/_/gal te bgegs la gnod bya na/_/shin tu 
[\[127a.2\]]sdang ba drag rnams la/_/'jam des nyid du mi bya'o/_/gal te 'jam des nyid byas na/_/de yi mod la gnod pa byed/_/thog mar 'jam por sbyar par bya/_/lan gnyis tshe na dbye bar brtson/_/gsum tshe mchod yon thogs nas su/_/me tog snyim par gnas byas la/_/de nas 
[\[127a.3\]]bgegs la mchod par bya/_/'byung po kun phan gtor byin na/_/'di skad kyi ni tshig brjod de/_/bdag gis de ring khyod mchod kyis/_/song shig bgegs chen 'gro bar gyis/_/phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig_/khyod kyi stobs dang rtsal mthong ste/_/khyod ni bgegs kyang byed par 
[\[127a.4\]]nus/_/khyod ni lha yi sprul pa ste/_/khyod ni bgegs byed mi nus min/_/sngon cad mchod pa ma thob pa/_/de ring bdag gis mchod byas na/_/khyod kyis da ni mchod khyer la/_/bgegs kyi dbang po song zhes brjod/_/gal te 'dug kyang bgegs min na/_/de ni spyod pa bzang po 
[\[127a.5\]]yin/_/sngags pas mchod byas 'os kyang ni/_/ci ste bgegs ni yang byed na/_/phyogs bcu sangs rgyas dbang gyur pas/_/mi mchog rnams kyis mkhyen par gsol/_/bgegs la chad pas gcad slad du/_/sbyor ba bgyis kyang nongs ma mchis/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[127a.6\]]rnams dang sangs rgyas sras/_/byang chub sems dpa' pa rnams kyis/_/bka' dang bdag 'gal mi bgyid brjod/_/lha dang lha min gsang rnams dang /_/phyogs bcu kun gyi dri za dang /_/gza' dang mi 'am ci gang dag_/mgon po mgon po che rnams la/_/bgegs 
[\[127a.7\]]kyis gtses pa bsgrag par bya/_/gal te chung zhig bskyab ce na/_/myur du yongs su skyobs shig ces/_/bsgrags pa gang dag mnyan byas nas/_/bgegs byed zhi bar gyur na ni/_/de nas phyogs rnams thams cad kyi/_/lha rnams la ni mchod par bya/_/gal te de ltar 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]mi 'dug na/_/me tog thal mo mchod yon gyis/_/sangs rgyas la sogs rab bskul la/_/de la chad pas gcad par bya/_/drag po shin tu sdang sems can/_/bka' lung las ni 'gal byed cing /_/srog kyang shin tu 'phrog byed la/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi g.yol ba/_/
[\[127b.2\]]de la phan par shes nas su/_/bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/_/sems dmyal rnams su skye ba yi/_/sdug bsngal mang po 'dir 'gyur zhes/_/ji ltar sman pas sems can gyi/_/nad rnams gso bar byed pa bzhin/_/gzir bas bdag la nyes pa med/_/mkhas pas rnam par spangs ma 
[\[127b.3\]]yin/_/de ltar sems ni mnyam bzhag cing /_/snying rje yid dang ldan pa yis/_/byang chub sems ni brtan byas te/_/de la chad pas bcad pa brtsam/_/ji ltar sman pa mkhas pa yis/_/nyes te yal bar mi 'dor bzhin/_/thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa yang /_/mi 
[\[127b.4\]]byed mkhas na'ang nyes dang bcas/_/ji ltar sman pa mi mkhas pa/_/thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis/_/nad pa yal bar 'dor byed cing /_/gso ba'i cho ga mi byed pa/_/de bzhin shes dang bral ba yis/_/gal te gso bar brtson na yang /_/thabs dang shes rab bral ba 
[\[127b.5\]]la/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni bsngags mi mdzad/_/nad pa nad pa rnams la ni/_/sman pa ji ltar sman byin na/_/tsha dang kha dang bska ba yang /_/'jig rten smod par mi byed pa/_/de bzhin 'dul ba'i bye brag gis/_/ci rigs pa ni gso bar bya/_/sdang ba'i sems can 
[\[127b.6\]]rnams la ni/_/'phyas te sangs rgyas rnams mi smod/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/shin tu rmad byung rgyal ba byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/_/'gro ba'i chos ni 'di 'dra ste/_/shin tu sdang sems drag po yi/_/sems can thams cad de tshe 
[\[127b.7\]]byung /_/shin tu drag po mthong nas ni/_/'jam po nyid du mi sbyor ro/_/shes rab thabs kyi snying stobs can/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/_/snying rje'i snying stobs khros gyur pa/_/sems can rnams la phan byed pas/_/de nas pha rol gnon pa yis/_/sems 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]can khams ni du ma gnon/_/sdig med nan gyi stobs kyis su/_/thams cad dbang du dgod par bya/_/pha rol gnon pa'i rigs tshul gyis/_/ji ltar byang chub 'dod byas nas/_/sems can khams ni du ma dag_/thams cad dbang du dgod par byas/_/rdo rje 
[\[128a.2\]]slob dpon chen po yis/_/log 'dren bgegs rnams de ltar dgod/_/byang chub sems dran bsgom byas na/_/skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyir sngags pa che khros la/_/bskal pa'i me yi mthu lta bus/_/rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad 
[\[128a.3\]]gcad par bya/_/rkang pa'i tshul ni de nyid kyis/_/rdo rje gar gyis gar byas la/_/rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang zhes 'dor/_/rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas brten te/_/bsnun bya rked pa'i gnas su ni/_/ral gri shubs su zhugs par bya/_/mnan pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/
[\[128a.4\]]shugs kyis lag pa sar bsdams la/_/rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/_/ral gri phyung ba 'dra bar bzung /_/ral gri tshul du gzhug pa ni/_/mdzub mo gung mo gshib par bya/_/de nas lag pa g.yon pa yis/_/ral gri shubs su bya ba ni/_/mthe'u chung dang ni srin 
[\[128a.5\]]lag dang /_/mthe bos ral gri shubs su bya/_/de nas rkang pa g.yas pa yis/_/sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te/_/so yis mchu mnan khros byas la/_/rang gi rdo rje nyi 'bar bas/_/rkang pas mgo ni mnan byas la/_/lag pas ral gri phyung nas su/_/de ni rdo rje 
[\[128a.6\]]gom stabs kyis/_/gar gyi tshul du kun bskyod cing /_/rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par bya/_/rdo rje ldan des gang bcom pa/_/de yi srog la mi sems so/_/de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur/_/yang na 'chir 'gyur the tso ma med/_/brgya 
[\[128a.7\]]byin mtshungs pa'i bgegs zhig na'ang /_/de yi mod la brlag par 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon che/_/snying rje snying brtse sems ldan pas/_/ji ltar de yang skye bar 'gyur/_/de ltar de la snying brtser bya/_/rdo rje ral gri'i stang stabs so/_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon ches/_/
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]rdo rjes gtub par bya ba byas/_/rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis/_/gnod par sems pa thams cad gtub/_/rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/_/rdo rje mthu rtsal brtsam byas la/_/rkang pa bteg cing bzhag tshul gyis/_/rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya/_/'khor lo rgyas par bya rim gyis/_/
[\[128b.2\]]pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar byas la/_/rkang pa rnam par bzhag byas nas/_/sa la 'khor lo 'phang bar bya/_/rting sprad gnas su 'dug byas nas/_/'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de/_/thal mo brdab pa'i tshul gyis su/_/sa la 'khor los bsnun par bya/_/bzlog ste lan bur byas nas 
[\[128b.3\]]su/_/lag pa sbyor ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/'khor lo lta bur byas nas su/_/gyen du 'phangs la gzhig par bya/_/bkug ste rkang pas mgo mnan nas/_/bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya/_/'on tam rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/yang na shi 'gyur the tsom med/_/de ltar 
[\[128b.4\]]rim pa'i tshul 'di yis/_/bgegs rnams la ni gnod par bya/_/sdig pa'i gnod pa med par ni/_/bskul yang bde bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te rdo rje sems dpa' che/_/snying rje'i sems dang ldan 'gyur bas/_/bgegs la zhi bar bya 'dod na/_/cho ga 'di yi tshul du bya/_/
[\[128b.5\]]ba lang gi ni lci ba las/_/de 'dra ba yi gzugs byas la/_/sngags pas zhi ba'i sems kyis ni/_/sngags pas 'o mas bkrus nas su/_/mod la snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur/_/de ltar kun du bgegs rnams ni/_/kun la cho ga bzhin du bya/_/rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni/_/
[\[128b.6\]]gsang sngags rnams la'ang sbyar bya ste/_/gcad dang gnon pa byas pa dang /_/bkag pa dang ni bcings pa 'ang rung /_/gal te bsgrub par 'dod na ni/_/de nas snga ma kho bzhin du 'gyur/_/'on tam gsang sngags rnams la ni/_/bye brag tu ni spos kyis bya/_/ba ni ser mo'i 
[\[128b.7\]]'o ma'am/_/yang na mar gyi sbyin sreg bya/_/yang na brgya dang rtsa brgyad kyis/_/sbyin sreg gis ni kun zhir 'gyur/_/zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas par ro/_/drag shul spyod las gang yin pa/_/de ni khros pa brtsam par bya/_/ji ltar las 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]ni ci rigs par/_/gsang sngags rnams la sngags pas bya/_/gzhan du na ni mi bya ste/_/las kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'khor lo'i stang stabs so/_/rdo rje tshul gyis de nas kyang /_/rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su/_/mtshog mar thal mo sbyar 
[\[129a.2\]]nas de/_/rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya/_/rting sprad gnas kyi tshul gyis su/_/smin bsgyur rkang pas reg par bya/_/lag pa gnyi ga sa la byug_/de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang /_/yid kyis bskor ba'i tshul gyis so/_/rkang pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/_/lag gnyis rked pa'i gnas 
[\[129a.3\]]bzhag la/_/rdo rje bgad pa rab byed cing /_/lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng bar bya/_/rdo rje'i mdzub mos rab tu bsdigs/_/hUM brjod bsgyings dang bcas par bya/_/rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan pas/_/rdo rje'i mdzub mos bsdigs nas ni/_/bdud kyi dbang phyug bdag nyid kyang /_/bltas 
[\[129a.4\]]pas de ni mod la 'bros/_/bya rog bong rdo 'phen mthong bzhin/_/rdo rje bgad pa'o/_/de nas rdo rje sngags pa ches/_/rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su/_/mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su/_/lag pa bsnol te khu tshur bcang /_/mthe bo gyen du bsgreng byas la/_/gung mo gshibs te 
[\[129a.5\]]bsgreng bar bya/_/mdzub mo de gnyis zla ba bsgreng /_/rdo rje kha zhes brjod pa yin/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bteg par bya/_/g.yon pa gzugs shing de bzhin bya/_/rdo rje lce ni me ltar 'bar/_/rgod ma'i kha ltar mngon sum bya/_/'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de/_/kha yi thad kar 
[\[129a.6\]]gzhag par bya/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni thams cad kyi_/rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu 'thungs na/_/mig sngar snang bar gyur pa yi/_/sdang ba kun lta smos ci dgos/_/de ltar byas na phyogs bzhi po/_/kun nas 'byung ba thams cad skems/_/'tshub ma kun dang lce 'bab dang /_/sprin 
[\[129a.7\]]rnams kun nas 'du ba yang /_/rdo rje kha ni glal ba dang /_/gtor bas rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten du ni ltas byung ba/_/kun nas gnas grub gang yin pa/_/sngags pas rdo rje me lce yi/_/me lce ltar bsgyur de kun zhi/_/rdo rje kha yi phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]cad bza' bar bya/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya/_/rdo rje kha glal ba'i stang stabs so/_/de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor che/_/rdo rje ye shes bsgyur nas su/_/bgegs la gso ba byas nas ni/_/nyes pa yod pa ma yin no/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes 
[\[129b.2\]]las byung ba'i/_/rdo rje slob dpon gso byed pas/_/bdag 'drar bsngags pa de 'dra ste/_/sngags pa ci 'drar rgyal de bzhin/_/sems can kun la snying rje dang /_/byang chub sems ni brtan bya ste/_/thabs kyis dam pa thob 'gyur bas/_/rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad la/_/gzhan 
[\[129b.3\]]du na ni phyogs rnams na/_/bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bsngags mi 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dang bral ba ni/_/lha yi mchod 'os ma yin no/_/thabs dang shes rab bral 'gyur ba/_/rgyal ba'i sras po nyan thos dang /_/gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni/_/dka' thub 
[\[129b.4\]]gnas la gnas pa ste/_/bdag don phan pa'i sems ldan pas/_/de dag la ni bya ba med/_/thabs dang ye shes las byung ba'i/_/byang chub sems ni snying rje can/_/byang chub sems kyi shing rta dang /_/byams dang snying rje'i kha sgyur dang /_/sa dang pha rol phyin pa 
[\[129b.5\]]dang /_/bsdu ba bzhi yi rdo rje dang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sa dang /_/byang chub phyogs kyi rtsa lag la/_/brten nas sangs rgyas sras po rnams/_/sems can don dga'i rtse bas rtse/_/de ltar slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/thabs dang ye shes mkhas pa yis/_/sdang 
[\[129b.6\]]ba rnams ni thams cad kyi/_/sems ni rab tu gso bar bya/_/rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang /_/rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas ni/_/rkang pa mthun pa'i gnas bzhag ste/_/rdo rje thal mo gzhum byas la/_/rdo rje gar ni byas nas su/_/lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng /_/g.yon 
[\[129b.7\]]pa ko skor brten nas su/_/gung mo dang ni mdzub mo gshib/_/mthe'u chung mthe bo sgrad par bya/_/g.yas pa lha yi ba dan gsum/_/g.yas brkyang rkang par mnan nas su/_/rdo rje bgad pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/kye ma'o bdag nyid rdo rje can/_/bdag nyid du ni bdag gnas so/_/
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]hUM brjod ba snyems dang khros pa yis/_/rdo rje gar gyis gtang bar bya/_/phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rjes bsdigs/_/rdo rje bgad pas bsdigs pas na/_/lha dang lha min gsang bar bcas/_/dkyil 'khor tshe'am bsgrub pa'i tshe/_/bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'dzin 
[\[130a.2\]]gyis thog mar bcing /_/gtsug nas byung ba nyid kyang ni/_/bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum shes/_/bgegs rnams phan tshun smra byed cing /_/bsrung ba'i phyir ni de dag kun/_/lhan cig dkyil 'khor drung du dong /_/rdo rje stangs kyis bskul bas na/_/rdo rje 
[\[130a.3\]]slob dpon skal ba che/_/bsod nams tshogs ni bsags pa la/_/gzhan rnams thams cad phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje'i tshul gyis de na yang /_/rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/_/pad+ma thal mo sbyar nas su/_/phyogs rnams kun du rgyas par bya/_/g.yas pa brkyang ba'i stabs byas te/_/
[\[130a.4\]]skal pa'i me yi 'od 'dra bas/_/thal mo brdab pa'i tshul gyis su/_/khros pas lag pa brdab par bya/_/lag gnyis rdo rje tshul gyis su/_/mthe'u chung mthe bo sprad byas la/_/g.yon pa ko skor brten nas su/_/g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/_/AHhUM hUM hUM brjod 
[\[130a.5\]]de bskul ba yis/_/sngags pas kun du sgra yang brjod/_/rdo rje sgra ni byung ba na/_/sdang ba thams cad phung bar 'gyur/_/brgya byin tshangs dang zla ba sogs/_/rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gza' chen yang /_/thos pa tsam gyis kun g.yos te/_/kun du sgra yi sems kyang nyams/_/de tshe 
[\[130a.6\]]thal mo sbyar te 'dud/_/rdo rje sgra chen gang na bar/_/thams cad lhan cig lhags nas su/_/rdo rje sgra yis gzir 'gyur zhing /_/stan las sems ni nyams pas na/_/mnga' bdag sug las ci 'tshal ba/_/bdag cag myur du bka' stsol ces/_/sngags pa la ni lung yang 
[\[130a.7\]]nod/_/sngags pas bsams te gar byas na/_/lha rnams myur du grol bar 'gyur/_/de nas byams pa'i sems bskyed la/_/brtul zhugs can gyis phyag rgya dgrol/_/rdo rje kun du sgra'o/_/rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/_/rdo rje gar ni 'bar byas la/_/rdo rje thal 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]mo sbyar nas su/_/phyogs rnams kun du rgyas byas te/_/mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su/_/bsnol te khu tshur bcangs byas la/_/mthe bo gnyis ni gshibs te bsgreng /_/gung mo gnyis ni gshibs byas la/_/mdzub mo dbu ma'i tshigs bkug ste/_/gung mo gnyis 
[\[130b.2\]]la sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje kha ni byas pas na/_/sdang ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_/kha yi thad kar bzhag na ni/_/rdo rje sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bdag ni rdo rje chen po can/_/rdo rje ye shes stobs dang ldan/_/hri ha hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/_/rdo rje'i gom stabs tshul gyis ni/_/
[\[130b.3\]]rdo rje gnon po'i gom pa yis/_/bzhag dang 'degs pas 'gro byed cing /_/phyogs rnams bzhi por brjod par bya/_/rdo rje sgra 'byung bskul bas na/_/bgegs chen rnams dang grags rnams dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams kyang /_/de yi mdun du 'gro bar byed/_/rdo rje 
[\[130b.4\]]sgra yis bdag cag tshig_/rdo rje sgra yis bskul bas na/_/bdag cag rang gi gnas nas g.yos/_/rdo rje dbang po bka' myur stsol/_/gal te dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam/_/rgyal srid dngul chu mig bsku dang /_/kun nas gter rnams gzigs bzhed dam/_/bka' 
[\[130b.5\]]stsol cig ces de skad smra/_/dga' bas byin nas sgrub po la/_/phyag 'tshal mchod pa byas nas dong /_/rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang /_/rdo rje slob dpon mthu chen gyis/_/rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la/_/rdo rje can gyis phyag rgya bcing /_/rkang pa pus mor btsugs nas su/_/lag 
[\[130b.6\]]pa gnyis ni khu tshur bcang /_/gung mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas su/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni ngos la sbyar/_/g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su/_/myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis/_/'khrul 'khor kun las bsnun byas la/_/sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya/_/lha min gnod 
[\[130b.7\]]sbyin rgyal po dang /_/srin po rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyang /_/thams cad rang gi gnas nas g.yos/_/bskal pa zad dam ji snyam sems/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na/_/sems ni blong zhes gyur nas su/_/rdo rje ye shes cher ldan pa/_/ga la ba der nye bar dong /_/
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag tshig_/sngags pas dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam/_/'on te dngul chu bcud len bzhed/_/rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur stsol/_/smras nas kun gyis de mod la/_/yid la 'dod pa sbyin par byed/_/gal te lha dang lha min dang /_/gsang ba 
[\[131a.2\]]bkol bar 'dod na yang /_/'dod pas de dag lhags nas su/_/'dod pa bzhin du las byed do/_/lung dang 'gal bar byed pa da ga_/ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na/_/slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba bo/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs ldan pa/_/sos ni mchu mnan khros pa dang /_/me 'bar lta 
[\[131a.3\]]bur 'jigs rung bas/_/myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis/_/sa rnams kun la bsnun par bya/_/g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su/_/ji ste dam bcas mi 'ong na/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun par bya/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na/_/a la la zhes de skad smra/_/stan 
[\[131a.4\]]las lus kyang rab tu nyams/_/lus ni me yis rab tu 'bar/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po pa/_/ga la ba der nye bar dong /_/skal ba chen pos yongs su skyobs/_/bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol/_/klu dang gsang ba lha min rnams/_/'phral du bsgo ba'i lung bzhin 
[\[131a.5\]]byed/_/bsgo ba'i lung ni bsgrubs nas su/_/rang rang gi ni gnas su dong /_/de lta na ni lha dbang song /_/de lta ma yin mi gtong ngo /_/de nas bsgo lung bzhin byas nas/_/de dag myur du gnas su dong /_/slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos/_/de nas phyag rgya btang byas te/_/rdo 
[\[131a.6\]]rje'i gar gyi tshul gyis su/_/rked pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya/_/rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang /_/rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la/_/rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/sdang ba thams cad bcing bar bya/_/dus bzhi rab tu bskul byas la/_/gal te bsgo lung 'gal byed 
[\[131a.7\]]na/_/rdo rje'i lcags kyus dgug bya zhing /_/rdo rje'i zhags pas bcing bar bya/_/rdo rje rnam pa'i sgra'o/_/rdo rje thal mo btsum nas su/_/mthun pa'i stabs su gnas byas te/_/lag pas rgyab tu bsnun byas la/_/rdo rje gyen du 'phang bar bya/_/de nas rdo rje blta byas la/_/
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de/_/rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/_/g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo dang /_/mthe bo sprad de zhags par bya/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis/_/rtse bkug lcags kyus brtan por bya/_/rdo rje rgyags pa'i mig 
[\[131b.2\]]ldan pa/_/so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/_/gang la bgegs ni yod pa der/_/rdo rje stabs kyis myur song la/_/rkang pa g.yas brkyang stabs byas la/_/rdo rje'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing /_/rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bar bya/_/
[\[131b.3\]]gal te 'khor lo can dang ni/_/dbang bcas drag po tshangs bcas pa/_/gal te rdo rje 'chang srung yang /_/sngags pas gzhi nas drangs te dgug_/bkug nas rdo rjes bcings pa yis/_/rdo rje'i gzeb tu gzhug par bya/_/ji srid 'dod pa rdzogs 'gyur ba/_/de srid bar 
[\[131b.4\]]du gzhag par bya/_/bsgo ba'i lung ni mi nyan te/_/gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs na/_/bdag gi 'dod pa 'byor 'dod pas/_/de la chad pas gcad par bya/_/de yi gzugs ni byas nas su/_/rdo rje rkang pas gzir byas na/_/a la la zhes sgra 'byin cing /_/lha yi dbang 
[\[131b.5\]]po'ang 'ong bar 'gyur/_/de la bsgo ba'i lung yang dbog_/rdo rje gar gyis de nas yang /_/thal mo shin tu sbyar byas la/_/dbang chen stabs kyis 'dug nas su/_/phyogs rnams kun du rgyas par bya/_/rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/_/g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo/_/
[\[131b.6\]]lag pa gnyis ni sbyar nas su/_/phan tshun bsnol te khu tshur bcang /_/gung mo gnyis ni gshibs nas su/_/mdzub mo de la gzugs par bya/_/nga yi rdo rje'i phyag rgya de/_/bgegs rnams kun gyi dam tshig yin/_/snga ma bzhin gyi stabs tshul gyis/_/phyag rgyas 
[\[131b.7\]]bgegs rnams bkug nas su/_/khro bo yi ni rdo rje 'dis/_/de la dam tshig sbyin par bya/_/rdo rje stabs kyi phyag rgya bcing /_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la/_/bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur nas su/_/bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/_/lan ni smra bar mi byed na/_/de ni gtang 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]bar mi bya'o/_/gal te cung zad mi smra na/_/de la chad pas gcad bya ste/_/shing gi dug dang star bu dang /_/yungs kar dag ni bsres pa las/_/de yi gzugs ni byas nas su/_/me yi nang du bor byas na/_/gal te tshangs pas bsrungs na yang /_/bgegs de de yi 
[\[132a.2\]]mod la 'gro/_/sngags pas de la bsgo bar bya/_/de nas de la rgyas par bya/_/byams pa'i sems ni bskyed nas su/_/phyag rgya btang bar bsam byas na/_/gzir dang bcing dang dgug pa rnams/_/thar nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/ye shes 
[\[132a.3\]]che la rab gzhol zhing /_/sems can don la snying rje bas/_/rdo rje nyid du yang bsgyur te/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/_/rdo rje thal mo legs sbyar te/_/phyogs rnams kun du rgyas par bya/_/gom pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/_/g.yas 
[\[132a.4\]]dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo/_/lag pa gar byed tshul gyis ni/_/de nas thal mo rab sbyar ro/_/gom pa bskyod pa'i tshul gyis su/_/mkhas pas phyogs bzhi rnams su bskor/_/rdo rjes rengs byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par bya/_/myur du 
[\[132a.5\]]rdo rje gom pa yis/_/phyogs rnams rdo rje rengs par bya/_/rtse mo brgyad pa'i lhun po che/_/rdo rje mtshan can bsam par bya/_/'og tu lag pa rdo rje can/_/steng du g.yas pa'ang rdo rje can/_/rdo rjes rengs byed rab byed cing /_/phyogs rnams kun du bskor byas na/_/gang dag 
[\[132a.6\]]sdang ba'i sems ldan pa'i/_/bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par 'gyur/_/rdo rje rengs byed byas pas na/_/bgegs byed phyir ni 'tshe mi byed/_/de yi spyi bor rdo rje ni/_/legs par 'dug par bsams byas na/_/tshangs pa'i gnas la thug pa nas/_/sa 'og 
[\[132a.7\]]bdun la thug pa'i bar/_/rdo rjes rengs pas rengs 'gyur te/_/rmongs shing sems kyang med par 'gyur/_/sngags pa mkhas pas 'dod bar du/_/de srid du ni rengs par byed/_/rdo rje tshul gyis de nas kyang /_/rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la/_/mtshog mar thal mo 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]sbyar byas te/_/phyogs rnams kun du rgyas byas na/_/kun nas byung ba'i chu rnams kyang /_/sngags pas bskam par byed par nus/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/rdo rje'i thal mo gzhum byas la/_/lag pa g.yas pa gyen du ni/_/zhags pa bcas pas brkyang bar bya/_/de 
[\[132b.2\]]bzhin rkang pa g.yon pa ni/_/g.yon dang lhan cig gdeg par bya/_/de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang /_/gom pa 'dor ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/mngon du bskal pa'i me lta bu/_/so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/_/'og logs su ni mig bltas te/_/rdo rje'i gom pas myur song 
[\[132b.3\]]la/_/rkang pa g.yon pa bskum byas te/_/lhun po'i rtse mor gzhag par bya/_/'og ma shugs nas 'byin pa'i lag_/g.yas pa steng nas de bzhin te/_/mchod pa'i rkang stabs sbyar ba yis/_/kha yi tshul du 'dug par bya/_/rgod ma rta yi kha tshul gyis/_/rgya mtsho'i chu 
[\[132b.4\]]rnams btung bar bya/_/rdo rje ldan pas bshad pa yi/_/bsam gtan sngags pa ldan gyur na/_/chu ni a la la zhes su/_/sgra 'byin kun nas 'du 'gyur na/_/'bab chu dang ni chu klung dang /_/sprin las byung ba smos ci dgos/_/bskyod na gal te 'o ma yi/_/chu las byung 
[\[132b.5\]]ba'ang skam par 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang /_/rdo rje'i thal mo mtshog mar sbyar/_/phyogs rnams kun du rgyas byas te/_/sprin bzhin yongs su rgyas par bya/_/dbang chen gom stabs byas nas su/_/rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/rkang pa g.yon pa bteg 
[\[132b.6\]]bya ste/_/de nas sa la gzhag par bya/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/_/g.yas phyogs su ni bskor bar bya/_/lag gnyis khu tshur tshul gyis su/_/rdo rje ldan pa g.yas pa bsgreng /_/g.yon pa mkhur bar brten nas su/_/'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor/_/
[\[132b.7\]]de bzhin g.yas pa bzhag nas su/_/lag pa g.yon pas yongs su bskor/_/g.yas pa mkhur bar brten nas su/_/rdo rje ldan pa'i g.yon pa bsgreng /_/rdo rje gom pas myur song la/_/g.yas pa brkyang ba'i gom stabs kyis/_/ti se'i rtse mor rkang bzhag ste/_/rkang stabs 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/lus ni 'dud pa byas nas su/_/rengs byed rtsa bar sbyor ldan pas/_/so yis mchu mnan khros gyur cing /_/bdag nyid me dang 'drar gyur pa/_/stobs chen sgra yang cher ldan pa/_/gtum po chen po pha rol gnon/_/rdo rje'i tshul gyis steng bskor 
[\[133a.2\]]la/_/nges par gnon pa blang bar bya/_/sngags pa sngags la 'jigs med pa/_/des ni gang du khros pa 'dor/_/rdo rje des gnon tshul gyis ni/_/rkang pa g.yon pa btsugs nas su/_/rdo rje gnon pas bsnun byas na/_/dbang po chen po'ang phye mar rlog_/rdo rje gnon pas bsnun 
[\[133a.3\]]byas na/_/sa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yo/_/lhun po man+dAr ti se dang /_/'khor ri rnams ni g.yo 'gyur na/_/lha min sgo lta smos ci dgos/_/rdo rje ldan pas bshad na'o/_/bsnun pas rnam pa brgyar 'gyur te/_/phub ma sbar gang rlung gtor bzhin/_/slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba 
[\[133a.4\]]pos/_/sa sbyang brtsam par bya ba ni/_/rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar nas su/_/snying gar bzhag ste rgyas par bya/_/rkang pa rting pa sprad nas su/_/lag pa gar byed spyod pa dang /_/rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su/_/g.yas dang g.yon pa gzhag par bya/_/rkang pa bskyod pa byas nas 
[\[133a.5\]]su/_/de nas rting pa yang sprad de/_/gar gyi tshul ni de nyid kyis/_/phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor bar bya/_/khros pas dbus kyi gnas su ni/_/rdo rje gom pas myur song la/_/rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/_/gung mos srin lag 'khyud byas la/_/gnyi ga khu tshur bcangs 
[\[133a.6\]]byas la/_/rting pa sprad pa'i rkang stabs kyis/_/sa la bzhag dang bteg bya ste/_/g.yas su yongs su brkyang byas la/_/bar bur thams cad bsal bar bya/_/me me zhes ni brjod byas la/_/nang na gang dag ci yod pa/_/sngags pas thams cad bsal bar bya/_/hU~M dang 
[\[133a.7\]]bcas shing phaT bcas pa'i/_/gsang sngags mkhas pas brjod par bya/_/'og dang sa yi steng na ni/_/bar bur thams cad zhir 'gyur te/_/kun du bgegs ni med gyur na/_/sngags pas mnyam gzhag las rnams bya/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje bzhag pa 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]legs bslabs pas/_/rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/_/tshangs pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar byas te/_/snying ga'i thad kar bskor bar bya/_/gar byed tshul gyis lag pa gnyis/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcangs bar bya/_/g.yon pa g.yon du brkyang bar bya/_/
[\[133b.2\]]g.yas pa g.yas su brkyang bar bya/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod la/_/sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/_/rdo rje gom pas myur song la/_/g.yas brkyang gom pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su/_/de nyid 
[\[133b.3\]]kyis ni yang bskor ro/_/hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la/_/de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang /_/rdo rje khu tshur bskor bas na/_/bgegs rnams thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje blo dang ldan pa yis/_/sa bsdus 'dor bar 'dod na ni/_/gom pa bzhag pa'i 'gros kyis su/_/
[\[133b.4\]]myur du g.yas pa brkyang byas la/_/gcig ni ri rab rtse la bzhag_/cig shos ti se'i rtse mor bzhag_/de ltar rkang stabs bzhag pa ni/_/kun du 'dor bar rab byed cing /_/sa 'og na ni lag pa g.yon/_/g.yas pas yi steng na ste/_/a la la zhes sgra 'byin cing /_/
[\[133b.5\]]'jig rten khams kun 'phen byed na/_/bgegs rnams gzhan lta ci zhig smos/_/log 'dren sdang ba drag po rnams/_/mi yi 'jig rten 'di nas ni/_/gzhan du 'phen pa ci zhig smos/_/ci ste 'jig rten khams rnams kyang /_/kun nas tshig par byed 'dod na/_/rkang 
[\[133b.6\]]stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu 'jug par 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la/_/g.yas pa brkyang ba'i stabs tshul gyis/_/nyi ma bcu gnyis lta bur ni/_/me lce phreng ldan bzod dka' ba/_/rkang pa g.yon pa brtan byas la/_/rdo rje 'dzin de lag 
[\[133b.7\]]pa bsgreng /_/lus ni btud par byas nas su/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bteg byas la/_/sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/_/rlung rnams kun yang sdud byed cing /_/nam mkha' me 'drar bsgyur nas su/_/bsreg pa'i bskal pa lta bur 'jug_/lag na 'dzin pa'i 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]rdo rje ni/_/kun du ri rab 'drar bsams la/_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgras gnon zhing /_/rdo rje 'og tu 'phangs byas na/_/ri dang nags su bcas pa yi/_/sa rnams thams cad 'khrug par 'gyur/_/de nas thal ba nyid gyur te/_/mer ni shing bal bcug pa bzhin/_/slob 
[\[134a.2\]]dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos/_/de nas bsdu ba brtsam byas te/_/rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid de/_/bye brag tu ni lag pa bsgreng /_/rdo rje gom pas myur song la/_/mchongs pa bskor ba byas nas su/_/phyag rgya yi ni stang stabs bya/_/rgyab nas stang stabs tshul gyis ni/_/dbus kyi 
[\[134a.3\]]gnas su phyin par bya/_/de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang /_/rdo rje bsnun pas brdeg par bya/_/stang stabs tshul ni de nyid dang /_/sngags pa blo ldan lag tshul gyis/_/sa rnams thams cad blangs byas la/_/de nyid du ni gzhag par bya/_/kun nas bsdu bar byed cing ni/_/mkhas 
[\[134a.4\]]pas gsang sngags brjod byas la/_/rdo rje can gyis bshad pa bzhin/_/sa rnams kun du gzhag par bya/_/rim pa yi ni 'di nyid kyis/_/mkhas pa thams cad kun du bzhag_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas/_/sdang ba lha dang lha 
[\[134a.5\]]min dang /_/mi rnams gzhag bya gdul bar bya/_/bsam dbang bzhin du 'byung ba yi/_/rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas/_/'dul ba'i tshogs ni tha dad pa/_/thams cad rnam par gdul bar bya/_/gdung bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten ni/_/gdung ba nyid kyis 'grub par 
[\[134a.6\]]'gyur/_/g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis su/_/dpa' bo lnga po kun du bya/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/g.yas brkyang stabs kyis gnon par bya/_/rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/'ben la lta zhing lag pas gtang /_/srin lag mthe'u chung 
[\[134a.7\]]sprad byas la/_/lag gnyis lu gu rgyud du bya/_/g.yon pa'i gung mo mtheb mtshungs sa sbyar/_/g.yas pa yi ni mdzub mo de/_/brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/_/gzhu dang mda' zhes brjod pa yin/_/gung mo yi ni rgyab logs su/_/mdzub mo mda' yi tshul du bzhag_/g.yas 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]brkyang stang stabs tshul gyis su/_/hU~M bcas brjod de phog par bsnun/_/gal te sa yi 'og gnas sam/_/tshangs pa'i gnas na gnas gyur tam/_/drag pos bsrungs par gyur kyang rung /_/rdo rje 'phang bar byas nas su/_/rdo rje mda' yis phog gyur na/_/de ni gson par mi 
[\[134b.2\]]bsam mo/_/'phang ba'i stang stabs so/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/thabs shes pa la mkhas gyur cing /_/'phang pa'i tshul du legs bslabs pa/_/sdang ba'i sems can gdul bar bya/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas/_/
[\[134b.3\]]srid pa gsum la khyab lus kyis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gdul bar bya/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis/_/thal mo khong stong sbyar bar bya/_/de yi phyag rgya bcings nas su/_/phyogs 
[\[134b.4\]]rnams kun du bskor byas na/_/srid pa gsum yang 'gugs 'gyur na/_/log 'dren bgegs rnams smos ci dgos/_/dgug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar byas la/_/phyogs 
[\[134b.5\]]rnams kun du rgyas par bya/_/rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su/_/gnas ni myur du bzung byas la/_/rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag_/khros pas hU~M gi sgra brjod de/_/rgya mtsho bzhi po'i klu rnams la/_/rdo rje'i lag pas bsnun par bya/_/klu skrag thal mo sbyar ba dag_/rgya mtsho 
[\[134b.6\]]nas ni 'thon par gyur/_/gang dag sa yi 'og gnas pa/_/lha min srin po gsang ba rnams/_/bsgo ba'i lung la brtson yid kyis/_/ci tshol cig ces 'khod par byed/_/rdo rje 'bar bas bdag nyid gzir/_/gnod sbyin mo'am srin mo'am/_/lha min mo'am klu mo'am/_/
[\[134b.7\]]bcud kyis len nam dngul chu'am/_/rin chen rnams dang nor bu rgyal/_/dpal dang phun sum 'dod ldan nam/_/thugs la ci dang ci bzhed pa/_/bdag cag rnams la bka' myur stsol/_/sngags pas gang yang rung blangs la/_/gsang ba kun du gtad bar bya/_/bsgo 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]ba'i lung dang 'gal bar byed/_/ci ste bsgo yang mi 'ong na/_/rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis/_/g.yon brkyang stabs kyis gnon par bya/_/lhun po la ni rkang bzhag ste/_/lag pas dbyug pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/sgra sgrog cing ni thams cad gnas/_/sa 'og 
[\[135a.2\]]thams cad gnon par bya/_/ha ha zhes ni sgra 'don cing /_/bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa/_/thams cad kyis ni bzung nas su/_/shin tu myur du dbug par byed/_/sngags pas de gcig tshar bcad de/_/lhag ma thams cad gtang bar bya/_/bsgo ba'i lung la de bzhag 
[\[135a.3\]]la/_/mkhas pas legs par bslab par bya/_/gsang ba srin po thams cad la/_/dgyes pa'i sems ni yang bskyed de/_/de dag dam tshig byin nas ni/_/de rnams kun du gtang bar bya//_//'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_
[\[135a.4\]]de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/snying brtse snying rje'i sems ldan pas/_/mi dang mi min la sogs pa/_/shin tu gnod byed lha rnams dang /_/lha min gsang bar bcas rnams dang /_/gzhan yang sdang ba'i gdon la sogs/_/nad sbrul dug la sogs rnams kyis/_/sems 
[\[135a.5\]]can rnams la gnod byed cing /_/dam tshig la ni mi gnas te/_/rgyags pa'i yid dang ldan pa dag_/nad dang mu ge la sogs pas/_/sems can rnams la gnod byed de/_/pha rol gnod byed mngon dga' ba/_/de dag snying rje med pa dang /_/bstan pa las ni 'gal byed cing /_/
[\[135a.6\]]shin tu rgyags pa'i shas che ba/_/mthong nas de dag tshar gcad phyir/_/sngags la mkhas pas sbyar bar bya/_/bdag la sdig par 'gyur snyam du/_/bdag nyid las ni mi sems shing /_/bdag nyid lam min zhugs gyur la/_/gzhan dang gzhan yang phung byed pa/_/gzhan 
[\[135a.7\]]la gnod pa de dag la/_/sngags pas bzod pa mi bya ste/_/skrag par bya zhing bcing bar bya/_/gtub par bya zhing gsad par bya/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas/_/nam mkha' go skabs med byas te/_/rdo rje dbyibs su bsgyur 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]nas su/_/gus pas bsgrims bcas 'jo tshul dang /_/bzhin 'dzum rgyags dang ldan pa yis/_/rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la/_/lag pa bskyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/phyogs rnams kun du gar bya zhing /_/dngos dang mthun par bzung byas la/_/bsgom pa la ni sems bzhag cing /_/
[\[135b.2\]]rdo rje'i rang bzhin lus sra bas/_/mi mthun rkang stabs tshul gyis ni/_/rdo rje 'chang bas lag bsgreng ste/_/rdo rje mig gis kun bltas la/_/srid pa gsum po thams cad gnon/_/dpa' bo'i gnas su gnas nas su/_/rkang pa gdengs pa'i tshul gyis su/_/hU~M brjod 'jigs 
[\[135b.3\]]pa 'jigs su rung /_/mig gnyis nyi ma zla ba ste/_/kha ni rgod ma rta yi kha/_/lte ba dga' bo nye dga' bo/_/lto ba rgya mtshor bsam par bya/_/lhun po de yi mgo bor bya/_/de bzhin lag pa 'khor yug ri/_/sa ni rkang pa gnyis yin te/_/nor rgyas bu sprul gsang bsrel yin/_/
[\[135b.4\]]rlung ni de yi rna ba gnyis/_/de yi skra rnams me yin te/_/lce ni 'jigs pa chen po'i glog_/a la la zhes sgra chen ldan/_/'brug sgra hUM zhes sgra phyung bas/_/phyogs rnams kun du yongs su bskor/_/rab tu bskul bas de nas ni/_/rdo rje'i sgra yis bsgyel gyur nas/_/klu dang 
[\[135b.5\]]dri za srin po dang /_/lha dang lha min sogs kun dong /_/hU~M brjod pas ni 'jigs gyur zhing /_/'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/_/rdo rje sgra yis tshig 'gyur zhing /_/blong bar gyur cing dman par blta/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor cher ldan pa/_/ga la ba der nye bar dong /_/rdo rje chen pos bka' 
[\[135b.6\]]stsol la/_/lhan cad de ltar ma mdzad cig_/de nas dam tshig bzhag byas la/_/lha rnams thams cad gtang bar bya/_/rdo rje 'jigs pa gtum che ba/_/'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa/_/'jigs par bya rnams 'jigs bskyed pa/_/chen pos mchod 'os rmad byung bas/_/
[\[135b.7\]]mi dang mi ma yin rnams la/_/'jigs chen ltas 'byung che 'byung dang /_/lha dang klu dang sha za dang /_/gza' dang ma mo brtse med rnams/_/nad dang mu ge la sogs dang /_/yul 'khrugs pa dang 'chi byed dang /_/bdud rnams dang ni log 'dren dang /_/srul po srin po la sogs 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]pa'ang /_/bdag yul gzhan yul las byung ba'i/_/gnod pa gzhan yang du ma rnams/_/de dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyar bar bya/_/rkang pa rgyas par bya tshul gyis/_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na/_/rdo rje 'jigs pas rab bskul 
[\[136a.2\]]bas/_/thams cad myur du 'jigs par 'gyur/_/'di ni don yod thogs pa med/_/rdo rje 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/_/sngags pas kun du sbyor byas nas/_/srid pa gsum yang dbang 'gyur na/_/mi yi 'jig rten mngag gzhug pa/_/byed par gyur pa smos ci dgos/_/
[\[136a.3\]]tshig gis cung zad bskul bas na/_/gang dag shin tu dregs ldan pas/_/srin po lha min gsang ba pa/_/de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_/rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas/_/dbang phyug kun dang yon tan thob/_/lha rnams kun gyi rgyal por 'gyur/_/mkhas 
[\[136a.4\]]pas dbang la 'god par byed/_/klu yi gnas su klu rnams dang /_/gnod sbyin rgyal dang gnod sbyin dang /_/dri za rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/_/lha min gnas su lha min dang /_/mkha' lding gnas su mkha' lding dang /_/mi ci rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/_/lha dang lha min 
[\[136a.5\]]mir bcas pa/_/bsgo ba'i lung bzhin gus sems kyis/_/rdo rje 'jigs sgra cher ldan pa/_/de yi dbang du thams cad 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba yi/_/sgra chen po yi phyag rgya'o/_/kun la rdo rje rab 'phrul ba/_/de yi 'og tu brjod par bya/_/dpal ldan mchod pa byed 
[\[136a.6\]]pa pos/_/phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs rnams kyi/_/sangs rgyas rnam pa kun du mchod/_/srid par bdag nyid che rnams kyi/_/bsam yas mchod min gang yang med/_/'dzum dang bcas shing mig rgyas pas/_/g.yas pa dang ni g.yon tshul gyis/_/rdo rje'i thal mo 
[\[136a.7\]]btsum byas la/_/phyogs bcu rnam pa kun du 'dud/_/dpral bar thal mo sbyar byas la/_/phyogs rnams kun du yongs bskor zhing /_/dus gsum rnam par bzhugs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas kun la phyag bya'o/_/bde gshegs kun la phyag bya mchod/_/sems can 'dul 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]ba'i mchod pa ni/_/bsam pa ji bzhin 'jug pa ste/_/bsam pa tha dad sems can khams/_/bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phel/_/bsam pa sna tshogs rnam rtog pa/_/bsam pa chags med de dang des/_/sngags pas rnam pa thams cad du/_/sems can khams 
[\[136b.2\]]mang gdul bar bya/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/kun la shes pa'i cher byung ba'i/_/sgeg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang /_/rgod dang khro dang 'jigs byed dang /_/'jigs rung rmad byung zhi ba rnams/_/bsam pa chags pas rnam dgur dgongs/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 
[\[136b.3\]]'chang /_/kun la ye shes 'byung byed pa'i/_/rkang pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni/_/gom pas mdzes dang ldan pa yis/_/lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni/_/gar byed pa yi tshul gyis su/_/mdzub mo mthe bo rtse sprad la/_/g.yon phyogs su ni blta bar bya/_/g.yas 
[\[136b.4\]]dang g.yon pa sbyar tshul gyis/_/'dzum bcas rgyas pa gus bsgrims shing /_/lag na rdo rje gsor ldan pas/_/rjes su chags pas gar bya'o/_/lha rnams kun dang gsang ba dang /_/lha ma yin dang mi rnams dang /_/'dod khams dbang phyug bdag po dang /_/sa gsum 
[\[136b.5\]]gnas rnams chags byed cing /_/mig zur bgrad dang lta ba yis/_/de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_/sa gsum thams cad 'gugs byed na/_/sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos/_/lha yi rgyal po sogs bkug nas/_/sdom pa can gyi dbang 'jog ste/_/
[\[136b.6\]]thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed cing /_/mngag gzhug par ni rab tu dgod/_/rdo rje cher ldan kun shes nas/_/rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/_/rdo rje glu yis bskul bas na/_/rjes su chags dang chags chen 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpar mos pa yis/_/glu dang gar ni rab tu bya/_/
[\[136b.7\]]bsam pa chags pas brgya la gyur nas/_/sems can khams ni rjes chags bya/_/rdo rje'i glu ni 'di yin no/_/sa gsum dag na 'bar ba'i sku mnga' rjes su chags mdzad 'dul ldan pas/_/nyi ma stong phrag bcu bas rno ba'i 'od zer stong dang ldan pa pos/_/rnam mang 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]cha byad gzugs kyis sems can 'gro ba rjes su chags mdzad pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa mdzes pa'i stobs ldan gar mdzad gsol/_/Sha Ta ba la sogs pa'i glu/_/rdo rje gar gyis bya ba na/_/sa gsum thams cad 'gugs byed na/_/sa 
[\[137a.2\]]steng mi rnams smos ci dgos/_/rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje nyid du yang sgyur zhing /_/rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/_/thams cad la ni gar mkhan bya/_/gom stabs thams cad mdzes ldan par/_/g.yas pa dgug pa'i phyag rgya dang /_/g.yon 
[\[137a.3\]]pas btang ba'i phyag rgya bya/_/mig zur bgrad dang lta ba yis/_/lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis/_/'khyud par byed pa'i sbyor ldan pas/_/tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams ni/_/rnam pa kun du dbang bsgyur te/_/mngag gzhug pa ni rab byed cing /_/rdo rje can gyi lung la 
[\[137a.4\]]brtson/_/rdo rje chags pas chags byas pas/_/shin tu chags pas dregs myos pa'i/_/lha dang mi dang gsang ba pa/_/bsgrub bya rnams kyang sngags pas bsgrub/_/rdo rje'i lus la yongs chags pas/_/'dod chags thams cad yongs su 'dor/_/rdo rje'i glu snyan ldan 
[\[137a.5\]]pa yis/_/sems can khams rnams chags par bya/_/rjes su chags pas chags pa'i phyir/_/lha rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i glu yi snyan pa'i sgra rnams thams cad dang /_/gzod nas rang bzhin dag pas rdo rje sems dpa' bskul/_/sgyu ma'i 
[\[137a.6\]]dngos po rnam mang dang /_/snyan pa'i sgra ni de nyid dang /_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad kyis/_/dbang bsgyur de nas sangs rgyas snang /_/'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dren/_/bdud rnams thams cad yongs su 'dul/_/shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyong /_/
[\[137a.7\]]sems can thams cad yongs smin byed/_/glu 'di rab tu len byed cing /_/rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas na/_/lha dang gang dag gnod sbyin dang /_/lha min klur bcas thams cad 'grub/_/rdo rje'i glus ni 'dren pa'o/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje sems dpar yang bsgyur 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]te/_/dpa' chen bsam par kun chags pas/_/dpa' bos lnga po bstan par bya/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/g.yas pa brkyang bas pha rol gnon/_/g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/seng ge bzhin du bsgyings bar bya/_/tshangs pa'i gnas la yang gnas 
[\[137b.2\]]te/_/rdo rje se gol sbyor ba dang /_/rdo rje bsnun stabs tshul gyis ni/_/tshangs pa la sogs bsdu bar bya/_/rdo rje'i glu ni len byed cing /_/sa gsum 'bar ba'i sku ldan pa/_/nyi ma bye ba 'bar mtshungs pa/_/nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam med pa/_/chos dang rgyal mchog 
[\[137b.3\]]rnams kyi gtso/_/sangs rgyas sku mchog de la 'dud/_/so yis mchu ni rab gnon cing /_/kun nas mig can khro gnyer bzhin/_/rked par rdo rje brten nas su/_/phyogs bcu kun du blta bar bya/_/g.yas pa rdo rje tshul gyis ni/_/phyogs rnams kun du rab bsgrags pas/_/
[\[137b.4\]]lta 'jigs 'od zer 'bar ldan zhing /_/bsreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan lta bu/_/grub 'gyur rdo rje me 'bar ba/_/'jigs pa che ltar bzod dka' bas/_/bgegs rnams la ni sbyor bar bya/_/'jig rten gsum po thal bar rlog_/nyes pa chen po ma yin la/_/phyag rgya 
[\[137b.5\]]'di ni sbyar mi bya/_/thun mong ma yin dgos pa ni/_/tha ma'i tshe na sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje 'chang bas bsrungs gyur kyang /_/hUM brjod pas ni thal bar rlog_/'jig pa'i me ltar bzod dka' ba/_/rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje'i ye 
[\[137b.6\]]shes legs bslabs pas/_/snying gar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis/_/bzhag nas 'di snyam bsam pa ste/_/sems dmyal [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gro dang /_/gang gzhan sdug bsngal sdug bsngal rnams/_/lag pas drang ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/bde ba kun gyis bstabs 
[\[137b.7\]]par bya/_/bza' btung la sogs char pa dang /_/gos dang rin chen rgyan gyi char/_/de dag rnams la kun du da bab/_/ci bder yang dag bstabs pas na/_/snying rje spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhin/_/kun du yongs su rgyas par bya/_/sems can kun gyi bla med bde/_/
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]thob par shog ces bsam par bya/_/snying rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje can/_/rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bya zhing /_/mtshog mar thal mo sbyar bar bya/_/bteg dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/de nas myur du smad par 
[\[138a.2\]]bya/_/rdo rje bgad chen phyag rgya 'di/_/rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhin du dgod/_/bgad pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o/_/de nas lag pa g.yas bteg ste/_/g.yon pa rkedapa'i phyogs su bzhag_/g.yon brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su/_/de nas thal mo yang sbyar te/_/'jigs rung sgra ni grag byed 
[\[138a.3\]]cing /_/thal mo sbyar ba btud par bya/_/'jigs su rung ba chen po'i sgra'i phyag rgya'o/_/g.yas brkyang rkang pa'i stabs byas te/_/lag pa gnyis kyis rgyal rol du/_/khu tshur gnyis ni bcang bar bya/_/bgegs kun 'dar bar bya ba'i phyir/_/mgul pa nges par smad bya zhing /_/
[\[138a.4\]]sgra chen rab tu brjod byas na/_/phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas la/_/lag pa gnyi ga lto bar gzhag_/g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis/_/sngags 
[\[138a.5\]]pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/_/ha ha zhes pas rab brgyan pa/_/phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te/_/ri rnams phye mar rlog byed na/_/sdang ba'i sems can ci smos te/_/sngags pa'i 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/lag pa gyen du bsgreng 
[\[138a.6\]]byas la/_/gdu bu'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/de bzhin so yis ma mchu mnan/_/g.yon pa brkyang ba legs sbyar bas/_/bgegs rnams kun la bsnun par bya/_/phyag rgya 'di ni sgra chen te/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa yin/_/phyag rgya 'di ni legs 
[\[138a.7\]]sbyar bas/_/thams cad bzlog par gyur pa yin/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/lag gnyis brang la sbyar ba las/_/lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng byas te/_/rkang pa g.yon brkyang legs sbyar bas/_/tho ba yi ni phyag rgya yis/_/rdo rje 'chang nyid yin pa'ang 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]bsnun/_/rdo rje tho bas bsnun pas na/_/de yi mod la phye mar 'gyur/_/tho ba'i stang stabs so/_/g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang /_/lag pa mchan khung gzhug par bya/_/nyi ma 'bar 'dra'i lta 'dra bas/_/hu~M brjod bsnyems pas thur du blta/_/lag na rdo rje nyid bsgyur 
[\[138b.2\]]te/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sgra phyung la/_/rgya mtsho man dAr bcas pa yi/_/sa rnams thams cad g.yo bar bya/_/so yis mchu ni mnan bya zhing /_/rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya/_/phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar bas/_/de dag thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/_/g.yas brkyang 
[\[138b.3\]]rkang stabs byas nas su/_/lag gnyis khu tshur bcang tshul gyis/_/g.yon pa brang la sbyar bar bya/_/g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/_/mdzub mo myur du bsgreng byas shing /_/rdo rje'i sgra ni dbyung byas na/_/gal te sangs rgyas nyid gyur kyang /_/bgegs rnams thams 
[\[138b.4\]]cad bsgyel bar bya/_/rdo rje can gyis bshad yin no/_/sdang ba'i sems can smos ci dgos/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bskyod pas na/_/de dag thams cad dul bar 'gyur/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/_/lag pa thal mo brkyang 
[\[138b.5\]]bar bya/_/g.yon pa brang du sbyar bar bya/_/lag pas myur du bsnun stabs kyis/_/hUM dang bcas pas sa la bsnun/_/nam mkha' me 'bar 'dra ba yi/_/ral gri'i phyag rgya bcing byas la/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya/_/rdo rje can gyis bshad yin 
[\[138b.6\]]no/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/lag pa 'og tu bcug nas ni/_/rkang pa'i dbus nas bzung byas la/_/de ni gyen du bteg par bya/_/hUM zhes rdo rje sgra dang ni/_/khros shing khro gnyer bcas pa yis/_/rkang pa de yis yang bsnun la/_/der ni bgegs ni 
[\[138b.7\]]bsam par bya/_/rdo rje'i rkang pas bsnun byas na/_/ri rab rnams kyang phye mar rlog_/rdo rje rkang pa'i stang stabs so/_/g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis/_/lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du brkyang /_/so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/_/kun du 'khor lo 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]'phang bar bya/_/phyogs rnams kun na gnas pa yi/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams gzhig par 'gyur/_/zhig par 'gyur ba'i zhing rnams nas/_/rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyang 'byon/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/gang gzhan dbang ni thob 'gyur ra rnams/_/blong 
[\[139a.2\]]zhes gyur nas blo ldan pa/_/lag na rdo rje'i gan du dong /_/srog zad na ni mi rung gis/_/bu gcig nged kyis ci zhig bya/_/khyod ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/_/nged kyis myur du sgrub bo zhes/_/rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan la/_/lung ni yongs su nod par mdzad/_/bskal pa me ltar gyur 
[\[139a.3\]]pa yis/_/g.yas brkyang stang stabs byas nas su/_/'bar ba'i phyag rgya legs sbyar bas/_/sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar bya/_/sa gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas/_/sngags pa rnams la rtag 'tshe ba/_/bgegs byed ma rungs chen po pa/_/srin po sdang ba 
[\[139a.4\]]rnams skrag go/_/phyag rgya 'di 'dra mthong gyur nas/_/de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/de tshe nges par bsnun blangs la/_/sngags pas gyen du 'phang bar bya/_/de tshe sos ni mchu mnan la/_/myur du gom pa gcig bor te/_/nges par 
[\[139a.5\]]bsnun pas bsnun de tshe/_/srin po sdang ba bgegs byed pa/_/de dag thams cad phye mar 'gyur/_/rdo rje nges bsnun phyag rgya yis/_/de dag thams cad bzlog par bya/_/dbang chen gnas la gnas nas su/_/lag pa gnyis ni bsgreng byas la/_/lhun po'i rgyal po blangs nas su/_/
[\[139a.6\]]lag pa gnyis su de bzhag nas/_/sngags pa la ni bgegs byed pa/_/sdang ba'i sems can rnams la bsnun/_/bsnun pas rnam par phung 'gyur cing /_/'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/_/rnal 'byor gzhol ba'i sngags pa la/_/gang tshe bgegs shig bgegs byed na/_/de tshe 
[\[139a.7\]]sngags pa stobs chen gyis/_/phyag rgya 'di la sbyar bar bya/_/phyag rgya 'di la rab sbyar ba/_/mthong nas de dag 'dar bar 'gyur/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas/_/rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas/_/cod pan stabs kyi thabs bshad do/_/sngags 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]pas shar phyogs kha bltas la/_/lag pa g.yas pa mtshog mar bzhag_/g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la/_/'brug sgra dal 'dra'i phyag rgya yis/_/phyogs rnams kun du bskor bar bya/_/g.yas brkyang ba yi tshul gyis kyang /_/dang pa'i rtsal gyi sbyor 
[\[139b.2\]]ba yis/_/lag pa g.yas pa gdengs byas na/_/rgya mtsho rnams kyang bteg par 'gyur/_/ngang pa'i rtsal gyi phyag rgya'o/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/_/lag pa gnyis ni sar btsugs la/_/a la la zhes rnam brgyan pas/_/sa gsum thams cad bteg byas na/_/rgya mtshor 
[\[139b.3\]]bcas pa'i ri rab kyang /_/thams cad shin tu bteg par 'gyur/_/man dA ra dang ti se dang /_/gzhan yang gang dag ri rnams kyang /_/ha la ha la'i phyag rgya yis/_/bsnun pa de dag slar mi 'chags/_/g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang /_/lag pa gnyis ni lto bar bzhag_/hUM 
[\[139b.4\]]rjod snyems pas mar bltas te/_/so yis mchu ni mnan byas la/_/rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/_/g.yon pa brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/de yi tshe na g.yon bteg ste/_/khros dang bcas pas rkang bzhag pas/_/sa gsum thams cad drang bar bya/_/
[\[139b.5\]]drang ba'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya'o/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/lag pa gnyis ni bteg byas la/_/bgegs rnams thams cad 'ching byed cing /_/'khor lo bzhin du phyogs su bskor/_/phyag rgya 'di la legs sbyar bas/_/de dag bcings dang gzir bar 'gyur/_/bgegs 
[\[139b.6\]]rnams thams cad sel bar byed/_/rdo rje can ni nyid kyis bshad/_/bgegs skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/rnal 'byor stan la 'dug nas su/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas ni/_/lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du bya/_/rkang pa gcig ni yongs su bskor/_/'khor lo cod pan phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[139b.7\]]bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/me tog thal mo sbyar tshul gyis/_/de yi tshe nas la bzhag_/de nas myur du yang bteg go/_/'dis mchod pas na sngags pa la/_/thams cad bgegs byed mi 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i stang stabs yod de/_nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/_bskal pa dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_bcom 
[\[140a.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas rgyan gyi dbyangs las ngas thos kyis/_de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dngangs khyod la bshad do/_/de yis skrag par byas nas bgegs/_/log 'dren thams cad gdungs par 'gyur/_/phyogs rnams kun du 'bros byed cing /_/
[\[140a.3\]]'chi bar gyur te the tshom med/_/lag gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas su/_/g.yon pa brkyang bar rab sbyar te/_/phyogs rnams kun du bskor bar bya/_/de nas rkang pas yang mnan no/_/skrag byed 'di ni skrag pa che/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa ste/_/skrag pas rnam par phung 'gyur 
[\[140a.4\]]zhing /_/'chi bar gyur te the tshom med/_/de nas rkang pa'i tshul gyis kyang /_/mig ni thur du blta byas la/_/lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng nas ni/_/g.yon pa brang la bcar byas te/_/lag pa sa la brdabs nas ni/_/rdo rje'i thal mos bsnun par bya/_/rdo rje thal mo'i stang stabs so/_/rnal 
[\[140a.5\]]'byor stan la yang 'dug ste/_/mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas la/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/_/'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor/_/'di ni rlung 'ching chen po ste/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/_/gal te rnam 'thor rlung byung yang /_/de yang mi g.yo 'dug par 
[\[140a.6\]]'gyur/_/rlung 'ching ba yi stang stabs so/_/gar gyi tshul gyis legs bslabs pas/_/rkang pa spo bar byas pas yang /_/lag pa thur du smad byas la/_/lag gnyis mthe bo srin lag sprad/_/g.yon pa brkyang ba legs sbyar te/_/lag pa g.yas pas gar bya'o/_/gar gyis 
[\[140a.7\]]bgegs rnams thams cad ni/_/shin tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/_/dga' bas sngags pa de la ni/_/de dag phyin cad bgegs mi byed/_/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/_/lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng bya ste/_/g.yon pa ral gri'i tshul byas la/_/gnyi ga gcig tu sbyar bar bya/_/gal 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]te rdo rje 'chang gyur kyang /_/bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya/_/kun nas shin tu drangs nas kyang /_/de nas phyag rgya gtang bar bya/_/rdo rje'i zhags pas bcing byas na/_/gnod par gyur pas kun du yang /_/a la la zhes sgra 'byin cing /_/sems ni blong zhes gyur pa yis/_/
[\[140b.2\]]blo ldan lag na rdo rje la/_/lung ni yongs su nod par byed/_/phyin cad bgegs ni ma byed ces/_/lag na rdo rjes lung bsgo'o/_/rdo rjes gzir ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/sngags pa ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin/_/de nas snying rje yang bskyed de/_/sngags pas mnyam gzhag sa la ni/_/me tog thal mo sbyar 
[\[140b.3\]]nas su/_/de yi tshe na de dag la/_/gang tshe sngags pa mnyam gzhag ste/_/khyed cag bgegs ni ma byed par/_/gnas su deng zhes brjod par bya/_/g.yas brkyang stang stabs byas nas su/_/lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya/_/g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis kyang /_/khu tshur 
[\[140b.4\]]mchan khung gnyis su gzhag_/hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra ldan pa/_/sngags pa drag po'i las byed pas/_/phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas kyang /_/rdo rje gzir bas gzir bar bya/_/gzhan yang gang dag log 'dren bgegs/_/srin po gang dag grags pa dang /_/rgod ma rta yi kha 
[\[140b.5\]]gdangs par/_/de dag thams cad gzir gyur cig_/rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/gzir nas de dag lhags gyur te/_/shin tu mi bzad 'dar byed cing /_/srog zad gyur na mi rung gis/_/ci 'tshal bka' ni myur gsol ces/_/bsgo ba'i lung ni nad par byed/_/sngags pas ci 
[\[140b.6\]]'dod lung bzhin du/_/gal te lung ni nod byed na/_/de lta na ni thar bar 'gyur/_/gzhan du na ni nam yang min/_/shin tu mi bzad gzir bas na/_/khyod ni ci bzhed de bzhin du/_/bgyid kyis bka' lung stsol cig ces/_/de tshe de dag de skad smra/_/mtshog mar rdo rje thal bzhag nas/_/de nas 
[\[140b.7\]]de dag dam tshig sbyin/_/sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris la/_/g.yas pa brkyang bas mnan nas su/_/rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya/_/gtub par byas pas de dag kun/_/de la skyabs su 'gro bar byed/_/snying rjer ldan pa'i sems kyis su/_/de 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]nas phyag rgya gtang bar bya/_/snying rje'i sems kyis de dag la/_/ma 'jigs shig ces smra bar bya/_/sngags pas de yi 'dod pa bzhin/_/de nas de dag rang gnas 'dod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[141a.2\]]rigs kyi bu dag phyag rgya gsum yod de/_gang ngas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po las phyag rgya gsum thob ste/_bskal pa du mar de bstan pa tsam gyis bgegs rnams kyis nga la ma gtses 
[\[141a.3\]]kyis sems rtse gcig tu bsgrims la de nyon cig_/g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su/_/lag pa g.yon pa snying gar bzhag_/g.yas pa gar dang bcas pa yis/_/mtshog mar legs par gzhag par bya/_/bgegs rnams rtag tu gzhig pa yi/_/dam tshig 'di ni brjod pa yin/_/
[\[141a.4\]]'di ni bstan pa tsam gyis kyang /_/'bros par 'gyur te the tsom med/_/phyir zlog pa ni yang byas la/_/sa la lag pa brdab par bya/_/lag pa gnyis ni bteg nas su/_/de tshe mkhur ba bud par bya/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bas na/_/de tshe bgegs rnams bcom par 'gyur/_/rdo rje can ni nyid 
[\[141a.5\]]gyur kyang /_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom 'gyur na/_/mthong ba tsam gyis bgegs rnams kun/_/phung bar gyur pa smos ci dgos/_/sngags pa shar phyogs bltas 'dug la/_/lag pa g.yas pa dkur brten te/_/g.yon pa brkyang ba legs byas la/_/g.yon pas thams cad dgug 
[\[141a.6\]]par bya/_/sa bcur gnas pa kun kyang dgug_/thams cad nas ni bkug nas su/_rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun par bya/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na/_/de yi mod la phye mar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[141a.7\]]lag na rdo rje nga'i slob ma rnams ma gtogs par khyod kyis su la bsnyad par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can ma dad pa de dag ni tshul 'di la yid mi ches shing de dag 'di skad du/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur bas/_de dag gi rna lam du yang bsgrag par mi bya 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]na phyag rgya lta ci smos/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid shes nas sbyin par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag 
[\[141b.2\]]slob dpon la brnyas par bgyid pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skrag par 'gyur gyis de skad ma smra shig_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang cung zhig brjod par bya'i/_dpa' bo bsgrims te 
[\[141b.3\]]de nyon cig_/mtshams med la sogs mi bzad pa/_/dmyal ba gang dag ngas bshad pa/_/de rnams kyi ni gnas su brjod/_/der ni bskal pa mtha' yas so/_/de lta bas na rnam kun du/_/de la nam yang brnyas mi bya/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po slob dpon la slob mas ji ltar 
[\[141b.4\]]blta bar bya zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba bzhin du'o/_/de yi sems ni de lta na/_/rtag tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/_/de ni 'jig rten thams cad la/_/phan par byed pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las stang stabs kyi rim par 
[\[141b.5\]]phye ba rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes shin tu rgyas pa chen pos bdag nyid rgyas pa de dag gi tshig gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings yangs pa la dmigs nas 'jug 
[\[141b.6\]]cing /_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba mngon du byed cing sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de 
[\[141b.7\]]nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis/_ye shes shin tu rgyas pa dpag tu med pa bsgrub pa'i don du thugs su chud nas de dag nyid na bzhugs bzhin du phyag brkyang ste lag na rdo rje'i spyi bor bzhag go/_/bzhag nas lag na rdo 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/_/rdo rje ye shes rdzogs byed pa/_/khyed ni sangs rgyas byas pa gzo/_/sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog_/dam pa gsang ba khyod kyis shod/_/
[\[142a.2\]]gzungs sngags tshul du dgod byos la/_/gang du zhugs ma thag tu ni/_/sdig pa thams cad med gyur pa/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bshad par gyis/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed de dag thams cad phyag slar bskums so/_/de nas lag 
[\[142a.3\]]na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed ma/_sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed ma/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma/_bgegs thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed ma/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed ma/_gzungs sngags chen mo'i 
[\[142a.4\]]mchog 'di smras so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA he bud d+ha ma ti ri/_sarba bA pa ni Sha Ni/_gardza gardza/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_marda marda/_gam+b+hI ri/_gam+b+hIr/_ha sa ha sa/_da ma da ma/_ma tha ma tha/_bi d+h+wa nas ya bid+h+wa na sa ya/_sarba sha trUM ta ra ma ti/_bi ma le/_pUr ya pUr ya/_
[\[142a.5\]]pra ti dz+nyA na/_sarba b+hU ta/_rU pa si te/_b+ha ga ba ti/_ga na ga na/_dza hi dza hi/_bi ma la sa ni/_kra ma Ni/_ha da ba ni/_ra ma Ni/_ma taM gi ke swA hA/_lag na rdo rjes gzungs sngags gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la sa chen po 'di 'gul lo/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/ldeg rab tu ldeg 
[\[142a.6\]]go_/lho phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'o/_/byang phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'o/_/nyi ma dang zla ba yang sa la lhung ngo /_/rig sngags 'chang rnams kyang lhung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag kyang mog mog por gyur to/_/thams cad 
[\[142a.7\]]dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang blong blong por gyur te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yid kyis phyag 'tshal zhing gnas par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de blang blang por gyur pa mthong nas de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye grogs po dag khyod kyis ye shes 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen mo dran par gyis shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthu chen po ni yin na/_sgrub pa po gang la la zhig 'di 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[142b.2\]]yid la byed pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa'i mthu ci lta bur rig par bya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gzungs sngags 'di'i mthu'am/_nus mthu'am mthu 
[\[142b.3\]]bsgyings pa ci 'dra'o/_/'jam dpal shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung
