[\[142b.4\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das des thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje tog la 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir byin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de la byin ma thag tu/_de'i mod la gzungs sngags 'di'i 
[\[142b.5\]]mthus de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams byung zhing zhugs te/_mtha' rtogs par ni mi nus so/_/sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thams cad 
[\[142b.6\]]la dbang thob pa de dag gis kyang 'di ci 'dra ba yin zhes bstan par mi nus so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur nas gnas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis/_byang 
[\[142b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'od zer gyis dbang bskur nas sku de nyid du zhugs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzungs sngags chen po 'di nyid kyi mthus so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi bdag por dbang bskur ba yin na/_khyod kyis kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/_
[\[143a.2\]]gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shod cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal don yod par grub par bya ba'i phyir/_de 
[\[143a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes gang dag gzungs sngags kyi tshul du gnas shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag nyon cig_/de dag gang zhe na/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA a ma ri/_a ma ri/_
[\[143a.4\]]Ta ta/_bany+dza/_dz+ha dz+ha/_mi tsi mi tsi/_s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/_ma ta ma ta/_du ra dA n+ta dam ka swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_he he/_ka Ni Ti ka ni ti/_sarba ta thA ga ta ba na ke_/bo da n+di de/_tra Ta Ta tra Ta Ta/_hUM phaT hUM phaT/_gardza gardza/_bar ma ti/_bi hUM ri ka swA hA/_na 
[\[143a.5\]]maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_b+ha ga ba te/_pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA A/_sarba pA pak+Sha yaM ka ri/_dz+nyA na a pa s+pha ra Ni/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_ma tha ma tha/_da ma da ma/_A na ya/_A na ya/_sa ra sa ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_sarba b+hU te dza na tri ye swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[143a.6\]]mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarbathA/_gardza gardza/_ma tha ma tha/_hA ma hA ma/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_dun+du b+hi swa ra nir g+ho She/_ha na ha na/_bi d+h+wan sa ya bi d+h+wan sa ya/_moT ya moT ya/_da ha da ha/_bi pu la ni rma la ni ra dzA te/_A ha ra A ha ra/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_sarba bud d+ha sa rU pa pi te mA bi laM ba swA hA/_'jam dpal 
[\[143a.7\]]gzungs sngags chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed ma/_byang chub kyi snying po ston par byed ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ma nor ba'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mig mi 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]'dzums par byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bltas te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes chen po sngon ma mthong ba rnams dang /_
[\[143b.2\]]dam tshig la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir/_ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags 'di yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de'i mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_dbang chen 
[\[143b.3\]]po bskur ba'i gzungs sngags la sogs pa ye shes bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las nges par byung ba'i ye shes chen po'i rdo rje rtogs par gyur to/_/ye shes chen po'i rdo rje rtogs ma thag tu/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod 
[\[143b.4\]]pa'i sprin chen po dag byung bar gyur to/_kye ma'o ye shes chen por dbang bskur bas/_/'jam dpal 'di la dbang bskur to/_/zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgra 'ur ces grags so/_/de'i mthus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[143b.5\]]pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag ut+pa la chen po'i nang du zhugs par mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mthus/_de'i mod 
[\[143b.6\]]la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spu'i khung bu'i mtshams rnams dang /_cod pan dang /_rgyan dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams byung zhing zhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la 
[\[143b.7\]]gnas pa/_sems kyi dbang thams cad thob pa de dag gis kyang spu'i khung bu gcig gi tshad kyang rtogs par ma nus na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_gzhan 'jig rten pa rnams kyis lta ci smos/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yid la byed pa de 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]btang ste/_yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la mig mi 'dzums par ring du bltas nas/_zhing rnams 'di dag yongs su sbyang bar bya/_/rgyal sras kun gyi smon lam mthu rdzogs bya/_/sems can phan dang snying brtse nad med cing /_/zhi ba bdud rtsi rnyed dka' ye 
[\[144a.2\]]shes bstan/_/ye shes dam pa gces pa 'di thob nas/_/sangs rgyas zhing nas sems can khrag khrig phrag_/grangs med khyod kyis brjod pa dgrol bar bya/_/khyod kyis ting 'dzin bstan pa mchog tu bya/_/zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[144a.3\]]sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis tshig 'di smras pa ni shin tu gtsigs te khyod yang legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod 'di lta bu'i gzungs sngags 
[\[144a.4\]]chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams yid la byed pa ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/_/'jam dpal yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag ye shes chen po 'di lta bu dag yid la byed pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_glegs bam du byas nas nyin gcig bzhin du phyag 
[\[144a.5\]]'tshal ba de dag ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste/_de dag ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas pa na yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur 
[\[144a.6\]]te/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang gi tshe 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi tshul 'di rtogs nas/_thams cad 
[\[144a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par byed pa dag go 'phang de thob par gyur pa ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sngon ma byung ba de sems can chen po shod cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gang du zhugs pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga po dag yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba dang /_don thams cad kyang 'byor par 'gyur ba dang /_dpal 
[\[144b.2\]]thams cad skyed par 'gyur ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ba dang /_ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dgod pa de nyon cig_/'jam dpal dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o/_/'jam dpal de la 
[\[144b.3\]]lus can thams cad la gsang chen dang bcas pa/_slob dpon rnams kyi gsang chen mchog_/gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ming du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o/_/'jam dpal de la dkyil 'khor 
[\[144b.4\]]gyi tshad la/_tshad ni khru brgyad tham pa ste/_/slob dpon nyid kyi khru yis bya/_/ye shes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor der/_/cha ni rnam pa gsum du bya/_/blo dang ldan pas cha gsum du/_/der ni sgo khyud rnams byas te/_/der ni sgo yang bzhi gtod do/_/gru bzhi lham pa kha khyer bcas/_/sngon gyi 
[\[144b.5\]]bzhin du cha gsum la/_/cha ni rnam pa brgyad brgyad bya/_/mkhas pas cha brgyad byas nas su/_/dbus kyi char ni 'jug par bya/_/chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par/_/thang cig thang cig bsam byas la/_/phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa/_/dkyil 'khor rgyal po bri bar bya/_/sngags pas de yi 
[\[144b.6\]]dbus su ni/_/pad+ma mchog tu mdzes pa bri/_/kun kyang ma rgad 'dra ba ste/_/'dab ma brgyad pa brjod pa yin/_/de yi steng du bum pa ste/_/bum pa'i steng du ut+pal lo/_/ut+pal steng du dung bri ste/_/me lce phreng bas 'khrigs pas mdzes/_/shes rab pha rol phyin de ni/_/ye shes chen por dbang bskur 
[\[144b.7\]]ldan/_/cha brgyad gang dag brjod pa yang /_/dbus kyi cha las byung ba ste/_/gzungs kyi tshul du bri ba yang /_/cho ga'i rim bzhin mthun par bya/_/de la shar phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo dbang po chen po'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa ut+pa la'i phyag rgyar bri bar bya 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]ste/_mtha' rnams su ut+pal bkram zhing me lce 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA rA oM b+ha ga 
[\[145a.2\]]ba ti/_sarba ta thA ga ti dza ni ke_/su rA ya pra tin/_ta ta Ta Ta/_marda marda/_A ha ra A ha ra/_hU~M hU~M dza hi dza hi swA hA/_dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham pa me lce zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/_/chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/pad+ma shin tu 
[\[145a.3\]]mdzes pa bri/_/de yi steng du 'khor lo ste/_/me lce'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa mdzes/_/de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba tha hu~M hriH/_sarba pad+ma/_ta hrIHb+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_ma tha ma tha/_da ma ma ni dam ma ni/_gar+g+ha ri gar+g+ha ri 
[\[145a.4\]]hrIHswA hA/_me'i phyogs su brten nas/_bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/_chu dang dbang chen ldan pa yi/_/phyag rgya gzugs rnams bri bar bya/_/pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje ste/_/me lce'i nang du shin tu mdzes/_/de la gzungs sngags 'di yin te/_/
[\[145a.5\]]namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tra Ta tra Ta/_mu hU mu hU/_sarba pA pa~M sho d+ha ne swA hA/_lho phyogs su ni gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/_me dang rlung dang ldan pa yi/_/ut+pa la ni der bri'o/_/de yi steng du rin po che/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs skong 
[\[145a.6\]]ste/_/me lce phreng ba 'khrigs zhi ba/_/pad+ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor/_/de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_d+ha kad+ha ka_mo Ta mo Ta/_da ha da ha/_sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na ni rdzU te swA hA/_bden bral phyogs su ni 
[\[145a.7\]]bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/_de yi me yi dkyil 'khor te/_/pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa yin/_/de yi steng du sngags pa yis/_/lcags kyu shin tu mdzes pa bri/_/phan tshun 'brel ba'i rdo rje dag_/blo dang ldan pas der dgod do/_/
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]de la gzungs sngags 'di yin te/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ha ha/_mi hu mi hu/_da ma da ma/_khA hi khA hi/_d+hu na d+hu na/_mi tsi mi tsi/_dur dAn+tad ma ni swA hA/_byang phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 
[\[145b.2\]]bri bar bya ste/_de yi dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yin/_/de yi steng du pad+ma ste/_/'od ni dus mtha'i me lta bu/_/de yi steng du ral gri ste/_/'od zer rnams kyis rab tu bskor/_/me lce phreng ba 'khrigs ldan pa'i/_/ut+pal rnams kyis kun khyab bya/_/
[\[145b.3\]]de la gzungs sngags 'di yin te/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA mi tsi mi tsi/_gardza gardza/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_ma tha ma tha/_da ma da ma/_swA hA/_rlung gi phyogs su ni dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/_/de yi rlung gi dkyil 'khor 
[\[145b.4\]]te/_/cha gsum la ni gtsug tor gnas/_/lcags kyus thams cad dgab par bya/_/me lce 'bar ba'i phreng bar ldan/_/nub phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma skul byed ma bri bar bya ste/_de yi dbang ldan dkyil 'khor te/_/de la rdo rje legs par gnas/_/de yi steng du pad+ma che/_/
[\[145b.5\]]de yi steng du bgrang nor phreng /_/de dag me lce phreng gis dkris/_/steng du pad+ma rnams kyis dgab/_/de nas cha gsum pa la ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/_/sngags pas ci rigs bri bar bya/_/brgyad rnams su yang snga ma bzhin/_/de la shar du rnal 'byor pas/_/
[\[145b.6\]]'jig rten dbang po'i 'od chen bri/_/pad+ma shin tu mdzes pa ni/_/de yi phyag rgyar brjod pa yin/_/me'i phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu bri bar bya'o/_/dbang bdag phyogs su ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 
[\[145b.7\]]phyag rgya ut+pa la bri bar bya'o/_/lho phyogs su ni lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdo rje bri bar bya'o/_/byang phyogs su ni byams pa'i phyag rgya ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o/_/rlung gi phyogs su ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya pad+ma bri bar bya'o/_/bden bral gyi phyogs su ni nam mkha'i snying 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]po'i phyag rgya ral gri bri bar bya'o/_/nub phyogs su ni sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya pad+ma bri bar bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/lag na rdo rje khyod kyis sems 
[\[146a.2\]]can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ye shes chen pos dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor brjod pa khyod yang legs so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ye shes chen por dbang 
[\[146a.3\]]skur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di su'i lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang dgra dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/_srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/_dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/_'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung 
[\[146a.4\]]ste/_de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/chom rkun gyis 'joms par mi 'gyur/_srin po la sogs pas gtse bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/_sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang 
[\[146a.5\]]bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig bzhin mngon du 'gyur/_'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gzigs par 'gyur/_shi nas kyang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur na/_
[\[146a.6\]]gang du 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang yid la byed pa dang ming tsam yang 'dzin pa lta ci smos te de'i sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/des ngan song gi sgo rnams gcad par 'gyur/_des ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang ring du 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig nang par langs nas su/_/lan cig klog 
[\[146a.7\]]par byed pa'i mi/_/srid pa'i nyam ngar byas pa yi/_/sdig las grol bar de 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/_bam po bcu gnyis pa ste tha ma/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di bris nas der zhugs par gyur na/_de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'gyur/_lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_'jam dpal kho bos ni de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad bstan par mi nus mod 
[\[146b.2\]]kyi/_'on kyang 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni sa'i rdul ji snyed yod pa de de snyed du rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can sdig can gang tshul 'di la yid mi ches pa dag yod de/_'jam dpal the tshom mang ba dang /_rnam 
[\[146b.3\]]par rtog pa sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin can dang /_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /_pha la ma gus pa dang /_ma la ma gus pa dang /_slob dpon dang bla ma la smod pa dang /_bla ma'i skyon 'dru ba'i sems can de dag la ni ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags 
[\[146b.4\]]kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lag tu 'chang du mi gzhug go/_/rna lam du yang grag par mi bya'o/_/'jam dpal de dag gi mdun du ni gtam yang mi bya'o/_/glegs bam du bris pa yang de dag gi mdun du dbye bar mi bya ste/_sems can sdig can de dag gis spong ba cung zad byas pas kyang ngan song sems 
[\[146b.5\]]can dmyal bar 'gro bar myur du 'ong ngo /_/'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes zer te/_de dag ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan dag kyang phung bar byed do/_/de ltar byed pa'i sems can de dag la ni gsang sngags kyi dngos grub med do zhes kho bo smra'o/_/sangs rgyas dang 
[\[146b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te/_de dag rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur nas nges par 'byin pa dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub gtan med do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad 
[\[146b.7\]]ces smras so/_/gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_/de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa yin te/_de dag la ni 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[147a.2\]]chen po 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang klog pa dang 'dzin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam yod par rig par bya/_lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyis zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de'i bsod nams 
[\[147a.3\]]kyi phung po yang de tsam du rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzungs sngags 'di'i rang bzhin du bzhugs te/_tshul 'di ma rtogs pa blun po de dag gis ni mi shes so/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang sems can thams cad 
[\[147a.4\]]la dbang thob pa ji snyed pa rnams rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul sna tshogs byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin rnams pa sna tshogs ston pa de dag thams cad kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag 
[\[147a.5\]]bdud pham par byed pa dang /_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no/_/'jam dpal su gsang ba'i ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dam tshig thams cad la 
[\[147a.6\]]zhugs pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de lta bu'i rang bzhin nam gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin nam dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir te/_de bas na gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ma gtogs pa de las gzhan med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[147a.7\]]dkyil 'khor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na su 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba yin no/_/'jam dpal phyogs gang du ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa'am gang 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]gi lag na 'chang ba'am gang gi phyir 'dri ba'am/_gang zhig nyin gcig bzhin du nang par langs nas lan re klog pa de la 'jigs pa rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de la nyin gcig bzhin du gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/'chi kar yang de la de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[147b.2\]]thams cad sku ston par mdzad do/_/'jam dpal ltos dang sa la gnas pa'i shing dang nags tshal thams cad ni sa med na de dag kyang med do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems la dbang thob pa rnams kyang gzungs 
[\[147b.3\]]sngags 'di dag la gnas te/_'di dag gis byin gyis brlabs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang rnyed do/_/bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do/_/byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas sems can gyi don rnam pa sna 
[\[147b.4\]]tshogs kyang byed de/_'di dag thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/yid la byos shig_/gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston cig dang /_des sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde 
[\[147b.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sa phyogs gang na ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten lta bur 'gyur ro/_/gang gi lag na 'chang ba'i sngags pa de la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/'jam dpal sngags 
[\[147b.6\]]pa de la naM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtag tu byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/sngags pa des kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rin po che'i za ma tog bzhin du rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal sems can gang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
[\[147b.7\]]dpa' rnams la gus pa med pa'i rang bzhin can dang slob dpon gyi skyon 'dru ba dag yod pa'i phyir te/_'jam dpal de dag la ni chung ngu na gtam du yang bzlas par mi bya/_glegs bam yang bstan par mi bya na/_nan gyis dkyil 'khor du yang dbang bskur ba dang klog tu gzhug pa dang bltar 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]gzhug pa lta ci smos/_'jam dpal 'di lta bu dag ltar gzhug pa dang tshig tu 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'khrul pa yin te/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i bag med pa chen por rig par bya'o/_/de ni 'khrul pa chen po dang shin tu kha na ma tho ba chen po yin no/_/
[\[148a.2\]]'jam dpal sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bslu ba ni sla'i/_gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag spong ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba ni dkon te/_dper na u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin no/_/de bas kyang gzungs sngags 'di 'dra ba dag 
[\[148a.3\]]ston pa ni dkon no/_/de bas kyang nan tan gyis sgrub pa ni dkon no/_/de bas kyang 'di gang dag gi lag na 'chang ba dang gang dag 'di nyan pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_yang na dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon/_sems can 'di dag gi bsod nams 
[\[148a.4\]]kyi phung po'i mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na/_gang dag nang bar langs nas lan cig klog pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de'i mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams 
[\[148a.5\]]cad dang phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la nad thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang la las dben pa'i phyogs su ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs la me tog phul nas tshes grangs dang zhag phyed pa dang yud tsam dang dus bzang po la 
[\[148a.6\]]grog la bris sam/_yang na yar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la spos dang me tog dang bdug pa dang lha bshos phul la/_mar gyi mar me brgyad dang gser gyi bum pa lnga bzhag nas [(]grog [,]grogs [)]la bris te mgul pa'am dpung ba'am lag ngar ram rked pa la btags la/_thab mo 'gyed 
[\[148a.7\]]pa'i nang du 'gro'am lam du 'gro 'am rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na yang de la 'jigs pa de dag thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di ni sems can la bsrung ba'i mchog yin te/_khyim mam gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang gang na gzungs sngags 'di dag 'dug pa'i 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]gnas der bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gang gis gzungs sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung bas bsrung ba byas pa la 'gal bar byed pa ni lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ste/_de'i mgo bo lag na rdo rje ngas rdo rje kun du 
[\[148b.2\]]'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pas 'gems so/_/'jam dpal char mi 'bab na yang gzungs sngags 'di dag bklag par bya'o/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong na yang bklag par bya'o/_/mi nad kyi gnod pa byung ba la yang bklags na 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te 
[\[148b.3\]]de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rgya che ba 'di dang shin tu zab pa 'di dang gting dpag dka' ba dang gsang ba 
[\[148b.4\]]bas kyang ches gsang ba sems can sdig can rnams la bstan du mi rung ba 'di ni lag na rdo rje khyod kyis shin tu dkon pa zhig smras te/_'di ni sngon ma thos na 'di sems can ji lta bu dag la bshad par bya/_lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_'jam dpal gang dag byang chub kyi sems sgom pa la 
[\[148b.5\]]zhugs pa dang gang gi tshe de dag gi byang chub kyi sems grub par gyur pa de'i tshe/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'i/_gang dag gi byang 
[\[148b.6\]]chub kyi sems rdzogs par ma gyur pa de dag ni gzhug par mi bya ste/_de dag ni dkyil 'khor yang ltar mi gzhug go/_/de dag la ni phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bstan par mi bya'o/_/'jam dpal gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir phyag 
[\[148b.7\]]rgya chen po gang bcings pa tsam gyis thams cad byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba bshad kyis nyon cig_/lag pa gnyis sbyar la g.yas pa'i gung mo bkug pa ni gzungs sngags thams cad 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ste/_gsang sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba tha 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]A gats+tsha pu nit+ti/_ba ri pU ra Ni/_sa mi sa mi/_ma~M ga li ma~M ga li hU~M phaT/_de nyid kyi gung mo snga ma bzhin du bzhag na dkyil 'khor du gzungs sngags rnams kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/_lag pa gnyis khu 
[\[149a.2\]]tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis bkug na thams cad drangs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i gsang sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA ta thA ga ta/_bo d+hi satwa ma d+ha ri/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_sa ni da d+ha~M/_ku ru ku ru/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_de nas mchod pa mchog 
[\[149a.3\]]'byung ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/_lag pa gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkyed pa ni mchod pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ste/_'di mchod pa'i mchog byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/gsang sngags la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_ma hA bU dza/_pra brta 
[\[149a.4\]]ni/_hU~M phaT/_pra brta ya pra brta ya/_/sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ye swA hA/_'jam dpal de nas slob dpon gyis cho ga snga ma bzhin du slob ma yongs su gzung bar bya ste/_byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa grub pa la dkyil 'khor 'di dang phyag rgya bstan par bya'o/_/de ma yin pa gzhan pa la ni 
[\[149a.5\]]glegs bam yang bltar gzhug par mi bya'o/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig mi shes pa'i sems can la dkyil 'khor bstan tam phyag rgya bstan na/_des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[149a.6\]]bslus bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga yang byed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni sla'i/_dam tshig mi shes pa dang lus yongs su ma sbyangs pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa ma grub pa la ston pa ni de lta ma yin te/_'jam 
[\[149a.7\]]dpal sems can de dag gi mdun du ni nam yang tshig tu brjod par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can sdig can de dag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la drin du mi gzo ba dang /_dad pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sems 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]de la ya mtshan du 'dzin par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam nas/_cang mi zer bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[149b.2\]]po gzungs sngags 'di dag mnyan pa dang dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang klog pa dang dran par byed pa dang /_chung ngu ni rna lam du grag pa tsam du gyur pa de yang shin tu dka' ba yin no/_/lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_'jam dpal 
[\[149b.3\]]gang dag gzungs sngags 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang yi ger 'dri ba'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon par rig par bya'o/_/su gro ga'am gzhan la bris nas yan lag dang nying lag gang yang rung ba la 'chang na de la 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung zhing sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 
[\[149b.4\]]'gyur te/_de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyin gcig bzhin du sangs rgyas stong las bsags par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal phyogs gang na gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa 'di gnas pa'am/_gang gi lag na yod pa'i sa phyogs de ni mchod rten lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[149b.5\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzungs sngags 'di dag 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kha ton byed pa gang yin pa de la ni/_kho bos mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de'i phyi bzhin du yang rtag 
[\[149b.6\]]tu 'brang bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe na yang kho bos de'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bya ste rtag tu byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston par bya'o/_/'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/tshig 'di ni legs par smras so/_/'jam dpal kho bos kyang de la mchod pa bya'o/_/
[\[149b.7\]]rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin du yang 'brang bar bya'o/_/rtag tu bsrung bar yang bya'o/_/'chi ba'i tshe na yang de la lung bstan par bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzungs sngags gang bsgrubs na sngags pas tshe 'di nyid la yid la ci 'dod pa'i 
[\[150a.2\]]dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags de dag gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rim par phye ba rgyas par shod cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gzungs sngags 'di dag gi 
[\[150a.3\]]bsgrub pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji skad gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig_/tshes grangs dang rgyu skar dang yang sbyar mi dgos/_smyung ba yang bya mi dgos/_bgegs kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_gzungs sngags bsgrub pa'i tshe yang rtag tu sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po thams cad 
[\[150a.4\]]kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal thog mar re zhig gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'byung ste/_kha thabs bzhin du ras nyos la skra la sogs med par bya'o/_/de nas ba las 'byung ba'i sna lngas bkrus la spos chus bsku'o/_/de nas tshes 
[\[150a.5\]]grangs dang zhag phyed pa dang yud tsam bzang po la ri mo bris te ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pa 'drir gzhug go/_/ri mo mkhan de yang 'khor los sgyur bas bsrung bar bya'o/_/nyin gcig bzhin du lha bshos dang mchod pa yang dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas ri mo mkhan gyis dbus su bcom 
[\[150a.6\]]ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bri bar bya ste/_skyil mo krung du 'dug la thor tshugs can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par bya/_bcom ldan 'das ma'i g.yon rol du so sor 'brang ba chen mo bri bar bya ste/_ut+pa la'i rgyal po chen po la 'dug cing ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[150a.7\]]zhugs la lcang lo can 'phyang bar bya/_g.yas logs su rdo rje mi pham pa'i me pad+ma dkar po la 'dug cing rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan la/_lag pa g.yon pa na 'khor lo thogs pa/_g.yas pa bcom ldan 'das ma la phyag 'tshal bar bya/_steng gi phyogs su yang rig 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]sngags 'chang gnyis me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri/_'og logs su sgrub pa po'am lag na pog phor thogs pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma la blta zhing yal ga me tog can thogs pa skyil mo krung gis 'dug par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo 
[\[150b.2\]]spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa phyogs gtsang ma'am/_dben pa'am/_ri'am nags tshal lam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_gang yid dang 'thad pa der 'dug la/_slong mo'i zas za zhing nang gi gtsang sbra spyod pas ri mo'i sku gzugs de'i mdun du gzungs sngags gang 
[\[150b.3\]]yang rung ba gcig bzung ste/_bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod byas la/_tha mar zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas te/_mtshan ra ngas bzlas brjod byas na nang par ram nyi ma 'char kar mtshan ma 'byung ste/_sngags pa'i lus la 'od zer snang ba 'byung zhing sku gzugs la me tog 
[\[150b.4\]]gi char 'bab par 'gyur/_rig sngags 'chang rnams ca co'i sgra 'don par 'gyur/_'brug sgra grag par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das ma yang bu nga grub zin gyis longs zhes tshig brjod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon phul nas/_bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[150b.5\]]la 'di skad du bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzod cig ces smros shig_/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das mas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas bzung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jog ste/_bcom ldan 'das ma'i mthus skad cig thang cig yud 
[\[150b.6\]]tsam cig de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sgrub par byed cing /_sems can gyi khams thams cad skad cig re re la dga' bar byed do/_/rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor du ma dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'jam 
[\[150b.7\]]dpal bcom ldan 'das ma'i ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i mdo 'di ni don thams cad sgrub pa/_sdig pa thams cad rab tu sel ba/_'jigs pa thams cad rab tu sbyong ba/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gang ri mo'i sku gzugs 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]'di mthong ba dang mchod pa byed pa dang su'i lag na 'dug pa dang su yi ger 'dri ba de la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam ston par 'gyur zhing sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams las skyes par 'gyur/_
[\[151a.2\]]'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_bdud sdig can rnams kyis gtse bar mi 'gyur/_'chi ba'i tshe sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang 
[\[151a.3\]]ri mo'i sku gzugs 'di mthong ba dang ri mor 'dri ba dang /_gang gi lag tu 'dug pa de ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhing ngan song ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 
[\[151a.4\]]su yang rtag tu skye bar 'gyur te smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la gsol ba btab pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzungs sngags 'di dag gi spyi'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rim par 
[\[151a.5\]]dbye ba gang gis byang chub kyi spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyis tshegs chung dus/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyes par bya bar 'gyur ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi 
[\[151a.6\]]dkyil 'khor du sems can thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byed par 'gyur ba khyod kyis shod cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal sems can rnams 
[\[151a.7\]]la phan gdags pa'i phyir gzungs sngags 'di dag gi spyi'i bsgrub pa'i rnam par phye ba bshad gyis nyon cig_/'jam dpal de la byang chub kyi spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yang rung ste/_ri mo'i ri sku gzugs bzhag la/_bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]gzugs sam/_kha dog gam/_dbyibs sam/_yi ger yid la bsams te/_zla ba drug gi bar du bsgoms na las thams cad nus par 'gyur te/_dug ni mthong ba tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/gdon gyis zin pa ni bsdigs pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[151b.2\]]gzhan ci yang rung bas zin pa yang mthong ba tsam gyis gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol na gnas pa yang las thams cad byed do/_/'jigs pa thams cad la ni lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i skud pas bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/bgegs 
[\[151b.3\]]thams cad la ni chus srung bar byed do/_/sgrub po rnams sam ro langs bsgrub pa rnams la gsang sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung ba gcig gis bdag bsrung ba dang /_gzhan bsrung ba dang /_phyogs bcing ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad par bya'o/_/de 
[\[151b.4\]]nas lus mi snang bar byed 'dod na skar ma rgyal la/_ldong ros kha thabs bzhin du nyos te rang gi khrag gis bsgos la/_de nas phyung ste ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du gzhag go/_/de nas zas su 'o ma dang phye'i 'de gu za zhing zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas 
[\[151b.5\]]brjod bya'o/_/de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la kha zas mi za bar lag pa g.yon par bzhag ste/_bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/_thig le byas bas lus ni snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[151b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das ma mthong bar 'dod na zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas za zhing ri'i rtse mor song ste bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/_zla ba nya la byang chub kyi shing drung du ci 'byor pas lha bshos dbul zhing mchod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das 
[\[151b.7\]]ma la bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das ma nyid 'ong bar 'gyur te/_de la me tog dkar po dag gis mchod yon dbul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mas sgrub pa po'i spyi bor byugs nas bu legs so/_/khyod la mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya zhes de nyid zer 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]ba dang ci 'dod pa de bslang bar bya ste/_'dod na zho'am/_rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/_lus mi snang ba'am/_sa'i 'og tu 'gro ba'am/_/gzhan yang yid la gang 'dod pa ci yang rung ba de thams cad bslang bar bya'o/_/ci ste dang pa bsgrub par 'dod na li khri 
[\[152a.2\]]las dang pa'i gzugs byas te/_ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la kun+da'i me tog gis mchod pa rgyas par byas nas mtshan rangs bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na nang par ram nyi ma 'char kar grub par 'gyur te/_de la zhon nas nam mkha' la 'phags pa dang 
[\[152a.3\]]tshangs pa gnyis par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste rma bya bsgrub par 'dod na 'jim pa la rma bya'i gzugs byas te/_ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la zla ba drug tu bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas pa'i mjug tu zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas te/_mtshan rangs bzlas 
[\[152a.4\]]brjod byas na nyi ma 'char kar rma bya'i skad 'byin par 'gyur te/_skad byung ma thag tu sngags pas bslang bar bya'o/_/de blangs ba tsam gyis sngags pa smin drug gi bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/cho ga de bzhin du sa srung gi bu bsgrubs na brgya byin dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/lus mi snang ba 
[\[152a.5\]]bsgrub par 'dod na/_mi'i thod pa blangs la shing mngar dang lhan cig tu zhib mor btags te/_tha mar yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la arga'i shing gi me bus la ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgyas par phul nas mtshan rangs sbyin sreg byas te/_nad par de'i thal bas sen mo'i 
[\[152a.6\]]sen ris byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur te/_lus mi snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba gzhan yang 'byung ste/_li khri mar dang lhan cig tu bsregs la/_de nas zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste/_ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgyas par byas na shel bzhin du/_
[\[152a.7\]]'bar bar gyur gyi bar du mtshan rangs brjod par bya'o/_/de nas grub par 'gyur te des thig le byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur te/_lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste mig sman bsgrub par 'dod na sna ma'i me tog dang lig bu mig blangs te zhib mor byas la/_de nas snga ma bzhin 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]du zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste/_mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas de sngon du gyur nas des mig bskus na phyogs gang du bltas pa de thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ci ste des mig bskus na rgyal po dang blon po dang rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa 
[\[152b.2\]]dang rgyal po'i bu mo dang gzhan yang gang su la bltas pa de thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/de nas mig sman gyi mchog bsgrub par 'dod na/_mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la mi ro rma med pa blangs te/_tsan+dan dmar po dang ldan pa'i lha bshos phul la/_de nas mi ro'i lag tu mig sman 
[\[152b.3\]]bzhag la bzlas brjod bya'o/_/bzlas brjod byas pa dang mi ro'i lag na mig sman 'dug pa de 'gul bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/_des mig bskus na gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog brgyad stong gis sbyin sreg byas na/_las thams 
[\[152b.4\]]cad bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs te/_mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la brtsams nas/_bsod snyoms kyi zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na yar kyi ngo tshes brgyad la yang yul sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la 
[\[152b.5\]]bsod snyoms kyi zas za zhing ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas zas su 'o ma 'thung zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na pha rol gyi dmag 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag 
[\[152b.6\]]gcig smyung ba byas te/_ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyas pa byas la mtshan rangs bzlas brjod byas na/_de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'grub par 'gyur te ra dz+ya~M da dA ti lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung 
[\[152b.7\]]gi nang du zhugs la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas te zas su chu 'thungs na/_de nas nam mkha' la ral gri thogs par 'gyur te/_des mchod yon phul la blang bar bya'o/_/des blangs pa tsam gyis skra lcang lor 'khyil zhing lo bcu drug lon pa'i sha tshugs dang 'dra bar 'gyur la/_
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]rig sngags 'chang du mas bskor cing sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa mang pos rol mo byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du yang mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dag grub par byed do/_/
[\[153a.2\]]gang gi tshe shi bar gyur pa de'i tshe yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/_ci ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na dgon par song la chu 'thung zhing zla ba gcig bzlas brjod byas la de'i 'og tu zla ba nya 
[\[153a.3\]]la ci 'byor pas ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgya cher byas te/_mtshan rangs bzlas brjod byas na de nas ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur te/_de blangs pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/_rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/lo drug khrir 'tsho bar 
[\[153a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa bzhin du dgos pa thams cad byed do/_/gang gi tshe shi bar gyur pa de'i tshe sa dang po la dbang bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste zas mi zad par 'byung bar 'dod na spo ma'i rtsa ba blangs la/_sle tres dang lhan cig sbyin sreg byas 
[\[153a.5\]]na kha zas mi zad par 'gyur ro/_/mig na na rgyam tsha btags pa la lan bdun bsngags te mig bkab na mig nad sos par 'gyur ro/_/ka la ping ka'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i chu dang btags la lte ba'i phyogs su bskus na bud med bde bar bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba sbyang 
[\[153a.6\]]kis zin pa'i tshe ba ser skya'i mar zangs kyi snod du bcug ste tsi ri ri zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/nye ba'i gso sbyong byas pas tshes bcu drug nas brtsams te/_til dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa sbyin sreg byas na rA dz+ya~M pra ti la b+h+ya te ri mo'i gzugs 
[\[153a.7\]]kyi drung du bye ba phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma mthong bar 'gyur te chos ston par yang byed do/_/de thos pas phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan dmar po las rdo rje byas la de glor bzhag ste 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]byas na de la reg pa tsam gyis gling bzhi'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/shing pa ta'i 'bras bu sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rgya shug gi 'bras bu rnams kyang de bzhin te gang gi ming nas brjod cing sbyin sreg byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/yang na ni ma 
[\[153b.2\]]pa'i 'bras bu sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ba ru ra'i me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na yul chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/ma li ka'i me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na zas zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/ka ra bI ra'i me tog 'bras bu 'bum phrag 
[\[153b.3\]]gcig sbyin sreg byas na ti na ra 'bum rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog khri sbyin sreg byas na mdun na 'don mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/bra ma'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig zangs kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag ste ti na ra rnyed kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/_/gu gul gyi sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal phran 
[\[153b.4\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/shing bil ba'i me'i me bus la ma li ka'i me tog 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ba ru ra'i shing gi me bus la a ga ru'i yam sreg shing khri'i sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/lha chen po'i gnas 
[\[153b.5\]]su song ste ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor byas la arga'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad phul na/_lha chen po mthong bar 'gyur te dngos grub gang 'dod pa sbyin par byed do/_/lha chen po'i gnas su ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na/_dka' thub zlog 
[\[153b.6\]]gi khyo mthong bar 'gyur te dngos grub gang 'dod pa sbyin par byed do/_/dur khrod chen por ri mo'i sku gzugs bris te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na ro langs chen po mthong bar 'gyur te/_mche ba mi sdug pa gtsigs la me phung chen po ltar byung na yang de la 'jigs par mi bya bar phyag rgya 
[\[153b.7\]]bcings la bsnun na des 'gyel bar 'gyur te/_de la dam pa bslangs na rgyal srid dam gter ram mi snang ba'am yul lam rkang pas rgyu ba yang rung ste/_dam pa lnga po dag las gang yang rung ba zhig sbyin par byed do/_/lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis ni lha'i bud med 'gugs par byed do/_/
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]sna ma'i me tog kham bye ba stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/_nyin gcig bzhin ti na ra re re rnyed par byed do/_/ci ste dgra srog dang bral bar 'dod na/_lan tshwa'i sreg blugs lan 'bum sbyin sreg byas na srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste nam mkha' lding 
[\[154a.2\]]bsgrub par 'dod na/_grog mkhar gyis las nam mkha' lding gi gzugs byas te/_ba las byung ba'i sna lngas bskus la/_de nas nam mkha' lding gi gzugs de ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na/_de nas grub par 'gyur te 
[\[154a.3\]]de la zhon nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro'o/_/de la yo byad thams cad kyang sgrub par byed do/_/'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/klu thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ji ste 'khor los sgyur ba bsgrub par 'dod na/_lcags ur mo'i 'khor lo byas la spos 
[\[154a.4\]]chus bkrus te gur gum gyis byugs la/_de nas a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste/_ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mngon par bzhag la sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na des grub par 'gyur te/_de bzung ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/_
[\[154a.5\]]rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing /_lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas/_lha'i gzhal med khang gi nang nas nam mkha' la 'gro zhing rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste 
[\[154a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das ma bsgrub par 'dod na/_ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzlas brjod drug 'bum byas na/_bcom ldan 'das ma mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/_mthong ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su spyod par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 
[\[154a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs pa yang 'thob bo/_/ci ste zhi bar byed par 'dod na/_pad+ma kha ma bye ba stong rtsa brgyad phul na su'i ched du phul ba de zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/_de'i nad thams cad med par 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/ba ru ra'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro/_/dpal gyis zin par 'gyur ro/_/a ti muk+ta ka kha ma bye ba khri sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ched du byas pa de gdon gang gis zin par gyur pa de la bltas pa tsam 
[\[154b.2\]]gyis gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe mar zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste du ba 'thul gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas nas/_de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste rma bya bsgrub par 'dod na/_chu ngogs gnyi gnas sa blangs te tsan+dan dang bsres la rma bya'i 
[\[154b.3\]]gzugs byas te/_de nas rma bya de ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la/_rma bya'i sgra 'byin gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/ci ste rdzas bsgrub par 'dod na/_kar bI ra'i me tog 'bum phul na nyin gcig bzhin ti na ra lnga lnga rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/mid 
[\[154b.4\]]pa nub tsam gyi chur zhugs la 'bum bzlas brjod byas na gter rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog kha ma bye ba 'bum sbyin sreg byas na bud med gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog khri phul na lus la nad ci yod pa thams cad byabs pas med par 'gyur zhing phyis mi 
[\[154b.5\]]ldang ngo /_/tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ro/_/lus la skal ba bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste pha rol gyi dmag gzhig par 'dod na mdzub mo la lan bdun sngags te bsdigs na dmag 'bros par byed do/_/'thab par 'dod na/_'ug pa'i sgro 'bum 
[\[154b.6\]]sbyin sreg byas na tsher 'thab par 'gyur ro/_/dgra phung bar byed par 'dod na ske tshe 'bum sbyin sreg byas na dgra srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rgya shug gi 'bras bu tsha ba gsum gyi mar du smyugs pa khri sbyin sreg byas na bgegs thams cad kyis mi gtse bar 'gyur ro/_/ba ru ra'i 'bras 
[\[154b.7\]]bu yungs kar gyi mar du smyugs pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma lngas dgra phung bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang du bya na 'bras swA lu'i phye ma las gzugs byas la gtub cing sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis brgya byin yang dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ka ra bI ba ri me tog kham bye ba sbyin sreg byas na 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gnod sbyin mo dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i lo ma sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de smyo bar byed do/_/dza ti ka li ka nan la k+Sha~M dzu hu yad rA dzA na~M ba shi ka ro ti/_a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul dbang du 'gyur ro/_mar gyi sbyin sreg gis zhag 
[\[155a.2\]]bzhi pa med par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa sbyin sreg byas na nyin gcig bzhin du ti nar re re rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas klu bsgrub bar 'dod pas ma li ga'i me tog kha ma bye ba 'bum sbyin sreg byas na klu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te de dag yod pa thams cad kyis 
[\[155a.3\]]ci 'dod pa bzhin sgrub bo/_/mya ngan 'tshang gi me tog kham bye ba khri sbyin sreg byas na/_gnod sbyin mo thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/_nyin gcig bzhin g.yog lnga brgya'i gos zas 'bul lo/_/ci ste gnod sbyin mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na/_a ga ru'i yam sreg shing 
[\[155a.4\]]'bum sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/_de dag ci 'dod pa bzhin sgrub bo/_/ci ste lag na rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod byas la tha mar zla ba nya la ut+pa la'i me tog ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas te mtshan 
[\[155a.5\]]rangs bzlas brjod byas na nang par ram nyi ma shar na lag na rdo rje 'ongs te/_'ongs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mgo la reg par byed de reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang nyid dam gzhan ci yang rung ba zhig kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/des 
[\[155a.6\]]ci 'dod pa thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs kyi mdun du shing king shu ka'i me tog 'bum phul na tin ra stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs kyi lag pa nas bzung ste zla ba gcig bzlas brjod byas na nyin gcig bzhin ti na ra re re sbyin par byed do/_/
[\[155a.7\]]phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du bzhag ste/_sna ma'i me tog kha ma bye ba khri phul na nyin gcig bzhin kAr ShA pa Na re re sbyin par byed do/_/zla ba gcig tu nam phyed na langs te nyin gcig bzhin gi wang gis dkyil 'khor byas la/_bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]byas na las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/_/bgegs rnams kyang mi 'tshe bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba gcig tu tsan+dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor bskus la/_bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na sha za thams cad dbang du 'gyur te ci 'dod pa de byed do/_/rang gi khrag gis dkyil 
[\[155b.2\]]'khor bskus te/_zla ba gcig tu bzlas brjod byas na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du 'gyur te ci 'dod pa byed do/_/shu dag dkar po 'bum sbyin sreg byas na ma mo thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/_de dag ci 'dod pa de thams cad bsgrub bo/_/li ga dur 'bru stong sbyin sreg 
[\[155b.3\]]byas na nyin gcig bzhin snod gang ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/sge'u gsher gyi rtsa ba sbyin sreg byas na/_nyin gcig bzhin kAr ShA pa Na bzhi bzhi rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/a pa marga'i snying po khri sbyin sreg byas na/_longs spyod zad mi shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/na le sham gyi 'bru 
[\[155b.4\]]stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas nas thal ba blangs te thig le byas la/_mon sran sde'u la sogs pa'i phung po'i nang du gtor na de mi zad par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste 'jam dpal bsgrub par 'dod na/_a ga ru dang bsres pa'i gi wang gis dkyil 'khor bskus la/_der gzugs bzhag 
[\[155b.5\]]ste zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas brjod byas na/_bdag nyid 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur te des chos ston to/_/de mthong na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'chang nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ji srid 'dod kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/pad+ma dkar 
[\[155b.6\]]po stong rtsa brgyad phul na/_de la 'jam dpal grub par 'gyur te/_rgyal srid dam pa'am/_sa 'og tu 'jug pa'am/_mi snang bar bya ba'am/_thos pa 'dzin pa'am/_sman bcud kyis len yang rung ste/_dam pa lnga las gang yang rung ba zhig sbyin par byed do/_/skyu 
[\[155b.7\]]ru ra'i yam sreg shing stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/_gnod sbyin mo ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/_de dag ci 'dod pa sgrub par byed do/_/bil ba'i 'bras bu 'bum sbyin sreg byas na/_dpal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad grub par 'gyur te/_
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]ci 'dod pa bzhin du sgrub bo/_/na dz+ya di ma pra yad tsan+ti/_ba ru ra'i 'bru 'bum sbyin sreg byas na/_dbyangs can thams cad grub par 'gyur te/_de dag grub pas tshig thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/pri yang ku'i me tog kha ma bye ba khri sbyin sreg byas na 
[\[156a.2\]]nyin gcig bzhin kA ra ShA pa Na lnga lnga rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste thams cad gnyid kyis log par byed 'dod na/_grong khyer gyi bdag po'i lha'i gzugs ri mor bris pa bris la/_ske tshe'i sbyin sreg byas la de'i thal ba thogs la grong khyer du song ste gtor na/_de dag thams 
[\[156a.3\]]cad gnyid kyis log cing 'dug par 'gyur te ci 'dod pa byed do/_/grong khyer la ji lta ba bzhin du yul la yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/mtshe'u skam par 'dod pas ske tshe'i sreg blugs rang gi khrag dang sbags pa khri sbyin sreg byas la de'i thal ba blangs te/_mtshe'u der gtor na mtshe'u skam 
[\[156a.4\]]par 'gyur te/_de na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis ci 'dod pa bzhin du rin po che rnams 'bul lo/_/a pa mar ga'i yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg byas na lha mo dpal mthong bar 'gyur te/_sa tsa rA dz+ya ma pra yats+tsha ti/_bil ba'i 'bras bu stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/_
[\[156a.5\]]rgyal po chen po'i mdun na 'don du 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan 'tshang gi yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg byas na/_rkang bzhi pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg byas na/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i 
[\[156a.6\]]me tog 'bum sbyin sreg byas na/_bud med thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/_/ske tshe'i sdong bu'i yam sreg shing sbrang rtsi la smyugs pa brgya sbyin sreg byas na/_gdon thams cad de la zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/'bras kyi 'o thug dang sbrang rtsi 'bab chu'i nang du 
[\[156a.7\]]gtor na/_klu mo thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur te/_rang rang gi gnas su yang khrid par byed do/_/log 'dren bsgrub par 'dod na/_a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog 'bum gtor na/_log 'dren thams cad dngos grub sbyin par byed do/_/a shwat+tha'i lo ma sbrang rtsi la 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]smyugs pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/_gnod sbyin mo thams cad rig sngags 'chang de la nyin gcig bzhin snod gang ba ci 'dod pa 'bul lo/_/rma bya'i sgro stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/_bdud kyi gnod pa thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/a ga rus 
[\[156b.2\]]marda na~M asta ha sa sran dzu hu yA da rA dza ba sho b+ha ba ti/_pri yang ku'i yam sreg shing gis ni/_ma hA rA dza gra ma hi shi ba sho b+ha ba ti/_a ga ru'i yam sreg shing gi me bus la til 'bru khri sbyin sreg byas na yul dbang du 'gyur ro/_/shing 'o ma can gyi me bus la til 
[\[156b.3\]]'bru 'bum sbyin sreg byas na/_sha za thams cad dbang du 'gyur te ci 'dod pa byed do/_/shing ma da kas me bus la na le sham gyi 'bru stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/_'byung po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/_'byung po'i bdag po re re la yang nyin gcig bzhin du g.yog 
[\[156b.4\]]brgya'i gos zas sbyin par byed do/_/gar 'gro 'dod pa der phrag pa la zhon te 'gro'o/_/mon sran gre'u 'bru 'bum sbyin sreg byas na/_'byung po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/_de dag rig sngags 'chang de'i yo byad thams cad sgrub bo/_/'jam dpal 
[\[156b.5\]]'di dag la sogs pa gzungs sngags 'di rnams kyi bsgrub pa dag gi nang du sbyor ba de'i dngos grub sbyin par byed de/_'dod pa dang sbyor ba tha dad pa dang /_sbyor ba mang yang rung /_nyung yang rung bas kyang sgrub par byed do/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang gsang 
[\[156b.6\]]sngags 'di dag 'dzin pa dang sgrub pa rnams la ni/_bgegs rnams kyis skabs med do/_/phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang 
[\[156b.7\]]bskur ba'i rgyud chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]{D497}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya aSh+Ta de bi d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum sdig pa thams cad byang bar mdzad ma/_
[\[157a.2\]]nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad ma/_bgegs thams cad rab tu 'jig par mdzad ma/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mdzad ma/_gzungs sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo'i mchog 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA he bud+d+ha mA ta ri/_sarba 
[\[157a.3\]]pA pa nA sha ni/_gardza gardza/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_marda marda/_gam+b+ha ri/_gam+b+ha ri/_ha sa ha sa/_da ma da ma/_ma tha ma tha/_ya/_bi d+hA n+sa ya/_bi d+hA n+sa ya/_sarba sha trUn ta ra ma ti/_bi ma le/_pUr ya pUr ya/_pra ti dz+nyA na/_sarba bud+d+ha par+yU pa si ti/_b+ha ga ba ti/_ga na ga na/_dza hi dza hi/_
[\[157a.4\]]bi ma sa ni/_kra ma Ni/_d+ha ba ni/_ra ma Ni/_mA taM gi swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_a ma ri/_a ma ri/_ta Ta/_b+hany+dza/_b+hany+dza/_dz+ha dz+ha/_mi tsi mi tsi/_s+pho Ta 
[\[157a.5\]]ya s+pho Ta ya/_ma tha ma tha/_durdAn+ta da ma ka swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_he he/_ki na de/_sarba ta thA ga ta b+ha ne ke_/b+h+yo d+hi na da da/_trA Ta trA Ta/_hU~M phaT hU~M phaT/_gardza gardza/_pa ra ma ti/_bi hu ri ke swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_
[\[157a.6\]]sarba thA/_b+ha ga ba ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi te a/_sarba pA pa k+Sha ya~M ka ri dz+nyA na artsi s+pha ra Ni/_b+hany+dza/_b+hany+dza/_ma tha ma tha/_da ma da ma/_A na ya A na ya/_sa ra sa ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_sarba bud+d+ha dza ne trI yai swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_gardza gardza/_ma tha 
[\[157a.7\]]ma tha/_da ma da ma/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_dun+du b+hi/_sarba nir+g+ho She/_ha na ha na/_bi d+h+wan+sa ya/_bi d+h+wan+sa ya/_mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/_da ha da ha/_bi phu la nirma la ni rdzA te/_A ha ra A ha ra/_gats+tsha gats+tsha/_sarba bud+d+ha par+yu pas ti ma/_mA bi lam+ba swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dbyings kyi 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM b+ha ga ba ti/_sarba ta thA ga ta dza ni ka/_pU ra ya pra ti dz+nyA na/_ta Ta ta Ta/_marda marda/_A ha ra A ha ra/_hU~M hU~M dza ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya 
[\[157b.2\]]ba'i gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_hU~M hrI/_sarba bud+d+ha mA ti ri/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_ma tha ma tha/_da ma ni da ma ni/_gargA ri gargA ri hrI swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[157b.3\]]mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_trA Ta trA Ta/_mu hu mu hu/_sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_d+ha ka d+ha ka_/mo Ta mo Ta/_da ha da ha/_sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na nir 
[\[157b.4\]]dzA te swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma gdul dka' ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_ha ha mi hu mi hu/_da ma da ma/_khA hi khA hi/_d+hu na d+hu na/_mi tsi mi tsi/_dur dA na ta da ma ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma bdud thams cad 
[\[157b.5\]]rnam par 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_mi tsi mi tsi/_gardza gardza/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_ma tha ma tha/_da ma da ma swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[157b.6\]]ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang gi lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/_'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/_de gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/_srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/_dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/_'thab pa'i nang na 
[\[157b.7\]]'dug kyang rung ste/_de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_chom rkun gyis bcom par mi 'gyur/_srin po la sogs pas gtse bar mi 'gyur/_de la dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar 'gyur/_rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/_de'i sdig pa thams 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de nyid la nyin gcig bzhin mngon du 'gyur/_'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su zin par 
[\[158a.2\]]'gyur/_shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/_gang 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_mi gtong bar 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/_de'i sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/des ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad par 'gyur ro/_/de ngan song dang /_
[\[158a.3\]]ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsrings par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig nang par langs nas su/_/lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi/_/srid pa nyam ngar gang byas pa/_/sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/srin po la sogs chom rkun dang /_/mtshon dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing /_/
[\[158a.4\]]dus min 'chi las rab tu thar/_/rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang /_/ngan 'gro rnams las bsrings 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung nas/_/bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha dang /_mi 
[\[158a.5\]]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te 
[\[158a.6\]]gtan la phab pa//[ {D498}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_b+ha ga bA na nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ta n+t+ra na ma/_bod skad du/_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud ces bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 
[\[158a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas lcang lo can gyi pho brang na byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]dang /_rdo rje sde dang /_rdo rje kun tu 'dzin pa dang /_/rdo rje rab tu 'dul byed dang /_/rdo rje mi bzad 'joms dang /_rdo rje gdug pa kun 'dul dang /_rdo rje dbyings las rgyal ba dang /_rdo rje dgyes gnas skyob la sogs pa'i 'khor bye ba phrag snyed rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[158b.2\]]so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje nyid kyis rdo rje thugs kar lan gsum gsor te/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyag 'tshal te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[158b.3\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po 'byung po kun 'dul bar byed cing /_sa 'og gi gdug pa can 'dul bar byed pa'i rdo rje kun 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po bshad du gsol/_rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bshad du gsol khyab bdag chen po bshad du gsol/_gdug 
[\[158b.4\]]pa kun 'dul bar byed pa chen pos bshad du gsol/_mun pa kun 'joms pa chen po bshad du gsol zhes phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab bo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_rdo rje 'chang chen po gsang ba pa khyod sems can 
[\[158b.5\]]rnams kyi don du rdo rje kun 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyu dang la zhu ba legs so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po legs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po legs so/_/de'i phyir lag na rdo rje'i rigs rnams khyed rjes su nyon la yid la zung shig_/ngas rnam par phye ste rdo rje sa 'og 'byung po 
[\[158b.6\]]'dul ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rgyud bshad kyis rjes su zung shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje kun 'dul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis sa 'og gi gdon dang /_'byung po kun 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ting 
[\[158b.7\]]nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas khro bo gdug pa kun 'dul bar byed pa du ma spros te/_sa 'og sa stengs sa bla gsum gang bar mdzad de/_sa 'og gi klu rnams kyi gnas rnams gdug pa'i hUM sgras kun tu gang bar byas nas 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]klu'i rgyal po brgyad po 'khor dang bcas pa btul te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bkug go/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas gdug pa'i sems langs te dbugs shin tu tsha bar gtong bar sems pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen te/_gsang ba'i 
[\[159a.2\]]bdag po lag na rdo rje lag na rdo rje la byin gyis brlabs nas klu thams cad kyi zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/_/oM nI la badzra kro d+ha nA ga hU~M phaT ces bzlas so/_/de nas klu mtha' yas sems rab tu zhi ste byang chub sems dang ldan par gyur pas klu thams cad sems 
[\[159a.3\]]rab tu zhi'o/_/de nas mtha' yas la sogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po chen po sa 'og na bzhugs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i dus na slad ma'i tshe sems can rnams la sa 'og gi gdon rnams kyis bar du 
[\[159a.4\]]mi gcod cing de dag gi gdug pa zhi bar byed pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol/_bdag cag klu'i rgyal po rnams dang bdag cag gi 'khor rnams kyis sems can chen po de la bar du gcad par mi nus pa bshad du gsol/_bdag cag klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba bshad du 
[\[159a.5\]]gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams la cung zad spyan gyis gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/_klu'i rgyal po dag legs so/_/zhu ba'i dus la bab bo/_/ngas sems can rnams kyi don du rab tu phye ste bshad 
[\[159a.6\]]kyis nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das legs so/_/zhes gsol te klu la sogs pa rnams ltar nyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u 'di bshad de/_hU~M/_sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/rdo rje 'dzin chen ston pa des/_/nyid kyi 'khor 
[\[159a.7\]]la rab gzigs te/_/'od zer kun tu rab bkye nas/_/gdon rnams rlag byed thabs gsungs pa/_/dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad dang /_/de bzhin bcu bzhi [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la/_/rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/_/phyag na rdo rje rab khros pa/_/gzhon tshul 'gyid ba rab 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]bsams la/_/rin chen snod dam kham phor du/_/gser la sogs pa'i rin chen bdun/_/dag par bsgrubs te rab bcug nas/_/gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bden pas/_/'byung po de la gtor byin te/_/gang gnas 
[\[159b.2\]]brtan sar rab sbas la/_/'byung po klu gdug zhi bar 'gyur/_/gang tshe zhi bas ma phan na/_/de tshe gdug pa'i mtshon cha rnams/_/rang gi khang par rab tu 'bar/_/sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po ste/_/de tshe sngon gyi sems dran pas/_/zhi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/
[\[159b.3\]]de nas 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi lha'i cho ga rab tu gsungs pa/_rtag tu byang chub sems thob cing /_/dam tshig sdom pa kun ldan pa/_/khrus kyi las rnams kun bya ste/_/rnam par dag pa'i sa gzhi la/_/dkyil 'khor ji ltar mdzes par bya/_/hU~M 
[\[159b.4\]]yig las byung lcags kyu yis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/skad cig mdun bsams mchod sogs bya/_/o~MshUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba A tA ko\u0f85ha~M/_stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom/_/nam mkha'i khams su a dang ni/_/zla ba dang po yi 
[\[159b.5\]]ge hU~M/_/'od zer kun du 'bar bar bsgom/_/'gro drug nyon mongs kun sbyangs te/_/rnam grol sa la nges bkod nas/_/'od bsdus hU~M gi rnam par bsam/_/de nyid rdo rje rtse lnga can/_/'od zer phreng ba 'phro bar bsam/_/de yi 'od kyis sems can rnams/_/rdo rje'i ngo bor 
[\[159b.6\]]thim par bya/_/de las khro bo chen po'i sku/_/sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba/_/g.yon brkyang na tshod bcu drug 'chang /_/mtha' yas la sogs brgyad kyis brgyan/_/sku mdog nag po'i gzugs can de/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams/_/na bza' sngon 
[\[159b.7\]]po'i zer 'jol can/_/spyan gsum dmar mdzes gyen du 'jil/_/ral ba gyen brdzes rdo rje yi/_/dbu rgyan can du bsam par bya'o/_/de nas ye shes khro bo che/_/spyan drangs dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsa gzhug_/mgo dang lkog ma snying ga ru/_/o~M AHhU~M gi rnam pa yi/_/yi ge 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]bcu gsum sngags kyis brgyan/_/'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje bsam/_/mi bskyod rdo rjes dbang bskur te/_/kun 'joms rnam par dag par bsam/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di'i rtsa ba'i sngags las thams cad pa gsungs pa/_o~M nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra 
[\[160a.2\]]pA Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_rab tu brjod par bya'o/_/sngags kyi phreng ba de dag kyang /_/zhi la rab dkar dbang la dmar/_/rgyas la ser po drag la gnag_/rtog pa kun tu spangs te bzlas/_/spro dang bsdu ba'i bye brag gis/_/ji ltar mos pa'i bsam gtan bya/_/mi mos rnal 
[\[160a.3\]]'byor rab tu spang /_/phyag na rdo rje khro rgyal gyis/_/dge kun rten pa'i yid 'di la/_/gang brtson pa de phan yon no/_/kun tu rab tu dga' sogs dag_/mi snang la sogs rab tu 'grub/_/kun rten rab tu spyad dge can/_/rten can sbyor ba rab tu dben/_/dngos grub mchog 
[\[160a.4\]]tu rab tu 'grub/_/dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las zhi ba'i las sgrub pa dang lha'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/bar chad 
[\[160a.5\]]zhi byed gtor ma yi/_/cho ga mchog ni bshad du gsol/_/sems can don du brtson ldan bgyi/_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so rdo rje 'chang ba gtso/_/bar chad zhi ba'i cho ga dang /_/dngos grub thabs kyi cho ga ni/_/gtor 
[\[160a.6\]]ma kun gyi gter 'gyur bshad/_/rab tu mdzes pa'i snod mchog tu/_/bza' dang bca' ba la sogs pa'i/_/phun sum tshogs pa rab tu bya/_/stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro bas/_/bru~M las mdzes pa'i snod bskyed de/_/kha~M las kha zas nam mkha'i khams/_/mnyam par 
[\[160a.7\]]bsams te sngags 'di brjod/_/o~M a kA ro mu kha~M sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA NA~M A d+ya nu t+pan+na twAd oM AHhU~M phaT swA hA zhes brjod do/_/bdud rtsir bsams te rab tu spel/_/spel ba gnyis kyis rnam par sbyang /_/nam mkhar hrIHlas pad+ma brgyad/_/dpag tu med pa bsam bya ste/_/gtso bo mgon 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]po rnam thos bu/_/gnod sbyin bye tshogs kyis bskor cing /_/klu brgyad kyis mchod spyan drang bya/_/gnod sbyin rgyal po de dag la/_/rmugs 'dzin gang ba bzang po dang /_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ku be ra dang ni/_/yang dag 'brog gnas lngas rtsen dang /_/pi tsi kuN+Da li rnams ni/_/'khor 
[\[160b.2\]]gyi tshul gyis gtso la bskor/_/phyogs dang mtshams su bsam par bya/_/bye ba'i 'khor tshogs thun mong yin/_/klu brgyad gnod sbyin phyi na'o/_/de nas lcags kyus spyan drangs la/_/ma bral gtso dang lcags kyu'o/_/bzhon pa seng ge rta yi tshogs/_/kun kyang zhal gcig 
[\[160b.3\]]phyag gnyis pa/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_/nor bu rin chen bum pa dang /_/rin chen 'bar ba ral gri dang /_/gri mdung khang brtsegs ral gri phub/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phyar bar bsgom/_/spyan 'dren tshe na rnga sogs dang /_/dung chen 'bras spos dag ni 
[\[160b.4\]]dbul/_o~M bai ba shra ba Na sa pa ri bA ra sa mA dzaHdzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_o~M bai swA hA/_o~M bai shra ba Na A kaR+Sha ya hU~M dzaH/_zhes spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/o~M a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_ces pa ni bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags so/_/de nas me tog la sogs pas/_/mchod pa 
[\[160b.5\]]dag ni nam mkha' ru/_/rab tu mchod de spro bar bya/_/o~M nI lA~M pa ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni A dz+nyA pa ya ti i ma~M ba li gr-ih+Na tu/_sa ma ya rak+Sha n+du/_ma ma sar+b+ba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tshan+tu ma ma kar+m+mA mo g+ha swA hA/_o~M bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/_o~M dzam b+ha lA ya swA hA/_o~M pUr+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/_o~M ma Ni b+ha drA 
[\[160b.6\]]ya swA hA/_o~M ku bai rA ya swA hA/_o~M sa~M pra dz+nyA nA ya swA hA/_o~M gu h+ya s+thA nA ya swA hA/_o~M pAny+tsi kA ya swA hA/_o~M tsi pi kuN+Da li ne swA hA/_gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags so/_/de nas mchod de mgron rnams btang /_/'od zer lcags kyu bkrol nas su/_/bkrol ba'i dus na 
[\[160b.7\]]gshegs dang mnyam/_/mnyam langs spyod pa'i cho ga bya'o/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las gtor ma'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod pa'i don du 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku'i ba spu nas 'od zer spros te/_rnam thos sras 'khor bcas kyi thugs bskul nas 'khor der 'dus te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te rin po che'i phye mas gtor nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[161a.2\]]bdag ni chos skyong ba'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi ba lags te/_bdag gis chos dang ldan pa rnams kyi chos bsrung zhing yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid kyis gsang ba bshad na bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar ci gnang zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[161a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so/_/rang gi gsang ba legs par shod cig_/ngas kyang rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyis kyang byin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyis khyod kyis legs par smros shig ces bka' stsal 
[\[161a.4\]]to/_/de nas rnam thos kyi bu rang gi stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi rig pa 'di smras so/_/o~M bai shra ba NA ya hU~M hU~M/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da swA hA/_zhes brjod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[161a.5\]]gi sngags 'di'i sgrub pa ni 'di lags te/_gang zhig bdag sgrub par 'dod pa des dus gsum du mchod pa rgya chen po bshams te/_bdag 'khor dang bcas pa mchod la sems rtse gcig dang ldan pas gnas dben par 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje sgom pa pos 
[\[161a.6\]]bdag gi sngags de khri phrag gcig bzlas/_de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya'o/_/de ltar bdag sgrub pa dang bdag gi las sgrub pa po des bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod par bya'o/_/de la bdag dang bdag gi 'khor rnams la 
[\[161a.7\]]mchod pa dang gtor ma rgya chen po dbul ba'i sngags ni 'di rnams yin te/_o~M bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/_o~M dzam d+ha lA ya swA hA_o~M pUr+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/_o~M ma Ni p+ha drA ya swA hA/_o~M ku be rA ya swA hA/_o~M sa~M pra dz+nA nA ya swA hA/_o~M gu h+ya s+thA nA ya swA hA/_o~M pAny+tsi kA ya swA hA/_
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]o~M pi tsi kuN+Da li ne swA hA zhes pa'i sngags de rnams ni bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags gnyis su shes par bya'o/_/de nas bdag gi las sgrub pa ni bdag gis bshad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes gsol nas 
[\[161b.2\]]'di'i las bshad pa ni/_gang zag gang gis sgrub 'dod pas/_/gsang dang sbyin sreg mnan pa gsum/_/rim pa ji bzhin shes par bya/_/bsgrub bya bstan la sdang ba rnams/_/spra tshil la sogs gzugs byas la/_/dgug dang gzhug sogs dbang du bya/_
[\[161b.3\]]yig 'bru [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad sngags kyis ni/_/dus gsum brdeg par rab byas nas/_/'phral du yid ches 'joms pa ste/_/bsgrub bya gsod par the tshom med/_/gal te sbyin sreg byed pa na/_/zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod las/_/'dir ni drag pos bsgral bar bya/_/ner 
[\[161b.4\]]spa tsha la rab bsreg bya/_/thab khung rab dang 'bring tha ma/_/rab kyis mtho gsum 'bring gis do/_/tha mas mtho gang tshad du bya/_/bud shing tsher ma can shing gis/_/kun tu drag po rab tu bsgrub/_/bag zan yungs kar mer bsreg cing /_/sdang ba'i lus ngag yid gsum 
[\[161b.5\]]rnams/_/rdzas la bstims te sbyin bsreg bya/_/'khor bcas gnod sbyin mer bsams te/_/bsreg pa'i rdzas kyis mchod pa'am/_/las me gnod sbyin rdzas kyis brab/_/gang ltar byas kyang 'grub par 'gyur/_/de tshe bstod pa 'dis kyang ni/_/rtse gcig sems 
[\[161b.6\]]kyis bstod par bya/_/hU~M kun 'dul mi bzad gnod sbyin sogs/_/gdug pa dpal tsha rab tu 'jigs/_/khro bo rngam pa cher sgrogs pa/_/'khor bcas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/o~M bai shra ba Na pu Sh+pe hU~M swA hA/_o~Mbai shra ba Na d+hu pe hU~M swA hA/_o~M bai shra ba Na dI pa~M hU~M 
[\[161b.7\]]swA hA/_o~M bai shra ba Na gan d+he hU~M swA hA/_o~M bai shra ba Na nai bi d+ye hU~M swA hA/_gtso bo mchod cing 'khor kyang mchod/_/de nas rim pas mchod pa ni/_/gsang sngags kun tu spel te bzlas/_/spro dang bsdu ba kun du bya/_/spel byed kun gyi thun mong yin/_/o~M bai shra wa NA ya che ge 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]mo mA ra ya phaT swA hA/_gtso bo ji ltar 'khor kyang de/_/rang gi rig pas mchod par bya/_/rig pa kun tu brtan byas nas/_/rdul phran bzhin du brlag par bsam/_/phrin las bcol la gtor ma btang /_/gtor dang gtor ma'i rim pa ni/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin 
[\[162a.2\]]du dbul bar bya/_/zhi ba'i las kyi rim pa ni/_/thab khung mtho gang tshad nyid la/_/bsreg rdzas la sogs rab tu dbul/_/lus ngag yid gsum sdig bcom nas/_/ye shes me yi ngo bor bya/_/snod dang thab ni dor bar bya/_/der ni gdon rnams kun sreg cing /_/bgegs 
[\[162a.3\]]chen zhi ba'i yas kyang bya/_/rgyas dang dbang du bya ba la/_/las dang bye brag rim pa rnams/_/sngar bshad pa yi las bzhin du/_/thab dbyibs bye brag shes par bya/_/ser dang dmar ba'i bud shing sogs/_/rim pa rdzas ldan dbul ba ni/_/o~M bai shra ba NA ya d+ha na~M puSh+Ti~M ku ru 
[\[162a.4\]]ye swA hA/_o~M bai shra ba Na ba sha~M ku ru swA hA/_o~M bai shra ba NA ye shIn+ta kuM ru swA hA/_gtso bo ji bzhin 'khor bcas ni/_/rig pa'i rdzas kyis mchod par bya/_/bsreg pa'i rdzas ni bag zan dang /_/yungs kar mngar sogs rim pas mchod/_/phrin las rnam bzhi kun 'grub ste/_/
[\[162a.5\]]brtse bar brtson pas nye bar 'grub/_/'bring dang tha mas 'bring dang ni/_/tha ma nyid du shes par gyis/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rnam thos kyi bu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis bshad pa'i las 'di rnams sgrub 
[\[162a.6\]]pa po des dus rgyun du bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang /_gnod sbyin rnams la dkar gsum gyis mchod par bya'o/_/chang kun tu spang bar bgyi'o/_/sha rnams ni 'os pa dang shis pa drang bar bya'o/_/de ltar rtse gcig gis bdag cag sgrub pa de rnams kyi phrin las ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[162a.7\]]bdag cag gis ma bsgrubs na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'khus par gyur cing /_bdag cag gis chos ma bskyangs par byas pa yin no/_/de la bdag gi bro tshig ni 'di yin no/_/o~M bai shra ba Na ar tha kha tham zhes pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]rnam thos kyi bu chen po legs so/_/shin tu rab tu legs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag gi don du rang gi gsang ba smras pa ni don chen po dang ldan no/_/ngas kyang de rnams kyi don nges par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di bshad kyis nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das la legs so 
[\[162b.2\]]zhes rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rnams ltar nyan no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_oM badzra pA Ni nI lA~M ba rad+ha ra badzra s+pho Ta hU~M phaT swA hA/_rig pa 'di ni las thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i sngags so/_/rnam thos kyi bu chen pos ji ltar khas blangs pa ltar gsang ba 
[\[162b.3\]]dang ldan par byed pa'o/_/de bzhin gyur zhes smras nas gnod sbyin mi snang bar gyur to/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las rnam thos sras kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom
