[\[162b.4\]]ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du gdug pa can la bsnun pa'i 'khor lo bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar thugs kyis gnang nas rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer kun tu khyab par spros te/_sems can 
[\[162b.5\]]thams cad 'khyams pas khyab par mdzad nas lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje ngas sa 'og gi bgegs la bsnun pa'i 'khor lo bshad kyis khyod rtse gcig tu nyon cig de ltar 'tshal lo zhes ltar nyan no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig 
[\[162b.6\]]'khrul 'khor byed 'dod pas/_/nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas dag tu/_/phyag na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bya/_/snod bcud rdo rje gtum por bsgom/_/rlung nas ri rab mthar thug pa/_/rdul snyed grangs kyi sku ru bsam/_/dbus na phyag rdor rnal 'byor bsgom/_/ri bong 
[\[162b.7\]]'dzin pa zhabs kyis brdebs/_/stong gsum tshad kyi zla ba la/_/bgegs chen kun tu 'dar bar bsgom/_/sku la nyi ma stong ldan pa'i/_/gzi brjid bzod dka'i 'od zer gyis/_/bgegs rnams ma lus 'tshig par bsgom/_/ljags las bzlas pa'i sngags phreng 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]gis/_/stong gsum gang bar rab tu bsgom/_/rgyan du byas pa'i klu brgyad kyis/_/kha rlangs chen po btang ba las/_/lha klu thams cad skrag par 'gyur/_/thugs las khro spros de dag gis/_/bskal pa'i rlung ltar 'thor bar 'gyur/_/phyag gis rdo 
[\[163a.2\]]rje rab bsnun pas/_sgyogs gzer bzhin du bsnun par 'gyur/_/hU~M hU~M 'brug ltar rab tu sgrogs/_/skad kyis kun tu bkug par bsam/_/de ltar byas 'gyur thams cad 'grub/_/las kyis mnar ba 'jig par 'gyur/_/phyag na rdo rje mi shes par/_/gang zhig gzhan bsgrub 
[\[163a.3\]]skal dman par/_/'di la gang 'grub thams cad 'grub/_/mchog dang thun mong bye brag go/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las bsnun pa'i 'khor lo ste le'u bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang 'khrul 'khor gyi/_/cho ga rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs/_/gro ga'am shing 
[\[163a.4\]]shun dag la ni/_/re'u mig nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i/_/'khor lo dag ni rab bris te/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo la brtsam/_/rtse gcig sems kyis rab tu bri/_/dbus su drag po'i yi ge dgod/_/gnyis par nor 'dzin yi ge ste/_/gsum pa badzra zhes pa dang /_/bzhi par chu yig dang po 
[\[163a.5\]]dgod/_/lnga par Ni ni rab tu dgod/_/mtshams bzhir bsgrub bya'i gsod snying bri/_/de ni nang gi re'u mig go/_/phyi yi re'u mig bcu gnyis la/_/oM spangs yi ge bcu gnyis la/_/de yi gsang sngags 'di yin te/_/nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT zhes bya'o/_/rab tu rdzogs 
[\[163a.6\]]pa'i 'khor lo ste/_/bsgrub bya'i snying gar dril de gzhug_/dang po'i mtha' nas dril bar bya/_/de nas sbyin sreg cho ga bya/_/gal te mnan pa byed 'dod pas/_/sngar bzhin 'khrul 'khor rdzogs byas nas/_/mtha' ru mnan pa'i cho ga bya/_/kham phor gsar pa kha sbyar du/_/bcug 
[\[163a.7\]]nas rdo rje rgya gram bri/_/rdo yi sbyin gyis rab sbyar nas/_/gtsug lag khang sogs mnan par bya/_/gal te re'u mig mi 'dod na/_/rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo bya/_/lte bar hU~M dang bsgrub bya'i ming /_/spel la rab du dgod par bya/_/lhag ma bcu gnyis rtsibs la dgod/_/
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]bri ba rdzogs na snying gar gzhug_/dgug dang gzhu gsogs byas la bsreg_/mi 'dod mnan pa'i cho ga bya/_/mar gyi dus la shis pa yin/_/'khrul 'khor ji ltar bris pa ltar/_/gang 'dod las la the tshom med/_/dper na me lces rtswa bsregs 'dra/_/gang yin gnas 
[\[163b.2\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las bri ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi cho ga ste le'u lnga pa'o//_//de nas yang lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das thams cad zab mo'i spyod yul lags pas sbyin sreg la sogs 
[\[163b.3\]]pas grol bar cang 'gyur lags sam/_bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol zhes zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje snying rje che/_/dad pa'i shugs kyis rab nyams te/_/dkyil 'khor rdzas kyi sbyor ldan zhing /_/sbyin sreg las dang de nyid 
[\[163b.4\]]shes/_/sdom par dam tshig rgyud ldan na/_/mtshan mas grol bar 'gyur ba ste/_/dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg rdzas la sogs/_/med na dngos grub mi 'grub pas/_/sbyin sreg las ni 'bad pas brtsam/_/phrin las bzhi yi sbyin sreg las/_drag po'i rim pa bya ba ni/_/khru bzhi pa yi 
[\[163b.5\]]dkyil 'khor la/_/dbus su zur gsum khru re tshad/_/zabs su khru phyed brko bar bya/_/phyi rol rim pa gsum ldan pa/_/dbus su rdo rje'i mtshan ma bri/_/rim pa gsum la rdo rje yi/_/rtse gsum phreng gis bskor ba bri/_/mtshams su lcags kyu bri bar bya/_/tsher ma can gyi shing 
[\[163b.6\]]bu ni/_/khru gang tshad kyis rab tu shis/_/dug dang khrag dang ske tshe sogs/_/rdzas ni rim par shes par bya/_/bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te/_/'jig rten gsum 'dul gzugs su bsam/_/mchod pa'i rim pa rab tu dbul/_/de la sbyin sreg 
[\[163b.7\]]gi sngags gsungs pa 'di yin te/_oM nI lA~M bar d+ha ra/_oM badzra dz+wa la a na la ha na sarbA duSh+Ta sar+b+ba b+hi r+m+ma~M ku ru nI lA~M bar d+ha ra badzra pA Ni che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M phaT ces pas rdzas rnams bsreg go/_/dug khrag ske tshe lan tshwa las/_/gzugs byas rab tu bsgrubs te bsreg_/oM nI lA~M ba 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni yak+Sha khA da ya khA da ya ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya mo ha ya mo ha ya sha trUM A na ya hU~M phaT/_gzugs la brab pa'i sngags so/_/oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni sha trUM gr-i h+Na A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaHdzaH/_'gro ba dgug pa'i sngags so/_/de ltar sbyin sreg rab byas 
[\[164a.2\]]nas/_/chu bo skams dang klu shing gcad/_/glang chen g.yang ltung me chen 'bar/_/nad dang yams sogs byung ba'i tshe/_/zhi ba mchog gi las bsgrubs te/_/thab khung zlum po rab dkar ba/_/rim pa gsum ldan khru gang tshad/_/zabs su khru phyed brkos byas nas/_/
[\[164a.3\]]zhi ba'i las kyi cho ga bya/_/de ltar byas na mtshan ma yi/_/dngos grub thob par the tshom med/_/lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/_/gus pas rgyud don rab tu zung /_/'gro ba'i don la rab brtson gyis/_/kye ma rgyud chen mchog tu gsang /_/byin rlabs sngon du cher 'byung ba/_/ston 
[\[164a.4\]]pa rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs/_/rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par gyis/_/dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las sbyin sreg gi rim pa ste le'u drug pa'o//_//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang /_/dpal chen gdan la rab bzhengs nas/_/lag na rdo rje la gzigs nas/_/
[\[164a.5\]]las kyi cho ga bshad par bya/_/dug la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la/_/gang 'dod pa yi gzugs byas te/_/snying gar 'khrul 'khor rab tu gzhug_/bdag nyid las kyi lhar gsal bas/_/ga 'u nang du rab bcug ste/_/tshon gyi tha gu sna lnga dkri/_/snying ga'i lcags 
[\[164a.6\]]kyus rab bkug nas/_/yi ge bcu gsum 'khrul 'khor bzlas/_/'gul g.yo yi ni rtags byung nas/_/chu chen gzhung la gtang bar bya/_/gal te rtags de ma byung na/_/d+ha ru ra yi khu ba dang /_/khrag dang dug bsres rab byugs te/_/tsher ma can gyi shing mes bsreg_/
[\[164a.7\]]oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni stam b+ha ya mo ha ya ban d+ha ya da ha na ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_dus gsum dag du bdugs byas nas/_/skad ngan sna tshogs gdon par byed/_/de nas sngags 'dis chu la dor/_/oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/_/tshon gyis dril nas rab tu bor/_/bsam pas 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]ba tshwa'i rgya mtshor skyur/_/de nas mi ldog bya ba'i phyir/_/sngags 'di rgyun du bzla bar bya/_/oM nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hU~M hU~M stam b+ha ya nan phaT ces rgyun du bzla bar bya'o/_/de nas las de nges par 'grub bo/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las bskrad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste 
[\[164b.2\]]bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas sems can rnams kyi don du sngags kyi le'u 'di gsungs so/_/oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags las thams cad sgrub pa'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[164b.3\]]kyi thugs kyi gsang ba'o/_/'dis ni ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad 'grub ste/_phyag rgya thams cad 'ching bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/_/dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rab tu gdengs pas so/_/sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje 
[\[164b.4\]]bzhad pas so/_/thams cad lkugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje hU~M sgras so/_/nam mkha' la 'phro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje ku mu das bya'o/_/klu thams cad 'dul ba la ni rma bya'i mjug sgros bya'o/_/dgra thams cad gsad pa la ni 'khrul 'khor gyis so/_/nor bsgrub par 'dod na dzam b+ha 
[\[164b.5\]]la'i chu sbyin gyis bya'o/_/bgegs 'phang bar 'dod na ting nge 'dzin gyis bya'o/_/thams cad 'gugs pa la ni rdo rje lcags kyus bya'o/_/rims bsrung ba la ni rtswa ku sha'i 'brum bus bya'o/_/klu sgrub par 'dod na mtshar bu'i lcug ma dang bdud rtsi chus bya'o/_/pha rol gyi dpung 
[\[164b.6\]]'joms par 'dod na gu gul gyis bya'o/_/las rnams la sngags 'bum gyis bya'o/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bzlas pa yi/_/nges pa 'dir ni bshad par bya/_/gang zhig dngos grub sgrub 
[\[164b.7\]]'dod pas/_/dam tshig sdom dang rab ldan pas/_/bdag nyid las kyi lhar bsgoms te/_/ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHdgug sogs bya/_/rang snying zla bar sngags kyi phreng /_/dngul sbram lta bur rab bsams te/_/myur dal gsal dang mi 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]gsal spang /_/yid kyis bsgrim pa'i bzlas pa bya/_/mchod pa rnam pa lngas kyang mchod/_/rab tu bsgrim pa'i bzlas pa 'dis/_/gang 'dod dngos grub nges par 'grub/_/oM AHhU~M sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/_/oM badzra pA Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa 
[\[165a.2\]]mAM/_dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/_/oM badzra pA Ni tiSh+Tha hUM/_thugs brtan pa'i sngags so/_/sku dang thugs kyi gsang ba dang /_/gsung gi gsang ba ma lus pas/_/myur du byang chub la reg 'gyur/_/gang tshe sgrub la brtson ldan pa/_/tshe gcig 'bras bu myur thob 'gyur/_/
[\[165a.3\]]gnyis med rang bzhin rdo rje can/_/mkha' dbyings rdo rje kun tu khyab/_/brjod med rtog bral de nyid don/_/lhun grub dang la rab tu gzhag_/hU~M dang a yi rnam pa can/_/ji ltar chu yi zla ba bzhin/_/ma yengs sems kyis rgyun du bsgom/_/e ma ho mgon po bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[165a.4\]]mchog las mchog tu rnam par rgyal/_/e ma ho sprul pa'i rnam pa sku/_/sgra la rab tu dmigs pa med/_/dgyes chen kun gyi spyod yul yin/_/rang gsal nyid la rnam par dag_/mchog gi byang chub tshul du gnas/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las nges pa dang rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[165a.5\]]le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang /_/'gro ba'i mgon la rab gzigs te/_/bsrung ba'i cho ga rab tu gsungs/_/lag na rdo rje rab tu nyon/_/'gro ba gdug pas zin 'gyur ba/_/zangs ma dag la dud 'gro'i gzugs/_/legs pa dag tu rab byas 
[\[165a.6\]]te/_/khong pa dngul la sogs pas dgang /_/gang nas 'dod pa'i sa phyogs sam/_/rang lus dag la legs sbas nas/_/bsrung ba dam par 'gyur ba'o/_/bde gshegs sku gdung ring bsrel can/_/rab tu gnas pa legs byas te/_/gang gnod sar ni rab sbas na/_/bden 
[\[165a.7\]]stobs brjod pas zhi bar 'gyur/_/bya la sogs pa'i byol song tshogs/_/yid 'ong mdzes pa'i dud 'gro la/_/sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye tshogs kyis/_/gsungs pa'i gzungs sngags dag gis ni/_/skud pa sngon po dag dang ni/_/dar la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te/_/bden pa bdar 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]la rab tu bsngos/_/gtor ma gtang na zhi bar 'gyur/_/kham por la sogs snod gtsang mar/_/sman dang dar sogs bar bcug ste/_/me tog bdug sogs mchod byas te/_/sa la sbas na gnod pa rnams/_/zhib ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin/_/skud pa dkar po lus bsgril la/_/
[\[165b.2\]]mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/_/sgrub dang bsgrub pa'i mchod pa bya/_/rgyal la rab tu mgul du btags/_/bar chad zlog par 'gyur bar nges/_/yungs kar mar dang mu zi rnams/_/cha snyoms lus la rab byugs na/_/gdug pas zin las thar bar 'gyur/_/ba su na da'i 
[\[165b.3\]]me tog dang /_/'da' hu na da'i 'bras bu la/_/smin drug dus su rab bsgrubs na/_/gdug pa phyogs su mi gnas so/_/stag dang dred dang 'ja' thar gyi/_/spus ni gdug pa las grol 'gyur/_/'bab chu rgya mtsho la sogs pa/_/lus bsrung bya ba mthar phyin par/_/byas 
[\[165b.4\]]na mchog tu bsrung bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'chang ba khyod kyis zung /_/mthar phyin zla ba sprin gza' las/_/grol ba lta bur 'gyur ba yin/_/dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//lag na rdo rjes legs smras pa/_/btub sngags 
[\[165b.5\]]kyi cho ga ni/_/ji ltar legs so rdo rje 'chang /_/khyed la rab tu nyan par 'tshal/_/nyon cig rdo rje 'chang ba khyod/_/sngags btu khyod la bshad par bya/_/gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/_/'dod don thams cad rab 'grub pa/_/der 
[\[165b.6\]]ni gsang sngags btu bar bya/_/dbus su yi ge'i bdag po gzhag_/bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/yi ge i ni rab tu sbyar/_/mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la/_/lnga pa yi ni mtha' dang sbyar/_/de nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa gzhag_/de nas mthar gnas gnyis pa gzhag_/de nas 
[\[165b.7\]]bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gzhag_/de nas mthar gnas gnyis pa gzhag_/de nas lnga pa'i gsum pa dang /_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/_/ra dang bcas pa gzhag par bya/_/de nas lnga pa'i dang po la/_/A yig rab tu sbyar bar bya/_/de nas gsum pa'i tha ma la/_/i ni 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]rab tu sbyar te gzhag_/bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/_/yi ge U ni rab tu sbyar/_/stong pas mnan pas nyis 'gyur dang /_/lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la/_/gsum pa yi ni dang po sbyar/_/yi ge bcu gsum rig pa'i sngags/_/brtse bas brtson par rab bzlas 
[\[166a.2\]]na/_/gang 'dod dngos grub nges par 'gyur/_/kye ma ho rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/sngags kyi rgyal po bla med lam/_/phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub thob/_/dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las sngags btu ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang /_/
[\[166a.3\]]spyan mig 'od zer sprul mdzad nas/_/slob ma rab tu smin bya'i phyir/_/dbang bskur cho ga rab tu bshad/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/_/gsang dang ldan pa dbang thob cing /_/dul dang drang dang shes nyen che/_/g.yo chung ngang bzang byang sems thob/_/dkyil 'khor cho 
[\[166a.4\]]ga rab mkhas pa/_/slob ma dam pa dbang bskur phyir/_/yid 'ong gtsug lag khang sogs su/_/brtul zhugs sngon du legs spyad nas/_/de nas sa yi cho ga bya/_/brtag dang sbyang zhing bslang ba dang /_/mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa dang /_/rmi lam mtshan ma'i sgo 
[\[166a.5\]]nas brtag_/zhi ba'i tshogs spyan sreg ni/_/brgya rtsa brgyad kyi cho ga bya/_/'byung po rnams la mchod cing bsgo/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su rab gnas te/_/hU~M las rdo rje chen po bsgom/_/bru~M las gzhal yas khang chen bsgom/_/spyan gnyis nyi zla'i 'od zer gyis/_/bgegs 
[\[166a.6\]]rnams ma lus tshar gcod do/_/rdo rje chen po gar 'gros kyis/_/sa gzhi lan gsum bskor bar bya/_/ba yi rnam lngas legs byugs te/_/tshom bu gcig gis lha dgod bya/_/mchod dang bstod dang snyan gsan dbab/_/bum pa lhag par gnas par bya/_/slob ma tsho 
[\[166a.7\]]gsar ba smin bya/_/thig dang tshon gyi cho ga ni/_/las kyi cho ga bzhin du bya/_/gdong g.yogs dar ni sngon po yis/_/slob ma dag ni gzhug par bya/_/sdom ldan dbang bskur rnam lngas bskur/_/bum pa dang po rdo rje dang /_/dril bu dbu rgyan ming gi dbang /_/las kyi cho ga ji 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bzhin no/_/tshes bcu bzhi dang bcu gsum la/_/slob ma las la gzud par bya/_/byin rlabs rim pas 'pho ba dang /_/'phral du yid ches bskyed par bya/_/rin chen snying po dri med rgyud/_/rgyud rnams kun gyi rtsa bar ni/_/'dir dbang bskur ba dam pa yin/_/smin 
[\[166b.2\]]pa'i las la brten pa yi/_/dbang bskur mchog gi rgyud gsungs pas/_/rab gnas dge bsdom pa ldan/_/dam pa yon gyis mnyes par bya/_/grol ba mthar phyin rab tu gnas/_/slob ma smin pa'i cho ga'o/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i 
[\[166b.3\]]le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du thugs kyi gsang ba bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[166b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje mi bzad khyod/_/gzhan don bag brtson legs so legs/_/gang zhig dus kyi snyigs ma la/_/gdul dka'i sems can 'dul 'dod pas/_/dang por byang chub sems bskyed la/_/tshogs gnyis kun rdzogs mthar phyin pas/_/rin chen 
[\[166b.5\]]snod du pad+ma'i gter/_/dbus su gsang ba'i bdag po can/_/'dab ma brgyad la klu chen brgyad/_/sbrul mgos brgyan pa dgod par bya/_/khrus dang gtsang sbra dang ldan pas/_/las kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/dang po spyan drangs rab mchod nas/_/bdag dang lha gnyis 
[\[166b.6\]]'phro 'dur bzlas/_/klu brgyad zhi bar 'gyur sems kyis/_/hU~M dang hU~M gi thag pa las/_/bsgrub bya 'od kyi phung por bya/_/skad cig mas ni hU~M du bslang /_/oM badzra kro d+ha a hI tsaN+Da phaT/_khri bzlas gdon las nges grol 'gyur/_/lag na rdo rje khyod kyis ni/_/thugs kyi 
[\[166b.7\]]'phros 'du gsang ba yin/_/bsgrub bya'i lus ni tshon gyis dkri/_/hU~M chen phreng ba'i 'phro 'dus gcad/_/rdzas chen rnams la rab brtags na/_/nges par gdon las grol bar 'gyur/_/gal te des kyang ma grub na/_/sngags kyi phreng ba bzlog ste bzlas/_/rdo rje phreng bas rab 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]bcad nas/_/the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/'og gi bgegs bzlog cho ga mchog_/yid bzhin nor ltar 'byung ba yin/_/theg pa gsum las nges rgyal ba'i/_/rgyud chen gsang ba mthar thug pa/_/skyob pa'i thugs kyi dam pa yin/_/
[\[167a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/_lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor rnams dang /_lha'i tshogs thams cad yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las 
[\[167a.3\]]gsang ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//kha che'i paN+Di ta tse lu dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//[ {D499}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya badzra pA Ni nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA tA la nA ma tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_
[\[167a.4\]]'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba'i rgyud/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sa 'og rim pa bdun klu'i rgyal po'i gnas na rin po che'i khri la bzhugs te/_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[167a.5\]]dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang /_rigs ldan la sogs te klu rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams dang thabs cig ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye bas 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang /_ltas byung bas 
[\[167a.6\]]'jig rten pa rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas brgya la bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_'od zer 'di 'gyur ba dang ltas byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad 
[\[167a.7\]]med pa las grub pas 'bras bu yang tshad med kyis byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba las bslad du gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye ste/_'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis brgyal ba las bslang ngo /_/de nas 'jig rten pa rnams 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]kyis ched du brjod pa/_e ma thub chen thugs rje yi/_/'jig rten thams cad brgyal gyur na/_/thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis/_/brgyal ba thams cad slongs par gyur/_/de nas 'jig rten pa rnams sa 'og rim pa bdun gyi klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'dus par gyur 
[\[167b.2\]]nas gsol ba btab pa/_sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las can/_/ston pa bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin/_/'jig rten rnams la phan gdags phyir/_/rdul bral chos rnams bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_/badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra pA Ni hUM zhes 
[\[167b.3\]]gsungs pas snod dang ldan par byas so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khrugs so/_/shin tu yid 'khrugs nas kha g.yab cing brang brdungs te/_kye ma kyi hud bdag klu'i gnas dang ston pa ni 'jig rten pas phrogs pas 'jig rten pa rnams brlag par bya'o zhes zer 
[\[167b.4\]]nas/_klu'i kha'i rlangs pas 'jig rten pa rnams la mdze'i nad btang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thugs ka'i dpal be'u las nad sel ba'i 'od zhal nas kyang badzrad ya zhes bya ba'i sngags dang bcas te 
[\[167b.5\]]byung bas me long la has btab pa bzhin du song ngo /_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis klu bran rnams bskul nas la las rtsa nas zhugs so/_/la las dbang po'i sgo nas zhugs so/_/la las rus pa nas zhugs pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba'i ting nge 
[\[167b.6\]]'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rtsa nas zhugs pa la dbugs kyis bsregs so/_/dbang po la zhugs pa dang /_rus pa la zhugs pa bsreg pa'i 'khor los bcom mo/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams cher 'khrugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid la snang ba re re chad nas 
[\[167b.7\]]lus la dkri bas byang chub kyi sems dang ldan te rgyan du song ngo /_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis bstod pa/_'jig rten 'di na klu rgyal mthu che yang /_/bcom ldan ba spu'i brgya yi char mi phod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'gro ba skyob pa la/_/klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis rtag 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]tu bstod/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/_ser sna'i dbang gis dbul gyur pa/_/nor rnams 
[\[168a.2\]]ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_/mdun gyi phyag na rdo rje yi/_/ye shes sems dpa'i phyag g.yas par/_/dzam+b+ha la ni bsgom par bya/_/bdag nyid sngags kyi rgyal po zlos/_/snying gar 'od zer dag gis ni/_/ye shes sems dpa' bskul bar bya/_/ye shes sems 
[\[168a.3\]]dpas dzam+b+ha la'i/_/sngags ni zlos pa nyid du bsgom/_/ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas/_/'od byung dzam+b+ha la bskul lo/_/nor gyi rgya mtsho gang bar 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba btab pa/_nyes pa shin tu phra mo 
[\[168a.4\]]la/_/grags dang rnyed pa'i don du ni/_/'jig rten gnod byed sgrib byed pa/_/thog ser bzlog pa bshad du gsol/_/thog mar mchod rten sngon po brtsig_/rab gnas gzhung dang mthun par bya/_/de yi 'og tu 'khor lo ni/_/rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas pa bri/_/
[\[168a.5\]]rtsibs la lha srin snying po bri/_/k+hA~Mr+d+ha/_ts+hAng+ha/_tsh+hAr+ng+ha_sh+har+ng+ha/_oMd+ha/_m+hor+d+ha/_t+hA+o~Mr+d+ha/_s+b+har+d+ha/_dbus su sngags mkhan bri bar bya/_/de nas thod pa'i nang du gzhug_/thod pa mchod rten 'og tu mnan/_/snying po'i 'od kyis sngags mkhan dang /_/lha srin 'khor dang bcas pa 
[\[168a.6\]]dgug_/de la thun gyis brab par bya/_/'byung po 'khrug pa'i dus su ni/_/ston pa'i nga rgyal ldan pa la/_/mthe bo dag ni mthe'u chung la/_/hU~M las phyag na rdo rje bskyed/_/mthe'u chung phyag na rdo rje yi/_/thugs nas phyag na rdo rje ni/_/zhags pa lcags kyu thogs pa 
[\[168a.7\]]spro/_/snying gi lcags kyus dgug pa dang /_/mgrin pa zhags pas bcing bar bya/_/mthe bong phyag na rdo rje yi/_/rdo rje las ni rdo rje spro/_/bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya/_/ba spu'i gshis na rdo rje 'phro/_/nam mkha' thams cad rdo rjer grub/_/yungs 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]kar rdo rjer bskyed la brab/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa/_e ma'o ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/sems can rnams la phan don du/_/tshar gcad rjes gzung gsungs pa mtshar/_/dbul dang yi 
[\[168b.2\]]dgas gnas las thar/_rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las nor bsgrub pa dang gnod pa bzlog pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/_klu dang gnod sbyin sa bdag 
[\[168b.3\]]gi/_/mdze dang dmu chu ji ltar bzlog_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/mdo sdes ni las kyi rnam par smin pa mi zlogs la sngags kyis bzlog pas khyad par du 'phags so/_/de la klu zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa gti mug shas che 
[\[168b.4\]]bas chags pa dang zhe sdang yang che ste/_gti mug gi dbang gis gnyid che ba dang /_zhe sdang gi dbang gis skye ba bdun du mi gtong ba dang /_chags pa'i dbang gis chags pa la gnas pa'i lus la zhugs nas mi gtong ba'o/_/klu gdol pa can gyis mthong ba tsam gyis nad 
[\[168b.5\]]bskyed do/_/rigs gsum ni reg pa tsam gyis nad bskyed do/_/klu bran rnams ni steng sgo gsum nas zhugs nas lus kyi bcud za bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_de rnams ji ltar 'dul bar bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das klu 
[\[168b.6\]]'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so/_/nA ga bi dA ra NA dzaH/_nA ga ut+sA da na ya dzaH/_sbyor ba gsum la legs gnas pas/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis 'gugs par 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[168b.7\]]kyis klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_nyid kyi dbugs las sngags 'di rnams phyung ngo /_/tad+ya thA/_bud d+ha bud d+ha/_bi bud d+ha bi bud d+ha/_mA ti kra ma tha/_ha ra ha ra nA ga nAM/_pra ha ra pra ha ra nA ga nAM/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/_b+hin+da 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]b+hin+da nA ga mar+m+mA Ni bi ShI r+yan tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni/_bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga nA ya nA ni/_'jigs shing skrag ste brgyal bar 'gyur/_/snying gar yi ge hU~M bsgoms pas/_/klu rnams thams cad bsregs gyur pas/_/bde ba can gyi gnas su skye/_/byang chub 
[\[169a.2\]]sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_de la 'jug pa'i gnas du mchis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtsa bzhi dag nas zhugs gyur nas/_/rtsa rnams na zhing tsha ba dang /_/steng sgo mi bde rdul yang 'byung /_/rmugs dang gnyid kyi bdag nyid can/_/
[\[169a.3\]]sha mdog dbu ba lta bu ste/_/rmi lam du ni chu 'od 'byung /_/de nas chags pa spyad par bya/_/dbang po gsum du zhugs gyur na/_/dbang po sbrid cing lus kyang 'dar/_/sha ni skam zhing rus pa na/_/de la chags pa mi spyad do/_/sa yi dbang po kun nas 'jug_/ba spu'i 
[\[169a.4\]]khung bu dmar zhing 'gyur/_/phol dang sha bkra 'byung ba dang /_/rmi lam du ni byol song 'byung /_/rgyal po dang ni rtsa bzhir 'jug_/tho rangs mi dga' mngon shes smra/_/gnyid chung ba spu'i gshis kyang dkar/_/gu gul nag po bsten par bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[169a.5\]]phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_nad de 'tsho ba dang mi 'tsho ba'i rnam pa ji ltar lags/_rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa/_bsnyen pa mtshan ma thob pa yis/_/bdud rtsi lnga dang gla rtsi dang /_/'bras bu gsum dang rma bya'i sha/_/ril bu byas la sgal tshigs gzhag_/de yi bar du rma 
[\[169a.6\]]bya'i sgro/_/mdangs dang ldan na 'tsho bar nges/_/nag por gyur na mi 'tsho'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de la tshar gcad pa'i thabs du mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sngags dang 'khrul 'khor sman 
[\[169a.7\]]dang bsreg_/thabs ni rnam pa bzhi yin te/_/byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/dbang bskur dam tshig ldan pa dang /_/bsnyen pa brtan par gyur pa yis/_/dang por sngags kyis bzlog par bya/_/snying ga'i sngags kyi rgyal po yis/_/rlung dang 'grogs te 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]'byung bar 'gyur/_/nad kyi snying por hU~M bsams te/_/rgyu rkyen tshogs pas bsreg par bya/_/de nas phyir bzlog mnan par bya/_/sbyin sreg rnam pa gsum du bshad/_/dang po zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ste/_/zlum po khru gang kha dog dkar/_/kha khyer sor bzhi 
[\[169b.2\]]rdo rjes mtshan/_/gru gsum sor bcu kha dog nag_/kha khyer sor gsum rdo rjes mtshan/_/zla dbyibs zla ba dmar 'dra ba/_/khru do kha khyer de 'drar shes/_/zhi ba 'o ma can shing gi/_/gtum pa 'bigs par byed de'o/_/dbang yang zhi ba dag dang mtshungs/_/
[\[169b.3\]]rgyun bzhag me dang rigs ngan khyim/_/ra~M las thab dang me lha bskyed/_/zhi rgyas dbang la bdud rtsi lnga/_/gtum pa dmar dang khrag dag dang /_/dug dang gu gul nag po dang /_/gzugs brnyan dag gis mchod par bya/_/'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa mchog gi sras/_/
[\[169b.4\]]me lha'i rgyal po Tak+kis dbang bskur zhing /_/shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad sreg_/'jigs byed me lha nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/gzi brjid chen po me yi lha/_/'dod pa thams cad rab stsol zhing /_/bdag gzhan phan sogs la zhugs pa/_/tshangs 
[\[169b.5\]]sras mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/me yi thugs kar drag po ni/_/cho ga bzhin du bskyed par bya/_/sbyin sreg de dag 'brel pa yis/_/nor rnams thams cad ster bar byed/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la zhus 
[\[169b.6\]]pa/_drag po'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas lha srin thams cad 'dul ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/_/Tad+ya thA/_hU~M phaT nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hU~M phaT/_/nA ga ut+sA da nA ya hU~M phaT/_nI la bas nA ya hU~M phaT/_a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya hU~M 
[\[169b.7\]]phaT/_kr-i tA na tA ya hU~M phaT/_kri tAn+ta rU pA ya hUM phaT/_ro Sha NAya hU~M phaT/_trA sa nA ya hU~M phaT/_kum+b+haN+Da ut+sA da nA ya hU~M phaT/_pra ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/_yak+Sha a pa smA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/_ha sa ha sa/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_nA sha ya 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]nA sha ya/_sar+b+ba big+h+na bi nA sha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/_sar+b+ba sha trUM saM brta bi nA sha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/_nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_o~M badzra a na la ma hA b+hu ta dz+wA la b+ha smiM ku ru swA hA/_mA ra ya hU~M phaT/_puSh+Ti ku ru o~M/_sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 
[\[170a.2\]]ni/_/lha srin thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ched du brjod pa/_e ma dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis/_/drag po 'dul bar dbang bskur nas/_/sngags rgyal gsungs pas skrag 'gyur ba/_/ngo mtshar 'di ni shin tu lha zhes 
[\[170a.3\]]pa'o/_/de nas rang rang gi srog snying ston pa la phul nas bran gyi tshul du gnas so/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las bcos dka' ba'i nad bzlog pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa dang phyag byas nas 
[\[170a.4\]]gsol ba btab pa/_sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchog_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/_/de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing /_/dbang bskur ba yang ma thob na/_/bsgrubs kyang 
[\[170a.5\]]ci yang mi 'grub po/_/de bas da ni bshad bya ba/_/gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhir bgyi/_/thig bzhi dag dang ldan gyur pas/_/cha chen bzhi ru btab byas na/_/shar gyi cha chen dang por ni/_/bzhir bgos dang po lte ba dang /_/gnyis pa pad+ma ral gri gnyis/_/gsum pa lha yi 
[\[170a.6\]]snam bu'o/_/de nas tshon ni dgye bar bya/_/lte ba dkyil 'khor 'od dang bcas/_/pad+ma sngon po ral gri sngon/_/lha snam gnag la rdo rje'i sgo/_/bzhi ni dkar por bri bar bya/_/sgo yi phyi rol kha dog gnag_/me ri 'bar ba bri bar bya/_/de la rdo rje phreng bas bskor/_/mda' dang 
[\[170a.7\]]phur bu bcu drug la/_/tshon skud sngon po bri bar bya/_/dbus su bcom ldan 'dab ma la/_/klu chen phyed gzugs sbrul mgo can/_/rdzogs par byas nas rnal 'byor ni/_/cho ga bzhin du gnyis ka yi/_/rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin du bskyed/_/dang po bla ma'i spyan sngar ni/_/
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]phyag 'tshal la sogs bdun rnam dag_/de nas ye shes sems dpa' la/_/me tog gtor zhing bstod pa bya/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba bdun rnam dag_/byas nas ye shes dbab par bya/_/gnas gsum yi ge gsum bsams la/_/sngags 'di yang ni brjod par bya/_/
[\[170b.2\]]A be sha ya staM b+ha ya rA rA tsA la ya tsA la ya hU~M AHoMdzaiH/_de nas dkyil 'khor brtan byas la/_/rig pa'i dbang ni cho ga bzhin/_/de nas sngags kyi rjes gnang sbyin/_/rnal 'byor snying ga'i sa bon las/_/sngags kyi 'od kyis ye shes bskul/_/ye shes ljags las 'od 
[\[170b.3\]]byung las/_/snod gyur lce la thim par bsam/_/bsgrub pa'i rdzas kyi bkra shis brjod/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba 
[\[170b.4\]]btab pa/_snying po kun la phan gdags dang /_/sangs rgyas bstan la gzhug don du/_/gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya ba ni/_/rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol/_/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/sems can kun la phan don du/_/gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya ba ni/_/gsung ni 
[\[170b.5\]]'di skad bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang /_/theg pa che la smod pa dang /_/de bsgrub pa la snying nas brnyas/_/sgrub pa 'di ni brtsam par bya/_/de la ri rab kyi 'og na las kyi gnod sbyin gyi lus blangs la gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi yod pa gdong dang po bcom ldan 
[\[170b.6\]]'das kyi sngags zlos pa/_gnyis pa na rang gi srog snying zlo ba/_gsum pa na me lce'i dbugs 'byung /_bzhi pa na sha dang khrag zab yod/_de sgrub pa'i thabs bshad kyis legs par nyon la yid la zung shig_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/sngags kyi rgyal po 
[\[170b.7\]]'bum bzlas la/_/'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor bri/_/de yi steng du khrag chen gyis/_/pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa/_/btson dong tshul du bri bar bya/_/dar sngon de yi nang du bting /_/dbus su mi yi sha dang khrag_/dang po khyi ste gnyis pa phag_/gsum par rna can zangs 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]gtsug phud/_/lnga par skad can drug par ra/_/bdun pa skye gnyis brgyad par glang /_/g.yas kyi phyogs nas bskor ba'o/_/ma he rta dang lug dang spre'u/_/g.yon gyi phyogs nas bskor ba'o/_/de ni dbul ba'i dam tshig go/_/khrag dang dug dang 
[\[171a.2\]]ske tshe yis/_/nam gyi phyed kyi dus dag tu/_/dur khrod ras la 'di ltar bri/_/zhal brgyad phyag stong yang na bcu/_/zhal bzhi dang po zhi ba ste/_/gnyis pa dmar po chu srin no/_/gsum pa khro nag yid dang khro/_/bzhi pa [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mgo yin no/_/skra ni gyen brdzes 
[\[171a.3\]]zhal dang mtshungs/_/sprul pha bya rgod khra dang spyang /_/de yi mgo can bri bar bya/_/dgug gzhug dbang ni bskrad par bya'o/_/'di ni bstan pa'i dam tshig go/_/bsnyen pa'i dam tshig gnyis dag gis/_/gsum rgyal dag las shes par bya/_/o~M yak+Sha ha sa ha sa da ra 
[\[171a.4\]]da ra hU~M/_khra dang spyang ki khyi la sogs/_/rmi lam du 'am dngos su 'byung /_/de nas mchod pa'i dam rdzas kun/_/bsgrub bya'i rdzas dang bsres byas la/_/gzugs brnyan byas la thod par gzhug_/mar ngo gnod sbyin gzugs kyis mchod/_/o~M yak+Sha mA ra ya mA ra ya/_
[\[171a.5\]]a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya phaT/_sar+b+ba shA trUM saM g+ha binA sha ka rA ya phaT/_nI lAM ba rad+ha ra badzra pA NI rA dz+nyA pa ya ti mA ra ya tsit+ta la phaT/_des kyang grub par ma gyur na/_/gzugs brnyan rdul la sbyin sreg bya/_/las skyes gzugs brnyan gong bur gzhug_/des kyang 
[\[171a.6\]]grub par ma gyur na/_oM yak+Sha mA ra ya/_mA ra ya/_nA ra ya/_nA sha ya/_nA sha ya/_tsit+ta la rbad rbad/_phyag gi rdo rjes bsnun par bya/_/des kyang grub par ma gyur na/_/nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/_stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ngo mtshar 
[\[171a.7\]]nas ched du brjod pa/_zung du 'brel bar gnas gyur pa/_/ya~M las rlung ste pa~M las pad/_/'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di/_/bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las gnod sbyin sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang la gsol ba btab pa/_snying nas slob dpon smod pa la/_/klu gzhug pa ni ji ltar lags/_/rdo rje can gyis bshad du gsol/_/klu'i lag na nad bcu gcig yod de/_mdze dang /_mdza' to dang /_ka ta ma dang /_ka she dang /_'bras dang /_
[\[171b.2\]]phol dang /_shu ba dang /_skem pa dang /_g.yan pa dang /_dmu chu dang /_gag pa'o/_/klu'i gnas ni sa 'og gi rim pa bdun no/_/klu bran ni 'dzam bu'i gling na yang yod do/_/'khor ni rnam pa bzhi dag gis/_/gtsang ma'i gos dag gyon nas ni/_/dkar gsum dag 
[\[171b.3\]]kyang bza' bar bya/_/sngags rgyal nyi 'bum bzlas byas la/_/dkyil 'khor tsan+dan gur gum byug_/pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bya ste/_/bdag nyid lag na rdo rje la/_/klu chen brgyad kyis bskor ba bri/_/de la sogs pa bshad zin to/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub phyogs su/_/
[\[171b.4\]]klu yi gzugs cig brtsam bya ste/_/rin chen lnga 'am gla rtsi 'am/_/mchod pa'i rdzas ni 'o ma sogs/_/dang po 'das pa'i mchod pa bya/_/spyan drang mchod dang bstod pa ni/_/cho ga bzhin du bya ba'o/_/klu yi snying gar hU~M bsgoms la/_/'od zer rnam pa gsum dag 
[\[171b.5\]]gis/_/klu chen gnas nas dgug par bya/_/gzugs brnyan de la bstim byas la/_/mchod pa dag gis mchod par bya/_/gzugs brnyan g.yo ba 'byung ba na/_/sdang pa'i lus la gzhug bya ste/_/dbang po brgyad nas gzhug bya ste/_/brgyad cha tha ma'i dus dag tu/_/
[\[171b.6\]]'o ma gla rtsi kha ra yis/_/lam ni drang por drang byas la/_/gong bu dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/de la klu chen gzhug par bya/_/sgrub pa po yis gu gul bsten/_/gzugs la phur bus gdab par bya/_/des kyang grub par ma gyur na/_/lha yi rnam pa nyid dag la/_/spogs 
[\[171b.7\]]pa dag gi cho ga bzhin/_/tad+ya thA/_hU~M phaT nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hU~M/_nA ga bi dA ra NA ya/_ha sa ha sa/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_sar+b+ba shA trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ga rA ya phaT/_nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti sha trUM tsit+ta mA ra ya phaT/_oM nA ga g+ha g+ha/_g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/_
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]sar+b+ba du Th+TA na phaT/_kI la ya kI la ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya/_badzra daM sh+T+rod A dz+nyA pa ya ti nA ga kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya phaT/_nA ga bi dA rA ya phaT/_nA ga ut+sA da nA ya phaT/_nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/_sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems 
[\[172a.2\]]can rnams 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das brgyal ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_A be sha gsungs pas thams cad kyang dbugs 'byung zhing brgyal ba sangs nas 'dar zhing thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa/_sangs rgyas kun 
[\[172a.3\]]gyis dbang bskur zhing /_/gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'i/_/sngags dang ting 'dzin nus pa yis/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzhal mi nus/_/rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas gtam rgyud bshad par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[172a.4\]]rdo rje 'chang chen pos lha gnas rnam pa brgyad du rgyud thams cad bsdus nas ri rab kyi byang phyogs su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud gsungs so/_/de nas zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sngags gsungs pas lha dang lha ma yin gyi rna bar song ngo /_/rig sngags 'chang de rnams ngo mtshar nas 
[\[172a.5\]]bstod pa byas so/_/de nas gling gi snying por 'khor gyi snying po gnod sbyin gyi cha 'dzin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byon nas mar gyi snying po dang 'dra ba dam pa'i chos rgyud thams cad bsdus so/_/nyid kyi las gnyis kyi bdag nyid can rgyud sde stong phrag brgyad cu yang gsungs so/_/
[\[172a.6\]]de nas 'jig rten du gnod sbyin rnams kyis mchod de/_sgron ma za ba rdo rjes mgo lus phral te nyams par byas so/_/de nas klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_sa 'og rim pa bdun du byon nas rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud gsungs so/_/rdo rje sa 'og 
[\[172a.7\]]gi rgyud las gtam rgyud kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang /_sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong bya'i gdong pa can gyis bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]{D500}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra b+hU mi tri tsa ra Ni rA dza kalpa nA ma/_bod skad du/_rdo rje sa gsum du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po/_dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas gsang ba'i dbang phyug po/_/shAka thub kyis ni rigs khro bo/_/phyis 
[\[172b.2\]]kyi rtog pa las rgyal byed/_/rtog pa'i bla ma 'di mchog bshad/_/lha dang sngags dang sbyor ba yis/_/rtog pas rtog pa 'joms pa'i lam/_/rtog pa med pa'i rig pa yis/_/khro bo'i dbang phyug zhi ba brnyes/_/dang po phyag 'tshal de 'og tu/_/bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la/_/
[\[172b.3\]]dbyangs yig gsum pas mdzes par byas/_/drug pa'i gsum pa blang byas la/_/'og tu dbyangs kyi gnyis pas brgyan/_/de la zla phyed dang thig le/_/lnga pa'i bzhi pa nyid dang ni/_/drug pa'i gnyis par nyid dang yang /_/bzhi pa'i bzhi pa yang de bzhin/_/yang ni 
[\[172b.4\]]me yi sa bon dang /_/lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang /_/gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa yi/_/'og tu me yi sa bon no/_/lnga pa'i dang po nyid dang yang /_/gsum pa'i sde pa lnga pa la/_/dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa dang /_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod/_/lag na rdo rje'i 
[\[172b.5\]]snying po'o/_/lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la/_/gsum pa'i dang po mthar bzhag pa/_/'di rnams rig sngags dbang byed pa/_/gang gA klung bcu'i bye snyed kyi/_/sangs rgyas khro bo byang chub sems/_/'byung por bcas pa 'gugs mdzad do/_/rig sngags rnams ni lha nyid 
[\[172b.6\]]de/_/stong dang snying rje 'dres pa yi/_/lha 'di snying ga'i sbyor ba ru/_/legs par bzhag pa bsam par bya/_/lugs su byung dang bzlog pa yi/_/sngags 'di bzlas dang bri bar bya/_/phaT hU~M Ni pA dzra ba rad+ha ra ba lAM nI o~M/_rig sngags 'bum phrag bzlas pa dang /_/yi ge 
[\[172b.7\]]re la 'bum phrag dang /_/de las lhag pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/sgrub pa po yi bsam pa ni/_/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug dang /_/bskrad dang dbye rengs bsad pa dang /_/las ni gang gang 'dod pa des/_/snying gar sbyor ba rim bzhin bsgrub/_/lus gtsang snying rjer ldan pa 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]yis/_/rang lus lha dang bla ma la/_/phyag sogs bya ba sngon 'gro bas/_/rig pa'i khro bo bsgom par bya/_/dang por stong nyid rnam bsams la/_/lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru/_/rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig ni/_/dang po las byung zla ba la/_/hU~M yig 
[\[173a.2\]]sngon po rnam par bsgom/_/rang gi 'dus 'dra'i 'od 'phros nas/_/sems can dri ma rnam bsal te/_/skur gyur snying po bsdu bar bya/_/hU~M yang rdo rje sngon por gyur/_/sngon bzhin spro dang bsdu byas la/_/sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba/_/rab tu dregs pas khros pa'o/_/ri 
[\[173a.3\]]bong 'dzin pa'i steng du ni/_/bde bar g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs/_/brgyad gnyis lon pa'i nyams tshul can/_/drag cing khros pa'i ro dang ldan/_/brang 'gro brgyad pos sku la brgyan/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/_/rang gis rdo rje bsnams pa ni/_/bsnun pa'i 
[\[173a.4\]]tshul du 'dzin pa dang /_/g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo can/_/na bza' sngon po'i sham thabs 'dzin/_/spyan mig dmar zhing mche ba gtsigs/_/dbu skra nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba/_/steng du bcings dbus cod pan ldan/_/zhal nas hA hA'i gad rgyangs ldan/_/khro bo'i bdag po 
[\[173a.5\]]'jigs par byed/_/log 'dren la sogs 'joms mdzad pa/_/de 'drar bdag nyid rab bsgoms la/_/de nas bdag nyid snyoms 'jug pa/_/de yi snying gar nyi ma la/_/rang gi chos kyi yi ge las/_/khros pas yang yang spros mdzad cing /_/de dang lhan cig bsgom par bya/_/
[\[173a.6\]]sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yis/_/de bzhin du yang dbang blang zhing /_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad ting 'dzin gnas/_/gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing /_/'od zer 'byung ba sna tshogs kyis/_/rims dang gdon dang dug sogs bza'/_/rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa dang 
[\[173a.7\]]po'o//_//de nas spyan sogs skye mched la/_/hU~M byung khro bo bsgom par bya/_/sku sogs gsum la rdo rje gsum/_/bsgom pa 'di ni dbang byed pa'o/_/dang po zhi bas zhi bar bya/_/klu la sogs pa'i gzugs byas la/_/rang snying 'od kyis bkug la bstim/_/
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]mchod sbyin bya ba snying rjes sbyin/_/'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang /_/mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang /_/pad chen dung skyong stobs kyi rgyu/_/dug rnams snying rje'i sbyor bas sbyang /_/nag po dkar po sngon po dang /_/rang gi gnas su sbyar bar bya/_/yang na zhi ba'i thab khung du/_/
[\[173b.2\]]klu yi sdig pa zhi bar bya/_/shin tu gnag pa'i rigs de la/_/mngar gsum chu yis gso bar bya/_/gang zhig sdig can zhi mi 'dul/_/gnyis kyi sbyor bas rgyun gcod bya/_/khrag dang dug sogs rdzas dag la/_/rig pa bzlog pas bsgrubs nas ni/_/shin tu khros pa'i 
[\[173b.3\]]khro bo yis/_/dgug dang gzhug dang myos bsad dang /_/cho gas gdug pa dbang byas la/_/bsreg pa la sogs las bya'o/_/brgyad dang bcu bzhi'i dus kyi tshe/_/skya rengs shar dang dmar rengs cha/_/nyin mtshan zad pa'i dus kyi tshe/_/skra bkrol bcud 'dzag gcer bu 
[\[173b.4\]]ni/_/byol song gnas su khrag skyug go/_/lus dbus me 'bar bsgrub bya de/_/khro bo'i ba spu'i bu ga las/_/spros pa'i khro bo khros pa dang /_/mngag gzhug rnams kyis drangs byas nas/_/rtog pas rtog pa bza' bar bya/_sngar ni rdo rje sa 'og las/_/gdug pa 'dir 
[\[173b.5\]]ni bza' bar bya/_/mang du smras pas ci zhig dgos/_/ma bcos pa yi sems can la/_/snying rje'i yid can rdo rje sems/_/til sogs rdzas dang sngags sbyor gyis/_/sdig pa zhi byed sbyin sreg bya/_/rig pa'i blo can kun bzang gis/_/zho la bsreg bya rgyas pa'o/_/
[\[173b.6\]]mi rtag gyur pa'i gdul bya la/_/'dod chags yid can bde chen gyis/_/bdag nyid dgos pa brtan bya'i phyir/_/ut+pal dmar sogs kyis bsgrub pa'o/_/'dir ni ma rungs sdig pa byed/_/gtsor ni sbyang phyir khro sems kyis/_/mngon spyod las ni rgyud kun las/_/
[\[173b.7\]]bshad pa thams cad 'dir bya'o/_/rig sngags snying rje'i shugs kyis 'gro/_/las ngan rgyun gcod bcos ma yin/_/las ngan dag pa'i rang bzhin du/_/khros pas dmigs par mi 'gyur te/_/sbyor ba rnams ni bcos mar 'gyur/_/byang chub bcos med 'bad 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]spangs pa'o/_/rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal po/_/sngar ni sprul pa bcu drug pos/_/rtog pa bcu phrag dang bzhi yang /_/gnyis kyis rig pa 'joms byed 'dir/_/sprul pa brgyad 
[\[174a.2\]]du bsdus pa dang /_/bdag nyid gcig bu bsgom pa'ang gsungs/_/nam mkha'i khams su 'byung bzhi bsam/_/ri rab lhun po hrI yig las/_/pad+ma 'dab grangs lte ba la/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o/_/hU~M las byung ba'i khro bo ni/_/zhal gcig phyag 
[\[174a.3\]]bzhin bza' sngo/_/rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu 'gengs/_/sbrul dang mi sdug mgos brgyan cing /_/stag lpags smad dkris 'jigs sel ba/_/khro bo rnam rgyal bsgom par bya/_/thugs ka'i hU~M gi sbyor ba yis/_/shar la sogs pa'i phyogs mtshams su/_/'jig 
[\[174a.4\]]rten gsum snang rdo rje dang /_/'jig rten gsum 'dul rin chen dang /_/'jig rten gsum 'ching pad+ma dang /_/'jig rten gsum 'jig las nyid dag_/g.yas rnams rang ming mtshan ma la/_/g.yon rnams gdug pa bsdigs pa'o/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil dang dbyug sngon 
[\[174a.5\]]dang /_/mi g.yo ba dang rta mgrin khro/_/rdo rje dang ni dbyug pa dang /_/ral gri pad+ma g.yas rnams so/_/g.yon pa gdug pa bsdigs pa'o/_/brgyad kyi dbus na khro bo bdag_/'jig rten gsum gyi 'khrul pa sbyong /_/dbyug pa nag sogs pho nya bzhi/_/sku mdog mtshan 
[\[174a.6\]]mas brgyan pa khros/_/lcags kyu la sogs sgor gnas pa/_/khro bo'i 'khor lo 'jigs sel bsgom/_/gtso bcas rig pa'i khro bo kun/_/rgyu ma'i phreng bas do shal byas/_/gos sngon can la stag lpags dkris/_/gdug pa sel ba'i lam du bsgom/_/de nas 
[\[174a.7\]]khams gsum rnam rgyal gtso/_/khro bo'i mtshan nyid sngags bcas bshad/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba/_mche ba gtsigs pa dang 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]'tsham pa mig me ma dag gi phung po 'dra ba/_dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/_'jigs pa'i nga ro can lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/_klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/_klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/_sbrul 'bar ba rin po 
[\[174b.2\]]che'i cod pan thogs pa/_sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/_bzhin rgyas pa smin ma dang khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus pa/_ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/_gshin rje'i cha byad can lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/_gsus po che sbrul za ba/_lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs 
[\[174b.3\]]par byed pa/_klu'i rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ska rags su bcings pa/_a la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa/_rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba klu thams cad rlag par byed pa/_gad 
[\[174b.4\]]rgyangs chen po rgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/_gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa/_klu thams cad rlag par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'i rig 
[\[174b.5\]]sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_b+ho b+ho ban+nA gA d+hi pa ta ye/_i dan+nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/_badzra pA Ni hr-i da yaM yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha mA ku lo t+sA da na/_b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/_ta d+ya thA/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/_ma hI prA p+ta ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_nA ga hr-i da yA ni/_bin+d+ha 
[\[174b.6\]]bin+b+ha nA ga marmA Ni/_bi shi r+ya n+tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni/_bi s+pho Ti ya/_nA ga na ya nA ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_tad+ya thA/_nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hU~M phaT/_nA got+sA da nA ya hU~M phaT/_nI laM ba sa nA ya hU~M phaT/_a pra ti ha ta ba la pa ra kra mA ya hU~M phaT/_kr-i tan+tA ya hU~M phaT/_kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya hU~M phaT/_ro Sha Na 
[\[174b.7\]]ya hU~M phaT/_trA sa nA ya hU~M phaT/_kuM b+hAN+Do t+sA da nA ya hU~M phaT/_pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/_yak+ShA pa smA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/_ha sa ha sa/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_nA sha ya nA sha ya/_sarba big+h+nA n+pi nA ka rA ya hU~M phaT/_sarba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya hU~M phaT/_oM nIM 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]lAM ba rad+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu la sngags kyis btab ste gtor na btang bar 'gyur ro/_/klu zlog par 'dod na smyug shad kyi lcug ma'am bal po se'u'i lcug mas bya'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang brjed byed rnams 
[\[175a.2\]]la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o/_/rims nad med par bya ba dang /_yig 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o/_/nor 'dod na zhag gcig smyung par gnas te pog gis bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston par 'gyur la gser gyi dong tse bdun stong ster 
[\[175a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o/_/sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o/_/'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba la ni mar rnying pa'am thal ba'am yungs kar gyis bya'o/_/nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po 
[\[175a.4\]]la bsrung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o/_/dug la ni rtswa ku shas byab par bya'o/_/
[\[175a.5\]]bdag bsrung ba la ni yid kyis sam chus bya'o/_/gzhan bsrung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o/_/las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam bdun nam bcu bzhi'am nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[175a.6\]]rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gsum pa'o//_//rtog pa 'di dag dbang byed pa/_/lag na rdo rje khros pa las/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/bran g.yog rnams ni bskul bar bya/_oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_'di ni bka' tsam 
[\[175a.7\]]nges bsgrag cing /_/bai yig sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod/_/snying ga'i 'od kyis dbang bya zhing /_/gu gul dud pas brod byas la/_/gser sna chen po seng ge la zhon pa dang /_rmugs 'dzin dang /_gang ba bzang dang /_nor bu bzang dang /_ku be ra dang /_yang dag shes dang /_'brog 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]gnas dang /_lngas rtsen dang /_pi tsi kuN+Da li rnams la mkho ba sbyin par bya'o/_/'di rnams rta la bcibs pa la/_/'od dang ldan zhing me long can/_/ras dkar gtsang mas gsal byas la/_/gsal snang kun ni bri bar bya/_/yang na kun kyang sbrul nag bcibs/_/'jigs 
[\[175b.2\]]pa'i mtshon cha phyag na bsnams/_/bskul ba dag par dbang byas na/_/mngon spyod las kun byed par 'gyur/_/drag po dgu dang nyi shu brgyad/_/sa gsum khyab pa spros nas ni/_/sngags grub stobs kyis bdag bran byed/_/dus tshod dus la mchod par byed/_/de nas 
[\[175b.3\]]dbul bas 'jigs pa la/_/rmugs 'dzin bsgrub pa yid 'ong bshad/_/kun kyang gter rnams mnan pa la/_/rin chen 'bar bas khyim 'gengs pa/_/skyor gang rdo rje chus 'grub 'gyur/_/pad+ma zla dang gter chen la/_/dzo~M las byung ba'i gnod sbyin dgu/_/bkug 
[\[175b.4\]]la rang rang gsang sngags kyis/_/chu dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin dbul/_/'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa rnams so/_/o~M bai shra pa NA ya swA hA/_o~M dzaM b+ha lA ya swA hA/_o~M pUr+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/_o~M ma Ni b+ha drA ya swA hA/_o~M ku be rA ya swA hA/_o~M saM pra dz+nya nA ya swA hA/_o~M gu h+ya s+thA nA ya 
[\[175b.5\]]swA hA/_o~M pAny+tsi kA ya swA hA/_o~M pi tsikuN+Da li ne swA hA/_de nas yang dag spyod pa'i mchog_/lha yi brtul zhugs dag pa bshad/_/dus rnams kun du dar ras gtsang ma'i gos sngon byin gyis brlab bya zhing /_/bram ze'i rigs ltar dri can zas dang 'gro mgyogs sha las ring 
[\[175b.6\]]du 'dug_/smyung bar gnas shing chus bkrus dkar gsum dag dang gtsang ba'i zas za zhing /_/ngag gi rlung bsdams dad dang snying rjes yid brlan rtag tu brtson par 'jug_/bsam gtan khang pa mdog ni sngo bsgyur ba lci dri zhim chu yis byugs/_/dkar dang sngo ba'i me tog 
[\[175b.7\]]bkram la sku gdung bla ma mdun bzhag la/_/cho rigs btsun pa'i sgrub pos gos dkar bgos la ku sha'i stan la 'dug_/snying rjes khros pa'i rig sngags dam pa dag cing mdzes par bzlas par bya/_/ru drAk+Sha yi bgrang phreng brgya phyed byin gyis brlabs la lag g.yas gzung /_/
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]phreng ba'i ril bu re dang lha re sngags re bcas nas snying gar gzung /_/rnal 'byor 'di rnams rnam par dpyad cing 'gro la 'jungs pa'i sems ldan pas/_/bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir du rtog pa bshad pa byas pa yin/_/rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa 
[\[176a.2\]]bzhi pa'o//_//dbyar kha skyes pa'i rtswa dang nags tshal las byung me mched ltar/_/rlung gis grogs byas bsregs nas thal ba'i lhag ma'ang ma lus bzhin/_/bskal pa dpag med skyes pa'i rtog pa'i dri ma'i rma rnams la/_/bsrung ba dad dang brtson 'grus sngags 
[\[176a.3\]]bzlas sems dag me yis bsreg_/nyi ma'i snying po 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su rigs bzung ste/_/skyes pa dang ni bud med dbang po skyon med tshul khrims can/_/skye ba snga ma'i lam shugs dag dang bla ma'i lung thob pa/_/dad dang snying rje'i sems can gtong ba'i blo dang ldan pa 
[\[176a.4\]]des/_/rig pa'i khro bo bsgom dang de rjes de ni bzlas 'bad na/_/bstod dang mchod mnyes bran g.yog lha min gsang ba brnyas med cing /_/chu yi mchod sbyin 'khor lo dag dang gtor ma la brtson zhing /_/sbyin sreg rnams kyis lha dang bran g.yog mnyes byas na/_/ring por 
[\[176a.5\]]mi thogs sgrub pa po des rtags dang phyag rgya 'byin par 'gyur/_/'dir ni mang du smra mi dgos/_/sngar ni rdo rje sa 'og tu/_/bshad pa'i mtshan ma ster bar 'gyur/_/zangs lcags bla ma'i gnang bya'o/_/lus sogs rig pa'i dbang bskur nas/_/me dang rlung sogs 'byung ba 
[\[176a.6\]]dang /_/nad dang gdon dang byad rnams dang /_/bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/me lce phreng ba'i rtog pa las/_/bshad pa'i 'chi ba'i sbyor byung na/_/ser sna 'di ni pha rol 'phang /_/smon lam lam sna la brten nas/_/'di 'og byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/'gro ba smin 
[\[176a.7\]]pa'i bla mar 'gyur/_/yang na srid pa bar ma dor/_/sngags kyis rnam shes gzi bskyed nas/_/'gro phan rig 'dzin gyur nas/_/de yi 'og tu sems dpa'o/_/tha ma'ang lam brten nas ni/_/rang 'dod pa yi lus rnyed nas/_/snga ma lam sel de 'og tu/_/dngos grub la ni 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]rnam par gnas/_/lha dang sngags sogs rtogs pa des/_/rtog pa dman pa mnan pa yin/_/nam mkha' lta bur rtog med la/_/'jig rten dor ni rtog pas sprul/_/gdul bya sdang sogs sems 'khrugs la/_/nga ni snying rjes sdang bar mdzad/_/khro sogs bsal du med 
[\[176b.2\]]gyur na/_/khro bor da ni ci phyir 'gyur/_/dang po rnal 'byor 'tshe ba bcom/_/de phyir rig sngags sbyor ba rnams/_/rgyud kun du ni gsungs pa yin/_/'tshe ba bcom nas dag pa ni/_/sems dag pa ni bde ba yin/_/gdug pa'i sbyor ba phrogs pas na/_/bde bar byang chub lam brten 
[\[176b.3\]]la/_/rdo rje sku nyid 'gyur med la/_/bdag gis rig pa'i ye shes de/_/lus can de yi 'bras bu'o/_/ji ltar shel ni dzam bu ka'i/_/me tog gis ni gzhan du snang /_/de bzhin rtog med rig pa yang /_/khro bo'i dbang phyug 'dir snang nas/_/ji ltar 'dul 'gyur sprul pa yis/_/rgyun 
[\[176b.4\]]mi 'chad par khro bor snang /_/snying rje med na 'bras bu nyams/_/'gro la phan btags gnod bsal na/_/rang sems dag pas 'bras bu 'grub/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgrib pa rnams/_/byang chub sems kyis ring du spang /_/'di ni 'khor ba 'jig par nges/_/brtan dang g.yo ba'i sgrib pa 
[\[176b.5\]]rnams/_/blo mnyam dus na gnyen po dang /_/mi mthun nam mkha' ltar yangs pa/_/lhun gyis grub 'bras phyi ma yin/_/ji srid rtog pa'i dri ma yod/_/de srid 'bad de rig pa bsgom/_/sems sbyong snga ma rig pa yis/_/rgyud nyid du ni 'dod pa yin/_/gang la sems ni dri med pa/_/
[\[176b.6\]]rtog pa'i dri mas nag por byas/_/de la spang ba'i blo med pa'o/_/rtog pa'i blo can 'khor ba yin/_/de phyir shAkya'i rigs can rnams/_/sa 'og tu rgyu ba'i klu'i rtog pa la sogs pa tshar gcad pa'i phyir sbyor ba rnams la gus par bya'o/_/rdo rje sa gsum du rgyu ba las rtog pa lnga pa 
[\[176b.7\]]rdzogs so//_//dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag khri srong lde btsan gyi bka' khrims su/_dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra badzra dang /_ra byid lo ts+tsha bas bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]{D501}]rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra tri lo ka bi na ya nA ma ta n+t+ra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa 
[\[177a.2\]]dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi byang phyogs lcang lo can gyi pho brang na bzhugs te/_brjod kyis mi lang ba'i lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu rnams 
[\[177a.3\]]ma 'jigs shig_/ma skrag shig_/ma dngang zhig ces gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u la 'od zer kha dog gsum las grub pa 'od zer kha dog gsum pa'i 
[\[177a.4\]]'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'jig rten gsum du bkye ste/_thams cad bkug nas slar yang 'od kyis snang bar byas nas/_o~Mbadzra tsaN+Da pa tsa du sh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phaT/_tir+ya bi dA ra NA ya phaT/_pre ta bi dA ra NA ya phaT/_na ra bi dA ra NA ya 
[\[177a.5\]]phaT/_na ra ga Na bi dA ra NA ya phaT/_de ba bi dA ra NA ya phaT/_ces gsungs pas/_'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi lus gas nas sems shel sgong lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/sems yi ge gsum lta bur gnas te/_o~M ni zhal gsum phyag drug ste/_/AHni 
[\[177a.6\]]zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/_/hU~M ni rgyan dang bral gyur pa/_/rigs ni gsum du gyur pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas rigs gsum du gyur pas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba/_/zhe sdang chen po'i bdag nyid can/_/phyag na 
[\[177a.7\]]rdo rje rnyed dka' ba/_/bdag cag gis ni thob par 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa thugs bskul ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/_/badzra pA Ni hr-i da yaM da/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]b+ho b+ho bAn+nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/_i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/_badzra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/_yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha ut+sA da naM b+ha pi Sh+ya ti/_bstod pa 'dis bstod pas 'gyur ba bcu gnyis dang /_ltas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'byung ba'i lha dang mi la 
[\[177b.2\]]sogs pa thams cad skrag nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi'o zhes brjod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis rang rang gi gdul bya rnams ma 'jigs shig_/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa' phyag na 
[\[177b.3\]]rdo rje bzhugs pas 'jig rten mkhyen pa la bstod pa'i ltas yin gyis zhes gsungs so/_/rang rang gi 'khor dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis rang rang gi 'jig rten mkhyen pa la gsol pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_byang chub sems dpa' de lta bar 'tshal na gnang bar mdzad du 
[\[177b.4\]]gsol/_de nas rang rang gi 'khor rnams rang rang gi ston pa'i 'od la 'jus nas ri rab kyi steng na lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi nang du rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa byon no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de bstod pa byas nas/_byang chub 
[\[177b.5\]]sems dpa' bstod pa yi/_/ngo mtshar ltas kyis 'dir mchis pas/_/'jig rten du 'byung dka' ba yis/_/tshar gcad rjes bzung bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbang bskur ba mdzad do/_/
[\[177b.6\]]a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes gsungs pas snod dang ldan par byas so/_/'jig rten gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de lan 
[\[177b.7\]]gsum du bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du phyag byas nas gsol ba btab pa/_sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/bsrung ba rnams kyi mchog gyur pa/_/phyag na rdo rje bsrung ba'i rgyud/_/zhe sdang gtso bos bshad du gsol/_/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/zhe sdang kun 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]gyi rgya mtsho gtso/_/'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/_/dbus su phyag na rdo rje bri/_/de mtha' mtshan ma nyi shu bzhi/_/rang dbus sarba duSh+TaM dang /_/sde tshan dang po 
[\[178a.2\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dgos/_/dbus mtshan lte bar ming bris la/_/de rnams phyag na rdo rje'i dbus/_/dbus ma'i phyag na rdo rje la/_/bstod pa'i sngags kyis bskor bar bya/_/rdo rje nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/_/klu 'dul sngags kyis bskor bar bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 
[\[178a.3\]]'dzin pas klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas gang gA klung gis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to/_/tad+ya thA/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/_ma hi prA p+ta/_ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM/_pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/_ts+tshin+da 
[\[178a.4\]]ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/_b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marmA Ni/_bi shi r+yan+tu nA ga sha rI raM Ni/_bi s+pho Ta ya/_sngags des klu rnams skrag ste/_rang rang gi gnas su 'bros par chas pa las nA ga ya nA ni zhes gsungs pas lus mi g.yo bar gyur to/_/de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 
[\[178a.5\]]su mchi ste/_rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/phyi yi phyag na rdo rje la/_/lha srin sngags kyis bskor bar bya/_/gnyis la rigs kyi nag pos brgyan/_/rgyan dang cha lugs tshang ba la/_/dbus nas rim pa ci bzhin du/_/oM dang hU~M mtha' pA Ni'i sngags/_/phreng ba 
[\[178a.6\]]bsnams pa bri bar bya/_/oM gyis rdo rje lte bar mtshan/_/hU~M gis shes rab lce la mtshan/_/phyi yi lcags ri dag la ni/_/thabs dang shes rab dag kyang bri/_/bsgrub bya rdo rje lte bar bca'/_/gur kum gyis ni bri bar bya/_/yar ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung ste/_/
[\[178a.7\]]bris nas de nub nas bzung ba/_/bcu bzhi bar du bsnyen par bya/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nub mo bsgrub pa ste/_/dkyil 'khor cha lugs ldan pa la/_/lha snam steng du pus btsugs la/_/cho ga bzhin du bskyed par bya/_/'khor lo dag la bsang byas la/_/'khor lo stong pa nyid du 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]bsgom/_/stong pa nyid las hU~M byung ste/_/de zhu ba las rdo rje ni/_/badzra pA Nis lte bar mtshan/_/de las 'phro dang 'dus pa las/_/phyag na rdo rje'i skur bskyed la/_/de snying zla ba rdo rjes mtshan/_/rdo rje lte bar hU~M mtshan las/_/'od zer spros te gos sngon bsdu/_/de la 
[\[178b.2\]]mchod pa sna tshogs mchod/_/bstod dang bdun po byas nas kyang /_/'od zer dag gis bkug byas la/_/rang snying rdo rje hU~M la thim/_/de la mchod bstod sna tshogs bya/_/rdo rje dag las ye shes kyi/_/me byung rdo rje zhu gyur nas/_/'khor lo'i rnam par gyur par bsam/_/
[\[178b.3\]]sku ni sku yi rnam pa ste/_/mtshan ma mtshan ma'i rnam par ro/_/sa de bsdus pa kirti dang /_/bsregs pa'i nang du 'khor lo gzhug_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bstod pa/_sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/_/ston pa khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin/_/
[\[178b.4\]]gdul dka' thams cad 'dul ba yi/_/bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ngo mtshar che/_/'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud las sa 'og 'dul ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o//_//de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyag na rdo rje rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin 
[\[178b.5\]]pa la mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab pa/_/de nas sngags snying kun 'dus pa/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/ston pa dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/_/rig sngags gcod byed bshad du gsol/_/de nas ston pa rig sngags gcod/_/
[\[178b.6\]]gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/dang po bsnyen pa bya ba ste/_/mchod rten sngon po brtsigs pa dang /_/ras ris la sogs bri bya ste/_/lce yi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir/_/yi ge brgya pas bshags par bya/_/de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom/_/stong pa nyid las 
[\[178b.7\]]'di gsum mtha'/_/yongs su gyur pas rdo rje ste/_/de la badzra pA Nis mtshan/_/lte dbus sngags la lha spro bsdu/_/byas pas phyag na rdo rjer gyur/_/lha yi sku mdog rgyan la sogs/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud las shes par bya/_/bdag nyid thugs ka'i dpal be'u las/_/
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]'od zer 'phros pas bcom ldan bsdu/_/'od zer gnyis pa'i rtse mo las/_/mchod pa rnam pa bcu spros te/_/bcom ldan tshogs la mchod pa bya/_/de nas yang dag bstod byas la/_/'od zer gsum pas snying gar gzhug_/snying ga'i mtshan ma zla dkyil 
[\[179a.2\]]thim/_/badzra nyi shu gcig dbus gnas/_/de la sngags rgyal bskor bar bya/_/sngags ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad/_/ming dang don dang spel ba dang /_/bzlas pa dag dang rnam pa bzhi/_/bzlas pa rnam pa bcu drug tu/_/rgyud 'di las ni rab tu grags/_/rdo rje yi ni bzlas pa 
[\[179a.3\]]dang /_/rin chen pad+ma'i bzlas pa dang /_/las kyi bzlas pa bzhi po dag_/las bzhi po ni rang bzhin can/_/rang bzhin rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang /_/drag po'i las dang zo chun rgyud/_/mgal me'i 'khor lo'i bzlas pa dang /_/mda' dang sbrul gyi bzlas pa dang /_/'gog pa yi ni 
[\[179a.4\]]bzlas pa dang /_/sku bsrungs bka' nyan bzlas pa'o/_/khyab 'jug mdung dang tshangs pa'i gzhu/_/mar me lta bu'i bzlas pa'o/_/bzlas pa'i mtshan ma'i rang bzhin te/_/rtag tu lha rnams bum pa yis/_/dbang bskur byed pa byung ba'am/_/yang na lo brgyad lon pa 'byung /_/
[\[179a.5\]]yang na me tog sngon po ste/_/ma byung na yang dus bsnyen bya/_/de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya/_/dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi ru bshad/_/zhi rgyas bsdus dang drag po ste/_/'dir ni drag po'i gtso bo'o/_/dkyil 'khor nyams su blang ba'o/_/bla ma lnga ru shes par bya/_/bdag 
[\[179a.6\]]nyid rgyan dang ldan pa la/_/shar gyi phyogs su blta bar bya/_/cho ga gsum gyis dbyung ba'o/_/dpal be'u zhu ba rdo rjer gyur/_/dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba la/_/bcom ldan cho ga bzhin du bskyed/_/ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/_/dpal be'u zhu bas ye shes so/_/
[\[179a.7\]]mtha' ma skar ma lta bu yi/_/rang bzhin dpal be'u hU~M dang ni/_/ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dkyil las/_/sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya/_/de yi dbus su bsgrub bya gzhag_/hU~M las bskyed pa'i phur bu ni/_/de yi lce las brten par bya/_/gu gul nag po'i 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]spos kyis ni/_/de yi sna nas bdug par bya/_/sngags rgyal nA ga bor nas ni/_/mA ra dzi ha gzhug par bya/_/de ni rigs ngan thod par gzhug_/mchod rten 'og tu mnan par bya/_/de steng dug gsum mgo bo ni/_/o~M AHhU~M/_dar dkar gcig gis phur byas 
[\[179b.2\]]la/_/rim pa dang por gzhug par bya/_/de steng rim pa lnga pa la/_/sha chen la sogs lnga po dag_/hU~M tra~M hriHA a/_ra rog kha ru gzhug par bya/_/rim pa bzhi pa dag la ni/_/'khor lo gzhug par bya ba de/_/ya~M las rlung dang ra~M las me/_/de steng 'khor lo 
[\[179b.3\]]rtsibs brgyad bri/_/de steng nyi ma zla ba ste/_/'khor lo dbus kyi lte ba la/_/dgra bo'i mgo bo thur bstan bri/_/de yi snying gar ming bri'o/_/'khor lo yi ni rtsibs brgyad te/_/rtsibs la sngags kyis bskor bar bya/_/ming las bsgrub bya hU~M las ston/_/'og 
[\[179b.4\]]gi las ni gnyis kyang bri/_/khra dang spyang ki la sogs pa'i/_/thod par gzugs brnyan bcug nas ni/_/yungs kar dag gis brab byas la/_/rang gi 'og tu gnan par bya/_/gu gul nag po'i spos dag gis/_/de yi sna nas bdug par bya/_/seng ldeng phur bu sor 
[\[179b.5\]]bzhi pa/_/gdab pa'i sngags kyis lce la gdab/_/rdo rje rgya gram dag gis ni/_/de yi bu ga pa dgab par bya/_/nya dang 'byung po'i nyi ma la/_/phur bu bskul zhing yungs kar brdeg_/de nas rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/
[\[179b.6\]]e ma'o ston pa khyad par 'phags/_/e ma'o thabs kyang khyad par 'phags/_/e ma'o 'khor yang khyad par 'phags/_khyad par 'phags pa ngo mtshar che/_/'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud las sa bla 'dul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[179b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/_bsad pa las kyi 'khor lo 'di/_/sa steng 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir/_/rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol/_/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang /_/theg pa chen po spong ba ni/_/bsdu ba'i dngos por bsdu bar bya/_/de yang dbang du ma gyur na/_/khams gsum sems can thams cad ni/_/sangs rgyas skur ni bsams 
[\[180a.2\]]nas su/_/de yis gsad bsgom nyes pa bsgrag_/zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje 'dzin/_/snying ga nas ni spros byas la/_/de yis bsrung dang 'jig rten lha/_/zhags pa dag gis drangs nas ni/_/o~M badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TaM be sha dzaH/_/mtshon cha dag gis bcad la 
[\[180a.3\]]sogs/_/o~M badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_klu yi bzlas pa 'bum byas te/_/nya dang 'byung po'i nyi ma la/_/bdag nyid rgyan dang ldan byas la/_/rdzas dang sngags kyis bsrung bar bya/_/bzhi mdo lha khang dus nam phyed/_/sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas byas 
[\[180a.4\]]te/_/de nas 'khor lo bri bar bya/_/steng 'khor 'og 'khor dug shing gis/_/dga' dang legs pa'i sems kyis bri/_/ras ma nyams la gur gum mchog_/dbus su phyag na rdo rje la/_/dpral ba snying ga lkog ma ru/_/yi ge gsum bkod sku gsum ste/_/rgyan 
[\[180a.5\]]dang cha lugs tshang bar bri/_/'khor yug thams cad duSh+TaM bri/_/zhabs dang spyi bo g.yas dang g.yon/_/zla ba nyi ma dbus su ni/_/rgyal po bzhi yi mtshan ma bri/_/mtshams bzhir rdo rje'i gdan la hU~M/_/'khor yug la ni shes rab thabs/_/hU~M las dam tshig 
[\[180a.6\]]sems dpa' la/_/ye shes spyan drang mchod de zhu/_/'og 'khor sbal nag yan lag lnga/_/snying dang drug tu ming rus gzhug_/phyogs bzhir rtsibs la mtshams bzhir thod/_/rtsibs dang thod par ming rus te/_/khor yug gnyis la bstod pas bskor/_/sbal khar 
[\[180a.7\]]hri las 'od byung bas/_/sa bdag klu chen bkug ste mchod/_/mchod pa'i rdzas ni 'o ma sogs/_/de nas bsgral bya dgug bya ste/_/sku gsung thugs la legs gnas pa/_/ming dang rus la bstim ste bzhag_/thod pa las srin hU~M las bskyed/_/de la sbyor ba 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]legs par bya/_/klu la dam bdar mchod pa bya/_/phur pas phyogs mtshams gcad par bya/_/'og mas phyogs su drangs na 'grub/_/de nas gsol ba 'debs pa rnams/_/ngo mtshar nas ched du brjod pa/_/rmad byung chen po chos rnams la/_/rnam par mi rtog ngo bo 
[\[180b.2\]]nyid/_/chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la/_/kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar/_/de nas thog mar gyur pa'i 'khor rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa la/_mtho 'tshams nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gnod byed thams cad 
[\[180b.3\]]zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_oM badzra pA Ni hr-i da ya gsungs pas gzhan nas byon pa'i ston pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs bskul nas/_tabyathA/_hU~M phaT/_nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phaT/_nA got+sA da nA ya phaT/_nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/_a pra ti 
[\[180b.4\]]ha ta pa la pa rAkra mA ya phaT/_kr-i tAn+tA ya phaT/_kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/_ro Sha NA ya phaT/_trA sa nA ya phaT/_kuM b+haN+Ta ut+sA da nA ya phaT/_pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/_yak+Sha a pa smA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/_ha sa ha sa/_dA ra dA ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_nA sha ya nA 
[\[180b.5\]]sha ya/_sarba big+h+nAn bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/_sarba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/_nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_gsungs pa tsam gyis dang po'i 'khor rnams skrag par gyur te ched du brjod pa/_e ma'o ston pa byin rlabs che/_/e ma sngags kyi nus pa 
[\[180b.6\]]che/_/e ma che ba'i nyon mongs che/_/'khor rnams mnyam pa nyid du gnas/_/'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud las sa steng 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gsum dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas byon pa'i 
[\[180b.7\]]'jig rten gsum po rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la rgyud 'di 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'di chongs shig_/lhogs shig 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]ces gsungs so/_/yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur 
[\[181a.2\]]ba'o//_//[{D502}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tri sa ma ya byU ha rA dzA nA ma tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[181a.3\]]khams mtha' yas pa na rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbus dang mtha' med yon tan ri bo dpag med dang /_/mchod rten mtha' med mchod pa chen po'i mchog tu 'khrungs/_/mchod 
[\[181a.4\]]chen 'phags pa'i 'phags pa chen po'i bdag_/dus gsum 'khrungs pa'i bder gshegs tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rdo rje chen po'i nye 'khor/_rdo rje 'chang chen po nye bar 'du ba/_
[\[181a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa lhag par dgyes pas rnam par rol pa/_dbus dang mtha' med pa'i rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo mthon po rin po che'i rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyu las gyur pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po'i pho brang chen po'i mchog na byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyis bskor 
[\[181a.6\]]ba'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rdzu 'phrul chen po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rgya chen por mdzad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa snying po thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa gsungs te/_na ma s+t+rai 
[\[181a.7\]]ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_sarba trA pra ti ha tA bA p+ti/_d+harma tA ba li nAM/_a~M a/_sa ma sa ma sa man+ta to/_/a nan+tA bA p+ti/_shA sa ni ha ra ha ra/_sma ra sma ra Ni/_bi ga ta rA ga bud+d+ha d+harma te/_sa ra sa ra/_sa ma ba la/_ha sa ha sa/_tra ya tra ya/_ga ga na ma hA ba ra Na 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]la k+Sha Ne dz+wa la dz+wa la na/_sA ga re swA hA/_de la rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa sngags kyi sgor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 
[\[181b.2\]]'dis las gang zhig byed par 'gyur ba de ni bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan par mi spyod kyi/_gzhan du mdor bsdus nas gsungs pa yin no/_/'dis skyes bu dam pa de ni sgo mtha' yas pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing de bzhin 
[\[181b.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad la lhag par dmigs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo sna tshogs pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/_sems can 'dul ba'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba/_las thams cad rjes su dran 
[\[181b.4\]]pa'i cho ga yang dag par sbyor ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur zhing sems can gyi khams dang mos pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs sna tshogs pa mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang stobs sna tshogs 
[\[181b.5\]]mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i sgo sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i mos pas snying po 'di bzlas na gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mdor bsdus na sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi 'khor 
[\[181b.6\]]lo'i dkyil 'khor yang sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/gser dang nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa'i char yang mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba yang mngon par rab tu 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/dmyal 
[\[181b.7\]]ba rnams kyi grang ba la dro ba yang yang dag par skyed par byed do/_/dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal yang rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/sems can mos pa'i sgo sna tshogs pa'i yul can gyi sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed do/_/byin gyis rlob par byed/_
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]yongs su 'gengs par byed/_yongs su smin par byed/_rnam par 'dul bar byed/_nges par sbyong bar byed/_kun du sbyor bar byed/_rnam par 'phel bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_so sor 'god par byed/_rnam par grol bar byed/_byang chub kyi theg pa la lhag par 
[\[182a.2\]]'dzeg par byed/_myur du lhag par 'dzeg pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag kyang ston par byed/_mdor na mthar gyis byang chub la gzhol zhing so sor 'god par byed/_dge ba sgrub pa la gnas pa skyed par byed/_sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa zad par byed/_rnam par 'joms 
[\[182a.3\]]par byed/_rnam par sel bar byed/_'dren par byed/_'joms par byed/_mdor na rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis sems can gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad 
[\[182a.4\]]pa yang byed par 'gyur ro/_/'dir yang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi don yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/_sngags 'dzin pas dang por re zhig byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa 
[\[182a.5\]]dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs rnyed pa 'di nyid la bdag nyid dad par bya'o/_/sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos snga dro dang po la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/_bdag ming che ge mo zhes 
[\[182a.6\]]bgyi ba chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag dbul bar bgyi'o/_/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de rnams kyis kyang bdag la rnam pa thams cad dang dus thams cad du byin gyis brlab pa dang yongs su bzung bar 
[\[182a.7\]]gyur cig_/bdag la grub pa dang mchog stsol cig_/de nas sdig pa so sor bshags par bya ste/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug las skyes pa'i sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thugs bskyed 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]pa gang gis bshags pa mdzad pa'i sems bskyed pa des bshags par bya ste/_ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa ltar des kyang ji tsam du bshags par nus pa de tsam du bshags par bya'o/_/de nas bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bya ste/_gang dus gsum 
[\[182b.2\]]du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyor bar byed pa/_sems can gyi khams yongs su srung bar byed pa/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 
[\[182b.3\]]'das pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba bla na med pas rjes su yi rang bar bya ste/_ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas mkhyen pa ltar/_des kyang ji ltar rjes su yi rang bar nus pa de ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/de nas mchod pa'i bya ba bya ste/_sems can gyi 
[\[182b.4\]]khams na gang nga yar med cing yongs su gzung ba med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga de thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchod pa'i phrin las kyis dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang bdag 
[\[182b.5\]]gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchog tu rgya che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog rgya chen po'i gong ma las bla mar mngon par bsgrubs pa'i 
[\[182b.6\]]mchod pa'i sprin rab tu 'bab pa bsam pa'am brjod pa/_mchod pa chen por mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM sarba thA/_ung+ga te s+pha ra Na haM maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/_de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
[\[182b.7\]]dpa' thams cad la ji ltar mngon par bsngos pa ltar de bzhin du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mchod pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mkhyen to/_/de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la yon tan du bsngags 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]pa dang /_grags pa sna tshogs kyi glu'i sprin rgya mtsho rab 'byam tshig tu brjod pa'am bsams la/_'di lta bu'i bstod pa dpe med pa nges par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bod+d+hi sa twA nAM/_sarba tra saM ku su 
[\[183a.2\]]mi ta a b+hi dz+nyA rA shi ni na mo stu te swA hA/_de nas de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yon tan bsngags pa brjod pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur yang dad par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi sprul 
[\[183a.3\]]pa'i sprin sems can thams cad la dmigs pa las byung ba sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_bde ba thams cad myur du stsol cig pa'am/_yang na sems can thams cad kyi zag pa med pa'i dge ba 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yang dag par 'byung 
[\[183a.4\]]ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de dag gis thob par gyur cig ces de lta bu la sogs pa sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa yid la byed pa'am ngag tu brjod de/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu dang sems can gyi khams 
[\[183a.5\]]thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_na mo stu te ma hA brdza sarba sa twA hi taM ka ra/_tiSh+tha sarba tra/_sar+b+be ShAM d+har+m+mA NAM a d+hiSh+thA ya swA hA/_rig pa'i
