[\[183a.6\]]rgyal po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis de dag gi sprul pa'i sprin rgya chen po mos pas mngon par bsgrubs nas/_mdor na sems can gyi khams su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzad pa 
[\[183a.7\]]yang byed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyis de dag la yang dag par dad par bya'o/_/de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' kho nas mkhyen to/_/de nas de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang /_rjes su yi rang ba la 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]sogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa la/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du byin gyis brlab pa dang bdag la grub pa'i mchog stsol cig ces brjod par 
[\[183b.2\]]bya'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_dmigs pa dang /_bzlas pa dang /_nan tan du bgyis pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi dngos grub la sogs pa grub pa thams cad la rjes su yi 
[\[183b.3\]]rang ba dang /_dmigs pa dag la goms pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa'i snying po 'di ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid bzlas pa bzla bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_sems 
[\[183b.4\]]can gyi don bla na med pa byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po'i sku yongs su sgrub par 'dod pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas ldang bar bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs 
[\[183b.5\]]pa rig pa rgya chen po'i tshul gyi mdo sde rnams mngon par mchod cing klog pa'am tha na phyag byas nas zas bza' bar bya ste/_dang po zas la sngags 'dis lan brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas kham gyi dang po lha nyid la dbul zhing de'i 'og tu zas bza' bar bya'o/_/de la sngags ni 'di 
[\[183b.6\]]yin te/_na maHsarba bud+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_oM ba liM dA te/_te dzo mA lI ni swA hA/_kha zas kyis dub pa spangs nas kyang snga dro'i bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad phyi dro'i yang bya ba yin no/_/nyal na yang yan lag thams cad kyis dang por sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 
[\[183b.7\]]phyag byas nas bstod de mal stan la 'dug cing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang bla na med pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog bdag la stsol cig_/rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba yang gdab par bya'o/_/mtshan gyi 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]dang po dang tha ma la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas dam pa'i chos 'don pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des de bzhin du nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dang por phyag bya ba dang nyin re zhing bdag dbul ba dang de bzhin du sdig 
[\[184a.2\]]pa so sor bshags pa dang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ba dang sems can thams cad la rang gi bsod nams bstab pa dang dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam la phyag byas nas 
[\[184a.3\]]bcang ba dang klog pa'am sgom pa dang /_tha na mchod pa byas nas dad pas snying po 'di bzla bar bya ba yin te/_ri'am lha khang ngam khyim mam brang khang la sogs pa'i gnas su/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing bzlas pas sems can 
[\[184a.4\]]thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis stobs bcu mkhyen pa'i sa don du gnyer zhing mngon par 'dod pas 'bum bzla bar bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur zhing des ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs la sogs pa'am/_phyir mi 
[\[184a.5\]]ldog pa'i sa la zhugs pa'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pa de dag gi bzlas pa'i cho ga yin no/_/gal te rig pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces yid la byed la bzlas pa 'bum yongs su rdzogs par byas 
[\[184a.6\]]nas/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'am bcu gsum mam bcu bzhi'i nyin mtshan la gso sbyong byas la/_ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas me tog gi gcal bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_mchod rten nam lugs sku 'am dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mdun du bzhag la/_ku sha'i khres po'am 
[\[184a.7\]]gcal du bkram pa la 'dug pa'am lo ma la nye bar 'dug ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchog slong bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba dang /_dmigs pa dang bzlas pas lcags kyi 'khor lo lag pa la thogs 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]la ji srid du 'bar bar ma gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa byas na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /_sa chen po 'gul bar 'gyur te/_rig pa 'dzin pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing de dag gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs su bsod nams 
[\[184b.2\]]ji lta ba dang rang gi skal ba ji lta ba'i gnas rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa'i sa thob par 'gyur te de la lus nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/thabs mkhas pa nyid kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyad kyang gzi brjid 
[\[184b.3\]]mtshungs pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo'i rim pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rdo rje dang mdung dang ral gri dang rtse gcig pa dang gtun shing dang dbyug pa dang sta re dang kha T+wA~M ga dang gri gug dang chu gri dang lcags kyu la yang bsgrub par bya'o/_/thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing sems can yongs 
[\[184b.4\]]su bsrung ba'i blo can lus dang srog la ltos pa med pa/_thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba'i yid la byed pas lcags dang /_gser dngul dang lcags gsum dang tsan+dan dang rdo dang tha na shing dngas las byas pa'am/_ta la'i lo ma'i rang bzhin las byas pa la sngar smos pa'i tshogs 
[\[184b.5\]]gcig pu dben par 'dug ste 'bum bzlas pas bsgrubs na gong ma bzhin rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/ldong ros sam/_mig sman nam ba bla 'am gi wang la sogs pa lo ma'i bar ram/_gos kyi bar ram lcags kyi snod kha sbyar du bcug la bsgrub par bya ba'am/_gos sam 
[\[184b.6\]]rgyal mtshan nam nor bu'am mu tig gi phreng ba la sogs pa rgyan rnams sam/_pad+ma 'am ut+pal la sogs pa me tog gi khyad par ram/_ska rags sam lhung bzed dam chos gos sam 'khar gsil la sogs pa'i yo byad lag par chud pa'am lo ma'am gos sam zhags pa la 
[\[184b.7\]]bsgrubs na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/ci snyed kyi grogs 'dod pa de snyed kyi grogs dang lhan cig 'phur zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa'i snying po 'di yang bsod nams dang ldan pa'am/_bsod nams dang mi ldan pas 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]kyang rung 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang rung /_tshul khrims dang mi ldan pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/thabs dang ldan pa'am thabs dang mi ldan pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/mkhas kyang rung mi mkhas kyang rung nges par don yod 
[\[185a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du dad pa med pa dang byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams kyis ma yin no/_/bris sku med kyang rung mchod kyang rung /_mchod pa med kyang rung /_khrus la sogs pa med kyang rung /_phyi'i spyod pa gtsang sbra la sogs pa med kyang rung /_nya sha dang sha dag 
[\[185a.3\]]la sogs pa yongs su ma spangs kyang rung 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs pa bsgoms pa'i sems kyis 'grub bo/_/gal te bris sku la sgrub par 'dod pas thad ka la bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i ri bo la rin po che'i pad+ma'i steng 
[\[185a.4\]]na bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pus mo btsugs nas pad+ma la bzhugs pa rdo rje dang bcas par thal mo sbyar ba ut+pa la'i lo ma'i mdog gam pri yang ku lta bur sngo bsangs sam gser gyi mdog can bri bar bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[185a.5\]]ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang cod pan can gos ser po gyon pa lag pa g.yon gyis lcags kyu yongs su 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu ming ngam mtha' med ces bya ba'i 'khor 'bar ba'i snying po can khros 
[\[185a.6\]]shing 'khrugs par gyur pa nor bu'i zur phud kyis brgyan pa a sho ka dmar po'i mdog can lag pa na gri gug dang zhags pa thogs pa bri bar bya'o/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'og tu gzhon nu ma g.yon na zur phud gcig pa nag po sngo bsangs rol par gyur pas 'khor la dga' ba dang bcas 
[\[185a.7\]]pas blta ba/_gos sngon po gyon pa lag na me tog gi phreng ba thogs pa mtha' med ma zhes bya ba pho nya mo bri bar bya'o/_/'dir yang bris sku la gzhan du yang las de dag nyid dang sgrub pa de dag nyid bya ba'am rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga'i sbyor ba'am yid la 'dod pa'i cho ga sbyar bar bya'o/_
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]dur khrod du 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'ongs nas lag pa nas bzung ste lcang lo can du 'dren par byed do/_/des rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nur gyur pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa dngos po ral gri la sogs pa la bsnyen pa byas pa des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/rgya 
[\[185b.2\]]mtshor zhugs nas 'bum bzlas na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su phyin par 'gyur zhing klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu'am rdo rje'am ral gri'am 'khor lo'am rin po che la 
[\[185b.3\]]sogs pa de rnams kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang por 'gro ba dang 'ong nus par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rigs thams cad blo mthun par 'gyur ro/_/char chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i mtshe'u gang du 'bum bzlas na 
[\[185b.4\]]klu'i gnas der rab tu 'jug par 'gyur zhing /_der gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gang gAr zhugs shing 'bum bzlas la 'bum yongs su rdzogs nas de nyid du mchod rten brtsigs la sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma dang yungs kar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg byas na/_klu thams cad skrag pas 
[\[185b.5\]]lhags par 'gyur zhing gang smras pa de byed par 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod du yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin gong ma bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_/ri'i lha la 'bru mar dang tsan+dan gyi sbyin sreg gis sam nags kyi gnas su rig pa 'dzin pa la sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling gi sbyin sreg 
[\[185b.6\]]byas na thams cad 'dus par 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du rjes su dran pa tsam gyis rang gi bka' lung sgrub par byed do/_/shing gi grib mas shing gzhan la ma phog pa ni shing gcig go/_/shing gcig gi drung du rjes su dran pas mchod rten byas shing 'bum bzlas la mdun du a shwat+tha 
[\[185b.7\]]las byas pa'i rtse gsum pa byas la nyin mtshan smyung bar 'dug ste/_nya la dris bskus shing ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du mtshan rangs pa bsgrub pa byas na gdul dka' ba 'dul bar byed pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de gling bzhi pa'i lha'i 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro/_/sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bzlas pa 'bum byas la nya la 'khor lo'i phyag mtshan nam rdo rje'i phyag mtshan nam rgyal mtshan blangs nas ji srid 'phur ba de srid bzlas na des kun du 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur 
[\[186a.2\]]ro/_/chu bor zhugs te bzlas pa 'bum byas nas sa las byas pa'i mchod rten gyi rtsar nya la sogs pa'i nyin zhag la ji skad du bshad pa'i gnas su cho ga snga ma bzhin lag pas nor bu blangs te ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid bzlas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 
[\[186a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/yang de nyid lag pas blangs te bzlas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bur 'gyur ro/_/zangs ma'i bum pa la cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrub pa byas na bum pa gang bar 'gyur ro/_/slong mos 'tsho zhing lcags kyi rdo rje lag par blangs te/_ji srid 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi 
[\[186a.4\]]smra bar bya ba ston par byed pa de srid bzlas pas chos gang nyan par 'dod pa de mngon par ston par 'gyur ro/_/de'i steng du bsgrubs na 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/'bar bar gyur pas lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang 'khor lo dang lcags 
[\[186a.5\]]kyu dang glegs bam lag pas blangs te bsgrubs pas rdo rje'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur zhing thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu'am gzhon nu ma legs par khrus byas te rgyan gyis brgyan pa la sngon du bsnyen pa byas la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te 
[\[186a.6\]]nyin mtshan smyung bas mchod rten nam lugs sku 'am glegs bam mam bris sku 'am gzhan dag gi mdun du ku sha'i gcal bkram pa la 'dug nas/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gsol ba btab la/_de nas tsan+dan nam ga bur ram gu 
[\[186a.7\]]gul lam du ru skas du ba med pa'i me mdag la sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de dag med na skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste lag pas de dag bzung la ji srid gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pas rab tu 'bar zhing 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/lag pas blangs na de dag dang bcas 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]par rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/bud med legs par khrus byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa la ji srid skyes par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/dur khrod du bris pa'am shing ngam sa las byas pa'i seng ge la ji srid 'gro bar gyur pa de srid bzlas pas de la zhon zhing gang du 
[\[186b.2\]]'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te nyin re rtag tu bzlas na gang du 'gro ba'i sa phyogs de bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te nyin mtshan du sgrub pa byed na ji srid zhag lnga'am drug gam brgyad dam lhag ma'i zla ba phyed kyi nang du yar 'phags par 'gyur zhing lha rnams las 
[\[186b.3\]]kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/de la zhon na gang du 'dod pa der 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rta'am glang po che'am khyu mchog gam ma he'am ra skyes sam lug gam [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la bzlas na de dag thams cad nyid gang du ji srid 'dod pa de srid du 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur 
[\[186b.4\]]ro/_/me tog gis rab tu gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor la dur khrod kyi shing la me sbar la mar dang yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg byas na zla ba phyed kyi nang du nges par mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod ji lta ba de bzhin du ri bo la sogs pa la yang gcig pu dben par 'dug ste bsgrub 
[\[186b.5\]]pa'am dad pa la sogs pa bya la bsgrub pa'am cho ga 'di nyid kyis shing khri'am mchil lham la sogs pa la yang yid la 'dod pas cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/shing mya ngan med kyi yal ga la 'jus nas ji srid nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas 
[\[186b.6\]]par bya'o/_/de bzhin du shing a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro d+ha dang nA ga puSh+pa'i shing dang shing til ka dang a mra dang dur khrod kyi shing la 'dzegs te ji srid mi snang bar 'gro ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/_/de ltar mi snang bar gyur pas lo stong phrag brgyar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur zhing khru gang tsam gyis sa la 
[\[186b.7\]]ma reg par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bsod snyoms kyi 'tsho bas dur khrod du ji srid du mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/_/dur khrod du zhag lnga 'dug ste bzlas pa byas nas phyis de nyid du sa'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten byas nas der me tog gi dkyil 'khor byas te/_thal ba 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]lag pa'i kha sbyar du bcug ste/_ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas pa byas nas des mdzub ris gsum byas pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ma ta la'i rtsa bskam po phye mar byas te dur khrod du me tog gis mngon par gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor byas la lag 
[\[187a.2\]]pa kha sbyor ram kham por kha sbyor du bcug ste ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas pa byas la des mig la bskus na mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'gro na puSh+pa dad a ti pa lA dang /_in+d+ra ba ru ni rnams kyi rtsa ba'am/_shu dag gam/_a pa rA tsi ta 'am/_a pa ra ti 
[\[187a.3\]]ni'am/_pad+ma'i sdong bu'i rtsa ba'am/_daN+Dot+pa la'am/_ut+pa la'i me tog gam/_mi'i sha'am/_rma bya'i sha'am/_tsha ba gsum mam/_ra dza pa ta'am/_spos dkar po'am gzhan dag phye mar byas te/_kham phor kha sbyar ram lag pa kha sbyor du bcug ste ji srid du ba 'thul 
[\[187a.4\]]ba de srid du bzlas pa des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod du sbrang rtsi la lan stong mngon par bsngags te mig la bskus nam mthong ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dgon par mchod rten gyi logs la shing rta bris la ji srid zla ba phyed kyi nang du 'gul bar 'gyur 
[\[187a.5\]]ba de srid nyin mtshan bzlas la de la zhon na kun du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/ba bla blangs te dben pa'i mchod rten nam dgon pa'am ri la sogs ba la ji srid dngos grub gsum grub par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/_/de bzhin du gi wang dang mig sman la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya'o/_/
[\[187a.6\]]dge slong gis rtag tu lhung bzed dang chos gos dang 'khar gsil la sogs pa blangs la bzlas pa bya zhing /_'jog pa na bsrung pa byas te gzhag par bya'o/_/de lta bu la sogs pa'i las su bya ba byed pa na yid la 'dod pa'i cho gas bsgrub pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[187a.7\]]cad kyi rtog pa'i cho gas bsgrubs na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po 'di 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/thogs pa med pa don yod pa'i yid la 'dod pa'i cho gas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsgrub par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di ltar bdag por khas blangs nas phyag 'tshal ba dang /_dmigs pa dang /_bzlas pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpar bcas pa rjes su dran zhing bzlas pa goms par bya'o/_/gal te skyil krung ma bshig par mtshan mo gcig pur ri 
[\[187b.2\]]la sogs pa dri zhim pa dben pa na dben par 'dug ste/_bzlas pa byed na nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe bsnyen pa ma byas par yang rig pa 'dzin pa nges par mtshan gcig gis 'grub bo/_/tsog pur 'dug nas byas na gdon mi za bar zla ba phyed kyi nang du lus yongs su 'gyur bar 
[\[187b.3\]]byed do/_/dkyil 'khor me tog la sogs pas mngon par gtor bar byas la/_mchod rten la mngon par phyogs pa'am/_lugs sku la mngon du phyogs pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag 'bul zhing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na dam pa'i chos 
[\[187b.4\]]spong ba dang 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams spong bar byed do/_/chu bo'i ngogs su mchod rten byas la chu bo de nyid du ske ba nub tsam du zhugs te bzlas na las kyi sgrib pa zad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mchod rten la skor ba byed cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na sdig pha las 
[\[187b.5\]]grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dben par mig btsums te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs nas/_ji srid mig btsums pa de kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na/_sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa las rnam par grol 
[\[187b.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/mi smra bar stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/'dis dam tshig thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par 'tshe ba la mar dang yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/nad pa rnams kyi don du ni mar dang sbrang rtsis 
[\[187b.7\]]sbyin sreg bya'o/_/khros pa rnams kyi don du sbrang rtsi'o/_/rgyal po 'dren par byed pa la ni yungs kar til mar la sbags nas sbyin sreg bya'o/_/g.yul 'gyed pa la ni 'od ma'i tsher ma'am 'chi ba la ma da na'i tsher ma'am arga'i me tog gam du dur ga'i me tog yungs kar gyi mar la 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]sbags pas sbyin sreg byas na 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/mu tsu kun+d+ha'i phur bu ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du spas na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang sngags phur bus btab par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad bris te lcags kyi phur bus 
[\[188a.2\]]btab na rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang ma dad pa dang gnod pa byed pa phur bus btab par 'gyur ro/_/a sho ka'i pur bus lam po che'i bzhi mdor brkos na gdon chen po rengs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig pa la sogs pa'i rims thams cad la skud pa'am bdug spos 
[\[188a.3\]]dri zhim po rnams kyis mgo btums la rang la bdugs na sel bar byed cing lhas bstan nas smra bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyin sreg gang yin pa des kyang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa med par byed do/_/zla ba gzas zin pa na zangs ma'am lcags sam gser ram dngul gyi snod du bcug 
[\[188a.4\]]pa'i mar la ji srid dngos grub gsum thob par gyur pa de srid du bzlas la/_de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin pa'am rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma gzas zin pa na ba bla shing mya ngan med kyi lo ma la bzhag ste/_dgon pa'i mchod rten nam ri bo'i mchod rten gyi rtsar dkyil 'khor la me 
[\[188a.5\]]tog gtor ba byas shing ji srid grub pa gsum thob par gyur pa de srid du bzlas na 'bar bar gyur nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/ba bla la ji lta ba de bzhin du lig bu mig dang ldong ros la sogs pa la zla ba gzas zin pa'am nyi ma gzas zin pa na bsgrub par bya'o/_/gang zhig sangs 
[\[188a.6\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba 'am rten 'pho bar 'dod pa'am rgal bar 'dod pa'am sems can rnams dang skye bo sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor ba las yongs su srung bar byed 'dod pa'am bdag nyid mthong ba'i chos nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la nges 
[\[188a.7\]]par sbyor bar 'dod pa'am gsal por snang ba la gzhan dag yang dag par sbyor bar 'dod pa'am/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las legs so zhes bya ba'i rnam pa rab tu bsgrags pa myur du rnyed par 'dod pa'am/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la skye ba rnyed par 'dod pas sngags kyi 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]spyod pa'i sgo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/thabs la mkhas pa 'dis kyang yongs su zin par bya ste/_smon lam rgya chen po bya ba dang sdig pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang dus gsum du 'byung ba'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'jig rten dang 
[\[188b.2\]]'jig rten las 'das pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang rjes su yi rang ba yang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyu nyid du rab tu sbyor bar gyur cig ces de ltar bsngo 'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs shing sems can gyi don 'byung bar gyur cig 
[\[188b.3\]]ces dang po'i tshig tu brjod pa'am/_rjes su bsams pa'am/_dmigs nas bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab cing sems can gyi don 'di 'byung bar gyur cig ces 
[\[188b.4\]]dang po tshig tu brjod pa'am rnam par bsams te bzlas pa bya'o/_/dben pa'i sa phyogs su 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa shin tu rgya chen po'i mdo dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu la rab tu 'jug pa klog pa nyid dang sems pa nyid dang mchod pa nyid tshes gcig 
[\[188b.5\]]nas brtsams te zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o/_/de nas nya la mchod pa byas te mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa byas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon zhing mgo bo la phyag gis byugs te/_'di skad du skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so zhes gsung bar 'gyur te/_de la sogs 
[\[188b.6\]]pa mi brjed pa'i gzungs rnyed par 'gyur zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rjes su zhugs nas mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyur gyur cig ces rnam par bsams la bzlas par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi nad 
[\[188b.7\]]rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig ces de ltar bzlas par bya'o/_/grang ba'i dmyal ba rnams la dro ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_tsha ba'i dmyal ba rnams la grang ba nyid 'byung bar gyur cig ces bzlas par bya'o/_/dud 'gro 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]rnams gcig la gcig za ba rnams med par gyur cig ces bzlas par bya'o/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad du sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba thams cad med par gyur cig_/bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad 'byung bar gyur cig_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[189a.2\]]rnams la bza' ba dang btung ba 'byung bar gyur cig ces de ltar zang zing med pa'i sems can thams cad la longs spyod pa 'byung bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyi dge ba rab tu 'phel ba'i shugs 'byung bar gyur cig_/bde ba dang yid bde ba de dag rnams la 'byung 
[\[189a.3\]]bar gyur cig_/dad pa dang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa dang rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i shugs 'byung bar gyur cig_/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/stobs bcu mkhyen pa'i sa la sems can 
[\[189a.4\]]so sor gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa dang gzhan yang sems can la phan pa'i rgyur dmigs te sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/mdor na 'khor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa rab tu spang ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs 
[\[189a.5\]]su rdzogs par gyur cig ces sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bzlas pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang smon lam gyi stobs dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis go ra mis ji lta bzhin du sems can gyi khams su sems can gyi don gyi 
[\[189a.6\]]khyad par chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par 'gyur te mos pa rgya che ba dang dad pas byang chub mngon par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu de la yang dad par bya'o/_/de la 'di'i dpe bstan pa ni 'di lta ste/_yang 'dod 
[\[189a.7\]]pa'i khams na dbang phyug ces bya ba yod de/_'dod pa skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dod pas rgyal bar byed cing 'dod pa'i longs spyod yongs su longs spyod pa yang /_yang dag par ston par byed do/_/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]mang po dang /_rin po che dang /_nor bu yod pa'i sa phyogs dang /_yo byad dang /_longs spyod nye bar stobs par byed do/_/'di lta ste yang lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba yod de des yid ltar mgyogs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[189b.2\]]kyi las su bya ba byed cing yo byad dang longs spyod mngon par sprul nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la yang nye bar stobs par byed do/_/'di lta ste yang rig pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gos dang /_btung ba dang /_gzhal yas khang dang /_
[\[189b.3\]]skyed mos tshal dang /_dri dang /_me tog dang /_phye ma dang /_phreng ba la sogs pa mngon par sprul nas yongs su longs spyod par byed cing gzhan dag la ster bar byed do/_/'di lta ste yang mig 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mig 'phrul mkhan zhes bya bas rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[189b.4\]]pa'i mig 'phrul ston par byed do/_/'di lta ste yang lha ma yin rnams sngags kyi sgyu ma byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste yang sman pas sngags kyis sems can mang po rnams kyi rims sel bar byed cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dug dang nad rnams sel bar byed do/_/'di lta 
[\[189b.5\]]ste yang sngags kyis me'i dro ba med par byed cing grang ba yang dro bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste yang mngon par gnod par byed pas rims kyis 'dzin par byed do/_/'di lta ste yang ma mo'i rtog pas sems can mang po rnams la gsod pa dang rnam par 'tshe bar byed do/_/gzhan 
[\[189b.6\]]yang sdig pa rnams la sdig pa'i sngags kyis sdig pa la sbyor bar byed do/_/gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi sems rnam par g.yo bar byed pa'i sngags kyis sems dga' ba dang yid bde ba la sogs pa dang gzhan dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu la sogs pa'i nges 
[\[189b.7\]]par ston pa ni sngags kyi stobs yin par blta bar bya'o/_/gsang sngags de'i stobs ni gsang sngags nyid las 'byung ba yang ma yin/_sems can las 'jug pa yang ma yin sbyor ba byas pa yang mi dmigs mod kyi sngon gyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga las gsang sngags kyi stobs kyi 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]stobs rab tu shes par bya'o/_/byin gyis brlabs kyi chos nyid las byung ba las 'das pa yang ma yin/_chos thams cad kyi chos nyid 'di yang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang ma yin/_dmigs pa yang ma yin/_'gro bar byed pa yang ma yin/_byed pa po 
[\[190a.2\]]yang ma yin/_byed pa yang ma yin/_bden par gyur pa mi slu ba yin te de bas na dad pas sngags 'dis sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o/_/tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba'i chos nyid kyi yon tan 'dod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par 'dod pa dang bsod 
[\[190a.3\]]nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pa dang yon tan rin po che so sor thob par 'dod pas bsgrub par bya'o/_/sems can gyi don gyi phyir mngon par brjod pa'i sbyor ba 'dis bsgrubs na myur ba kho nar ji ltar 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs 
[\[190a.4\]]pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur gyur pa ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi go 'phang gang yin pa rnam par bsams la bzlas pa 'bum byas na nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mthong zhing mgo la byugs te ji ltar 'dod pa'i 
[\[190a.5\]]dngos grub kyang myur du stsol bar mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi las su bya ba ci 'dod pa la sbyor ba'ang rung rtog pa'i cho ga gzhan nam sngags 'di la rtog pa thams cad kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o/_/dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po las gsungs pa'i cho ga las/_de bzhin 
[\[190a.6\]]gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u rdzogs so//_//yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku'i yan lag thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod 
[\[190a.7\]]yul thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po byung bar gyur to/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_oM a ma la bi krAM ta te dzI ni a ra dze swA hA/_lag na rdo rje 'di ni chos kyi spyod yul mtha' dang dbus med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rig pa mchog 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags chen po rtog pa'i sbyor ba rab 'byam yangs pa mtha' med pa sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dis las rnams gang bag med pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub 
[\[190b.2\]]sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa ma gtogs par smyo bar 'gyur ro/_/mdor bstan na bzlas pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su thob nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[190b.3\]]sku dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sku sems can gyi khams thams cad la yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/_/mos pa sna tshogs pa rnams la 'tsham par 'khor ba la zlog pa'i phyir sgyu ma mkhan bzhin du thams cad du song ba thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags 
[\[190b.4\]]chen po 'dis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs las byung ba/_mtha' dang dbus med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i stobs dang /_dge bas rgyas par byas pa'i sems kyi 'jug pas 
[\[190b.5\]]byin gyis brlabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung gi 'khor lo dang gzhan dag kyang sems can gyi khams rnams las 'byung zhing thos par gyur cig ces sems can thams cad bskyab par dmigs nas sngags bzlas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 
[\[190b.6\]]byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyi shugs la dad par bya'o/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas tha na gzung pa tsam la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/rtog pa 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi don yod pa thogs pa med pa smon lam gyi stobs dang /_byin gyis 
[\[190b.7\]]brlabs kyi stobs kyis dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/de las 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa 'thob pa'i thabs phyogs tsam brjod par bya'o/_/'dir dad pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas re zhig sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]snga ma bzhin du bdag gi lus dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas dus thams cad pa'i sdig pa bshags te/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las byung ba rnams nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshags par bya'o/_/
[\[191a.2\]]de nas 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya ste/_sems can thams cad skyob cing phan par mdzad pa la rjes su yi 
[\[191a.3\]]rang ngo /_/dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa nyid la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de nas 'di ltar yang bsam par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig cig 
[\[191a.4\]]gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang tshad med do zhes rjes su yi rangs nas sems can thams cad kyi phyir yongs su bsngo na mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na gang yang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[191a.5\]]mtha' yas pa mtha' mi mthong ba tshad med pa khong du chud par byas nas rjes su yi rang ba lta ci smos/_yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ci ltar mkhyen pa gang yin pa des rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod de/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 
[\[191a.6\]]yang dag par byung ba/_bdag gi med pa rjes su ma bzung ba/_thang las skyes pa rin po che'i ri la sogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa'i don du bsngo bar bya'o/_/de nas bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis de bzhin 
[\[191a.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i dam pa rgya chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /_bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces nges par bsams 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]la/_'di skad lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_sarba thA ung+ga te s+pha ra Na hI mAM ga ga na kaM sa man+tA ta swA hA/_/de'i rjes la gzhan ma yin par de bzhin du mchod pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pas ci ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du 'byung bar 
[\[191b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas pa rab 'byam rgya mtsho rnams bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs dang /_bsod nams kyi stobs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin 
[\[191b.3\]]gyis brlabs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams la sngags 'di lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_sarba trAM saM ku su mi tA a b+hi dz+nyA na rA shi ni na mo stu te swA hA/_de nas bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams de bzhin gshegs 
[\[191b.4\]]pa rnams kyis ci ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis thams cad tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bdag la dngos grub dang mchog stsal du gsol zhes tshig tu brjod par 
[\[191b.5\]]bya'o/_/de nas sems can thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs zag pa med pa rnal 'byor las yang dag par byung ba rab tu thob par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do/_/de bzhin du mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba sbyin par yid la 
[\[191b.6\]]byas nas de lta bu'i sprul pa'i sprin mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor bas bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i sngags lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing dmigs la bzlas pa goms 
[\[191b.7\]]par byas nas/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad grub par gyur pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba la dmigs pa'i sems kyis goms par byas 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]shing bzlas par bya ste/_ci srid skyo bar ma gyur [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]bar du'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /_bla na med pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 
[\[192a.2\]]bzang po ye shes kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa la mngon par mos pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas langs te 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa yangs shing rgya che ba'i mdo sde bklag pa'am gzhan yang rung ci ltar bsams pa 
[\[192a.3\]]bzhin du snga dro'i dus kyi bar du gnas par bya'o/_/de nas glegs bam la sogs pa mchod pa'am/_tha na mchod rten la phyag byas nas zas bza' bar bya'o/_/za ba'i tshe kha zas la sngags 'dis lan brgyad mngon par bsngags la dang po'i chang bu lha bshos su phul la bza' 
[\[192a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/de la sngags ni 'di yin te/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_oM ba liM tA te/_te dzo mA li ni swA hA/_zas kyis dub pa cung zhig ngal ba sos la phyi dro'i dus su yang cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o/_/nyal ba'i tshe dang por sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[192a.5\]]cad la yan lag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal nas bdag nyid phul la phyi nas mal du ci ltar 'dod par gnyid log la nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar bya'o/_/de la cho ga ni 'di yin no/_/tshes gcig nas brtsams nas nyin re nyin re zhing zla ba gcig rdzogs kyi bar 
[\[192a.6\]]du 'di bzhin du bya ba yin no/_/gal te cho ga 'ga' zhig ma byas sam/_bya ba gzhan gyis brel bas nyi ma gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum la sogs par las las nyams na yang des brtson 'grus dor bar mi bya ste/_zla ba de nyid kyi nya la nyin mtshan gcig tu 
[\[192a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du'am/_mchod rten dang /_sku gzugs dang /_dam pa'i chos glegs bam mam/_gzhan gyi mdun du yang rung /_mchod pa ci 'byor pa byas nas ku sha bkram pa la 'dug ste bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_rtse gsum 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]dang /_mdung dang /_kha T+wAM ga yang rung /_lcags las byas pa'am/_sa las byas pa yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u nas gsungs pa'i mtshon cha rnams las gang 'dod pa zhig lag tu blangs nas bsgrub pa byas na des nam phyed dam/_nyi ma 'char kar 
[\[192b.2\]]nges par 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/_skad cig de la rig 'dzin gyi rigs kun nye bar 'dus nas de la dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bzung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du nam mkha' la rgyu zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[192b.3\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rjes su 'jug cing mchod pa chen po byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs nas bde ba dang ldan bzhin du lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin thams cad kyis mchod cing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i rig sngags 'dzin 
[\[192b.4\]]pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/_/mtha' yas pa'i bud med kyi 'khor la sogs pa la yongs su longs spyod kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing lus de nyid mi 'dor bar bde bar rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/thabs 'di nyid kyis mthar gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[192b.5\]]rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku'i bar du yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo la sogs pa mtshon cha rnams la ci lta ba bzhin du ldong ros dang /_mig sman dang /_ba bla dang /_gi wang dang /_gos dang /_ku sha dang /_nor bu dang /_rma bya'i sgro dang /_snod dang /_mchil lham dang /_
[\[192b.6\]]gdugs dang /_rnga yab dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_'phan dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pa la dang /_ta la'i lo ma las ral gri dang /_chu gri dang /_gri dang /_kha T+wA~M ga la sogs pa'i rdzas su byas pa'am/_lhag mas kyang bsgrub par bya'o/_/yid la gang 'dod pa'am/_rig sngags 
[\[192b.7\]]dang /_gsang sngags dang /_rtog pa'i cho ga gzhan la yang sbyar ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i cho ga'am/_yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas kyang sgrub pa byas na de nyid kyis rig 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thad nas dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga'o/_/ji skad bstan pa'i phyogs gcig tu mchod rten dang /_sku gzugs dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/_gang yang rung ba'i mdun 
[\[193a.2\]]du me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la ci 'byor ba'i dri dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung /_ku sha'i chang bu la nye bar 'dug nas lag pa'am gzhan du yang rung /_ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas bzung nas/_
[\[193a.3\]]lo ma'i bar ram/_gos kyi bar du'am/_lcags dang /_dngul dang /_gser gyi snod du bzhag la ji srid 'bar bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/_de bzhin du bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste/_
[\[193a.4\]]'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i cho ga yin no/_/cho ga 'di nyid kyis dben zhing stong pa'i ri dang /_chu klung dang /_mtshe'u dang /_tshal nyams dga' ba'am/_shing gcig gam/_gtsug lag gi gnas sam/_sku gdung dang bcas 
[\[193a.5\]]pa'i mchod rten gyi rtsa'am/_sku gzugs bzhugs pa'am/_gzhan yang gtsug lag khang gi brang khang la sogs pa dben par bsgrub par bya ste/_'du 'dzi dang bral ba'am/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la goms par byas la/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i 
[\[193a.6\]]sems dang ldan pa/_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_dad pa dang ldan pa ser sna med pas som nyi dang bral ba'i sems kyis lus dang srog la yang ltos pa med par bya'o/_/gzhan yang thams cad kyi thun mong gi cho ga ni ri dang chu 'gram dang /_'bab chu'i ngos la sogs pa'i 
[\[193a.7\]]gnas dben zhing stong pa rnams su dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dang gnyis su gnas la dus gsum du sdig pa bshags pa dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ba byas nas/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar gsol ba 'debs 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]pas ci srid mtshan ma byung bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/yar ngo'i nya la cho ga snga ma bzhin du nyin zhag gcig smyung bar gnas nas ji skad bstan pa'i rdzas rnams las gang yang rung ba blangs la ci srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas na de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur 
[\[193b.2\]]ro/_/rig pa mchog don yod pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa/_thogs pa med pa yid la re ba'i phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa ste/_ci lta ci ltar rab tu sbyor ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin gyis grub pa bklags pas 'grub pa yin pas bzlas pa tsam 
[\[193b.3\]]gyis 'dod pa thams cad byed pa yin no/_/don yod pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin du sbyar ba'am/_ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/yang na ras ris bsgrub par 'dod na bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[193b.4\]]kyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje kun nas 'bar bas bskor ba/_bcom ldan 'das cod pan las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su rig pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal mo gser gyi mdog can ral 
[\[193b.5\]]pa dang bcas pa/_gos gtsang ma bgos pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba/_'od kyi phreng bas brgyan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'og tu mtha' med ces bya ba'i 'khor ral gri dang /_zhags pa lag na thogs pa/_mdog sngo 
[\[193b.6\]]bsangs khros shing 'khrugs pa/_gos dmar ser zung bgos pa/_khro gnyer bsdus pa bgegs thams cad tshar gcod pa/_mdag gzhug pa rin po che'i brag la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar ba rin po che'i brag gi 
[\[193b.7\]]pad+ma'i sdong bu la bzhugs pa me tog gi 'khri shing gis kun nas bskor ba bri bar bya'o/_/de lta bu'i ras ris kyi mdun du cho ga 'dis ci ltar 'dod par ram/_rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga dang yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/rig pa mchog gi ras ris gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]zhugs pa pad+ma dmar po la rab tu bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu mngag gzhug pa mtha' med lag pa na ral gri dang /_zhags pa thogs pa de dang 'dra ba bri bar bya'o/_/ras ris 'dir yang las de dag kun bya'o/_/cho ga gzhan yang ri la sogs pa 
[\[194a.2\]]dben zhing dben pa'i phyogs gcig tu skyil mo krung bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs nas mtshan thog thag skyil mo krung ma bshig par bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas kyang tho rangs sam nam phyed na rig pa 'dzin par 
[\[194a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/mthu mtshungs pa med pa dang ldan pas phyir mi ldog pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas mchod par 'gyur/_sems can thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa'i mchog 'di gang gi lag tu thob pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 
[\[194a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yang dag par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha dang klu la sogs pa dgug pa dang /_gzhan yang yid la gang 'dod pa rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[194a.5\]]snying po'i cho ga gang yin pa'i dam pa nyis 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[194a.6\]]yul la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje shugs kyi yi ge zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/_/de las ni rig pa'i mchog gi rdo rje'i tshig 'di byung bar gyur to/_/na maH
[\[194a.7\]]sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nA~M/_oM pi ra dzi bi ra dzi ma hA bi ra dzi satwa sa twa/_sA ra te sA ra te/_trA yi trA yi bi d+ha ma hA tI sa b+tany+dza ni/_tarma ti sid+d+hA a gre traM swA hA/_/'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di la yang rig pa'i mchog dang po mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rtog pa'i cho gar 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rtog pa'i cho ga nyis 'gyur du sbyor ba gang yin pa yang nyis 'gyur du 'jug go/_/'di'i ras ris kyi khyad par ni rin po che'i brag las skyes pa'i rin po che'i pad+ma chen po la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa phyag gis mchog stsol ba'o/_/
[\[194b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su rig pa'i mchog phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin po che'i brag la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin phyag na 'khor lo 
[\[194b.3\]]bsnams pa/_cung zad sngo bsangs rin po che'i brag la bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis kun nas bskor ba'o/_/de'i 'og logs su sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri'o/_/lha mo'i 'og tu ni mtha' med ces bya ba 'khor de nyid bgegs tshar gcod pa ral 
[\[194b.4\]]gri dang zhags pa lag na thogs pa bri bar bya'o/_/ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo gcig pu gnas pa phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/_/de'i 'og tu ni de bzhin du mtha' med lag na ral gri dang zhags pa thogs pa khro bo gzhon nu'i gzugs can khro gnyer g.yo ba dang 
[\[194b.5\]]bcas pa'o/_/'dir yang cho ga ni snga ma nyid kyis bya'o/_/ci ltar yid la 'dod pas sam/_rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang bya'o/_/'dir khyad par ni 'di yin no/_/bklags pa tsam gyis dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyur/_dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs 
[\[194b.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so//_//de nas bdud rtsi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis dam tshig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[194b.7\]]la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de las rol pa'i yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i bden pa'i tshig gi 'khor lo rdo rje'i sgra mngon par byung bar gyur to/_/de las bdud rtsi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa mchog 'di thos par gyur to/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a mr-i ta a mr-i ta/_
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]shi khi shi khi/_bi ma la bi ma la/_bI rA dzI nI bI rA dzI nI/_ha ra ha ra/_bi dAM ma hA sa ma ya/_badzra a gre swA hA/_bdud rtsi rdo rje 'di'i cho ga yang sngar bstan pa'i rig pa'i mchog gsum po de nyid kyi yin no/_/'dir 'di'i ras ris kyi khyad par ni bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i ri'i steng 
[\[195a.2\]]na rin po che'i pad+ma chen po la nye bar bzhugs pa phyag gis mchog stsol ba de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su lha mo pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa bri bar bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[195a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su bdud rtsi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa rin po che'i pad+ma la nye bar bzhugs pa phyogs gnyis su rin po che'i ba dan gnyis phyar ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis kun nas bskor ba bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu sgrub 
[\[195a.4\]]pa po snga ma bzhin du bri'o/_/lha mo'i 'og tu mngag gzhug pa mtha' yas ral gri dang zhags pa lag na thogs pa gzhon nu'i cha byad can log 'dren tshar gcod pa bri bar bya'o/_/ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag na bsnams pa de bzhin du bris la 'khor 
[\[195a.5\]]mtha' yas kyang snga ma lta bu'o/_/de bzhin du the tshom dang bral bas rtog pa 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rtog pa'i cho ga yang 'dir nyis 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdud rtsi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub 
[\[195a.6\]]sems dpa' dpa' bo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gsum mnyam pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas de dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so/_/
[\[195a.7\]]na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nA~M/_a ha ha ha/_bIM bIM/_b+h+rA ma Ni/_tri pa li ni swA hA/_rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog gi snying po 'dis ni gang de dag tu mngon par ma bsgrubs pa 'grub par 'gyur te/_'di'i cho ga ni de dag nyid yin no/_/ras ris kyi khyad 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]par ni rig pa'i mchog gi gnas su gzhon nu ma bri bar bya ste/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lcang lo can pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa/_bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar bar byas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su rdo rje 'dzin gyi gnas su de bzhin 
[\[195b.2\]]du dpa' bo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi mdog can skyil mo krung gis pad+ma'i steng du ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pas bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'od kyi phreng bas bskor ba bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'o/_/lha mo'i 'og tu ni de bzhin du 
[\[195b.3\]]mtha' med do/_/ras ris gnyis pa ni de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i lha mo lcang lo can g.yog dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/ras ris 'di la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rtog pa dang sbyar nas de bzhin du las thams cad nyis 'gyur du bya'o/_/
[\[195b.4\]]rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba stobs chen po'i spyod yul gyi mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par 
[\[195b.5\]]zhugs nas rig pa mchog ces bya ba'i yi ge brgyad po don yod pa mi 'phrogs pa chos thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs la ltos pa med pa 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a sa hA nA mA sa ma hU~M/_'di ni rig 
[\[195b.6\]]pa chen po'i mchog rgyal po'i rtse mo bla na med pa ste/_'dis dngos grub gang ci yang rung ba mi sgrub pa med de kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ni ma yin no/_/sngar bstan pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i sum 
[\[195b.7\]]'gyur du bya ba nyid do/_/ras ris ni pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su gzhon nu ma lcang lo can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa pad+ma'i steng na skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor ba mnyam par gzhag pa bri bar bya'o/_/rig pa mchog gi 'og tu mtha' med ces bya ba lag na 
[\[196a.2\]]rdo rje thogs pa sngo bsangs khros pa/_'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor ba/_khro gnyer bsdus pa mngag gzhug pa bgegs tshar gcod pa bri bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'o/_/ras ris gnyis pa ni gzhon nu ma de lta bu nyid 'og tu mtha' med dang 
[\[196a.3\]]bcas pa'o/_/'dir yang yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho ga'am/_rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas snga ma bzhin du las rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/_/mi brjed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so//_//de nas dam tshig rdo rje brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 
[\[196a.4\]]'chang gi sngags gsungs pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_hAM hAM a sa ma tsin+ta ma hA badzra bi shwa d+ha ra a nan+ta bi krAn+ta dzA sAM hU~M phaT/_'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_sngar bstan pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga rnams sbyar bar bya'o/_/dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 
[\[196a.5\]]rdzogs so//_//rdo rjes kI li kI la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin de bzhin tu ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i rigs gzhon nu ma mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a tsa la sam+ba ra/_bi Sha ye hU~M ma hA 
[\[196a.6\]]badzre ga te dze/_hI hI a sa ma ma hA bi d+ho/_ud+d+ha me/_ha ha sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/_ba ra aM ga de ba rA ga_/he s+pha ra/_dz+wa la nA ma swA hA/_rdo rje rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//_//byang chub sems dpa' kun nas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[196a.7\]]zhugs nas rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_a badzra ma hA badzra/_ma hA ba la sa ra bI rA dzA te/_sa ma sa ma/_khu ru khu ru/_biSha mo d+ha ri d+ha ri/_sI ri sI ri/_ba re swA hA/_dpa' bo mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//_//byang 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a sa man+ta bA tri/_a tsa la ba ra aM/_bi la si nI/_khe le ba ra/_ut+ta ma/_hA si ni ha rA te/_g+ha na ma Na de ni haM/_mi 
[\[196b.2\]]g.yo ba mchog gi lus zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//_//byang chub sems dpa' snying rje rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a mr-i te a mr-i te/_shi khi ne shi khi ne/_sa ma te sa ma te/_a sa 
[\[196b.3\]]me a sa me/_ga ga ne gag ne/_tiSh+tha tiSh+tha/_a sa he/_hU~M dz+wA la dz+wA la swA hA/_bdud rtsi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//_//shin tu rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mdzes pa mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 
[\[196b.4\]]'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_A ti A ti/_ba ra ba ra/_pi ri pi ri/_sa ma li Sh+Ti Ni/_ti ri ti ri/_hA sa hA sa/_A rI Ni ban+d+ha ya/_ma hA b+ho gi ni/_ta hA ta ma hA badzra gu Nong+ga te badzra le swA hA/_kun tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//_//
[\[196b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yi ge brgyad pa 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+ho satwA nAM/_a nan+ta satwA maM ga hU~M/_byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo'i 
[\[196b.6\]]stobs zhes bya ba stobs thams cad kyi rgyal po'i rtse mo'i stobs kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a sa 
[\[196b.7\]]ma ma hA ba ra da ya gi ti ti ti ti/_a mU a mU/_khaM khaM NA a sa ma gu NA/_a kA ra ti ti ti ti/_a gra bA lo a d+ha ye taM swA hA/_byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo kun nas rdo rje zhes bya ba mchog gi yul la rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]par zhugs nas rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_a ti a ti/_sa ma sa ma/_kI li ki la/_bar bar/_sa ma ye ha sa ha sa/_a sa te/_tra yi tra yi/_/ga ne/_ku ru ku ru/_a ji te swA hA/_rab mchog rdo rje zhes bya 
[\[197a.2\]]ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ye shes kyi sgo phyogs bcur spro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho rnams 
[\[197a.3\]]su ngo mtshar chen po dam pa rgya che ba du ma sna tshogs kyi ltas rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/de nas phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i yi ge bcu pa 'di byung zhing thos par gyur to/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ma hA badzrA bi krAn+ta a gra sa hU~M/_
[\[197a.4\]]phyogs bcu'i 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa mchog yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya bas rig pa'i mchog gsungs pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_Ar+ya a gra te dz+wA la dz+wA la swA hA/_spyan gsum zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 
[\[197a.5\]]rtse mo bla na med pa'i yul can no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun nas bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga pa'i rig pa'i mchog phyung ngo /_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ma hA ba la hU~M/_de nas rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis 
[\[197a.6\]]brlabs nas/_nyid kyi rig pa'i mchog gsungs pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_o~M badzra ne tra/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_ku ru ba ra ku ru ba ra/_bi ra bi ra/_ma hA ba la/_a ti ho/_/ma hA sa ma ya te dza lan hU~M/_de nas lag na rdo rjes yang rdo rje de nyid byin gyis brlabs pa/_
[\[197a.7\]]na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ma hA tsan+d+ra hU~M/_gsang ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog go/_/'phags pa rdo rje sdes rang gi rig pa'i mchog smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a badzra hU~M/_yi ge bzhi pa rig pa'i mchog zhal bzhi pa zhes bya 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]ba'o/_/khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang gzi brjid stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i mchog gsungs pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_a gra te dzo ba la hU~M/_rak+Sha rak+Sha/_da ma da ma/_dzA la na ma hA/_ha ra ha ra/_bi Sha Na/_ta ra ta 
[\[197b.2\]]ra/_na da na da/_ka ra ka ra/_haM haM/_a mo g+ha/_a pra ti ha ta/_a mr-i ta ba la/_dz+wA la dz+wA la swA hA/_gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin te/_gtum po srung ba po 'chang ba po gsod par byed pa/_sgrub par byed pa/_thogs pa med pa/_don yod pa ste/_
[\[197b.3\]]las mtha' yas pa sngar bstan pa'i cho ga 'dis sgrub par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i cho ga sum 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o/_/rig pa mchog 'di dag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul las byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtha' yas pa/_mtha' med pa/_
[\[197b.4\]]sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/_sngar bstan pa'i cho ga'i rim pa 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/skye ba 'di nyid la tshe dpag tu med pa thob par 'dod pa dang /_dpag tu med pa'i bde ba la longs spyod par 'dod pa dang /_'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'jug 
[\[197b.5\]]par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par 'dod pa dang /_mthong bar 'dod pas som nyi spangs nas dad cing rtog pa dang ldan pas 'phrogs pa med pa don yod pa 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni ris ris med kyang rung /_ma bsgrubs 
[\[197b.6\]]kyang rung /_mchod pa med pas kyang rung /_khrus la sogs pa gtsang sbra kun spyod med kyang rung /_sha dang nya sha ma spangs kyang rung /_bsod nams dang ldan yang rung bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung /_
[\[197b.7\]]tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung /_dman pa'am dman pa ma yin pa yang rung /_mkhas pa'am mkhas pa ma yin pa yang rung /_thabs dang ldan yang rung /_thabs dang mi ldan yang rung nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dad pa med pa dang /_byang chub tu sems 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]ma bskyed pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de nas rig pa mchog 'di'i cho ga yang sngar bstan pa'i rtog pa rnams kyi cho ga dang thun mong yin no/_/khyad par gyi cho ga phyogs tsam zhig bsdus nas brjod par bya'o/_/rig pa'i mchog rig pa chen po'i rgyal po rtse mo 'di 
[\[198a.2\]]ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa/_bklags pas 'grub pa/_bzlas pa tsam gyis 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa 'grub par byed pa 'di sems can gyi khams rnams rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dmigs pa sngon du 'gro bas bzlas pa byas na bsrung ba dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_
[\[198a.3\]]bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_dbab pa dang /_rengs par bya ba dang /_bskrad par bya ba dang /_dgug pa dang /_gdug pa tshar gcad pa dang /_bsreg pa dang /_btso ba dang /_mthu bstan pa dang /_lha dang klu la sogs pa dgug pa dang /_dbang du bya ba dang /_don bsgrub par 
[\[198a.4\]]bya ba dang /_rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu mo dgug cing bsgrub pa dang /_bsnyen pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /_nad rnam par bsal bar bya ba dang /_klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa dbang du byed pa la sogs pa las rab 'byam bsgrub pa'i khyad par gyis mngon sum du sbyar 
[\[198a.5\]]bar bya'o/_/las gang dang gang dang /_sbyin sreg gang dang gang gis de dang de 'grub pa'i thabs gang yin pa de thabs gang yin pa de thabs de de bzhin du las kyi cho gas bya'o/_/ji ltar nus pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed la mi'i lus ni gdul dka' ba yin zhes smad nas ri'i gseb tu 
[\[198a.6\]]zhugs te/_sdig pa dus gsum du bshags pa dang /_bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_yongs su bsngo ba byas nas nus pa dang mthun par ci srid mtshan ma byung gi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas zla ba nya ba la 'khor lo dang /_ral gri dang /_gser dang /_dngul 
[\[198a.7\]]dang /_zangs las byas pa'am/_lcags rin po che las byas pa'am/_ta la'i lo ma las byas pa yang rung /_ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas pa'am/_sngags gang yang rung bas bsrung ba byas te/_ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas gang la mtshon 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]gyis brgyab pa de yang 'khor dang bcas par rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar 'khor lo la sogs pa/_ji lta ba de bzhin du mtshon cha thams cad la yang ngo /_/thun mong gi cho gas ba bla'am/_ldong ros sam/_lig bu mig la sogs pa rdzas thams cad la bsgrub 
[\[198b.2\]]par bya'o/_/'dir sbyor ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/_thabs dang bcas pa dang /_thabs dang bral ba'o/_/de la cho ga gang yang rung bas nus pa ci lta ba bzhin du gang yang rung ba zhig sems can gyi khams rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig ces yid la 
[\[198b.3\]]byas nas bzlas pa byas na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyur gyur cig ces yang dag par bsams la bzlas pa bya'o/_/de bzhin du sems can gyi khams dge ba la 'jug par gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa 
[\[198b.4\]]sems can rnams la phan pa'i sbyor ba byas la mos par byas nas bsgrub par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs shing phyag 'tshal nas bzlas pa bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa rnams don du gnyer ba la 
[\[198b.5\]]'bad pas dmigs shing bzlas pa byas shing sdig pa rnams bshags pa dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du gnyer ba'i phyir bzla ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs 
[\[198b.6\]]pa don du gnyer bar dmigs nas bzla ba dang /_stobs bcu pa'i ye shes kyis non par bya ba don du gnyer bar dmigs nas bzla ba dang /_de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byas nas gang yang rung ba'i rig pa mchog gis bsgrubs na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/ri bo'i gseb 
[\[198b.7\]]tu 'bum bzlas pa byas na 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyis kyis ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so/_/gsum gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang smra bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhis ni 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung thos par 'gyur ro/_/lngas ni gzungs rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/drug gis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bdun gyis mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad la 
[\[199a.2\]]mngon par mchod par 'gyur ro/_/dgus ni mya ngan las 'das pa mngon par sgrub par byed do/_/bcus ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su rgyu bar 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni thabs la mkhas pa'i bzlas pa'i cho ga ste/_mtha' yas pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/thabs 
[\[199a.3\]]la mi mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang brtson 'grus rab dang 'bring dang tha mas ci ltar bsnyen pa de ltar rab tu sbyar na nub gcig gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te snga ma bzhin no/_/ri 'am phug gam khang pa'i phug la sogs pa dben zhing stong par me tog dri zhim po sil ma bkram pa/_
[\[199a.4\]]dri zhim po'i spos kyis bdugs pa'i sa phyogs 'ga' zhig tu nyi ma nub pa'i dus na skyil mo krung bcas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs pas skyil mo krung ma bshig par gang yang rung ba'i rig pa'i mchog nam phyed dam/_nyi ma shar gyi bar du 
[\[199a.5\]]bzlas pa byas na lus 'bar bar gyur nas gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_thams cad du 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma grub na bar du nub gcig ngal bsos la nub gsum pa la yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/yang nub gcig 
[\[199a.6\]]gis bar du chod pa'i nub lnga pa la ni/_dam pa'i chos spong ba yang nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas 'bum bzlas te rdzas gang la bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo 'am/_rdo rje dang ral gri la sogs pa 
[\[199a.7\]]lag tu thogs nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas te/_de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na ba lang gi lci ba'i nang du de bcug la gang yang rung ba'i rig pa'i mchog gis bsrung ba byas te gzhag go/_/dur khrod du 'dug nas ci 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]srid gnod sbyin du gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas la mya ngan med kyi shing gi rtsa bar 'dug ste ji srid gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/_/'ongs nas ci zhig bgyi zhes zer na/_gang 'dod pa smras na thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing 'khyud nas rang gi khyim du 'jug par 
[\[199b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/p+l+kak+Sha'i shing gi rtsa bar me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor la lha'i bzhon pa bris la/_ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/ri'i gseb tu seng ge'am/_rta bris nas de nyid du 'dug ste/_ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas 
[\[199b.3\]]pa bya'o/_/de bzhin du glang po che dang /_ma he dang /_lug dang /_ra dang /_ngang pa dang /_rma bya la sogs pa bris nas me tog sil mas brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas mtshan mo rangs pa bzlas par bya'o/_/gal te mtshan mo de la ma grub na yang bsgrub par bya ste/_sangs 
[\[199b.4\]]rgyas rjes su dran bzhin du lha chen po'i khang par zhugs nas ci srid lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyis 'ong bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas de nyid du nyal na 'ongs nas gang smras pa de byed par 'gyur ro/_/sred med kyi bu'i gzugs brnyan lag tu thogs nas ji srid sred med 
[\[199b.5\]]kyi bu 'ong gi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'ongs nas gang smras pa de byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha gang gi khang par bzlas pa'i lha de zla ba phyed kyi nang du nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ba'am/_yang na bskams par 'gyur ro/_/yar ngo'i brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ba bla blangs nas lha chen po'i byang 
[\[199b.6\]]phyogs su ku sha'i changs bu la nye bar 'dug nas ci srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na de nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am/_mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam thos kyi bu bris nas ji srid mdun du 'ongs nas mchog stsol bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/klu'i 
[\[199b.7\]]gnas mtshe 'ur ji srid klu rnams gyen du 'phags kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/gal te ldang bar ma gyur na phub ma'i me la lcags kyi snod dam zangs kyi snod til mar gyis bkang nas/_ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas nas/_der klu'i lcug ma tshwa dang rang skyur gyis 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]bskus nas bsregs na nges par ldang bar 'gyur ba'am/_dri ma can du 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs la bltas nas ji srid smra ba dang /_'gul ba dang /_'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na de nas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/ras 
[\[200a.2\]]ris kyi mdun du me tog gis mngon par brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas ji srid du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje byon gyi bar du bzlas na byon nas mgo la reg par 'gyur ro/_/reg pa tsam gyis lcang lo can du gnas nas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs su 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa phyag na 
[\[200a.3\]]rdo rje'i rdo rje blangs la ji srid mi snang bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/'bum bzlas pas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi zhabs kyi mtheb mo la bzung nas ji srid 'bar ba dang /_'phro ba dang /_khro ba ston gyi 
[\[200a.4\]]bar du bzlas pa byas na/_de nas bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing gsung bar yang 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal la blta zhing ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ba'am/_rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa kun du 
[\[200a.5\]]bzang po la blta zhing ji srid dge ba la ngoms mi shes pa dang /_'bebs pa dang /_mngon par 'phar gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/rgyud 'dir sngags kyi spyod pa la zhugs pas zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe zangs kyi snod du mar bzhag nas dri zhim po'i me tog gis dkyil 'khor 
[\[200a.6\]]byas te/_bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs la ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas nas de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba dang nyi ma gzas bzung ba na lha chen po'i khang par zhugs nas ldong ros sam/_mig sman nam/_ba bla blangs nas a 
[\[200a.7\]]shwa t+tha'i 'dab ma'i bar du bcug nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas na des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur pa'am/_mi snang 'gyur ro/_/lha chen po'i steng du lag pa bzhag nas ji srid mi snang bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/dur khrod du gnas nas ji srid 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]mi snang bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/dur khrod du dkyil 'khor byas nas kham phor ma bsregs pa kha sbyar thal bas bkang nas du ba byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas la de chu gsum byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' dgug pa dang /_lha dang klu dgug pa 
[\[200b.2\]]ni nub gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/mdor bsdus na rig pa mchog 'di dag gis ni 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pa byed pa yin no/_/yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas ji ltar bsgrubs pa de de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes mkhas pas brtags la/_'di la byang chub 
[\[200b.3\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pas som nyi mi bya'o/_/de nas 'di'i thun mong gi ras ris bstan par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa'o/_/g.yas su ni 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'o/_/lha mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa dang bcas pa gser 
[\[200b.4\]]gyi mdog can thams cad rig pa'i mchog ces bya ba'am/_dri ma med pa rnam par gnon pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba yang rung 'di lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'od kyi phreng ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/_brag la gnas pa'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la bzhugs pa'o/_/lha mo'i 
[\[200b.5\]]'og tu ni de bzhin du bgegs thams cad tshar gcod pa'i g.yog mo mtha' yas zhes bya ba bri'o/_/phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o/_/yang na ras ris ni ji ltar 'dod pa de lta bu bri bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang 
[\[200b.6\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku ni mtha' yas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rtog pa dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyis ni ras ris kyi cho ga med pa'am/_mchod pa med par yang 'grub bo/_/gsang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i 
[\[200b.7\]]rig pa mchog gi rgyal po bsdus pa'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so//_//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bstan pa don yod pa'i dngos grub rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya mtsho 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo rtse mo gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo 
[\[201a.2\]]rtse mo mchog 'di sku thams cad las gsungs so/_/na maHs+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_sarba ta thA ga tA nA~M/_o~M ga ga na lo tsa ne/_ga ga na sa ma/_sarba thA o~M ga tA ti sa ra saM b+ha badzra lA na mo a mo g+hA nAM swA hA/_lag na rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal mo rtse mo chen mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[201a.3\]]cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa'i yum/_mtha' yas pa thogs pa med par don yod par grub pa/_sngags kyi spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la rab tu sbyor bar gnas pa'o/_/'di 
[\[201a.4\]]'dzin par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas pa nyid kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa mnyam pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/bsgrub pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[201a.5\]]cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sa la 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin mi 'phrogs pa don yod pa 'dis tshegs chung dus thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[201a.6\]]de ni rig pa 'dzin pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga phyogs tsam zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas tshes gcig nas brtsams nas/_dang po re zhig sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag 
[\[201a.7\]]nyid dbul bar bya'o/_/dbul ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/_bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag dbul bar bgyi'o/_/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyis dus thams cad du 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]sdug bsngal ba bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_yongs su gzung du gsol/_yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes brjod do/_/de nas sdig pa bshags par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thugs bskyed pa gang gis bshags pa'i sems bskyed 
[\[201b.2\]]pa des dus thams cad pa'i sdig pa thams cad bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du bshags par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'am/_nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshags par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i rgyur 
[\[201b.3\]]gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnams la rjes su yi rang ste/_ci ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen 
[\[201b.4\]]pa de bzhin du rjes su yi rang zhes bya ba'am/_nus pa ci lta ba bzhin du rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa na bdag gi med pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa thang dang chu las skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri dang /_rgya mtsho'i rin po che la sogs pas 
[\[201b.5\]]mchod pa'i thabs la goms par byas la/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la dbul zhing yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgya che zhing gya nom pa mchod 
[\[201b.6\]]pa'i sprin rab 'byam rnams bdag gi smon lam dang /_bsod nams kyi stobs dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis so sor 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod la/_de lta bu'i mchod pa chen po mngon par sgrub par 
[\[201b.7\]]byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di yang lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sarba thA ung+ga te s+phar Na hi maM/_ga ga na khaM sa man+tA ta swA hA/_de nas gzhan ma yin par mchod pa rnams de bzhin du yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yon tan bsngags pa rgya mtsho sgrogs pa'i dbyangs rab 'byam rnams kyis sems can gyi khams thams cad dang /_chos kyi dbyings su grags pa 'jug par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[202a.2\]]pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su 'jug par gyur cig_/mdo sde'i tshul rab tu sgrogs par gyur cig ces bsams la/_bstod pa dang bsngags pa sgrub par byed pa/_chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs par byed pa'i rig pa chen mo'i rgyal mo 'di yang 
[\[202a.3\]]lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sarba tra saM ku su mi tA/_a b+hi dz+nyA na rA shi nI na mo stu te swA hA/_de nas de bzhin du gzhan ma yin par bstod pa brjod pa dang /_chos brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 
[\[202a.4\]]ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du nges par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i bsam gtan la ched du byed pa'i dmigs pa thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi mtshan 
[\[202a.5\]]mas brtags pa'i spyod lam ston cing /_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings su spros pas sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pas gnas pa dang /_stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa'i bar du gyur cig 
[\[202a.6\]]ces tshig tu brjod pa'am/_bsams la de lta bu'i sprul pa chen po mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_na mo stu te/_ma hA badzra sarba sA d+ha hi ta~M ka ra/_tiSh+tha sarbA tra sarbe ShAM d+harmA NAM a 
[\[202a.7\]]d+hiSh+thA ya swA hA/_de nas ci ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag ji ltar bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa 'di kun yang gong du ci tsam 'dod pa'i bzlas pa byas na gsang sngags kyi spyod pa yang dag par grub pa rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji lta 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]ba bzhin du gzigs par 'gyur ro/_/des de ltar sems can gyi don dang dgos pa bdag gir byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[202b.2\]]don bsgrubs pa la rjes su yi rang zhing dmigs pa la goms par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba'am/_dmigs pa la goms par byas te/_'dir yang nam mkha'i spyan bzlas pa bya'o/_/yang na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[202b.3\]]rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang /_bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan rnams ci ltar rigs pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis rlob cing 'byung bar gyur cig ces dang por yid la byas la bzlas pa bya'o/_/yang na de bzhin 
[\[202b.4\]]gshegs pas bsngags pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'byung ba'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig ces bya'o/_yang na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya'o/_/yang na dge ba la 'bad par gyur cig_
[\[202b.5\]]ces bya'o/_/yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya'o/_/yang na stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_
[\[202b.6\]]mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po skor ba'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa sems can thams cad kyis so sor thob par gyur cig ces bya ba'am/_yang na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang yang 
[\[202b.7\]]dag par 'grogs shing /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]rnams rim gyis gnon pa'i phyir ram/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'am/_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa thams cad du so sor 'thob pa'am/_mchod pa chen po'i sprin mngon 
[\[203a.2\]]par bsgrub pa sprul ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprin las chos kyi char gyi rgyun 'bab pa rab tu gnas par bya ba'am/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad pa'am/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i dpal thob par bya ba'am/_rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa yang 
[\[203a.3\]]sems can thams cad la 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod do/_/yang na bsam pa ci lta ba dang mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du'am/_sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba 'byung ba'i bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas bzlas pa bya'o/_/yang na bla na med 
[\[203a.4\]]pa'i dngos grub thams cad bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can thams cad la 'byung bar gyur cig ces sam/_ci ltar rigs par sems kyis bsams la bzlas pa bya'o/_/de ltar goms par 
[\[203a.5\]]bzlas pa byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/smon lam dang rjes su mthun pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang rjes su mthun par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par phyogs shing 'jug na nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni rtag tu bya ba'i cho ga yin no/_/yang 
[\[203a.6\]]na som nyi med pa'i dad pas ci ltar nus pa'i cho gas bya'o/_/de nas 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che ba'i lugs rgyas par byed pa'i mdo sde gdon par bya/_mchod par bya ba'am/_tha na phyag 
[\[203a.7\]]byas nas so/_/kun nas ngal bar gyur nas zas za na/_sngags 'dis zas la lan brgyad mngon par bzlas pa bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_o~M ba liM da de/_te dzo mA li ni swA hA/_de nas zas kyis dub pa bsal la phyi dro'i dus su yang snga dro'i cho ga 'di nyid 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]kyis bya'o/_/skyo bar gyur na sngags bzlas par bya ste/_ci srid mi skyo ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas smon lam btab nas ldang bar bya'o/_/langs nas zab cing rgya che ba'i mdo sde klog pa la sogs pa gzhan bya'o/_/nyal ba'i tshe yang lus thams cad btud pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[203b.2\]]sems dpa' thams cad la bsam pa thag pas phyag byas la phyi nas ji ltar 'dod par gnyid log par bya zhing /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bdag la dngos grub dang mchog stsal du gsol/_gnod pa 
[\[203b.3\]]thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_zhes mkhas pas rtag tu bya'o/_/nyin re nyin re 'di lta bu'i las zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o/_/de nas zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung bar 'dug nas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas te/_mchod rten nam/_sku gzugs sam/_ras
