[\[203b.4\]]ris la dben zhing stong pa'i sa phyogs su me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pa la dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mdun du bzhag ste/_spos dri zhim pos bdugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te/_lcags kyi 'khor lo'am/_rdo rje'am/_ral gri blangs la ku sha 
[\[203b.5\]]bkram pa la 'dug nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya ste/_/nam phyed dam nyi ma shar pa'i dus su 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_'bar ba na ltas chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_sa g.yo ba dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba'i ltas chen po 'byung bar 
[\[203b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/skad cig de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'ching ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo grogs dang bcas 
[\[203b.7\]]pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pas de dbang bskur bas thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang /_lha thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /_bsod nams ji ltar nye bar bsags pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'gro zhing /_sangs rgyas 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i nus pa yang rab tu 'thob bo/_/lus de nyid ma dor bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rjes su 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/stobs ci lta ba dang /_snod ji lta ba 
[\[204a.2\]]bzhin du [{]go rims kyis [,]go rim gyis [}]byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams gnon par 'gyur/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du de nyid kyis thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa la zhugs pa 
[\[204a.3\]]gtsor byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i cho ga yin no/_/ri'am 'bab chu'i 'gram mam/_mtsho'i gling ngam/_shing gcig gi drung ngam/_kun dga' ra ba'am/_dgon pa'am/_gtsug lag khang gi gnas sam/_sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/_sku gzugs 
[\[204a.4\]]kyi mdun du'am/_tha na gtsug lag khang ngam/_khang pa'am/_nye bar spyod pa'i sa'ang rung /_stong zhing dben par ras ris kyi mdun du bsgrub par bya'o/_/gal te nus pa yod na ri la sogs pa stong zhing dben pa'i gnas rnams su 'du 'dzi rnam par spangs nas/_tha na khyim 
[\[204a.5\]]mam/_brang khang ngam/_nye bar spyad sa 'am/_mdzod phugs su yang rung /_ci srid ma byung gi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas snga ma bzhin du 'khor lo'am/_rdo rje la sogs pa ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/'bum bzlas pa byas nas ldong ros sam/_
[\[204a.6\]]mig sman la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin thob par byed pa'i rdzas thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/_/dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad bklags pas 'grub pa 'di ri'i gseb tu zhugs la 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mthong 
[\[204a.7\]]nas gzungs la sogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/dben zhing stong pa'i ri la sogs par skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/_skyil mo krung ma bshig par mtshan thog thag de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs nas bzlas na/_nam phyed dam nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su lus 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/'bar bar gyur nas lus brjes nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bzhon pa bris nas de'i steng du 'dug ste mtshan rangs pa bzlas na lha'i bzhon pa rin po che las grub par gyur nas nam mkha' la gang 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rig 
[\[204b.2\]]pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa yin pas sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas pas kyang cho ga bzhin du bya'o/_/ci skad gsungs pa'i rig pa mchog gi cho gas kyang bya ba'am/_thabs dang mi ldan pas ni ji ltar 'dod pa'am/_mos pa ci lta ba bzhin las kyis bsgrub par bya'o/_/rtog 
[\[204b.3\]]pa 'di cho gas yid la gang 'dod pa ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o/_/yang na ras ris bsgrub par 'dod na ras ris de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/g.yas su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa thal mo 
[\[204b.4\]]sbyar ba 'od kyis bskor ba bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du nam mkha'i spyan gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_ral pa dang bcas pa/_thal mo sbyar ba byas pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'od kyi phreng ba can bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu 
[\[204b.5\]]khros pa gnag cing ljang ba/_ral pa gcig yod pa/_'jigs pa chen mo zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma lag pa g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin cing 'phyar ba/_rin po che'i phreng ba can brag la bzhugs pa/_'bar ba'i phreng ba can ngur smrig bgos pa/_mig cung zad dmar ba/_bgegs tshar gcod 
[\[204b.6\]]pa bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o/_/ras ris 'di la rtog pa 'di'i cho ga rnams bya ba 'am ci ltar 'dod pas bya'o/_/ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo 'jigs par byed pa'i grogs dang bcas pa/_ral pa thur la 'phyang ba/_lus 
[\[204b.7\]]'od kyi phreng ba can no/_/de lta bu la yang 'dir sngar gyi cho ga rnams sbyar bar bya'o/_/thabs dang ldan nam thabs dang mi ldan yang rung /_nam mkha'i spyan 'di ni don yod pa yin te/_bsod nams dang ldan nam/_bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung zhes rgya cher sbyar zhing gang gis 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]kyang nges par 'grub par 'gyur te/_'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs par byed pa yin no zhes mkhas pas rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[205a.2\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul mngon par spro bar byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams bskyab pa'i phyir sngags 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_Ar+ya A gA dze a na n+hA bi shA ya nI/_a ra dze bi ra dze/_hU~M 
[\[205a.3\]]trA ka ra swA hA/_sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kyis/_/gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa na/_/shin tu rgya che rnam par rol/_/nam mkha' la ni byung bar gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi mdun du 'di'i las kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa cho ga 
[\[205a.4\]]rab 'byam mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po skad cig de la sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'o/_/cho ga de dag thams cad kyang 'di la sbyar bar bya ba'am/_yang na ci ltar 'dod pa'i cho gas bya'o/_/snying po rtog pa'i cho gas nyis 'gyur du sbyar pa'am mnyam pas kyang rung ngo /_/
[\[205a.5\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i lus zhes bya ba chags pa med pa'i sgo'i gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i rtse mo 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_trI trI trI/_a ha ha b+hi sma ye/_namaHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_a sa dr-i shes sA 
[\[205a.6\]]hA/_phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i rtse mo 'di ni cho ga de dag nyid kyis sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar rgyal ba rnams kyis mkhyen pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba kun nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[205a.7\]]la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ha ha ha/_ma hA mu ni b+hi sma ye/_ha ra ha ra/_tra ya tra ya/_bi sho d+ha ke namaHsarba ta tA ga te b+h+yaHswA hA/_don yod pa'i don yod pa zhes bya ba ngag gi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo'i 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]rtse mo yangs shing rgya che ba'i rnam par rol pa'i spyod yul yin te/_'di'i cho ga yang de dag nyid kyis bya ba 'am/_yid la gang 'dod pas bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun du shin tu mnyam par rdzogs par grub pa zhes bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyal po'i rtse mo la snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya 
[\[205b.2\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa chen mo'i rgyal mo 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ma la ba le ha ha/_a sa ma sa man+ta/_ga ga na ga ga na/_sa ma sa ma/_ku ru ku ru/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi 
[\[205b.3\]]sa twe b+h+yaHswA hA/_sangs rgyas sras dang bcas rnams kyis/_/lhan cig 'dir ni gsungs pa na/_/chos dbyings ngo mtshar chen po 'di/_/thams cad kun du rmad du gyur/_/'di'i cho ga yang de dag yin/_/'jig rten thams cad kun du yang /_/'di dang 'dra ba de yod min/_/ras ris kyi khyad 
[\[205b.4\]]par ni nam mkha'i spyan gyi gnas su lha mo ku mu da'i mdog can/_ral pa dang bcas pa/_rgyan dang bral ba/_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni de lta bu nyid yin no/_/lag na rdo rje ni gtum pa'o/_/g.yon du ni ral pa gcig yod 
[\[205b.5\]]pa/_gnag pa/_mig dmar ba/_bgegs mthar byed pa/_khros pa/_ngur smrig bgos pa/_gzhon nu lag na ral gri thogs pa bri bar bya ste/_'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor ba rin po che'i brag la gnas pa'o/_/lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no/_/rin po che'i brag la gnas pa'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la 
[\[205b.6\]]gnas pa bri bar bya'o/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo 'di ras ris la rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo don yod pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/_/
[\[205b.7\]]na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_aR+thA sid+d+ha bid+ya ut+ta ma A gre swA hA/_/byang chub sems dpa' longs spyod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ra dze sa ma ya/_sA d+ha yI ku ru ku ru/_
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]sid+d+hi/_a mo g+ha/_a pra ti ha ta ste sid+d+hi/_sa ta ke ta/_u thA a ga ga nAM swA hA/_gtum po mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sa ma sa ma/_a gre a gre/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_ta yi ta yi/_ga ga nAM sA d+ha ya/_sarbaM na 
[\[206a.2\]]mo stu a pra ti ha ha A grA nAM/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_hA sa ne swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_hr-i da yaM/_sa ma yaM sa ma yaM/_na d+hi bir+ya te spya sa d+ho/_Sha ma yaM/_ta Ti dan+ta/_na 
[\[206a.3\]]mo a gra/_gu NA a nan+ta/_ma yaM gu ru te/_sany+tsa sarbA/_mi d+haM ma pi te/_stobs gsum pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rtse mo thams cad du mi mnyam pa thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a mo g+ha/_a tsi/_pra bi sha ba ra de/_a ma la/_
[\[206a.4\]]a ma la/_dz+wA la na tsa lod+d+ha te/_s+pha ra Na swA hA/_'jigs pa med pa don yod pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a sa ma/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa ma sa ma/_saM ga ta saM ga ta/_tI TI tI TI/_ha sa ha sa/_tI tI ma hA ma hA/_bi shwa d+hA gra a 
[\[206a.5\]]gra/_hU~M spA ra s+phA ra s+phA ra/_bi ma le ku ru/_a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/_a s+tha sid+d+hi/_yaM a duH_kha ga ra swA hA/_mnyam pa med pa'i mchog gi stobs kyi rtse mo zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo yin no/_/de nas mnyam pa med pa thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa thun mong ma yin pa'i ras ris 
[\[206a.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das ni pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba bri bar bya'o/_/g.yas su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du ni gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang bcas pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/_nga rgyal 
[\[206a.7\]]dang bral ba bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'i lha mo'o/_/lha mo'i 'og tu drag gtum zhes bya ba'i g.yog po gzhon nu ral pa can gnag cing sngo ba/_gos sngon po bgos pa/_khros pa/_mig dmar ba/_lag na rdo rje thogs pa/_'bar bas bskor ba/_bgegs tshar gcod pa bri bar 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]bya'o/_/rdo rje 'dzin gyi 'og tu ni sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o/_/'di la yang las de dag thams cad sbyar bar bya ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas sam/_rig pa mchog gi cho gas sbyar ba'am/_ji ltar mngon par 'dod pas sam/_rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang bsgrub 
[\[206b.2\]]par bya ste/_the tshom dang bral ba'i dad pas bya'o/_/thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i rtse mo 'dis kha cig la ni mtshan gcig gis dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kha cig la ni nub gnyis na'o/_/kha cig la ni nub gsum na'o/_/kha cig la ni zla ba tsam 
[\[206b.3\]]gyis nges par dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dir yang snga ma bzhin du phan yon yod par shes par bya'o/_/'di la ni tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung /_tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa yang rung /_bsod nams dang ldan yang rung /_bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung 'grub par 'gyur te/_
[\[206b.4\]]gzhan du na dad pa med pa dang /_byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ni ma gtogs so/_/thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa rig pa'i rgyal mo rab 'byam rim par phye ba'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i rtse mo kun du mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i gad mo spyi gtsug nas grags pas mthar 
[\[206b.5\]]thug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i rnam par rol pa'i spyod yul can/_gtsug tor gyi yang gtsug tor dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po rig pa byung bar gyur to/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a grA a grA bi Sha ye/_sa ma sa ma/_bar bar/_deng yaM ku ru/_ar+tha sid+d+hi/_dz+wA la na maH/_
[\[206b.6\]]a pra ti ha to Sh+NI ShANAM/_a ti a ti swA hA/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang gzhan dag las kyang thogs pa med par gtsug tor gyi rtse mo zhes bya ba gsungs pa na mtha' yas shing yangs pa'i ngo mtshar byung bas thams cad g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas shar phyogs lags nas de 
[\[206b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa dri ma med pa zhes bya bas de bzhin du 'od kyi snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs shing thos par gyur to/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a gra bi ma le na maH/_a grA bi man+Da le na maH/_a gri ya a gra swA de nA maH/_sid+d+h+ya a gra ye ke 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]na maH/_a tsa la ma hA ba la a gre na maH/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_d+hu na d+hu na/_do Sha Na ja ga ta/_g+ha ta g+ha ta/_bi Sha yaM na maHs+thAM a pra ti ha te b+h+yaHswA hA/_gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gtsug gi rtse mo zhes bya ba'o/_/steng gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 
[\[207a.2\]]snying rjes brgyan pa zhes bya bas kun du bzhad pa'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i bzhad pa'i mchog mdzad nas rtse mo 'di gsungs shing thos par gyur to/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ho ma hA bi sma ya a gri/_sad a grA NAM/_a ho kA ru NA/_a mr-i ta/_a gre bar ti ni/_sA d+ha ya a mr-i ta d+harmA NAM/_
[\[207a.3\]]tad+ya thA/_kA ru Ni kA ru Ni/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_shI khI shI khI/_d+ha ri d+ha ri/_a gri ta ra a gri ta ra/_na mo a gre b+h+yaH/_ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaH/_s+pha ra Na ga ga na ba re swA hA/_snying rje bdud rtsi rtse mo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i gtsug tor ro/_/yang gtsug tor gsum pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 
[\[207a.4\]]'dzin sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gsol ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rtse mo'i rtse mo 'di rab tu thob bo/_/rab tu thob nas gsungs pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_tri shI khA/_a gra na mo 
[\[207a.5\]]stu te/_sa man+ta sha man+tA/_a gri gu Na a tsa la a gra d+harma te/_bi d+hu na hI kle shA nAM/_duHkha dz+wA laM ga dza te/_sarba duHkhaM da da hi tsaM/_shAn+ta daM tri sa ma ye ku ru swA hA/_rtse mo'i rtse mo chos rtse mo/_/sems can kun gyi don byed ni/_/kun nas yon tan mtha' yas pa/_/sras dang bcas 
[\[207a.6\]]pas gsungs par gyur/_/de nas bla na med pa thogs pa med pa don yod pa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yi stobs kyi stobs can rnams kyis thun mong gi cho ga la 'jug pa bshad par bya'o/_/thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du 
[\[207a.7\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rab tu byed par 'dod pas tshes gcig nas brtsams nas/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul bar bya ba dang /_snga ma bzhin du sdig pa bshags par bya'o/_/nus pa ci lta ba bzhin du dus gsum 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yid rang ngo /_/de bzhin du bdag gi bsod nams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pas 
[\[207b.2\]]sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'grub par gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo bar bya zhing /_byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes brjod la/_dben zhing stong pa'i gnas rnams su sngags 'di bzlas pa byas la goms par bya'o/_/yid skyo bar gyur na dam 
[\[207b.3\]]pa'i chos bklag par bya'o/_/'du 'dzi spangs nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs shing phyag 'tshal nas bzlas pa la goms pas bzlas pa bya ba'am/_nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshes gcig nas brtsams nas zla ba'i bar du bzlas la de nas zla ba nya la me 
[\[207b.4\]]tog dri zhim po bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas pa byas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas mgo la phyag gis reg nas 'dod pa'i don gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yang 
[\[207b.5\]]rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan mthong na slar yang zla ba gcig na mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u'i cho ga'am/_rig pa mchog gi'am/_rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga'am/_
[\[207b.6\]]yid la gang 'dod pa'i sgrub pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs dang /_thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa'i chos nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dir sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur gyur cig ces bsams 
[\[207b.7\]]nas bzlas na/_de nas gzhan ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis yang dag par gnas par 'gyur zhing de dag la phan pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dad par yang bya'o/_/don yod pa 'dir yang chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po'i 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]dngos grub nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du gang gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /_yon tan mtha' yas pa'i bdud rtsi de kho na nyid rab tu 'thob cing yongs 
[\[208a.2\]]su spyad pa thams cad la 'phrogs pa med pa'i grogs dang bcas pas 'gro bas sam/_ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o/_/mdor na mtshan gcig gis kyang rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/_skyil mo krung ma bshig par de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pas me tog 
[\[208a.3\]]dri zhim po bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du mtshan thog thag bzlas na nges nges par nyi ma shar ba'i tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/las gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lha dgug pa ni yungs kar dang mar gyis so/_/klu dgug pa ni 
[\[208a.4\]]mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa dang pho ba ris kyis so/_/gnod sbyin dgug pa ni sbrang rtsi can gyi me tog mar gyis bsgos pa dang til mar gyis bsgos pa'i sngags ma rud kyis so/_/rig pa 'dzin pa la ni til mar gyis bsgos pa'i yungs kar gyis so/_/rgyal po dgug pa la ni mar gyis gang ba'i 
[\[208a.5\]]sbyin sreg gis te/_me tog dang bcas pa bsreg par bya'o/_/skyes pa dbang du bya ba la ni mar gyi dkyil 'khor gyis so/_/bud med dbang du bya ba la ni pri yang ku'i me tog sbrang rtsis bsgos pa bsreg par bya'o/_/the tshom dang bral bas ci ltar 'dod par nges par bsgrub par bya ste/_thun mong 
[\[208a.6\]]gi sbyor ba yin no/_/'di'i ras ris kyi cho ga ni bcom ldan 'das gser gyi mdog can skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_spyi gtsug nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyi steng du 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor can bri bar bya'o/_/g.yas su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la thal mo 
[\[208a.7\]]sbyar ba pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'od kyi phreng ba can no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du ni ku mu da'i mdog can sgros dmar ba/_lag pa dang rkang pa dmar ba/_ral pa dang bcas pa/_rgyan dang bral ba/_thal mo sbyar ba byas pa/_pad+ma dmar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i lha mo'o/_/de'i 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]'og tu gtum po chen po 'dul ba zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma khros pa/_sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_gnag cing ljang ba/_ral pa gcig yod pa/_mig cung zhig dmar ba bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o/_/'dir yang cho ga 
[\[208b.2\]]ni de ga nyid yin no/_/yid la gang 'dod pas kyang rung ngo /_/ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo pad+ma la gnas pa ral pa thur du bshal ba'o/_/mngag gzhug pa gtum chen ni gzhon nu skra 'greng bar bri bar bya'o/_/gtsug tor rab 'byam gyi rim par phye ba'o//_//bcom ldan 'das 
[\[208b.3\]]kyi dbu'i spyi gtsug nas kun nas rol pa yangs shing rgya che ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sngags 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_oM shI khA an+ta/_a gra a gra swA hA/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ma la a gra ma ye na mosta a gra tsaM u bi Sha ye shi khi nI swA hA/_
[\[208b.4\]]na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a mr-i te A d+ha ra bi Sha ye/_a gra d+harma te/_na ma stIt+ti/_stIt+ti ma hA bI ra swA hA/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_tri sa ma ya/_bi Sha ye/_tri shA khA a gra tA b+ho gi nI/_a nut+ta ra a gra ut+ta ri ma hA shi khe swA hA/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a gra 
[\[208b.5\]]ut+ta ra a gri bi Sha ya na maHswA hA/_spyi gtsug 'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang kun du mnyam pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi zhing du gyur pa/_sems can gyi khams rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/sngags chen po'i bla na med pa'i 
[\[208b.6\]]yon tan la yang dad par byas nas bsgrubs na las thams cad de bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi khyad par ni lha mo gser gyi mdog can rgyan dang bral ba ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o/_/'og tu spyi gtsug gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu ma lag pa g.yon pa na 
[\[208b.7\]]zhags pa/_g.yas kyis rdo rje 'phyar ba/_khros pa/_ral pa gcig yod pa/_gnag cing ljang ba/_mig dmar ba/_de bzhin du rin po che'i brag la gnas pa bgegs tshar gcod pa bri bar bya'o/_/spyi gtsug rab 'byam gyi rim par phye ba'o//_//de nas yang de'i tshe byang 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]chub sems dpa' 'od zer gyi sprul pa zhes bya ba kun nas ma lus pa'i 'od zer gyi mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam la blta zhing sngags 'di smras so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a te dze sa ma sa ma/_te dze ni/_dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ya/_ma hA be ga/_a sa gre 
[\[209a.2\]]he/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/_muM tsA hi sarba thA phra baM swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i spyod yul can zhes bya ba yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/_tI hI tI hI/_shi ri shi ri/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_bi ma le/_d+hu na d+hu na/_sa ma te da tu ta/_nA mA stAM tsan+t+ya nAM 
[\[209a.3\]]s+pha ra s+pha ra dz+wA la nA a ma le swA hA/_rig pa mchog dri ma med pa 'bar ba zhes bya ba yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a hi sha ya/_shrI te dzo mA la/_a gra sa ma ya/_a gri NI la u la a/_be shI nI be shI nI/_ti ra ti ra/_a sa he a sa he/_sa ma sa ma/_bA ra te swA hA/_
[\[209a.4\]]rig pa mchog gzi brjid rtse mo rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_tI tI tI tI/_sha ni sha ni/_te dze te dze/_ta ra ta ra/_a gre dz+wa la ya nA maHsarba d+ha/_a ma le shwa swA hA/_'jig rten gsum 'bar bar byed pa zhes bya ba'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi 
[\[209a.5\]]satwA nAM/_an+te sa man+ta to/_d+hu na d+hu na/_lo kaM a ma la/_dz+wa la sa man+tA shaM gi_/d+ha ra d+ha ra/_nA ma swA hA/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'bar ba kun du ma chags pa zhes bya ba'o/_/da ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i rtse mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las 'byung bar 'gyur te/_ci srid du nyi 
[\[209a.6\]]ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od zer 'ongs nas spyi bor babs nas yid la gang 'dod pas sam/_des nges par gser gyi mdog can gser gyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gro ba 'dis las thams cad la snga 
[\[209a.7\]]ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u'i cho ga'am/_yid la gang 'dod pas sam/_rig pa mchog gi cho gas sam/_rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang bsgrub par bya'o/_/don yod pa mi zad pa rmad du byung ba 'dod par bya ba'i dngos grub brgyad yangs shing mi zad pa 'khrul pa 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]med pa'o/_/gzi brjid rab 'byam rim par phye ba'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i thig le zhes bya ba kun du nam mkha'i spyod yul gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di smras so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ga ga no pa me/_na ma 
[\[209b.2\]]stam+b+ha ya a gra nI swA hA/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ma le a nan+ta ma d+he tra hrIH/_sarba satwaM duHkha twaM da ma/_sa man+dA nAM/_a nA ya/_a nan+ta/_a tsa la gu NA swA hA/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_u ti u da ra/_a gra d+harma twAM/_badzra bi si rA NAM su khi sa da a sa a sa ye yaM b+ha baM 
[\[209b.3\]]he he mi si d+hi a gri ga ma de ma ni man+ta pa da ra dza a gri b+ha ban+ta/_sa ma sa ma/_a sa ha a sa ha/_trA ya trA ya/_d+hu na d+hu na/_a sa man+ta/_sarba bi Sha ye/_a ha na a ha na/_t+yaM shi ni tAM/_sa ma ya mo sta gan+du nAM swA hA/_snying po'i dkyil 'khor gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i 
[\[209b.4\]]rgyal mo'i rtse mo yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a sa me a sa me/_a sa he a sa he/_dz+wA la ni bi sho d+ha ya/_a gri tri lo kaM_/sa man+ta to/_na maHsa man+ta/_ad+hi Sh+ThA na a gra d+harma te swA tA/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ti d+ha ra a gra d+harma te/_ha ha ha ma hA gu No ta 
[\[209b.5\]]ra/_a nan+ta sa man+ta ye tsa ra tsa ra/_ma hA ba le swA hA/_sngags kyi spyod pas bsgos pa yi/_/rtse mo dam pa mchog 'di ni/_/gsungs pa gtso bo thams cad kyis/_/ma lus par ni byin gyis rlob/_/sngar gyi cho ga rnams kyis 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/yid la gang 'dod pa'i tshogs 
[\[209b.6\]]sam/_rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang sbyar bar bya'o/_/'dir khyad par ni ri la sogs pa dben zhing stong par slong mo'i kha zas dang /_dus gsum du khrus dang gtsang sbra byed cing dben par lus yang bas bzlas pa la goms par bya ste/_ci srid du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa dang /_
[\[209b.7\]]mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur gyi bar du'o/_/rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs nas ci srid mngon par shes pa lnga thob kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/kun du rab 'byam gyi rim par phye ba'o//_//de nas lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam gyi spyod yul la rnam par lta zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa dang ldan pa 'di smras so/_/de la dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'di ltar 'byung ste/_ma nges pa'i 
[\[210a.2\]]sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i phyag rgya bcings la shin tu rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba 'dra ba med pa/_bla na med pa 'phags pa'i spyod yul de'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni 'di yin no/_/de la re zhig dang por gzhan dag mos pa bskyed par bya zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi phyir 
[\[210a.3\]]gsol ba gdab pa'am/_bdag nyid nges par sbyor bar 'dod pas bar chad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang por sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya zhing seng ldeng gi phur bus brkos la dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar mkho ba rnams gsog par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sa man+ta badzrA 
[\[210a.4\]]NAM hUM a kro d+ha yaM/_sa he ma hA tsa N+Da lI hU~M phaT phaT phaT/_sarba tra rak+Sha Na trA tra Ta tra Ta/_mrA TA mrA TA phaT/_de nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'am/_bcu gsum la dben pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/_tshon rtsi lnga yi phye mas sam/_dri yis bsgos pa'i pir gyis kyang rung /_tshon gzhan 
[\[210a.5\]]yang rung /_tha na thal bas kyang bri par bya'o/_/gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor khru lnga pa nas ji tsam 'dod pa'i bar sngags 'di zlos shing bri bar bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ma la a ma la/_ha ra g+ha a nan+ta/_shA shA ta sarba dzI nA a shi mA NI Sh+RA ba ra 
[\[210a.6\]]da ma ma daM du/_a ti a ta raM ba ra a g+h+yaM sa ma sarba tA a naM taM/_tat+t+re me badzra pa dA a ra ra/_a sa ma sa ma/_sa man+ta/_a nan+ta/_d+harma te kha Na kha Na/_ma hA bI raM/_a tsa le sa ma sa ma/_a sa ha mA ba le/_ka Na ka Na/_ma hA ra a ra gre ke ha ha ha ha/_badzra badzra aM ka me/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_
[\[210a.7\]]hU~M hU~M saM da laM/_sa ma bA la/_a gra bi kra me/_ku ru ku ru/_tu ru sarba thA/_sarba hi dz+wA la dz+wA la/_a gre a gri ni hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo 'di ni rtsa ba'i rig pa yin no/_/'di bzung ba tsam mam/_bzlas pa tsam gyis rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur_
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]ro/_/rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du stong bzlas na gsang sngags thams cad bzlas pa 'bum byas par 'gyur ro/_/las gzhan thams cad kyang don yod pa thogs pa med pa 'dis byed par 'gyur ro/_/sngags 'di brjod 
[\[210b.2\]]cing dkyil 'khor gyi nub kyi sgor bri bar bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor las khru do tsam gyi phyi rol byang gi sgo gnyis pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/de'i nang gi dkyil 'khor la phyag rgya 'byung bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong shar phyogs su gru gsum gyi gzugs dang /_
[\[210b.3\]]gru bzhi pa'i phyag rgya pad+ma'i steng na gnas pa bri bar bya'o/_/zla ba dang nyi ma ni dkyil du'o/_/de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngags ni 'di yin te/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a sarba thA sarba tra NA ke swA hA/_zla ba dang nyi ma'i sngags so/_/na maHsa man+tA badzrA NAM/_sa ma sa ma ma hU~M/_
[\[210b.4\]]na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a sa ha haM maM/_bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ma hA 
[\[210b.5\]]kA ru Na a t+ye maN+Ta le swA hA/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ma hA sa man+ta a mr-i te dz+wA la dz+wA la swA hA/_de'i rjes thogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor ral gri'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de'i 
[\[210b.6\]]rig pa ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_badzra rA dza a ma la swA hA/_ral gri'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ma hA badzro dA re dA rA ya tA DA/_de nas de'i rjes thogs la dam tshig rdo rje'i mdung dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de'i rig pa ni 
[\[210b.7\]]'di yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ma hA bi rA a tsa la/_sma ra dz+wA la nA hUM/_mdung gi phyag rgya dang sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_d+ha ma d+ha ma badzrod+b+ha be trAM/_byang shar 'tshams su rdo rje'i phreng ba dang /_rdo rje'i phreng ba dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de'i rig pa ni 'di 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_badzra mA lA mA lA/_a tse la/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_na ma dz+wa s+t+waM s+phA Ta/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tri gu Ne ba ra bar swA hA/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i g.yon phyogs su dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la 
[\[211a.2\]]gnas pa'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sa man+ta mA d+h+ya a mAM laM gu Na a tsa la bi sho d+ha ka na mastu te/_tA rA tA rA/_ku ru ku ru/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_d+hu na d+hu na/_ga ga ga_/ha ha ha/_tra ya tra ya/_dz+wA la dz+wA la swA hA/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA ba le 
[\[211a.3\]]dz+wA la swA hA/_de'i rjes thogs la rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'o/_/de la sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta padzrA NAM/_ma hA badzra a nan+ta/_ba la sa ma ye/_dz+wA la dz+wA la hU~M phaT/_rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/_/na maHsa 
[\[211a.4\]]man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA badzra a nan+ta te dza sA d+ha ya hUM/_de'i rjes thogs la rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ces bya ba'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de la sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA badzra a nan+ta te dza sA d+ha ya hUM/_ka la ka la/_sa man+ta 
[\[211a.5\]]a nan+ta/_bi Sha ya ad+b+hu ta/_d+harma te dz+wa la nA ma swa s+thi d+ha ne d+ha ne/_ha na ha na/_ma hA bi ka me swA hA/_lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrAM NAM/_ma hA pe ga a ra tI me/_an ya a t+yaM gr-i h+Na swA hA/_lho shar mtshams su rdo rje'i rdo rje lta bu'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/
[\[211a.6\]]na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA a tsa la a tsa la/_ku ru ku ru/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_bi d+ha ya bid+ha ya/_ti le kaM hU~M ma na swA hA/_rdo rje lta bu'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_badzra ba la ye/_a nan+ti ne/_ta tI ta tI hA phaT/_lho phyogs su dbus su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 
[\[211a.7\]]phyag rgya gru bzhi pa pad+ma la gnas pa/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos kyi dbus na gnas pa'o/_/de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ma la a ma la/_bi ma la a nan+ta go tsa rA ya na mo stu te/_ma hA bai ro tsa nA ya/_ha ra ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_a nan+ta 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]to/_a sa ma na a sa ma na/_a ra ra ma hA bi krAn+tA/_ma hA bi ra tu ru tu ru swA hA/_chos gos kyi phyag rgya dang sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_bai ro tsa na mA lA swA hA/_lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_pi thA pi thA/_d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/_pa trAM ma hA ba le swA hA/_
[\[211b.2\]]na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/_baM d+ha baM d+ha swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su longs spyod rdo rje'i brang 'gro'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tsa phe NA a gra sa phaT/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tri nan+ta la 
[\[211b.3\]]ba twA ma hA b+ho ga_/ti Ti ti Ti/_hUM haM swA hA/_de'i rjes thogs la rdo rje gtum po'i gri gug gi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de la sngags ni 'di yin te/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA tsaN+Da la badzra hU~M/_bi da rA ya phaT/_rdo rje gri gug gi phyag rgya dang sngags so/_/
[\[211b.4\]]na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA badzrA ka tA rA kA NAM ra NAM/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_b+hin+da b+hin+da/_a pra ti ha ta ta ma ya tra ka ka ra phaT/_de'i rjes thogs la rdo rje dga' ba'i so shing dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_de la sngags ni 'di yin te/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_trA hi trA hi/_ma hA ba lA/_
[\[211b.5\]]twe a tA u su/_tA ra su tA ra su ta na ma sid+d+hi ra stu swA hA/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ti ti yaM a ko ne hU~M/_bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du sta re dang /_mchod sbyin rdo rje ut+pa la'i steng du rdo rje'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de'i rig pa ni 'di yin no/_/na 
[\[211b.6\]]maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_badzra a Ta ha sa hU~M na maHswA hA/_phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_bar da te ha hi t+t+ya ma bi ke swA hA/_de'i rjes su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma sil ma'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_na maHsa 
[\[211b.7\]]man+taHbadzrA NAM/_bai ro tsa na ma hA ro tsA/_tA rA tA rA/_ma hA tA ra/_ho ho/_da ma da ma/_hU~M dz+wA la na phaT/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_A ra A ra/_tit+ti ra raM sa ma yaM swA hA/_de'i rjes thogs la gtum po rdo rje'i dar dpyangs gnyis dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]la gnas pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_na mash+tsa N+Da an+ta ka hU~M badzrA na la hU~M phaT/_phyag rgya'o/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_g+ha TA na haM Ta ka phaT/_lho nub kyi mtshams su rol pa rdo rje'i rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/_/de'i rig pa ni 'di yin te/_
[\[212a.2\]]na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_khe la khe la/_la lI trAM/_kA rA prA be sha ya/_prA be sha ya/_ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/_hU~M hU~M tA TA tA TA/_phyag rgya'i'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tri gu Na ma hA badzrA sa ma haM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/_nub phyogs kyi sgo'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas par rdo rje 'khyil ba'i 
[\[212a.3\]]mtshan ma'o/_/sgo'i g.yas su rdo rje rgya chen gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma ho da ra badzrA NAM/_ho badzra dz+wA la ya ma la hUM hUM hUM/_su ru su ru/_tri ba la daM ku ru ku ru/_na maHswa s+t+ya stu swA hA/_'khor 
[\[212a.4\]]lo'i'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_traM traM ga ga tra ka ra hU~M/_de'i rjes thogs su rdo rje dpa' bo rdo rje dar dpyangs dang bcas pa'i gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA krut+tA an+ta ka dz+wA la hU~M phaT tri/_ba la a she Sha sa maM 
[\[212a.5\]]swA hA/_rdo rje dar dpyangs kyi'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NI/_tri pa ta ke tri pa ta ke hA sha hA sha/_badzra ba la a gre maN+Da lA ya/_ha ra ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_hU~M hU~M/_d+ha ni d+ha ni/_sa ma ye swA hA/_de'i rjes la rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dkyil 
[\[212a.6\]]'khor chung ngu la gnas pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA ma he n+d+ra gaN gaN/_bI ra bI ra/_hU~M dz+wA la nA ma swA hA/_phyag rgya'i sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ba ra ba li ni ba li ni/_ni thi ni thi swA hA/_de'i rjes la sgo'i g.yon 
[\[212a.7\]]du rdo rje yan lag gi rtse mo gsum gyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a tsha TA nA/_ma hA shU la a gra pA Ni/_hUM d+ha ma d+ha ma/_da ra da ra/_ma hA badzra aM g+ha d+ha na hUM phaT/_rtse gsum gyi'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]NAM/_e hi ma hA tri shU la phaT/_b+hin+da ma hA tsaN+Ta a swA da ka_/ti Ta ti Ta/_hUM tra phaT/_rdo rje yan lag gi phyag rgya dang sngags so/_/de'i rjes la sta re'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA be gA/_a mA mA 
[\[212b.2\]]la ang+ga/_da ya da ya/_hU~M sa dzA ya dzA ya na ma swA hA/_phyag rgya'i sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a nan+ta ba lA bi kra me/_tI ri tI ri/_g+ho raM s+phu Ta ya hUM phaT/_de'i rjes la rdo rje zhal gyi rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/de'i sngags ni 
[\[212b.3\]]'di yin te/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA tsaN+Da/_a tsa la a tsa la hU~M/_bid+yA ut+ta ma/_bid+yA ut+ta ma/_u dar u dar/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_maR+da maR+da/_A bi sha A bi sha/_khA da khA da hUM phaT/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_hAM badzrA uts+tsha Ta ni/_ti shi khi ni/_tA TA tA TA/_
[\[212b.4\]]phI Ta phI Ta phaT/_phyag rgya'i sngags so/_/byang phyogs kyi char bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod pa grub pa'i phyag rgya 'od zer 'gyed pa'i rnam pa pad+ma la gnas pa dbus su bri bar bya'o/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags ni/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_
[\[212b.5\]]a pra ti ha ta stu sid+d+hi dz+wA la dz+wA la/_tri shi khi sa ma sa ma/_a sa me ta ma ta ma/_a sa he d+ha ma d+ha ma/_na maHsA a ma le b+h+ya stA ra swA hA/_'od kyi phyag rgya'i sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tra ya tra ya/_a ma la a hU te/_sarba thA sarba thA/_sarba ma hA te dza mA le/_tri shi khI 
[\[212b.6\]]ni/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_a A a A/_sa me d+hu na swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su rdo rje shugs kyi dbang phyug gi sta re gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa namaHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_hUM ga ga nA ga ga nA/_bA phA ma hA pe gA kra ma kra ma/_
[\[212b.7\]]hu lu hu lu/_hUM phaT swa re/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_sa ma sa ma/_be gA trA d+hi ma hA ba la hU~M/_de'i rjes la rdo rje shugs chen po'i rdo rje mche ba gdan gyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_hUM hUM hUM/_ka pA la mA lA/_
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]hU~M dz+wA la nA mA ya phaT/_rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tiSh+Tha he tra Ta tra Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_dz+wa la na shi kha re/_gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu dang ldan pa'i chu gri'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/_/de'i rig pa ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ka TA ka TA/_mA 
[\[213a.2\]]rA bA ra ta ka maM/_tI Ta tI Ta/_A lo kaM hU~M phaT/_nub byang mtshams su rdo rje rol pa'i dag byed dang bcas pa'i rdo rje'i gdan dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a tsa la a tsa la/_na TA na TA/_a ma bi la sha/_spu ra spu ra/_hU~M 
[\[213a.3\]]TA tA swA hA/_dag byed kyi phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tri ta ka badzrA hU~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa ma yaM hAM/_bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du rdo rje chen po'i rdo rje gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa gzhag par bya'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/namaHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a 
[\[213a.4\]]sa ho da ya/_ma hA ma hA/_badzra ta ra ta ra/_b+hin+da b+hin+da/_mAM nA ma swA hA/_rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a b+h+ya d+h+ya/_ka ra ka ra/_a pra ti ha ta/_ma tA ma tA/_a mo g+ha ta d+ha ka d+ha ka_/mAM mAM dzA/_dus mtha'i 'bar ba 'dra ba'i gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas 
[\[213a.5\]]pa'i gtun shing gi phyag rgya dgod par bya'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a tI a tI swA hA/_saM ba ra tA/_an+ta ka hU~M hU~M/_A sa hA dz+wA la tA TA/_mA rA mA rA/_phaT phaT/_gtun shing gi phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tA TA tA TA/_ku TA ku TA/_
[\[213a.6\]]ma hA ba ri bi/_gra ma a sa dri sha_/tri TA tri TA/_de nas de de'i rjes la dri ma med pa'i rdo rje'i rdo rje myu gu'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu dang bcas pa'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ga ga nAM ga ga nAM/_ku ru ku ru/_ti ri ti ri/_sa 
[\[213a.7\]]ma sa ma/_ba ra d+ha na ma/_rdo rje dbyug gu'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tA TA tA TA/_hU~M ka na ka na/_raM raM bI dzA ya/_ti sa ti sa/_ba la ba la/_kha NA kha NA/_hU~M maM/_dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ni 'bar bas kun nas bskor ba'i dkyil du bri bar bya'o/_/de'i 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]sngags ni 'di yin te/_gang yang steng nas rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_na maHsarba badzra gu lA NAM/_a sa ma sa ma/_a d+hi Sh+ThA na/_a nan+ta/_sa man+ta sa man+ta/_ba lA ma hA badzra rA dza/_sarba tra sa mA ba trA/_be gi na 
[\[213b.2\]]dz+wA la dz+wA la/_dz+wA lA pa ya a nan+ta bi kra ma tra ga tra ga mAM/_a sa hA ma hA sa ma yo hU~M ta ra ta ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_hU~M ma hA ma hA/_su tsaN+Da su tsaN+Da/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra d+ha ra a gra hU~M hU~M/_bi d+hA ra ya bi d+hA ra ya/_hU~M tsaN+Ta ra an+ta ka pA ta ya swA hA/_
[\[213b.3\]]dam tshig rtse mo'i rdo rje'i gzi brjid kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rdo rje'o/_/ang+ga'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tri lo tsa na/_e hi ba ra ba la a gra/_e hi sarba buMd+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a d+hiSh+ThA na/_a ho sha sA ka sha sA ka_/ma hA ba ra badzrA hrI ma hA ma hA/_
[\[213b.4\]]sa mA sa mA/_twa ra stu ra/_na mo stu te swA hA/_/rdo rje'i mtshan ma ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs kyi sgor bri'o/_/rdo rje klu'i sbrul gyi phyag rgya dang /_'dul byed kyi sog le lta bu'i phyag rgya dag ni 'gram gnyis su dgod par bya'o/_/de dag gi sngags ni 'di dag 
[\[213b.5\]]go/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_na mo stu te ga ga na sa ma a dza baR+ti d+ha ra d+ha ra ba la da/_A tI A tI/_be gra pa ti gaM_/baM baM ma hA na/_gaM hUM sU ra a gra phaT/_rdo rje'i klu brang 'gro'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a ti bi Sh+Ta a ti bi Sh+Ta/_ti li ti li/_ba la ba la/_ba ra ba ra/_
[\[213b.6\]]ta Ti ta Ti/_tA TA tA TA/_da ha da ha/_b+hin+da b+hin+da/_tsaN+Ta tsaN+Ta/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha phaT/_'dul ba po'i 'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tsaN+Ta a gra a nan+ta ka hU~M da ma ya phaT/_sog le lta bu'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tra gi ni maN+Ti ni a sa hA ba lA a ge tAM tAM/_byang shar mtshams su 
[\[213b.7\]]rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa'i pi wang gi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA yo ge n+d+ra ba ru Ni/_sa ma sa ma/_dz+wA la dz+wA la swA hA/_pi wang gi phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ti ni ti ni/_ta nu ta nu/_
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]su g+ho ShA be ge_/ha raM ha raM/_e ti ha na ha na swA hA/_lho shar mtshams su rdo rje mdangs kyi lcug ma gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa dgod par bya'o/_/da'i rig pa ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ma hA tsaN+Da ta ra le na ma sho b+hi ni te dze ni dz+wA la dz+wA la/_
[\[214a.2\]]sid+d+hi ha ra ha ra/_bI re swA hA/_rdo rje lcug ma'i'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tI li tI li/_bi li bi li/_be ke d+ha ri Ni/_badzra d+ha ra d+ha ra/_tAM tAM/_bo d+hi di ni aM/_lho nub mtshams su rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dril bu'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chung ngu la gnas pa dgod par bya'o/_/
[\[214a.3\]]de'i sngags ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tri rU tse/_sa ma ya ba li ba ra ba ra/_b+hi re b+hi re/_ra Na ra Na/_ra be me/_tsi ni swA hA/_dril bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ra Na dza ra Na dza/_ti ra Ne ti ra Ne/_raM raM dAn+ta swA hA/_nub byang mtshams su 
[\[214a.4\]]stobs mchog gi shugs kyi phreng ba'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung ngu dang bcas pa'o/_/de'i rig pa ni 'di yin no/_/na maHsan+ta badzrA NAM/_ti shi ye ti shi ye/_badzra ti shi he ti shi he/_tsi ri tsi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_tri pa ta kre swA hA/_phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta 
[\[214a.5\]]badzrA NAM/_tri ba li nI/_ba rA mA le mA le ni ban+d+ha ya/_ba ri NI su ra b+hi NI/_ba ra a gre sa ma sa ma/_ban+d+he ban+d+he/_ya d+he ni swA hA/_lhag ma bstan pa'i snam bu gcig la ni sems dpa' chen po thams cad dgod par bya'o/_/phyogs bzhi'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi grwa 
[\[214a.6\]]bzhir ni bum pa gang ba ste/_nang dri zhim po'i chus bkang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/'dir yang sngar gsungs pa'i rdo rje rgyal mo las rab 'byam mtha' yas pa sgrub par byed pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas par bya'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ma 
[\[214a.7\]]hA sa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a sa ma sa ma sa man+ta/_a nan+ta bi kra mA/_ma hA badzra rA dz+nyA/_a gra a gra yo he sa ma ya/_ma hA ba lA be ga tA/_ma hA dz+wa la na dz+wA la dz+wA la/_mA mA mA/_sarba thA bA rU bA rU/_sa mA sa mA/_tra tra tra tra/_ba ra ba ra/_bid+yA ut+ta ma a gra a gra/_hU~M hU~M/_
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]dz+wa la ya sarba ma hA ma hA/_sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/_a gra a gra d+ha na hU~M hU~M/_maM phaT phaT/_sarba thA ud+d+ha me swA hA/_de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan bdun gyi bar du brjod la thal mo brdab par bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[214b.2\]]rnams kyi snying po lan bdun gyi bar du brjod la snga ma bzhin du thal mo yang brdab par bya'o/_/de la snying po ni 'di yin no/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_sarba tra a pra ti ha tA bA p+ti/_d+harma tA bA li nAM/_aM a/_sa ma sa ma/_sa man+ta to/_a nan+ta to/_bAp+ti/_shA sa ni ha ra 
[\[214b.3\]]ha ra/_sma ra sma ra Ne/_bi ga ta rA ga/_bud+d+ha d+harma te/_sa ra sa ra/_sa ma ba lA/_ha sa ha sa/_tra ya tra ya/_ga ga na ma hA ba ra lak+Sha Ne/_dz+wA la dz+wA la na sA ga re swA hA/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_pa ra ba ra/_sarbaM sarbaM/_
[\[214b.4\]]sa ma sa ma/_kA ru NaM kA ru NaM/_tA rA tA rA/_sA ra sA ra/_a tI a tI/_a mI tAM/_a mI tAM/_a tI a tI/_b+hi raM b+hi raM/_a tI a tI/_shU raM shUM raM/_ha ha ha ha/_ma hA sa ma ya/_na mo s+t+wa a ma la/_sid+d+hi da ya ke b+h+yaH/_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaH/_sarba a nan+ta ma d+h+ye 
[\[214b.5\]]b+h+yaH/_ma hA kA ru Na/_mA lI nI/_tri sa ma ye dz+wa la swA hA/_/byang chub sems dpa'i snying po ste/_/'di dang 'dra ba gzhan med do/_/de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas lag par me tog blangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[214b.6\]]lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/de brjod pa tsam gyis rdo rje'i rigs thams cad nye bar lhags nas dga' pa la sogs pa'i ltas sam/_gsal ba'am/_sgra thos pa'am/_dri zhim po 'am/_'od dam/_ser bu'i bsil ba'am/_bzhon pa'am/_
[\[214b.7\]]gzhan yang rung ltas cung zad zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la kun tu thogs pa med par grub pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba 'di yin te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa stobs kyi snying 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]po'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sa man+ta a mo g+ha a pra ti ha tA badzrA NAM/_a gra a gra/_A kaR+Sha Ni hU~M/_be gI be gI ma hA be gI nI/_sarbaM badzrA ku lA nAM/_A kar+Sha ya hUM/_sarba mu drA ga NA nAM/_tIk+te tIk+te/_ti ti ti ti/_ta tha ta tha/_a a nA pr-i te/_a pra ti 
[\[215a.2\]]ha ta/_a mo g+ha bi kra me/_sa ma sa ma/_a mA la ma hA me/_a ti a ti/_b+he g+ha pa tA ge/_sa ma ya maM/_daM ka ru shrI trI na ya ta twA ang+gi ni/_A na ya shI g+h+raM ta thA ga tAM ku shi swA hA/_de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas sngags 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA 
[\[215a.3\]]ga tA nAM/_sarba ut+ga te s+pha ra Na hi mAM ga ga na khaM sa man+tA ta swA hA/_de nas sngags 'dis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du sbyin par bya'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_ba la ba ti ba liM de swA hA/_de nas snga ma bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[215a.4\]]sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas la gtsang sbra byas nas g.yas su me tog thogs te/_gdong g.yogs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar nas gcig gnyis gsum bzhi'am lnga yang gzhug par bya zhing sdom pa 'di ltar gzung bar bya'o/_/de la dam tshig 
[\[215a.5\]]dang sdom pa blang ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag 'bul gyis thams cad kyis dus thams cad du bdag la rab tu gzung du gsol/_/sangs 
[\[215a.6\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bdag byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par mdzad pa rnams kyis bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_/las thams cad grub par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po bdag 
[\[215a.7\]]la stsal du gsol zhes de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/de nas lan re re rna bar 'di brjod par bya'o/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas dang mnyam rgyal dbang po/_/sras bcas ma lus kun gyi dam tshig stsol/_/'chi ba med cing gsad med sems can bskyab pa med/_/shin 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]tu brtan pas 'di ltar bya ba nyid/_/de nas me tog 'phang bar bya'o/_/me tog gang la bab pa de ni de'i rigs kyi lha yin no/_/de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol la de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan par bya'o/_/spyi bor mthe bong bzhag la gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya 
[\[215b.2\]]bya zhing sngags 'di brjod do/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_tri shi khA a gri na na mo stu te/_sa man+ta/_a da sa man+tA a gri ku Na a tsa la a gri d+hi ra me/_bI du nA hi kle sha duHkhadz+wa la na dza ga ta/_sarba su khaM da d+ha hI tsa shu tA tre d+haM tri sa ma ye ku ru swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di 'chang par byed 
[\[215b.3\]]pa de la gtsug tor gyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bar du nyams par yang mi 'gyur la yon tan mtha' yas pa'i sgor 'jug pa yang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/nges par rgal nas so sor spyod pa'i dam tshig 'di rnam par bstan par bya'o/_/yang yang 'chi bar mi 'gyur 
[\[215b.4\]]zhing /_/ngan 'gror mi 'gro 'chi 'pho med/_/khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/theg pa 'di la dam tshig bsrungs/_/dam pa'i chos kyang spang mi bya/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la/_/mi gus mi bya spang mi bya/_/srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing /_/bla 
[\[215b.5\]]ma la yang brnyas mi bya/_/sngags dang phyag rgya spang mi bya/_/nyams par mi bya bdag gis min/_/rdo rje 'dra ba 'gom mi bya/_/bza' bar mi bya ser sna min/_/'di spyod pa yi rgyal po yi/_/gsang sngags sgo yi spyad pa spyod/_/byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims dang /_/ldan 
[\[215b.6\]]la mngon spyod mi bya'o/_/gnod byed la yang mi bya'o/_/sdig pa'i las kyang mi bya zhing /_/byis pa'i chos kyang mi bya'o/_/bla ma la ni lha bzhin bya/_/mdor na bdag dang gzhan dag la/_/gnod par 'gyur ba de mi bya/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las/_/'dis ni 
[\[215b.7\]]nges par 'da' bar byed/_/ston pa'i bstan pa bdud rtsi nyid/_/thugs rje chen po'i bstan pa las/_/slar yang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing /_/sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ngan 'gror min/_/myur du zhi bar 'gyur ba min/_/'di ltar gsang sngags spyod pa yi/_/dam tshig 'di ni 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]sangs rgyas rnams/_/sras dang bcas pas khyod la gsungs/_/gang zhig rnam pa 'di lta bus/_/lus dang mthun pa'i yon tan 'byung /_/dad med ngan 'gro ba mi bya/_/sangs rgyas sras bcas yongs rnams kyis/_/smon lam la yang spyad par bya/_/kun rdzob tu ni 
[\[216a.2\]]mi ldog par/_/rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes pas mthong /_/ring du mi byed ches drag pas/_/sems can don du smon par byed/_/ces brjod la/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal ba de ni dam tshig gi thal mo zhes bya ba ste rtsa 
[\[216a.3\]]ba'i phyag rgya yin no/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_/su sid+d+hi sA d+ha ni a gra kA ru Na/_bA re d+he/_trA ti trA yi/_A tI ba la na mo stu/_ba rA d+ha yi/_g+he b+h+yo ma hA kr-i pe b+h+yaHswA hA/_'di ni rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i sngags yin no/_/phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bcings la bya ba 'am/_
[\[216a.4\]]de bzhin du gang yang rung ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o/_/ser sna dang bral bas 'dir gang las dngos grub 'byung ba'i dam tshig la goms par byas nas mdangs dang ldan pas 'dir dngos grub kyi dam tshig la zhugs na myur du de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags 
[\[216a.5\]]pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams nas phyag rgya bcings nas sngags bzlas na dngos grub brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs nas phyag 
[\[216a.6\]]byas la bzlas pa bya'i/_'dir gnyis la bslab par mi bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag mi bya ba dang /_sems can gcig gi don bsgrub par mi bya'o/_/gzhan du na ma lus pa la spros pa'i sems bskyed pa'i che ba la goms par bya'o/_/thams cad du 
[\[216a.7\]]gnyis po 'di dag spang bar bya ste/_'gyod pa dang zhum pa'i sems so/_/gzhan yang gnyis po 'di dag ni bya ba ste/_sdig pa thams cad bshags pa dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ba rgyun mi bcad pa'o/_/'dir gnyis po 'di spang bar 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]bya ste/_bslab pa la mi sbyor ba dang sgrub pa mi byed pa'o/_/'grub par mi 'gyur ba ni gnyis te/_dad pa med pa dang /_byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'o/_/bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig ni gnyis te/_dus ma yin par bya ba byed pa dang /_brtag pa med pa'o/_/sngags kyi spyod pa 
[\[216b.2\]]la rjes su zhugs pa'i chos ni gnyis te/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bskyed pa dang /_thams cad du dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa la gzhol ba'o/_/de nas 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi snying po rnams dang /_dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /_sngags rnams 
[\[216b.3\]]kyi rtog pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mar dang bcas pa'i gu gul gyi bdug spos kyis ni rims dang /_gdon dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za rnams la mi na ba dang /_na bas kyang rung ras ris dang /_ri mo dang /_sku gzugs dang /_shing dang /_lo ma dang /_ral gri dang /_me 
[\[216b.4\]]long la sogs pa la 'bebs par byed do/_/gang yang rung ba'i bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni bcing ba dang /_btsir ba dang /_brdab pa dang /_bsnun pa dang /_gsad pa dang /_gcad pa dang /_dbab pa dang /_rnam par sbyang ba dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_dgug pa dang /_dbang 
[\[216b.5\]]du bya ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad bsgrub par bya ba ni bklags pas 'grub pa 'di nyid kyis byed par 'gyur ro/_/mchog sgrub pa la sogs pa las thams cad ni de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rim par phye ba rab 'byam gyi cho ga'am/_rig pa mchog la 
[\[216b.6\]]sogs pa'i cho gas sbyar bar bya ba de dag kyang thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa 'dis kyang bya'o/_/'di dag gi thun mong gi ras ris 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni brag gi phug na pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_gser gyi mdog can 'od kyi phreng 
[\[216b.7\]]bas bskor bar bri bar bya'o/_/g.yas su rdo rje 'dzin gang yang rung ba zhig rang gi mtshan mas phyag brel ba 'od kyis bskor ba'i pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bri 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]bar bya'o/_/bgegs rnams gsod pa'i g.yog po mtha' yas gang yang rung ba gnag cing ldang ba/_gzhon nu ral pa can/_mig cung zhig dmar ba/_khros pa/_rin po che'i brag la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/_/'og tu ni sgrub pa po'o/_/'dir yang rdo rje 
[\[217a.2\]]'dzin gang yang rung ba'i snying po dang bsgrub par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sngar bstan pa'i cho ga'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i cho ga bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o/_/grub par gyur na 
[\[217a.3\]]rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po'i sngags bla na med pa'i nor bu'i rgya mtsho thogs pa med pa don yod par grub par byed pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/rtog pa thams cad kyi cho gas sam/_yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas sbyar ro/_/de 
[\[217a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu dpe med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi mdzod las yang dag par byung ba snying po'i mthus kyang de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/'dir ni bar chad mi 'byung zhing /_/rmongs par mi 'gyur chags mi 'gyur/_/'dir ni sangs rgyas kun gyi nor/_/
[\[217a.5\]]rtag tu byin gyis brlabs nas gnas/_/thun mong gi phyag rgya sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di la phyag rgya gang yang rung ba rtsig ngos sam/_ras sam/_spang leb bam/_lo ma'am/_gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su tshon rtsi'am/_dris bsgos pa'i pir ram/_tha na thal bas 
[\[217a.6\]]kyang rung bris la dri dang me tog gis mchod pa byas te/_bdag gi don 'di mdzad du gsol/_/bdag la mchog 'di stsal du gsol/_/bdag gi 'di ni bsgrub tu gsol/_/bdag gi dgos pa 'di dag gzhan du ma gyur pa de bzhin du gyur cig ces yang dag par bsams nas 
[\[217a.7\]]phyag rgya'i sngags bzlas pa byas na dgos pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'am/_lha la sogs pa'am mi la sogs pa ngas 'ong bar byas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dang de smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i dgos pa yang smra bar byed/_ston cig ce'am/_rgyob cig ce'am/_chod cig_/sod 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]cig_/rgyas thob cig_/tshir cig_/phug cig_/smod cig ces sam/_sdig pa can/_gdug pa can/_gnod pa byed pa'i lha dang /_klu la sogs pa gzhom pa'am/_gang yang rung ba bsams la rang gi khrag gis bris te/_khros pas 'dug la bzlas pa byas na gang gi 
[\[217b.2\]]don du byas pa'i lha'am/_klu'am/_rig pa 'dzin pa'ang rung ste/_nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe mchog bsgrub par 'dod na des lcags las phyag mtshan byas la bzlas pa byas nas lag par bzung ste/_gang yang rung bas dben par ci srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du 
[\[217b.3\]]bsgrubs na de zla ba gcig gi nang ngam/_zla ba gsum gyi nang du rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi cho zas za ba na yang de lag pa nas ma bor bar bza'o/_/slong du 'gro na yang de bzhin du lag tu thogs la slong du 'gro bar bya'o/_/nyal ba'i tshe yang bsrung ba byas nas 
[\[217b.4\]]sngas su gzhag par bya'o/_/mi snang ba la sogs pa las thams cad kyang phyag rgya 'dis bsgrub par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas phyag rgya 'dis snyigs ma dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par sbyang ba'i bar du yang bya'o/_/thugs kyi bdag nyid sdig pa rnam par 
[\[217b.5\]]'jig par byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di/_/kun du mchog rnams sras bcas pas/_/dpag med ces bya'i sems can khams/_/rnam par sbyang phyir byin gyis brlabs/_/phyag rgya spyod pa'i rgyal sa ru/_/gtso bo gang zhig zhugs gyur pa/_/'bad pa 
[\[217b.6\]]chung ngus sems can don/_/de yis ma bsams par yang byed/_/dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya chen po'i rgyal mo 'di dag na sa ya grangs med pa bcu'i nang na rtse mor gyur pa don sna tshogs sgrub pa yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_hUM tri sa ma yaM ku ru ku ru/_taM taM/_sa ma sa 
[\[217b.7\]]ma/_a ma le/_ta ra ta ra/_a gre Na swA hA/_rtse mo zhes bya ba phyag rgya'i rgyal mo yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ti ba le a ma le/_a sa man+ta sa ti ni badzre badzre/_ti mi ti mi/_sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/_ku ru ku ru/_sa ma sa ma/_la ba te la ba te/_a yat+ti ni/_dz+wA la na ma 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]sarba ut+tA ma naM swA hA/_stobs mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya'i rgyal mo yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_hU~M sA d+ha ya sa ma yaM badzra sa ma yaM/_badzra sa ma ye/_ti Ti ti Ti/_sarbaM tri shi kha/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM ba re b+h+yaH/_sa ka la ti swa ti ki/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_ti pa ta yi/_bi re dze 
[\[218a.2\]]swA hA/_kha dog med pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_trAM gi ni trAM gi ni/_a tAM sa yi ni a tAM sa yi ni/_tI ba rI NI tI ba rI NI/_tri ba ra tri ba ra/_a ma le hU~M sid+d+h+yan+tu sarba ut+ta ra twa tre d+h+yaM d+h+yaM bi kre swA hA/_gsum ldan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta 
[\[218a.3\]]badzrA NAM/_a ti ba ra badzra sa man+ti ni hUM tri pr-i ti/_ku ru ku ru/_ta ra ta ra/_tA re tA re/_a sa ma ma hA ba li sa ma ye/_d+hu na d+hu na/_ha ra ha ra/_a mr-i te swA hA/_yan lag gi stobs zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyal mo yin no/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_trAM trAM t+r+'+yaM t+r+'+yaM/_gi ni ts+tshin+d+ha 
[\[218a.4\]]ma hA A t+me ta ra ta ra sho d+ha ni/_sarba pa ri trAM/_ku ru ku ru/_a sa ha ba la/_a pra ti ha ta be ga/_trAM trAM hU~M hU~M/_gi ni trAM trAM/_yan lag mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a ma le a ma le/_sa ma ye sa ma ye/_a gre a gre/_
[\[218a.5\]]mo tsa ni mo tsa ni/_a sa he a sa he/_te dze ni badzrI/_a ti a ti/_a grA mA tI/_a grA mA tI/_mu ya mu ya/_tri sa ma ye tri sa ma ye/_hU~M dz+wA la/_a nAM swA hA/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_ta ra ma ti ta ra ma ti/_sa re sa re/_d+hi ni d+hi ni/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_ti ri me ti ri me/_hUM bi 
[\[218a.6\]]sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_tri ba li ni ta ra ang+ga ni a no pa me swA hA/_kha dog gi stobs zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin no/_/na maHse man+ta badzrA NAM/_a he a he/_a tI a tI/_ta ra mA ta ra mA/_tA ya tA ya/_sa ma ye tra ta ri/_a ma le/_na mo stu te a 
[\[218a.7\]]sa tri she b+h+yaHswA hA/_shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_hU~M ba ra ba ra/_ba ra de ba ra de/_tri ta yi tri ta yi/_sarba sarba/_ta bi na yaM ka ro ti/_ma hA ba le b+h+yaHswA hA/_log 'dren gyi mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo'o/_
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]bcu po 'di dag ni phyag rgya'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo mnyam pa med pa ste/_thams cad du thogs pa med pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams skyed par mdzad pa zhes bya'o/_/phyag rgya'i sngags kyi 
[\[218b.2\]]sgrub pa pos 'di la dad pas spyad par bya'o/_/phyag rgya'i rgyal mo brtson 'grus chen mo mnyam pa med pa/_thams cad du dri ma med pa byin gyis brlabs pa med pa/_'dod pa thams cad la der gtad pa/_de nges par bsgrub par bya ste/_don yod par rab tu grub par 'gyur 
[\[218b.3\]]ro/_/dam tshig gsum las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po thogs pa med pa don yod pa grub pa las gsang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa'i rim par phye ba'i rab 'byam rdzogs so//_//na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a sa ma 
[\[218b.4\]]ye/_tri sa ma ye/_sa ma ye swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad stobs kyi shugs gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sangs rgyas thams cad dang lhan cig snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de 
[\[218b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par thar ba rmad du byung ba/_rgyas pa snga na med pa/_gzhan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thams cad kyis dam tshig gi spyod yul byin gyis brlab pa byas 
[\[218b.6\]]nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_a bI ra hU~M khaM/_sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/mtha' dang dbus med chos rnams las/_/
[\[218b.7\]]mtshungs pa med pa'i gter kun gyi/_/snying po 'di ni stobs po che/_/'di yis rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par gsungs/_/ma bsams pa ra yang sems can don/_/mkhas pas 'di yis sbyor bar 'gyur/_/'gro ba drug 'grel bdag 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]nyid yi ge lnga/_/thugs rje'i bdag nyid kun gyi yab gcig pu/_/'jig rten gsum po skyob pa'i sgor zhugs nas/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho sbyong zhing rnam par gnas/_/thugs rje'i bdag nyid dad pas zin pa'i yul/_/sems can don mchog nye bar 
[\[219a.2\]]sgrub par byed/_/gcig tu sdug bsngal mthar thug 'gro ba rnams/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtso mchog de sbyong byed/_/de phyir gtso mchog dri med 'di sgrub pa/_/rmad byung che mchog chos can snying po 'di'o/_/mtha' yas bde bar gshegs la mngon dad pas/_/
[\[219a.3\]]brtson 'grus rdo rje bla med bsgrub par bya/_/'di'i sgrub pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ci lta ba dang /_rig pa mchog rab 'byam la sogs pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/_/de nas 'dir ras ris kyi khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ras ris ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[219a.4\]]rin po che'i brag phug na pad+ma la ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas bzhugs pa 'od kyis bskor ba bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dri ma med pa zhes bya ba pri yang ku ltar ljang gu bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar bas 
[\[219a.5\]]pad+ma la gnas pa bri bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog can nam/_gser gyi mdog can 'od kyi phreng bas bskor ba/_lag na rdo rje thogs pa rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa'o/_/de'i 'og tu mi g.yo ba mig 
[\[219a.6\]]gcig pa zhes bya ba bgegs tshar gcod pa/_rin po che'i brag la bzhugs pa mig dmar po gcig yod pa/_kun nas 'bar bas bskor bag nag cing ljang ba/_khros shing 'khrugs pa/_gzhon nu ral pa gcig yod pa/_lag pa na ral gri dang /_zhags pa thogs 
[\[219a.7\]]pa bri bar bya'o/_/sgrub pa po ni thal mo sbyar ba'o/_/ras ris gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_mi g.yo ba mig gcig pa bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du cho ga thams cad kyis sbyar bar bya zhing /_ri la sogs pa dben par 'du 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]'dzi spangs nas ras ris med par yang bsgrub pa'am/_tha na gtsug lag khang gi brang khang la sogs pa dang /_kun dga' ra ba la sogs pa'i gnas su sems can gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos grub la nye bar dmigs pa nyid kyis 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na/_de 
[\[219b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa byon nas mgo la reg ste legs so zhes bya ba byin zhing kun nas reg par gyur pas mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur zhing gzungs rnams kyang so sor thob par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gsum bzlas na rdzas gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang des 
[\[219b.3\]]rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa byams pa'i spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'phags pa byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la rnam par blta zhing gnas pas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na lag pa nas bzung nas lcang 
[\[219b.4\]]lo can du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi mdun du bzlas pa byas pa de nges par mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/khyad par du 'gro ba la yang 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/skyil mo krung gis 
[\[219b.5\]]'dug nas mtshan rangs par de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs nas bzlas na mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/_/ri la slong mo spyod cing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'thob cing ci srid 'dod par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/snying po 'di ni rang bzhin 
[\[219b.6\]]gyis grub pa/_chags pa med pa don yod par grub pa'o/_/myur du 'grub pa sgrib pa med par 'grub pa zhes bya'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi cho ga gang yin pa de rtog pa 'di'i yin no/_/mdor na gang 'dod pa de sgrub par byed pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 
[\[219b.7\]]kyi dam tshig ces bya ba yi ge lnga po yin no zhes bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dam tshig ces bya ba gang mchog tu mtshungs pa med pa pha rol gyi yang pha rol tu gyur pa dpa' bo dri ma med pa thams cad dang gcig tu nye bar 'dug nas sangs rgyas dang byang 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs nye bar bsdus pa 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ma hA ma hA/_a ra ya a ra ya/_sho d+ha ya 
[\[220a.2\]]sho d+ha ya/_a mA lA a mA lA/_tra ha tra ha/_ma hA kA ru NaM/_sa ma ya tra ka ra tra ka ra/_tra ya tra ya swA hA/_yang bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba la sgrib pa med pa/_sngon gyi chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug par byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[220a.3\]]thams cad kyis lhan cig tu gsungs so/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ba ra ba ra/_sarbaM sarbaM/_sa ma sa ma/_ku ru NAM ku ru NAM/_tA rA tA rA/_sA rA sA rA/_A tI A tI/_a mI tAM a mI tAM/_a ti a ti/_bI raM bI raM/_a tI a tI/_shu raM shu raM/_ha ha ha ha/_ma hA sa ma ya/_
[\[220a.4\]]na maHtra a ma la sid+d+hi dA ya ke b+h+yaH/_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH/_sarba a nan+ta me d+h+ye b+h+yaH/_ma hA kA ru NAM/_a ma li NAM/_a sa he dzA la swA hA/_'di gsum bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis grol ba dang /_/mchog tu rnam dag sems can rnams/_/byed pa'ang 
[\[220a.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/dpa' bo kun gyis 'dir thams cad/_/'di yi stobs kyis don thams cad/_/byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs/_/gsang ba bdag nyid chen po 'di/_/dpag med ces bya'i thugs rje'i bdag_/kun gyi spyod yul 'di yin te/_/de phyir 'di dang 
[\[220a.6\]]'dra ba med/_/blo ldan dad pas snying po 'di/_/'gro kun 'dul bar 'dod pa yis/_/yang dag nyid du bsgrub par bya/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa bsdus pa'i rgyal po'i phyogs gcig gi bla na med pa'i snying po rim par phye ba ram 'byam gyi 
[\[220a.7\]]phyogs gcig yin no/_/'phags pa kun du bzang pos kyang rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_su ma tI su ma tI/_sa ma ya sa ma ya/_sa ma sa ma/_a tI a tI/_ro tsa nA ro tsa nA/_ma hA ba le be ge d+ye hi ma hA sa man+ta b+ha dra/_a tsi ta ba la be ga na maHstu te swA hA/_de 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i cho gas nyis 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o/_/rig pa mchog rab 'byam la sogs pa'i cho gas kyang sbyar bar bya'o/_/ras ris ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du bzang po dang /_'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba phyag na rdo rje rnams snga ma 
[\[220b.2\]]bzhin du ci rigs par bri bar bya'o/_/phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni 'phags pa rdo rje'i stobs zhes bya ba gzhon nu rin po che'i brag la 'dug pa/_gnag cing ljang pa/_mig dmar ba/_ngur smrig gyon pa/_lag na ral gri thogs pa/_khros pa/_thur du lta ba/_bgegs rnams 'joms 
[\[220b.3\]]pa bri bar bya'o/_/'og tu ni sgrub pa po'o/_/ras ris gnyis pa ni 'phags pa kun du bzang po dang /_g.yos po de bzhin du gnas pa bri bar bya'o/_/'dir yang las thams cad snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya ste/_ci ltar mos pa bzhin du 'phags pa kun du bzang pa'i smon lam gyis 'gyur 
[\[220b.4\]]ro/_/'phags pa blo gros chen pos rang gi snying pe smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a trA a trA/_sarba sarba/_sa ma sa ma/_sa paM/_a tsa lI nI/_a tsa lI nI/_a ma lI nI/_a ma lI nI/_ma hA a gra ye swA hA/_mchog la lta ba zhes bya bas snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba 
[\[220b.5\]]bud+b+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a nan+ta ma hA ba khe nA sti a gra satwa na mo stu te/_sarba tra a pra ti ha ta grA te na mA sarba dzi/_aM be tad e taM/_a tra a tra/_ba ra ba ra/_bi ri ya bi ri ya swA hA/_dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi 'od kyis rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ta ra ta ra/_ba ra ba ra/_
[\[220b.6\]]bi ri bi ri/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_a sa ma dz+wA la swA hA/_rdo rje dpa' bos rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a gra ta sta ra ma na hA ma ti hU~M hU~M/_e h+ye hi/_a ti a ti/_a ma lA/_ba ra ba ra/_bi ri bi ri/_badzra badzra/_ba la a~M gi/_ti bi ti bi/_hU~M dz+wA lA nA ma swA hA/_
[\[220b.7\]]rdo rje dpa' bos smas pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ga ga nA ga ga nA/_ga ga nA d+ha nong+ga te d+hi d+ha nAM me/_ti si ti si/_ha sa ha sa/_badzra ba lA u da ya swA hA/_nam mkha' shar bas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ti a ti/_gar+b+ha gar+b+ha/_tu rU tu rU/_badzra 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]badzra/_ku ru ku ru/_hU~M swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi snying po'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_trA Ta trA Ta/_tA TA tA TA/_ha ra ha ra/_ma hA badzra gar+b+ha hU~M hU~M/_tA Ti tA Ti/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_badzra badzra/_gu NA gu NA/_sa rI hU~M dz+wa la na maHste swA hA/_rdo rje snying po'i'o/_/
[\[221a.2\]]na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_kA ru NAM/_sa ma yaM/_ku ru ku ru/_a nan+ta ma hA ba lA badzra he he shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/_A bi sha A bi sha/_tak+t+wi ti bi ti bi/_badzra mA la swA hA/_rdo rje mtha' yas kyi'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ma la shI/_sa man+ta sa ma ya/_hi ri hi ri/_hU~M hU~M/_badzra 
[\[221a.3\]]badzra/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_dza ra dza ra/_badzra ya sa ni nA ma swA hA/_rdo rje dpal gyi snying po'i 'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma las nges par byung ba zhes bya bas snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_A ya hI shI g+h+raM su ga ta/_dza be gra ta pra Na mi taM te ba ra/_sa tra 
[\[221a.4\]]me kra mA kA ro hI/_sarba pa ra da ma ma hA ba la/_a tsaN+Da ka satwA bi shud+d+hi/_ka ra ka ra ka tra tre daM tri ta yaM/_bi ra yaM bi ra yaM/_bir yaM/_a ra ra kri mA ba ya swA hA/_pad+ma las nges par byung ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ba ra da badzra u 
[\[221a.5\]]da ya hU~M hU~M/_he he sA d+ha ya swA hA/_rdo rje dpa' bo'i'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ru NAM a ru NAM/_sa ma te sa ma te/_ba ra de ba ra de/_sA rA the sA rA the/_na mo a tsin+t+ya bi Sha ye b+h+yaHswA hA/_bde bar gshegs pa las byung ba'i snying po'o/_/'phags pa byams pas 
[\[221a.6\]]rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_tIt+tI ya tI t+tI ya/_b+hi d+hi ya b+hi d+hi ya/_ma hA yo gI shwa ra/_dar+sha ya daR+sha ya/_sa ma yaM dz+wA la ya sarba a mo g+ha sid+d+hi swA hA/_mya ngan med bzang pos rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sA ma te sA ma te/_su rA te su rA te/_
[\[221a.7\]]sho b+hi ni sho b+hi ni/_b+ha dre b+ha dre/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_bi ra bi ra/_tsa la swA hA/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a trI ka sa ma hA na n+ti man+ti/_ka ra ka ra/_bI ra bI ra/_ta ra ta ra/_tI yA tI yA/_many+dzu shri yA/_ka ri ka ri/_ka ra ka ra/_ta ra ta ra/_ha ra ha ra/_badzra ma ya/_hU~M hU~M/_dza la ku mA ra ka swA hA/_
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying po'o/_/'phags pa pad+ma rdo rjes snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_Ar+ya gI te na mo stu te/_kA ru Na maN+Da lA ma la dz+wA lA me d+ho ma ni sa ha te tsa gu Na rA dzA a gra b+hU Sha Na tA tra/_e daM ti dwa ya tri dwa ya tri/_su ma ti su ma ti/_te ra tI te ra tI/_gu Na 
[\[221b.2\]]gu Na/_dz+wA la ya a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta swA hA/_'phags pa rdo rje rang bzhin gyis snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_badzra mA yA tri shi khA ba ra hU~M/_bar bo ga gu NAM ma la ban+d+ha pe ki ni swA hA/_'phags pa rdo rje rtse mos snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a ha ha 
[\[221b.3\]]ha ha/_sa ma sa ma/_tri shI kha ra tri shI kha ra/_t+r+yam+ba t+r+yam+ba/_a sa dr-i sh+ya swA hA/_rdo rje yan lag byin gyis rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_trA ga trA ga/_hU~M hU~M/_tsaM tsaM tu te su kha ya hI swA hA/_rdo rje mi g.yo bas rang gi snying po smras ba/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA 
[\[221b.4\]]nAM/_sarba tra g+hu NAM/_ku ru ku ru/_sa ma tA/_hA rA hA rA/_hU~M hU~M/_badzra a tsa la swA hA/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ha na ha na/_ta na ta na/_ma hA badzra ba lo da ya/_ta ta ta ta/_na ma na ma/_a ta a ta/_sa ta sa ta/_gu NA gu NA/_ta na ta na/_ma na ma na/_dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ya/_
[\[221b.5\]]be ga a tsa la a tsa la/_hU~M hU~M/_a ti dz+wA la ya na ma swA hA/_gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang gi rdo rje sos rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_rak+tA rak+tA/_sak+tA sak+tA/_man+tA man+tA/_b+ha drA b+ha drA/_mo TA mo TA/_ta Ta ta Ta/_hU~M hU~M badzra a ti ba la/_dza ha le dza ha 
[\[221b.6\]]le/_tit+ti tit+ti/_ti tsi ti tsi/_sha ta sha ta/_tsa tsa Adz+nyA ka ra swA hA/_dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyis rang gi snying po smras pa/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_Ar+ya a ma le/_sa da ya sarbaM/_ti tsi ti tsi/_ma ti ma ti/_gA n+te swA hA/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ta ra ti ta ra ti/_ba ra ti ba 
[\[221b.7\]]ra ti/_ma hA ba ra ti/_ma hA ba ra ti/_sa man+te dz+wA lA ya/_badzra tA ha ri hUM ga ra sa ma ya swA hA/_dam tshig gzi brjid ces bya ba'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_tri shi khI/_ba ra de ba ra de/_sha ra sha ra/_shA re shA re/_ba ra ba ra/_te dze hU~M hU~M/_kha nI/_sid+d+hi swA hA/_rdo rje shugs kyi'o/_/
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_aT+Ta aT+Ta tsaN+De tsaN+De/_b+hI Sha NI b+hI Sha NI/_ta Ta ta Ta/_badzra be ge nI kan+t+ri sho b+hi nI trAM trAM/_A kar+Sha ya sid+d+hi/_trAM bi ni badzre bai ro tso/_a na tha a na tha/_ba la ba la hU~M hU~M/_ya ma li ni/_a sta ka ro hi sarba thA sA d+ha ni swA hA/_'phags pa rdo rje 
[\[222a.2\]]lcags kyu'i'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_tik+t+we tik+t+we/_muk+t+we muk+t+we/_de hi ba ra raM/_to Sha ye/_to Sha ye/_ha sa ka re taM re taM/_ti li ti li/_ti ni ti ni/_mu ni mu ni/_ma hA kA ru NAM maM tra yi ge swA hA/_rdo rje ma'i'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ti T+ya ti T+ya/_to tra to tra/_me la mA 
[\[222a.3\]]la/_hA hA le khe ma ma tso re hUM hUM/_badzra ang+ge ke k+Shi ta k+Shi ta/_ke ka re swA hA/_rdo rje gdan gyi'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a pI nI a pI nI/_Ar+ya mA la ni/_be ge dz+wA lA ya swA hA/_rdo rje nag po'i'o/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_ma ga ta s+t+ri hi ra ya s+ya ta s+ya ta ge na mo bud+d+ha ma hA 
[\[222a.4\]]yo ga ba la a gra ya badzra bI ra ya ta yi ni tre dAM/_a ma bi ti a ma bi ti/_ba la ba ti ba la ba ti/_sho d+ha ne swA hA/_rdo rje dpa' bo'i'o/_/rtog pa 'di dag thams cad du snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du ras ris kyang ji ltar rigs par bri bar bya'o/_/'di dag ni bsgribs pa med par rab tu grub 
[\[222a.5\]]pa/_don yod par grub pa/_rang bzhin gyis grub pa/_bklags pas grub pa/_thogs pa med par rab tu grub pa'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o/_/sems can thams 
[\[222a.6\]]cad kyi don byed pa'o/_/mthong ba'i chos la bdud rtsi'i spyod yul du 'gyur zhing yon tan gyi 'byung gnas rab tu thob par 'dod pas 'bad pa thams cad kyis bsgrub par bya'o/_/'dis mi 'grub pa gang yang med do/_/sgrub pa 'dis bsgrubs pa la nyams pa med do/_/bar chad 
[\[222a.7\]]mi 'byung ngo /_/log 'dren mi 'byung ngo /_/gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/nad mi 'byung ngo /_/ci ltar 'dod pas ci ltar mos pa bzhin du dad par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su bran bzhin du las rnams bsgrub par bya'o/_/rtog pa 'dir the tshom med par bya ste/_dam 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]tshig 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/snying po rab 'byam gyi rim par phye ba'o//_//de nas 'dir gtum po mthar byed la sogs pa pho nyar byed pa sa ya bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gtso bo bcu'i snying po bcu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a ti bi Sha ya/_
[\[222b.2\]]gr-i h+Na ya tsaN+Da/_ut+ta ts+tsa ka ma hA go rA ka rA/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_badzra kA ra la/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_ha~M ha~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT swA hA/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_hU~M ma hA ba la a gra a tsa la/_gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_pA tA ya pA tA ya/_A bi sha A bi sha/_a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta ba ra 
[\[222b.3\]]bi shwa mAM hU~M hU~M/_ta bI ta bI ra a tsa la swA hA/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a tsi ta ud+da ra gu Na bar+NA ba ra ba ra/_ka ra ka ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_a tI ba lA/_kha Na kha Na/_khun+ta khun+ta/_ta ni ta ni/_ma hA dz+wA lA man+da ya sa ka swA hA/_shin tu stobs kyi rdo rje'i'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA 
[\[222b.4\]]NAM/_tri pa li a tsa lI/_a ma lI/_ka ma lI/_ma hA ma hA/_sa da ba la/_sa ma ti/_ga ba rA/_ti dzA tre daM/_taM ba taM ba/_tra Ta tra Ta/_ta Ta ta Ta/_a ti badzra bi Sha Na hU~M/_s+pho Ta ya/_sA d+ha A dz+nyA ka ra swA hA/_mchod chen mchog gi'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_
