[\[242b.3\]]su 'gro ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi don gyi las dang rab tu ldan pa'i lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad yang dag par rtsom pa ste/_sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa la zhugs pas chos de dag la spyad par bya'o/_/de la 'di dag ni rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 
[\[242b.4\]]'dir bar du gcod par 'gyur ba yin te/_le lo dang /_'dod pa med pa dang /_mngon par mi sbyor ba dang /_'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /_phan pa ma yin pa la zhugs pa dang /_yid gnyis dang /_bdag gi bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[242b.5\]]'chal pa yin pa dang /_dman par gyur pa yin pas 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer nas yongs su spong ba dang /_kun tu 'tsho ba'i dri ma dang /_mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la bdag gi don dang /_gzhan gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad med pa la sbyor ba'i 'dod 
[\[242b.6\]]pa med pa dang /_gsang sngags la brtag pa med pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i sngags kyi bstan bcos la mngon par dga' ba dang /_bdag nyid la nga rgyal byed pa dang /_gzhan la mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_mngon par mi brtson pa spong bar mi byed pa dang /_yo 
[\[242b.7\]]byad mang po nye bar sdud pa dang /_lus dang srog la chags pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams rtogs par bya'o/_/'di la ser sna yang mi bya'o/_/gzhan dag sngags kyi spyod pa la gzhug par bya'o/_/bslab par bya/_yang dag 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]par gzung bar bya ste/_de ltar byed na bstan pa'i don byas pa yang yin no/_/dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa yang yin no/_/gzhan dag kyang yang dag par 'dzud par 'gyur ro/_/bskul bar yang 'gyur ro/_/des ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da 
[\[243a.2\]]ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam pa'i chos bzung bar yang 'gyur ro/_/bklags pa dang /_bcangs par yang 'gyur ro/_/de ni sangs rgyas thams cad bzung bas thams cad du mnyam pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/sdang mig bltas pa tsam gyis 
[\[243a.3\]]ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg gis log 'dren la sogs pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/ras ris kyi cho ga ni nam mkha'i spyan gyi gnas su ni rdo rje'i mchog ces bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo'i mchog bya ste/_kun nas 'bar ba/_gnag cing ljang ba/_rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje lag na 
[\[243a.4\]]thogs pa'o/_/'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o/_/ras ris gzhan yang cung zhig sngo ba/_gzhon nu khros pa/_rdo rje 'bar ba gsor ba'o/_/khro ba dang bcas pa/_'gying ba/_'gying bag gis ri mo rnams cung zhig bskul skum zhing 'dar 
[\[243a.5\]]ba bri bar bya'o/_/'phags pa rdo rje lcags kyus sngags smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_oM badzra dz+wA la aM gi mya A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/_'dis ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /_thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa 'dis bde sogs bkug nas yongs su 
[\[243a.6\]]spyod pa yang ston par byed do/_/sngar bstan pa'i cho gas rengs par byed do/_/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang mnyam pa med par 'gyur ro/_/lha la sogs pa'i rigs 'gugs par byed do/_/g.yo bar byed/_phur bus 'debs par byed do/_/de nas ras ris kyi cho ga ni 
[\[243a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag na rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa'o/_/g.yon logs su ni lha mo dang bcas pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can rdo rje gzhon nu ma cung zhig sngo bsangs so/_/rdo rje 'dzin gyi 'og tu ni sgrub pa po lha mo la mngon du phyogs pa'o/_/lha mo'i 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]'og tu ni gzhon nu ma bri bar bya'o/_/ras ris gnyis pa ni gzhon nu ma cung zhig sngo bsangs lag na ral gri thogs pa 'bar ba'i lus can zhes bya ba rdo rje gzhon nu ma bri bar bya'o/_/de nas yang 'phags pa rdo rje sdes sngags smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_
[\[243b.2\]]o~M sau mya ba ra badzrA ya na maHswA hA/_de bzhin du 'phags pa lag [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]sngags smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_o~M badzra gar+b+ha phaT bi ri ni swA hA/_'phags pa mthor 'phags kyis sngags smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_badzra ba 
[\[243b.3\]]la ye swA hA/_log 'dren la sogs pa 'ching bar byed do/_/'phags pa rdo rje lcags sgrog gis sngags smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_oM a na la sam+b+ha be swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'o/_/rdo rje 'dzin gyis 
[\[243b.4\]]sngags smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_o~M sarba sa ut+ta ma ban+d+ha badzra shi kha re/_ka ma lA ka ma lA/_ma pa lA a d+hiSh+ThA na badzra badzra shi khi shi khi/_na mo a ma lA nA/_sA rA sA rA/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_bi ma le swA hA/_shin tu gnod mdzes rdo rje zhes 
[\[243b.5\]]bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_d+hu ba re d+hu ba re/_dz+wA la dz+wA la dz+wA la/_badzra sA ga re swA hA/_rnam par sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_o~M tsa ra ba na tsa ra 
[\[243b.6\]]ba na/_ha ra ha ra/_bi skam+b+ha ya/_sA ra u sA ra u/_go pa go pa/_bA bA twa ra twa ra/_kha hi kru ra badzri Ni swA hA/_mnyam pa rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_kA ru Na kA ru Na/_sa ra sa ra/_bi d+ha ma na/_
[\[243b.7\]]hr-i da ya/_sa twAM bi d+ha ut+ta ma/_dz+wA la na twAM swA hA/_'phags pa rdo rje zug rngus sngags smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta tA ga tA nAM/_o~M kro d+ha dz+wA la u ta ha si ni swA hA/_mtha' yas rdo rjes sngags smras pa/_na maHsa man+tA nAM/_sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_o~M a/_
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]sa mA ga ga ne swA hA/_o~M a na ma la sam+b+hA n+tu ta ri Ni/_na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_a sa man+tA gu Na ut+ta ma de hi bi raM/_ga ga na a nan+tA ga ti/_dz+wA la ta dz+wA la ta/_sa ma ta sa ma ta/_b+hi bI ta hr-i dA ye/_sha kha lA ba le be/_s+pha ra he s+pha ra 
[\[244a.2\]]he/_d+h+ru ba d+h+ru ba swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_ma hA ba ra tsi tA/_a gra shi kha re swA hA/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_o~M b+hu d+ha ke b+hu d+ha ba lA ti ba lA ni swA hA/_gtsug tor dang rma bya chen mo'i yin no/_/
[\[244a.3\]]na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_o~M a na ma la saM b+hAn+du ta ri Ni/_oM ba ra saM ban+d+hu d+hu swA hA/_rdo rje me dang rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i ste/_nye bar 'tshe ba yang dag par zlog par byed do/_/o~M badzra ba la an+tu sha tri sho sarba dA be gi ne han+tu na tAM/_o~M a sa dr-i she swA hA/_dpe med 
[\[244a.4\]]rdo rje'i rigs dang mi g.yo ba nyid kyi yin no/_/oM a sa ma sa ma/_a nan+ta a nan+tu ya swA hA/_rdo rje 'dod pa ma'i'o/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_ta thA ga ta ma hA be ga saM b+ha be saM b+ha be/_na mo stu te saM g+ha ni la san+ti sa ra b+hu be swA hA/_rdo rje sngo bsangs 
[\[244a.5\]]rtse mo zhes bya ba'o/_/oM shi khi shi khi swA hA/_shi khe re swA hA/_spyi gtsug rnam gsum gyi'o/_/o~M hu~M ban+d+ha badzra maN+Da le swA hA/_oM d+ha ri d+ha ri/_d+ha re d+ha re/_d+ha re Na du ye na mo a pra ti ha ta uSh+NI ShA ya swA hA/_d+ha ri d+ha ri/_d+ha na ti ye swA hA/_gtsug tor so so so so 
[\[244a.6\]]la dus gsum gyi gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba dang /_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad du so sor brjod par bya'o/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_o~M hu 
[\[244a.7\]]lu hu lu/_tsaN+Da la sarba de ba nA ga yak+ShA Na A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/_na ma s+t+re ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_hU~M s+phAT ya ma ru d+hi ra/_ang+ga/_hUM tsaN+Da lA mA d+hi pa ta ye hU~M phaT phaT/_badzra sa ma d+ha na hA ra ga tA/_sarba ta thA ga tA a d+hiSh+Tha tA ya/_a le hi maM dz+wa le hU~M ha na 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]hA na/_TA ta A kaR+Sha de ba a ti nAM/_tA ra sa ru d+hi ra aHge ra ma hA tsaN+Da tsa la/_oM d+ha sha duR+d+ha ma/_dz+wA la dz+wA la na maHswa sti swA hA/_rdo rje 'bigs pa'o/_/oM b+hu ra dz+wa la a gra ye swA hA/_rdo rje gzi brjid kyi'o/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_
[\[244b.2\]]oM a la kan+ti ti dza ni swA hA/_sngags thams cad la 'di bzhin du re re zhing phyag 'tshal ba brjod par bya'o/_/sngags 'di dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba la 
[\[244b.3\]]sogs pa rgyas par sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/_rig pa'i rgyal mo mchog byang chub sems dpa' sngags kyi sgor spyod pa nyid kyis nges par don yod par grub par rig 'dzin 
[\[244b.4\]]rim par phye ba smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_tAM tAM tAM/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_haM haM haM/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_baM baM baM/_na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_tsaM tsaM tsaM/_dang pos ni sangs 
[\[244b.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing rnams g.yo bar byed do/_/gnyis pas ni gzugs rnams so/_/gsum pas ni 'ching bar byed do/_/bzhi pas ni thar pa dang gzi brjid sgrub par byed do/_/lnga pas ni gcod par byed do/_/drug pas ni rengs par byed do/_/'di dag ni phyag 
[\[244b.6\]]'tshal ba re re'o/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_sa ma be ga be e lA a d+hiSh+ThA nAM/_ut+ta ra ga ga na sa ma su s+thi tA/_shrI ka ra shA ba nA to khe la nA to shA nA rA gA na shi shan+tu/_a nan+tA tAM/_sA ra sA ra/_ka mA la/_ka mA la/_ba ra sha ra NA/_na 
[\[244b.7\]]mo stu/_sarba tra sha ra NA/_b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_a nan+tA ya swA hA/_rdo rje gdan gyi'o/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_sarba badzra d+ha rA NAM/_badzre ni le ni la g+haM hU~M s+phA Ta hU~M/_rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje gzi 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]brjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/_mgrin gcig tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'dir ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i chos rdo rje 'di smras so/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_a 
[\[245a.2\]]ma lA be ga sam+b+ha ba a d+hiSh+ThA na/_badzra ba la be ga sa man+tA ga mi/_b+h+ra maM b+h+ra maM/_bi d+ha ra Na bi d+ha ra Na/_na mo stu te dz+wA lA na lA bi ma la lo tsa na/_sarba ta pra sa ra Na bi sa ra Na ba ra pra ba la dru ba ra sha ra Na hU~M swA hA/_de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 
[\[245a.3\]]srung bar byed pa rdo rje rgyal po'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi cho gas rdo rje sgrub na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/bklags pa tsam gyis 'dir lag pa'i rdo rje mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ri la 'dug nas sngar bstan pa'i cho gas ji srid mtshan ma byung gi bar du bzlas 
[\[245a.4\]]pa byas na/_de nas zla ba nya la skyil mo krung bcas nas mtshan rangs pa bzlas pa byas na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos par gyur nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad nam mkha'i spyan 
[\[245a.5\]]gyi cho gas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba btab cing zhus pa ste/_rig pa'i mchog gi rgyal po 'di ni mthu mtshungs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/byang chub 
[\[245a.6\]]sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsngags pa sgrub pa nges pa med pa'o/_/sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_spyod pa thams cad kyi snying po bsdus pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba 'di lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin cing /_de bzhin 
[\[245a.7\]]gshegs pa'i mthu yang dag par ston par byed pa/_mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la rmad du byung ba'i mthu mthong bar 'dod pas/_sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung ba bzung nas bsgrub par bya'o/_/'di la ras ris med kyang rung /_ma bsgrubs kyang rung /_
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]mchod pa med kyang rung /_khrus med kyang rung /_sha la sogs pa ma spangs kyang rung ste/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa 'dir sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu dang ba bskyed nas/_byang chub kyi sems kyis 
[\[245b.2\]]yongs su bzung ba de'i nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'dir 'di'i dam tshig ni 'di yin te/_sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mchod rten gyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas 
[\[245b.3\]]pas 'dug la/_brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bya'o/_/yan lag thams cad sa la phab la 'di skad du sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje 
[\[245b.4\]]chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bdag yongs su gzung du gsol/_bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes bya ba'i ngag kyang brjod par bya'o/_/de nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_ga 
[\[245b.5\]]ga ne ga ga ne/_sngags dang /_phyag rgya 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin pa'i dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig 'di dag gang yang rung ba mnyams par bya'o/_/cho ga 'di dag gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /_cho ga 'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor 
[\[245b.6\]]thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di dag ni spang bar bya ba ste/_sems can 'dul bar byed pa la gnod par byed pa dang /_skyon thogs par 'gyur ba'i las byed pa dang /_bstan pa la gnod par sgrub par byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong bar 
[\[245b.7\]]byed pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba la mngon spyod kyi las byed pa dang /_mi smra ba'i sbyor bas phyag rgya sbyor bar byed pa dang /_gzhan bsod nams ma yin pa la sbyar bar mi bya bar gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/rig pa 'dzin 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]pa'i rim par phye ba 'dir 'di dag dam tshig yang dag par bsrungs par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang /_sngags kyi sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgor 'jug pa don yod 
[\[246a.2\]]par grub pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam 'dren par byed pa'o/_/rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba btab pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa'i snying por 'gyur ba'o/_/dad pa can brtson 'grus dang ldan pas nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la khyad 
[\[246a.3\]]par thob par 'dod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sku thob par 'dod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sku nges par bsgrub par 'dod pas dben zhing stong pa'i gnas su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dmigs pa'i sbyor ba byas nas sngags 
[\[246a.4\]]gang yang rung ba bzlas pa bya'o/_/dben par dam pa'i chos gdon pa dang /_sems pa yang rung /_nus pa ci lta ba bzhin phyag 'tshal ba yang byas la mchod rten nam/_sku gzugs kyi mdun du ri dang /_chu klung dang /_mtsho dang /_gling dang /_kun dga' 
[\[246a.5\]]ra ba dang /_nye ba'i tshal la sogs pa rnams su 'am/_gtsug lag khang gi gnas dang /_sku gdung dang bcas pa'i sa'am/_lam gyi mdo'am/_tha na gtsug lag khang gi brang khang du'ang rung /_dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du 'am/_
[\[246a.6\]]sangs rgyas la dmigs pas 'du 'dzi spangs la/_snyom las dang bral bas dam pa'i chos la bla mar byed pas bsgrub pa byas na/_mtshan gcig gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa la skyil mo krung ma bshig par mngon par bsngags shing legs so 
[\[246a.7\]]zhes bya ba yang gsol bar mdzad do/_/kha cig gis ni mthong ba yang gsol bar mdzad do/_/kha cig gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa 'phel bar byed cing 'bebs par yang byed do/_/byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/_byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/_tshad 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]med pa'i yon tan nyid la yang rab tu 'jog par 'gyur ro/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mtha' yas shing mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams kyis yon tan rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/mthu chen po yang rab tu thob par 'gyur 
[\[246b.2\]]ro/_/de ltar 'di ni de'i 'jig rten gyi chos kyi tha ma yin no zhes bya'o/_/de ltar na yang sngags kyi spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med par rab 'byam rgya che ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med cing tshad med pas/_mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po chog pa med pa dam 
[\[246b.3\]]tshig chen po gsum gyi rdo rje zhes bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gsum rdo rje'i sgo nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang yin pas rdo rje 'chang las gsang ba'i snying 
[\[246b.4\]]po yang dag par bzung ba nyid ni sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkor gyi snying po 'di sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir dang /_bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir te/_'di gnyis ni sngags dang /_phyag rgya 
[\[246b.5\]]la spyod pa rnams la sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor bu chen po'i rgya mtsho'i mchod pa'i mchog bka' bzhin byed pa zhes gsungs so/_/sngags dang /_phyag rgya spyod pa 
[\[246b.6\]]zhes kyang gsungs so/_/g.yo ba med pa'i nor bu zhes kyang gsungs so/_/yon tan mtha' yas pa zhes kyang gsungs so/_/dam tshig srung ba po zhes kyang gsungs so/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i smon lam 'dzin pa po zhes kyang gsungs so/_/bstan 
[\[246b.7\]]pa srung ba po zhes kyang gsungs so/_/stobs chen po zhes kyang gsungs so/_/don yod pa 'di la som nyi dang bral bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la dad pas nan tan du bya'o/_/'dir de lta bu'i bstod pa rmad du byung ba gang bdag gis sngon 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]dbyangs su blangs pa de dbyangs su brjod pas de dang mthun pa'i dngos grub rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_ma hA kr-i pe b+h+yaH/_a sa ma a tsa lA/_sa ma tA sA ra/_d+harma Na kA ru Na At+ma ga dza gA tI duHkha hA ri NA/_a 
[\[247a.2\]]si man+d+ha/_sarba gu NA sid+d+hi d+ha yi no/_sa ma lA a tsa lA/_sa ma ba ra a gra/_d+harma Ni ga ga na sa mo pa ma ga tan bIr+ya te/_gu Na la sha re Na tu ka ti ke pya/_shi me ke sA d+ha sarba d+hA tu ba ra/_sid+d+hi da yaSh+Ti bi ga to/_u pA me Shu/_a sa man+ta/_sid+d+hi shu sa ta tA/_a 
[\[247a.3\]]ma la kA ru Na be ga to u t+thi ta pra Ni d+ha nA sid+d+hi ra ni ro d+ha d+harma tA/_dza ga to ar+thA sA d+ha na pa ra/_a sa ma n+tI nI/_sha ta tAM bi ro tsi ta ma hA kr-I pa At+ma nAM/_na ni ro d+ha twAM kA ru NA tsA ra ka/_a tsa la pra dza te tri lo ki/_d+ha ra sid+d+hi d+ha yi ka/_a mI tA a mI te Shu su sa ma pA ti tAM/_ga ti shwa 
[\[247a.4\]]bi/_a ho su d+harma tA/_tri sa ma ye a grA/_sid+d+hi ba ra d+ha n+te/_me ba ra d+ha/_na ta a gra ti ti ti taM/_sA d+ha sa ka lA tri lo ki ba ra d+ha a gra/_sa d+ha nA nA ar+thA/_s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA tI kA/_A nA pri tA/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a mo g+ha e hi/_a pra ti hA ta/_e hi a tsa lA/_tse TA 
[\[247a.5\]]a nan+tA kA Na tiSh+Tha/_tsa ru tsa ru/_ta Ti ta Ti/_tA Ta tA Ta/_big+h+nA na g+ha ta ya/_mA ra ya khA da ya/_s+pho Ta ya/_sha tA tAM tsa me/_a nu ban+d+ha A dz+nyA ku ru/_a sa ha d+ha na a gra/_ka TA ka TA/_he haM/_a ti bA lA/_e ho ma hA gu Na bi Sha NA/_na TA na TA/_A bi sha A bi 
[\[247a.6\]]sha_/a tsa la tse Ta sarba tra a nut+tA ra e ka tsa tA Ta tA Ta/_da mA da mA/_phaT phaT swA hA/_khro bo mi g.yo ba'i snying po'o/_/dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po chen po las thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rtog pa'i rgyal po 
[\[247a.7\]]chen po las thun mong gi cho ga rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[247b\]]
[\[248a\]]
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]{D503}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sap+ta ta thA ga ta pUrba pra Ni d+hA na bi she Sha bi s+t+wa ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas 
[\[248b.2\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing yangs pa can du byon te/_yangs pa can na rol mo'i sgra can gyi shing ljon pa'i drung na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 
[\[248b.3\]]'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[248b.4\]]chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blta na sdug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[248b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa legs par rnam par sems pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[248b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po chen po'i rtse 'dzin rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong 
[\[248b.7\]]dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_khyim bdag thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]mdun gyis bltas te/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po'i chos ston cing chos kyi gtam gyis sems can rnams tshim par mdzad/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 
[\[249a.2\]]'god par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[249a.3\]]btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[249a.4\]]dang /_mi dang /_mi ma lags pa mang po dag chos nyan pa'i slad du 'dus shing mchis lags na/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_thos na ci nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog 
[\[249a.5\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang /_bdud sdig can gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa dang /_
[\[249a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i gnas rnams bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni ma gzigs pa 'am/_ma gsan pa'am/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra 
[\[249a.7\]]rab snyed dag kyang dper na deng ngam sang gi ltar dgongs pa lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dang po byang chub kyi thugs yid la mdzad pa dang /_sngon gyi smon lam dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag brjod pa dang /_
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]yang dag par bstan par spyod na/_bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/_sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang /_sngon gyi smon lam 
[\[249b.2\]]gyi khyad par rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ka la ping ka'i sgra skad dang dbyangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/'jam 
[\[249b.3\]]dpal khyod snying rje dang ldan pa ste/_'jam dpal khyod kyis snying rje dpag tu med pa bskyed nas sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir ba/_mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs 
[\[249b.4\]]kyis gtses pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa ni yang legs so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis khyod kyi spobs pa 'di skyes so/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid 
[\[249b.5\]]la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[249b.6\]]zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zham ring ba byang 
[\[249b.7\]]chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni shin tu yongs su dag pa/_tha grur dpag tshad brgya stong du ma yod pa/_lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/_ngan song dang /_sdug bsngal gyi sgra med pa/_bud med kyi dngos po med pa/_tsher ma dang g.yang sa 
[\[250a.2\]]med pa/_ri dang /_rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med pa/_'jam pa/_sa'i ngos reg na bde ba/_lha'i dri bsung dang ldan pa/_lha'i rin po che'i shing ljon pa dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bus mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che'i seng ge'i khris legs par brgyan pa/_
[\[250a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' dag pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sa/_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig gis brgyan pa'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa'o/_/'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ni rdzus te 
[\[250a.4\]]skyes pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma las byung ba sha stag go/_/de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam thob shig_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 
[\[250a.5\]]legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po de thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na des smon lam chen po brgyad rgyun ma chad par btab bo/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs 
[\[250a.6\]]pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang la la dag na ba'i nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir te/_rims dang /_gshed byed dang /_byad dang /_ro langs dang /_'jigs pa rnams kyis 
[\[250a.7\]]gtses pa de dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming lan bdun brjod pas de dag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rims dang /_sdig pa can gyi gdon rnams med par gyur cig_/rab tu zhi bar gyur 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag long ba dang /_'on pa dang /_smyon pa dang /_sha bkra can dang /_
[\[250b.2\]]nad tshabs chen pos btab par gyur pa de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming lan bdun brjod pas de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dbang po thams cad yongs su tshang bar gyur cig_/sdug bsngal dang nad thams cad rgyun

[\[250b.4\]]gis bsgribs pa/_mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/_bya ba ma yin pa spyod pa mang ba/_dam pa'i chos spong ba/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs byed pa/_ngan song gsum dang /_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba de dag sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas sdug bsngal 
[\[250b.5\]]gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas de dag gi mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing yongs su zad par gyur cig_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[250b.6\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du su yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro bar ma gyur cig_/lha yul ba'i lha'i bde ba dang /_mi'i bde ba nyams su myong bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs 
[\[250b.7\]]pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang su dag dbul por gyur te/_zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mal cha dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgyan dang yo byad mi bdog pa de dag 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dbyig dang /_gos dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mal cha dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgyan dang yo byad 'phel bar gyur

[\[251a.3\]]tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir ba de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig_/lus

[\[251a.5\]]la gdung ba'i me 'bar ba dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_dom dang /_dred dang /_sbrul gdug pa'i nang du chud de/_srog la bab ste 'jigs skrag nas mgon med de/_smre sngags sna tshogs 'don pa de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi 
[\[251a.6\]]ming lan bdun yid kyis brjod pas de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lus la gdung ba'i me thams cad zhi bar gyur cig_/seng ge dang /_stag dang /_dom dang /_dred dang /_sbrul gdug pa de dag kyang byams pa la gnas par gyur cig_/'jigs pa med pa dang /_zhi

[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]rtsod pa dang /_'gyed par gyur te/_'khrugs shing 'jigs skrag nas dngangs pa de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming lan bdun yid kyis brjod pas de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa

[\[251b.3\]]pa de na/_sems can gang dag chu'i nang du son te/_grur zhugs pa gling med par phyin pa/_srog 'dod pa/_chu klung dang /_rgya mtsho'i nang du son te/_smre sngags sna tshogs 'don pa de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming yid kyis 
[\[251b.4\]]lan bdun brjod pas de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du chu klung chen po de las dbugs 'byin pa sbyin par gyur cig_/'jigs pa med par rgal bar gyur cig ces btab ste/_'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs

[\[251b.6\]]nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi gnas dang /_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro mdzad pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_zham ring

[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]yang brjod par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_rgyal po 'am/_blon po'am/_khyim bdag yon tan don du gnyer ba rnams kyis zhe sdang dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar de bzhin

[\[252a.3\]]'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i lung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[252a.4\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang /_zla ba dang /_pad+ma sa rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston cing /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la theg pa chen po'i 
[\[252a.5\]]gtam 'ba' zhig ston pa yod do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po brgyad btab bo/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang gi 
[\[252a.6\]]tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag zhing blas kyi las kyi mtha' dang tshong la dga' ste/_g.yeng ba sna tshogs mang bas dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams pa dang /_

[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du

[\[252b.3\]]byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig_/ngan song gsum dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[252b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgo nga las skyes pa'am/_mngal las skyes pa'am/_drod gsher las skyes pa'am/_rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can gang dag grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_
[\[252b.5\]]bkres pa dang /_skom pas lus yongs su gdungs shing sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyam thag pa de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming rna lam du grag cing de dag gis bdag gi ming dran pa dang /_brjod pas sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su byang bar gyur cig_/skye ba 
[\[252b.6\]]de yang tha ma par gyur cig_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skye ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig_/lha'i yul ba'i lha'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen 
[\[252b.7\]]po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bud med gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]gang zhing bud med kyi skye gnas la smod pa dang /_gang dag btsa' ba'i dus na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming rna lam du grag cing de dag gis bdag gi ming dran pa dang /_brjod pas tshor ba thams cad dang /_sdug 
[\[253a.2\]]bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig_/skye ba de yang tha ma par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du skyes pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[253a.3\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag 'chi ba'am/_dgra dang /_dgon pas gtses pa dang /_phan tshun du pha ma dang /_sring mo dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du'i mya ngan myong zhing sdug bsngal dang /_mya ngan gyi zug rngus lus la 
[\[253a.4\]]zug pa de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming rna lam du grag cing de dag gi rna lam du bdag gi ming grag pa dang /_kha ton du bton pas byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'chi ba dang /_dgra dang /_dgon pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/mya ngan dang /_
[\[253a.5\]]sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po lnga pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag mtshan mo mun pa mun nag na 
[\[253a.6\]]rnam par rgyu ba las kyi mtha' rnam pa sna tshogs la zhugs pa/_sdig pa can gyi gdon sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/_'jigs pas smre sngags sna tshogs 'don pa de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas byang 
[\[253a.7\]]chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du mun pa mun nag thams cad med par gyur cig_/sdig pa can gyi gdon thams cad byams pa la gnas par gyur cig_/mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par brtson par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]drug pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag dman pa la mos shing shes rab chung la dran pa rmongs te/_dge ba'i chos rnams dang /_stobs dang /_
[\[253b.2\]]byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa las yongs su nyams pa de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas de dag 
[\[253b.3\]]byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du ting nge 'dzin dang /_dran pa dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon du gyur cig_/shes rab chen po rjes su rgyu bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bdun pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 
[\[253b.4\]]'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag dman pa la mos shing nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'dod pa bskyed de/_de la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[253b.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur pa de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bla na med 
[\[253b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis la rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa ni gang 
[\[253b.7\]]gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po zad pa'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bar 'khrugs par 'gyur te ngu zhing mya ngan byed la sngon 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]gyi mi dge ba'i las kyi rgyus sdug bsngal myong zhing skyabs med mgon med pa'i sems can de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming yid la gnas shing /_bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod pas de dag sdug bsngal dang /_mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 
[\[254a.2\]]gyur cig_/bsil ba'i dngos po thob par gyur cig_/de nas shi 'phos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar gyur cig ces btab ste/_'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon 
[\[254a.3\]]lam chen po brgyad po de dag btab bo/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni mnyam pa/_tha gru 
[\[254a.4\]]che ba/_yangs pa/_lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/_lha'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_spos gtsang zhing skyon med pa dang /_lha'i spos dang /_me tog gis rab tu brgyan pa/_lha'i rol mo'i sgra skad dang /_glu'i nga ro 'byung ba/_lha'i rin po 
[\[254a.5\]]che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas legs par brgyan pa/_lha'i rin po che'i seng ge'i khris mdzes par byas pa/_lha'i rin po che'i rdzing gis rab tu brgyan pa/_sa gzhi 'jam zhing snyi ba/_ri dang /_rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_tsher ma med pa/_bud med kyi dngos po med pa/_nye 
[\[254a.6\]]ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sar gyur pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te byung ba/_lha'i rin po che'i rgyan dang gos kyis lus legs par brgyan pa sha stag go/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[254a.7\]]kyi zhing de na bsams ma thag pa tsam gyis gos dang /_zas dang /_skom dang /_mal cha dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_rgyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod thams cad dang /_sems can gyi 'tshog chas thams cad dang /_lha'i rin po che'i 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]longs spyod thams cad 'byung ste/_de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_rgyal po 'am/_rgyal bu dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po 
[\[254b.2\]]che dang /_zla ba dang /_pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan nyin lan gsum/_mtshan lan gsum du yid la bya/_rab tu gus par gzung bar bya/_dad par bya/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzugs kyang byed du gzhug_/
[\[254b.3\]]me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_mar me rnams kyis mchod par bya/_yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas la/_nyin bdun gtsang mar byas te sa phyogs gtsang mar gnas par bya/_sangs rgyas 
[\[254b.4\]]kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam gdab cing sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje ba'i sems su byas na/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa de dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa 
[\[254b.5\]]thams cad dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug srabs par 'gyur ro/_/yun ring du 'tsho zhing nad med par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[254b.6\]]gang bsams pa'i bsam pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[254b.7\]]zhing der pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon du 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin pa 'di ni de ltar yon tan mang po dang ldan 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]pa yin no/_/'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyis yongs su gang ba rin chen brtsegs pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[255a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor ba yod do/_/'jam dpal bcom 
[\[255a.3\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bzhi btab bo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa 
[\[255a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag srog gcod pa/_srog gcod pa'i mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa/_srog chags rnam pa sna tshogs kyi srog gcod pa de dag srog gcod pa byas pas tshe thung 
[\[255a.5\]]zhing nad mang ba dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_me dang /_nad sna tshogs kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas 'dzin pa dang /_mchod pas las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su byang ste tshe ring bar gyur cig_/nad med par gyur cig_/su yang dus ma 
[\[255a.6\]]yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par ma gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag sdig 
[\[255a.7\]]pa mi dge ba sna tshogs byas te/_gzhan gyi rdzas phrogs pas dbul po'i khyim du skyes te/_sgren mo dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pas lus yongs su gdungs shing sdug bsngal myong ba de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas bzung bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig_/dbang phyug phun sum tshogs shing ma tshang ba med pa thob par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na 
[\[255b.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag gcig la gcig kun du gnod sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun srog gcod pa byed pa dang /_'thab pa de dag gis bdag gi ming thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[255b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phan tshun pha ma ltar byams pa la gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[255b.4\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis bsgribs te/_tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur ba de dag sdig pa kun tu spyod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa dral bas ngan song gsum du ltung ba dang /_
[\[255b.5\]]sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi ming thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar gyur cig_/nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams 
[\[255b.6\]]dang bral bar gyur cig_/tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin cing /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid sdom pa la gnas par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig ces btab ste/_'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[255b.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag btab bo/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sa gzhi la rin po che'i spos sna tshogs gnas pa/_tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri dang ldan pa mnyam pa/_yangs pa tha gru che ba/_
[\[256a.2\]]tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/_lha'i nor bu dang /_mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang /_rin po che dpyangs pa/_lha'i nor bu rin po che'i rdzing spos chus yongs su gang bas mdzes par byas pa/_dar gyi lda ldi bres shing dpyangs pa/_rin 
[\[256a.3\]]po che'i skud pas mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bres pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba med pa/_bud med kyi dngos po med pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dag pa rnams kyis rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs ma blangs par sgra 
[\[256a.4\]]'byung ba/_sil snyan de dag las dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgra dang /_theg pa chen po'i gtam gyi sgra 'byung ba/_sgra de thos pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon 
[\[256a.5\]]lam gyi thabs mkhas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni de lta bu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[256a.6\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs te/_sems can 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis bsgribs pa rnams gzigs shing /_nad sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/_'chi ba dang /_dgra dang /_dgon 
[\[256a.7\]]pas gnod par gyur pa/_tshe bskal par thub pa'i sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba'i sems can rnams gzigs nas sems can de dag gi don dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir gzungs 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/_/ta d+ya tha/_sid+d+he sid+d+he/_su sid+d+he/_mo tsa ni/_mo k+Sha Ni/_muk+te/_bi muk+te/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_mA~M ga l+ye/_hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/_rat+na gar+b+he/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_pa ra ma ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_ma na se/_ma hA ma na se/_ad+b+hu te/_bI ta b+ha ye/_
[\[256b.2\]]su bar+N+Ne/_bra h+ma g+ho She/_brah+mA d+h+yu Shi te/_sarba ar+th+the Shu a pa rA dzi te/_sarba tra a pra ti ha te/_tsa tu Sh+Sha Sh+Thi b+hU ta ko Ti b+hA Shi te/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags 'di gsungs pa na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad dang /_brgya 
[\[256b.3\]]byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sdig pa thams cad bsal ba dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 
[\[256b.4\]]bgyi ba dang /_re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di lta bu 'di dag bka' stsal pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_rgyal po 'am/_rgyal 
[\[256b.5\]]bu'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma yon tan don du gnyer ba gang su'ang rung ste/_gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_dad par byed pa dang /_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sems can thams cad la 
[\[256b.6\]]snying rje ba'i sems yid la byed pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_mar me rnams kyis mchod pa gtsang mar byas te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan par byas na/_de'i mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang 
[\[256b.7\]]bar 'gyur/_'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur te/_pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_'chi ba dang /_dgra dang /_dgon pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_'chi ba'i dus 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]kyi tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par 'gyur/_re ba dang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[257a.2\]]mya ngan med pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod do/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[257a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/_tha gru che ba/_yangs pa/_mya ngan dang /_ngan song dang /_sdug bsngal gyi sgra med pa/_bud med kyi dngos po med pa/_sa gzhi 'jam zhing shin tu snyi ba/_lha'i 
[\[257a.4\]]spos kyis bdugs pa/_lha'i nor bu rin po che'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/_lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi rdzing spos chus yongs su gang ba/_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang ldan pa/_lha'i rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan gyi sgra 
[\[257a.5\]]dang ldan pa ste/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can ji lta ba bzhin du/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[257a.6\]]sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yi yon tan bkod pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad 
[\[257a.7\]]pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bzhi btab bo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag mya ngan dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa mang ba/_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba der sems can gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos la/_thos nas kyang yid la byed pa de dag bdag gi mthus mya ngan dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa 
[\[257b.2\]]thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/su yang sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar ma gyur cig_/tshe ring por gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[257b.3\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag sdig pa mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po bstir med pa chen po mun pa mun nag can du skyes pa de dag la bdag gi mthus/_bdag gi lus las 'od zer gyi snang ba 'di lta bu 
[\[257b.4\]]byung ste/_des sems can dmyal ba pa de dag la reg cing mthong ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad byang nas sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su thar bar gyur cig_/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig_/bla na med pa 
[\[257b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_lha dang mi'i bde ba rmyong bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[257b.6\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag sngon sdig pa mi dge ba byas te/_gzhan gyi rdzas phrogs pas dbul po dman pa'i khyim du skyes nas gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_rgyan mi bdog pa/_grang ba dang /_tsha ba'i sdug bsngal myong 
[\[257b.7\]]ba/_bkres pa dang /_skom pas lus gzir cing mdog ngan pa de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas brjod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bgo ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha thams cad la 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]yongs su spyod par gyur cig_/lus la lha'i lus kyi kha dog gis brgyan par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/_gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[258a.2\]]sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za rnams kyis gtses shing mdangs phrogs te nad kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs rmyong ba de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas bdag gi mthus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[258a.3\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha zas mdangs 'phrog pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/byams pa la gnas par gyur cig_/nad kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar gyur cig ces btab 
[\[258a.4\]]ste/_'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das des smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag btab bo/_/'jam dpal gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal de'i mtshan thos te nyin lan gsum mtshan 
[\[258a.5\]]lan gsum brjod pa dang /_sems can thams cad la byams par gnas par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la yang mchod pa byed pa de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/_mya ngan dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa thams 
[\[258a.6\]]cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_yun ring du 'tsho zhing nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur/_skye ba dran par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[258a.7\]]pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/_lha thams cad kyis rjes su bsrung bar 'gyur te/_'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan thos pa ni de ltar yon tan mang po dag dang ldan no/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]'das de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par/_nyan 
[\[258b.2\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis brjod par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[258b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod do/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de'i 
[\[258b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni shin tu yongs su dag pa/_mnyam pa/_dri ma med pa/_'od gsal ba/_an+da rnyil gyi rang bzhin can/_rtsig pa dang /_ra ba dang /_skar khung dang /_rta babs dang /_dra ba dang /_bag ma ni shel las grub pa/_sa gzhi lha'i rin po che'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas 
[\[258b.5\]]pa gser gyi skud pas mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bres pa/_rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la yang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres shing dpyangs pa/_lha'i dar gyi lda ldi dang /_lha'i me tog dang /_spos kyis mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing lha'i spos chus yongs su gang 
[\[258b.6\]]ba/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing bsgul ba na/_lha'i sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sems can thams cad yang dag par dga' bar byed pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi sgra skad 'byung ba/_lha'i sil snyan dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnams las theg pa 
[\[258b.7\]]chen po'i chos kyi sgra skad 'byung ba dang /_sems can gang dag gis chos kyi sgra de thos pa de dag 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ba/_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba'o/_'jam dpal 'jig rten 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]gyi khams de ni ngan song dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa/_bud med kyi dngos po med pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bzhi btab bo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_de'i smon lam chen po 
[\[259a.2\]]dang po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag log par lta ba can gyi khyim du skyes pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la sems ma dad pa/_byang 
[\[259a.3\]]chub kyi sems yid la byed pa las ring du gyur pa de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas/_bdag gi mthus las kyi sgrib pa de zad par gyur nas byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du yang dag pa'i lta ba can du gyur cig_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa 
[\[259a.4\]]dang ldan par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_
[\[259a.5\]]sems can gang dag gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_chos kyi sgra mi grag pa/_dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa/_yul mtha' 'khob dag tu skyes te/_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rgyus sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag de nas shi 'phos nas ngan song gsum du ltung zhing dge ba'i 
[\[259a.6\]]chos rnams las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de dag la bdag gi mthus bdag gi ming rna lam du grag cing chos kyi sprin dang /_rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byung bar gyur cig_/de dag gis chos kyi sgra de thos nas sngon gyi las zad par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du byang chub kyi 
[\[259a.7\]]sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag gos dang /_rgyan dang /_
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang bral zhing mi ldan pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong zhing sdig pa byed pa de dag bdag gi mthus gos dang /_rgyan dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_
[\[259b.2\]]yongs su spyad pa dang /_longs spyod rnams bsams ma thag tu 'byung zhing mi ldan pa med par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du su yang ci dang yang mi ldan pa med par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na 
[\[259b.3\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/_sems can gang dag sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas phan tshun 'thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed par gyur cing gcig la gcig gnod pa bya ba dang /_gsad par bya ba'i 
[\[259b.4\]]phyir brtul ba/_mtshon dang /_mda' dang /_dbyug pa dag gis bsnun pa de na gang dag gis de'i tshe bdag gi ming thos shing yid la gnas pa de dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi ming yid kyis brjod na mda' dang /_mtshon dang /_dbyug pa la sogs pa slar ldog par gyur cig_/
[\[259b.5\]]phyir phyogs par gyur cig_/dgra thams cad kyang byams pa la gnas par gyur cig_/su'i srog gi dbang po yang 'gag par ma gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rang rang gi rdzas dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dag gis chog shes par gyur cig ces btab 
[\[259b.6\]]ste/_'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag btab bo/_/'jam dpal gang la la zhig bcom ldan 
[\[259b.7\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de'i mtshan thos pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_dad par byed pa dang /_rab tu gus par mchod pa byed pa de sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_nam du yang byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang pa dang phrad par 'gyur/_rtag tu nad med cing tshe ring bar 'gyur/_

[\[260a.3\]]yo byad dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de'i mtshan 'dzin pa dang /_nyan pa de ni de ltar yon tan mang po dag 
[\[260a.4\]]dang ldan no/_/'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgya mtshor legs par gnas pa na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[260a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod do/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po

[\[260a.7\]]pa dang /_tshong byed pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa la spro ba dang /_sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag thams cad kyis/_bdag gi ming thos nas bdag gi mthus bsams ma thag tu 'tshog chas thams cad 'byor bar gyur cig_/gnod sems mang bar ma gyur cig_/rtag tu dge ba'i 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]chos spyod par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang su dag mi dge ba bcu'i

[\[260b.3\]]'gro bar ma gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang ji snyed cig gzhan gyi 
[\[260b.4\]]dbang du song ste/_chad pas bcad pa dang /_brdeg pa dang /_go rar gzhug pa dang /_gsad par 'os pa de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas/_bdag gi 'od kyis byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa de dag rgyun chad par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/

[\[260b.6\]]'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs byas te 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_bdag gi ming rna lam du grag par gyur cig_/de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lha dang 
[\[260b.7\]]mi'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig_/sdig pa'i las thams cad yongs su byang bar gyur cig ces btab ste/_'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa de 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag btab bo/_'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgya mtshor legs par gnas pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa na 
[\[261a.2\]]ci 'dra ba yod pa de 'dra'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po de dag gi mtshan thos la thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /_nang par langs nas yid la byed pa dang /_dad par byed pa dang /_
[\[261a.3\]]me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dag gis mchod pa dang /_glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_sems btud de 
[\[261a.4\]]gzhan las nyan pa dang /_chos smra ba de dag la yang 'tshog chas dang /_yo byad thams cad kyis mchod par byed pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//_//
[\[261a.5\]]'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa/_bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya ra 
[\[261a.6\]]snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[261a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po 'di dag btab bo/_/bcu gnyis 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]gang zhe na/_de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na/_bdag gi lus kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu 
[\[261b.2\]]med cing dpag gis mi lang ba dag lam me lhan ne lhang nger gyur cig_/sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan par gyur te/_bdag ci 'dra ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig 
[\[261b.3\]]ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/_lus nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar phyi nang shin tu yongs su 
[\[261b.4\]]dag pa dang /_dri ma med pa 'od gsal ba dang /_kho lag yangs shing che ba dang /_dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang /_legs par gnas pa dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rnams kyis legs par brgyan par gyur cig_/de na sems can gang dag 'jig rten 
[\[261b.5\]]gyi bar dag tu skyes pa dag dang /_gang dag yang mi'i 'jig rten 'di na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na phyogs tha dad par 'gro bde dag bdag gi 'od kyis phyogs rnams su dga' mgur 'gro bar gyur cig_/dge ba'i las rnams kyang byed par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon 
[\[261b.6\]]lam chen po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na/_bdag gi shes rab dang thabs dpag tu med pas sems can gyi khams dpag gis mi lang ba dag 
[\[261b.7\]]longs spyod mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur te/_su yang cis kyang brel ba med par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang dag lam ngan par zhugs pa de dag byang chub kyi lam la dgod par bya'o/_/nyan thos kyi lam du zhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la gzud par bya'o zhes btab 
[\[262a.2\]]bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po lnga pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang dag bdag gi ga na na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa dang /_
[\[262a.3\]]de bzhin du sems can gzhan dpag tu med cing /_dpag gis mi lang ba de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi ming thos nas/_bdag gi mthus sdom pa gsum gyis bsdams pa dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa med par gyur cig_/su yang tshul khrims log par zhugs 
[\[262a.4\]]te ngan 'gror 'gro bar ma gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po drug pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang su dag 
[\[262a.5\]]lus ngan pa dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba dang /_mdog mi sdug pa dang /_bems po dang /_yan lag skyon can dang /_sgur po dang /_sha bkra can dang /_zhar ba dang /_long ba dang /_'on pa dang /_smyon par gyur pa dang /_gzhan yang gang dag lus la nad kyis btab pa/_de dag gis 
[\[262a.6\]]bdag gi ming thos nas thams cad dbang po tshang zhing yan lag yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bdun pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag 
[\[262a.7\]]byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang su dag nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir ba/_skyabs med pa/_mgon med pa/_'tshog chas dang sman mi bdog pa/_dpung gnyen med pa/_dbul ba/_sdug bsngal ba gang dag gi rna lam du bdag gi ming grag pa de dag gi nad thams 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du nad med cing gnod pa med par gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[262b.2\]]sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na/_bud med gang la la bud med kyi skyon brgya dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa/_bud med kyi dngos po la smod pa/_bud med kyi skye gnas las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag bud med kyi dngos po las slar log par gyur 
[\[262b.3\]]cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du skyes pa'i dbang po 'byung bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po dgu pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag 
[\[262b.4\]]byang chub thob pa na sems can thams cad bdud kyi zhags pa rnams las yongs su thar bar bya'o/_/lta ba tha dad cing mi mthun pa zing zing bas mi mthun par gyur pa dag yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par bya'o/_/mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan par bya'o 
[\[262b.5\]]zhes btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bcu pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang su dag rgyal po'i 'jigs pas skrag 
[\[262b.6\]]pa dang /_gang dag bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_go rar gzhug pa dang /_gsad par 'os pa/_sgyu du mas kun du gtses pa/_nga rgyal dang bral ba/_lus dang ngag dang sems sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa de dag bdag gi bsod nams kyi mthus gnod pa thams cad las yongs su 
[\[262b.7\]]thar bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bcu gcig pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang su dag 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i me rab tu 'bar ba/_kha zas tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa/_sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag bdag gis kha dog dang /_dri dang ror ldan pa'i kha zas kyis lus tshim par byas te/_phyis chos kyi ros shin tu bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes 
[\[263a.2\]]btab bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i smon lam chen po bcu gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang su dag sgren mo/_/
[\[263a.3\]]bgo ba med pa/_dbul ba/_sdug bsngal ba/_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dag gis nyin mtshan du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag la bdag gis gos yongs su spyad par 'os pa/_tshon sna tshogs su kha sgyur ba dag sbyin par bya'o/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 
[\[263a.4\]]du rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang /_spud pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces btab ste/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 
[\[263a.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po de dag btab par gyur to/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal 
[\[263a.6\]]po de'i smon lam gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de ni bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par yang zad par byar mi nus so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/_rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med pa/_'dod pa'i 
[\[263a.7\]]skyon med pa/_ngan song dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra med pa/_bud med kyi dngos po med pa/_sa rdo dang /_rtsig pa dang /_ra ba dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung gi dra ba dang /_ba gam ni bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin can/_ka zhu ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can te/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]khams bde ba can ci 'dra ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+yar snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag gi nang na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[263b.2\]]gtso bo gnyis yod de/_gcig gi ming ni nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya/_gnyis pa'i ming ni zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya ste/_de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o/_/'jam 
[\[263b.3\]]dpal de lta bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam thob cig_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sems can so so'i skye bo gang dag dge ba dang /_mi dge 
[\[263b.4\]]ba mi shes pa dag yod de/_de dag ni chags pas zil gyis non pa/_sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi shes pa'o/_/de dag ni byis pa glen pa dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba/_nor sogs shing bsrung ba la mngon par brtson gyi/_sbyin pa yang dag par 'gyed 
[\[263b.5\]]pa la de dag gi sems mi 'gro ba ste/_sbyin pa'i dus nye bar gnas pa na rang gi lus kyi sha las bcad pa bzhin du yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/_/sems can de dag ni bdag nyid kyang du ma yongs su mi spyod na/_pha ma dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo la mi ster ba lta 
[\[263b.6\]]smos kyang ci dgos/_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gzhan slong ba rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_sems can de lta bu de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na dud 'gro'i 
[\[263b.7\]]skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas kyang rung /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas kyang rung ste/_der de bzhin 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur zhing dran ma thag tu rim gyis de nas shi 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas skrag nas yang 'dod pa'i yon tan dag don du mi gnyer ba dang /_sbyin 
[\[264a.2\]]pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/_rim gyis rang gi mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_sha dang /_khrag kyang slong ba rnams la rab tu sbyin par 'gyur na/_nor gyi gyi phung po 
[\[264a.3\]]gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dag yod de/_de dag tshul khrims log par zhugs shing lta ba log par zhugs nas gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa de dag ni tshul khrims tsam 
[\[264a.4\]]bsrung gi mang du thos pa yongs su mi tshol te/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams kyi don zab mo mi shes/_gang dag mang du thos pa de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du 'gyur te/_nga rgyal gyis non pas gzhan dag la phrag dog byed cing dam pa'i chos la dbang za bar 
[\[264a.5\]]'gyur/_spong bar 'gyur ro/_/mi blun po de lta bu de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs pa ste/_bdag kyang lam ngan par zhugs la sems can gzhan gang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag kyang g.yang sa chen por ltung bar byed pa'o/_/sems can de lta bu de dag ni sems can dmyal ba 
[\[264a.6\]]mi bzad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa/_de dag ni sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang der sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur 
[\[264a.7\]]te/_de dag de nas shi 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/_yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba'i bsam pa can du 'gyur ro/_/de dag khyim spangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas mthar gyis byang chub 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag bdag gi bsngags pa brjod cing phrag dog gis gzhan dag la mi snyan pa brjod pa yod de/_bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa'i sems can de dag ngan song gsum po dag tu lo stong 
[\[264b.2\]]phrag mang por sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag lo stong phrag du ma 'das nas de nas shi 'phos nas ba lang dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_bong bu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_lcug lcag dang dbyug lcag rnams kyis brdeg pa dang /_bkres pa 
[\[264b.3\]]dang /_skom pas lus nyen pa dang /_khal chen po bkal te lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te brgya la mi'i rnyed pa rnyed pa na yang rtag tu rigs dma' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_bran du 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na/_bcom ldan 
[\[264b.4\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_dbang po rno bar 'gyur/_mkhas pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_
[\[264b.5\]]yid gzhungs pa dang /_dge ba yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur/_bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa dang /_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i chu klung skems par 'gyur/_skye ba dang /_
[\[264b.6\]]rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag phra ma la mngon par dga' zhing /_sems can gang dag phan tshun 'thab pa dang /_rtsod 
[\[264b.7\]]pa dang /_'gyed par byed du 'jug pa dag yod de/_sems can de dag rnam par rtsod pa'i sems su gyur pas lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed do/_/gcig la gcig phan pa ma yin pa 'dod cing rtag tu phan tshun gnod par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]brtson te/_de dag nags tshal gyi lha dang /_shing gi lha dang /_ri'i lha 'gugs par byed/_dur khrod rnams su 'byung po tha dad pa dag 'gugs par byed/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod cing sha dang /_khrag za ba'i 
[\[265a.2\]]gnod sbyin dang /_srin po rnams mchod par byed de/_dgra bo de'i ming nas brjod pa'am/_gzugs byas nas der rig sngags drag po sgrub cing byad stems dang /_ro langs kyi sbyor bas srog gi bar chad bya ba dang /_lus rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa la gang dag gis bcom
