[\[265a.3\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag la gang gis kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus te/_de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_gnod sems med pa'i sems su gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rang rang gi 
[\[265a.4\]]bdog pas chog shes par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag dang /_gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas 
[\[265a.5\]]la nye bar gnas te/_lo gcig gam/_zla ba gsum du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams 'dzin cing gang dag gi bsam pas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nub phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar shog shig ces smon lam 
[\[265a.6\]]de lta bu btab pa dag las gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags nas lam ston par 'gyur te/_de dag der pad+ma tshon kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[265a.7\]]rnams la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la dag lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni der skyes nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de zad par mi 'gyur zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi'i 'jig rten 'dir gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du na yang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag 
[\[265b.2\]]dang /_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang po 'byor pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa dang /_g.yog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dpa' 
[\[265b.3\]]ba dang rtul phod pa dang /_tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos shing bzung ba de'i bud med kyi dngos po de tha ma pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[265b.4\]]nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gang dag mdo 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_glegs bam la bris te 
[\[265b.5\]]me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan rnams kyis bkur sti bgyid pa'i dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[265b.6\]]su bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/tha na rmi lam du yang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rna lam du nye bar bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/tshon sna lnga pa'i gos rnams kyis dkris te/_phyogs gtsang mar bzhag na gang na mdo sde 'di gnas pa der rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_lha bye ba khrag 
[\[265b.7\]]khrig brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan dang sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum par mi 'gyur/_sus kyang mdangs 'phrog mi nus te/_phrogs na 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]yang slar phrogs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/'jam dpal dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byed pa de dag gis 
[\[266a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzugs byas te/_nyin zhag bdun du 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas par bya kha zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lus legs par bkrus te/_gos bzang po dri ma med pa bgo zhing phyogs gtsang mar me tog sna tshogs sil 
[\[266a.3\]]ma bkram pa/_spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/_ras dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i sa phyogs su dri ma med pa'i sems dang /_rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang /_gnod sems med pa'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_
[\[266a.4\]]btang snyoms kyi sems dang /_mnyam pa'i sems su bya/_/rol mo'i sgra dang /_/sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs blang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la bskor ba bya ste/_de'i sngon gyi smon lam yang yid la bya zhing mdo sde 'di yang bstan na gang bsams pa dang /_gang smon 
[\[266a.5\]]pa'i bsam pa dang /_de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_gal te tshe ring bar smon na ni tshe ring por 'gyur ro/_/gal te longs spyod 'byor bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te dbang phyug dang ldan par smon na ni tshegs chung dus rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[266a.6\]]gal te bu 'dod na ni bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sdig pa can gyi rmi lam rmis sam gang du bya khwa dang /_ltas ngan mthong ngam/_gnas gang du bkra mi shis pa brgyad dag gnas par gyur pa la gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la 
[\[266a.7\]]mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkur sti byed na/_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mes 'jigs pa dang /_chus 'jigs pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang /_dug gis 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]g.yang sas 'jigs pa dang /_glang po che gtum pos 'jigs pa dang /_seng ges 'jigs pa dang /_stag gis 'jigs pa dang /_dom dang /_dred dang /_sbrul gdug pas 'jigs pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_rkang lag brgyad pas 'jigs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la 
[\[266b.2\]]mchod pa byas na 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang /_rkun pos 'jigs pa dang /_chom pos 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa bya'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang 
[\[266b.3\]]dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gsum la skyabs su 'dzin cing lha gzhan mi 'dzin pa dang /_gang dag yang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag 'dzin pa dang /_gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang /_gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa 
[\[266b.4\]]bslab pa'i gzhi bzhi brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang /_khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba'i dge slong gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi nyis brgya lnga bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang /_dge slong ma gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang /_gang dag ji ltar yongs su bzung ba'i bslab pa'i sdom pa de 
[\[266b.5\]]dag gi nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig las nyams par gyur te/_ngan 'gro ngan song gis 'jigs skrag pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/_de dag la ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal med par shes 
[\[266b.6\]]par bya'o/_/bud med gang la la bu btsa' ba'i dus na/_sdug bsngal ma rungs pa drag po mi bzad pa myong ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod na de myur du yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_bu yang yan lag yongs su tshang bar btsa' zhing 
[\[266b.7\]]gzugs bzang ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_blta na sdug pa dang /_dbang po rno ba dang /_blo dang ldan pa dang /_nad med cing gnod pa nyung bar 'gyur te/_de la mi ma yin pas mdangs 'phrogs par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]pa/_kun dga' bo gang gi phyi rang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i yon tan brjod par khyod dad dam yid ches sam/_yang na khyod sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo 'di la yid gnyis sam/_som nyi'am/_the tsom za 
[\[267a.2\]]ba med dam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs ba'i chos rnams la yid gnyis sam/_som nyi'am/_the tsom 'tshal ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[267a.3\]]zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi kun du spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gdugs dang /_dgung zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis ni dogs la ltung yang gda'/_ri'i rgyal po 
[\[267a.4\]]ri rab ni gnas nas 'pho yang gda'i/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' ni gzhan du mi 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags kyis kyang sems can dad pa'i dbang po dang bral bdag mchis te/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'di thos na de 
[\[267a.5\]]dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'di dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar shin tu yon tan dang phan yon du 'gyur snyam nas/_de dag mi dad cing yid mi ches te spong bas yun ring por gnod pa dang /_mi sman pa dang /_mi bde ba dang /_log par 
[\[267a.6\]]ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan su'i rna lam du grag par gyur pa de ngan 'gro ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni gnas med de go skabs ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni yid 
[\[267a.7\]]ches par dka' ba'o/_/kun dga' bo khyod dad cing yid ches pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin par blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ma gtogs par 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo mir 'gyur ba rnyed pa ni rnyed par dka'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus pa yang rnyed par dka'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa yang rnyed par shin tu dka'o/_/kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla 
[\[267b.2\]]bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni tshad med do/_/thabs la mkhas pa yang tshad med do/_/smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang tshad med do/_/nga de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par rgya cher yang 
[\[267b.3\]]dag par bshad par 'dod kyang bskal pa zad par 'gyur gyi/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mtha' rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[267b.4\]]dpa' chen po skyabs grol zhes bya ba stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[267b.5\]]'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can bro nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir te/_yun ring po'i bro nad kyis lus kyi shabs shing /_bkres pa dang /_skom pas gre ba dang mchu ni skams/_'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs/_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_snag 
[\[267b.6\]]gi gnyen mtshams ngu ba rnams kyis ni bskor/_phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong /_gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni drangs te/_de'i lus 'di na nyal yang rnam par shes pa chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing /_mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha slad bzhin 'brang ba gang 
[\[267b.7\]]lags pa des ni des dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa de thams cad legs par yi ger bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul ba dang /_chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes de la dris shing brtags nas dge ba'am/_mi dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo ba la/_
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]gang dag nad pa de'i don du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la skyabs su mchis zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa bgyid na/_de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing rmi lam rmis pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyis 'tshal 
[\[268a.2\]]ba'i gnas der mchis te/_yang na ni gdugs bdun/_yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig_/yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga/_yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing dran pa rnyed la/_de la dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par 
[\[268a.3\]]smin pa bdag nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur te/_srog gi slad du yang sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do/_/de lta lags pas dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos byang chub sems 
[\[268a.4\]]dpa' skyabs grol la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la ji ltar mchod par bya/_byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag nad chen po las 
[\[268a.5\]]yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis nad pa de'i don du nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong gi sdom pa blang bar bya'o/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang /_skom rnams dang /_yo byad thams cad kyis ci nus su mchod pa dang /_rim gro 
[\[268a.6\]]bya'o/_/nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan yid la bya'o/_/mdo 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu gdon par bya'o/_/zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me bud par bya'o/_/sku gzugs 
[\[268a.7\]]bdun bya'o/_/sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar yang mar me bdun bdun bzhag go/_/mar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du bya ste/_ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me mi zad par bya'o/_/tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o/_/
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la nad kyi gnod pa 'am/_rang gi dmag tshogs sam/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa 'am/_rgyu skar gyi gnod pa'am/_gza' zla ba'i gnod pa'am/_gza' nyi ma'i gnod 
[\[268b.2\]]pa'am/_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char gyi gnod pa'am/_than pa'i gnod pa yang rung ste/_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems 
[\[268b.3\]]su bya/_btson du bzung ba rnams gtang bar bya zhing gong du smos pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la de lta bur mchod par byas na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[268b.4\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis yul bde ba dang /_lo legs par 'gyur/_rlung dang /_char dus su ldang zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur/_yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang nad med pa dang /_
[\[268b.5\]]bde ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ro/_/yul der gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za ma rungs pas sems can rnams la gtse bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ltas ngan pa thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas 
[\[268b.6\]]dbang bskur ba de'i tshe dang /_mdog dang /_stobs dang /_nad med pa dang /_dbang phyug rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na tshe yongs su 
[\[268b.7\]]zad nas yang mngon par skye/_byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu yod par khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las ma thos sam/_de'i phyir sngags dang sman gyi sbyor ba rnams bstan to/_/sems can nad 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]kyis btab la de nad tshabs mi ches kyang sman dang /_rim gro byed pa dang mi ldan nam/_yang na sman pa sman ma yin pa byed pa yang yod de 'di ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang po'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba gnyis pa ni gang rgyal po'i chad pas 'chi ba'i dus byed 
[\[269a.2\]]pa'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba gsum pa ni gang dag ha cang bag med de/_bag med par gnas pa de dag la mi ma yin pa dag gis mdangs 'phrog pa'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzhi pa ni gang dag mes tshig ste 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba lnga 
[\[269a.3\]]pa ni gang dag chus 'chi ba'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba drug pa ni gang dag seng ge dang /_stag dang /_wa dang /_sbrul dang /_gcan gzan khro bo'i nang du chud de 'chi ba'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba bdun pa ni gang dag ri ka nas g.yang du lhung ba'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba 
[\[269a.4\]]brgyad pa ni gang dag dug dang /_byad stems dang /_ro langs kyi sbyor bas gsod pa'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu pa ni gang dag zas dang skom ma rnyed nas bkres pa dang /_skom pas nyen te 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o/_/mdor na 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dus ma 
[\[269a.5\]]yin par 'chi ba chen por bstan pa ste/_gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni grangs med dpag tu med do/_/de nas 'khor der gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis 'dus par gyur te/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ci 'jigs dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje 
[\[269a.6\]]dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 
[\[269a.7\]]chen po btung 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed de/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po de dag go/_/
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po re re la yang g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum bdun 'bum yod pa ste/_de dag gis tshig gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[269b.2\]]pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos te/_bdag cag la yang ngan 'gror mchi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/des na bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/dge 'dun 
[\[269b.3\]]la skyabs su mchi'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o/_/bye brag tu ni grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_dgon pa'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang /_gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[269b.4\]]sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_rim gro bgyid pa'i sems can de dag la bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/_gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[269b.5\]]rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag gang gi phyir khyod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la byas pa gzo zhing 
[\[269b.6\]]rjes su dran la sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu shes rab chung ngu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[269b.7\]]pa de dag gi mtshan thos pa dang /_bzung ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha'i bu blo gros chung ngu de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[270a.2\]]thams cad rab tu g.yos so/_/lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /_me tog gi sprin gyi char yang bab bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dag kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gshegs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lha'i 
[\[270a.3\]]seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni bskor/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[270a.4\]]rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor te chos ston cing /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang thabs cig tu kun tu snang ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[270a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la/_legs so legs so zhes gsol nas 'khor de thams cad kyis rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams las nges par byung ba'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_spud pa dang /_rgyan rnams 
[\[270a.6\]]dang /_lha'i rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mngon par mchod de/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par dang 
[\[270a.7\]]thabs la mkhas pa ni ngo mtshar du bgyi ba lags te/_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu thob par gyur cig_/ces sems can de dag thams cad kyis smon lam de skad btab bo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]langs te/_thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs dang /_thabs la mkhas 
[\[270b.2\]]pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/yang bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slad mi'i tshe/_slad ma'i dus na sems can bsod nams chung ba bro nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir ba/_gnod sems su gyur 
[\[270b.3\]]pa/_gza' dang /_rgyu skar gyi gnod pa byung ba/_'chi ba dang /_dgra dang /_dgon pas gnod par gyur pa thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad las bskyab pa dang /_mgon bgyi ba dang /_sems can de dag gis bcangs sam/_bklags sam/_yi ger 
[\[270b.4\]]'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir stsol tam/_'don na de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_log par ltung bar mi mchi ba dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum 
[\[270b.5\]]par mi 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi tshig de lta bu bshad du gsol/_de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/_legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_'jam dpal legs 
[\[270b.6\]]so legs so/_/'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi don dang snying rje ba'i phyir/_khyod kyi spobs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis skyes so/_/yang legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[270b.7\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa'i bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs yod de/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo sems can thams cad snying rje ba'i sems kyis gzungs de bzung ngam/_bklags sam/_mchod na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_de bzhin 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]gshegs pas dgongs shing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur/_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[271a.2\]]gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bgyi ba'i gzungs de gang lags/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gsung dbyangs gcig gis gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/tad+ya thA/_g+hu me g+hu me/_i mi/_ni mi hi/_ma ti ma ti/_sap+ta ta thA ga ta sa mA 
[\[271a.3\]]d+h+ya d+hi Sh+Thi te/_a ti ma te/_pA le/_pA pa~M sho d+ha ni/_sarba pA pa~M nA sha ya/_ma ma bud+he/_bud+d+hot+ta me/_u me/_ku me/_bud+d+ha k+She tra pa ri sho d+ha ni/_d+ha me/_ni d+ha me/_me ru me ru/_me ru shi kha re/_sarba a kA la mr-i t+yu ni bA ra Ni/_bud+d+he su bud+d+he bud+d+hA d+hiSh+ThI na/_rak+Sha n+tu me/_sarba 
[\[271a.4\]]de bA/_sa me a sa me sa ma n+wA ha ran+tu me/_sarba bud+d+ha/_bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_sha me sha me/_pra sha man+tu me sarba i t+yu pa dra ba byA d+ha yaH/_pU ra Ni pU ra Ni/_pU ra ya me/_sarba A shA ya bai DUr+ya pra ti b+hA se sarba pA paM k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/_gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa'i tshe snang ba 
[\[271a.5\]]chen po byung ste/_sa chen po g.yos nas rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dag snang ngo /_/'khor ji ltar lhags pa des kyang lha'i spos dang /_bdug pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod nas/_legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_lan bdun bskor 
[\[271a.6\]]ba byas so/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig_/gzungs 'di 'chang ngam/_klog gam/_mchod dam/_gtsang mar byas te/_phyogs gtsang mar 'phags 
[\[271a.7\]]pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan par byas la/_sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying rje bas/_des de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dag gi sku gzugs byas la/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_spos dang /_
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]phreng ba dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing /_nyi ma bdun du 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad la gnas te/_gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag lan stong rtsa brgyad du bton na/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgongs 
[\[271b.2\]]par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems par 'gyur/_rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyang yang dag par bsrung bar 'gyur/_lha thams cad dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa thams cad dang /_rgyal po bzhi po dag gis kyang yongs su 
[\[271b.3\]]bskyang bar 'gyur/_mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur/_nad thams cad kyis mi btab par 'gyur/_ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar 
[\[271b.4\]]bar 'gyur/_'chi ba dang /_dgra dang /_dgon pa'i gnod pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_dgra thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur/_ci bsams pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[271b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[271b.6\]]'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang thos/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mngon du mthong ste mchod pa bgyis so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na de bzhin 
[\[271b.7\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang /_gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag spyod pa der/_bdag cag g.yog dang bcas te mchi bar bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod par bgyid pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]yi ger 'drir stsol ba der bdag cag mthun par lhan cig tu mchis te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_rgyal po 'am/_rgyal po'i blon po mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa dang /_'dri ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 
[\[272a.2\]]kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_phyogs kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/'chi ba dang /_dgra dang /_dgon pa'i gnod pa dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sems can 
[\[272a.3\]]thams cad la byams pa dang /_byas pa gzo ba lags te/_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o/_/'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bsams pa dang /_sems dang 
[\[272a.4\]]yid bde ba dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dang /_nor dang /_'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyi'o/_/dus thams cad du bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rang gi bro bor ba dang /_dam bcas pa 'di dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[272a.5\]]mo des rjes su dran par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a g+hu/_ma g+hu/_ta ra g+hu/_ma ma g+hu/_g+hu re/_hA hU he/_mra mra mra mra/_dzu dzu ri/_dzu ri swA hA/_gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams dang /_gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[272a.6\]]yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_rab tu gus par mchod pa bgyid pa de ni ngan song gsum du mi mchi bar rig par bgyi ste/_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur/_ji ltar 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 
[\[272a.7\]]dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur/_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]gsol to/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi don du/_bdag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams rab tu stsal bar bgyi yis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_
[\[272b.2\]]de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsung gcig gis/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/lag na rdo rje khyod la dgongs zin gyis/_mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin 
[\[272b.3\]]pa de dag la phan par 'dod pa dang /_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag smros shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras 
[\[272b.4\]]so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje 'dzin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM badzre badzre/_ma hA badzre/_badzra pA sha d+hA ra NI/_sa ma sa ma/_sa man+ta/_a pra ti ha ta badzre/_sha ma sha ma/_
[\[272b.5\]]pra sha man+tu/_sarba byA d+ha yaH/_ku ru ku ru sarba karmA Ni/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_b+ha ga bA na badzra pA Ni/_sarba A shA ma me pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas 
[\[272b.6\]]pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa de'i re ba thams cad bdag gis yongs su bskang bar bgyi/_don thams cad kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/gal te des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'drir stsal bar 
[\[272b.7\]]bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi sku gzugs bdun kyang bgyi/_rdo rje 'dzin kyang sku gdung dang bcas par bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yang ji skad gong du smos pa bzhin du/_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]phreng ba dang /_rgyan dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa rnams kyis mchod de bskor bar bgyi/_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang gdon par bgyi/_sems can thams cad la yang phan 
[\[273a.2\]]pa'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems su bgyi/_'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas te/_lan gsum khrus bgyi zhing /_gos lan gsum brje bar bgyi/_tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/_zla ba phyi ma [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga 
[\[273a.3\]]nya'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/_de dag la bdag gis rmi lam du mthong ba stsal bar bgyi/_'bel ba'i bka' mchid kyang bgyi/_re ba thams cad kyang yongs su bskang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[273a.4\]]dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_lag na rdo rje khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag legs par smras pa/_legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 
[\[273a.5\]]gis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje nged kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i phyir/_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas 
[\[273a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bos te bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag khyed la chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di rjes su gtad kyis/_khyed kyis ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam 
[\[273a.7\]]grangs chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs pa/_sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/_re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba 'di phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/_sems can bsod nams chung ngu /_dam pa'i chos spong ba/_'phags 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams kyi lag tu myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar srungs shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[273b.2\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir/_
[\[273b.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/las kyi sgrib 
[\[273b.4\]]pa thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing /_re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis kyis dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal 
[\[273b.5\]]gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[273b.6\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo brgyad brgya pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_
[\[273b.7\]]shi lan+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]{D504}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya b+ha ga bAn b+hai Sha dz+ye gu ru bai DUr+ya pra b+has+ya pUr+b+ba pra Ni d+hA na bi she Sha bi stA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_
[\[274a.2\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing yangs pa can du byon te/_yangs pa can na rol mo'i sgra can gyi shing ljon pa'i drung na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 
[\[274a.3\]]slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong dang yang thabs cig tu rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams dang /_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am 
[\[274a.4\]]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs 
[\[274a.5\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang thos pas sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba dang /_slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus su dam pa'i chos ltar 
[\[274a.6\]]bcos pa 'byung ba na/_sems can de dag rjes su gzung ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[274a.7\]]la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis snying rje dpag tu med pa bskyed nas sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa rnams dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]phyir gsol ba 'debs pa ni legs so/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[274b.2\]]'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+yar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[274b.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla 
[\[274b.4\]]bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de/_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po 'di dag btab bo/_/bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_de'i smon lam chen 
[\[274b.5\]]po dang po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag gi lus kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med cing dpag gis mi lang ba dag lham me lhan ne lhang nger 
[\[274b.6\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan par gyur te/_bdag ci 'dra ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen 
[\[274b.7\]]po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/_lus nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa dang /_dri ma 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]med la 'od gsal ba dang /_kho lag yangs shing che ba dang /_dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang /_legs par gnas pa dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rnams kyis legs par brgyan par gyur cig_/de na sems can 
[\[275a.2\]]gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar du skyes pa dag dang /_gang dag yang mi'i 'jig rten 'di na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na phyogs tha dad par 'gro ba de dag bdag gi 'od kyis phyogs dga' mgur 'gro bar gyur cig_/las rnams kyang byed par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/
[\[275a.3\]]de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/_bdag gi shes rab dang thabs dpag tu med pas sems can gyi khams 
[\[275a.4\]]dpag gis mi lang ba dag longs spyod mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur te/_su yang cis kyang brel ba med par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[275a.5\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang dag lam ngan par zhugs pa de dag byang chub kyi lam la dgod par bya'o/_/nyan thos kyi lam du zhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la 
[\[275a.6\]]gzud par spyad par bya'o zhes btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po lnga pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang dag bdag gi gnan 
[\[275a.7\]]tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du sems can gzhan dpag tu med cing dpag gis mi lang ba de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi ming thos nas/_bdag gi mthus sdom pa gsum gyis bsdams pa dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa med par gyur cig_/su yang 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]tshul khrims log par zhugs te/_ngan 'gror 'gro bar ma gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po drug pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag 
[\[275b.2\]]byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang su dag lus ngan pa dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba dang /_mdog mi sdug pa dang /_bems po dang /_yan lag skyon can dang /_sgur po dang /_sha bkra can dang /_zhar ba dang /_long ba dang /_'on pa dang /_smyon par 
[\[275b.3\]]gyur pa dang /_gzhan yang gang su dag lus la nad kyis btab pa de dag gis bdag gi ming thos nas thams cad dbang po tshang zhing yan lag yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bdun pa ni/_gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus 
[\[275b.4\]]na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can gang su dag nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/_skyabs med pa/_mgon med pa/_'tshog chas dang /_sman mi bdog pa/_dpung 
[\[275b.5\]]gnyen med pa/_dbul ba/_sdug bsngal ba gang dag gi rna lam du bdag gi ming grag pa de dag ni nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du nad med cing gnod pa med par gnas par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po 
[\[275b.6\]]brgyad pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/_bud med gang la la bud med kyi skyon brgya dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa/_bud med kyi 
[\[275b.7\]]dngos po la smod pa/_bud med kyi skye gnas las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag bud med kyi dngos po las log par gyur cig_/byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po dgu pa ni gang gi tshe bdag 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/_sems can thams cad bdud kyi zhags pa rnams las yongs su thar bar bya'o/_/lta ba tha dad pa mi mthun 
[\[276a.2\]]pa zing zing bas mi mthun par gyur pa dag yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par bya'o/_/mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan par bya'o zhes btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bcu pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[276a.3\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can gang su dag rgyal po'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang /_gang dag bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_go rar gzhug pa dang /_gsad par 'os pa/_sgyu du mas kun tu gtses 
[\[276a.4\]]pa/_nga rgyal dang bral ba lus dang ngag dang sems sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa de dag bdag gi bsod nams kyi mthus gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de'i smon lam chen po bcu gcig pa ni/_gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med 
[\[276a.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can gang su dag bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i me rab tu 'bar ba/_kha zas tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa/_sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag bdag gis kha 
[\[276a.6\]]dog dang /_dri dang /_ror ldan pa'i kha zas kyis lus tshim par byas te/_phyis chos kyi ros shin tu bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes btab bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i smon lam chen po bcu gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[276a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/_sems can gang su dag sgren mo bgo ba med pa dbul ba/_sdug bsngal ba/_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dag gis nyin mtshan du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba dag la 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]bdag gis gos yongs su spyad par 'os pa tshon sna tshogs su kha bsgyur ba dag sbyin par bya'o/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang /_spud pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa 
[\[276b.2\]]rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[276b.3\]]spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po de dag btab par gyur to/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i smon lam gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de ni bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las 
[\[276b.4\]]lhag par yang zad par byar mi nus so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/_rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med pa/_'dod pa'i skyon med pa/_ngan song dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra med pa/_bud med kyi dngos po med pa/_sa dang /_rtsig pa dang /_ra ba 
[\[276b.5\]]dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung gi dra ba dang /_ba gam ni bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin can/_pu shu ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can te/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can ci 'dra ba de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya ra snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod 
[\[276b.6\]]pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag gi nang na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtso bo gnyis yod de/_gcig gi ming ni nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya/_gnyis pa'i ming ni 
[\[276b.7\]]zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya ste/_de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]lam thob cig_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sems can so so'i skye bo gang dag dge ba dang mi dge ba mi shes pa dag yod de/_de dag ni chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/_sbyin 
[\[277a.2\]]pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi shes pa'o/_/de dag ni byis pa/_glen pa/_dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba/_nor sog cing /_srung ba la mngon par brtson gyi/_sbyin pa yang dag par 'gyed pa la de dag gi sems mi 'gro ba ste/_sbyin pa'i dus nye 
[\[277a.3\]]bar gnas pa na rang gi lus kyi sha las bcad pa bzhin du yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag ni bdag nyid kyang du ma yongs su mi spyod na pha ma dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo la mi ster ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed 
[\[277a.4\]]pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gzhan slong ba rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_sems can de lta bu de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/_yang na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na/_
[\[277a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas kyang rung /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas kyang rung ste/_der de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur zhing dran ma thag pa tsam gyis 
[\[277a.6\]]de nas shi 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas skrag nas yang 'dod pa'i yon tan dag don du mi gnyer ba dang /_sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_bdog pa 
[\[277a.7\]]thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur te/_rim gyis rang gi mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_sha dang /_khrag kyang slong ba rnams la rab tu sbyin par 'gyur na/_nor gyi phung po gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i gnas 'jig pa dag yod de/_de dag tshul khrims log par zhugs shing lta ba log par zhugs nas/_gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa de dag ni tshul khrims srung gi mang du thos pa yongs su mi tshol te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[277b.2\]]pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams kyi don zab mo mi shes/_gang dag mang du thos pa de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur te/_nga rgyal gyis non pas gzhan dag la phrag dog byed cing dam pa'i chos la dbang za bar 'gyur/_spong bar 'gyur ro/_/mi blun po de lta bu de dag ni 
[\[277b.3\]]bdud kyi phyogs pa ste/_bdag kyang lam ngan par zhugs la sems can gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag kyang g.yang sa chen por lhung bar byed pa'o/_/sems can de lta bu de dag ni sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sngon mir gyur 
[\[277b.4\]]pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang der sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur te/_de dag de nas shi 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye 
[\[277b.5\]]bar 'gyur/_yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba'i bsam pa can du 'gyur ro/_/de dag khyim spangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 
[\[277b.6\]]gzhan yang sems can gang dag bdag gi bsngags pa brjod cing phrag dog gis gzhan dag la mi snyan par rjod pa yod de/_bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa'i sems can de dag ngan song gsum po dag tu lo stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag 
[\[277b.7\]]lo stong phrag du ma 'das nas de nas shi 'phos nas ba lang dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_bong bu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_lcug lcag dang /_dbyug lcag rnams kyis brdeg pa dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pas lus nyen pa dang /_
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]khal chen po bkal te lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te brgya la mi'i skye ba rnyed na yang rtag tu rigs dma' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bran du 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[278a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa/_de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_dbang po rno bar 'gyur/_mkhas pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_dge ba yongs 
[\[278a.3\]]su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur/_bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa dang /_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i chu klung skems par 'gyur/_skye ba dang /_rga shi 
[\[278a.4\]]dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag phra ma la mngon par dga' zhing sems can gang dag phan tshun 'thab 
[\[278a.5\]]pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed par byed du 'jug pa dag yod de/_sems can de dag rnam par rtsod pa'i sems su gyur pas lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyis mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed do/_/gcig la gcig phan pa ma yin pa 'dod cing rtag tu phan 
[\[278a.6\]]tshun gnod par bya ba'i phyir brtson te/_de dag nags tshal gyi lha dang /_shing gi lha dang /_ri'i lha 'gugs par byed/_dur khrod rnams su 'byung po tha dad pa dag 'gugs par byed/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod cing sha dang 
[\[278a.7\]]khrag za ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po rnams mchod par byed de/_dgra bo de'i ming nas brjod pa'am/_gzugs byas nas der rig sngags drag po sgrub cing /_byad stems dang /_ro langs kyi sbyor bas srog gi bar chad bya ba dang /_lus rnam par gzhig par 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]'dod pa la gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag la gang gis kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus te/_de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_gnod pa'i sems 
[\[278b.2\]]med pa'i sems su gnas par 'gyur/_rang rang gi bdog pas chog shes par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag dang /_gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[278b.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang dag yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas te/_lo gcig gam/_zla ba gsum du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams 'dzin cing gang dag gis bsam pas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nub phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med 
[\[278b.4\]]bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar shog shig ces smon lam de lta bu btab pa dag las/_gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad rdzu 
[\[278b.5\]]'phrul gyis lhags nas lam ston par 'gyur te/_de dag der pad+ma tshon kha dog sna tshogs rnams las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la dag lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni der skyes nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de zad par mi 'gyur zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 
[\[278b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi'i 'jig rten 'dir gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du na yang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i 
[\[278b.7\]]khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang /_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang po 'byor pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dbang 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]phyug phun sum tshogs pa dang /_g.yog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dpa' ba dang /_rtul phod pa dang /_tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos shing bzung ba de'i bud 
[\[279a.2\]]med kyi dngos po de tha ma yin par shes par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/_gang dag mdo 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[279a.3\]]dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_glegs bam la bris te me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan rnams kyis bkur sti bgyid pa'i dad pa'i rigs 
[\[279a.4\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/tha na rmi lam du yangs ngas rgyas kyi mtshan rna lam du nye bar bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/tshon sna lnga pa'i 
[\[279a.5\]]gos rnams kyis dkris te phyogs gtsang mar bzhag na/_gang na mdo sde 'di gnas pa der rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od 
[\[279a.6\]]de'i mtshan dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum par mi 'gyur/_sus kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus te/_phrogs na yang slar 'phrog par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[279a.7\]]de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/'jam dpal dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzugs bya/_nyin zhag bdun du 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas par bya/_kha zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lus legs par bkrus te/_gos bzang po dri ma med pa bgo zhing phyogs gtsang mar me tog sna tshogs sil ma bkram pa/_spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/_ras dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[279b.2\]]sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i sa phyogs su dri ma med pa'i sems dang /_rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang /_gnod sems med pa'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_btang snyoms kyi sems dang /_mnyam pa'i sems su bya/_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil 
[\[279b.3\]]snyan dang /_glu dbyangs blang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la bskor ba byas te/_de'i sngon gyi smon lam yang yid la bya zhing mdo 'di yang bstan na gang bsams pa dang /_gang smon pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_gal te tshe ring 
[\[279b.4\]]bar smon na ni tshe ring por 'gyur ro/_/gal te longs spyod dang ldan par smon na ni longs spyod 'byor par 'gyur ro/_/gal te dbang phyug dang ldan par smon na ni tshegs chung dus rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te bu 'dod na na ni bu rnyid par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sdig pa can gyi rmi 
[\[279b.5\]]lam rmis sam/_gang du bya khwa ta dang /_ltas ngan pa mthong ngam/_gnas gang du bkra mi shis pa brgya dag gnas par gyur pa la/_gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkur sti byed na rmi lam ngan 
[\[279b.6\]]pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mes 'jigs pa dang /_chus 'jigs pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang /_dug gis 'jigs pa dang /_g.yang sas 'jigs pa dang /_glang po che gtum pos 
[\[279b.7\]]'jigs pa dang /_seng ges 'jigs pa dang /_stag gis 'jigs pa dang /_dom dang /_dred dang /_sbrul gdug pas 'jigs pa dang /_sbrul dang /_sdig pa dang /_rkang lag brgya pas 'jigs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas na 'jigs pa 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang /_rkun pos 'jigs pa dang /_chom pos 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa bya'o/_/'jam dpal 
[\[280a.2\]]gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'dzin cing /_lha gzhan mi 'dzin pa dang /_gang dag yang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag 'dzin pa dang /_gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi bcu po dag 'dzin 
[\[280a.3\]]pa dang /_gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bzhi brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang /_khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba'i dge slong gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi nyis brgya lnga bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang /_dge slong ma gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[280a.4\]]gang dag ji ltar yongs su bzung ba'i bslab pa'i sdom pa de dag gi nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig las nyams par gyur te/_ngan 'gro ngan song gis 'jigs skrag pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna 
[\[280a.5\]]tshogs byed na/_de dag la ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal med par shes par bya'o/_/bud med gang la la bu btsa' ba'i dus na sdug bsngal ma rungs pa drag po mi bzad pa myong ba des/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod na/_de myur du 
[\[280a.6\]]yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_bu yang yan lag yongs su tshang bar btsa' zhing gzugs bzang ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_blta na sdug pa dang /_dbang po rno ba dang /_blo dang ldan pa dang /_nad med cing gnod pa nyung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la mi ma yin pas mdangs 'phrog par 
[\[280a.7\]]mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang gi phyir nga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i yon tan brjod par khyod dad dam yid ches sam/_yang na khyod sangs rgyas kyi spyod 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]yul zab mo 'di la yid gnyis sam/_som nyi 'am/_the tshom za ba med dam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[280b.2\]]gsungs pa'i chos rnams la yid gnyis sam/_som nyi 'am/_the tsom 'tshal ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi kun tu spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba'i slad du'o/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[280b.3\]]gdugs dang dgung zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing /_'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis ni dogs la ltung yang gda'/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni gnas nas 'pho yang gda'i/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' ni gzhan du mi 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags 
[\[280b.4\]]kyis kyang sems can dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dag mchis te/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'di thos nas/_de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'di dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar shin tu yon tan dang /_phan yon du 
[\[280b.5\]]'gyur snyam nas de dag mi dad cing yid mi ches te/_spong bas yun ring por gnod pa dang /_mi sman pa dang /_mi bde ba dang /_log par ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan su'i rna lam du 
[\[280b.6\]]grag par gyur pa de ngan 'gro ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni gnas med de go skabs ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni yid ches par dka' ba'o/_/kun dga' bo khyod dad cing yid ches pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 
[\[280b.7\]]yin par blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ma gtogs par 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo mir 'gyur ba rnyed pa ni rnyed par dka'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]dad cing gus pa yang rnyed par dka'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa yang rnyed par shin tu dka'o/_/kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang tshad med do/_/thabs 
[\[281a.2\]]mkhas pa yang tshad med do/_/smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang tshad med do/_/nga de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par rgya cher yang dag par bshad par 'dod kyang bskal pa zad par 'gyur gyi/_bcom 
[\[281a.3\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mtha' rtogs par ni mi 'gyur ro/_/yang de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyabs grol zhes bya ba stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa 
[\[281a.4\]]gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe/_slad ma'i dus na/_sems 
[\[281a.5\]]can bro nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir te/_yun ring po'i bro nad kyis lus kyi sha bas shing /_bkres pa dang skom pas gre ba dang /_mchu ni skams/_'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs/_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams 
[\[281a.6\]]du ba rnams kyis ni bskor/_phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong /_gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni drangs te/_de'i lus 'di na nyal yang rnam par shes pa chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing /_mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha slad bzhin 'brang ba gang 
[\[281a.7\]]lags pa des ni des dge ba dang /_mi dge ba bgyis pa de thams cad legs par yi ger bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul ba dang /_chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes de la dris shing brtags nas dge ba'am/_mi dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ba las/_gang dag nad pa de'i don du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la skyabs su mchi zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa bgyid na/_de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing rmi lam rmis pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyis 'tshal ba'i gnas 
[\[281b.2\]]der mchis te/_yang na ni gdugs bdun/_yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig_/yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga/_yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la/_de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing dran pa rnyed la/_de dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las kyi 
[\[281b.3\]]rnam par smin pa bdag nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur te srog gi slad du yang /_sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do/_/de lta lags pas dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_byang 
[\[281b.4\]]chub sems dpa' skyabs grol la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la/_ji ltar mchod par bya/_byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag nad chen 
[\[281b.5\]]po las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis nad pa de'i don du/_nyin bdun mtshan bdun du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong gi sdom pa blang bar bya'o/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang /_skom rnams dang /_yo byad thams cad kyis ci nus su mchod pa dang /_
[\[281b.6\]]rim gro bya'o/_/nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan yid la bya'o/_/mdo 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu gdon par bya'o/_/zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me bud par bya'o/_/sku gzugs 
[\[281b.7\]]bdun bya'o/_/sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar yang mar me bdun bdun gzhag go/_/mar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du byas te/_ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me mi zad par bya'o/_/tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o/_/
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la/_nad kyi gnod pa'am/_rang gi dmag tshogs sam/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa'am/_rgyu skar gyi gnod pa'am/_gza' 
[\[282a.2\]]zla ba'i gnod pa'am/_gza' nyi ma'i gnod pa'am/_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char gyi gnod pa'am/_than pa'i gnod pa yang rung ste/_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo 
[\[282a.3\]]nas dbang bskur ba des/_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya/_btson du bzung ba rnams gtang bar bya zhing gong du smos pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la de lta bur mchod pa byas na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs 
[\[282a.4\]]spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis yul bde ba dang /_lo legs par 'gyur/_rlung dang char dus su ldang zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur/_
[\[282a.5\]]yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang nad med pa dang /_bde ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ro/_/yul der gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za ma rungs pas sems can rnams la gtse bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ltas 
[\[282a.6\]]ngan pa thams cad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe dang /_mdog dang /_stobs dang /_nad med pa dang /_dbang phyug rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos byang chub sems 
[\[282a.7\]]dpa' skyabs grol la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na tshe yongs su zad nas yang mngon par skye/_byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu yod par/_khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]ma thos sam/_de'i phyir/_sngags dang sman gyi sbyor ba rnams bstan to/_/sems can nad kyis btab la/_de nad tshabs mi ches kyang sman dang rim gro byed pa dang mi ldan nam/_yang na sman pa sman ma yin pa byed pa yang yod de/_'di 
[\[282b.2\]]ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang po'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba gnyis pa ni/_gang dag rgyal po'i chad pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba gsum pa ni/_gang dag ha cang bag med de bag med par gnas pa de dag la 
[\[282b.3\]]mi ma yin pa dag gis mdangs 'phrog pa'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzhi pa ni/_gang dag mes tshig ste/_'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba lnga pa ni/_gang dag chus 'chi ba'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba drug pa ni/_
[\[282b.4\]]gang dag seng ge dang /_stag dang /_wa dang /_sbrul dang /_gcan gzan khro bo'i nang du chud de 'chi ba'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba bdun pa ni/_gang dag ri kha nas g.yang du lhung ba'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad pa ni/_gang dag dug 
[\[282b.5\]]dang /_byad dang /_ro langs kyi sbyor bas gsod pa'o/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu pa ni/_gang dag zas dang skom ma rnyed nas bkres pa dang /_skom pas nyen te 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o/_/mdor na 'di dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[282b.6\]]dus ma yin par 'chi ba chen por bstan pa ste/_gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni grangs med dpag tu med do/_/de nas 'khor der gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis 'dus par gyur te/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs dang /_gnod 
[\[282b.7\]]sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin 
[\[283a.2\]]dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed de/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po de dag go/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po re re la yang /_g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum bdun 'bum yod pa ste/_de dag gis tshig gcig tu 
[\[283a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos te/_bdag cag la yang ngan 'gror mchi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[283a.4\]]des na bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du spro 
[\[283a.5\]]bar bgyi'o/_/bye brag tu ni grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_dgon pa'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang /_gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_rim 
[\[283a.6\]]gro bgyid pa'i sems can de dag la bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/_gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin 
[\[283a.7\]]gyi sde dpon chen po de dag la/_legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dag gang gi phyir khyed/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dran la/_sems can thams cad la phan 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[283b.2\]]btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir/_chos kyi rnam 
[\[283b.3\]]grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing /_re ba 
[\[283b.4\]]thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis kyis dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang 
[\[283b.5\]]chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[283b.6\]]pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA 
[\[283b.7\]]na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]{D505}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta thA ga ta bai DUr+ya pra b+ha nA ma ba la d+ha na sa mA d+hi d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[284a.2\]]cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sman gyi gnas na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[284a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so/_/lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /_me tog gi char dpag tu med pa bab bo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[284a.4\]]pa bdun po 'khor dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni bskor/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[284a.5\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[284a.6\]]gyur pa stan las langs te/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs su gsol/_sems can rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang /_nad thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba dang /_re ba thams cad bskang du gsol/_
[\[284a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal legs so 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]legs so/_/legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas bshad do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[284b.2\]]'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[284b.3\]]pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[284b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[284b.5\]]'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[284b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba ltar rab tu bsil byed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang 
[\[284b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]chen po spobs pa brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blta na mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[285a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa legs par rnam par sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po 
[\[285a.3\]]brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po chen po'i rtse 'dzin rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa dgra bcom pa shA ri'i bu dang /_
[\[285a.4\]]maud gal gyi bu chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha'i dge bsnyen chen po dpal tshangs pa dang brgya byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i dge bsnyen chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi dge 
[\[285a.5\]]bsnyen chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gsung dbyangs gcig gis gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga wa te/_a pra ti ha ta/_b+hai Sha dz+ye rA dzA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM sarba ta thA 
[\[285a.6\]]ga ta hU~M/_g+hu me g+hu me/_i mi ni mi hi/_ma ti ma ti/_sap+ta ta thA ga ta/_sa mA d+h+ya d+hiSh+Thi te/_a ti ma te pA le pA paM sho d+ha ni/_sarba pA paM nA sha ya/_ma ma bud+d+he/_bud+d+ho t+ta me/_u me ku me/_bud d+ha k+She tra pa ri sho d+ha ni/_d+ha me ni d+ha me/_me ru me ru/_me ru shi kha 
[\[285a.7\]]re/_sarba a kA la mr-i t+yu ni bA ra Ni/_bud+d+he su bud+d+he/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na/_a d+hiSh+Thi te na/_rak+Sha n+tu me/_sarba de ba sa me/_a sa me/_sa ma n+wA ha ran+tu me/_sarba bud d+ha/_bo d+hi satwA/_sha me sha me/_pra sha man+tu me/_sarbe t+yu pa drA ba/_byA d+ha yaH/_pu ra Ni/_su pUr Ni/_
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]pU ra ya me/_sarba A shA me/_bai DUr+ya pra ti b+hA se/_sarba pA paM k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/_oM b+hai Sha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+ye/_ma hA b+hai Sha dz+ye/_sa mut+ga te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa'i tshe snang ba chen po byung ste/_sa chen po yang g.yos nas 
[\[285b.2\]]rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dag snang ngo /_/'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang spos dang bdug pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod nas legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_lan bdun du bskor ba byas so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun 
[\[285b.3\]]po de dag mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa des gtsang 
[\[285b.4\]]mar byas te/_phyogs gtsang mar 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan par byas la/_sems can thams cad la snying rje bas sa ga la bab pa'i nya nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku gzugs byas la tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la smyung bar gnas 
[\[285b.5\]]pas gzungs 'di dag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'am/_stong rtsa brgyad dam/_stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu 'don cing me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_mar me dang /_phreng ba dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan 
[\[285b.6\]]gsum du mchod pa byed na/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sems par 'gyur/_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_klu'i dge bsnyen chen po dag gis kyang yongs su skyong bar 'gyur/_
[\[285b.7\]]gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyis yang dag par bsrung bar 'gyur/_mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur/_nad thams cad kyis mi btab par 'gyur/_ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_'chi ba dang /_dgra dang /_dgon pa'i gnod pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_dgra thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur/_ci bsams pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs 
[\[286a.2\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de'i phyir chos kyi 
[\[286a.3\]]rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi gzungs zhes bya bar zung shig_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thag cing sbyong ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang 
[\[286a.4\]]zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[286a.5\]]stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI baM ka ra shri dz+nyA na dang /_
[\[286a.6\]]dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas tho ling gser khang du/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D505a}]@##/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[286a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM b+hai Sha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+ye/_ma hA b+hai Sha dz+ye/_b+hai Sha dz+ye sa mut+ga te swA hA/_sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa rdzogs so/_/
[\[286b\]]
