[\[286b.1\]{D506}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA ma Ni bi pu la bi mA na su pra tiSh+Thi ta gu h+ya ba ra ma ra ha s+ya da kalpa/_rA dzA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i 
[\[286b.2\]]rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'dus pa dang po la bdud bye ba pham par mdzad/_dpyod pa pa dang /_
[\[286b.3\]]kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa thams cad dang /_mu stegs can gzhan rnams kyang btul nas pham par mdzad de/_'khor ba'i skyon 'khor ba'i chu bo'i pha rol du gshegs so/_/gang gi tshe bdud kyi sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma g.yog bdud kyi sde phrag 
[\[286b.4\]]dkrigs pa can dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling bkang ba de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas sems can de dag gis 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra yang ma thos shing mtshon cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me tog sna tshogs su bab par 
[\[286b.5\]]gyur to/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sum mdo'i dbus de'i sa de yang rdol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa/_sdong bu ni bai DUr+ya/_snying po ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/_ze ba ni rdo'i snying po/_srid ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar la thug pa 'od 
[\[286b.6\]]dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_pad+ma de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad du snang bar byas so/_/de nas pad+ma de las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyis bskul ba'i sgra 'di byung ngo /_/phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa thams cad la 
[\[286b.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_o~M ma Ni badzra hr-i da ya/_badzra mA ra sai n+ya bi dra ba Ni/_ha na ha na/_badzra gar+b+he/_trA sa ya trA sa ya/_sarba mA ra b+hu ba na ni hU~M hU~M/_saM d+ha ra saM d+ha ra/_bud+d+ha mai tri sarba ta thA ga ta badzra kalpa a d+hi Sh+Thi te swA hA/_pad+ma de las yang legs so zhes bya ba'i 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]sgra grag ste/_des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgras bkang nas/_shAkya thub pa srid pa'i dgon pa las ni rgal/_bdud ni bcom/_nyon mongs pa'i rdul ni spangs/_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs ni dral/_chos kyi 
[\[287a.2\]]sgron ma chen po ni spar te/_gang gi phyir gzungs 'di'i mthus sa gzhi rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/_bdud ni bcom pa legs so legs so/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spu zing zhes byed cing lus 'dar nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[287a.3\]]zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_rig sngags chen mo 'di 'dus pa dang po la 'dzam bu'i gling du byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di 'jig rten du sngon byung bar 
[\[287a.4\]]ma thos lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/_de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[287a.5\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/_mtshon cha'i char 'bab pa 'di yang me tog sna tshogs su gyur te 'bab bo/_/gzungs 'di'i mthus bdud kyi 'khor bcom nas srog chags bye ba btul to/_/'di'i mthus sum mdo'i dbus su pad+ma 
[\[287a.6\]]'di byung bar gyur to/_/lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di med par mngon/_ra rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus/_bdud bye ba pham par ma yin/_nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems par ma yin te/_chos kyi sgron ma sbar bar mi nus so/_/lag na rdo rje ngas dka' ba bye ba 
[\[287a.7\]]khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma spyad na ji srid ngas gzungs 'di mnyan pa dang /_mngon par brtson pas brtson 'grus ma byas kyi bar du ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob par ma nus kyi/_phyis ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob bo/_/lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]yin no/_/lag na rdo rje 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub pa yin no/_/lag na rdo rje 'di'i ming bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/brjod 
[\[287b.2\]]cing bzlas pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur dang /_zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes me tog sna tshogs dang /_dri dang /_bdug 
[\[287b.3\]]pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na yon tan gyi 
[\[287b.4\]]khyad par ci 'dra ba dag gda' ba bstan du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag pa'i chos kyi gzhi 'di dag las gzhan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyi tshogs bsags par mi bgyi lags so/_/de nas 
[\[287b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje sems can de dag ni snyom las can/_brtson 'grus dman pa/_gti mug gis rmongs pa/_'dod pa'i dregs pas rmongs pa/_yid ches par dka' ba/_
[\[287b.6\]]phar mi 'dzin pa dang /_mar mi 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa/_rigs kyi gtso bo la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ste/_des ni gzungs 'di lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhing /_bsod nams chung ba/_skal ba chung ba/_blo zhan pa rnams 
[\[287b.7\]]kyis kyang nyan par mi 'gyur/_'chad par mi 'gyur zhing /_sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di la dad pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu nga ni 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 
[\[288a.2\]]grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'i ra ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba/_nyams dga' ba/_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_skye bo'i tshogs thams 
[\[288a.3\]]cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nyid snang zhing nor bu dang /_gser 'bar ba'i mgo rgyan sna tshogs kyis mgo brgyan pa/_lha'i gzugs can/_mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/_bshes gnyen thams cad dang ldan pa/_rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud 
[\[288a.4\]]pa/_snang ba yod par 'gro'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na rgyal po nor bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_blon po bye ba phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing btsun mo dam pa gsal byed ma zhes bya ba bud med nyi khri'i 'khor can lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi lus 
[\[288a.5\]]la 'gran pa zhig yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na yang me tog gi shing dang /_'bras bu'i shing dang /_drang chu'i shing dang /_dri'i shing gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no/_/chu las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams 
[\[288a.6\]]cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no/_/thang las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi rang bzhin no/_/mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri thub ste/_thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/_sangs 
[\[288a.7\]]rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa yin no/_/rgyal po de yang chos dang mthun pas rgyal srid skyong bar byed kyis chos dang mi mthun pas ni ma yin te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa can yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na yang 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang chen po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[288b.2\]]mdzad pa mdzad de de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gser gyi kha dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba/_'od 'dom gang gis kun nas bskor ba/_'od rin po che sna bdun ltar shin tu gsal ba yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[288b.3\]]thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi lus 'od 'phro ba/_mtshan dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma'i stan la 'khod pa ste/_thams cad kyang spobs pa mi zad pa/_sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba/_rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pas 'di lta ste/_
[\[288b.4\]]nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sems shing gzungs de nyid kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par 'di byung bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang gzungs 'di sems can thams cad la rab tu ston to/_/sems 
[\[288b.5\]]can de rnams kyang gzungs 'di'i mthus bde ba nyams su myong ba ste/_sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris rnams las yongs su thar bar gyur to/_/ngan song gi 
[\[288b.6\]]sgo thams cad kyang bcad par gyur to/_/mtho ris kyi sgo rnams phye'o/_/bde 'gro'i sgo rnams thams cad kyang phye ste/_'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so/_/
[\[288b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis gnas te/_'di lta ste/_chu dang 'o ma gcig tu gyur pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/_nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]gnas pa'i gsang ba 'di sgrub pa na smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig ces smon lam btab 
[\[289a.2\]]ste/_gang dag gzungs 'di nyan pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_sgom pa dang /_'don pa dang /_sems pa dang /_sgrub par byed pa dang /_chung ngu na ming nyan par byed dam/_lag pas reg gam/_lus la 'chang nga ngam/_
[\[289a.3\]]mig gis mthong ba tsam mam/_glegs bam la bris pa'am/_ras la bris pa'am/_rtsig pa la bris pa mthong na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'am/_mnar med par gzhol ba'am/_dam pa'i chos spangs pa'am/_'phags pa la skur pa btab pa 'am/_shan 
[\[289a.4\]]pa'am/_gdol pa'am/_rngon pa'am/_bya ba 'am/_long ba'am/_'on pa'am/_sha bkra can nam/_bkren pa'am/_zhar ba'am/_sgur po'am/_dman pa'am/_sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i sgrib pa can nam/_myong bar gyur par ma nges pa'am/_
[\[289a.5\]]bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa 'am/_lta ba ngan par lhung ba'am/_/log 'dren gyis zin pa'am/_rgyu skar dang /_gza'i gnod par byas pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/chung ngu na dud 
[\[289a.6\]]'gro'i skye gnas pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_sha sbrang dang /_byi ba dang /_grog sbur rnams dang /_gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs sgo nga las skyes pa'am/_mngal nas skyes pa'am/_drod gsher las skyes pa'am/_
[\[289a.7\]]rdzus te skyes pa la sogs te/_de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/_'di la the tshom dang /_yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor de 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]dag thams cad dga' zhing ba spu'i khung bu rnams g.yos par gyur to/_/lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po'i char yang rab tu bab bo/_/lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin to/_/
[\[289b.2\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi rang rang gi lus las kyang 'od zer byung bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_shin tu rnam par phye ba/_nyams dga' ba/_ka ba bzhi zug pa/_sgo 
[\[289b.3\]]bzhi btod pa/_them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/_'od 'bar ba/_grwa bzhi na nor bu rin po che chen po bzhi nyi ma ltar 'od 'bar ba/_nor bu dang /_rin po che dang /_mu tig gi dra ba du ma dpyangs pa/_dril bu mang pos mdzes par byas pa/_dar gyi ba dan mang pos kun nas 
[\[289b.4\]]brgyan pa/_me tog sna tshogs du ma'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa zhig byung ngo /_/sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/_'gul ldeg la sgra 'byin cing mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to/_/lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas te/_lha'i gnas na gnas pa thams 
[\[289b.5\]]cad bskul to/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bskul to/_/rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad kyang bskul te/_lha'i rigs thams cad kyang 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang /_bar chad byed pa'i log 'dren thams cad kyang dngangs skrag ste/_
[\[289b.6\]]cho nges 'debs shing phyogs bcur byer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas/_'od zer rab tu bkye ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar byas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[289b.7\]]'das de rnams bskul nas slar dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das khyod de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de gzigs pa dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing bzhud pa'i dus la bab kyi bzhud la nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas 
[\[290a.2\]]pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de yang rgyas par gson cig_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs de ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags so/_/gzungs de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags te/_gang la la zhig nyan tam/_chung ngu na 
[\[290a.3\]]ming ngam/_lag pas reg na yang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas gshegs pa'i sangs 
[\[290a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bkye ste/_ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de la bos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu tshur sheg_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda byung ba ni 'di 
[\[290a.5\]]yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan las bzhengs pa dang /_khang pa brtsegs ma de'i dbus su rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri byung nas/_khri de'i steng du rin po che'i pad+ma bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_sdong bu ni gser/_pad+ma'i snying po ni mu tig 
[\[290a.6\]]dmar po can zhig byung ste/_de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu sa chen po 'di che thang du g.yos par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang nor bu chen po dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_'khor thams cad 
[\[290a.7\]]dbugs phyung nas steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khod de/_'khor mang po dang /_'khod pa chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po dang /_rnam par sprul pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'khor dang /_lha dang /_
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa mang po dang /_rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang po'i 'khor dang /_gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thabs 
[\[290b.2\]]cig tu/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gshegs so/_/de dag thams cad shar phyogs logs su dong ba dang /_tshad med pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag 
[\[290b.3\]]khrig brgya stong 'das nas nor bu sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin par mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/_/'jig rten gyi khams der byon ma thag tu nam mkha' las babs nas/_
[\[290b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de'i drung du gshegs so/_/der gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa mi mang 'am/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsungs nas/_rin po che sna bdun 
[\[290b.5\]]gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa zhig byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa dang /_des phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/_zab cing zab pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya 
[\[290b.6\]]thub pa de yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/_khang pa brtsegs ma de nyid du bzhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor lags sam/_khyod kyis bdud dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom pa lags 
[\[290b.7\]]sam/_khyod kyis chos kyi sgron ma sbar lags sam/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng lags sam/_chos kyi rnga brdungs lags sam/_chos kyi dung rab tu bus lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'byung ba bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]mkhyen par bgyis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis deng 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo chos kyi gter lan gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba mdzod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi 
[\[291a.2\]]khams de thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul/_ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/_chem chem/_rab tu 
[\[291a.3\]]chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem ste/_me tog gi char chen po yang rab tu 'bab/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang snang /_sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin/_steng gi nam mkha'i bar snang gi lha'i bu rnams kyang lha'i sil snyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba/_yan lag 
[\[291a.4\]]lnga pa dag dkrol bar byed/_klu chen po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed/_dri'i phye ma sna tshogs dang /_tsan+dan gyi chu sna tshogs kyi char yang 'bebs par byed/_gos sna tshogs dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub sna tshogs kyi 
[\[291a.5\]]char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/_lha'i mu tig dmar po dang /_spug dang /_nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par snang byed dang /_nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang /_chu shel dang /_me shel dang /_dpal gyi snying po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/_lha'i me 
[\[291a.6\]]tog u t+pal dang /_pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/_lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i me tog dang /_lha'i dngul las byung ba'i me tog gi char yang rab tu 'bebs par 
[\[291a.7\]]byed/_lha'i me tog gi phreng ba'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/_nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang a la la zhes sgra snyan par 'byin cing dbyangs kyang rjes su sgrogs par byed/_legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par byed/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]thub pa 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor ba dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa dang /_'di lta ste/_nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i rgyal po'i cho 
[\[291b.2\]]ga zhib mo chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du rab tu spyod par bgyis pa legs so legs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra bar ba gnas gtsang ma'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer sna tshogs bkye ste/_'od 
[\[291b.3\]]zer de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bskul zhing snang bar mdzad do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang snang bar mdzad/_lha'i gnas thams cad 
[\[291b.4\]]dang /_klu'i gnas thams cad dang /_dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris rnams su yang bskul cing snang bar mdzad nas/_slar log nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la lan gsum/_
[\[291b.5\]]bskor ba byas nas slar yang gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs so/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad nas/_tshad med pa'i gang 
[\[291b.6\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gshegs nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma dag sprul nas/_khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i seng ge'i 
[\[291b.7\]]khri dag byung ba de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi 'khor dang /_khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos legs par mchod nas rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab 
[\[292a.2\]]gnas gtsang ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po yang rab tu gda'/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po 
[\[292a.3\]]dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma lags pa'i 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyang rab tu gda'/_rigs sngags 'chang gi tshogs 'dus pa chen po yang lhags nas/_'di 
[\[292a.4\]]lta ste/_lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyang lhags/_bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang gda' lags pas bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba rab tu bstan pa'i dus ni 'di 
[\[292a.5\]]lags so/_/tshong ni 'di lags so zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[292a.6\]]dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu song la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsol ba thob cig dang /_des khyod la rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[292a.7\]]dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba 'di/_sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu bstan du gsol/_de nas 
[\[292b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po song la 'khor mang po 'di'i dbus kyis phyogs su rdo rjes sa la bsnun cig_/de nas gsang 
[\[292b.3\]]ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/_'khor gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gang na ba der song nas sa phyogs de la rdo rjes bsnun te sa la bsnun ma thag tu de nas gru bzhir gas so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[292b.4\]]gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/g.yos ma thag tu sa phyogs der rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma gru bzhi pa/_ka ba bzhi pa zug pa/_sgo bzhi btod pa/_mnyam pa/_nyams dga' ba/_shin tu rnam par phye ba/_chas mdzes par byas pa/_
[\[292b.5\]]bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_'od 'bar ba/_them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/_'phang du dpag tshad gsum yod la/_rgyar dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo /_/khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus der yang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i mchod rten nor bu dang /_rin po che dang /_
[\[292b.6\]]mu tig gi dra ba du mas brgyan pa/_rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa/_dril bu du ma 'phyang du bcug pa/_dar gyi chun po du mas mdzes par byas pa/_me tog gi chun po du mas mngon par brgyan pa zhig byung ngo /_/mchod rten de'i dbus na 
[\[292b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis khang pa brtsegs ma de dag la mchod pa mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de yang khang pa brtsegs ma de dang mchod rten la mchod par byed/_rjed par byed/_me 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rol mo dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[293a.2\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa'i 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar skyes te ya mtshan du gyur/_spro bar gyur nas khang pa brtsegs ma dang /_mchod rten 'di ci'i phyir byung bar gyur ces ca co dang gzha'i sgra mthon 
[\[293a.3\]]por 'byin cing mchod rten dang /_khang pa brtsegs ma de la bskor ba byed/_mchod par byed/_rjed par byed/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_pheg rdob pa dag gis mchod par byed do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[293a.4\]]dpa' de dag thams cad dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang /_thal mo sbyar nas 'khod de phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/de nas khang pa brtsegs ma de las sgra byung ba/_kye 'khor mang po dag bar snang la ci snang ltos shig ltos shig_/de nas ji ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor 
[\[293a.5\]]mang po de dag thams cad kyis bar snang la bltas te bltas ma thag tu bai DUr+ya dang /_nor bu rin po che chen po las byung ba'i sprin gyi phung po chen po zhig byung ngo /_/de nas sprin gyi phung po'i steng du nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 
[\[293a.6\]]'di yi ge gser gyi kha dog tu bris pa mthong ngo /_/nam mkha'i dkyil de nyid nas sgra byung ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklag tu gsol ba klag tu gsol/_sgra byung 
[\[293a.7\]]ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar sprin gyi phung po las bris pa byung nas 'di skad ces kyang dbyangs su sgrogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod rten mchog 'di sgo phye shig dang /_mchod rten de'i dbus na de bzhin 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs te/_de'i mthus cho 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i khyad par chen po 'di snang zhing /_de kho na'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yang snang /_nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas 
[\[293b.2\]]pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_cho ga dang /_rig sngags dang /_cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad dang bcas pa mtha' dag rdzogs shing rgyas par 'khor gyi dbus su legs par rab tu 'chang par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[293b.3\]]ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das mchod rten rin po che 'di dang 'di na bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[293b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal po me tog rgyal mtshan dang /_nor bu rnam par bkra ba dang /_rdo rje 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de dag bstan pa'i skabs dbye bar mdzod cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas rdzu 'phrul 
[\[293b.5\]]gyi cho 'phrul chen pos khang pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rten gang na bar bzhud de/_phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can/_bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa brkyang nas mchod rten mchog de'i sgo'i sgo 'phar phye ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams bstan to/_/de 
[\[293b.6\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_shAkya thub pa legs so legs so/_/deng khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor to/_/bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri 'di nyid la bzhugs 
[\[293b.7\]]shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mchod rten gyi nang du khri de nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag khang pa brtsegs 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]ma'i mchod rten gyi nang du ci'i slad du byung gang nas gshegs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje sngon byung ba bskal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_tshad med pa/_dpag tu med pa/_gzhal du med pa/_gzhal gyis mi lang ba/_
[\[294a.2\]]tshad gzung du med pa/_ches grangs med pa na gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa/_rgyas pa dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' ba dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang zhing ma rmos pa ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu byung ste/_bdag gi ba med cing yongs su bzung 
[\[294a.3\]]ba med de/_'jig rten thams cad bde ba dang ldan pa de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas med do/_/de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po rin chen ri bo zhes bya ba de la drang srong gsum zhig gnas te/_gcig gi ming ni nor bu'i gtsug tor/_gnyis pa ni gser gyi gtsug tor/_gsum pa ni 
[\[294a.4\]]rdo rje'i gtsug tor zhes bya ste/_de rnams bdag cag ji ltar sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/_'jig rten bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur snyam zhing gcig tu sangs rgyas yid la byed/_chos yid la byed/_
[\[294a.5\]]dge 'dun yid la byed do/_/de nas drang srong de rnams de snyam du bsams nas yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar gyur cing sems pa na/_de rnams kyis sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i byams pa/_rnam par bkra ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing /_
[\[294a.6\]]lha'i mig skyes nas ji tsam na steng du bltas na/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bar snang la sgra 'byin pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so/_/khyod 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni legs so/_/kye skyes 
[\[294a.7\]]bu dam pa dag nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du gsungs pa thos pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]bar thob par 'gyur/_chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur/_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon du 'gyur/_bdud thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/_chos thams cad kyi sgron ma sbar bar 'gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon du 'gyur/_pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[294b.2\]]drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul dang /_lha ma yin gyi chos rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_
[\[294b.3\]]smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba thob nas phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di na sems can gang dag par mi 'dzin pa dang /_mar mi 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa 
[\[294b.4\]]dang /_bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang /_mi dge ba dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_mnar med par gzhol ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bslu ba dang /_dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga 
[\[294b.5\]]byed pa dang /_bram ze gsod pa dang /_ba lang gsod pa dang /_chom rkun byed pa dang /_g.yon can dang /_sho gam sgugs pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par spyod pa dang /_phra ma smra ba dang /_tshig kyal pa smra ba dang /_gzhal 
[\[294b.6\]]ba la sgyu byed pa dang /_gzhal lugs la sgyu byed pa dang /_srang la sgyu byed pa dang /_gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa dang /_gtams pa rnog pa dang /_bshes pa la 'khu ba dang /_sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pas zin pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad gzungs 
[\[294b.7\]]'di'i mthus thos pa tsam mam/_bklags pa'am/_kun chub par byas pa'am/_lus la thogs sam/_bris nas 'chang ngam/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la 'dogs sam/_glegs bam du byed dam/_ras la bris pa'am/_dar la bris pa'am/_rtsig pa la bris 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]pa'am/_ra ba la bris pa'am/_chung ngu na sgra nyan pa'am/_lag pas reg gam/_grib mas phog gam/_sems can gzhan gyis reg na yang de dag thams cad gdon mi za bar phyir mi ldog par gyur pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[295a.2\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur/_tshe 'di nyid la yang yon tan brgya stong mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/_bdud thams cad mthar byed par 
[\[295a.3\]]'gyur/_'jig rten thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/_sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur/_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze thams cad 
[\[295a.4\]]dga' bar 'gyur/_tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/_rtag tu lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_gzhon sha can du 'gyur/_tshig mnyen zhing snyan par 'gyur/_bkren par mi 'gyur te/_'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur/_lus 
[\[295a.5\]]la dug gis mi tshugs te/_mtshon gyis ma yin/_me yis ma yin/_chus ma yin/_de la gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs te/_mi rgod kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/_chom rkun gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/_kla klo'i 'jigs pas ma yin/_lam dang 
[\[295a.6\]]lam gol ba'i 'jigs pas ma yin/_gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/_'byung po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/_srin po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/_srin po'i 'jigs pas ma yin/_sha za'i 'jigs pas ma yin/_mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pas ma yin te/_sbrul gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_
[\[295a.7\]]lus la rims kyis mi tshugs te/_zhag gcig pa'am/_zhag gnyis pa'am/_zhag gsum pa'am/_zhag bzhi pa'am/_rtag pa'i rims sam/_rims thams cad kyis lus la mi tshugs par 'gyur/_mig gi nad mi 'byung ste/_rna ba'i nad ma yin/_
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]sna'i nad ma yin/_lce'i nad ma yin/_kha'i nad ma yin/_so'i nad ma yin/_mchu'i nad ma yin/_mgrin pa'i nad ma yin/_rna bar zug pa ma yin/_lag pa'i nad ma yin/_ro rgyab kyi nad ma yin/_chu so'i nad ma yin/_gzhang 'brum gyi nad ma yin/_
[\[295b.2\]]gcin nad ma yin/_'khru ba'i nad ma yin/_shu ba'i nad ma yin/_brla'i nad ma yin/_byin pa'i nad ma yin/_rkang pa'i nad ma yin/_nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/'di lta ste/_bas bldags dang /_lhog pa dang /_med pa la dang /_lto na ba dang /_g.yan 
[\[295b.3\]]pa dang /_phol mig dang /_khyi rngo dang /_mdze dang /_rkang shu la sogs pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung /_klad pa na ba ma yin/_gzhogs phyed na ba ma yin/_long bar mi 'gyur/_zhar bar mi 'gyur/_sgur po ma yin/_pha rol gyi mthus 'chi bar mi 
[\[295b.4\]]'gyur/_'on par mi 'gyur/_sha bkra can du mi 'gyur/_brnyas shing gnas par mi 'gyur te/_yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i tshe na yang spobs pa mi zad par 'gyur/_sems 'khrugs pas dus byed par mi 
[\[295b.5\]]'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal mngon du bstan nas dbugs 'byin pa mdzad par 'gyur/_lus la byad dang /_g.yengs byed kyis mi tshugs/_lus la sngags kyi sbyor bas mi tshugs/_bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/_bde bar sad par 
[\[295b.6\]]'gyur/_rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur te/_gsang ba'i gzungs kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu 'byung ngo zhes smra ba mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[295b.7\]]nas drang srong de rnams chos kyi dga' ba snying la reg cing spro ba thob nas mar sar gyi gong bu bzhu ba bzhin du lus zhig nas zhu ba'i khu ba de sa'i nang du thim mo/_/de nas sa gzhi de las smyug ma'i mde'u gser gyi kha dog can/_rtsa ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_lo ma gser 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]las byas pa/_rtse mo mu tig las byas pa/_bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_stobs dang ldan pa/_gzi brjid dang ldan pa/_dri zhim pa/_shin tu yid du 'ong ba gsum skyes so/_/smyug ma'i mde'u de rnams zla ba bcu lon pa dang gas te/_de 
[\[296a.2\]]rnams kyi dbus nas khye'u gzugs bzang po mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog rgyas pa/_mchog dang ldan pa gsum byung ngo /_/de nas khye'u de rnams phyogs de nyid du de'i drung na skyil mo krung bcas te bsgom zhing 'khod do/_/ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin mo 
[\[296a.3\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_gser gyi kha dog gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa/_'od 'dom gang gis kun nas spras par gyur to/_/smyug ma'i mde'u de rnams kyang khang pa brtsegs mar 
[\[296a.4\]]gyur to/_/nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang nam mkha' la gser gyi yi ger snang ngo /_/rgyal po chen po bzhi yang steng nas gdugs 'dzin cing me tog gis gtor te/_'di skad ces 'jig rten du sangs 
[\[296a.5\]]rgyas byung ngo zhes dbyangs su sgrogs shing 'di lta ste/_klu'i bdag po rgyal po chan po gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba dang /_grul bum gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba dang /_brang 'gro'i bdag po rgyal po nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[296a.6\]]gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das de dag la mchod pa byed do/_/sa phyogs de yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur to/_/me tog gi shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin du gyur to/_/
[\[296a.7\]]lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshe drang srong smyug ma'i mde'u rnams las byung ba byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lag na rdo rje de dag ni khang pa brtsegs ma'i mchod rten gyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]pa 'di dag yin no/_/sa phyogs kyang 'di yin no/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'di yin no/_/smyug ma'i mde'u yi khang pa brtsegs ma yang 'di yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa yang 'di yin no/_/de rnams drang srong du gyur pa na gzungs 'di 
[\[296b.2\]]thos pa tsam mam/_snying po sems la bsgoms pa tsam gyis drang srong gi lus spangs nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi khyad par bsngags 
[\[296b.3\]]pa smra ba gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar gyur to/_/lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba gang gis drang srong de rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de 
[\[296b.4\]]rnams la bkur sti dang /_rim gro byas pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab tu gnas pa 'di gnas gtsang ma 
[\[296b.5\]]zhes bya ba'i rim gro bar gyur pa na/_de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan to/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi 
[\[296b.6\]]rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di 'dra bas sngon gyi sbyor ba gsungs shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang dag par bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/_de bzhin 
[\[296b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa'i gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri la gshegs pa'i gsang 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgongs pa'i 
[\[297a.2\]]gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i gnas kyi gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[297a.3\]]kyi 'od zer bye ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems 
[\[297a.4\]]dpa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyan gyi gsang ba/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la rab tu 'god pa'i gsang ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rtogs pa khong du chud pa'i gsang ba/_sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par 
[\[297a.5\]]byed pa'i gsang ba 'di gsungs pa legs so legs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gzigs nas/_'od zer kha dog 
[\[297a.6\]]sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_leb rgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog dag bkye ste/_de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su dong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[297a.7\]]thams cad snang bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs so/_/'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i gsung 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]dbyangs chen pos bkang nas rig sngags chen mo 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma Ni sha ta dI p+ta/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/_ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ma Ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu/_ri dang /_
[\[297b.2\]]tshal dang /_nags tshal du bcas pa'i sa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_shAkya thub pa khyod kyis mchog tu gsang ba 'di gsungs pa ni legs par gsungs te legs so legs 
[\[297b.3\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i sprin chen po nam mkha'i dkyil du chags so/_/phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyi char bab bo/_/tsan+da na sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char yang bab bo/_/u dum+bA ra'i me 
[\[297b.4\]]tog gi char bab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir gzhan yang me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_dri ngad ldang ba dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_me tog mdog mdzes dang /_mdog mdzes 
[\[297b.5\]]chen po dang /_many+dzu Sha ka dang /_many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_yid 'ong ba dang /_pa ri Sha ka dang /_me tog tsam pa ka'i char dag bab bo/_/bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad skrag cing sngangs par gyur to/_/
[\[297b.6\]]bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyi lus rdul cing lus dri mi zhim par gyur nas/_phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros par brtsams so/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang dag yin pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[297b.7\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phul lo/_/de nas nor bu rab snang sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]khrag khrig brgya stong nor bu dang rin po che sna tshogs thogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su mchod pa byed do/_/de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ras bcos bu'i gos brgya stong gis 
[\[298a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du ma me tog sna tshogs dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[298a.3\]]ba dan dag thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/_/tshangs pa la sogs te/_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la brtson par byed do/_/
[\[298a.4\]]de bzhin du sred med kyi bu dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_nor bu bzang po dang /_gang ba bzang po dang /_stobs kyi lha la sogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/_/lha'i bu nyi ma dang /_zla ba yang nam mkha'i dkyil nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed 
[\[298a.5\]]do/_/dpal lha mo chen mo dang /_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang /_lha mo chen mo dung can ma dang /_gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma yang 'khor brgya stong dang /_lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma dang /_rdo rje nag mo dang /_me tog so dang /_lha mo chen mo pho nya mo 
[\[298a.6\]]dag kyang rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/_/dri za'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag kyang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa brgya stong bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pas dkrol bar byed do/_/klu'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag 
[\[298a.7\]]du ma 'dus pa 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_chu lha dang /_shin tu rab gnas dang /_gtsug na nor bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnam pa kun nas rdzogs pa'i 'od dag kyang rin po che nor bu skar 'od sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]'das la mchod pa byed do/_/'khor chen po yang 'dus par gyur to/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po de yang blon po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang /_btsun mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas shing bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas yongs su 
[\[298b.2\]]bskor te/_mdun gyis bltas so/_/sa de yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas 'khor chen po de nyid kyi dbus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la brtol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa zhig byung ste/_pad+ma de'i steng du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las 
[\[298b.3\]]byas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa/_mu khyud dang bcas pa/_lte ba dang bcas pa/_lhag pa'i 'od 'phro ba/_nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba zhig byung ngo /_/de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas nas/_'khor lo de'i lte ba'i 
[\[298b.4\]]nang nas sgra byung ba/_shAkya thub pa gang 'di 'dra ba'i gzungs kyi gsang ba rnams gsungs pa ni legs so legs so/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/_/byang chub chen po'i snying por gshegs pa'i rig sngags/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[298b.5\]]cad kyi rig sngags kyi snying po/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gyi rig sngags kyi snying po 'di/_bcom ldan 'das yang gsungs shig_/nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs gsungs 
[\[298b.6\]]shig dang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gsungs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul cing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gsungs ba'i dus ni 'di 
[\[298b.7\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba/_sdig pa thams cad sel ba/_sdug bsngal thams cad kyi mtsho skems pa/_'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las nges par 'byin pa lags/_'di ni chu bo chen po las sgrol ba lags te/_
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]gzungs 'di ma mchis par sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi sa bon lags/_'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lags/_'di ni chos kyi sgron ma sbar ba lags/_'di ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba lags/_
[\[299a.2\]]'di ni chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa lags/_'di ni chos kyi rnga brdung ba lags/_'di ni chos kyi seng ge'i khri la mchis pa lags te/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di'i dam tshig dang /_dkyil 'khor cho ga dang bcas pa/_gsang 
[\[299a.3\]]ba dang bcas pa/_phyag rgya'i le'u dang bcas pa/_ras bcos bu zung dang bcas pa/_yo byad dang bcas pa'i cho ga legs par rgyas par gsungs shig_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_
[\[299a.4\]]lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa'i 'khor 'dus pa rnams ya mtshan du gyur/_spro bar gyur nas thams cad kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas shing 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba yang 
[\[299a.5\]]dag pa 'di dang /_gsol ba btab pa gsan nas/_rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di rgyas par bka' stsal to/_/bskul ba'i le'u ste cho ga dang po'o//_//'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba dam pa'i cho ga zhib 
[\[299a.6\]]mo'i rgyal po/_bam po gnyis pa/_de nas sdig pa kun ni sel byed pa'i/_/rig sngags lus kyi dri ma med byed pa/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med pa yi/_/cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po dge bar bshad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M 
[\[299a.7\]]bi pu la gar+b+he/_ma Ni pra b+he/_ta thA ga ta niR+de sha ne/_ma Ni ma Ni/_su pra b+he/_bi ma le/_sA ga ra gam+b+hI re/_hU~M hU~M/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_bud+d+ha bi lo ki te/_gu h+ya a d+hi Sh+Thi ta/_gar+b+he swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]dam pa'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa nas chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/rin po che'i char chen po bab par gyur to/_/me tog gi char chen po bab bo/_/'khor thams cad kyang 'dus te thams cad kyis ca co dang /_gzha'i sgra phyung nas thams cad sa bcu la gnas 
[\[299b.2\]]par gyur to/_/thams cad dge ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/_shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_shAkya thub pa gang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i gzungs 'di lta bu gsungs pa legs so legs so/_/thos 
[\[299b.3\]]pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lha'i na bza' dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pas mchod par 'gyur ro/_/bklags pa tsam 
[\[299b.4\]]gyi mdo la phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa/_bskal pa'am/_bskal pa brgya 'am/_bskal pa stong 
[\[299b.5\]]ngam/_bskal pa brgya stong du yang brjod par mi spyod de/_de ltar gzungs 'di phan yon che ba lags so/_/bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis bar chad bya bar mi nus te/_bgegs kyis bya bar ma yin/_phyir rgol bas ma yin/_mi mdza' bas ma yin/_'byung pos ma 
[\[299b.6\]]yin/_gdon gyis ma yin/_gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/_srin pos ma yin/_mi dang mi ma yin pas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du 'phel bar 'gyur/_lan cig dran pa tsam gyis kyang de ltar yon tan gyi phan yon mang por 'gyur na shin tu bya ba mang po 
[\[299b.7\]]byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sems can de 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/spro bar bgyi'o/_/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[300a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag nas/_rgyal po chen po bzhi po de rnams la dbugs phyung ste/_ngas gzungs 'di gtad do/_/sems can de yang gtad do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di dang /_sems 
[\[300a.3\]]can yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du yongs su gzung lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi snying po bka' stsal pa/_o~M ma Ni badzre hU~M/_'di ni snying po'o/_/o~M ma Ni d+ha ri hU~M phaT/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_/rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyi cho ga ni/_tshes grangs ma yin rgyu skar 
[\[300a.4\]]min/_/smyung ba yang ni bya mi dgos/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam/_/mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i drung du bzlas brjod 'ba' zhig khri byas nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i zla ba nya la shin tu khrus byas te/_gos gtsang ma bgos nas mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i drung 
[\[300a.5\]]du ci 'byor pas mchod pa bya ste/_mar me bzhi dbul bar bya/_dri dang me tog la sogs pa yang dbul bar bya'o/_/zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/_/mchod rten la bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de nyid kyi drung du nyal na/_nam nangs kyi 
[\[300a.6\]]dus tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa lag na rdo rje yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa zhig yin na yang des dus 
[\[300a.7\]]gsum du bsgrubs na gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/_/nang par langs te bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na don thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la dug gis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/_sbyor ba ngan pas ma yin/_chu 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]yis ma yin/_me yis ma yin/_chom rkun gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur te/_lus la nad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur/_dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ste/_mig nad ma yin/_sna nad ma yin/_lce nad ma yin/_rna ba'i nad ma yin/_so nad 
[\[300b.2\]]ma yin/_klad nad ma yin/_yan lag dang nying lag gi nad ma yin/_rims ma yin te/_zhag gcig pa'am/_zhag gnyis pa'am/_zhag gsum pa'am/_zhag bzhi pas lus la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/_gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs 
[\[300b.3\]]pas ma yin zhing /_lus la byad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di ni yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/_'jigs pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa yin/_sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa yin/_yon tan thams cad grub par byed pa yin/_pha rol 
[\[300b.4\]]tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid grub par byed pa yin te/_gzungs 'di ni bklags pas grub pa ste/_las thams cad byed do/_/ri khar 'dzegs te bzlas brjod byas na/_mig gis gang du bltas pa der sems can rnams 
[\[300b.5\]]kyi sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lha khang du zhugs te bzlas brjod byas na lha thams cad des ci bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i 
[\[300b.6\]]gnas su zhugs te bzlas brjod byas na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma la kha bltas te bzlas brjod byas na nyi ma mngon sum du babs nas mdun na 'dug cing mchog ci smra ba de sbyin par byed do/_/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na mchog thams cad ster cing mthong bar yang 
[\[300b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/shu dag la sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de zos nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/ci smras pa de sbyin par byed do/_/na le sham gyi 'bru la lan bdun bzlas te/_khar bcug na ci smras pa ster bar byed cing 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]dbang du 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na rlung dang /_ser ba thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro/_/lan tshwa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_bram ze rnams la byin na gang dang gang gis lan tshwa zos pa de dang de kho na dbang du 
[\[301a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs dbang du bya na yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gu gul la sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_gang dang gang gi gdon la bdugs na de dang de nyid 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/bdugs na gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/char mi 'bab pa'i tshe 
[\[301a.3\]]klu'i gzugs byas te/_gnas gru bzhir byas la ba ser mo'i lci ba las klu mgo gsum pa byas la snying gar gser gyi sa glan par bya'o/_/lus ni li khris byug par bya'o/_/gnas kyi gzhi ni sngon pos bsku bar bya'o/_/gnas gru bzhi ni shing pa la sha ltar kha dog sngon por bya'o/_/
[\[301a.4\]]bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/pog phor bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya ste/_gcig ni 'o ma/_gcig ni zho/_gcig ni 'o thug_/gcig ni zhun mar bu ram can no/_/ba'i lci bas gling bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/_/grwa bzhi ru phyes pad+ma bri bar bya'o/_/
[\[301a.5\]]mda' bzhi btsugs la tshon skud sna lngas bskor bar bya'o/_/tshon sna lnga'i ba dan gdags par bya'o/_/bdug pa sna bzhi po gu gul dang /_tse pog dang /_tsan+dan dang /_du ru ska bsreg par bya'o/_/sa bon bdun gtor bar bya'o/_/kha dog lnga'i gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/_/'bras bu dang 
[\[301a.6\]]me tog gzhag par bya'o/_/rig pa 'dzin pas kha shar phyogs su bltas te/_'dug nas rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_yungs kar re re nas spyi bor brdeg par bya'o/_/stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na/_de nas klu rnams char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do/_/klu thams cad 
[\[301a.7\]]de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas te/_klu'i mtshe'ur gtor na char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do/_/seng ldeng gi phur bu la bzlas brjod byas te klu'i gnas su btsugs na rlung dang /_ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]byas te/_log 'dren gyi klad par btab na log 'dren thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/'o mas bkrus na phyir sos par 'gyur ro/_/las gang dang gang kho na bya ba'i las de dang de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya ste/_'di ni rtsa ba'i rig sngags 
[\[301b.2\]]kyi cho ga'i tshul yin no gnyis pa'o//_//da ni snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste/_bzlas brjod 'bum byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/nyis 'bum byas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sum 'bum byas na dkyil 'khor thams 
[\[301b.3\]]cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi 'bum byas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/lnga 'bum byas na lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i gnas thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/drug 'bum 
[\[301b.4\]]byas na gter thams cad 'bur bar 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod bdun byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur te/_de la sogs pa gong nas gong du yon tan gyi khyad 
[\[301b.5\]]par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod sa ya byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur te/_de la sogs pa gong nas gong du yon tan gyi khyad 
[\[301b.6\]]par thob par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'am/_'phags pa la skur pa btab pa'am/_dam pa'i chos spangs pa'am/_mnar med par gzhol ba yang rung /_de dag thams cad kyis bzlas brjod 'bum byas na las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_phyir mi 
[\[301b.7\]]ldog par 'gyur/_skye ba dran par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/mig rnam par dag pa dang /_rna ba rnam par dag pa dang /_sna rnam par dag pa dang /_lce rnam par dag pa dang /_dbang po yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur te/_de ltar gong nas gong du 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]yon tan gyi khyad par dang /_gong nas gong du lus yongs su rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi dngos grub tu bya ba rnams grub par 'gyur ro/_/de kho na grub pa bla na med pa ldong ros la bsgrub pa bshad de shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma 
[\[302a.2\]]bgos pa/_zas dkar gsum bza' bas ldong ros blangs te/_zangs kyi snod du bzhag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshes bcu gsum nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nya'i bar du/_bzlas brjod 'bum byas na de nas rnam pa 'grub par rig par bya ste/_gal te nag por gyur na 
[\[302a.3\]]dpral ba la thig le bya'o/_/de nas mi snang bar 'grub par 'gyur te/_lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/_gnas thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/_gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te dud pa byung na des mig bsku bar bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[302a.4\]]gnas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_lag na rdo rje'i gnas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_nor dang 'bru thams cad rnyed par 'gyur te/_gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'bar bar gyur na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/_'bar ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi ting 
[\[302a.5\]]nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur/_gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur/_ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te bzlas brjod 'bum byas na 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor 'gyur/_gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 
[\[302a.6\]]thams cad ci bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_mtshor zhugs te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_yungs kar blangs nas sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas nam mkha' la gtor na char chen po 'bab par 'gyur/_klu thams cad ci bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur 
[\[302a.7\]]ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/bum pa chus bkang ste hab shang tshe'u dang /_shing pa la sha dang /_yungs kar dang /_gur gum dang /_tsan+dan rnams lhan cig bum pa der blugs la bzlas brjod khri byas pas nad chen pos thebs pa bkrus na nad thams cad 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]med par 'gyur/_nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_de'i sdig pa thams cad kyang 'jig par 'gyur/_byad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/mdze'i nad kyis thebs pa bkrus na mdze nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sha bkra'i nad 
[\[302b.2\]]kyis thebs pa yang bkrus na sha bkra'i nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med bu 'dod pa rnams des khrus byas na bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub med pa khrus byas na dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/de la sogs pa gong nas gong du 'jig rten gyi dngos grub tu 
[\[302b.3\]]bya ba rnams kyang grub par 'gyur ro/_/gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro/_/nye ba'i snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste/_bzlas brjod 'bum byas na bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rkang pa la gtugs nas kye rig pa 'dzin pa bdag cag skyobs shig_/bdag cag gi srog chud ma 
[\[302b.4\]]gsan cig dang dka' ci stsal pa de bgyi'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod nyi khri cig stong byas na lha thams cad dang /_klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_rig sngags thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/ci bsgo ba de byed par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod sum khri byas na 'byung po 
[\[302b.5\]]dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod lnga khri byas na gang dgug pa de khugs par 'gyur te/_lha 'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'am/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi'am ci'am/_lha ma yin nam/_rig 'dzin nam/_bud med dam/_bram 
[\[302b.6\]]ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_sa bdag gam/_blon po'am/_btsun mo'am/_khrom gyi ru sna 'am/_mdun na 'don nam/_gzhan yang sems can sna tshogs khugs par 'gyur ro/_/gu gul dang yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg drug khri byas na dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/bdun 
[\[302b.7\]]khris ni rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/brgyad khris ni lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa mdun na sdod par 'gyur ro/_/dgu khris ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/'bum tshang bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu khyod gsang sngags thams cad dang /_bstan bcos thams cad grub kyis gang 'dod pa der song cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pas phyir mi ldog cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[303a.2\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gnang gis/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa gzhan dag kyang ci 'dod pa bzhin khyod kyis las thams cad byos shig ces ston par 'gyur ro/_/o~M ma Ni kuN+Da li hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_gdan gyi sngags 
[\[303a.3\]]so/_/o~M ma Ni bi dza ye d+ha rA d+ha rA hU~M phaT swA hA/_dkyil 'khor gyi sngags te yungs kar la lan bdun sngags bzlas pas so/_/o~M dz+wa li tam Ni ru tsi ra gri Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_yungs kar dang /_dri chur bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhi bcing ngo /_/o~M ma Ni pra b+ha ba ti ha na ha na hU~M phaT 
[\[303a.4\]]swA hA/_thal ba dang chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas log 'dren bcing ngo /_/o~M badzra ma Ni tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/_lan bdun bzlas te gtsug tor bcing ngo /_/o~M ma Ni bi pu la di ri di ri hU~M phaT/_gos kyi sngags so/_/oM bi du ma ti ha ra ha ra ma Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_nye reg gi sngags so/_/o~M su nir+m+ma la pa ti ha ra 
[\[303a.5\]]ha ra pa paM mi li mi li hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te khrus bya'o/_/o~M ma Ni d+ha re hU~M hU~M phaT/_bsang gtor gyi sngags so/_/o~M di ri di ri bi ma la ka ri hU~M hU~M phaT/_mchod phyir thogs kyi sngags so/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa ma Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_me tog gi sngags so/_/o~M 
[\[303a.6\]]sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha ma Ni s+pha ra Na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_dri'i sngags so/_/o~M dz+wa li ta ma Ni pra ba ra kU Ta gA ra s+pha ra Na bi ga te hU~M/_bdug pa'i sngags so/_/o~M dz+wa li ta shi kha ri ta pa li hU~M hU~M phaT/_mar me'i sngags so/_/o~M pra par gra ba li sa ra sa ra hU~M hU~M/_gtor ma'i sngags so/_/o~M ma hA ma Ni pU ra ya d+ha ra d+ha 
[\[303a.7\]]ra hU~M hU~M phaT/_mchod yon gyi sngags so/_/o~M ma hA bi ma le hU~M hU~M ba ra ba ra hU~M/_lha bshos kyi sngags so/_/o~M dz+wA la s+pha ra da ga ga na pra ta ra Ni hU~M hU~M/_sbyin sreg gi sngags so/_/o~M ru tsi ra ma Ni pra bar ta ya hU~M/_bgrang phreng gi sngags so/_/sngags 'dis lan bdun bgrang phreng la btab ste/_bzlas brjod 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags de dag thams cad bzlas par 'gyur zhing /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bzlas par yang 'gyur ro/_/o~M badzra ma Ni ka ra kiM ka ri hU~M hU~M phaT/_skyil mo krung gi sngags so/_/o~M su pra brti ta be ge ma Ni ma Ni swA hA/_
[\[303b.2\]]bzlas brjod kyi sngags so/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta thA yu dza be ta ra hU~M ma Ni ka ra Ne swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul ba'i sngags so/_/o~M su bi pu la la pra ba re du ru du ru hU~M hU~M/_spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ad+hiSh+ThA na tsi ta saM rak+Sha Na badzre hU~M hU~M/_gsol ba gdab pa'i 
[\[303b.3\]]sngags so/_/o~M su bi pu la ba da ni ha ra ha ra hU~M/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags so/_/o~M su bi pu la ba da ni ha ra ha ra hu~M/_lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad bod pa'i sngags so/_/o~M ma Ni be ga ba ti hU~M/_rgyal po chen po bzhi bod pa'i sngags 
[\[303b.4\]]so/_/o~M shu ba ma Ni hu lu hu lu hU~M/_slob ma'i sngags so/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya badzri Ni d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M hU~M/_'jug pa'i sngags so/_/o~M b+hi ra b+hi ra dze ga ga na pA hi ni li hu lu hu lu hU~M hU~M hU~M/_thams cad du mkhyen par byas pa'i sngags so/_/o~M ma Ni sum+b+ha ni be ga ba ti/_bdag dang che ge mo la 
[\[303b.5\]]srungs shig hU~M/_bsrung ba'i sngags so/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ku lo ti te sma ra Na bi ga te dz+wA la dz+wA la hU~M swA hA/_slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/_/thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/snying po 'di rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag thams cad yin te dpag tu med do/_/thams cad du yang lan brgya 
[\[303b.6\]]rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/_de nas dgos pa brtsam par bya'o/_/'di bton pas ni thams cad 'grub/_/'dis ni 'gro ba'i sdig kun sel/_/sdig pa de kun zad byed cing /_sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag_/lung ston 'gyur te the 
[\[303b.7\]]tsom med/_/gang gis snga mar sdig pa'i las/_/mang po byas pa 'jig par 'gyur/_/rig pa bla med su 'dzin pa/_/de dag myur du sangs rgyas 'grub/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pa'i/_/byang chub rtogs par sla ba dang /_/ji ltar gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/bsod nams dpag tu med 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]'thob bo/_/rig sngags rgyas par sgrub pa'i le'u ste/_cho ga gnyis pa'o//_//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/sngon du sa yongs su brtags nas phyi nas las brtsam par bya'o/_/dri'i snod gtsang mar blugs pa'i tshon sna lnga'i phye mas dkyil 
[\[304a.2\]]'khor sgo bzhi pa bri'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su tsan+dan gyis byugs te gur gum gyis mchod par bya'o/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni khru gnyis pa'o/_/phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni grwa bzhi pa rwa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun 
[\[304a.3\]]gyi gzhal med khang dang /_sangs rgyas kyi pad+ma'i gdan bkra zhing tshon sna bdun dang ldan par bya'o/_/pad+ma'i snying po'i steng du gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa mu khyud dang lte ba dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can te yu ba ni bai DUr+ya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la kun nas kha khyer dang ldan 
[\[304a.4\]]par bya'o/_/shar la sogs pa'i sgor ni khru'i tshad tsam gyi gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_tshon sna lnga'i rgya nag gi gos zung gis brgyan par bya'o/_/g.yon du lag na rdo rje bsdigs pa'i gzugs can rnga yab dang mtshon cha thogs shing bzhugs pa'o/_/g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[304a.5\]]nor bu rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa g.yas pa na nor bu dang /_rnga yab thogs nas bzhugs pa'o/_/zur bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste/_go cha dang tshem tshem bgos shing lag na mtshon cha thogs pa/_rgyan thams cad dang /_ral pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa drag po'i gzugs 
[\[304a.6\]]can bri bar bya'o/_/mtshams bzhir spos chus gang ba'i gser gyi snod bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/gal te gser gyi snod med na rdza'i bum pa tshad mi chung ba la gser g.yogs nas bya'o/_/de lta bu'i snod mi 'dzag par 'o mas gang bar byas nas phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[304a.7\]]gyi g.yas logs su lha mo dpal chen mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/g.yon du lha mo chen mo dung can ma bzhugs pa bri'o/_/sgo'i dbus su lha mo chen mo rdo rje pho nya mo phyag brgyad pa lag na mtshon cha thogs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing bzhugs pa bri'o/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]gyi snying po'i phyogs bzhir da ra sngon po 'phyang ba dang /_bcud sna tshogs dang /_tshul sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/_/bum pa gang ba bzhi dang /_mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'bras bu dang me tog sna tshogs rnams gzhag par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ni gser las grub 
[\[304b.2\]]pa'i bum pa gzhag go/_/so sor du ru ska bsreg par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi snying por dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi bum pa gzhag go/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdug spos so/_/nor bu 'dzin pa'i du ru ska dang /_tsan+dan dang /_ma hA rA dz+nyA dang /_kun du ru dang /_kA ka bi dza dang /_spos dkar gyi bdug pa'o/_/dpal 
[\[304b.3\]]lha mo'i tsan+da no/_/dung can ma'i gu gul lo/_/pho nya mo'i sha la'i bdug spos te so sor bsreg par bya'o/_/gtor ma yang sbyin no/_/dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i bya ba'o/_/phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni sgo bzhi rnam par 'byes shing cha mdzes pa bkra shis kyi sgo bzhi gnas pa bya'o/_/shar gyi sgor 
[\[304b.4\]]khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/lhor dbang phyug chen po'o/_/nub tu me tog so zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin mo'o/_/byang du 'jigs byed ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo ngo tsha dang bcas pa bya ste/_na chung bdun dang bcas pa'o/_/de nas phur bu sum cu so gnyis gdab par byas la kha dog lnga'i skud pas phur 
[\[304b.5\]]bu bcing ngo /_/zur bzhi mnyam par kha dog lnga'i ba dan gyis brgyan no/_/me tog sna tshogs dgram pa dang /_gtor ma dang /_me tog sna tshogs rnams ma 'khrugs pa mnyam par bya'o/_/bcud sna tshogs 'phrog pa'i snod bdun gzhag go/_/rdza'i snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_phye ma'i snod sum cu 
[\[304b.6\]]rtsa gnyis dang /_pog phor sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_mar me brgya rtsa brgyad gzhag par bya'o/_/phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang /_dri yis gang ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/_/bdug pa dang kun du ru sna tshogs sreg go/_/de nas sgo nas 'jug pa la dri yis gang ba'i bum pa gnyis bzhag la/_ji ltar 
[\[304b.7\]]rnyed pa'i gtor ma byin nas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhug pa'i cho ga la spyad la/_de nas oM ma Ni bi pu la pra tiSh+Thi ta sid+d+he a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya maM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She kair+b+ha ra b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hU~M/_ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'dis dbang bskur na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin pa dang /_
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]thams cad 'grub pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yang mngon du 'gyur ro/_/gang bsams pa'i don de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos zab mo la bzod pa 'thob cing rjes su 
[\[305a.2\]]rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu la sogs pa yon tan gyi khyad par rnams 'thob ste/_ji srid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ma rdzogs kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sgrub pa'i le'u ste/_cho ga gsum 
[\[305a.3\]]pa'o//_//de nas phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o/_/snying po chen po bzhi'i phyag rgya la sbyar ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi la sbyar ba dang /_lag na rdo rje'i snying po bzhi'i phyag rgya btus pa rnams dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi gdan gyi phyag rgya dang /_phyag rgya gzhan yang brtsam 
[\[305a.4\]]par bya'o/_/'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya la sbyar ba'i cho ga dang /_phyi rol gyi phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o/_/thams cad du phyag rgya gzhan rnams ji ltar bde bar brjod do/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sbyar ba ni/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ma Ni dz+wa la ni A be shA ya hU~M/_
[\[305a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya'o/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pra ba ra gra ma ni hU~M/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/_/o~M sarba ta tha ga ta ya bi saM r+b+ho d+ha na badzra hU~M hU~M/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na ma Ni ma Ni hU~M hU~M phaT/_
[\[305a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi phyag rgya'o/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pra ba ra ma Ni ru tsi ru tsi hU~M hU~M phaT/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje seng ge'i khri'i phyag rgya'o/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta bi pu la saM b+ha be hU~M hU~M phaT/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma 
[\[305a.7\]]Ni badzra hU~M hU~M/_chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta dza ya a pa rA dzi ta badzra hU~M hU~M/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgyA+o/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu ma hA ma Ni shi kha re ha ra ha ra hU~M hU~M/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badzra ha ya ha ra ha ra hU~M 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]phaT/_'phags pa lag na rdo rjes gzung ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/o~M du ru du ru ma Ni ma Ni ma hA bin+du ta ma Ni swA hA/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ste/_'phags pa nor bu'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/_/o~M lo ka li te dze ya dza ya hU~M hU~M/_rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o/_/o~M bi pu la gra pa ti saM 
[\[305b.2\]]b+ha ra hUM/_dpal lha mo'i phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o/_/o~M daM Sh+Ti ni saM hU~M/_dung can ma'i bsdigs pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/o~M A ga ma ya drI ra mu ts+tsha da tA hA sti ni hU~M/_pho nya mo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/_/o~M saman+ta a ka ri bi pU ra Ni ta ga ta ka hU~M hU~M phaT/_dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/spyan drang 
[\[305b.3\]]ba'i phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o/_/o~M sa ra sa ra bi sa ra hU~M hU~M/_pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya rgyas pa'i le'u ste cho ga bzhi pa'o//_//de nas don kun sgrub pa'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/_ras kha tshar ma bcad pa/_skra med pa/_khru gang ba'am/_khru do gru bzhi lham pa la ri mo mkhan 
[\[305b.4\]]smyung ba byas pas snod sar bar tshon sbyin med pas bcom ldan 'das rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_pad+ma'i steng na chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa/_khang pa brtsegs mas yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o/_/g.yas su lag na rdo rje lag pa bcu gnyis pa ston ka'i 'dam bu mda' rgyu lta bu'i mdog can/_
[\[305b.5\]]lag pa na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa/_gdong bzhi pa bya ste/_gdong dang po ni zhi ba'o/_/gnyis pa ni khro bo'o/_/gsum pa ni mche ba gtsigs pa'o/_/bzhi pa ni gdong khro gnyer can gyen du lta ba ste/_ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhag pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_pad+ma'i steng na 
[\[305b.6\]]skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug pa bya'o/_/g.yon phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rdo rje zhes bya ba gdong bzhi pa lag pa bcu drug pa bya ste/_lag pa g.yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul ba/_lag pa g.yon na pad+ma thogs pa/_lag pa gcig 
[\[305b.7\]]gis dbugs 'byin pa/_lag pa gnyis ni thal mo sbyar ba bya'o/_/lag pa gzhan ni mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa bya ste/_rtse gsum pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_ral gri dang /_me tog gi phur ma dang /_bgrang phreng dang /_ril ba spyi'u blugs dang /_ral gri dang /_glegs bam dang /_mchod 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]rten dang /_ri rab bo/_gdong dang po ni zhi ba'o/_/gdong g.yas pa ni nag po chen po dang 'dra ba'o/_/gdong g.yon pa ni mi'i seng ge'i dbyibs/_shing pa la sha'i kha dog lta bu'o/_/gdong gong ma ni bzhin bsgyur ba pad+ma'i stan la skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug pa bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dung 
[\[306a.2\]]can ma bri ste/_lag pa brgyad pa pus mo btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu dpal lha mo chen mo pus mo btsugs nas nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul ba bya'o/_/dpal lha mo 
[\[306a.3\]]chen mo'i rgyab tu pho nya mo bzhin 'dzum pa lag pa bzhi pa/_rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa bya'o/_/dung can ma'i rgyab tu me tog so gos dkar po gyon pa/_me tog thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la gyen du blta ba bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rin 
[\[306a.4\]]po che sna bdun gyi kha dog can gyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/_sdong bu ni bai DUr+ya/_snying po ni gser las byas pa bya'o/_/de'i steng du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi 'khor lo shin tu rnam par phye ba lte ba dang bcas pa/_kun nas 'bar ba/_shin tu rnam par bkra ba bri bar bya'o/_/pad+ma de'i drung du rgyal po chen po 
[\[306a.5\]]bzhi ya lad dang /_go cha dang tshem tshem bgos pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o/_/pad+ma de'i drung du rdzing bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bya'o/_/rdzing de'i 'gram du rig pa 'dzin pa/_lag pa na pog phor dang /_me tog gi mgo lcogs thogs la lag pa cig shos na bgrang 
[\[306a.6\]]phreng thogs te/_pus mo btsugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la gyen du blta ba bya'o/_/khang pa brtsegs ma'i gan du tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa nam mkha'i dkyil na bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed pa bya'o/_/de la sogs pa sku 
[\[306a.7\]]gzugs kyi cho ga rnams bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas gos dkar po bgos te/_zas dkar gsum zabs tshes brgyad nas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga nya'i bar du sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzlas brjod 'bum tshang bar bya'o/_/de nas sku gzugs 'gul zhing bdag nyid 'bar bar mthong bar 'gyur/_sgrib pa 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]med pa'i mig thob par 'gyur/_nor bu rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[306b.2\]]las thar bar 'gyur/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la sogs pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/ser sna'i dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur/_bsod nams thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/_bde ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang 
[\[306b.3\]]dag par gzung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/_lha thams cad kyis yang dag par gzung bar 'gyur/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_yi 
[\[306b.4\]]dgas dang /_sha za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis kyang bsrung bar 'gyur/_rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur/_'jig rten thams cad la dbang bskur bar 'gyur/_
