[\[306b.5\]]yon tan dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/_de la sogs pa yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur/_mthong ba tsam mam/_bzlas brjod byas pa tsam mam/_bklags pa tsam gyis yon tan dang /_phan yon 'di dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur na cho ga lhag par mang 
[\[306b.6\]]du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gang zhig klog par byed pa dang /_'don par byed pa dang /_bzlas brjod la mngon par brtson par byed pa dang /_sgrub par byed pa dang /_phyag rgya'i tshogs sgrub par byed pa dang /_rig sngags sgrub par byed pa dang /_ras zung sgrub par byed pa'i sems can 
[\[306b.7\]]de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kho nar brjod par bya ste/_mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par blta bar bya/_shes par bya/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa gnang bas sems can de ni phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gsal bar lung bstan pa yin no/_/phyin cad ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang 
[\[307a.2\]]der pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar shes par bya'o/_/phyin cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad par 
[\[307a.3\]]'gyur zhing byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/_/sku gzugs rgyas pa chen po'i le'u ste cho ga lnga pa'o//_//don kun grub par byed pa yi/_/sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya/_/sems can kun gyi bde thob pa/_/zhi ba yi ni las brtsam mo/_/rig pa 'dzin pas gsang bya 
[\[307a.4\]]ste/_/nges par tshangs par spyod pa yis/_/sems can thams cad yid dga' ba'i/_/de nas sbyin sreg dag bya'o/_/oM swa ha pa ti b+hur+b+hu ba hu~M hu~M phaT swA hA/_sngags 'dis til dang /_yungs kar dang /_mar las sbyin sreg byas na rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bgegs 
[\[307a.5\]]dang log 'dren thams cad tshar gcad par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba thams cad rmugs par byas par 'gyur/_rengs par byas par 'gyur/_rmongs par byas par 'gyur/_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa thams cad 
[\[307a.6\]]med par 'gyur ro/_/gu gul dang /_yungs kar dang mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/_gdon thams cad kyi klad pa 'gas par 'gyur/_'byung po thams cad kyis gnod pa byas pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_rims nad la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nad thams 
[\[307a.7\]]cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/mar dang yungs kar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/_yul thob par 'gyur ro/_/sa bon bdug pa dang /_mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/_bdud la sogs pa'i gdug pas 'jigs skrag pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la sogs pa 'jig 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sgron shing dang mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/_rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/ci 'dod pa de byed do/_/gang dang gang bslangs pa de dang de 'thob bo/_/ri khar sra rtsi pog dang /_yungs kar dang /_mar las sbyin sreg byas na/_
[\[307b.2\]]lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur/_rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar dang /_til mar dang /_nA ga ge sar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ci bsgo ba byed do/_/dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do/_/phyin cad ser ba'i 
[\[307b.3\]]'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/kha zas la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na 'bru stong du 'phel zhing mang por 'gyur ro/_/lan tshwa la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gnod sbyin mo thams cad lhags nas rje btsun srog dang ma dbral cig dang /_bka' ci stsal pa de bgyi'o zhes rkang pa la gtugs par 
[\[307b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/'bras dang mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma la kha bltas te na le sham las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na de la lha thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/dpal thams 
[\[307b.5\]]cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/dpal lha mo'i mdun du til dang yungs kar las sbyin sreg byas na nor mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/shing arga'i yam sreg shing dang mar las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa 
[\[307b.6\]]thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags thams cad mngon du 'gyur/_nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/_dgra thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'di'i 
[\[307b.7\]]mthus bde ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur/_byad thams cad dang /_bcings pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la sogs te sbyin sreg gi las rnams kyis mchog tu zhi bar 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]byed do/_/bde ba rab tu sbyin par byed do/_/nor thob par byed/_don 'grub par byed cing lta ba ngan par ltung ba'i sems can thams cad nyams par byed do/_/sbyin sreg grub pa rgyas pa'i le'u ste cho ga drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[308a.2\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje 'di ni cho ga zhi ba mo'i rgyal po yin/_'di ni yon tan khyad par chen po can yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[308a.3\]]kyi chos 'khor lo bskor ba yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs pa yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa yin/_
[\[308a.4\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gdan yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud thams cad pham par byed cing 'joms par byed pa yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dam pa yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[308a.5\]]cad kyi gsang ba dam pa yin/_lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba yin/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa 'jig pa yin/_'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi dmyal ba thams cad skems 
[\[308a.6\]]pa yin/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten zlog pa yin/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar byed pa yin no/_/'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid 
[\[308a.7\]]mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams skems par byed pa yin no/_/lag na rdo rje 'on kyang bsod nams kyi phung po 'byung ba lha'i mig gis blta ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyis kyang brjod kyis mi lang ste/_yon tan gyi khyad par de ltar rgya che zhing /_de ltar zab 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]pa/_ra ba mchog gya nom pa la sogs pa de ltar gong nas gong du rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/_/nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di ni/_sems can skal ba 
[\[308b.2\]]chung ba rnams kyi lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/_thos par mi 'gyur/_bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur/_'chang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba de'i lag tu mchog tu gsang ba 'di 'ong ba'am/_
[\[308b.3\]]nyan pa'am/_bsnyen bkur byed pa'am/_'dzin par lta ga la 'gyur/_lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gting dpag dka' ste/_lag na rdo rje gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma dang 
[\[308b.4\]]mnyam pa rnams la/_bskal pa brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_zhal zas dang /_btung ba dang /_bcibs pa dang /_pho brang rnams 
[\[308b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la/_nyi ma re re 'bul zhing /_de bzhin du me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang /_gang 
[\[308b.6\]]gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis byur bur bkang ste/_nyi ma re re sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul ba ni/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi/_lag na rdo rje gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di lan 
[\[308b.7\]]cig bzlas brjod byas na/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo /_/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig dran par gyur na/_de gong du 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par yongs su bsgrags pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur/_mkho ba'i yo byad khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la/_de ltar nyin gcig 
[\[309a.2\]]bzhin mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis 
[\[309a.3\]]a la la zhes ca co dang /_ga zha'i sgra cher bton nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma'o sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mtshungs par mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gsang ba dam pa'i snying po 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag 
[\[309a.4\]]lags so/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shAkya thub pa la/_legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 
[\[309a.5\]]'phrul chen pos mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gshegs so/_/'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi 
[\[309a.6\]]mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur zhing /_slad nas rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
